entries.name: 千面万相
entries.description: 13级起，德鲁伊具有任意改变相貌的能力，如同@Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}的效果，但使用时必须是原本身形。

entries.name: 千面万相
entries.description: 18级起，变形者获得任意改变相貌的能力，如同@Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}，但使用时必须是原本身形。

entries.name: Abadar's Boon
entries.description:
You can spend 1 minute meditating on and communing with a masterwork object of any type. At the end of this time, you can speak with that item. This functions as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{石言术}, except that it works with masterwork goods, and the item cannot tell you what it covers or conceals if that question is not applicable to it.

  You can speak with items in this way for a number of minutes equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

entries.name: 异怪血统
entries.description:
在你的血统中，有一个外来和怪异的污点。你趋向于使用奇怪的方式思考，从大多数人所不希望的角度接近问题。随着时间的推移，这个污点在你的外形上得以显现。

  本职技能: 知识（地城）

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{巧言术}(7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66vvhyiy5q8yzbq2]{弱智术}(11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{精通卸武},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{精通擒抱},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识 ：地城).

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个“变形”子学派的法术，该法术延续时间增加50%（至少为1轮）。这项奖励不能与 @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时} 专长叠加

entries.name: Aberrant Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
There is a taint in your blood that is both alien and bizarre. When you bloodrage, this manifests in peculiar and terrifying ways.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{精通卸武},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{精通擒抱},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}.

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (16th)

entries.name: 异怪形态
entries.description: 20级开始，你的身体变得完全异常。你免疫重击和偷袭。另外，你获得60尺盲视和伤害减免“5/-”。

entries.name: 化身异怪(血脉狂怒者)
entries.description: 20级起，你的身体变得异样。你免疫重击与偷袭。此外，你获得60尺盲视，血脉狂怒者的伤害减免增加1点。即便没有处于血怒之时，你也会一直获得这些优势。

entries.name: 异怪强韧
entries.description: 8级起，你免疫恶心（sickened）与反胃（nauseated）状态。

entries.name: 异怪抗力
entries.description: 16级起，你免疫疾病（disease）、力竭（exhaustion）、疲乏（fatigue）、毒素（poison）以及恍惚（staggered）状态。

entries.name: Ability Increase (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon grows larger muscles, gains faster reflexes, achieves greater intelligence, or acquires another increase to one of its abilities. Increase one of the eidolon's ability scores by +2.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. It can only be applied once to an individual ability score, plus 1 additional time for every 6 levels the summoner possesses.

entries.name: Ability Increase (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
The eidolon grows larger muscles, gains faster reflexes, achieves greater intelligence, or acquires another increase to one of its abilities. Increase one of the eidolon閳ユ獨 ability scores by 2.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. It can be applied only once to an individual ability score, plus one additional time for every 6 levels the summoner possesses.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase (SPI)
entries.description: The phantom adds 1 to one of its ability scores.

entries.name: Abjuration Resonant School
entries.description:
Abjuration implements are objects associated with protection and wards.

Implements: Amulet, armor, bell, bracers, brooch, cloak, holy symbol, shield.

entries.name: 防护学派
entries.description: 护法师使用魔法对抗它本身，同样也掌握了防御和守卫魔法的艺术。

entries.name: Abnormal Anatomy
entries.description: At 12th level, your internal anatomy shifts and changes, giving you a 50% chance to negate any critical hit or sneak attack that hits you. The damage is instead rolled normally.

entries.name: 异怪触及
entries.description: 4级起，你的肢体变得更长；这使得你的触及增加5尺。

entries.name: Aboleth Curse
entries.description:
Your mind is marked by aboleth tampering, either as a result of a close encounter with one of these creatures while you were a child, or even through an ancestor, close family member, or one of your sisters or brothers in faith閳ユ敄his associate閳ユ獨 interaction with the aboleths may be all that it takes to infect you. You take a 閳? penalty on saving throws against mind-affecting effects and add @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术} to your list of 1st-level oracle spells known.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

entries.name: Abominate
entries.description:
The witch transforms a creature within 30 feet into an aberration. This hex acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.t8ei2mrmqg7252vw]{恶意变形术}, except the target is transmuted into a Small, Medium, or Large aberration. The target閳ユ獨 abilities are modified as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6jc9e9qooa4c89vr]{Monstrous Physique IV}.

  Whether or not its save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: Abomination Discipline
entries.description:
Your mind is impure, tainted by outside forces. These might be monstrous ancestors whose blood still flows within you, or powerful and unknowable psychic forces that intrude upon your mind. Like a psychic disease, this influence consumes part of your brain, creating a dark counterpart to your normal self. Every time you call forth a psychic spell, you閳ユ獧e drawing on this dangerous force閳ユ攣nd potentially giving it a greater hold on you. This malign influence might stem from creatures like rakshasas and aboleths, or perhaps malign entities that dwell in the voids between the stars.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnocwsre2mckj58a]{Excruciating Deformation} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yi0rf7b0v4lev9fl]{Explode Head} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{排斥术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.003tu19dpyoaj0se]{Orb Of The Void}(16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.egbw0mba2cpe3xe5]{Telekinetic Storm} (18th).

entries.name: 辟榖食气
entries.description: 你只需要你所属种族原本需求量一半程度的饮食就可以生存。除此之外，当你屏息时，你可以保持屏息的时间额外增加相当于你的先知等级的轮数。在15级时，你无需饮食就能生存，并且你可以屏息的时间提升到原本的10倍长度（每点体质值可以让你屏息2分钟，外加每先知等级1分钟的额外时间）。

entries.name: 神足通
entries.description: 你可以以类法术能力的形式使用法术羽落术，每天可以持续的轮数相当于你的先知等级。这些轮数无需连续生效。如果你在坠落的羽落术生效期间用完了这个能力的持续时间，那么你会如常的从已经羽落的高度掉下去并承受坠落伤害。在10级时，你还可以消耗本能力的每日使用轮数来获得法术凌空而行的效果。

entries.name: Absentia
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0
Prerequisite emptiness

  You are always under the effect of @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测} as if you had cast it on yourself. If the effect is dispelled, you can call if forth again as a standard action. You can accept 1 point of burn to grant a creature touched the effects of nondetection.

entries.name: Absorb Blow
entries.description: You gain DR/閳?and resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic equal to 1/2 your medium level. Add @Compendium[pf1.spells.uo317ywjn95w316n]{牺牲} to your medium spells known as a 2nd-level spell.

entries.name: 遁术
entries.description: 12级起，武僧能够神奇地在空间中瞬移，就像使用 @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门}. 法术一样。使用此能力是一个移动动作，且必须自丹田中耗去2点气。他的施法者等级等于他的武僧等级，但他使用此能力时不能携带其他生物一起移动。

entries.name: Abundant Step (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ki power can slip magically between spaces, as if using the spell dimension door. Using this ability is a move action that consumes 2 points from his ki pool. The monk’s caster level for this effect is equal to his monk level. He cannot take other creatures with him when he uses this ability.

  A monk must be at least 8th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 深渊之血
entries.description: 每天一次，当野蛮人进入狂暴状态时，他的体型可以从基本程度上增长一个等级（如同法术人类变巨术，不过野蛮人的生物种类并无变化）。

entries.name: 高等深渊之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，他获得5点强酸，寒冷和火焰抗力。

entries.name: 次级深渊之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，他将获得两次爪抓攻击。这些攻击视为主要天生武器攻击且使用完整的基本攻击加值。中体型野蛮人的爪抓可以造成1d6点挥砍伤害（小体型野蛮人1d4点）加上完整的力量调整值。

entries.name: 深渊血统
entries.description:
数代前，一个恶魔在你的遗传中散播它的污秽。虽然它并没有在你所有的亲属身上得到显现，不过在你身上尤为强势。你有时会有邪恶和无序的冲动。不过命运（和阵营）依然掌握在你手中。

  本职技能: 知识（位面）

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9tww9fc9049h6iqc]{惊恐术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术}(9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.k3zn13pbr5tr9zac]{驱逐术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{高等传送术} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{邪恶灵光} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{召唤怪物 IX} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{增强召唤},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{顺势斩},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.dn2KgHFQRbuoNRx0]{精通冲撞},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lpXdFoT6OqS5vi2X]{精通破武},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识 ：位面).

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个“召唤”子学派的法术，召唤生物获得伤害减免“1/2术士等级（最小为1）/善良”。这项奖励不能与召唤生物的任何原有伤害减免叠加。

entries.name: 深渊血怒
entries.description: 12级起，血怒赋予力量的士气加值增加2点，但是AC的减值变为-4点以取代原本的-2点。16级起，这个加值增加至4点。20级起，它增加至6点。

entries.name: Abyssal Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
Generations ago, a demon spread its filth into the essence of your bloodline. While it doesn閳ユ獩 manifest in all of your kin, in those moments when you閳ユ獧e bloodraging, you embody its terrifying presence.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{顺势斩}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.dn2KgHFQRbuoNRx0]{精通冲撞}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lpXdFoT6OqS5vi2X]{精通破武}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (16th)

entries.name: Abyssal Claws
entries.description: At 1st level, you can grow claws as a free action. These claws are treated as natural weapons, allowing you to make two claw attacks as a full attack action using your full base attack bonus. These attacks deal 1d4 points of damage each (1d3 if you are Small) plus your Strength modifier. At 5th level, these claws are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming DR. At 7th level, the damage increases by one step to 1d6 points of damage (1d4 if you are Small). At 11th level, these claws become flaming weapons, each dealing an additional 1d6 points of fire damage on a successful hit. You can use your claws for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

entries.name: 深渊利爪(血脉狂怒者)
entries.description: 1级起，当你处于血怒中时，会长出利爪。这些爪子被视为天生武器，使你能够使用完整的基本攻击加值，以全力攻击动作（full-attack action）进行两次爪抓攻击。这些攻击每下造成1d6点伤害（若你的体型为小型则是1d4点）加上你的力量调整值。4级起，这些爪子在克服伤害减免时被视作魔法武器。8级起，爪子的伤害增加至1d8点（小型为1d6点）。12级起，这些爪子变为炽焰（flaming）武器，每只爪子成功命中造成额外1d6点火焰伤害。

entries.name: AC加值(拳师)
entries.description:
当不着甲，着轻甲也没有过度负重时，拳师在她的的AC与CMD上获得+1闪避加值。在第9级，13级和18级时，这个加值还会额外+1。

  该加值在拳师对抗接触攻击时依然起效。当她行动不能或者无助时拳师将失去此加值。而当拳师穿戴中甲或重甲，或者负重达到中载或重载时都将失去此加值。

entries.name: AC加值(武僧)
entries.description: 当不穿甲也没有过度负重时，武僧可以将其感知加值（如果有）加在他的AC与CMD上。另外，4级武僧AC与CMD+1，而之后每4个武僧等级该加值都会再增加1点，直到20级的+5。该加值在武僧对抗接触攻击或者措手不及时依然起效。当他无法动作或者无助时他将失去此加值。而当他穿戴任何盔甲，使用盾牌，或者负重达到中载或重载时都将失去此加值。

entries.name: AC Bonus (PSY)
entries.description: When unarmored and unencumbered, you add your Wisdom bonus (if any) to your AC and CMD. The bonus to AC applies even against touch attacks or when you閳ユ獧e flat-footed. You lose these bonuses when you閳ユ獧e immobilized or helpless, when you wear any armor, when you carry a shield, or when you carry a medium or heavy load.

entries.name: AC Bonus (UMK)
entries.description:
When unarmored and unencumbered, the monk adds his Wisdom bonus (if any) to his AC and his CMD. In addition, a monk gains a +1 bonus to AC and CMD at 4th level. This bonus increases by 1 for every four monk levels thereafter, up to a maximum of +5 at 20th level.

  These bonuses to AC apply even against touch attacks or when the monk is flat-footed. He loses these bonuses when he is immobilized or helpless, when he wears any armor, when he carries a shield, or when he carries a medium or heavy load.

entries.name: Acceleration of Form
entries.description: A ninja with this trick can spend 1 ki point as a standard action to gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术} for 1 round per 2 ninja levels.

entries.name: 飞来横祸
entries.description: 萨满可以让一个距离他不超过30尺的生物突然绊一跤摔倒在地。萨满需要进行一个施法者等级检定，DC=他想摔一跤目标的CMD。如果萨满的施法者等级检定成功，目标就会摔倒，承受1d6点伤害并被击倒至俯卧状态。如果目标的邻接位置有一个坑洞或类似的险境，他还必须成功通过一个反射检定（DC=萨满的施法者等级检定结果）否则将被摔进去。然后观察者如果想看出这灾祸其实是萨满做的手脚，他必须通过一个察言观色检定来对抗萨满的施法者等级检定结果。

entries.name: Accurate Poisoner
entries.description: A rogue with this talent delivers poisons with deadly precision. When the rogue successfully hits an opponent with a poisoned weapon and would deal sneak attack damage, she can forgo the sneak attack damage and increase the poison閳ユ獨 potency. If she does, the poison閳ユ獨 duration increases by 2 (for example, large scorpion venom lasts for 8 rounds instead of 6 rounds, and drow poison lasts for 4 minutes instead of 2 minutes).

entries.name: Accurate Stance (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can focus her strikes. She gains a +1 competence bonus on melee attack rolls and thrown weapon attack rolls. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has.

  This is a stance rage power.

entries.name: 精确打击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：魔战士可以迅捷动作从【奥能力池】中花费2点奥能来使他该轮所有的近战武器攻击变成近战接触攻击。

entries.name: 咒怨血统
entries.description:
不幸、疾病和梦魇如附骨之蛆一般缠绕着你的家系。在你家族历史的某个时点，鬼婆禁忌的影响渗入了你的血统。你或许与该鬼婆存在真实连结，或许仍在忍受着她下在你祖先身上的诅咒折磨。如今，鬼婆的力量已经是你遗传基因的一部分。

  本职技能: 察觉.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线}(3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{愚者之触} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vlzave855irdc7yu]{力竭射线} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66vvhyiy5q8yzbq2]{弱智术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱}(15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ef75tkrzjuotgra2]{次元锁} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{防御式战斗训练},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0spsP9ylE3goD3jc]{骑乘战斗}.

  血统奥秘: 你可被视为鬼婆加入一个鬼婆战团（hag's coven）。该战团必须已至少存在一只鬼婆。此外，当你30尺距离内有另一位拥有此血统的术士、或一位拥有“战团”巫术的女巫时，你可以通过援助他人动作使他们的施法者等级在1轮内提高1级。

entries.name: Accursed Curse
entries.description:
You are cursed with misfortune and sorrow, and you cannot gain benefit from morale bonuses. However, you gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws against curse effects.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.2qbdesr0fwtmi9tj]{Brand, Greater} to your list of spells known.

  At 15th level, you are immune to curse effects except for your own oracle curse.

entries.name: 病痛成自然
entries.description: 3级起，你免疫恶心，同时在对抗反胃和疾病的豁免检定上获得+4加值。9级起，你免疫反胃和疾病所带来的负面效应。（但你还是可以染病。）

entries.name: 强酸炸弹
entries.description: 当炼金术师制作炼金炸弹时，他可以选择让它造成强酸伤害替代火焰伤害。受到强酸炸弹直接命中的生物会在1轮后受到1d6点额外强酸伤害。

entries.name: 酸镖 (牧师)
entries.description: 你能用标准动作发出一道酸镖。通过远程接触攻击一个30尺以内的敌人，酸镖造成“1d6+1/2牧师等级”的强酸伤害。你每天可以使用此能力次数“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 强酸镖（法师）
entries.description: 你能通过一个标准动作释放一道强酸飞镖，通过一次远程接触攻击30尺以内的任何敌人。此强酸镖造成“1d6+1/2法师等级”强酸伤害。你每天可以使用此能力次数为“3+智力修正”。此攻击无视法术抗力。

entries.name: 酸液喷射
entries.description: 奥能师可以从【奥能源泉】中消费1点来发射出一股强酸。他能对30尺距离内任一目标进行一次远程接触攻击。若攻击命中，则造成“1d6+奥能师魅力调整值”的强酸伤害。1级以后每2级再增强1d6点（最高在19级达到10d6）。目标还会恶心1d4轮，通过强韧豁免则不会恶心。

entries.name: Acid Resistance
entries.description: At 6th level, you gain resist acid 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to acid.

entries.name: 酸性皮肤
entries.description: 你获得5点强酸抗力。在5级该抗力变为10，11级变为20。17级，你免疫强酸。

entries.name: 酸性射线
entries.description: 1级开始，你能用标准动作发出一道酸性射线。通过一个远程接触攻击任何30尺以内的敌人。酸性射线造成“1d6+1/2术士等级”的强酸伤害。你每天可以使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Acrobatic Assist
entries.description: You can expend an attack of opportunity to perform an aid another action to assist an adjacent ally閳ユ獨 Acrobatics check, so long as he makes the check as part of movement that passes through your space or an adjacent space. Additionally, whenever you use the aid another action to assist an ally in making an Acrobatics check and you succeed, your ally gains a +1 dodge bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity caused when he moves out of or within a threatened area, until the end of his turn.

entries.name: 忍法·身捷
entries.description: 拥有该忍术的忍者可以聚气，令她下轮开始前在特技技能检定上获得+20加值，这是一个迅捷动作。使用本能力消耗1点气。

entries.name: 翻滚绝技
entries.description: 每日1次，当具有该项天赋的盗贼至少被两名敌人夹击，而且任何威胁到盗贼的敌人攻击她时，盗贼可以以直觉动作尝试一次特技动作检定，以此来对抗威胁生物中最高的CMD，若威胁到盗贼的敌人超过两名，则每增加一名敌人，此次对抗的CMD就增加2点。若检定成功，盗贼便能够向任意方向进行五尺快步，不过她必须在移动后仍处于触发移动的攻击者的触及范围内。以盗贼的最终位置来判断攻击者是否会从夹击中获益。若盗贼的检定失败，那么她会在初始地点倒地（prone），而攻击者会正常判定攻击（敌人的攻击在对抗倒地的目标时会获得+4加值）。盗贼每具有5个盗贼等级，每日便能多使用该能力1次。盗贼必须在特技动作技能上受训才能选取该项盗贼天赋。

entries.name: 一心同体
entries.description: 15级时，骑将可以以一个标准动作来以其标准速度移动并做出一次近战攻击。30尺内的所有同伴也可以以直觉动作进行一次移动和攻击。如果地形符合，移动和攻击可以以冲锋的形式做出。所有这样的攻击都有+2加值（与冲锋带来的加值叠加），并且所有参与者的AC获得+2闪避加值，持续一轮。骑将每次战斗可使用此能力1次。

entries.name: Action Before Thought (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 2 ki points as a free action as part of rolling initiative to roll twice on the initiative check and take the higher result.

  A monk must be at least 6th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 随时开干
entries.description: 在2等时，骑士获得随手武器（Catch Off-Guard）做为奖励专长。以一个迅捷动作，他在该轮对一个有武装的敌人，以临时武器造成的攻击，可以将该名敌人视为措手不及。这个能力一场战斗可以用一次。

entries.name: 加强召唤
entries.description: 15级开始，当你使用怪物召唤法术召唤恶魔或者炼狱生物时，额外召唤来一个同种生物。

entries.name: 老练缴械
entries.description: 8级时，骑将获得精通卸武作为奖励专长。额外的，当他成功做了一个卸武检定时，只要他有至少一只手空着并且被卸武的物品可以被一只手拿着，被卸武物品可以自动落到他空着的手中。

entries.name: 融合学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 塑能学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代塑能学派的力场飞弹和元素墙能力。

entries.name: 倾慕
entries.description: 以直觉动作，你能阻碍以你自己为目标的近战或者远程攻击。此能力是个类似“圣域术”的心智效果，但只能对一次攻击有效。你必须在攻击宣言和投骰之间发动此能力，目标可通过一次意志豁免来不受此影响。若目标能进行多次攻击，只有一次会受到阻碍。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换魅力领域的恍惚接触。

entries.name: Adumbration
entries.description: At 13th level, shadows move to conceal you. You gain a bonus on Stealth checks equal to half your level. In addition, you can use the Stealth skill even while being observed and without cover or concealment, as long as you are within 10 feet of a shadow other than your own. You gain no benefit from adumbration in areas of bright light.

entries.name: Advanced Psychic Magic (UC) (3 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype; intermediate psychic magic evolution; Charisma 12; summoner level 7th.

  The eidolon gains 5 points of psychic energy that it can spend each day. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{黑暗术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.13pilcgm2oydyogv]{Disfiguring Touch}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fa3oswb6t4drz74g]{Id Insinuation I}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.it1fbobapvnp5swg]{Mind Thrust II}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{愚者之触}

  The eidolon can cast that spell as a psychic spell by spending 2 points of psychic energy. The caster level and save DC are the same as for basic psychic magic. This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 amount of psychic energy available to spend each day does not stack閳ユ攰t uses only the highest number of points granted by its most powerful psychic magic evolution.

entries.name: Advanced Slayer Talents
entries.description: At 10th level and every 2 levels thereafter, a slayer can select an advanced talent in place of a slayer talent.

entries.name: 高等天赋
entries.description: 10级时，以及之后每2级，杀手可以从高等天赋中进行选择，替代杀手天赋。

entries.name: Aegis
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus and touch a suit of armor or a shield to grant it an enhancement bonus. The bonus is equal to 1 + 1 for every 6 occultist levels you possess (to a maximum bonus of +4 at 18th level). Enhancement bonuses gained via this ability stack with those of the armor or shield, to a maximum total enhancement bonus of +5.

  You can also imbue the armor or shield with any one armor or shield special ability that has an equivalent enhancement bonus less than or equal to your maximum bonus granted by this ability by reducing the granted enhancement bonus by the appropriate amount. The item must have an enhancement bonus of at least +1 (from the item itself or from aegis) to gain an armor or shield special ability. In either case, these bonuses last for 1 minute.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zuqlok69lapqc6lg]{心灵连线}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (aeons only)

entries.name: Aerial Adaptation
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You are immune to altitude sickness, and gain an amount of electricity resistance equal to twice your current amount of burn.

entries.name: Aerial Evasion
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 1
Prerequisite enveloping winds

  You use wind to buffet yourself away from area attacks. Until the next time your burn is removed, you gain @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.KQYCRLEdD4bGA5ak]{Evasion}, as the rogue class feature.

entries.name: Aether Architect
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Su); Level 9; Burn 0

  You can spin a small building, bridge, or other edifice out of aether, and even use aether to tether a building to a flat surface other than the ground. By concentrating for 10 minutes, you can create an edifice out of scintillating aether (same hardness and hit points as a wall of force) as long as the edifice is no larger than one 10-foot cube per kineticist level. Unless the creation is extremely simplistic, you must succeed at a Craft or Knowledge ：工程 check to add embellishments.

  This ability can also create a series of tethers to securely attach a normal building to a vertical surface or even a cavern ceiling. Aether architect lasts as long as you concentrate, and you can accept 1 point of burn to make the effect last until destroyed; by accepting this burn, you can use this ability any number of times in a row to create a larger edifice.

entries.name: Aether Puppet
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0

  You use strands of aether to animate an object. You can animate a Medium or smaller object as an animated object (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 14) with no Construction Point abilities (except for stone or metal [common], if the object is constructed of one of those materials). Each round on your turn, you must take a move action to guide the object, or it reverts to its inanimate state.

  By accepting 1 point of burn, you can pour a bit of your own sentience into the aether puppet, allowing the effect to persist for 1 round per kineticist level without requiring additional actions.

  At 12th level, you can animate a Large or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Medium animated object plus the additional attack ability.

  At 14th level, you can animate a Huge or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Large animated object.

  At 16th level, you can animate a Gargantuan or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Huge animated object, as well as the metal (mithral) ability if the object is made of mithral.

  At 18th level, you can animate a Colossal or smaller object, which gains all the abilities of the Gargantuan animated object, plus the metal (adamantine) ability if the object is made of adamantine.

entries.name: Against the Wall
entries.description: A rogue with this talent is considered to be flanking any opponent adjacent to a stone wall (whether the stone is worked or unworked).

entries.name: 盖森子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.y2uhoqr4itdbw5g4]{虔诚护盾}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{巧言术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友} (agathions only)

entries.name: 卖老
entries.description: 9级起，你获得可以通过在一瞬间内暂时将你自身老化数十年的能力，以此方式使你自身从最有害的效果中恢复过来。通过标准动作，你能够将自身的实际年龄转化为下一个较高的年龄段（比如你可以从成年转化为中年）。每当你这样做时，任何在最初可以进行意志或强韧豁免，并且正在影响你并使人虚弱的状态或效果（any debilitating condition or effect）会立刻结束。当你以此方式使自己变老时，你会受到正常的与年龄增长相关的减值（见核心规则书169页），但是不会获得加值。你无法使用该能力将年龄提升至暮年（venerable）以上，恢复生命值的伤害，或者移除那些不允许通过意志或强韧豁免移除的效果。你会在最后一次使用该能力的24小时之后回到真实年龄，所有由于使用该能力提升年龄而带来的属性的罚值会在此之后消失。

entries.name: 运流使者
entries.description: 在8级时，每当你施放卜筮类法术能力时，你就可以暂时引导一部分命力帮助你的下一场战斗。在接下来的一次战斗中，如果你占卜的结果为“吉”，那么所有治疗你的效果都会额外为你治疗1d10点生命值；如果你占卜的结果为“凶”，那么你的近战攻击可以额外造成+1d6点伤害；如果你占卜的结果为“平”，那么你在防御等级上获得+2洞察加值。

entries.name: Aggressive Possession
entries.description: At 1st level, you can make a melee touch attack as a standard action. The target must succeed at a Will save or be confused for 1 round. The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 灵巧步伐
entries.description: 以一个自由动作，你可以在一轮中获得更好的机动性。在接下来的一轮中，你忽视所有困难地形带来的穿越时的移动力惩罚。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 灵巧秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ns2zo6qgd9co02uf]{跳跃术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ns8jbp0ilbvbvuif]{猫之优雅}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.d40ia71c2eljm91k]{变形术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlch97n99ea0pog6]{Cat's Grace, Mass}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{动物形态}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化}

entries.name: 岁月之触
entries.description: 你可以用一个近战接触攻击加速生物或是对像老化崩坏的速度。当你用此方式攻击一个活物，将造成每两先知等级1点的力量伤害。而对于对像或构装生物来说，此接触将造成每先知等级1d6点伤害。如果你用此接触攻击由一个生物所持有的物品，则在考虑命中时此攻击相当于击破武器战技攻击。你每天可以使用此能力1次，之后每5级再多加1次。

entries.name: Agitating Cognizance
entries.description: Whenever you are not maintaining an altered form via metamorphosis (including the 24 hours normally required to assume a new form), your maximum number of points in your phrenic pool increases by 1.

entries.name: Agonizing Wound
entries.description:
At 13th level, whenever you cast a spell that deals damage to a creature, you can also make that creature frightened or sickened (your choice) for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier. If you expend two uses of this ability, you can instead have the creature become dazed, nauseated, or panicked for 1 round. The creature can attempt a Will saving throw to negate this effect.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  This is a mind-affecting pain effect.

entries.name: 苦咒
entries.description: .  通过一句简短的咒文，女巫可以对60尺内的一名生物施展此巫术，使其承受剧烈的痛楚。目标因此陷入反胃状态，持续轮数等同于女巫等级。成功的强韧豁免可以令其无效。若豁免失败，生物在之后的每轮都可以进行一次新的豁免以结束此效果。无论豁免成功与否，该生物在1天内都不会再次成为此巫术的目标。

entries.name: Agony's Embrace
entries.description:
At 12th level, whenever you閳ユ獧e hit by a critical hit, your morale bonus to Strength from your bloodrage increases by 2 for 1d6 rounds or until your rage ends.

  The bonus to Strength instead increases by 4 at 16th level and by +6 at 20th level.

entries.name: Ahrimon's Favor
entries.description: At 20th level, you are filled with Ahriman閳ユ獨 wickedness. You gain immunity to fire and poison. You also gain acid resistance 10 and electricity resistance 10, and the ability to see perfectly in darkness of any kind to a range of 60 feet.

entries.name: 协助盟友
entries.description: 2级时，当巨龙骑士团的骑将使用协助他人来帮助自己的盟友时，盟友的防御等级，攻击检定，豁免检定或技能检定获得+3加值。8级时，以及之后每6级，此加值增加1。

entries.name: 大气之盾
entries.description: 你可以创造出一件空气组成的盾牌，为你的ＡＣ提供＋４护甲加值。７级时和之后的每４级，该加值再＋２。１３级时，该护盾可以使任何对你进行的远程攻击有５０％失手率。该能力使用时限为每萨满等级１小时，无需连续，每次至少１小时。

entries.name: 飞行突击
entries.description: 在10级时，用一个标准动作，你能触摸一个盟友赠与其飞翔之礼（如同飞行术效果）1分钟。这名盟友获得60尺飞行速度和一般机动性。她还会获得等于你等级的飞行技能加值。当她在飞行时成功发起一次冲锋时，这次攻击会造成等于你等级的额外电击伤害。

entries.name: 风灵之礼
entries.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以通过触摸一件远程武器使其得到气之力的加强。在1分钟内，任何使用该武器的攻击都不会因为超过射程增量而遭受减值。除此之外，使用该武器进行远程攻击不会导致藉机攻击。

entries.name: Air Cushion
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You cushion a fall from any height. You are constantly under the effects of feather fall, and you count as one size category larger for the purpose of determining how you are affected by wind.

entries.name: 气领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你能够操纵雷电、雾、风，和气系生物沟通，抵抗电伤害。

领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xhd6734dulevnwef]{风墙术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e4v1uv8hexeu9sxj]{凌空而行}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g9koefk7x9szoheo]{操纵风相}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6vfauefzzmwl4az7]{连环闪电}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{元素形态 IV} (air only)
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{旋风术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pfy97qyneoa391ek]{元素集群} (air spell only)

entries.name: 恐怖气氛
entries.description: 在2等时，当骑士试图用威吓对敌人进行挫败士气时，在威吓检定上，骑士获得等同1/2她骑士职业等级的加值。在8等以及之后的每6个等级，受到骑士挫败士气的目标的减值再-1。

entries.name: Air Lung
entries.description: An alchemist with this discovery has conditioned his body to adapt to life above water. He gains the amphibious special quality. Only an alchemist with the aquatic subtype can select this discovery.

entries.name: Air Shroud
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You are always surrounded by air, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5m7ci3da78ugjwkz]{Air Bubble}.

  As a standard action, you can accept 1 point of burn to extend the effect to a number of additional creatures equal to your Constitution modifier for 1 minute per kineticist level you possess.

entries.name: Air Shroud, Greater
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite air shroud

  Your air shroud improves, granting you the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6lqt3ju8m7r5la2]{维生气泡}. When you accept burn to grant the benefit to others, the benefit lasts until the next time your burn is removed.

entries.name: Air Totem
entries.description: Once per rage, the barbarian can move for 1 round as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.e4v1uv8hexeu9sxj]{凌空而行}.

entries.name: Air Totem, Greater
entries.description: While raging, the barbarian is surrounded by an aura of howling winds. Creatures attempting to cast spells while adjacent to the barbarian must succeed at a concentration check (DC 15 + spell level), and ranged attack rolls against the barbarian take a 閳? penalty. Creatures smaller than the barbarian that attack the barbarian in melee with a natural weapon or touch attack must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + the barbarian閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier) or the attack fails and the creature is flung back 5 feet and knocked prone. The barbarian can suspend this aura as a free action.

entries.name: Air's Leap
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  You are always considered to have a running start when jumping, you add your kineticist level as a bonus on all Acrobatics checks to jump, you jump twice as far or high as the results of your check indicate, and you can accept 1 point of burn when jumping to double the distance you jump again (to a total of four times as far).

entries.name: Air's Reach
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 閳?/p>

  When using air blasts, air wild talents, or composite blasts that include air, double the blast閳ユ獨 effective range. This effect applies after altering the range due to effects such as the extended range infusion. This doubles only the blast閳ユ獨 effective range, not the area of effect for infusions like cloud and cyclone.

entries.name: 炼金拟像
entries.description: 炼金术师制造出比较次级的拟像，效果如同“次级拟像术（lesser simulacrum, UM）”，不过其每HD花费炼金术师100金币的原材料，且需要花24小时的时间成长，并在被杀死时化为雪水。他必须达到8级才能选择此发现。被制造出来的拟像是个生物，不是超自然效果。

entries.name: 炼金僵尸
entries.description: 炼金术师可以使较完整的尸体获得行动能力，变成以炼金术驱动的僵尸。使用此能力需要1个小时并为每HD支付100金币的价格，完成之后死者将会变成僵尸。以此能力创造的僵尸在考虑各种状况的时候被视为以“操纵死尸”创造的僵尸，包括决定炼金术师可以控制多少的不死生物。他必须达到8级才能选择此发现。被创造出来的僵尸被视为生物，而不是超自然效果。

entries.name: 炼金术士发现
entries.description: 调查员可以选择获得一项以下列出的炼金术士发现：混合炼成（Combine Extracts），浓缩毒素（Concentrate Poison），稀释（Dilution），万灵药（Elixir of Life），强效药水（Enhance potion），永恒药水（Eternal Potion），增幅药水tend Potion），灌注（Infusion），突变药剂（Mutagen）UM，毒素转换（Poison Conversion）UC。在选择炼金术士发现时，调查员将他的调查员等级视为炼金术士等级。他必须有足够的等级来选择有相应等级要求的炼金术士发现。调查员可以多次选择本天赋，每次选择时他会获得一项新的炼金术士发现。

entries.name: 炼金术
entries.description:
炼金术师不仅对创作简易的炼金制品（像是炽火胶或是烟雾棒）得心应手，他们也擅于制作精制的魔法化合物药水以用来储存法术效果。实际上，一名炼金术师靠混合多种炼金产物来储存他的法术，然后喝下药水来“施展”他的法术。当一名炼金术师制作一份炼金制品、一份炼金炼成物或是一份炼金炸弹，他向这份混合物中注入一小部分他自身的魔法力量——这能确保这份作品的强大效果，但从某些角度而言这也是限制了这份制品的效果。当使用工艺（炼金）技能来创造一份炼金物品的时候，一个炼金术师获得等同于他职业等级的表现加值在工艺（炼金）的检定上。此外，当炼金术师使用工艺（炼金）来鉴定药水时，等同于使用‘侦测魔法’。他必须把药水握于手中1轮来进行这一鉴定。

  一个炼金术师可以制作三项特殊的魔法制品——化合炼成、炼金炸弹、以及突变药剂。【炼金炸弹】是一种爆炸性溅射武器，而【突变药剂】是一种改变药水，炼金术师可以饮用它来提升自己的物理能力——而这些都是在他们自身慎重决定之后使用的。化合炼成是这三样中最为多变的产物。在许多方面，它们表现有如魔法，只是以药水的形式显现出来，因而他们可以被‘解除魔法’来解除效果，使用炼金术师的职业等级作为施法等级。不同于药水，化合炼成有着更强大的作用和魔法效果，而这些都是普通药水做不到的。

  一个炼金术师每日能进行一定数量的化合炼成，他的基础化合炼成数量见上表。此外，如果他有额外的智力加值，他能进行额外的化合炼成，就如同法师获得额外法术一样。当一个炼金术师调成一份化合炼成时，他向化合物和试剂中注入自身的魔法力量。当一份化合炼成离开了炼金术师的掌握后，它会迅速失效，当它回到炼金术师的手中时，它又立即再度生效——通常一个炼金术师是不能把他的化合炼成交给他的队友使用的（见【灌注炼成（Infusion）】科研发现）。一份化合炼成一旦被创造出来，在它失效前可以储存一天，所以炼金术师必须每天重新准备他的化合炼成。制作一份化合炼成需要1分钟时间——大部分炼金术师都是在每天开始之时准备好化合炼成，或是在出发去冒险之前，不过即使炼金术师整天闲置他的一些（或全部）炼成位也并非什么大不了的事，这样做的目的是为了让他可以随时随地准备化合炼成以备不时之需。

  尽管炼金术师不能真正的施展法术，他们有一份公式列表，来决定他们可以制作哪些化合炼成。炼金术师可以使用法术型触发物品——如果那个法术在他的公式列表上；但他不能使用法术完成型物品（除非他通过使用魔法装置技能来使用该物品）。一个化合炼成靠饮用来生效，就像是喝药水一样，化合炼成的效果取决于你使用的公式、只对饮用者生效。炼金术师使用他的炼金术师职业等级作为施法者等级，来决定他的化合炼成效果。施展化合炼成需要一些原材料，但这些材料的价格大都是可以忽略不计的——相对于那些昂贵的施法材料而言。如果一个法术需要施法材料，那么那份材料视作在准备化合炼成的过程中已经使用了。

  炼金术师可以准备他已知晓公式的化合炼成。欲准备某环级的化合炼成，炼金术师的智力必须达到“10+公式环级”。若要对抗炼金术师的化合炼成，其豁免检定的DC为“10+公式环级+智力修正”。炼金术师可以知晓任意数量的公式，他将公式记载在一本叫做公式簿（formula book）的特殊笔记里，他必须研习他的笔记来准备化合炼成。一个1级炼金术师开始时只有“2+智力修正”数量的1环公式（他可以任意选择），每获得一个新的炼金术师等级，他可以增加一个能施展的任意环级公式。炼金术师也可以像是法师增添法术一样增添他的公式，使用同样的金钱和时间消耗。一个炼金术师可以研究法师的法术书来增加他的公式数量，但是法师不能从炼金术师那里学习新的法术。

替代领域法术

  • 2nd閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.ll1ut0nx5em2uegh]{Touch Injection}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sxtpslsxy4yn66tg]{增效灵药}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.loah8i0n6li2o377]{即效延迟剂}

entries.name: Alien Consciousness (UC) (3 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Aberrant or protean subtype; summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 mind is dangerously incomprehensible to mortals who contact it. Nonaberrations that read the eidolon閳ユ獨 mind or make mental contact with it take 1d4 points of Wisdom damage (or 1d8 points of sanity damage, if you use the sanity rules from Horror Adventures). This contact also includes communication via telepathy閳ユ攣n eidolon that has telepathic capability must initiate this particular contact as a swift action against a single target in order to force its alien consciousness on another creature. A successful Will saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 HD + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier) halves the damage. Once a creature has been subjected to the eidolon閳ユ獨 alien consciousness, it is immune to further damage from that eidolon閳ユ獨 alien consciousness for 24 hours.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 summoner is immune to his own eidolon閳ユ獨 alien consciousness, but he can still be affected by other eidolons閳?alien consciousnesses. This is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: 异型抗力
entries.description: 15级开始，你获得等于“术士等级+10”的法术抗力。

entries.name: Alien Summons
entries.description: Whenever the shaman calls or summons one or more creatures, one creature of her choice arrives with the advanced creature simple template. The creature presents a distorted mockery of the usual creature summoned, its body deformed and alien in nature. This chosen creature閳ユ獨 anatomy is so confounding that it is immune to the additional damage from critical hits or precision damage (such as that granted by sneak attack).

entries.name: Aligned Disguise
entries.description: When a rogue with this talent uses the @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} spell-like ability, she can also alter her alignment aura to deceive spells that discern alignment (such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.tr7m97npkbgm4wp7]{侦测邪恶}) for the duration of the disguise self effect. She can choose to detect as any specific alignment, or to detect as no alignment at all. This ability does not protect against spells or effects that cause harm based on alignment. The rogue must have disguise self as a spell-like ability before choosing this talent.

entries.name: Aligned Sneak Attack
entries.description: When making a sneak attack against a creature that has damage reduction that can be overcome by weapons of a particular alignment (such as DR 5/good), the rogue閳ユ獨 attack reduces that damage reduction by an amount equal to the number of sneak attack dice rolled until the end of the rogue閳ユ獨 turn.

entries.name: Alignment Smite
entries.description:
Choose a single alignment component that opposes one of the summoner閳ユ獨 own. Once per day as a swift action, the eidolon chooses one target within sight. If this target閳ユ獨 alignment matches that chosen for this ability, the eidolon deals an additional +1d6 points of damage with one of its natural weapons. This attack is treated as good-aligned for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction. The alignment smite persists until the target is dead or the eidolon is dismissed.

  At 10th level, the summoner may spend 1 additional evolution point to allow the eidolon a second daily use of this ability.

  The summoner must be at least 5th level before selecting this evolution. Evil or true neutral summoners cannot select this evolution.

entries.id: All the Stars in the Sky
entries.name: All the Stars in the Sky
entries.description: Certain master ninjas possess a seemingly limitless supply of their trusted weapons. Whenever a ninja with this trick buys a set of 50 identical magic shuriken, she thereafter replenishes them at no cost and never runs out. This stock of magical shuriken can be upgraded as though it were a normal magic weapon, and shuriken upgraded this way likewise never run out.

entries.name: Allay Reason
entries.description: The subject of this trick gains DR 15/閳?against one attack that deals nonlethal damage. The mesmerist can trigger this trick whenever the subject is hit with an attack that deals nonlethal damage.

entries.name: Allure (Stare)
entries.description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies on initiative checks and Perception checks.

entries.name: 调整附魔
entries.description: 拥有此技艺的奥能师可以调整武器、盔甲或盾牌上的附魔。奥能师可以用此技艺将一个武器或防具特殊能力更变为等价值的另一个。此能力只能更改物品的特殊能力，而非增强加值。使用此能力是一个会引发藉机攻击的整轮动作，需要奥能师触摸该物品，并从【奥能源泉】中消费1点。此能力不能用于一个非自愿生物所持用的物品。此更变持续等于奥能师魅力调整值的分钟数（至少为1）。奥能师必须已有【奥能武器】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 自我变形
entries.description: 15级开始，你可以随意地将自己变形为任何类人生物。此能力类似@Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}，不过你可以保持该形态任意时长。

entries.name: 化形
entries.description: 3级时，你获得了改变自己外貌的能力（如同法术@Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}）。此能力每天可以持续的时间为（术士等级）分钟，不必每轮连续使用。17级时，这个能力不再有时间限制，你可以随时随地保持你希望的外形。

entries.name: 变形转换
entries.description: 当奥能师被他自己施放的一个[变形]子学派法术影响时，他可以从他的【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点转换到该法术允许的另一个形态。如此做将使法术的施法者等级减1，这可能会让该法术的施法者等级低于施放该法术的最低必要施法者等级，如果适用的话还会降低法术的持续时间。奥能师必须拥有【勒彼斯塔德变形者】技艺才能选择该技艺。

entries.name: Always Prepared
entries.description:
The vigilante can set aside resources to plan for future contingencies. The vigilante gains the Brilliant Planner feat except he can spend up to 100 gp per character level for his brilliant plan fund and only requires 1 minute to enact his brilliant plan. In addition, while in a settlement for at least 1 week, he can spend 24 hours and up to 500 gp per character level to create a stash somewhere within the settlement.

  Once per day, the vigilante can take 1 hour to retrieve a stash, retrieving any number of items that would have been available in a settlement he visited at the time of making the stash, regardless of the weight of the items. Once he retrieves a stash in this way, he subtracts the price of the items from the stash閳ユ獨 value and the stash is exhausted and lost, regardless if he used the full value of the stash.

  The vigilante can maintain any number of stashes, but a stash is lost if he does not spend 1 hour to maintain the stash at least once per month. A vigilante閳ユ獨 stash is well-hidden and only the vigilante knows the location of a stash he creates.

entries.name: 奇妙灵感
entries.description: 在使用灵感能力时，调查员可以以1d8来代替1d6以获得加值。在20级时，调查员的灵感加值提升到2d8。调查员至少要达到7级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: Ambuscading Grapple
entries.description: When a rogue with this talent succeeds at a combat maneuver check to grapple an unaware opponent, she can immediately deal her sneak attack damage to the target. This counts as having hit with a sneak attack for the purpose of other abilities and talents.

替代神授力量 Note: Only creatures with the Kobold Faith trait can take this subdomain.

  替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nee6cxpoekp3aklq]{魔法警报}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7c0l64pfdkgl7j5y]{幻墙术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱}

entries.name: Ameliorating
entries.description:
The witch can touch a creature to suppress or protect it from negative conditions. The witch chooses one of the following conditions each time she uses this hex: dazzled, fatigued, shaken, or sickened. If the target is or later becomes afflicted with the chosen condition, that condition is suppressed for a number of minutes equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level.

  Alternatively, the witch can grant her target a +4 circumstance bonus on saving throws against effects that cause any two of the listed conditions (which condition is always the witch閳ユ獨 choice) for 24 hours.

  Once a creature has benefited from this hex, it cannot benefit from the hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Amorphous (UC) (4 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Aberrant or elemental subtype; summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 biology lacks discernible weak points. It is not subject to critical hits and sneak attacks.

entries.name: Amorphous Anatomy
entries.description: At 20th level, your vital organs shift position, and as a rule they are constantly changing their shape and size to best protect you. You gain immunity to critical hits and sneak attacks. In addition, you gain blindsight with a range of 60 feet and damage reduction 5/閳? You automatically recover from physical blindness or deafness after 1 round by growing new sensory organs to replace the compromised ones; you cannot otherwise regenerate lost body parts.

entries.name: Anarchic Bomb
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal chaotic divine damage. Lawful creatures that take a direct hit from an anarchic bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against neutral creatures, anarchic bombs deal half damage, and such targets are not affected by their staggering effect. Anarchic bombs have no effect on chaotic-aligned creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Anathema
entries.description:
When an investigator creates or prepares a poison, including poisons derived from racial or class abilities, he can spend one use of inspiration to create an anathema instead. Anathemas count as poisons, but they can affect creatures that are normally immune to poison, as they exploit vulnerabilities in their very nature rather than their biology. When an anathema is created, select a creature type (and subtype, if applicable) from the ranger favored enemy list; the anathema functions only against this chosen type. The investigator also chooses one of the following special abilities for the anathema to affect: damage reduction (except DR/閳?, energy resistance (one type chosen by the investigator), fast healing, movement speed, or spell resistance.

The method of delivery (contact, ingested, inhaled, or injury) and the DC of the anathema閳ユ獨 save are identical to those of the poison used to make the anathema. If the target fails its save against the anathema (even if the enemy is normally immune to effects that require a specific save, such as undead閳ユ獨 immunity to effects that require a Fortitude save), the value of the chosen ability is lowered by 5 (minimum 0) for 1 round per investigator level.

entries.name: 先祖秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择先祖启示领域的先知将以下技能加入他的本职技能：语言学，知识（所有）。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{隐形仆役} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.avofn5q2v0f0qxjy]{灵能武器} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0lrux8tmaml5fkw6]{灵能盟友} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3lfx1ccxo2hdqrf3]{心灵遥控} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} (18th).

entries.name: Ancestor Totem
entries.description:
The barbarian閳ユ獨 insight bonus to her chosen skill increases to +4. The barbarian can now select any skill to receive this bonus, even a Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skill or a skill that requires patience or concentration; if she selects such a skill, she can use it even while raging.

  A barbarian must have the lesser ancestor totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Ancestor Totem, Greater
entries.description:
The barbarian閳ユ獨 insight bonus to her chosen skill increases to +6. Once per rage, she can spend one round of rage as an immediate action to reroll a skill check in the chosen skill. She must take the result of the second roll, even if it is lower.

  A barbarian must have the ancestor totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Ancestor Totem, Lesser
entries.description: When she enters a rage, the barbarian selects a skill of her choice, which must be one she can use while raging, such as Climb or Intimidate. While raging, she gains a +2 insight bonus to the chosen skill.

entries.name: Ancestor's Council
entries.description:
As a standard action the shaman can call upon her ancestors to provide advice and assistance to one ally within 30 feet. The ally gains a +2 bonus on any attack roll, saving throw, ability check, or skill check made before the beginning of the shaman閳ユ獨 next turn.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma bonus.

entries.name: 先祖最终启示
entries.description: 20级时，你加入了你的先祖之中。你的意志豁免得到相当于你魅力修正的加值，获得60尺盲视，你所施展的预言系法术施法者等级+4。每日1次，你能以类法术能力施展“星界投射”而且不需要材料成分。

entries.name: 先祖秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{援助术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hu8179fdqfkl0bqj]{祈祷术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.scyklgov72pvw884]{Blessing Of Fervor}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{通神术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.080el1lfozrhf6c2]{脱身术}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3wdx7fjulsohi1lk]{怪影杀手}

entries.name: Ancestors Spirit
entries.description:
A shaman that selects the ancestors spirit has wise eyes and thick white or silver hair. Fine wrinkles line the shaman閳ユ獨 face, becoming more obvious when she smiles or glowers. When she calls upon one of this spirit閳ユ獨 abilities, her hair glows as though lit from within, rustling of its own accord.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{隐形仆役} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.avofn5q2v0f0qxjy]{灵能武器} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0lrux8tmaml5fkw6]{灵能盟友} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3lfx1ccxo2hdqrf3]{心灵遥控} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} (9th)

  Spirit Animal: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal has streaks of gray or silver hide, hair, or fur, and long facial hair that appears similar to a wispy mustache or bushy eyebrows. The spirit animal can speak and understand a number of bonus languages equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma bonus.

entries.name: Ancestors Spirit Manifestation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes one with the spirits of her ancestors. She gains a bonus on Will saving throws equal to her Charisma modifier, blindsense out to a range of 60 feet, and a +4 bonus to her caster level for all divination spells. She can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} as a spell-like ability once per day without requiring material components.

entries.name: 先祖子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zaw5yh1c7ftk45tf]{永恒安眠}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pfv5zv744x9dwg38]{指使术}

entries.name: Ancestral Blessing
entries.description:
The shaman can grant the blessings of her ancestors to any ally within 30 feet. The blessed creature receives a +1 competence bonus on attack and damage rolls. This blessing lasts until the blessed creature hits with an attack or deals damage to a target. The shaman can have only one ancestral blessing active at a time. If the shaman uses this ability again, the previous blessing immediately ends.

  At 8th level and 16th level, the bonuses provided by this blessing increase by 1.

entries.name: Ancestral Champion
entries.description: At 12th level, when your ancestral strikes target a creature whose alignment is opposite to the type of damage the strikes deal, your ancestral strikes instead deal 2d6 additional points of damage of that type.

entries.name: Ancestral Enlightenment
entries.description:
The vigilante can attempt any Knowledge check untrained. If he already has ranks in a particular Knowledge skill, he gains a +4 bonus on checks with that skill.

  A vigilante must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Ancestral Guardian
entries.description: The shaman can call on the ancient allies of her ancestors to physically appear and assist her, even if they have moved on to new roles in the cosmos. Once per day as a standard action, the shaman can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友}. Although there is no cost to use the spelllike ability, the planar ally demands payment for services it performs as normal for the spell.

entries.name: Ancestral Strikes
entries.description:
At 1st level, three times per day as a swift action, you can imbue your melee attacks with a measure of your ancestor閳ユ獨 power. For 1 round, your melee attacks deal 1d6 additional points of good-aligned damage if you are good, or they deal 1d6 additional points of evil-aligned damage if you are evil. If you are neutral, you must choose which type of damage this ability deals when you choose this bloodline, and the decision cannot be changed later.

  At 8th level, you can use this ability up to five times per day.

  At 20th level, all your melee attacks deal this additional damage, and you don閳ユ獩 need to activate this ability.

entries.name: 祖传武器
entries.description: 你可以召唤一只和你家族背景紧密连结、且符合你体型的简易或是军用武器，你被视为熟练此武器。3级时这把武器视为精制品，7级，15级，19级这把武器会获得额外1点的增强加值，11级这把武器得到幽冥属性。你每天可以使用这把武器的分钟数等于你的先知等级，使用时间不需要连续，但是每次使用至少消耗1分钟的时间。这把武器会在离开你的手中1轮之后消失。

entries.name: Ancient Tactics
entries.description: At 4th level, while you are bloodraging, whenever you or an ally within 30 feet of you would gain a bonus on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield position (such as flanking or cover), that bonus is increased by 1. Allies must be able to see and hear you to gain this bonus. You can expend a spell slot as an immediate action to further increase this bonus by 1 per level of the spell slot expended until the beginning of your next turn.

entries.name: 使徒之击
entries.description: 1级起，在克服伤害减免时，你的近战攻击被视为善良阵营武器。此外，在使用近战攻击对邪恶异界生物造成伤害时，能够额外造成1d6点伤害。阵营武器（align weapon）以及那些会赋予武器神圣（holy）武器特殊能力的效果与上述额外伤害叠加。

entries.name: 使徒之护
entries.description: 16级起，在对抗邪恶生物做出的攻击或者创造出的效果时，你的AC获得+4偏斜加值，豁免获得+4抗力加值。此外，你就如同成为防护邪恶（protection from evil）的受术者一般受影响。该效果无法被解除（dispelled）。

entries.name: 裁决：震怒
entries.description: 神授力量: 你的主神赐予你以神圣（或亵渎）的狂怒。每当你投入战斗，敌人必将在飞溅的血肉中迎来被击败的终局。

entries.name: Anguish Bomb
entries.description: You can throw bombs infused with psychic trauma. This discovery allows other alchemists to duplicate the anguish bombs used by mnemostillers.

entries.name: 动物的愤怒
entries.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以触摸一个盟友并赋予其野性的特性。该盟友会获得造成1D6伤害的两次爪抓（中体型数据，小体型则为1D4）或是造成1D8伤害的啮咬攻击（中体型数据，小体型为1D6）。这些攻击视作主要天生武器，并取代任何盟友原本可能拥有的天生武器。这个效果持续1分钟。

entries.name: 战斗伙伴
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个标准动作，你可以召唤一个战斗伙伴。这个能力作用等同于召唤四级自然盟友的效果，持续时间为1分钟。这个能力只能召唤1个动物，无论使用何种列表。10级之后每2级，召唤自然盟友的法术都会提高1环，最高在18级变为九级召唤自然盟友。

entries.name: 动物伙伴
entries.description: 4级起，你获得一个动物伙伴来为你服务。决定动物伙伴的时候，有效德鲁伊等级为“牧师等级-3”。通过自然联结能力选择本领域的德鲁伊，在决定其动物伙伴的有效等级时同样按“德鲁伊等级-3”计算。

entries.name: 动物伙伴(猎人)
entries.description:
1级起，猎人会与一个动物伙伴建立起羁绊。猎人开始游戏时可以选择任何德鲁伊可用的动物伙伴。这名忠诚的伙伴将会伴随猎人一同冒险。该能力的功能如同德鲁伊的动物伙伴能力一般（这部分内容记录在自然纽带职业能力中）。猎人的有效德鲁伊等级与她的猎人等级相同。当角色从多个来源获得动物伙伴时，那么在判断动物伙伴的属性和能力时，她的有效德鲁伊等级会叠加。猎人也可以教导她的动物伙伴学会散兵（Skirmisher）游侠变体（出自进阶玩者手册）的猎人奇术（Hunter's Tricks），以取代标准的技巧（tricks）。要使动物伙伴使用猎人奇术，必须有猎人的命令。动物伙伴每日猎人奇术使用次数等于动物伙伴【1/2HD+感知调整值】。

  如果猎人解放了她的动物伙伴、或者她的动物伙伴死亡时，她可以通过执行需要24小时不间断的祈祷来完成的仪式，来获得一个新伙伴，这个伙伴是举行仪式所处的环境中生活的生物。当猎人的动物伙伴死亡时，任何由她使用召唤自然盟友（Summon Nature's Ally）法术召唤的动物，都会存在每等级1分钟以取代原本的每等级1轮。不过同一时间，猎人仅能以此方式来让一个召唤自然盟友法术生效。若再次使用该能力，那么任何已经使用的召唤自然盟友法术会立即结束。

entries.name: 动物领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你能够和动物交流和亲近他们，并且添加知识（自然）到你的职业技能。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5s4e2iifhflglr1t]{安抚动物}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yyzf346hiq8ixt0u]{动物定身术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.io2yjhr42chvcfb4]{支配动物}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.choriern682hgptb]{召唤自然盟友 IV} (限动物)
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III} (限动物)
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.76t09cafayrw13ux]{防活物护罩}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{动物形态}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lnpyf5gwn8m21y02]{召唤自然盟友 VIII} (限动物)
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化}

entries.name: 动物之力
entries.description:
1级起，猎人能够以迅捷动作对一种动物的面相进行拟态。猎人必须选择模仿一类动物，基于她所模仿的动物类型以及猎人等级，她可以获得不同的加值或特殊能力。猎人每日能够使用该能力的分钟数等同于她的等级。这些时间不需要连续，但是必须以1分钟为单位来使用。同一时间猎人仅能够模仿一类动物。

  猎人还能够将这些拟态应用至她的动物伙伴。和猎人自身使用该能力不同，动物之力应用至她的动物伙伴时没有持续时间。以此方式应用动物之力不会计入猎人的每日使用时间——这会一直生效，直至猎人改变它为止。动物伙伴和猎人所拟态的动物可以相同，也可以不同。猎人能够在同一个迅捷动作中，同时选择或改变自身和她的动物伙伴所应用的动物之力。

  若猎人的动物伙伴死亡，那么她能够将应用至动物伙伴的动物之力转移至自己身上，以取代对她的动物伙伴产生效果。这并不会计入正常情况下她能够选择的动物之力，而且（会如同应用至动物伙伴的动物之力一般）持续生效，直至猎人改变它为止，此外还不会持续花费她的每日动物之力持续时间。

  蝙蝠（Bat）：生物获得60尺范围的黑暗视觉（darkvision）。8级起，这个范围增加30尺。15级起，生物还会获得10尺范围的盲感（blindsense）。

  熊（Bear）：生物的体质获得+2增强加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+4点。15级起，这个加值增加至+6点。

  公牛（Bull）：生物的力量获得+2增强加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+4点。15级起，这个加值增加至+6点。

  猎鹰（Falcon）：生物的察觉检定获得+4表现加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+6点。15级起，这个加值增加至+8点。

  蛙（Frog）：生物的游泳检定获得+4表现加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+6点。15级起，这个加值增加至+8点。

  猴（Monkey）：生物的攀爬检定获得+4表现加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+6点。15级起，这个加值增加至+8点。

  鼠（Mouse）：生物获得反射闪避（evasion）。12级起，该能力提升至精通反射闪避（improved evasion），就如同盗贼高等天赋（advanced talent）一般。

  枭（Owl）：生物的潜行检定获得+4表现加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+6点。15级起，这个加值增加至+8点。

  蛇（Snake）：生物在进行藉机攻击时攻击检定获得+2加值，并且AC在对抗藉机攻击检定时获得+2闪避加值。8级起，这些加值增加至+4点。15级起，这些加值增加至+6点。

  雄鹿（Stag）：生物的基本陆上速度获得5尺增强加值。8级起，这个加值增加至10尺。15级起，这个加值增加至20尺。

  虎（Tiger）：生物的敏捷获得+2增强加值。8级起，这个加值增加至+4点。15级起，这个加值增加至+6点。

  狼（Wolf）：生物获得10尺范围的灵敏嗅觉（scent）能力。8级起，这种感官的范围增加至20尺。15级起，这种感官的范围增加至30尺。若敌人在逆风处，这个范围加倍，同理若敌人在顺风处，则范围减半。

entries.name: 野性之怒
entries.description: 当狂暴时，野蛮人可以做出一次啮咬攻击。如果作为全力攻击的一部分来使用，则啮咬攻击在计算时使用野蛮人的最高BAB-5。如果这次攻击成功了，它造成1d4点（这是野蛮人是中型时的情况；如果是小型，则造成1d3点伤害）加上力量修正一半的伤害。野蛮人可以将啮咬攻击作为维持或挣脱擒抱动作的一部分，这项攻击在擒抱之前结算。如果他这样做并且成功了，则该回合他对该目标做出的所有擒抱检定都有+2加值。

entries.name: Animal Fury (UC)
entries.description: The barbarian gains a bite attack. This is a primary natural attack that deals 1d4 points of damage (if the barbarian is Medium; 1d3 if the barbarian is Small) plus the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier. If made as part of a fullattack action with manufactured weapons, the bite attack is made at the barbarian閳ユ獨 full base attack bonus 閳?5, and she adds only 1/2 her Strength modifier to the damage roll. The barbarian can make a bite attack as part of the action to maintain or break free from a grapple. If the bite attack hits, grapple checks attempted by the barbarian against the target until the end of the round gain a +2 bonus.

entries.name: Animal Fury, Greater
entries.description:
This power works as animal fury, but the barbarian閳ユ獨 bite attack deals damage as if she were one size larger.

  A barbarian must have the animal fury rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: Animal Mastery
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can project your mind into the mind of an animal you can see, establishing a mental link that allows you to share the animal閳ユ獨 senses閳ユ攬earing, seeing, smelling, tasting, and touching everything the animal does. You cannot use this ability on an animal if its Hit Dice exceed your psychic level. The animal can attempt a Will save to resist the effect. If it is successful, the animal is immune to this ability for 24 hours. While sharing an animal閳ユ獨 senses, your body is effectively unconscious, but you can end the effect as a free action.

  You can maintain the link for 1 hour per level, but the link is immediately severed if the animal moves beyond a range of 1 mile per psychic level you have.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  At 7th level, the mental link becomes stronger. Whenever you share an animal閳ユ獨 senses, you can control it, as per dominate animal, except the duration, Hit Dice limit, range, and other conditions listed above apply.

entries.name: Animal Patron
entries.description:
The vigilante gains the benefits of one minor shifter aspect for a number of minutes per day equal to 1 + half his vigilante level. He can shift into this minor aspect as a swift action.

  The vigilante must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Animal Servant
entries.description:
The witch can use this hex to turn a humanoid enemy into an animal and rob it of its free will. The transformation works as @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II} and is negated by a successful Will save. The transformed creature retains its Intelligence score and known languages, if any, but the witch controls its mind. This effect functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物}, except the creature does not receive further saving throws to resist the hex.

  The effect can be removed only with wish or similar magic, although slaying the witch also ends the effect.

  Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: Animal Skin
entries.description: The witch can become any animal of a size from Tiny to Large whose skin she wears. This ability is similar to @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II}, except she takes on the appearance of the specific individual from which the skin came.

entries.name: 动物秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.io2yjhr42chvcfb4]{支配动物}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.choriern682hgptb]{召唤自然盟友 IV}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.29cfi65seiajh5qv]{动物异变}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.76t09cafayrw13ux]{防活物护罩}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{野兽形态 IV}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{动物形态}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.x6y3kyvxf8s31jhy]{召唤自然盟友 IX}

entries.name: 源生活化
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你能唤起小型风、火、土或水元素为你服务，持续轮数相当于你的魅力调整值，你在七级时可以招唤中型元素，九级时则可以招换大型，你每日可以使用这个能力一次，十级时再多一次。你必须达到三级才能学习此先知启示。

entries.name: Animate Servant
entries.description:
At 8th level, as a standard action, you can give life to inanimate objects. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k9iu3d82hlo7coct]{活化物体} using your cleric level as the caster level. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and one additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapon power of the Artifice Domain.

entries.name: Animate Trees
entries.description:
At 13th level, you can animate a tree within 180 feet as a standard action. This functions as a treant閳ユ獨 animate trees ability, with the following exceptions.

  Each day, you can animate a number of trees equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier, and you can control up to one tree at a time, plus an additional tree at 15th level and every 2 levels thereafter.

  A tree remains animated for 10 minutes per level, or until dismissed by you or destroyed.

entries.name: 择日而亡
entries.description: 每日1次，如果一次近程攻击将使盗贼的HP降低到0或更低，那么她可以以一个直觉动作进行5尺快步。如果这一移动使她移出对手的触及范围，那么她将不会因这次近程攻击而受到任何伤害。盗贼在下一轮将处于恍惚状态。

entries.name: Any Guise
entries.description:
A vigilante can use his everyman social talent to disguise himself as any specific person, even a king or high priest. Furthermore, if the actual individual wouldn閳ユ獩 normally be able to be found via magic (such as by being dead or protected from divinations designed to locate the individual), such divinations always find the vigilante instead.

  A vigilante must be at least 17th level and have the everyman social talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 予取予求
entries.description: 8级时，你能以标准动作的心智效果强迫30尺生物服从。生物可用成功的意志豁免避免此效果，但若豁免失败，此生物将攻击你敌人1轮、献上最有价值的物品、跪下1d4轮（由GM决定）。你能在8级每天使用此能力1次，每比8级高4级多1次。此能力替换魅力领域的魅惑微笑能力。

entries.name: Apocalypse Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a herald of the apocalypse and wield the awesome power to fulf ill such prophecy. Anytime you successfully cast a spell or use an ability that bestows 1 or more negative levels, the effect bestows 1d4 additional negative levels. Whenever you confirm a critical hit against a creature (including with a melee, ranged, or spell attack), as a swift action you can curse the target of your attack, as the bestow curse spell, except the target doesn閳ユ獩 receive a Will saving throw to negate the effects and spell resistance does not apply against this ability.

entries.name: Apocalypse Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the apocalypse mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Survival, and Stealth to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1hjxxr3k62rcpb5c]{观命术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vxi9c3xwa83xthka]{飞虫走兽} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4ywdvsm1oty8blq]{爆裂符文} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdp0mts5razk0qms]{疫病虫群} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3a162m66toj22fpa]{死亡法阵} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.iq0as5470o8q9y39]{焚云术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (18th).

entries.name: 应用工程学
entries.description: 调查员可以将他学过的建筑学与设计构造方面的知识应用在通常需要蛮力才能破开的障碍物或是需要锐眼才能发现的暗间上。通过一个整轮动作并消耗1点灵感点数，调查员可以进行一次知识（工程学）技能检定，并用检定的结果取代一次力量检定来击破障碍物，或是一次察觉检定来寻找秘门或其他隐蔽的建筑结构。

entries.name: Aquatic Action
entries.description:
The vigilante uses weapons, natural weapons, and unarmed strikes in aquatic environments as though under the effect of freedom of movement, including when making melee attacks against targets in the water while the vigilante is on land. The vigilante ignores limitations and penalties on ranged attacks, including thrown weapons, imposed by being underwater for the first 15 feet. (See Underwater Combat on page 432 of the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook for more information.)

  A vigilante must be at least 8th level to select this talent.

entries.name: 水族适应
entries.description: 3级开始，你获得30尺的游泳速度。9级时，你获得两栖特性并且拥有了肥厚的皮下脂肪层来防冻取暖。你获得天生AC+1加值和5点寒冷抗力。当你处于水下时，你获得30尺盲感。15级开始，你的游泳速度增加到60尺，水下的盲感范围也增加到60尺。

entries.name: 水之灵动
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6

  效果：魔战士可以迅捷动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，获得‘水下呼吸’的效果。这个效果持续每魔战士等级一轮。在此时间内，他还忽略激流(Rough Water)和水下战斗(Underwater Combat)对攻击和移动的影响。

entries.name: 深洋血统
entries.description:
你的家谱可以追溯到那些位于深海之下的未名存在，你可能是某个深海王国的遗民，因为某次游牧变迁而迁居地面，抑或是某些水生爬行动物渗透海滩村庄的遗留产物。 海之乐律于你血脉中不断吟唱回响，你能清晰的感知到海洋的呼唤和波涛的感召。

  本职技能: 游泳

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.a4z9yazsd7ez1p0h]{水牢法球} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nll8ip8348eti0ff]{间歇泉} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{野兽形态 IV} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.et3440o24hcgrfwl]{召唤怪物 VII} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4rwtizvdj7216qd]{水幕天华} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.refg1teqkrdtxllg]{世界波} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.rMR6ahXEfYqASE7D]{运动健将},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nNVFVFRBCT4O2ab9]{调制药剂},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{防御式战斗训练},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻}(Swim),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个带有“水”描述的法术时，你的有效施法者等级+1。你所召唤的拥有天生游泳速度的生物以及两栖、水系亚种生物在攻击骰和伤害骰上获得+1士气加值。

entries.name: Aquatic Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
The anger in your blood rises from the ocean depths, seeded by descent from undersea empires, creeping ichthyic infiltrators into remote seaside villages, or something deeper still.

奖励专长：

  • Aquadynamic Focus,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Fly),
  • Steam Spell
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.478jgozgfbt20u0q]{水流爆发} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位} (16th)

entries.name: Aquatic Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
The anger in your blood rises from the ocean depths, seeded by descent from undersea empires, creeping ichthyic infiltrators into remote seaside villages, or something deeper still.

奖励专长：

  • Aquadynamic Focus,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Fly),
  • Steam Spell
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.478jgozgfbt20u0q]{水流爆发} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{操纵水位} (16th)

entries.name: 水裔感应
entries.description: 9级开始，你获得心灵感应能力（100尺），并能和拥有天生游泳速度或是水栖或水系亚种进行交流（无论这一生物是否拥有足够的智商）。你可以对这类生物施展@Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}，每日使用次数等同于你的魅力修正。此能力属于心灵感应，因而你不需要语言上的交流或者有视觉线。15级开始，你每天能够以心灵感应能力召唤一只水栖、水系亚种或是拥有天生游泳速度的生物，并要求他们为你提供协助，就如同使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.21r9ptvsjo99o3yw]{短讯暗示}或是@Compendium[pf1.spells.0wamdkl9gp19l55w]{高等异界盟友}一般。

entries.name: 奥能精准
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以迅捷动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，令其在所有攻击检定中获得等于其智力调整值的洞察加值，直到回合结束。

entries.name: Arcane Ambush
entries.description: At 9th level, as a swift action, you can expend a spell slot in order to grant you and your allies a bonus on attack and damage rolls. This bonus lasts 1 round, is equal to the level of the spell expended, and only applies to opponents your allies are flanking or opponents denied their Dexterity bonus against your allies. You grant this bonus to yourself plus up to one ally for every four sorcerer levels you possess (to a maximum of five allies at 20th level). The allies must be within 30 feet of you and you must have line of effect to each affected ally.

entries.name: 奥术学者
entries.description: 你充盈的奥术知识让你可以施展奥术，如同他们在你的法术列表。每天1次，你可以施展术士/法师法术，就如同他们在你的可知法术表之中。以这个方式施展的法术其消耗的法术位要比标准法术高上1级。要施展奥术，你必须要有一本记载此奥术的法术书，当你施法完成之后，此法术将会从法术书上面被抹除。要选择这个启示你必须达到11级。

entries.name: Arcane Backfire
entries.description: When a ninja with this trick successfully attacks a creature that is holding a magic item that has a number of charges or uses per day, she can attempt a Use Magic Device check (DC = 20 + the item閳ユ獨 CL) to cause the item to lose either one daily use or a number of charges equal to the number of the ninja閳ユ獨 sneak attack dice.

entries.name: 奥能壁障
entries.description: 以一个迅捷动作从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师可以创造一个魔法的壁障，保护他不受伤害。这个壁障赋予奥能师等于“奥能师等级+他的魅力调整值”的临时生命值，持续每奥能师等级一分钟或者直到临时生命值耗尽。一天之中奥能师每再次使用一次此能力，需要从【奥能源泉】中耗费的点数就增加1点（第二次使用时需要消耗2点，第三次使用时消耗3点，以此类推）。以此方式获得的临时生命值不与自身叠加，但再次使用能让临时生命值和持续时间重置。

entries.name: 奥术灯塔
entries.description: 以标准动作，你成为奥术灯塔，发出15尺灵光到自己下轮开始。在灵光内施展的奥术获得施法者等级或法术DC+1，施法者在施法时进行选择。你每天能使用此能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。此能力取代魔法领域的随从之手能力。

entries.name: 奥秘血统
entries.description:
你的家族一向擅长于诡异的魔法艺术。你的许多亲戚都已经成为了法师，然而开发你的力量并不需要研究和实践。

  本职技能: 知识（任一）

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.llxrra87kbofmyhl]{鉴定术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wqvy12w1xgk6l9b0]{翱翔天际} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{高等传送术} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ol9newf4vrcx0kpf]{真言术 震} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V8GIvVaAofyw9xIl]{精通反制},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.tlRu8SYjzA7WCHN7]{抄写卷轴},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识 ：奥秘),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发}.

  血统奥秘: 当你使用一个使所需法术位至少提高1级的超魔专长时，法术DC增加1。这项奖励不能与其自身叠加，也不能用于 @Compendium[pf1.feats.O109YFcItBFUDHvu]{法术升阶} 专长。

entries.name: 秘咒血怒
entries.description: 4级起，当你进入血怒时，你能够从后述法术中选择一项，并将它的效果应用到你身上：朦胧术（blur）、防护箭矢（protection from arrows）、抵抗能量伤害（resist energy，选取一种能量类型）或者蛛行术（spider climb）。无论这些法术正常的持续时间为何，只要你还保持着血怒，这些法术的效果就会持续下去。

entries.name: Arcane Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
While others of your kin may be powerful wizards and sorcerers, the eldritch nature of the blood coursing through your veins transforms you into a spell-breaking terror.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.QaMwiDFQdDwycTUO]{扰法者}*
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.yE3hVOvBq9rx6TAw]{破法者}*.

  (Your bloodrager levels count as fighter levels for the purposes of qualifying for any feats marked with an asterisk [*].) This stacks with any levels in fighter you have.

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.49yc9dpr4kvgki2s]{魔法飞弹} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{闪电束} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门} (16th)

entries.name: 奥术联结
entries.description: 1级开始，你获得一个奥术联结，等同于同级的法师。你的术士等级与你的法师等级累加来决定魔宠或者联结物品的能力。

entries.name: Arcane Bond (SOR)
entries.description: At 1st level, you gain an arcane bond, as a wizard equal to your sorcerer level. Your sorcerer levels stack with any wizard levels you possess when determining the powers of your familiar or bonded object. Once per day, your bonded item allows you to cast any one of your spells known (unlike a wizard閳ユ獨 bonded item, which allows him to cast any one spell in his spellbook). This ability does not allow you to have both a familiar and a bonded item.

entries.name: 奥能遮蔽
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，将他的智力调整值加到唬骗和潜行检定上，此加值持续一分钟。

entries.name: Arcane Crafter Susbchool
entries.description:
An Arcane crafter is one of the builders of the arcane world, assembling magic items with facility, skill, and power. He is intimately familiar with the craft and practice of imbuing items with arcane power, and works with precision even early in his career to help create some of the most powerful magic items.

  相关学派： Universalist.

  替代神授力量 This subschool replaces the hand of the apprentice power of the universalist school.

entries.name: 奥能发牌
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6

  效果：魔战士获得“致命发牌Deadly DealerHH”专长，无论他是否满足前提。他可以用他的【奥能力池】给牌组附魔，就好像它是一把具有54发弹药的远程武器一样。魔战士必须使用“奥术打击”专长或者他的【奥能力池】增强卡牌才能将其用作武器。

entries.name: 奥能炫技
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3；“华丽奥能”

  效果：当魔战士选择这个奥能时，他可以从游荡剑客职业能力中选择任何一个等级等同于他魔战士等级的游荡剑客可用的炫技。他使用该炫技时可用他【奥能力池】中的奥能作为时髦值来满足炫技的消耗需求。即使他用别的方法获得了时髦池，对于以奥能炫技能力获得的炫技，他也不会被视为至少有一点时髦点存在。在决定该炫技效果时，魔战士的有效游荡剑客等级为0。

  特殊：一个魔战士可以多次选择这个奥能，在每次都习得一个新的炫技。

entries.name: Arcane Discovery Exploit
entries.description: An arcanist who selects this arcanist exploit learns an arcane discovery. When she learns an arcane discovery, her level must be high enough for her to qualify for that discovery, using half her arcanist level as her wizard level to determine whether she qualifies. The effects of any arcane discovery that she selects with this exploit apply only to arcanist spells that she casts, not to wizard spells, and she cannot select an arcane discovery in place of a feat (unless she also has wizard levels, in which case the discovery applies only to her wizard spells).

entries.name: 奥能刀锋
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：魔战士可在他的穿刺或挥砍武器击中对手之后以直觉动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，对目标造成相当于魔战士智力调整值(最少是0)的流血伤害。

entries.name: 奥术启蒙
entries.description: 萨满的天生智能让她可以开发利用奥术之力。选择该巫术时，萨满可以选择等于当前魅力调整值个数的处于法师/术士法术列表上的法术，将这些法术加入自己的法术列表，你必须当前有法术位可以用来准备这些法术。要想施放这些法术，你的智力必须至少为１０＋法术环级，但是法术豁免ＤＣ取决于你的感知而非智力。当你释放这些法术时，它们视为神术而非奥术。选择该巫术后每一个新的等级，你都可以从法师/术士列表里选择１个新的法术替换１个旧的法术。

entries.name: Arcane Hypothesis
entries.description: At 20th level, your body surges with arcane power. You can add any metamagic feats that you know to your spells without increasing their casting time, although you must still expend higher-level spell slots. Whenever you use magic items that require charges, you can instead expend spell slots to power the item. For every three levels of spell slots that you expend, you consume one less charge when using a magic item that expends charges.

entries.name: 奥能力池
entries.description:
1级时，魔战士获得一个奥能能量池，他可以从中汲取能量增强其力量和武器。奥能力池拥有等于“1/2魔战士职业等级（至少为1）+智力修正”的能量点数。每日当魔战士准备法术时，力池也得到恢复。1级时，魔战士可以用迅捷动作从奥能力池中花费1点来赋予任何他所持用的武器+1增强加值，持续1分钟。之后每4级，武器会再获得+1增强加值，17级时达到最高+5。这些加值可以与武器原本加值累计，但最高叠加至+5。多次使用此能力并不互相累计。

  5级时，以下附魔可被添加至任何合适的武器上：舞空、炽焰、焰爆、冻寒、冰爆、锐锋、电击、电爆、追击或斩首。

  添加这些附魔会消耗等价点数的奥能增强加值。这些特性可以添加在原有该特性的武器上，但效果并不累计。若武器无魔法，则必须在添加任何附魔前先添加至少+1增强加值。这些加值和附魔在消耗奥能力池时选择决定，在下次使用此能力前无法更改。这些增强效果在武器被魔战士外的其他人持用时也无效。魔战士同时只能以此方式增强一把武器。若他再次使用此能力，则先前的效果立即结束。

entries.name: 奥能堡垒
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以迅捷动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，将他盾牌所提供的AC加值(包括增强加值)加到他的接触AC上，此能力持续直到他下一轮开始。

entries.name: 高等奥能壁垒
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级12；“奥能壁垒”

  效果：当魔战士使用“奥能壁垒”时，他可额外花费一点奥能将他盾牌所提供的AC加值(包括增强加值)加到他的反射豁免上，此能力持续直到他下一轮开始。若在此能力持续期间，魔战士成为一个需要反射检定的效果的目标，他可以直觉动作从【奥能力池】中花费2点奥能给自己【反射闪避】，或者花费4点奥能给自己【精通反射闪避】。

entries.name: 奥能源泉
entries.description:
奥能师拥有天生的魔法能量之池，可以为他的【奥能技艺】提供能量、或强化他施展的法术。奥能师的奥能源泉中可以储存的最大魔法能量点数为“3+奥能师等级”。

  每天准备法术时，奥能师的奥能源泉将充满原始魔法能量，获得“3+1/2奥能师等级”点数。他在前一天剩余的点数将浪费掉。他还能通过【转耗法术】职业能力和一些【奥能技艺】来获得这些点数。奥术源泉中储存的点数无法超过前述的上限，超过最大值的点数会被浪费。

  奥术源泉点数可以用来为多种奥能师能力提供能量。此外，他可以在施放奥能师法术时，通过自由动作从奥术源泉中消耗1点，使得施法者等级+1或此法术DC+1。奥能师以此方式在一个法术上最多消耗1点。

entries.name: 奥能嗅觉
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，获得每魔战士等级1小时的“灵敏嗅觉（Scent)”。该能力只能用来侦测有施法能力或类法术能力的生物。此外，在此期间魔战士可以以类移动作尝试法术辨识检定{DC＝10＋目标的施法者等级}来得知一个被侦测到的生物能释放的最高级的法术。对于每个生物，魔战士在24小时内只能尝试一次这样的法术辨识检定。

entries.name: 奥术学派
entries.description:
法师能够选择专精于一个法术学派，获得基于该学派的额外法术和力量。这个选择必须在1级作出。一旦选定，不能更改。不选择专精学派的法师视为普通学派。法师决定专精与某个学派的同时必须选定两个对立学派，代表牺牲一个法术领域的知识去完全掌握另一个领域。法师如果准备对立学派法术则必须付出两倍的同级法术位。举例来说，一个选择塑能系作为对立学派的法师需要用2个3环法术位来准备火球术。另外，当专精法师制作一件先决条件中需要对立法术的魔法物品时，所有技能检定受到-4罚值。一个普通学派法师准备法术没有相关限制。

　　每个奥术学派都会给予法师一定数量的学派能力。另外，专精法师在每个法术环级上获得一个额外的学派法术位，从1环法术开始。每天，法师能够在此法术位中准备一个专精学派的法术，这个法术必须在法师的法术书中。学派法术位中能够添加超魔专长，但要使用更高环的法术位。普通学派法师不获得学派法术位。

entries.name: 奥秘子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.l01ajd0m4xgwq3fd]{魔法灵光}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fmuea6pmgrylbux7]{秘法眼}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f2awecndqcmhavq7]{解析咒文}

entries.name: Arcane Surge
entries.description: You can allow the archmage spirit to gain 1 point of inf luence over you in order to cast one of your medium spells known without expending a spell slot. When you do so, the caster level and DC of the spell increase by 1, and you can閳ユ獩 apply metamagic to the spell.

entries.name: 奥术器皿
entries.description:
在8等时，不论何时，当骑士因为另一个生物所施展的法术或类法术能力，在攻击、豁免或是伤害上获得加值时，骑士也会获得跟该法术或类法术能力环级同等的临时生命值。

  此能力给予的临时生命值会和不同的法术叠加，但临时生命值的数值最多只能等同骑士的等级。这些临时生命值可以持续10分钟。

entries.name: 奥能武器
entries.description: 以一个标准动作从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师可以增强他的武器。此武器在穿透伤害减免时视作魔法武器。5级时，此武器获得+1增强加值，5级以后每4级，此加值增加1（最高在17级时变成+4）。此加值可以与武器上已有的加值叠加，最多到+5。奥能师也可以用此技艺添加下列之一的武器特殊属性：舞空，防御，及远，炽焰，炎爆，霜冻，霜爆，锋锐，电击，电爆，追击，法储，投掷。添加这些特殊属性占用等于此能力价值的增强加值。重复的特殊能力不会叠加。若本不是魔法武器，在添加其他武器特殊能力前，必须有至少+1增强加值。此效果在使用此技艺时决定，之后不能更改，除非再次使用此技艺。此效果只能对奥能师持有的武器生效，若其他生物持有此武器，这些效果就会消失，奥能师重新持用此武器时则会重新生效。奥能师同时只能有一个此能力生效。此效果持续等于奥能师魅力调整值的分钟数（最少为1）。

entries.name: 奥能技艺
entries.description: 通过扭曲、甚至打破魔法的规律则，奥能师习得了怎样开发魔法规律中的漏洞和特例。有的技艺还能让他粉碎各种形态的魔法，将其精华加入他的【奥能源泉】。1级和之后每2级，奥能师习得下表中一项新的奥能技艺。一项奥能技艺只能选择一次。一旦奥能技艺选定后则无法再更改。多数奥能技艺需要奥能师从【奥能源泉】中消费点数来施展。若无特别说明，奥能技艺的豁免DC为“10+1/2奥能师等级+奥能师的魅力调整值”。

entries.name: Archmage Arcana
