entries.description: Instead of your normal spells per day for your medium level, you use the spells per day from Table 1閳?: Mesmerist. For each level of spell you can now cast (including level 0), each time you channel an archmage spirit, select a single spell of that level from the sorcerer/wizard spell list to add to your medium spell list and spells known until you lose contact with the archmage. When you cast these spells, they count as arcane (though not for the purpose of fulfilling prerequisites), and thus you must provide verbal and somatic components instead of thought and emotion components.

entries.name: Archmage Spirit
entries.description:
An archmage spirit is a font of knowledge and arcane power.

Spirit Bonus: When you channel an archmage, your spirit bonus applies on concentration checks, Intelligence checks, and Intelligence-based skill checks.

  Seance Boon: Your damaging spells deal an additional 2 points of damage of the same type that they would normally deal to each target.

  Favored Locations: Arcane redoubts, areas of unusual magic, libraries, schools.

  Influence Penalty: Your body begins to respond as if you were a frail, aged scholar. You take a penalty equal to your spirit bonus on Strength checks, Strength-based skill checks, Constitution checks, attack rolls, and non-spell damage rolls.

  Taboos: Choose one: You eschew all faith in the divine, so you must not be the willing target of divine spells or abilities and you must attempt a Will saving throw against even harmless divine spells and abilities; you must not pass up the opportunity to learn something new and significant (a nontrivial piece of information with a Knowledge check of DC 20 or higher) when that opportunity is directly present; you must use your own magical solution to a challenge if you can, even if a mundane solution that would require fewer resources is available.

entries.name: 亚空子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21bxbzdaawjrnvyo]{神恩}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hu8179fdqfkl0bqj]{祈祷术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友} (archon only)

替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nznqmwpavfediten]{意识投影}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}

entries.name: 装甲熟练
entries.description: 你对金属的掌握让你熟于使用装甲。你在穿着金属制的中型装甲时速度不减，此能力不给予你额外的盔甲擅长。5级时当你穿着金属盔甲，你的防具减值减少1（最小为0），且最大敏捷加值上升1。10级还有15级这个加值额外变化1点。

entries.name: 骨制铠甲
entries.description: 你可以创造出一件骨制铠甲，为你提供+4盔甲加值。7级以及之后的每4级，该加值再+2。在13级，这件盔甲为你提供伤害减免“5/钝击”。你每天可以使用此铠甲的小时数等于你的先知等级。这些时间不必连续，但每次使用最少消耗1小时。

entries.name: Armor of Chains
entries.description:
At 8th level, you gain resistance 5 to cold and the chains covering your body provide a +4 armor bonus to AC with no armor check penalty, maximum Dexterity bonus, or additional weight.

  At 16th level, the resistance increases to 10 and the armor bonus increases to +8.

entries.name: Armor Piercer
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can cause her sneak attacks to pierce through natural armor. When she hits with an attack that deals sneak attack damage, she can forgo one or more of her sneak attack dice to reduce the target閳ユ獨 natural armor bonus by that amount (minimum natural armor bonus of +0) until the end of her next turn. A creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 1 minute.

entries.name: Armor Ripper
entries.description: While raging, you gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks made to sunder with any of your natural attacks.

entries.name: Armor Skin
entries.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 armor is like a second skin. He doesn閳ユ獩 apply the armor check penalty for light and medium armor on Acrobatics, Escape Artist, or Stealth checks. This penalty applies on other skill checks as normal.

  At 8th level, he can move at full speed in medium armor.

entries.name: 盔甲训练
entries.description: 3级时，战士学会在穿戴盔甲时获得更灵活的机动性。当他穿甲时，盔甲防具检定减值减少1点（最小为0）且敏捷上限增加1点。在这之后的每4级（7、11、15级），上述修正再提高1点，最大达到防具检定减值减少4点，敏捷上限增加4点。此外，战士能够在装备中型盔甲时以正常速度移动。7级时战士能够在装备重型盔甲时以正常速度移动。

entries.name: Armored Marauder
entries.description:
Some elite slayers exchange leather and chain for plate when stalking prey. A slayer with this talent gains proficiency with heavy armor.

  In addition, the armor check penalty of any heavy armor the slayer wears is reduced by 1 for every 6 class levels he has.

entries.name: 盔甲面具
entries.description: 奥能师可用标准动作从【奥能源泉】中花费1点奥能点给他自己加持一层幻术装甲。当他激活该能力时，奥能师获得任意轻甲或中甲外观的‘法师盔甲’效果，施法者等级等同于他的奥能师等级。在盔甲激活后的任何时间点，奥能师均可用直觉动作从【奥能源泉】中额外花费1点奥能点获得‘虔诚护盾’效果，施法者等级等同于他的奥能师等级。

entries.name: Armored Mind
entries.description:
While you are wearing Hellknight plate or a signifer mask, you gain a +2 bonus on Will saving throws to resist mind-affecting effects. Once per day at 7th level, you can reroll a Will saving throw against a mind-affecting effect and choose the more favorable result.

  At 11th level, the bonus on Will saving throws increases to +4.

entries.name: Armored Swiftness
entries.description:
In time, the heaviest armor can become like a second skin. A slayer with this talent can move at full speed in heavy armor. In addition, the maximum Dexterity bonus of heavy armor the slayer wears increases by 1 for every 6 class levels he has.

  A slayer must have the armored marauder slayer talent to select this talent.

entries.name: Army of Darkness
entries.description: Whenever you cast a summon monster spell and summon a creature that normally has the celestial or fiendish template, you can instead summon it with the shadow creature template (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 4 238). This revelation counts as having the @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻} (conjuration) feat for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Augment Summoning feat, as well as any feat that lists Augment Summoning as a prerequisite.

entries.name: Aromatic Extract
entries.description:
The alchemist creates an inhaled version of an extract that is shared among multiple creatures. He must decide that an extract is an aromatic extract when he makes it. When used, the extract grants its benefit to all creatures within a 10-foot spread of the extract. The aromatic extract is treated as having the minimum caster level required for the original extract. An aromatic extract expends one of the alchemist閳ユ獨 daily extracts as if it were an extract 2 levels higher. This discovery can be applied only to extracts with a range of touch.

  An alchemist must be at least 10th level and must have the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Arrest the Flow
entries.description: At 15th level, once per day as an immediate action, you can attune yourself to the Astral閳ユ獨 timeless nature to halt the effects of one condition or affliction (such as paralyzed, stunned, a poison, or a curse), including permanent and instantaneous conditions, until the end of your next turn. You can use this ability even when a condition or affliction would normally prevent you from doing so, regardless of whether you閳ユ獧e targeting that prevention effect閳ユ獨 source. At the end of your next turn the condition or affliction resumes its normal effect and the round delayed by this ability does not count toward the condition or affliction閳ユ獨 duration. This ability has no effect on hit point damage, ability damage, or the dead condition. Alternatively, you can use this ability to extend the duration of any one effect affecting you until the end of your next turn; this does not extend the duration for any other creatures under the effect. At 19th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lzos34s87qsc620l]{炽焰法球}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gmugktarbieojt59]{焰击术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cm3l4h4mld9j8lar]{延迟爆裂火球}

entries.name: 工匠之怒
entries.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以通过触摸一件近战武器给予其超越其他人工制品的力量。在一分钟内，每当该武器对构装体或物体造成伤害时，它无视所有硬度和伤害减免。

entries.name: 魔法变换
entries.description: 在10级时，用一个标准动作，你能将一件魔法武器的特殊能力转移到另一件武器上。施展这个能力时，你必须同时触摸两件武器，而且这两个物品的携带者必须为自愿。你可以传递价格为基本价格加值为+1和+2的特殊能力。在对双头武器使用该能力时，只对一端起效。这种转移持续1分钟，然后被转移的能力会自动回到原物品上。你可以在同一件武器上多次使用这种能力。另外，你也可以使用这种祝福将一种+1或+2魔法护甲特殊能力传递到另一件你所接触的护甲上，或是直接转移+1或是+2的武器或盔甲增强加值。

entries.name: 手艺领域
entries.description:
神授力量:能够修复损坏的物品，给予物体生命，和无中生有地创造。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7k5ypftnzy9r7mzz]{活化绳}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.10e3iwsr5jkq4q73]{塑木术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g1evszmk8wfgnsv5]{塑石术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{次级造物术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rxk9rk8gvqau3f3l]{鬼斧神工}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{强效造物术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fnxgq54y02f6ri82]{铁墙术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o6vh3lrmi1hsdzmm]{即刻召唤}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lxxliyxfw9uvbxmt]{虹光法球}

entries.name: 技工之触
entries.description: 你能够任意施展修复术，使用你的牧师等级作为施法者等级去修复物品。并且你还能通过一次近战接触攻击来破坏物品和建筑，造成“1d6+1/2牧师等级”点伤害。这次攻击忽略相当于你牧师等级的伤害减免和硬度。你每天可以使用此能力次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: Aryzul's Curse
entries.description: When raging, the barbarian emanates a 5-foot-radius aura of radioactivity. Each round that another creature begins its turn within this aura, it takes a cumulative 閳? penalty to Strength (Fortitude negates, DC = 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + her Constitution modifier) for the duration of the rage. A creature閳ユ獨 Strength penalty from this ability cannot exceed the barbarian閳ユ獨 class level. At 12th level, the barbarian can choose to create a 10-foot-radius aura of radioactivity when she begins her rage.

entries.name: 晋升
entries.description: 20级起，你的体内充盈着天堂之力。你免疫强酸、寒冷以及石化（petrification）。你还会获得10点闪电抗力、10点火焰抗力、并且在对抗毒素（poison）时豁免获得+4种族加值。即便没有处于血怒之时，你也会一直获得这些优势。

entries.name: 圣体护持
entries.description: 你通过静修凝神而掌握了将外物从你的身体上弹开的密法。若你未穿着护甲也未处于中载或重载负重，那么这密法便能让你在防御等级上获得+4护甲加值。在7级和之后每提升4个等级时，这个护甲加值再额外+2。在13级时，你还会获得DR 5/徒手击打或天生武器。你每天可以享受本启示好处的时间相当于你的先知等级数个小时。这些时间无需连续使用，但每次使用至少需要持续1小时。

entries.name: 修持最终启示
entries.description: At 20th level, you become a magical creature. You are forevermore treated as an outsider rather than as a humanoid (or whatever your creature type was) for the purpose of spells and magical effects. Additionally, you gain damage reduction 10/chaotic, which allows you to ignore the first 10 points of damage from any attack made by a nonchaotic weapon or by any natural attack made by a creature that doesn't have similar damage reduction. Unlike other outsiders, you can still be brought back from the dead as if you were a member of your previous creature type.

entries.name: 修持秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 拥有浩劫秘示域的先知可以将特技动作（敏捷），攀爬（力量），逃脱术（敏捷）和游泳（力量）技能加入本职技能列表。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.879sdozw7ca7ci9k]{石拳术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d8yy4njnr25hacek]{滑翔术} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lmst00dtapf4xhya]{Force Punch} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h16l4lq9bzyeeosf]{Ethereal Fists} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b5mz8voksps5g4yq]{通晓传奇} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ukacuu0cvdjkqxwu]{Frightful Aspect} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (18th).

entries.name: Ash Cloud
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can surround yourself with a 10-foot-radius cloud of ash, which functions as an obscuring mist spell, except you can see through it clearly. The cloud is stationary, and remains for 1 round per oracle level. Using this ability again causes your previous cloud to fall to the ground.

  At 7th level, your ash cloud fills with embers. All creatures in the cloud except you take 1d6 points of fire damage per round and must succeed at Fortitude saves to avoid choking, as though they were breathing in heavy smoke (Core Rulebook 444).

entries.name: 灰烬子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{解离术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{火焰之躯}

entries.name: Ask the Spirits
entries.description: At 13th level, a medium can send his consciousness to the Astral Plane any number of times per day to ask the spirits for advice, as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} to contact the Astral Plane. The medium automatically succeeds at the Intelligence check to avoid the possible decrease to his Intelligence and Charisma.

entries.name: Asmodeus's Boon
entries.description: Whenever a creature fails a saving throw and takes damage from one of your spells, it is shaken for a number of rounds equal to the spell閳ユ獨 level. Spells that do not allow saves do not cause creatures to become shaken. This does not stack with other fear effects.

entries.name: 异界型态
entries.description: 10级之后，召唤师可以从幻灵的进化池里抽出2点来改变自己。他不能选择幻灵无法选择的能力，他本身也必须符合进化的需求。召唤师不能选择【属性提升】作为他的进化。这项能力耗费的进化点数来自幻灵的进化池，召唤师可以在每次能够改变幻灵的进化型态时改变用在自己身上的进化点数。

entries.name: 天真无邪
entries.description: 奥能师可用直觉动作从【奥能源泉】中花费1点奥能点获得‘无罪术’APG效果，施法者等级等同于他的奥能师等级。

entries.name: 战争之貌
entries.description: 在20级时，战斗祭司可以将自己提升为战力的化身，大幅增强武技与操纵神威的能力。每天一次以一个迅捷动作，战斗祭司可以将自己的人物等级视为基础攻击加值，获得DR10/-，且可以无视自己穿着的护甲类型和负重而保持全速移动。此外，在持续时间内使用祝福能力不计算入每日使用次数限制。 此能力持续1分钟。

entries.name: Aspexia's Mysticism
entries.description: The rogue has been trained in a minor occult technique. The rogue gains Psychic Sensitivity as a bonus feat.

entries.name: 一击瞬杀
entries.description: 拥有此高等天赋的杀手可以直接解决无法保护自己的敌人。为暗杀对手，杀手必须先以标准动作研究对像1轮。接下来的1轮中，若杀手发动偷袭且对方的AC失去敏捷加值，则此次偷袭具有可能秒杀对方的额外效果。这种尝试在对方能意识到杀手是敌对者时自动失败。若偷袭成功，对方必须通过DC为 {10+1/2杀手等级+杀手智力修正} 的强韧豁免。如果豁免失败则即死；若成功则受到正常的偷袭伤害，且在24小时内免疫该杀手的一击瞬杀能力。

entries.name: 强袭连携
entries.description: 每日1次，当盗贼在一次对夹击目标的攻击中未能命中目标时，她可以策动她的一位盟友（必须也处在夹击位上）进行一次攻击。这位盟友可以以一个直觉动作对目标进行攻击。

entries.name: 显示权威
entries.description: 在15级时，骑将对攻击他或他奴隶的人展示他的残酷与无情。无论何时，' 一名敌人对骑将或一名临接他的奴隶或侍从进行一次近战攻击时，该名敌人会引发骑将的一次借机攻击，并且骑将会在这次借机攻击上获得+2士气加值。如果该名敌人的攻击一个确认了的重击，则骑将对该名敌人的借机攻击，将他视为骑将挑战的目标。

entries.name: Assume Control
entries.description:
At 1st level, you can attempt to gain control over a summoned creature by disrupting the bond between it and the caster who summoned it. You must make a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) equal to 10 + the summoning caster閳ユ獨 level. If you know the summoned creature閳ユ獨 name, you receive a +2 circumstance bonus on the check. If the check is successful, you can control the summoned creature as if you had summoned it for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your wizard level (minimum 1 round). This does not increase the duration of the original summoning. The original summoning caster can attempt to regain control of the summoned creature as a standard action by making a caster level check against your caster level + 10. When your control ends, the creature reverts to the control of its summoner.

  At 9th level, you can use this ability to bargain with called creatures as if you were the caster who conjured them. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

entries.name: Assumed Form
entries.description:
You can change your appearance at will, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} with a caster level equal to your oracle level.

  At 7th level, you can choose to actually transform, which works the same way but counts as a polymorph effect instead of an illusion and doesn閳ユ獩 allow a Will save to disbelieve.

  At 11th level, the ability lasts until you dismiss it or use it again, allowing you to even keep it active while you sleep.

  At 15th level, when you use this ability as a polymorph effect, you can gain the size bonus to your ability scores and additional racial abilities as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}.

entries.name: Astounding Avoidance
entries.description:
The subject can avoid damage from magical and unusual attacks. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attempts a saving throw against an attack or spell that normally deals half damage on a successful save, before the subject rolls the save. If the subject succeeds at her save, she takes no damage.

  If the mesmerist is 12th level or higher, the subject takes only half damage if she fails her save. The benefits of this trick don閳ユ獩 stack with those of the evasion or stalwart class features.

entries.name: Astral Beacon
entries.description:
At 20th level, a medium is an open connection to the Astral Plane and a shining beacon for spirits. As a free action, he can channel spirits of any of the five legends he did not contact via his seance. This ability lasts for 1 round and grants access to the intermediate, greater, and supreme spirit powers of the chosen spirits.

  Unlike trance of three, astral beacon allows spirits of the chosen legends (for instance, archmage) to gain influence over the medium until 24 hours from when the medium contacted his primary spirit.

  Also unlike trance of three, if the medium would incur influence by using one of the new spirits閳?abilities, that influence is added to the medium閳ユ獨 total influence from that spirit rather than from his primary spirit.

entries.name: Astral Bloodline
entries.description:
Whether you were raised on the Astral Plane, had an ancestor with a strong connection to the Astral, or simply had a freak brush with an astral conduit in your youth, you have an unusual connection to both time and space. Your senses extend through the Astral Plane to the far reaches of the multiverse, allowing you to perceive and manipulate the timeless potential that binds the multiverse together. Your ancestors may have also held a connection to one of the astral isles or conduits, or like you, may have plied this cosmic ocean閳ユ攣nd some may even survive there to this day.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：位面.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{克敌机先} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ze0kso9hxff5u2f]{虚假生命} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7tmsbg37zr1q382]{时之沙} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ni93l43asrq29ytd]{游荡星尘} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{魔法恒定术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4br9puuneexco5hx]{触发术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wniqskqkk0cubu9u]{创造半位面} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{时间静止} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.HVu9JzllWoLzKKqH]{锻造戒指},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：位面),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{武器娴熟}.

  血统奥秘: When you cast a spell, you can choose to enhance the next spell you cast before the end of your next turn, increasing the enhanced spell閳ユ獨 saving throw DC by 1. The level of the enhanced spell must be lower than that of the spell used to activate this ability.

entries.name: Astral Caravan
entries.description:
As a full-round action, you can step into the planar border where the Astral Plane abuts the Material Plane, pulling up to one additional person per class level with you. You can閳ユ獩 travel fully into the Astral Plane or any of the other planes it borders, but while using this ability you can cover incredible distances, traversing 50 miles per hour, as per the shadow walk spell.

  You can travel for up to 1 hour per day per oracle level. This duration need not be continuous, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.

entries.name: Astral Journey
entries.description: At 14th level, a medium can enter a deep coma in order to project himself onto the Astral Plane as @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射}, except he can project only himself, he can閳ユ獩 enter other planes, and his projected gear has no magical properties.

entries.name: Astral Voyager
entries.description: At 9th level, you can send your consciousness to the Astral Plane once per day. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.zk8l7i27fhfic3c1]{Astral Projection, Lesser} and allows you to bring with you up to one additional willing creature for every 2 sorcerer levels you have. At 13th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送} once per day, but only on yourself and willing targets that accompany you, and only from the Material Plane to the Astral Plane and vice versa. At 17th level, the @Compendium[pf1.spells.zk8l7i27fhfic3c1]{Astral Projection, Lesser} ability instead functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射}.

entries.name: Astral Warp
entries.description: At 1st level, you can create a sparkling field within 30 feet that distorts time within a 5-foot cube. This field lasts until the beginning of your next turn. Any creature that enters the area or that starts its turn within the cube takes 1d4 points of force damage + 1 point of force damage per 2 sorcerer levels you have (Fort negates). While within the area, a creature takes a 閳? penalty on Reflex saves and to AC. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: At Arm's Length
entries.description: At 5th level, you gain Reach Spell as a bonus feat. Additionally, when using this feat, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool for each increase in the spell閳ユ獨 range category. If you do, the spell does not use up a higher-level spell slot than normal. (For example, a spell with a range of touch increased to long range via this feat would normally use up a spell slot 3 levels higher, but if you spend 3 points from your phrenic pool, the spell does not use up a higher spell slot.)

entries.name: 原祖图腾
entries.description: 野蛮人获得凶猛（Ferocity）特殊能力。野蛮人必须达到6级才能选择本狂暴之力。

entries.name: 高等原祖图腾
entries.description: 野蛮人获得践踏（Trample）特殊攻击。野蛮人必须达到10级才能选择本狂暴之力。

entries.name: 次级原祖图腾
entries.description: 野蛮人获得一次啮咬攻击。如果野蛮人已经拥有了一次啮咬攻击，那么这啮咬攻击造成的伤害视为野蛮人的体型增大一级。

entries.name: Atheist Inspiration
entries.description: The investigator can use her inspiration on saving throws against divine spells without expending uses of inspiration. This talent counts as the Divine Defiance feat (Pathfinder Player Companion: Faiths & Philosophies 7) for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of other feats.

entries.name: Athletic Exploit
entries.description:
As a swift action, you gain the ability to overcome physical obstacles with ease. Until the beginning of your next turn, you halve your armor check penalty when attempting Acrobatics, Climb, Escape Artist, and Swim skill checks, and you gain a bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on such skill checks.

  This power replaces the Strength Surge power of the Strength Domain.

entries.name: Attune Implants
entries.description:
Starting at 5th level, you can spend a full-round action once per day to harness and channel the power of your cybernetic implants into your psychic spellcasting. This increases the saving throw DCs of your psychic spells by 1, and the increase lasts a number of minutes equal to your psychic level. You must have at least one piece of cybertech (Technology Guide 35) implanted in you to use this ability.

  Additional implants do not increase the duration or the number of uses of this discipline ability.

entries.name: 强效
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以藉着接触一个生物给予他单项属性至少+2的增强加值，或着你也可以选择给他一项可以与其他效果叠加的天生护甲AC+1加值。10级开始，这个加值增加到+4。你给予的天生护甲加值也在每5法师等级再+1，最高到达20级的+5。强效持续法师等级一半的轮数（至少1轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: 占命
entries.description: 每天一次，你可以以类法术能力的形式施放法术卜筮。

entries.name: 灵光
entries.description: 信奉混乱、邪恶、善良或秩序神祇的导魂者拥有和神祇阵营相同的灵光（见“侦测邪恶（Detect Evil）”法术的说明，CRB p.266）。

entries.name: 放逐灵光
entries.description: 从1级开始，你每天可以展开一道半径30尺的灵光，轮数等于你的法师等级。这些回合并不需要连续。任何处于这道灵光内被召唤或呼唤的生物，每轮都必须进行意志检定，一旦失败就会在这道灵光内变的缓慢。当他第二次意志检定失败时，立即被遣返回他的故乡界域，且这道召唤法术的持续时间立刻结束。如果法术召唤的生物不只一个，只有检定失败的生物会受到影响。

entries.name: Aura of Bedlam
entries.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot-radius aura of chaos and strife for 1 round per cleric level. Enemies in the aura take a 閳? penalty on concentration checks and are treated as experiencing vigorous motion (concentration DC = 10 + spell level) when attempting to cast spells. This penalty increases by 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have beyond 8th. This is a mind-affecting effect. These rounds need not be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Chaos Blade power of the Chaos Domain.

entries.name: 混沌灵光
entries.description: 到了8级你可用狂乱能量场围绕着自己，此30尺灵光每日持续轮数为你牧师等级。在行动轮开始之际，范围内敌人需要宣布自己此轮行动（攻击、施法、移动、使用物品、激活特殊能力），意志豁免成功依此行动，失败则要以其它方式行动。此能力替换混乱领域的混沌之刃能力。

entries.name: 勇气灵光
entries.description: 3级起，圣骑士对恐惧免疫（不论魔法或其他因素造成的）。在她周围10尺内的伙伴对抗恐惧时豁免检定有+4士气加值。此能力在圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，但当她失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 战栗灵光
entries.description: 3级起，反圣骑士浑身放出显而易见的威慑气势。在他周围10尺内的敌人进行对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定时受到-4减值。免疫恐惧的单位身处反圣骑士周围10尺内时，失去其免疫恐惧能力。此能力在反圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，但当他失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 腐败光环
entries.description: 到了8级你能用标准动作放出30尺的腐败光环，范围内的活物（除了你）都因为肉体腐烂受到1d6伤害，植物受到2d6点。并且只要在光环内，每轮都受到1点累积的力量惩罚，离开后会以每轮1点的速度恢复。你每天能使用的轮数为牧师等级，不必连续。此能力取代植物领域的荆棘护甲能力。

entries.name: 堕落灵光
entries.description: 17级起，反圣骑士获得伤害减免“5/善良”，在他周围10尺内的敌人于进行对抗〔胁迫〕效果的豁免检定时，受到-4减值。此能力在反圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，当他失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 绝望光环
entries.description: 在8级时，你能散发出30尺半径的绝望光环，每天持续轮数等同你法师等级。在此范围内的敌人在属性检定，攻击，伤害，豁免和技能检定上获得-2罚值。此能力作用时间不需要连续。这是一个影响心智的效果。

entries.name: 绝望灵光 （反圣骑士）
entries.description: 8级起，反圣骑士周围10尺内的敌人豁免检定-2，此减值与【战栗灵光】能力的减值不叠加。此能力在反圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，当他失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: Aura of Efficiency
entries.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot-radius aura that grants your allies a +4 bonus on all saving throws against effects that inflict the fatigued or exhausted condition. Any equipment wielded by your allies within this area gets a bonus to hardness equal to 1/2 your cleric level, and your allies閳?attacks against targets within this area ignore an equal amount of hardness. You can use this aura for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapon power of the Artifice Domain.

entries.name: 炬烛圣志
entries.description: 在4级时，你可以创造出一片半径30尺，提供正常光照的灵光。该灵光可以为所有身处其中的盟友在技能检定上提供+2洞察加值，并且可以作为一个二环法术效果来反制或解除黑暗术效果。你每天可以激活本灵光的时间相当于你的审判者等级轮，这些轮数无需连续。

entries.name: 邪恶灵光
entries.description: 反圣骑士的邪恶灵光强度（见‘侦测邪恶’法术）等于他的反圣骑士等级。一名圣骑士对反圣骑士使用【制裁邪恶】能力时，第一次成功的命中将造成“圣骑士等级×2”的额外伤害。

entries.name: 坚信灵光
entries.description: 14级起，在克服怪物的伤害减免时，圣骑士的所持有的武器，以及任何在她身边10尺内盟友所做出的攻击都被视为具有善良阵营。此能力在圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，当她失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 健忘灵光
entries.description: 到了8级你能放出30尺的光环，持续轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。此范围内的目标必须通过意志豁免，否则将对置身于圈内时候没有记忆。同时施法者在区域内从1环开始向上遍历，从低到高依次失去记忆法术或可用法术，每轮都必须意志豁免，成功可保留。此能力替换领域的黑暗之眼能力。

entries.name: 善良灵光
entries.description: 圣骑士的善良灵光强度（见“侦测善良（Detect Good）”法术）等于她的圣骑士等级。

entries.name: 英勇灵光
entries.description: 到了8级，可以迅捷动作放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺英勇灵光，不需连续。盟友受到效果等同“英雄气概”。此能力替换荣耀领域的神力光临能力。

entries.name: 自闭灵光
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你能展开范围20尺的灵光，使得所有处于灵光范围内的敌人陷入孤单与失落中。被你的灵光影响的敌人会变得迟缓笨拙，如同他们在困难地形中行动。除此之外，灵光内的敌人无法夹击，也无法使用援助他人动作。你每天可以激活灵光的轮数相当于3+你的感知调整值轮。这些轮数不必持续。这是一个影响心灵的情绪效果。此能力替换虚空领域的错裂面纱能力。

entries.name: 审判灵光
entries.description: 11级起，圣骑士可以花费两次制裁邪恶的使用次数，给予10尺以内的盟友1次【制裁邪恶】的能力，但使用她自身的魅力和职业等级决定奖励加值。盟友必须在下回合行动开始时使用此能力，效果持续1分钟。使用此能力是一个自由动作。邪恶盟友并不会受到此能力的好处。

entries.name: 狂乱灵光
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以放出30英尺的狂乱灵光，每日可用轮数等于你的牧师等级。在此灵光范围内的敌人需做通过DC等于“10+1/2牧师等级+感知修正”的意志豁免，以避免受到困惑效果影响。该困惑效果在生物离开灵光范围或灵光结束时立刻失效。通过豁免检定的生物在24小时内对此灵光的效果免疫。每日轮数可分为多次使用。

entries.name: 威胁灵光
entries.description: 到了8级，你能用标准动作发动30尺的防护灵光，敌人的命中、AC、豁免受到-2惩罚。你每天能使用的轮数等于牧师等级，不必连续。此能力取代善良领域的神圣之枪能力或秩序领域的律理之杖能力。

entries.name: 保护灵光
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以放出30英尺的保护灵光，每日可用轮数等于你的牧师等级。你和在灵光范围内的同伴获得AC+1偏斜加值，以及所有元素抗力5（酸、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。之后每4牧师等级该偏斜加值再+1。在14级时，所有元素抗力增加为10。这些轮数可以分作多次使用。

entries.name: Aura of Purity
entries.description: The witch閳ユ獨 aura purifies the air around her. Diseases, inhaled poisons, and noxious gaseous effects (such as stinking cloud) are negated in a 10-foot aura around the witch for a number of minutes equal to her level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Effects caused by spells whose level is more than half the witch閳ユ獨 class level are unaffected.

entries.name: Aura of Repitition
entries.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of repetition for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. All enemies within this aura must make a Will save each round or repeat their action from the previous round (if possible). Creatures that attacked on the previous round attack again on the following round, although they may change their target. Creatures that moved the previous round must take the same move action again, although they may change their route. Creatures that drank a potion must do so again, even they can only drink from an empty bottle. Actions that cannot be repeated are wasted. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Dancing Weapon power of the Artifice Domain.

entries.name: 虔诚灵光
entries.description: 8级起，圣骑士免疫〔魅惑〕法术和类法术能力。10尺以内的盟友在对抗〔魅惑〕效果的豁免上获得+4士气加值。此能力在圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，当她失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 公正灵光
entries.description: 17级起，圣骑士获得伤害减免“5/邪恶”，且免疫〔胁迫〕法术和类法术能力。10尺以内的盟友在对抗〔胁迫〕效果的豁免上获得+4士气加值。此能力在圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，当她失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 圣化灵光
entries.description: 在8级以一个即时动作，你能散发出30尺半径的圣化灵光，持续等于牧师等级的轮数。这些轮数无需连续。在区域内特定对善良生物有害的效果被反转，不再伤害善良生物反而伤害邪恶生物。同样的，只对邪恶生物生效的有益效果只对善良生物有效。。此能力取代善良领域的神圣之枪能力。

entries.name: 罪孽灵光
entries.description: 14级起，在克服怪物的伤害减免时，反圣骑士的所持有的武器，以及任何在他身边10尺内对反圣骑士的敌人做出的所有攻击，都被视为具有邪恶阵营。此能力在反圣骑士神志清醒时发挥作用，当他失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

entries.name: 复仇灵光
entries.description: 11级起，反圣骑士可以花费2次【制裁善良】的使用次数，给予10尺以内的所有盟友1次制裁善良的能力，但使用他自身的魅力和职业等级决定奖励加值。盟友必须在下回合行动开始前使用此能力，效果持续1分钟。使用此能力是一个自由动作。善良盟友并不会受到此能力的好处。

entries.name: Aura Sight
entries.description: At 5th level, the occultist can read the auras of creatures around him as a standard action. This functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.isrnyw9biluqoo80]{Aura Sight} spell with a duration of 1 round.

entries.name: 极光壁垒
entries.description: 9级开始，你可以创造一片五彩斑斓的壁障。此能力效果类似于@Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术}，但造成寒冷伤害并且并不会产生热量。此外，你可以指定这片墙壁一面方向10尺内的生物，使他们处于迷魂状态，你可以迷魂每术士等级2个生物。通过意志豁免检定能不受迷魂影响，豁免DC为“10+1/2术士等级+魅力修正”。你每日能使用等同于你术士等级轮数时间的此能力，但你无需一次耗尽所有使用时间。

entries.name: Aurora Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qcjskol4ac3eemhy]{七彩喷射}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zyfm6dq35i4hip4u]{催眠图纹}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.56atnwmo4s61hi45]{Wall Of Nausea}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6lebv7569xsypp8u]{虹彩图纹}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hxgnuvkeh18untb4]{Blazing Rainbow}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o9kqm42x6xkfjem3]{预置幻影}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mb819hvwpk0zmw53]{虹光喷射}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight}

entries.name: 吉祥烙记
entries.description: 该野蛮人身上拥有祖灵的印记，此印记通常是一个让人印象深刻的刺青、疤痕或是胎记，每次狂暴时，拥有吉祥烙记的野蛮人拥有一次机会，可以以迅捷动作花费2轮的狂暴，唤起祖灵的庇佑，在单次1d20的投骰中加上1d6的加值。他可以在得知投骰结果之后才唤起【吉祥烙记】。

entries.name: Auspicious Mark (UC)
entries.description: The barbarian has been marked by the spirits, as indicated by an impressive tattoo, scar, or birthmark she possesses. As a swift action, she can call upon the spirits閳?favor to increase any d20 roll she just made by rolling 1d6 and adding it to the result. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels she has. She can call on the auspicious mark after seeing the result of the d20 roll. This ability can be used only once per day.

entries.name: 巫写预言
entries.description: 每天１次，萨满可以花费１小时进行不间断的沉思，在冥想期间，你的双手写出了一段段属于未来的神秘片段。该书写如同拥有９０％准确率的预言术效果一般。在１２级、１６级、２０级时各获得１次每日使用次数。

entries.name: Autumn Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8w67l6dzzsi6oz5f]{造坑术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vdmsaodgnbo8wjfx]{遗体防腐}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9ha7fyq951iijvt8]{Vitriolic Mist}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{强效造物术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ky8n4yzn6kc2cume]{酸雾术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mqrflbi6p6cltdze]{Caustic Eruption}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wplgawb6aznjx7se]{女妖之嚎}

entries.name: 秋之怒
entries.description: 野蛮人成为收获的侍者。在狂暴时，她在移位或绊摔的战技检定上获得+2加值。她也在确认重击的攻击检定上获得此加值。野蛮人只能选择一个季节主题的狂暴之力，从春季，夏季，秋季或冬季之怒中选择。

entries.name: 山崩攻势
entries.description: 9级开始，当你用一个造成伤害的法术击中一个生物时，你可以用过一个迅捷动作施展冲撞战技。该战技的CMB为“术士等级+魅力修正”。你甚至可以在近战距离以外使用此能力，并且不会触发藉机攻击。若目标与大地或岩石接触，你的CMB检定获得+4加值。

entries.name: 混沌化身
entries.description: 20级开始，你已经被最纯粹的混沌彻底浸染。你对强酸，石化，以及变形免疫。在施法对抗秩序生物的法术抗力时，你在施法者等级检定上获得+2加值。

entries.name: Avian Escape
entries.description:
The subject changes shape to elude an attacking enemy. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject takes damage from an enemy閳ユ獨 attack. The subject transforms into a bird (as beast shape III). Though the subject can appear as any Tiny bird, it uses the statistics for a raven (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 133).

  This is a polymorph effect.

entries.name: 警世言
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以发表一段摄人心魄的演说，指出那些上位者所犯下的错误并号召信众加入你的变革运动，所有你的听众都会受到一个法术魅惑人类（Charm Person）效果的影响，该效果的施法者等级等同于你的审判者等级，豁免DC为10+你的审判者等级的一半+你的感知调整值。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值。

entries.name: 启迪智慧
entries.description: 炼金术师对稀奇化学药品的长期研究拓展了他的心智。他的智力永久增加2点。

entries.name: 王霸拳
entries.description: 在16级时，以一个标准动作拳师可以可以发动一次战技攻击。如果战技攻击成功且目标是一个体型不大于拳师的非虚体生物，那么目标除了受到拳师的近身武器攻击或徒手击打伤害外，还会被击飞10尺（方向由拳师选择）并被击倒至俯卧。击飞路线必须是直线，且目标生物不可被移动至比它受到攻击的起始位置距离拳师更近的方格。如果击飞路线上有障碍物阻挡了目标生物的移动，那么障碍物和目标生物都会受到1d6点伤害，目标生物将在障碍物的邻接格被击倒至俯卧。（和可怖殴击怪物专长不同，拳师自身可以是任何体型）

entries.name: 威严显现
entries.description: 你的幻术精确的展现出夜空的奥秘，并使所有目击者为之惊诧。每一个受你施展的幻术：心灵幻觉影响生物的生命骰数，视为其生命骰数减去你的魅力修正。

entries.name: Axiomatic Bombs
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal lawful divine damage. Chaotic creatures that take a direct hit from an axiomatic bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against neutral creatures, axiomatic bombs deal half damage, and such targets are not affected by their staggering effect. Axiomatic bombs have no effect on lawful creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 爱塔子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pysrx5kxfjvsjjsi]{脚底抹油}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友} (azata only)

entries.name: 亡灵杀手
entries.description: 每当你使用治疗伤害类法术来对不死生物造成伤害时，你造成每施法者等级2点而非1点的固定附加伤害。但是，这不会改变该法术原本可以造成的伤害上限。

entries.name: 厄钱
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，萨满可以为一枚钱币施加诅咒。然后下一个持有这枚钱币的人会在所有的技能检定和豁免检定上承受-2减值。一旦这块钱离开了他的下一个主人，那么它的诅咒会立刻消解并变回一枚普普通通的硬币。在8级时，这个诅咒硬币造成的减值上升到-4。如果萨满对另一枚硬币下咒，那么他之前诅咒过的硬币价格失去魔力。这是一个诅咒效果。

entries.name: 焚尸炽焰
entries.description: 你可以从外层界域唤起纯净或炽热的火焰焚烧你的敌人，以一个标准动作，你可以将30尺内的一个目标以炎热的火焰盘绕，造成每等级1d6的伤害，一个成功的反射检定可以将伤害减半。在第十级，被此效果伤害的生物会恍惚一轮，十五级时，反射检定失败的生物将会恍惚1d4+1轮的时间。你每日可以使用此能力一次，并在十级时得到一次额外的使用次数。

entries.name: 破敌
entries.description: 到了5级，审判者可以用迅捷动作将她的一件武器强化获得〈破敌〉附魔。她在使用该能力时必须选择一个生物类型（如果是类人生物或异界生物，还必须选择一个子类）。选定后，这个类型可以随时以迅捷动作更换。这个能力只在审判者使用该武器时有效。如果武器掉落或者被拿走，武器将失去该能力、直到被归还到审判者手上或者持续时间结束。这个能力每天可使用轮数等于审判者等级，这些轮数不必连续。

entries.name: 破敌刀锋
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级15

  效果：当魔战士使用【奥能力池】强化武器时，他可额外花费一点奥能将〈破敌〉特性加在他的武器上。

entries.name: 裁决：驱逐
entries.description: 神授力量: 你虔诚侍奉主神的意志连异界的魔物也会在它的光芒中退缩。借助信仰和秘仪，你将它们扔回低层界的肮脏之中。

entries.name: 放逐学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 防护学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代防护学派的能量吸取和保护结界能力。

entries.name: 旗帜
entries.description: 5级时，武士的旗帜会成为盟军和伙伴的振奋之源。只要武士的旗帜清晰可见，60尺内的所有友军在对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定中获得+2士气加值，在冲锋的攻击检定获得+1士气加值。10级时，以及之后每5级，这些加值增加1。旗帜必须至少为小型或更大，并且需为武士或其坐骑携带或展示方可生效。

entries.name: 逸闻知识
entries.description: 诗人在进行知识类技能检定时将他一半的职业等级（至少为1）加到检定结果中，并且可以使用未受训的知识技能进行检定。

entries.name: 吟游表演
entries.description:
吟游诗人可以用他的表演在身边的人身上（通常包括自己，如果愿意）制造出各种魔法效果。1级时，他每天可以使用此能力的总轮数为“4+魅力修正”。之后的每一级，诗人都会获得2轮额外的每日使用轮数。在每一轮，诗人都可以通过表演来使用他当前等级拥有的任意一项吟游表演能力。启动吟游表演能力是一个标准动作，但在之后保持同一种表演是自由动作。更换吟游表演的效果需要诗人停止当前的表演，并用一个标准动作开始新的表演。吟游表演无法被打断，但若诗人被杀死、麻痹、震慑或敲昏，或者由于其他因素而无法保持每轮一个自由动作时，表演立刻结束。诗人无法令一个以上的吟游表演效果同时生效。7级或更高的吟游诗人可以用移动动作替代原本的标准动作，开始一项吟游表演；13级或更高的诗人开始表演只需要一个迅捷动作。

  每一项吟游表演都需要依赖声音或/和视觉成分运作。若一项吟游表演依赖声音成份运作，目标必须能够听见诗人的表演才会被影响，而这些能力多数和语言相关（如说明中所描述）。一名耳聋的诗人在进行此类表演时有20%的失败率，若他在这项检定中失败，他的尝试依旧计入每日使用轮数。耳聋的生物对依赖声音成分运作的吟游表演免疫。若一项吟游表演依赖视觉成份运作，目标必须存在和诗人之间的视觉线才会受到影响。一名目盲的诗人在进行此类表演时有50%的失败率，若他在这项检定中失败，他的尝试依旧计入每日使用轮数。目盲的生物对依赖视觉成分运作的吟游表演免疫。

entries.name: Bardic Pretender
entries.description: The rogue knows enough about music and performance to survive in a bardic college and can fake what she doesn閳ユ獩 know. The rogue qualifies as having the inspire competence bardic performance class feature for the purpose of meeting prestige class requirements, although this talent doesn閳ユ獩 grant her the bardic performance ability.

entries.name: Bare-Hand Block (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as an immediate action when attacked with a manufactured weapon to attempt an unarmed sunder combat maneuver check against it. If he successfully sunders the weapon and grants it the broken condition, the attack deals no damage. He can spend an additional 1 ki point when using this ability to activate ki sunder as a free action.

  A monk must be at least 8th level and have the ki sunder ki power before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: Basic Aerokinesis
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can create a light breeze that blows against a creature or object from a direction of your choice that follows the target wherever it goes. The breeze grants the subject a +2 bonus on saves against very hot conditions, severe heat, breath weapons, and cloud vapors and gases (such as cloudkill, stinking cloud, and inhaled poisons). This wild talent doesn閳ユ獩 function without air or while underwater. You can have only one such breeze active at any one time.

You can also use your aerokinesis to make it harder to detect you or others by scent. You can designate a number of creatures or objects equal to your Constitution bonus. These creatures and objects always count as being downwind for the purpose of determining the distance at which they can be detected by scent. This effect lasts for 1 hour or until you use basic aerokinesis again, whichever comes first.

entries.name: Basic Chaokinesis
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can create a shadow that protects a target from bright light. You can also change gravity to increase a creature閳ユ獨 carrying capacity by half or grant a creature a +4 bonus on Acrobatics checks to jump.

  Each benefit lasts 1 hour or until you use basic chaokinesis again.

entries.name: Basic Geokinesis
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can move up to 5 pounds per kineticist level of rocks, loose earth, sand, clay, and other similar materials up to 15 feet as a move action. You can search earthen and stone areas from a distance as if using the @Compendium[pf1.spells.zms7u0g03ogxrvi3]{搜寻术} cantrip.

entries.name: Basic Hydrokinesis
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can create water as the cantrip @Compendium[pf1.spells.snj78r5rw96btfjn]{造水术}, purify water as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.xi1uouy7qlpfaqlr]{净化食粮}, and dry wet creatures and objects as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.a6isom7wx0nmhwfp]{魔法伎俩}. While you cannot lift water into the air using this ability, you can create mild currents in a body of water by concentrating. These currents are strong enough to run a water mill as if the mill were being turned manually by a creature with a Strength score equal to your Constitution score.

entries.name: Basic Magic (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon learns to cast a basic spell as a spell-like ability. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eu2xv8klucttzqmd]{酸液飞溅},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zymaptg3vmnvfvxl]{舞光术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hk3xhc08blqzniv0]{晕眩术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{侦测魔法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eg67vvykmv9c6j7h]{闪光术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ip9onjfp6nf1vlv9]{光亮术},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8lm7khq3ynyif21]{法师之手},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n879x6fw79jiofew]{冰冻射线},
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fipqx43u5blpjsvo]{稳定伤势}, or
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t1w2zq5fx7mislq8]{疲乏之触}.

  This spell can be cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 4th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice. The save DC for this spell is 10 + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 10 to take this evolution. This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell.

entries.name: Basic Phytokinesis
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can prune and otherwise tend plants within 30 feet without using gardening tools. You can search wooded areas and other plant-heavy areas from a distance as if using the sift cantrip. By concentrating, you can detect plants within 120 feet as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.65i0wc0e6fq0evk5]{侦测动植物}.

entries.name: Basic Psychic Magic (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype, Charisma 10.

  Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zymaptg3vmnvfvxl]{舞光术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{侦测魔法}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z3ysa1xxmzgj14sd]{Grave Words}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.yssjgukwe3dgjhf3]{指北术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.99xovzg8h1nh9o9a]{催眠曲}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8lm7khq3ynyif21]{法师之手}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug7ycubjoxgp7ppc]{开关术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6k11j4pvmkka4e9]{Telekinetic Projectile}

  The eidolon can cast that spell as a psychic spell at will. The spell requires thought and emotion components as normal for psychic magic (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 144).

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 caster level is equal to the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice 閳?2 (minimum CL 1st). The save DC equals 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 HD + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier. This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time.

entries.name: Basic Pyrokinesis
entries.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You can use your inner flame to reproduce the effects of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.eg67vvykmv9c6j7h]{闪光术}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.ip9onjfp6nf1vlv9]{光亮术}, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.eg2gwmkpoaqljkzu]{火花术} cantrip, except that the light you create with light produces heat like a normal flame; using any of the three abilities ends any previous light effect from this wild talent.

entries.name: Basic Telekinesis
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  This ability is similar to mage hand, except you can move an object that weighs up to 5 pounds per 2 kineticist levels you possess (minimum 5 pounds), and you can move magical objects. Additionally, you can create a container of entwined strands of aether in order to hold liquids or piles of small objects of the same weight. You can dip the container to pick up or drop a liquid as a move action. If you possess the extended range wild talent, you can increase the range of basic telekinesis to medium range and increase the rate of movement to 30 feet per round, and if you possess the extreme range wild talent, you can increase the range of basic telekinesis to long range and increase the rate of movement to 60 feet per round. You can also use your basic telekinesis to duplicate the effects of the @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug7ycubjoxgp7ppc]{开关术} cantrip.

entries.name: 骑将阵地
entries.description: 15级时，骑将用无双的残暴来守护他的家乡。以一个迅捷动作，骑将可以宣告一个敌人是他守护定居地的敌人。这会给与骑将和他的盟友，在对抗该名敌人时，于攻击骰、伤害骰以及能力和技能检定，还有在对抗源自该名敌人的效果，于豁免检定上获得+4加值。骑将能以一个迅捷动作结束此能力。他每天可以使用此能力的轮数，等于他骑将等级的一半。时间并不需要连续，但必须以1轮为增量。

entries.name: Bat Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the bat imparts mastery over darkness and the night. Though not as powerful in battle as some other aspects, those who take this aspect become adept at skirmishing and spying.

Minor Form: You gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision with this range or greater, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

  At 8th level, you gain darkvision with a range of 90 feet instead. If you already have darkvision with this range or greater, your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

  At 15th level, you gain the 8th-level benefit and gain blindsense with a range of 15 feet or, if you already have blindsense with a range of 15 feet or more, you increase its range by 10 feet.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a dire bat (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 30). While in this form, you gain a base speed of 30 feet, a fly speed of 40 feet (clumsy), blindsense with a range of 10 feet, and a bite attack (1d8 damage).

  At 8th level, the fly speed increases to 60 feet (good), the range of your blindsense increases to 20 feet, and you gain the Flyby Attack feat (Bestiary 315).

  At 15th level, your fly speed increases to 80 feet (good) and you gain the Hover feat (Bestiary 315).

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), wing (B)

entries.name: 战斗最终启示
entries.description: 当达到20级时，你成为了战斗的化身。你能以一个整轮动作进行一次全力攻击，并移动相当于你速度的距离（你可以在攻击之前或之后移动）。当你造成重击时，你可以忽略目标可能拥有的伤害减免。你在AC上获得+4洞察加值以对抗对你造成的重击。当你的生命值低于0时，你不会死亡，除非你的负生命值达到你体质值的两倍。

entries.name: 战斗大师
entries.description: 每轮可以额外进行１次藉机攻击。这个能力给予的藉机攻击可以与战斗反射专长给予的次数叠加。８级时，萨满任选一种武器获得该武器专精专长作为奖励专长。１６级时，萨满获得８级时所选武器的高等武器专攻专长作为奖励专长。萨满无需满足此２专长的前置条件。

entries.name: 战斗秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了战斗秘示域的先知将以下技能加入他的本职技能列表：威吓，知识（工程），察觉，骑术。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{正气如虹} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8xjcrqg79ugxu5qu]{群体牛之力量} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{地震术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴} (18th).

entries.name: 战斗狂暴
entries.description: 你可以用标准动作接触一个生物使其1轮时间内，在近战攻击伤害上获得等于你牧师等级一半的加值（至少+1）。你每日可以使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 震耳战呼
entries.description: 每当角色成功的使用威吓凝视（Intimidating Glare）狂暴之力挫败了一个对手的士气，他就会同时对目标造成1d6点音波伤害。角色必须达到6级，并拥有威吓凝视狂暴之力才能选择本狂暴之力。

entries.name: 战斗魂域
entries.description:
战斗魂域的萨满所承受的每道创伤都会形成伤疤，这些战斗的残渣会布满她的全身。每次当她使用魂域能力时，她都会变得更高更壮，狂怒之貌在她脸上浮现。

  魂术：人类变巨术（１环）、云雾术（２环）、魔化防具（３环）、火墙术（４环）、正气如虹（５环）、群体蛮牛之力（６环）、操控天气（７环）、地震术（８环）、复仇风暴（９环）

  魂兽：该萨满的魂兽看起来是凶暴种，有着鼓动的肌肉和结实的骨架。魂兽的ＡＣ获得＋２天生ＡＣ加值。若魂兽已有天生ＡＣ加值，则改为原天生ＡＣ加值＋２。

entries.name: Battle Spirit
entries.description:
A shaman surrounds herself with the spirit of battle. Allies within 30 feet of the shaman (including the shaman) receive a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and weapon damage rolls.

  At 8th level and 16th level, these bonuses increase by 1.

  The shaman can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

entries.name: 战斗魂域显圣
entries.description: ２０级时，萨满成为战斗的精魂。以一个全回合动作，萨满可以在进行全回合攻击中移动最多本身速度的距离（可在攻击前后任意移动）。当萨满确认重击后，该次重击忽视一切伤害减免。同时萨满在被确认重击的ＡＣ中得到＋４洞察加值。当萨满生命值被降低到０以下时，她不会在总负生命值超过２倍体质值前死去。

entries.name: 战斗结界
entries.description: 萨满接触一名自愿生物（包括自己）来赐予战斗结界。目标下一次被攻击时，结界被触发给予目标ＡＣ＋３偏斜加值。触发之后每次目标被攻击，结界给予的ＡＣ偏斜加值都会降低１点（第二次被攻击＋２偏斜，第三次＋１偏斜）。结界在给予ＡＣ降为０或２４小时后消失。８级时，结界给予的加值增为＋４。１６级时，该加值增为＋５。接受该结界的单位２４小时内无法再次受益于该能力。

entries.name: 战嚎
entries.description: 花费一个标准动作，你能够释放一个充满激励的战嚎。100尺内所有听到战嚎的盟友在攻击检定，技能检定和豁免检定上获得+1士气加值，持续轮数等同于你的魅力加值。10级此加值变成+2。每天你可以使用此能力1次，并在5级以及之后每5级增加1次使用次数。

entries.name: 战地明晰
entries.description: 每天1次，无论何时当你在豁免检定失败后导致目盲，耳聋，战栗，惊惧，麻痹，恐慌或是震慑状态时，你都可以再投一次豁免，并获得+4加值。你必须接受第二次的结果，即使它更糟。在第7级和第15级，你可以增加1次每天使用数量。

entries.name: Bear Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the bear invokes a juggernaut of tireless endurance and furious power. Those who take this aspect are known for surviving severe wounds and delivering punishing blows in return.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your Constitution score.

  At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level it increases to +6.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a dire bear (Bestiary 31). While in this form, you gain a base speed of 40 feet, low-light vision, scent (30 feet), a bite attack (1d8 damage), and two claw attacks (1d6 damage) with the grab ability.

  At 8th level, you gain Improved Natural Attack (Bestiary 315) with your claws.

  At 15th level, the critical multiplier of your claw attack increases by 1 (鑴? becomes 鑴?) to a maximum of 鑴?, and you gain the Awesome Blow feat (Bestiary 314).

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

entries.name: 兽眸
entries.description: .  女巫可以让她的感觉投射到范围100尺内的一只动物中，感觉其所感知的一切。她无法控制动物的行动。她能以标准动作将自己的感官从此动物转移到100尺内的另一只动物，并可以藉此让感官持续飞跃，看到实际上距离很远的地方。女巫能以自由动作让感官回到自己的身体里。正常动物无法对这种能力进行豁免，但是动物伙伴、圣骑士坐骑以及类似的不寻常动物可以用意志豁免进行抵抗；女巫可以使用这种能力在她自己的魔宠身上，如同它是一只动物。如果女巫拥有【战团】巫术，所有在她10尺内也拥有【战团】巫术的其她女巫也可以通过这只动物的感官去看；不过施术的女巫依旧享有主控权。女巫每日可以使用此能力的分钟等同于她的女巫等级，这些时间不需连续，但必须以1分钟为单位。

entries.name: Beast Friend
entries.description:
The vigilante can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物} once per day as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to his level.

  The vigilante must have the songbird talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 凶兽
entries.description: .  女巫在魔宠身上灌输了可以让下一个看到它的敌人受到诅咒的小魔法。敌人必须通过意志豁免以避免受到‘绝望术’影响（施法者等级为女巫等级）。女巫可以使用这个巫术在她的魔宠上，影响范围60尺。受影响的敌人，必须在魔宠60尺内才会触发效果；更远的距离看到魔宠并没有影响（如果敌人和魔宠距离相互靠近到60尺内，则巫术生效）。绝望术先影响最接近魔宠的生物（距离相同则为先攻值较高者）。无论豁免成功与否，该生物在1天内都不会再次成为‘绝望术’的目标（之后使用此巫术时，忽略该生物来决定谁受影响）。

entries.name: 兽之身
entries.description: 在4级时，每天一次以一个标准动作，你可以将自己的灵魂从身体中抽出，转而用它侵占并控制一个距离你不超过30尺内，拥有动物生物类型的目标，持续最长等同于你的审判者等级轮数的时间。当你以此方式控制一个动物时，你原本的身体不具有感知力且处于无助状态，但你可以使用动物的身体随意移动任意距离，只要和你原本的身体处于同一位面即可。你可以以一个自由动作离开回到原本的身体。如果你原本的身体或占据的动物受到任何伤害，又或是你尝试操控该动物进行攻击和执行违背它本能的行为，这个效果会立刻结束并且你返回原本的身体。

entries.name: Beast Speech
entries.description:
The vigilante can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈} once per day as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to his character level.

  The vigilante must have the songbird talent to select this talent.

entries.name: Beast Tongue
entries.description: You can communicate with a single type of animal (birds, cats, snakes, fish, and so on) as if you were constantly using @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈}. Although this ability grants you the ability to converse with such creatures, it grants you no special influence over them.

entries.name: 中级野兽图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时野蛮人AC获得+1天生护甲加值。这个加值每4个野蛮人等级+1。野蛮人必须习得【次级野兽图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 高级野兽图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时野蛮人获得“猛扑”特殊能力，让他在冲锋之后能发动全力攻击。此外，他的爪抓伤害增加到1d8（小型生物为1d6），重击倍率增为×3。野蛮人必须习得【中级野兽图腾】且至少10级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 次级野兽图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时野蛮人获得2爪抓攻击。这些攻击是主要攻击，并使用野蛮人的完整的BAB。爪抓造成1d6点挥砍伤害（小型生物为1d4）再加上野蛮人的力量修正。

entries.name: Beast's Gift
entries.description: The witch can use her magic to grant her allies ferocious animal abilities. The witch can partially transform a willing ally, granting him natural attacks for a number of minutes equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. Choose one: the creature gains one bite attack that deals 1d8 points of damage and one secondary attack of the witch閳ユ獨 choice that deals 1d6 points of damage, or the creature gains two claw attacks that deal 1d4 points of damage each. These attacks follow the standard rules for natural attacks.

entries.name: Beastskin
entries.description: At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can cause your skin to grow thicker and more bestial. Your damage reduction from your bloodrager levels increases by 2, but it can be bypassed with silver weapons. Your natural attacks (including unarmed strikes) are then treated as silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

entries.name: Beautiful Strike
entries.description: At 15th level, once per day when the order of the songbird samurai confirms a critical hit against the target of her challenge, she can declare it a beautiful strike without spending an action. The damage dealt by the attack becomes nonlethal damage, and the target must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half the samurai閳ユ獨 class level + her Charisma modifier) or be charmed as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (caster level equals the samurai閳ユ獨 class level).

entries.name: 极寒召来
entries.description: 萨满可以使３０尺内一个生物容易被极寒之力影响，持续１分钟。当目标在时效内受到寒冷伤害时，它会被纠缠１轮。若目标在因极寒召来能力被纠缠时受到寒冷伤害，该纠缠时限会增加１轮。受到该能力影响后，目标２４小时内无法再次成为该巫术目标。

entries.name: 残虐灵光
entries.description: 8级开始，你可以展开一个半径30尺的灵光让你的敌人感到被魅影袭击。在这灵光中的敌人必须以半速移动，而且不能进行藉机攻击且被视为夹击。这是影响心灵的效果。你每天可以使用这个能力的轮数等同于你的法师等级。这些回合并不需要连续。

entries.name: 迷惑打击*
entries.description: 当盗贼对一个目标造成偷袭伤害时，目标在接下来的1d4轮里对盗贼的所有攻击承受-2的减值。

entries.name: Beginner's Luck
entries.description: The vigilante appears so harmless and innocent that onlookers dismiss his incredible abilities as nothing more than beginner閳ユ獨 luck. When the vigilante uses a vigilante talent while in his social identity, he can add the +20 circumstance bonus from seamless guise to his Disguise check to fool onlookers, so long as the number of onlookers witnessing him is no greater than his vigilante level. The vigilante閳ユ獨 PC allies do not count as onlookers (and at the GM閳ユ獨 discretion, a closely allied NPC might not count as an onlooker, either). He loses this bonus against onlookers who have already witnessed him using a vigilante talent in his social identity within the last week.

entries.name: 欺愚之触
entries.description: 你可以用触碰去魅惑一个生物。HD超过你法师等级的生物不受这个效果影响，在战斗中对你有敌意的生物也是。受影响的生物可以用一个意志检定避免这个效果。豁免难度等于“10+1/2法师等级+智力修正”。失败的生物视同受到“魅惑怪物”，持续轮数为法师等级一半（至少1轮）。这是影响心灵的效果。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: 欺愚之声
entries.description: 1级开始，你可以用声音催眠一个生物，使其失去动作。该能力类似@Compendium[pf1.spells.hk3xhc08blqzniv0]{晕眩术}，不过它基于言语，持续1轮，且可以影响HD不超过你的术士等级的生物。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Bellflower Innuendo
entries.description: A vigilante with this talent has learned to pass secret messages more efficiently by observing the coded messages of the Bellflower Network or another secret organization. He can pass a secret message with Bluff in the same amount of time it would normally take to convey the message without encryption. The words and meaning of his secret messages cannot be gleaned from him or those he directly delivered the message to by divinations unless the caster succeeds at a caster level check (DC = 15 + the vigilante閳ユ獨 level).

entries.name: 扭曲纹理
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以将一个木造对像扭曲变形，效果类似“塑木术”或“曲木术”。11级时你可以让木造物远离你，效果如同“驱离木材”。每日你可以使用此能力1次，7级和14级，你得到1次额外的使用次数。

entries.name: 智慧馈赠
entries.description: 萨满依靠感知而非智力来学习和记忆知识。她可以用感知调整值代替智力调整值来进行所有基于智力的技能检定。

entries.name: 兽性攀爬
entries.description: 在狂暴时，野蛮人得到相当于他陆地移动速度的攀爬速度。要选择此狂暴之力，野蛮人必须达到6级，且必须先学习过【狂暴攀手】。

entries.name: Bestial Flyer
entries.description:
While raging, the barbarian閳ユ獨 fly speed increases by 10 feet and her maneuverability improves by one category.

  A barbarian must have a fly speed before raging, have the raging flyer power, and be at least 6th level to choose this rage power.

entries.name: 兽性飞跃者
entries.description: 狂暴时，当野蛮人移动时，他可以在该次移动的任何一点进行他的标准动作，并且继续移动。要选择此狂暴之力，野蛮人必须达到6级。

entries.name: 兽性泳者
entries.description: 狂暴时野蛮人得到相当于他陆地移动速度的游泳速度。要选择此狂暴之力，野蛮人必须先达到6级，且必须先学习过【狂暴泳者】。

entries.name: 志在必得
entries.description: 到了8级，可令20尺内所有盟友获得你“牧师等级+感知修正”点数临时生命，持续1分钟。每天1次，每比8级高4级多1次。此能力替换力量领域的神力能力。

entries.name: 拉人垫背
entries.description: 15级起，骑士能够在1次攻击袭来时，以直觉动作（immediate action）来让1名相邻的盟友插入到这次攻击中，从而使骑士在对抗攻击时获得掩蔽（cover）。该攻击必须仅以骑士为目标，而且她必须在得知攻击检定的结果前选择使用该能力。该盟友必须处于战栗（shaken）状态或者其生命骰不超过骑士生命骰的一半，他还会获得1次反射豁免来使得该能力的效果完全失效（DC = 10 + 骑士等级的一半 + 骑士的力量调整值与魅力调整值中的较高者）。若攻击命中，伤害会在骑士和盟友之间均分。若该盟友的豁免丢出了自然1点，那么他会承受全部伤害，包括任何相关的效果（出血、毒素等等）。盟友可以故意使此次豁免检定失败，但是无法刻意投出自然1点。

entries.name: Binding Circles
entries.description:
At 12th level, whenever the occultist creates a magic circle he can expend 1 additional point of mental focus to make it a binding circle. A binding circle is invisible and counts as a trap. If a living creature of the corresponding alignment steps inside it, the trap triggers and binds the creature inside the circle. While it can move freely within the circle, it can閳ユ獩 leave the circle, make attacks against targets outside the circle, cast spells that cross the circle閳ユ獨 boundary (the circle blocks line of effect from the inside), or use any ability that would allow it to leave the circle or disturb the circle in any way. When the circle traps a creature in this way, the creature can attempt a Reflex save to dive out of the circle before the magic takes hold (DC = 10 + 1/2 the occultist閳ユ獨 level + the occultist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier).

  A creature that can see the circle gains a +4 bonus on this save. If it fails its save, the creature must remain in the circle, although it can attempt a Will save at the same DC at the end of each hour of imprisonment to escape. A binding circle can be spotted with a successful Perception check (DC = 25 + 1/2 the occultist閳ユ獨 level). It can also be disarmed using Disable Device, with the same DC. Anything crossing the boundary of the circle from the outside, such as a weapon, spell effect, or special ability, immediately breaks the circle and frees the creature trapped inside.

entries.name: 纠缠黑暗
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你以远程接触攻击对任意30尺内的对手施放一道阴影波动。这道阴影纠缠你的敌人1轮，加上你每5个法师等级1轮。在光亮区域中此阴影持续时间减半（最少1轮）。一个被你纠缠的生物若没有黑暗视觉或类似能力则会受到只影响他们的隐蔽。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: Binding Pattern
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to create a binding pattern of psychic energy that causes a living creature to become paralyzed. The target must be within 30 feet of you, and it can attempt a Will saving throw to negate the effect. If it fails the save, it is paralyzed for 1 round for every 2 occultist levels you possess.

  At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt another Will save to end the paralyzed effect and instead be staggered for the remaining duration. This is a mind-affecting compulsion effect.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: 承受
entries.description: 以标准动作, 你触摸一个盟友并将一个影响它的状态转移到自己身上。此效果持续的轮数等于你的牧师等级，但是你可以用一个自由动作结束它。在效果结束时，状态将回到原本的生物上，除非它已经结束或者被其他效果移除。在转移期间，该生物对被转移的状态免疫。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。此能力取代团队领域的镇定接触能力。

entries.name: Biokinetic Healing
entries.description: When the psychic casts a linked spell from the transmutation school, she can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to regain 2 hit points per level of the linked spell.

entries.name: Bionetwork
entries.description:
At 5th level, your mental influence over nature increases. Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes to mentally connect with living fungi, leaves, moss, roots, and similar plants or plantlike things. You form a temporary network that functions as an extension of your senses. The network allows you to use one of the following two effects: you can remotely view any familiar or obvious location within a range of 250 feet per psychic level, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术}; or you can attempt to locate a creature within the area, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知}. You don閳ユ獩 need a focus to use this effect, and you can閳ユ獩 cast spells through the sensor.

  This ability doesn閳ユ獩 function in areas of sparse vegetation, such as arid deserts, barren caverns, or frozen tundras. Buildings and urban areas are generally excluded from your network, but ruins reclaimed by nature are connected. While you閳ユ獧e underground, roots and fungi function as your network, but the radius of the network is only 100 feet per psychic level.

  At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you gain an additional daily use of this ability.

entries.name: 小幸运
entries.description: 你可以用一个标准动作碰触一个自愿的生物，使其沾到点运气。在接下来一轮中，目标任何时候投掷一个D20，都可以投两次并选择其中较好的结果。每日你可以使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: Bite (1 pt)
entries.description: An eidolon's maw is full of razor-sharp teeth, giving it a bite attack. This attack is a primary attack. The bite deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). If the eidolon already has a bite attack, this evolution allows it to deal 1-1/2 times its Strength modifier on damage rolls made with its bite.

entries.name: Bite (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 maw is full of razor-sharp teeth, giving it a bite attack. This attack is a primary attack. The bite deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). If the eidolon already has a bite attack, this evolution allows it to deal 1-1/2 times its Strength modifier on damage rolls made with its bite.

entries.name: Biting Frost
entries.description:
The shaman turns the air frigid around a target within 30 feet for a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier (minimum 1). The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw at the beginning of each turn or be damaged by exposure to the extreme cold. On a failed save, the target takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. On a successful save, the effect ends immediately.

  Whether or not the initial save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Bitter Pill
entries.description: The alchemist becomes bitter in flavor. Any creature that hits the bitter alchemist with a bite attack gains the sickened condition for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + the alchemist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier). Any creature that swallows the alchemist whole gains the nauseated condition for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save (same DC as above). If the alchemist is trapped in the creature閳ユ獨 gullet and it becomes nauseated, the creature vomits him back out immediately as a free action at the start of the creature閳ユ獨 turn; the alchemist lands prone adjacent to the creature.

entries.name: Black Blood
entries.description: At 1st level, your blood runs black with the blood of Orv. You are immune to the effects (both beneficial and destructive) of black blood. You have this benefit constantly, even while not bloodraging. When you take damage from a slashing or piercing attack while bloodraging, as an immediate action you can grant your melee attacks the frost weapon special ability for 2 rounds. You can use this ability three times per day.

entries.name: Black Blood Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
Contact with the black blood of Orv閳ユ攤y you or one of your ancestors閳ユ敄ransformed your bloodline. This necromantic taint in your blood mutates you into something peculiar.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.to1cdmyh5rtfyg2s]{寒冷之触} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wifi44l62ymqdvt8]{Unshakable Chill} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q35l6m4pggb4y98v]{元素光环} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (16th)

entries.name: Black Blood Immunity
entries.description: At 20th level, you gain immunity to cold, nonlethal damage, critical hits, and sneak attacks. You have this benefit constantly, even when not bloodraging.

entries.name: Black Blood Resistances
entries.description:
At 8th level, you gain resistance 5 to cold and a +2 bonus on saving throws against ability drain, death effects, disease, energy drain, paralysis, and poison.

  At 16th level, this resistance increases to 10 and the saving throw bonus increases to +4.

entries.name: Black Blood Transfusion
entries.description: At 16th level, when you confirm a critical hit, some of your black blood seeps into the target閳ユ獨 wounds. The next time the target would be healed by positive energy, the healing burns away the black blood and ends this effect, providing no other benefit. This ability is not effective against creatures that have no blood. The black blood transfusion persists until it negates one positive energy healing effect, but it can be removed sooner with a successful DC 25 Heal check.

entries.name: Black Market Connections
entries.description:
A rogue with this talent gains better access to magic items from black market connections. She treats every settlement as one size greater for the purpose of determining the gp limit of the base value of items for sale, as well as the number of minor, medium, and major magic items for sale in the settlement. If the settlement is already a metropolis, all minor and medium magic items are for sale, as well as 3d8 major magic items. With a successful Diplomacy check, the rogue can treat the settlement as two sizes larger. If the settlement is already a metropolis and she succeeds at the check, all magic items are for sale. If the settlement is already a large city and she succeeds at the check, all minor and medium magic items are for sale, as well as 3d8 major magic items. With a successful check, the rogue can also sell stolen items on the black market. If the check fails by 5 or more, the rogue does something to spook the market, and treats the city as normal for 1 week. Furthermore, those in control of the black market may alert the authorities to the rogue閳ユ獨 presence in an act of reprisal for spooking the market or to divert attention away from their illicit activities. The DCs of the checks are by settlement size and are given in the table below.

Community Size DC
Thorp 10
Hamlet 12
Village 15
Small town 18
Large town 20
Small city 25
Large city 30
Metropolis 35

entries.name: 裁决：枪火
entries.description: 神授力量: 你获得异种武器擅长（火器）和枪匠作为奖励专长。每当你使用火器攻击命中一个奥术施法者或是可以使用类法术能力的生物时，这个生物就必须通过一个强韧检定。如果该生物的强韧豁免检定失败，他就会在一轮内在专注检定上承受-4减值。

entries.name: 焦黑之臂
entries.description: 你的手掌与前臂干瘪发黑，就如同你曾经把手臂插入熊熊火焰中一样。你那薄如纸张的皮肤对碰触极为敏感。你在武器攻击检定中受到-4减值，不过你能够将燃烧之手（burning hands）加入到你的已知法术列表中。5级起，将灼热射线（scorching ray）以及炽焰法球（flaming sphere）加入到你的已知法术列表中。10级起，将火墙术（wall of fire）加入到你的已知法术列表中。并且你的武器攻击检定所受的减值降低至-2。15级起，将延迟爆裂火球（delayed blast fireball）加入到你的已知法术列表中。

entries.name: Blackstar Bomb
entries.description: This bomb crushes the target like a void bomb, then repels nearby creatures with a burst of gravity. The target takes damage as if hit by a void bomb. All other creatures within 5 feet of the target are subject to a bull rush. The alchemist uses his alchemist class level in place of his Combat Maneuver Bonus, and adds his Intelligence modifier in place of his Strength or Dexterity modifier to resolve the bull rush attempts. Creatures moved by a blackstar bomb are pushed directly away from the target閳ユ獨 square. An alchemist must have the void bomb discovery to create blackstar bombs.

entries.name: Blade Rush Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; 等级 2; Burn 2
Prerequisite kinetic blade
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You use your element閳ユ獨 power to instantly move 30 feet in any direction (even straight up), manifest a kinetic blade, and attack once. You gain a +2 bonus on the attack roll and take a 閳? penalty to your AC until the start of your next turn. The movement doesn閳ユ獩 provoke attacks of opportunity, though activating blade rush does.

  If you have the kinetic whip infusion, you can manifest a kinetic whip instead of a kinetic blade at the end of your movement by increasing the burn cost of this infusion by 1.

  The blade or whip vanishes instantly after the rush.

entries.name: Blade Whirlwind Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Prerequisite kinetic blade
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You create a kinetic blade and swing it in an arc around you, making a single attack against all foes within reach as if with kinetic blade. If the result is a critical threat, roll to confirm the critical hit against only the first target you hit. The blade vanishes instantly after the whirlwind.

entries.name: 爆发符文
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以在任何邻近的方格中创造一个爆发符文。任何进入此方格的生物会受到“1d6+1/2牧师等级”的伤害。此符纹造成强酸、寒冷、电击或火焰伤害之一，须在你创造符文时决定。符文是隐形的，持续等同于你的牧师等级的轮数后失效。你无法在一个其他生物占据着的方格中创造爆发符文。符纹在被尝试解除时视同1级的法术效果，可以通过DC26的察觉技能检定发现符纹，并通过DC26的解除装置技能检定来解除。你每日可使用此能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 荣耀之炎/王出征
entries.description: 15级时，他可以以一个标准动作发动一个荣耀之炎（Blaze of Glory）。等同于他魅力调整值的轮数，骑将可以增加10尺基本速度，冲锋时可以忽略困难地形，并且攻击检定获得+4加值（取代+2）。骑将每次战斗只能使用一次这个能力。

entries.name: Blazing Vitality
entries.description: When tensions run high and your emotions flare, you let forth waves of restorative energy from within. At 8th level, you emit a 10-foot-radius aura of energizing fire while bloodraging. Any ally that ends their turn within this aura gains a number of temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. These temporary hit points last for 1 minute.

entries.name: Bleaching Discipline
entries.description:
You draw power from a void in your emotions, a yawning and empty chasm where your hopes and dreams and fears should be. It is very rare for any creature besides a gnome to have this psychic discipline閳ユ敆sually a bleachling or a gnome with a particularly strong fear of the Bleaching閳ユ攤ut in occasional cases members of other races have been known to develop such a strong nihilistic ennui or depression that they can tap into the vitality-draining effects of this discipline as well.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7u45op4znvtkvgv3]{Decrepit Disguise} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5j7llv2nys5makeq]{Steal Voice} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ds011sdiv3d8c86w]{Cup Of Dust} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bc3nc0ri47egssht]{弱能术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c7j4fxzlxyvll2t4]{Pessimism} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{解离术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jg3p4t3dv1a7nqvo]{Spell Immunity, Greater} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术} (18th).

entries.name: Bleed (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon gains the ability to inflict bleeding wounds. Select one type of attack. Attacks of that type deal 1d6 points of bleed damage.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different attack. The bleed effect doesn閳ユ獩 stack.

entries.name: 流血攻击
entries.description: 拥有此能力的盗贼可以通过偷袭让活体目标流血。流血攻击令目标受到每偷袭伤害骰1点伤害（例如4d6的偷袭伤害造成4点流血伤害)。流血的生物在每轮行动开始时都会受到流血伤害。流血可被DC15的医疗检定，或其他任何恢复生命值的效果终止。此能力造成的流血伤害不与其自身叠加。流血伤害无视该生物的伤害减免。

entries.name: Bleeding Attack (UC)
entries.description:
A rogue with this ability can cause living opponents to bleed by hitting them with a sneak attack. This attack causes the target to take 1 additional point of damage each round for each die of the rogue閳ユ獨 sneak attack (e.g., 4d6 equals 4 points of bleed). Bleeding creatures take that amount of damage every round at the start of each of their turns.

  The bleeding can be stopped by a successful DC 15 Heal check or the application of any effect that heals hit point damage. Bleed damage from this ability does not stack with itself. Bleed damage bypasses any damage reduction the creature might possess.

entries.name: 流血猛击
entries.description: 当野蛮人使用【猛力一击】狂暴之力时，他同时造成相当于额外伤害的出血伤害，此出血伤害可以无视DR。野蛮人必须达到8级且拥有【猛力一击】。

entries.name: Bleeding Blow (UC)
entries.description:
While in the powerful stance, the barbarian can make an attack that causes her enemies to bleed profusely. Once per round, she can have one of her attacks deal an amount of bleed damage equal to 1/2 her bonus damage from powerful stance. This bleed damage bypasses damage reduction. This bleed damage doesn閳ユ獩 stack with itself.

  A barbarian must have the powerful stance rage power and be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 流血接触
entries.description: 你通过一次近战接触攻击令活物每轮受到1d6伤害，持续时间是牧师等级一半（最少1轮），或直到接受了DC15的医疗或法术治疗。你每天可以使用此能力次数“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 流血伤害
entries.description: 当你的某个造成负能量伤害的法术或能力（例如“造成轻度伤”或“引导负能量”）对敌人造成伤害时，他会开始出血，每轮受到1点伤害。5级以及之后的每5级，该伤害再加1。这种出血状态可以通过DC15的医疗检定和治疗伤害的效果终止。

entries.name: 肃正
entries.description: 在4级时，当你进行一次交涉，威吓或表演（演说）技能检定时，你可以双骰取高。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值。

entries.name: 奉理暗查
entries.description: 在4级时，每当你进行唬骗，交涉或潜行检定时，你可以双骰取高。你每天可以使用本能力的次数相当于你的感知调整值。

entries.name: Blessed Secrecy
entries.description: At 4th level, when you attempt a Bluff, Disguise, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth skill check, you can roll twice and take the more favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom bonus.

entries.name: Blessed Surgery
entries.description:
Your divine patron guides your healing hands, allowing you to perform minor miracles with mundane cures. You can use this ability as a free action when using the Heal skill in order to roll the check twice and take the higher result. When you閳ユ獧e using this ability, any use of the Heal skill requiring 1 hour instead takes at most 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Rebuke Death power of the Healing Domain.

entries.name: 祝福
entries.description:
战斗祭司所信仰的神祇为他指明了他所走的道路，他的魔法力量，他挥舞武器的意义，以及周遭人等对他的看法。每一个战斗祭司都可以选择他的神祇所赋予的两个祝福（神祇所赐予的祝福和他们的领域相联接）。只有信仰特定拥有特定阵营领域神祇（善良，邪恶，混乱，守序），并且本人的阵营与之相符的战斗祭司才可以选择阵营祝福。如果一个战斗祭司不信仰特定的神祇，他也可以随意选择两个代表他信念所向或是崇拜概念的领域，具体由GM裁定，但他仍然受限于选择阵营领域。

  每个战斗祭司的祝福都会在1级时赋予他一项次级祝福，并在10级赋予他一项高等祝福。战斗祭司每天可以呼唤祝福的次数等同于3+1/2战斗祭司等级（所有的祝福均使用此数目限制），最高达到20级时每日13次。他的祝福能力的豁免DC=10+1/2战斗祭司等级+战斗祭司的感知调整值。

  如果战斗祭司通过其他职业获得了牧师的领域能力，那么他选择的领域必须与他的战斗祭司祝福相符。取决于GM裁定，战斗祭司可以更换自己已有的祝福或领域。

entries.name: 祝福
entries.description:
战斗祭司所信仰的神祇为他指明了他所走的道路，他的魔法力量，他挥舞武器的意义，以及周遭人等对他的看法。每一个战斗祭司都可以选择他的神祇所赋予的两个祝福（神祇所赐予的祝福和他们的领域相联接）。只有信仰特定拥有特定阵营领域神祇（善良，邪恶，混乱，守序），并且本人的阵营与之相符的战斗祭司才可以选择阵营祝福。如果一个战斗祭司不信仰特定的神祇，他也可以随意选择两个代表他信念所向或是崇拜概念的领域，具体由GM裁定，但他仍然受限于选择阵营领域。

  每个战斗祭司的祝福都会在1级时赋予他一项次级祝福，并在10级赋予他一项高等祝福。战斗祭司每天可以呼唤祝福的次数等同于3+1/2战斗祭司等级（所有的祝福均使用此数目限制），最高达到20级时每日13次。他的祝福能力的豁免DC=10+1/2战斗祭司等级+战斗祭司的感知调整值。

  如果战斗祭司通过其他职业获得了牧师的领域能力，那么他选择的领域必须与他的战斗祭司祝福相符。取决于GM裁定，战斗祭司可以更换自己已有的祝福或领域。

entries.name: 凋零
entries.description: .  女巫能够诅咒一只动物、植物类别的生物，或一块土地，使其枯萎或死亡。诅咒一块土地消耗1轮时间，在此期间女巫和她的魔宠必须与目标保持接触。遭到凋零侵袭的土地在第二天开始枯萎，生长在土地上的全部植物会在之后的一周内死亡。只要诅咒依旧持续，这片土地就无法生长任何东西。女巫可以影响半径等同于“女巫等级×10尺半径”范围的区域。若以一名生物为目标，则需要标准动作并发动一次成功的近战接触攻击，使目标植物或动物受到以下诅咒：凋零巫术（Blight Hex）：——类型－诅咒；豁免－意志通过则无效；频率－每日1次；效果－1点体质伤害。以上两种诅咒都可以被‘移除诅咒’或类似的法术清除，移除DC等同于抵抗此效果的豁免DC。女巫在同一时间内只能保持一个凋零生效，若她再次使用此巫术，则前一次的效果即刻结束。

entries.name: Blind Spot
entries.description:
The vigilante is so skilled at stealth, he can use the Stealth skill to hide from creatures with unusual senses that normally automatically detect creatures. This includes senses such as blindsense, blindsight, lifesense, scent, or tremorsense. For each such ability that the creature possesses, if the vigilante is not bypassing the sense in another way閳ユ敃uch as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.ch6iof333ghti2tj]{消除气味} spell for scent or flying for tremorsense閳ユ敄he creature gains a stacking +20 circumstance bonus on all Perception checks to notice the vigilante, rather than automatically noticing the vigilante.

  Only a stalker vigilante of at least 6th level can select this talent.

entries.name: 致盲炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师可以让炸弹在起爆时发出非常刺眼的强光，被炸弹直接击中的生物必须通过强韧检定否则目盲1分钟。被泼及到的生物若豁免失败则会目眩1分钟的时间。此是基于强光的效果。他必须达到8级才能选择此发现。

entries.name: 瞎眼闪光
entries.description: 你以标准动作从圣徽，或者圣法器处放出一道闪光。在你20尺内生物目眩，轮数为你牧师等级一半，而且HD低于你牧师等级的生物必须通过强韧豁免否则目盲1d4轮。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换太阳领域的太阳祝福能力。

entries.name: 失明射线
entries.description: 你能通过一个标准动作释放一道闪耀射线，通过一次远程接触攻击30尺以内的任何敌人。此射线导致生物失明1轮。HD高于你法师等级的生物仅仅目眩1轮。你每天可以使用此能力次数为“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: Blinding Strike
entries.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.2Gd0V8lDe6BkG7nl]{致盲重击} as a bonus feat, even if she doesn閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. The rogue must have the obscuring blow rogue talent and be at least 15th level before choosing this talent.

entries.name: 致盲一击(调查员)
entries.description: 调查员在使用策士之击造成伤害时，目标必须通过一个DC=10+1/2调查员等级+调查员智力调整值的强韧检定，否则永久性目盲。如果目标成功通过豁免则目眩（Dazzled）1d4轮。这个能力对于不依赖眼睛视物或是多于两只眼睛的生物无效（但如果多次造成重击则可能仍然使其目盲，由GM裁定）法术医疗术（Heal），再生术（Regeneration）和移除目盲（Remove Blindness）可以解除目盲效果。调查员至少要达到17级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: Blindsense (3 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's senses become incredibly acute, giving it blindsense out to a range of 30 feet. This ability allows the eidolon to pinpoint the location of creatures that it cannot see without having to make a Perception check, but such creatures still have total concealment from the eidolon. Visibility still affects the eidolon's movement and it is still denied its Dexterity bonus to Armor Class against attacks from creatures it cannot see.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Blindsense (UC) (3 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 senses become incredibly acute, giving it blindsense with a range of 30 feet. This ability allows the eidolon to pinpoint the location of creatures that it can閳ユ獩 see without having to attempt a Perception check, but such creatures still have total concealment from the eidolon.

  Visibility still affects the eidolon閳ユ獨 movement, and it is still denied its Dexterity bonus to Armor Class against attacks from creatures it cannot see.

entries.name: Blindsight (4 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's senses sharpen even further, granting it blindsight out to a range of 30 feet. The eidolon can maneuver and attack as normal, ignoring darkness, invisibility, and most forms of concealment as long as it has line of effect to the target.

  The eidolon must possess the blindsense evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Blindsight (UC) (4 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 11th, blindsense evolution.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 senses sharpen even further, granting it blindsight with a range of 30 feet. The eidolon can maneuver and attack as normal, ignoring darkness, invisibility, and most forms of concealment as long as it has line of effect to the target.

entries.name: Blistered Caress
entries.description:
You can channel the hostile, unforgiving heat of the sun into your touch. This is a melee touch attack that deals 1d8 points of fire damage per 2 oracle levels (Fortitude half ). Against a plant creature, this touch heals or damages the creature (your choice) for 1d6 points of fire damage per oracle level.

  At 7th level, a creature that fails its save against this revelation becomes sickened for 1d4 hours in addition to taking fire damage.

  At 15th level, your touch is so intense that a creature that fails its save is also staggered for 1d6 rounds.

  You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day at 10th level.

entries.name: 暴风雪
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以制造一场暴风雪。你可以制造10尺立方每先知等级的风暴。这些立方可以组合成你希望的任何形状，但每一块都必须与另一块相连并且至少有一块与你相连。在这个风暴中的生物会受到1d4每等级的寒冷伤害。通过反射检定可使伤害减半，豁免DC为“10+1/2先知等级+魅力修正”。风暴持续的时间等于你的魅力修正。在风暴的范围内地面处于结冰状态。在风暴中5尺之外物体完全不可见，这提供了全隐蔽。5尺之内的物体处于隐蔽状态。你每天可以使用此能力1次。要选择此启示你至少要达到11级。

entries.name: 狂血咒术
entries.description: 4级起，血脉狂怒者获得了即便身处血怒之中也能够施法的能力。他能够施放这些法术进行防御，而且还能够在血怒中为这些法术进行专注检定。在处于血怒时，他仅能施放并专注于自己的血脉狂怒者法术（见后文）；在此期间无法施放来自其他职业的法术。

entries.name: Blood Debt
entries.description: A ninja with this ability gains In Harm閳ユ獨 Way as a bonus feat, even if she doesn閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. When the ninja intercepts an attack using this feat, she can spend 1 ki point to impose a blood debt on the aided ally. The ninja閳ユ獨 ki pool is reduced by 1 until she ends this effect, which she may do as an immediate action.
