entries.description: At 9th level, twice per day, you can use fire to restore the health of yourself or your allies. As a standard action, you can wreathe your hand in a halo of flame and touch yourself or another creature. The touch heals 2d8 + your character level points of damage. You can also remove one of the following conditions affecting the target: 1d6 points of ability damage, blinded, confused, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, or sickened. At 20th level, you can use this ability three times per day.

entries.name: Cleansing Flames
entries.description:
As a swift action, you can take 1d4 points of damage per oracle level to gain a new saving throw against a single ongoing effect. The effect must be one for which you already failed a saving throw. If you succeed, the effect is removed.

  At 7th and 15th levels, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

entries.name: 心如坚钢
entries.description: 野蛮人可以重骰一次失败的意志豁免。使用此狂暴之力是一个直觉动作，而且必须在GM宣布结果前启用。他必须接受重骰结果，即使更糟。野蛮人必须至少8级才能选取此狂暴之力。他每次狂暴只能使用1次此能力。

entries.name: Clear Mind (UC)
entries.description:
When the barbarian fails a Will saving throw, she can attempt another Will saving throw at the end of her next turn (using the original DC). If the second saving throw is successful, the barbarian is treated as if she succeeded at the first saving throw, negating or reducing the effect as determined by the spell or effect. If this second saving throw fails, the barbarian suffers the full effects of the spell or effect as normal.

  A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Climb (1 pt)
entries.description: An eidolon becomes a skilled climber, gaining a climb speed equal to its base speed. This evolution can be selected more than once. Each additional time it is selected, increase the eidolon's climb speed by 20 feet.

entries.name: Climb (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
The eidolon becomes a skilled climber, gaining a climb speed equal to its base speed.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each additional time it is selected, increase the eidolon閳ユ獨 climb speed by 20 feet.

entries.name: 攀爬绝技
entries.description: 具有该项天赋的盗贼能够在攀爬检定中承受-10减值，以此来在攀爬时全速移动。盗贼必须在攀爬技能上受训才能选取该项盗贼天赋。

entries.name: Cloak Image
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to hide your appearance behind an illusion, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术}. The effect lasts for 1 minute per occultist level you possess.

  At 5th level, you can instead expend 2 points of mental focus to appear as a creature of a different type, but you must remain the same size.

  At 7th level, you can expend 1 additional point of mental focus to target a willing creature other than yourself with this ability.

entries.name: 黑幕斗篷
entries.description: 你创造出一件由纯粹黑暗所构成的斗蓬，给予你+4的盔甲加值，并且在隐匿检定上得到+2加值。7级还有之后的每4级，这些加值提升2点。你每天可以使用此能力的时间为每先知等级1小时，使用的时间不须连续，但每次使用最少消耗1个小时。

entries.name: 击倒攻击
entries.description: 当你用攻击法术对敌人造成重击时，你可以立即用一个迅捷动作来对你的敌人进行绊摔。这次绊摔尝试你不会像通常情况那样受到藉机攻击。

entries.name: Clockwork Heart
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite metal blast

  You have used your power over metal to add clockwork components to your own body. So long as these clockwork components are kept wound (per the winding ability of the clockwork subtype), you gain the benefits of both the @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射} feats.

entries.name: Clockwork Puppet
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite metal blast

  You can weave metal into clockwork parts, creating clockwork constructs to attack your foes. This functions as the aether puppet wild talent, except the object animated gains the clockwork subtype and cannot have the stone Construction Point ability.

entries.name: 片刻不离
entries.description: 8级起，当骑士与他所保护的物件间的距离不超过30尺时，他就会在攻击检定、伤害检定和豁免检定中获得+1士气加值。若他保护的物件被抢夺、盗取或者以其他方式被骑士的敌人所占有或控制，那么骑士就会失去上述好处。在这种情况下，他会获得物品定位术（Locate Object）或关照术（Status）的效果（具体哪种法术取决于保护物件的性质），目标位元他所保护的物件，效果持续24小时。在靠近骑士所保护的目标时，他与坐骑的速度会增加10尺。12级以及之后每4个等级，攻击、伤害与豁免的加值会再增加1点，移动速度再增加5尺。

entries.name: 缩短距离
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：选择本奥能的魔战士可以将需要远程接触攻击的射线法术以近战接触攻击方式传递。他可利用此奥能施放目标多于一个的远程接触法术（如‘灼热射线’），但他只能用一次近战攻击传递一个远程接触效果，该法术额外的远程接触攻击则被浪费掉且没有效果。这些法术可以用于【法术打击】职业能力。

entries.name: Close the Gap
entries.description: Each round, at the start of his turn, the vigilante can designate one foe within 20 feet that isn閳ユ獩 adjacent to him. When he moves, he doesn閳ユ獩 provoke attacks of opportunity from that foe as long as he ends his move adjacent to that foe. If he charges that foe, he does not take the 閳? penalty to his AC on any attacks made by the designated foe.

entries.name: 殴斗大师
entries.description: 在5级时，拳师使用近身武器战斗时得到伤害提升。在使用近身武器攻击时，拳师可以应用他的徒手击打伤害骰而非武器的伤害骰，但视为他的拳师等级-4（比如，一个使用拳匕（Punching Dagger）攻击的拳师可以用它造成1d6点伤害而非正常的1d4点）。如果这件武器的伤害骰高于拳师的徒手击打伤害，那么它的伤害骰不变。拳师也可以自由选择以武器本身的伤害骰而非自己的徒手击打伤害，但他必须在进行攻击检定前声明。

entries.name: 心之壁
entries.description: 在8级时，你的敌人将无法知晓你不想让他们知道的东西。你获得永久性的法术回避侦测（Nondetection）的效果，如同你对自己施展了本法术一般。

entries.name: Cloud Infusion
entries.description:
Element air, water; Type form infusion; 等级 7; Burn 4
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts blizzard, sandstorm, steam, thunderstorm
Saving Throw none

  You release your power in a diffuse cloud. You can center this 20-foot-radius spread anywhere within 120 feet of you. All creatures and objects within the cloud when you create it automatically take 1/4 the normal amount of damage from your blast with no saving throw. Any time a creature enters the cloud, it takes half the normal amount of damage from your blast, as do creatures that end their turns in the cloud. Your cloud obscures vision as obscuring mist. It lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Constitution modifier or until you use the cloud infusion again.

entries.name: Cloud Mind
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to cloud the mind of one foe within 30 feet. That foe is dazed for 1 round if the number of Hit Dice it possesses is less than or equal to or your occultist level. If it has more Hit Dice than your occultist level, it is staggered for 1 round instead. The foe can attempt a Will saving throw to negate the effect.

  Whether or not it succeeds at the save, the target is then immune to this effect for 1 day. This is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: 烟云
entries.description: 以标准动作在30尺范围内创造半径5尺的云烟，内部生物对远程攻击获得隐蔽。在区域内和离开不到1轮的生物将在命中和察觉上受到-2惩罚。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换火领域的火箭能力。

entries.name: 云子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g0q8c0ni0rvipjpn]{重雾术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

entries.name: 盲目
entries.description: 先知的双眼蒙上一层雾翳，让她难以看清东西。你的视野降低为30尺，但是在此视野内视为拥有黑暗视觉；5级时，此视野增加到60尺；10级时，你获得30尺盲感；15级时，你获得15尺盲视。

entries.name: Cloying Shades
entries.description: When a rogue with this talent uses dimension door as a spell or spell-like ability, including the abundant step or shadow jump class feature, then all creatures adjacent to the rogue at the start and end of her teleportation are entangled by grasping shadows for 1 round (although the creatures are not anchored in place). A successful Reflex saving throw negates this effect. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + 1/2 the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence or Charisma modifier (whichever is higher). The rogue must have dimension door as a spell or spell-like ability (including the abundant step or shadow jump class feature) before choosing this talent.

entries.name: 繁星罩衫
entries.description: 你创造出一件闪着缈缈星光的大衣，这件大衣给予你+4的盔甲加值。7级还有之后的每4级，此加值提升2点，13级这件盔甲给予你伤害减免5/挥砍。你每天可以使用此能力的时间为每先知等级1小时，使用的时间不须连续，但每次使用最少消耗1小时。

entries.name: 虚假情报
entries.description: 一个拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以利用交涉或是唬骗技能检定取代威吓检定，将一个敌人对她的态度转化为友好。

entries.name: Coax Information (UC)
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can use Bluff or Diplomacy in place of Intimidate to force an opponent to act friendly toward her. When the duration of the attitude shift ends, that opponents閳?attitude toward the rogue returns to its previous level, rather than dropping one level.

entries.name: Cobra Breath (UC)
entries.description:
Whenever a monk with this ki power uses diamond body to neutralize a poison, he can instead release that poison as a ranged touch attack against a single foe within 30 feet. If the attack hits, the foe must succeed at a saving throw (using the poison閳ユ獨 original DC) or suffer the poison閳ユ獨 effects, even if it was not originally a contact poison.

  A monk must be at least 12th level and must possess the diamond body ki power before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 异变药剂
entries.description: 透过这种药剂炼金术师可以通过削弱一个肉体属性来强化一个心智属性。如果他强化智力，那么此药水将削弱他的力量；若他强化感知，受损的则是敏捷；要是他强化魅力，那么其体质将会下降。除此之外此能力和“突变药剂”职业特性相同。每当炼金术师调制突变药剂时，他可以选择调制异变药剂。所有对突变药剂的限制都会在异变药剂上升效，像是他一次只能饮用一瓶突变或异变药剂，一旦他喝下第二瓶，之前的药剂就会失去效果；不是炼金术师的人没有办法使用异变药剂，喝下去强韧没过会反胃等等。异变药剂的效果解除之后，炼金术师承受减值的那个属性会受到2点属性伤害。“灌注突变”科研发现和“长效突变药剂”职业特性同样作用在异变药剂上。

entries.name: Cognatogen (PSY)
entries.description:
Once per day, you can create a cognatogen, a mutagen-like mixture that heightens one mental ability score at the expense of a physical ability score. When you imbibe a cognatogen, you gain a +2 natural armor bonus and a +4 alchemical bonus to the selected ability score for 1 minute per psychic level.

  In addition, while the cognatogen is in effect, you take a 閳? penalty to one of your physical ability scores. If the cognatogen enhances your Intelligence, it applies a penalty to your Strength. If it enhances your Wisdom, it applies a penalty to your Dexterity. If it enhances your Charisma, it applies a penalty to your Constitution. Otherwise, this ability works just like the alchemist閳ユ獨 mutagen ability (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 28). When the effect of the cognatogen ends, you take 2 points of ability damage to the ability score penalized by the cognatogen.

  If you have both alchemist and psychic levels, these levels stack to determine the duration of your cognatogen and the DC of the save a non-alchemist must attempt if he drinks your cognatogen.

  If you gain discoveries, you can take the grand cognatogen and greater cognatogen discoveries to improve your cognatogen.

  The infuse mutagen discovery and the persistent mutagen class ability apply to cognatogens. However, even if you have alchemist levels, the duration of your cognatogen remains 1 minute per level (instead of 10 minutes per level) and you can still create only one per day (instead of an unlimited number) unless you also possess the cognatogen discovery.

entries.name: Cold Adaptation
entries.description:
Element fire, water; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You are constantly protected by endure elements against cold temperatures only. You gain cold resistance equal to twice your current amount of burn.

entries.name: Cold Aura
entries.description:
As a swift action, you can cause waves of cold to radiate from your body. This cold deals 1d6 points of cold damage per 2 oracle levels to all creatures within 10 feet. A successful Fortitude save halves the damage. In addition, a flurry of snow momentarily surrounds you, granting you concealment until your next turn.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter.

entries.name: 冰抗
entries.description: 在6级时，你获得寒冷抗力10，12级时增加为20。你在20级时彻底免疫寒冷。

entries.name: Cold Snap
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 1
Prerequisite cold adaptation, shroud of water

  You chill your shroud of water and send the cold around you, creating an aura of numbing cold around yourself. Until the next time your burn is removed, you can begin or end the cold aura at will as a swift action. The temperature in the area 30 feet around you lowers by 5鎺?F per kineticist level you possess, to a minimum modified temperature of 閳?0鎺?F. If this brings the temperature in the area below 40鎺?F, all creatures within 5 feet of you take a 閳? penalty to Dexterity. You are immune to these effects, as are creatures that are immune to cold or that benefit from effects that protect against temperature, such as endure elements.

entries.name: 极冰寒铁
entries.description: 1级开始，你可以以一个标准动作赋予一件武器或是50发弹药冻寒属性，持续轮数等同于术士一半（至少1轮）。9级开始，你可以赋予武器或是弹药冰暴属性，但是持续时间减半。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Cold-Blooded Curse
entries.description:
Your blood turns sluggish without sufficient heat, and you must seek warmth and shelter earlier than most. This oracle curse is common among lizardfolk and other oracles with the reptilian subtype. You take a 閳? penalty on saves against cold spells and effects, and whenever you fail such a saving throw, you are staggered for 1 round. You can survive without food four times longer than a typical creature of your species before you begin to starve.

  At 5th level, poisons affecting you have their onset time doubled and last half as long if they end after a set time (for example, a poison with a frequency of 1/round for 6 rounds would instead have a frequency of 1/round for 3 rounds). Poisons with no onset time gain an onset time of 1 round.

  At 10th level, whenever an action you have readied is triggered, you can take an additional move action at half your speed閳ユ攣long with your readied action閳ユ攨ven if you have already taken a move action that round.

  At 15th level, you can take an additional move action a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier. You can take these additional move actions only on your turn, and can take only one of these extra move actions per turn.

entries.name: Collective Memory
entries.description:
While under the effects of a cognatogen, the alchemist adds half his class level on all Knowledge skill checks and may attempt all Knowledge skill checks untrained. This bonus does not stack with the second Intelligence bonus granted by the mindchemist archetype閳ユ獨 perfect recall class feature.

  An alchemist must have the cognatogen discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 索魂
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次，你可以创造出魔鬼从地狱走出，在你的命令下将目标拖入九狱的幻象。本效果相当于一个法术幻影杀手（Phantasmal Killer）的效果，不过如果目标在强韧检定上失败，他只会瘫痪1d4+你的审判者等级轮的时间而非死亡。

entries.name: Color Beam
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to unleash a beam of cascading colors at any one target within 30 feet. Doing so requires a ranged touch attack. If the beam hits, the target is blinded for 1 round if it has a number of Hit Dice equal to or lower than your occultist level.

  A foe with a number of Hit Dice greater than your occultist level is instead dazzled for 1 round.

  The foe can attempt a Will save to negate the effect.

  Regardless of whether it succeeds at its save, the target is then immune to this effect for 1 day. This is a mind-affecting illusion effect.

entries.name: Combat Expertise (VIG)
entries.description: The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{寓守于攻} as a bonus feat, even if he doesn閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. If he already has Combat Expertise, he instead gains another feat he qualified for at the level when he chose Combat Expertise. If the vigilante閳ユ獨 Intelligence score is less than 13, it counts as 13 for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of combat feats.

entries.name: 战斗医师
entries.description: 当你使用一个“治疗（Cure）”法术时，你可以用一个迅捷动作来释放它，如同使用“法术瞬发”专长，但要花费两个法术位。这不会提升法术等级。在7级你可以每天使用此能力1次，并在之后的每5级增加1次使用次数。要选择此启示你至少要达到7级。

entries.name: 战斗医师
entries.description: 当你使用一个“治疗（Cure）”法术时，你可以用一个迅捷动作来释放它，如同使用“法术瞬发”专长，但要花费两个法术位。这不会提升法术等级。在7级你可以每天使用此能力1次，并在之后的每5级增加1次使用次数。要选择此启示你至少要达到7级。

entries.name: Combat Hypnosis
entries.description: The witch can lull her enemies into a trance, even in the chaos of combat. This hex functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术}, except it can affect only one creature at a time, and the target creature does not receive the usual +2 bonus on its saving throw while in combat. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: 战斗灵感
entries.description: 调查员在使用灵感能力优化自己的攻击投骰和豁免投骰时只需要消耗1点灵感点数。调查员至少要达到9级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 料敌机先
entries.description: 3级开始，你对未来的预知能力让你在战斗中占尽优势。你在先攻检定上获得+1洞察加值，这一加值之后每4级额外+1。

entries.name: Combat Skill
entries.description:
The vigilante gains any one combat feat as a bonus feat. He must meet the prerequisites for this feat, but he is treated as though he had a number of fighter levels equal to half his vigilante level for the purpose of qualifying for this feat.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent, but he can select this talent more than once; each time he must select a different feat.

entries.name: 战斗流派专长
entries.description:
在2级时，游侠必须在两种战斗流派中选择一种进行修习：箭术或双武器格斗。游侠在所选流派上的技巧，以奖励专长的形式在2，6，10，14和18级获得。他可以根据自己的战斗流派选择专长，即使自身没有达到该专长的先决条件。

  如果游侠选择了箭术，他在获得战斗流派专长能力时可以从如下专长中选择：@Compendium[pf1.feats.HMCAM3Zyo77kG8Yg]{远程射击}，@Compendium[pf1.feats.8rsFtye3PwM6CKli]{近距射击}，@Compendium[pf1.feats.53urYIbYYpQuoSLd]{精准射击}和@Compendium[pf1.feats.NABgOSBRECIREaha]{快速射击}。在6级时，@Compendium[pf1.feats.h1vqUG9Kh3f7oKWK]{精通精准射击}和@Compendium[pf1.feats.w23dO02t0poRrno0]{多重射击}加入列表中。10级时，@Compendium[pf1.feats.ztV5oURW9cFsLdXT]{精确瞄准}和@Compendium[pf1.feats.ymtj17MI4MdwB0v2]{移动射击}加入列表中。

  如果游侠选择了双武器格斗，他在获得战斗流派专长能力时可以从如下专长中选择：@Compendium[pf1.feats.VK8TgwfjeomMwGjd]{双重切割}，@Compendium[pf1.feats.qYv70Ch9RQfi1LQQ]{精通盾击}，@Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战}和@Compendium[pf1.feats.Ee7JHADKEK37tTHs]{双武器格斗}。在6级时，@Compendium[pf1.feats.3fNdl7eIUJ5d5fwg]{精通双武器格斗}和@Compendium[pf1.feats.YDqp3yrAsuXh103W]{双武器防御}加入列表中，10级时，@Compendium[pf1.feats.ieltigobtFrlTXIt]{高等双武器格斗}和@Compendium[pf1.feats.tGDNVHHZnNFPPgiY]{双武器撕裂}加入列表中。

  【战斗流派专长】带来的收益只有在游侠穿戴轻型，中型盔甲或不穿甲时才有效。在穿戴重甲时，游侠失去所有的战斗流派专长。战斗流派一经选择，便无法改变。

entries.name: Combat Swipe
entries.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains Improved Steal as a bonus feat.

entries.name: Combat Swipe (UC)
entries.description:
A rogue with this talent gains Improved Steal as a bonus feat.

  At 6th level, she is treated as if she met all the prerequisites for Greater Steal (although she must take the feat as normal).

entries.name: 战斗窍门
entries.description: 选择此项天赋的盗贼获得一个额外战斗专长。

entries.name: Combat Trick (UC)
entries.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains a bonus combat feat.

entries.name: 混合炼成
entries.description: 当炼金术师炼成一份化合炼成时，他可以选择让两项公式一同生效，使用这一炼成方式需要占用一个高于等级较高公式2级的炼成位。选择这一科研发现需要至少8级炼金术师等级。

entries.name: 反击态势
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人可以用一个自由动作准备展开毁灭性的反击。直到野蛮人的下一回合之前，敌人对他的攻击检定和伤害检定+4，但是敌人对他的每次攻击都会引起野蛮人的藉机攻击，藉机攻击会在敌人的攻击之前完成。野蛮人必须至少12级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 控制
entries.description: 你以标准动作对一个生物发号施令，就如同施展了“命令术”，成功的意志豁免可避免此效果。你一天内不能对一个生物反覆尝试，每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换秩序领域的秩序之触能力。

entries.name: 使役弱者
entries.description: 8级起，在判断骑士是否能够从自己的团队专长中获得奖励（bonus）时，她将所有陷入战栗（shaken）状态的盟友视为具有相同的团队专长。除非这些盟友真的具有相应的团队专长，否则他们无法因此而获益。骑士要想获得专长带来的奖励，这些盟友的站位和动作仍旧必须满足团队专长中所列出的先决条件。当骑士使用战术（Tactician）、高等战术（Greater Tactician）或战术大师（Master Tactician）能力时，若生物的生命骰不超过骑士生命骰的一半、或者在骑士启动能力时具有战栗状态的话，这些能力的持续时间加倍。

entries.name: 圣令
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以随意使用法术高等命令术（Greater Command），但仅对单独一个生物有效。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值。

entries.name: 通神之术
entries.description: 7级时，每天一次，导魂者可以类法术能力施展“通神术（Commune）”。15级时，她可每日使用此能力两次。

entries.name: 团队互助
entries.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以触摸一个盟友并赋予其团结的祝福。在1分钟内，每当这名盟友使用协助他人动作时，加值都会提升至+4。你可以用迅捷动作对自己使用这项能力。

entries.name: 合众进击
entries.description: 在10级时，你可以呼吁全体战友并肩作战。在1分钟内，每当你成功地对一个敌人发动了近战或远程攻击，奖励你10尺内的队友就可以在对抗同一敌人时在你的攻击方式上进行攻击检定上获得+2洞察加值——你进行近战攻击则近战获得加值，远程亦然。如果你的攻击成功专长了重击威胁，那么在一轮内，该加值提升到+4.

entries.name: 团队领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你的触摸能治疗伤害，你的风采使人团结，加强彼此情感的联系。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.menqakfoa1ftvi3f]{护卫他人}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hu8179fdqfkl0bqj]{祈祷术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0axqb92kzlesc24q]{法术灌输}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zuqlok69lapqc6lg]{心灵连线}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.080el1lfozrhf6c2]{脱身术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6346rs0f4sra9gt4]{群体治疗致命伤}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术}

entries.name: 动物伙伴
entries.description: 萨满的魂兽将成为萨满的动物伙伴，使用萨满等级作为有效德鲁伊等级。该魂兽保留其所有特殊能力和智力值，同时也获得动物伙伴的数据和属性能力。若该魂兽被驱逐、丢失或死亡，它可通过普通魂兽的方式召回。

entries.name: Companion to the Lonely
entries.description:
Whether religiously motivated, as are followers of Arshea, Calistria, or Shelyn, or for purely carnal reasons, physical intimacy helps the vigilante cope with the loneliness of his double life. Once per day, the vigilante can spend at least 1 hour engaged in acts of physical pleasure with a willing partner to gain a pool of morale points equal to his Charisma bonus or his partner閳ユ獨 Charisma bonus, whichever is higher.

  For the next 24 hours, the vigilante can spend a morale point as an immediate action to roll a Charisma-based skill check or a Will saving throw again after rolling the die but before learning the consequences; he must take the second result even if it is lower.

entries.name: Compel Alacrity
entries.description:
A dash of mental speed lets the subject push past her physical limits to avoid an enemy. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject begins her turn within an enemy閳ユ獨 reach. The subject can move 10 feet as a free action without provoking attacks of opportunity. The distance the subject can move increases by 5 feet for every 5 levels the mesmerist possesses, to a maximum of 30 feet at 20th level.

  The subject can閳ユ獩 move farther than her speed in this way. The movement from this trick doesn閳ユ獩 count against the subject閳ユ獨 movement speed for that round.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ns2zo6qgd9co02uf]{跳跃术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2dtcvrqh1z9k05dq]{Animal Aspect, Greater}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概}

entries.name: Complex Countermeasures
entries.description:
The psychic can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to increase by 2 the DCs of concentration checks or caster level checks the linked spell requires enemies to attempt. For example, if the linked spell were nondetection, the DC of the caster level check for using a divination on the warded creature or item would increase. This increase also applies to checks to dispel, counterspell, or identify the linked spell. The bonus applies while the spell is cast and lasts for the spell閳ユ獨 duration (if appropriate), to a maximum of 24 hours.

  The psychic can choose to spend 2 points from her phrenic pool to instead increase the linked spell閳ユ獨 DCs by 4.

entries.name: Composite Specialization
entries.description: At 16th level, a kineticist becomes more adept at creating composite blasts. She reduces the burn cost of all composite blasts by 1 point. This can閳ユ獩 reduce the cost of a composite blast below 0 points.

entries.name: Concealed Strike
entries.description:
Whenever the vigilante attacks an opponent with a concealed weapon that his target wasn閳ユ獩 aware of, he can attempt a Bluff check to feint that opponent as a move action.

  If he has the @Compendium[pf1.feats.tocde3sKG1O3GKgd]{精通虚招} feat, he attempts this check as a free action instead.

  A vigilante must be at least 6th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Concealing Veil
entries.description: When this trick is triggered, the subject is affected by a nondetection spell for 1 round per mesmerist level.

entries.name: 精神集中
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士能够以+4加值重掷任何刚做出的专注检定。他必须在投骰后决定本次检定是否成功前使用本能力。魔战士必须接受第二次的结果，即使更糟。魔战士每日可使用此能力一次。

entries.name: 浓缩毒药
entries.description: 炼金术师可以浓缩两份相同毒药来增强其毒性。这需要消耗两份毒药与1分钟时间。完成后得到的一份毒药发作持续时长增加50%，豁免DC+2。该毒药必须在制成后1小时内使用，否则将失效。

entries.name: 震荡炸弹
entries.description: 当炼金术师制作炼金炸弹时，他可以选择让它造成音波伤害替代火焰伤害，震荡炸弹造成1d4点音波伤害，之后每奇数等级增加1d4点。除非通过成功的强韧检定，否则被震荡炸弹直接命中的对象耳聋1分钟。选择这一科研发现需要至少6级炼金术师等级。

entries.name: Conflicted Identity
entries.description: The vigilante閳ユ獨 mind is in a constant state of turmoil, which makes him even more ethically and morally fluid than other vigilantes. When targeted by a harmful spell or effect that would affect the vigilante in his current identity but not his other identity (or when he would suffer a lesser effect in his other identity), he has a 50% chance of being affected as though he were in his other identity. This chance is rolled when the spell or effect is cast or triggered and before any spell resistance roll, if applicable. For example, if a vigilante has a lawful-neutral social identity and a neutral vigilante identity, he has a 50% chance of taking only half damage from a chaos hammer spell while in his social identity, since he would always take only half damage from a chaos hammer spell when in his vigilante identity.

entries.name: 困惑之刃*
entries.description: 拥有此能力的盗贼在用近战武器对目标造成偷袭伤害时，该目标在1d4+1轮内无法藉机攻击。盗贼必须选择扰乱反应*（Slow Reactions*）才能选择此天赋。

entries.name: 迷乱重击
entries.description: 1级起，精类力量能透过你的武器传递出去。每当你造成重击时，目标必须成功进行意志豁免（DC为 10 + 1/2你的血脉狂怒者等级 + 你的体质调整值），否则会困惑（confused）1轮。这是影响心灵的胁迫效果。

entries.name: 迷乱一击
entries.description: 调查员在使用策士之击造成伤害时，目标必须通过一个DC=10+1/2调查员等级+调查员智力调整值的强韧检定，否则陷入困惑状态1d4+1轮。如果目标成功通过豁免则只困惑1轮。这个能力对于构造体，无心智的生物，泥怪，植物，虚体生物，不死生物和免疫重击的生物无效。调查员至少要达到19级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 困惑炸弹
entries.description: 此炸弹扭曲被击中者对敌我的认知，被这个炸弹直接击中且强韧检定失败的生物将会受到“困惑术”影响，持续时间等于链金术士的施法者等级。被附加此效果的炸弹其伤害降低2d6（所以如果一个炼金术师的炼金炸弹正常能造成6d6+4点伤害，那他的癫狂炸弹仅仅能造成4d6+4点伤害）。他必须达到8级才能选择此发现。

entries.name: 困惑诅咒
entries.description: 萨满的碎碎念可以让孱弱的心灵陷入混乱。萨满选择３０尺内一个智慧生物。目标必须通过意志豁免，否则会陷入困惑，持续轮数为萨满魅力调整值（最低为１）。受到该巫术影响的生物２４小时内无法再成为该巫术目标。

entries.name: Congeal
entries.description: The witch can make the water in a 10-foot radius around her sludgy and viscous for 1 minute, causing it to function as difficult terrain for all swimming creatures except herself. This also provides partial cover against physical effects that pass through the affected area.

entries.name: Conjuration Resonant School
entries.description:
Implements used in conjuration allow the occultist to perform magic that transports or calls creatures.

Implements: Bowl, brazier, compass, figurine, lantern, mirror.

entries.name: 咒法学派
entries.description: 咒法师专注于学习让召唤生物和魔法都屈服于他的意志。

entries.name: Conjure Implement
entries.description:
You can expend 1 point of mental focus to conjure any item that qualifies as an implement that you know how to use. This implement can be used as the item in question, functioning as a masterwork version of that item, and can also be used to cast your psychic spells, even though you did not select it at the beginning of the day. If you have more than one implement for the same school, decide which set of spells the conjured implement will grant when you first conjure it. The implement can閳ユ獩 be used to store mental focus or create any effects that require mental focus.

  The implement lasts for 10 minutes per occultist level you possess.

entries.name: Conjured Armor
entries.description:
By spending 1 point from her phrenic pool, the psychic grants any creature she conjures or summons with the linked spell a +2 deflection bonus to AC. This bonus lasts for 1 round per caster level or until the creature disappears, whichever comes first.

  This amplification can be linked only to conjuration (calling) or conjuration (summoning) spells.

  The bonus increases to +3 at 8th level and to +4 at 15th level.

entries.name: Connaissance
entries.description: You can spend a full-round action to attune yourself to the spirit world, gaining the benefit of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} spell with the insight bonus equal to one half your oracle level (minimum 1). You may use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1), but you may only have one connaissance effect active at a time.

entries.name: Connection Channel
entries.description: At 7th level, a medium can use his location channel ability at any location, so long as he possesses some connection to the deceased. If another participant in the seance is more familiar with the deceased than the medium, the medium can substitute that participant閳ユ獨 familiarity in place of his own to determine the DC of the call spirit effect.

entries.name: Conspiracies Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.afoxrj4mjkhq0cp1]{Lock Gaze}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.80f89nrksbofs5vx]{Disguise Other}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{巧言术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pyr472hvqn8c8es2]{Hypercognition}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{支配人类}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1m5rpvirt48brv71]{说服徽记}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ukacuu0cvdjkqxwu]{Frightful Aspect}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}

entries.name: Constrict (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon gains powerful muscles that allow it to crush those it grapples. Whenever the eidolon successfully grapples a foe using the grab evolution, it deals additional damage equal to the amount of damage dealt by the attack used by the grab evolution.

  This evolution is only available to eidolons of the serpentine base form.

entries.name: Constrict (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Serpentine base form, grab evolution.

  The eidolon gains powerful muscles that allow it to crush those it grapples. Whenever the eidolon successfully grapples a foe using the grab evolution, it deals additional damage equal to the amount of damage dealt by the attack the grab evolution is tied to.

entries.name: 构装子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s2p7a4biy7bl4ks2]{有限祈愿术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2sa3881har33geo1]{变形万物}

entries.name: Constructive Dyes
entries.description: The alchemist閳ユ獨 dyes congeal and solidify, allowing him to make physical objects from them. The alchemist can expend two uses of his daily bombs to create a nonmagical object, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{次级造物术}, using his alchemist level as the spell閳ユ獨 caster level. The alchemist must be at least 8th level and have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 转耗魔具
entries.description: 奥能师可以消耗药剂、卷轴、法杖和魔杖中的力量，用来充填自己的【奥能源泉】。使用此能力是一个会引发藉机攻击的标准动作，每天使用次数等于他的魅力调整值（最小为1）。当使用此技艺时，奥能师为他的【奥能源泉】增加等同于魔法物品中法术环级一半的点数（0环和1环法术无法充填奥能源泉）。若用于药剂或卷轴，则该物品将损毁。若用于魔杖，该魔杖失去5发充能；若其充能少于5发，则魔杖损毁且奥能师无法获益。若用于法杖，该法杖失去1发充能，而奥能师获得的点数等同于该法杖消耗1发充能所能施放的最高法术环级；若该法杖没有仅消耗1发充能的法术，则奥能师无法转耗此法杖的魔力。一根法杖每天只能以此方式吸取1发充能。超过奥能源泉最大值的点数将流失。此技艺对于魔法防具、武器、戒指、权杖、奇物或其他上文没有说明的魔法物品无效。

entries.name: Consume Primal Magic
entries.description:
When the arcanist encounters a primal magic event, as an immediate action she can attempt to consume its power, as the consume spells class feature. The arcanist must succeed at a Fortitude save equal to 10 + the CR of the primal magic event, or she fails to consume the event and is staggered for 1d4 rounds.

  The arcanist must have the swift consume exploit to select this exploit.

entries.name: 转耗法术
entries.description: 奥能师可以以一个移动动作消耗1个可用的奥能师法术位，使其当天无法再用，如同用其施放了法术一般。这样做会为奥能师的【奥能源泉】增加等同于所消耗法术位环级的点数。每日使用次数等于魅力调整值（最低1）。他无法用这种方式消耗戏法（0环法术）。超过奥能源泉最大值的点数将流失。

entries.name: Consume the Enemy
entries.description:
As a full-round action that is considered an evil act and provokes attacks of opportunity, you can bite a helpless living or freshly killed creature, dealing 1d3 points of damage. By consuming the creature閳ユ獨 flesh, you gain a +1 profane bonus on saving throw DCs for all spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities you use against creatures of the same type (and subtype, if humanoid or outsider) as the cannibalized creature. This effect lasts for a number of minutes equal to 1/2 your cleric level or until you use this ability against a different creature. At 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th level, this bonus increases by 1 (+5 maximum). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Touch of Evil power of the Evil Domain.

entries.name: 耗损
entries.description: 你与阿巴顿（Abaddon）以及居住在那里的邪魔的联系使你变得虚弱，而你仍旧足够对大多数凡人弱点蔑视而笑。每当你受到致命伤害（lethal hit point damage）时，会额外受到数值等同于该伤害1/2的非致命伤害。而你会在生命值低于0时自动稳定。5级起，每当你进行对抗疾病或毒素效果的豁免检定时，掷骰两次并取较高的结果。10级起，你能够坚持不吃不喝等同于先知等级的天数之后，再遭受由于口渴与饥饿造成的不良影响。15级起，战斗中每当有生物在距你30尺内受到伤害时，你会自动获得1点暂时生命值。你能够由该能力获得优势的轮数等同于你的魅力调整值，并且你能够由此获得的暂时生命值的总量等同于你的先知等级。以此方式获得的暂时生命值会在1小时后消散。

entries.name: Consummate Liar
entries.description:
A mesmerist adds 1/2 his mesmerist level (minimum 1) as a bonus on all Bluff checks. In addition, the mesmerist qualifies for the Improved Feint and Greater Feint feats, even if he doesn閳ユ獩 have Combat Expertise or an Intelligence score of at least 13.

  He can also ignore Combat Expertise and an Intelligence score of 13 as prerequisites for other feats that require Improved Feint or Greater Feint.

entries.name: Contagious Rage
entries.description:
The barbarian howls during combat, agitating nearby fauna. Willing animals and magical beasts within 30 feet of the barbarian gain the benefits of the rage spell for as long as she maintains her rage. After the barbarian閳ユ獨 rage ends, creatures affected by her rage are fatigued for the same number of rounds as the barbarian.

  A barbarian must be at least 6th level to choose this rage power.

entries.name: Control the Herd
entries.description: At 2nd level, the cavalier can direct multiple animals with one forceful command. The cavalier can handle a number of nonhostile, riderless animals equal to his cavalier level with a single use of the Handle Animal skill, so long as the commanded animals can see or hear the cavalier. The handled animals must all be ordered to perform the same trick. If an animal in the group does not know the trick the cavalier is commanding them to perform, the cavalier is considered to be pushing that animal. The cavalier cannot use this ability on animals more than two size categories smaller than he is. Using this ability requires a move action, though if the cavalier is pushing any animal as described above, it requires a full-round action.

entries.name: 控制学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 惑控学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代惑控学派的迷人微笑和绝望光环能力。

entries.name: 裁决：劝服
entries.description: 神授力量: 你是一个专业的说客。神祇赐予的口才和你自己的天赋相结合，你的话语可以让敌手释怀，异见统一。

entries.name: Convert Wand
entries.description: An arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as a full-round action to convert one wand that is in her possession into a wand of a cure spell with the same spell level and caster level (a cure spell is any spell with 閳ユ竷ure閳?in its name). For example, she could convert a wand of stone shape into a wand of cure serious wounds. This alteration lasts for 1 minute, after which the wand reverts to its original function. Charges expended while the wand was altered are still expended when it reverts.

entries.name: 信念
entries.description: 8级起，每次血怒仅限1次，你能够重掷一次刚刚做出的属性检定、技能检定、或豁免检定。你必须在骰子掷出之后、GM给出结果之前决定是否使用该能力。你必须接受第二次的结果，即便它比前次更糟。

entries.name: 谎言说服
entries.description: 拥有此能力盗贼成功使用唬骗检定之后，对方会对他的谎言信以为真。如果之后这个谎言受到质疑或是挑战，相信该谎言的人可以用盗贼的唬弄检定进行对抗，而不是使用他们自己的检定加值。如果他的唬骗检定加值比散布谎言的盗贼本人还高，那么他在进行此检定时得到+2加值。此效果持续的天数相当于“1/2盗贼等级+魅力修正”。

entries.name: 烹人
entries.description: .  女巫可以通过在她的大釜内烹煮无论生死的智能类人生物，创造出难以置信的法术。使用这个巫术创造出怎样的佳肴将由女巫决定，通常是美味的餐点，或一份适用于制作曲奇、小松饼等甜点的面团。烹饪受害者需要1小时。享用这些食品将在1小时内为生物带来下列效果之一：岁月抵抗，熊之坚韧，公牛之力，猫之优雅，鹰之威仪，狐之狡黠，中和毒素（立即），枭之睿智，移除疾病（立即）。此外，女巫可以将面团塑造成小型类人生物，将其作为一个活动的人造人（Homunculus）1小时。女巫必须拥有【魔釜】巫术才能选择此巫术。使用这项巫术、或在知情状况下享用这种食物是一种邪恶行为。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mmc8z9bzozgeg4dm]{借技术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.etskn140auk6cjj2]{共享语言}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lisojmynoblunlex]{协调行动}

entries.name: 复制幻象
entries.description: 你可以用一个移动动作制造一个与自身极为相似的幻象。此幻象如同单个的“镜影术”般生效，并持续等同于你的牧师等级的轮数，或直到该复制幻象被解除或毁灭。你同时只能拥有一个复制幻象。此能力与镜影术无法同时生效。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: Corpse Puppet
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  You draw upon negative energy to animate a nearby corpse as a zombie or a fast zombie (your choice). You can animate a zombie only if its Hit Dice are no greater than your kineticist level 閳?4.

  Each round on your turn, you must take a move action to guide the zombie, or it reverts to a corpse (but retains any damage if you later turn it into a zombie again with this utility talent). By accepting 1 point of burn, you can pour a bit of your own sentience into the zombie, allowing it to persist for 1 round per kineticist level without requiring additional actions on your part, or until the next time your burn is removed if the zombie has half your maximum zombie Hit Dice or fewer.

  At 12th level, you can animate a zombie with a number of Hit Dice no greater than your kineticist level 閳?2.

  At 16th level, you can animate a zombie with a number of Hit Dice no greater than your kineticist level.

entries.name: Corrupting Aura
entries.description:
At 9th level, you can surround yourself with an aura of corrupting energy for a number of rounds per day equal to your sorcerer level.

  Any creature within 10 feet of you takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 for every 2 sorcerer levels you possess, and it is sickened for 1 round. In addition, any creature within the aura that attempts casting a divine spell must succeed at a caster level check (DC 15 + double the level of the spell) or lose the spell. You can use this ability once per day at 9th level, twice per day at 17th, and three times per day at 20th.

entries.name: 腐化之触
entries.description: 在1级时，你能用一个近战接触攻击导致一个生物战栗。此效果持续每两个术士等级1轮（至少1轮）。受此能力影响而战栗的生物发出邪恶灵光，如同他们是邪恶异界生物。重复接触不会叠加，但是能延长效果。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.p613n5sqbfpq22un]{Bestow Curse, Greater}

entries.name: 反制吸取
entries.description: 每当奥能师成功使用法术反制奥能技艺时，奥能师将回复一定【奥能源泉】点数，此点数基于被反制的法术环级。2环及以下的法术无法回复【奥能源泉】点数。3环及以上的法术则能为其【奥能源泉】回复每3个法术环级1点（向下取整），最高为9环回复3点。奥能师必须拥有【法术反制】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 破咒曲
entries.description: 1级起，吟游诗人可以用他的音乐和诗歌来反制依赖于声音的法术（并非简单的指那些有言语成分的法术）。在表演破咒曲的每轮内，他都必须做一次表演（键盘乐、打击乐、管乐、弦乐，或演唱）检定。任何在吟游诗人30尺之内的生物（包括吟游诗人自己）在受到音波或者基于语言的魔法攻击时，都可以用吟游诗人的表演检定来代替自身的豁免检定（如果吟游诗人的表演检定结果好于自身的豁免检定结果）。如果在“破咒曲”范围内的生物已经受到持续性音波魔法或者基于语言的魔法攻击，在听到破咒曲的每个回合内，他都有进行新的豁免检定对抗魔法影响的机会，但是必须使用吟游诗人的表演检定结果值来进行此对抗。对于无法进行豁免检定的魔法效果，【破咒曲】无效。【破咒曲】依赖声音成份运作。

entries.name: 法术反制
entries.description: 从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师在一个法术施展时反制它。他必须如常地辨识该法术。若法术辨识检定成功，奥能师可以通过直觉动作尝试反制该法术，消耗1个比要反制的法术至少高1环的法术位。要反制该法术，奥能师必须如同使用‘解除魔法’般进行解法检定。若要反制的法术是奥能师已经准备过的，则他改为消耗对应法术环级的法术位，且解法检定+5。以此方式反制法术不会触发通常在施法者反制法术成功时生效的专长或能力。

entries.name: Counterspell Mastery
entries.description: 6级开始，你获得 @Compendium[pf1.feats.V8GIvVaAofyw9xIl]{精通反制} 作为奖励专长。每天1次，可以用一个直觉动作去反制敌人的法术（取代原本的准备动作）。你必须要使用高于对手法术等级至少1级的法术激活这个能力。6级时你每天可以使用这个能力1次，每多4级你可以再多使用1次。

entries.name: Counterspell Primal Magic
entries.description:
The arcanist can attempt to counter a primal magic event as if counterspelling a magical effect. This requires a Spellcraft check with a DC of 10 + the CR of the primal magic event. If she succeeds, the event is dispelled per @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法}.

  The arcanist must have the counterspell exploit to select this exploit.

entries.name: 制法学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 防护学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代防护学派的能量吸取和保护结界能力。

entries.name: 反制击
entries.description: 16级时，每当魔战士触及范围内的敌人以防御式成功施展法术时，该敌人在法术完成后会引发魔战士的一次藉机攻击。但该次藉机攻击不会干扰到法术。

entries.name: 反制挑战
entries.description: 在15级时，一天一次，当他在挑战一个大体型或更大体型的生物时，骑将可以同时筹划打断该生物的特殊攻击。无论何时，当该名被挑战的目标启动一个特异能力（EX）或一个超自然能力（Su）（像是喷吐武器或凝视攻击），都会引发骑将的借机攻击。如果该名骑将在这次攻击中造成伤害，则这名生物必须成功通过一个意志豁免（DC=10+骑将等级的一半+骑将的魅力调整值）否则它会启动失败，并且失去做这特殊攻击时所做的动作。在反制挑战的过程中，骑将可以执行三次这样的借机攻击。

entries.name: 战团
entries.description: .  女巫能够被视为一名鬼婆加入鬼婆战团，战团中至少有一名鬼婆。此外，若2名以上具备此巫术的女巫相互距离30尺以内，则她能够通过协助他人动作使另一位女巫的施法者等级+1，持续1轮。该加值可作用于女巫的法术和所有巫术。

entries.name: Covenguard
entries.description: At 16th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒} three times per day as a spell-like ability. You count as a hag for the purposes of joining a coven; the coven must contain at least one hag.

entries.name: Covetous Curse
entries.description:
You find yourself drawn to the luster of wealthy living. You must wear fine nonmagical clothing and jewelry worth at least 50 gp + 100 gp per character level you have beyond 1st. If you do not have sufficient wealth to purchase this additional equipment, you feel a strong desire (but are not compelled) to sell existing items or steal from others to obtain it. You are sickened whenever you do not meet this requirement; you are also sickened for 24 hours after anything worth 25 gp x your character level or more is taken from you against your will. Use Magic Device becomes a class skill for you.

  At 5th level, you gain a +4 insight bonus on Appraise checks, Spellcraft checks to identify magic items, and Use Magic Device checks.

  At 10th level, you add @Compendium[pf1.spells.rxk9rk8gvqau3f3l]{鬼斧神工} to your list of spells known.

  At 15th level, you add half your oracle level to your CMD against stealAPG combat maneuvers and to the DC of Sleight of Hand checks to take items from you.

entries.name: 冲击巨浪
entries.description: 萨满的水法术造成的波浪可以击飞更大的敌人。当萨满施放具有“水”描述符的法术时，施法者等级＋１。若该法术造成伤害，目标必须通过强韧豁免，否则被击倒至俯卧。８级时，萨满施放是水法术施法者等级改为＋２。１６级时，萨满施放的所有造成伤害的法术都可能击倒目标。

entries.name: 创造工具
entries.description: 1级开始，你可以创造任何重量不超过每法师等级1磅的工具。用这个方法创造工具是一个标准动作。这个工具会在1分钟后消失，离开你的手中1轮也会直接消失。要创造一个足够精确的对象需要通过一个工艺检定，这由GM决定。这个物品必须是用简易材料所造，例如木材、石头、玻璃 或金属，且不能取下任何相连的部分。你可以用这个能力创造一把匕首，但是不可以用来创造炽火胶。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: Create Primal Event
entries.description:
The arcanist can twist the magic of an area, forcing primal magic events to occur there. As a standard action, she can spend 2 points from her arcane reservoir to create a 10-foot-by-10-foot area of primal magic at a point within 30 feet. The arcanist can increase the size of the area to 20-foot-by-20-foot by spending 2 additional points from her arcane reservoir.

  The primal magic effect remains for 1 minute.

entries.name: 创造学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 咒法学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代咒法学派的强酸镖和次元步的能力。

entries.name: 创造者意志
entries.description: 8级开始，你可以以类法术能力施展 @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{次级造物术} 你不可以同时拥有超过一件的造物。如果你再次施法，先前的法术效果立即结束。12级开始，这个能力进阶为 @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{强效造物术}.你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于你法师等级的一半。

entries.name: 裁决：犯罪
entries.description: 神授力量: 你不但在日常生活中与黑暗的犯罪世界存在联系，你的精神力量也研究被罪恶侵蚀，而它则赋予你力量。

entries.name: 罪恶之心
entries.description: 你可以通过接触一个生物刺激他大脑中的犯罪冲动。本能力相当于一个法术Crime of Opportunity（本书）的效果，但与法术不同，如果目标在豁免检定上失败并执行了自己的犯罪冲动，那么他会暂时获得满足，在24小时内免疫本能力的效果。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值（至少1次）。

entries.name: 致残猛击
entries.description: 当使用【猛力一击】狂暴之力时，野蛮人可以选择不造成额外的伤害加值（这同时也会取消【流血猛击】的出血伤害），而是对目标造成每4级1点的力量或敏捷伤害，此伤害的强韧豁免DC为“10+1/2野蛮人等级+力量修正”。野蛮人必须先选择【猛力一击】且达到8级，才能选择“致残猛击”。

entries.name: Crippling Blow (UC)
entries.description:
Once per day when the barbarian hits with an attack, she can deal 1 point of ability damage to the target閳ユ獨 Strength or Dexterity score. This damage increases by 1 point for every 4 levels the barbarian has.

  A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 致残攻击*
entries.description: 拥有此能力的盗贼可以极其精准地偷袭目标，以削弱和妨碍对手。被偷袭击中的对手要受到2点力量伤害。

entries.name: Crippling Strike (UC)
entries.description: A rogue with this ability can sneak attack opponents with such precision that her blows weaken and hamper them. An opponent damaged by one of her sneak attacks also takes 2 points of Strength damage.

entries.name: 受苦
entries.description: 在8级时，每当你造成了一次重击威胁时，你都可以消耗一次磨难之触能力为你的重击确认投骰增加+4加值。本能力的效果不与重击专攻专长叠加。

entries.name: 重击反射
entries.description:
17级时，吸血鬼猎人在确认对不死生物造成的重击后，他可以尝试进行特殊的战技检定来取出一样物品，并立即将其用在对手上。 吸血鬼猎人在他的重击造成额外伤害后决定是否使用此能力。这时，他可以尝试进行一次战技检定对抗目标的CMD （目标在对抗此战技时会失去敏捷修正值）。如果吸血鬼猎人成功，他可以取出身上的一件物品，并立即将该物品用在目标生物上。此能力不会引发藉机攻击。

以此方式使用的物品通常是炼金物品，例如强酸或圣水。需要对目标进行攻击的物品可以自动命中并正常地造成伤害（如果物品会影响一片区域，吸血鬼猎人自身也可能会受影响）。对目标没有直接影响的物品（如钓鱼钩或提灯）或需要额外战技使用的物品（如绳子或镣铐）不能用于此能力。其他近战和远程武器也不能用于此能力（除了对吸血鬼使用木桩;见下文）。此能力可以用来对付虚体生物。

如果目标生物是吸血鬼，且吸血鬼猎人身上拥有木桩（或被他的木桩能力影响的类似物品），他可以把木桩刺进吸血鬼的心脏，如同对方处于无助般，并立即杀死对方（参见开拓者角色扮演游戏志怪录的第270-271页）。 如果目标生物不是吸血鬼的话，此尝试会在最后一刻失败; 吸血鬼猎人会意识到目标不是吸血鬼。吸血鬼猎人无法通过使用此能力利用木桩刺穿非吸血鬼的心脏。

entries.name: 重击施法
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级12

  效果：每当魔战士以近战武器造成重击时，他可用迅捷动作释放一个距离为接触的法术，然后用自由动作对被重击的目标进行一次接触攻击。魔战士每日可用此能力一次。

entries.name: Crocodile Aspect
entries.description:
The crocodile lurks in the water, unseen until it lunges forth with its powerful jaws.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Swim checks and grapple combat maneuver checks.

  This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a crocodile. While in this form, you gain a swim speed of 30 feet, low-light vision, a bite attack (1d8) with the grab ability, and a tail slap attack (a secondary natural attack that deals 1d12 points of damage).

  At 8th level, once per minute as a free action, you can increase your land speed by 20 feet for 1 round.

  At 15th level, you gain Improved Natural Attack with your bite attack, and when you successfully grapple a foe, you can knock your grappled foe prone.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tail slap (B)

entries.name: Cruel Thicket
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can cause the ground in a 5-foot-radius burst centered on you to sprout twisting, thorny vines. Any creature moving through it must travel at half speed or take bleed damage equal to half your cleric level; if you activate this ability in an area with numerous plants (grass, weeds, trees, etc.), the area also becomes difficult terrain. These effects last for 1 minute, after which the vines crumble to dust. Creatures able to move through natural undergrowth unhindered ignore the effects of this ability. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Wooden Fist power of the Plant Domain.

entries.name: 暴行
entries.description:
在第3级和之后每3个等级，反圣骑士都可以选择一项暴行。每个暴行都会为【堕落之触】带来追加的效果。当反圣骑士使用堕落之触伤害一个目标时，目标受到此反圣骑士所拥有暴行其中之一的负面效果。此负面效果需在成功碰触目标时选定。目标可进行一个DC等于“10+1/2反圣骑士职业等级+魅力修正”的强韧豁免检定，若检定通过则免遭暴行负面效果影响，但仍会受到堕落之触的正常伤害。

  在第3级，反圣骑士可以从以下基础暴行中进行选择。

  • 造成疲乏（Fatigued）：目标疲乏。
  • 造成战栗（Shaken）：目标战栗每反圣骑士职业等级1轮。
  • 造成恶心（Sickened）：目标恶心每反圣骑士职业等级1轮。
：在第6级，反圣骑士将以下暴行加入可选择列表。

  • 造成晕眩（Dazed）：目标晕眩1轮。
  • 传染疫病（Diseased）：目标如受反圣骑士施放法术‘疫病术’般得病，施法者等级等于反圣骑士的职业等级。
  • 造成恍惚（Staggered）：目标恍惚每2反圣骑士职业等级1轮。
：在第9级，反圣骑士将以下暴行加入可选择列表。

  • 传递诅咒（Cursed）：目标如受反圣骑士施放法术‘降咒’般受诅，施法者等级等于反圣骑士的职业等级。
  • 造成力竭（Exhausted）：目标力竭。在选择这项能力前，反圣骑士必须拥有【造成疲乏】的暴行。
  • 造成惊惧（Frightened）：目标惊惧每2反圣骑士职业等级1轮。在选择这项能力前，反圣骑士必须拥有【造成战栗】的暴行。
  • 造成反胃（Nauseated）：目标反胃每3反圣骑士职业等级1轮。在选择这项能力前，反圣骑士必须拥有【造成恶心】的暴行。
  • 渗透毒素（Poisoned）：目标如受反圣骑士施放法术‘毒击’般中毒，施法者等级等于反圣骑士的职业等级。
：在第12级，反圣骑士将以下暴行加入可选择列表。

  • 造成目盲（Blinded）：目标目盲每反圣骑士职业等级1轮。
  • 造成耳聋（Deafened）：目标耳聋每反圣骑士职业等级1轮。
  • 造成麻痹（Paralyzed）：目标麻痹1轮。
  • 造成震慑（Stunned）：目标震慑每4反圣骑士职业等级1轮。

    •   以上能力不会累积。例如，一个12级反圣骑士的【堕落之触】可造成6d6伤害，并使目标陷入疲乏、晕眩、中毒、生病等状态之一。【暴行】在选定以后无法更换。

entries.name: 粉碎擒抱
entries.description: 第8级，骑士获得锁喉UC作为奖励专长，即使其不满足前提条件。他在锁喉时，擒抱检定不会-5。

entries.name: Cryokinetic Stasis
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 8; Burn 1

  You encase yourself or a willing target in an icy sheen, placing the target in a state of suspended animation, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.qptzjtg2m9cqnuwh]{永恒静滞} except fire spells and spell-like abilities of 3rd level or higher count as if the caster used dispel magic against the stasis. Otherwise, no other force or effect can harm the target.

entries.name: 魔晶碎片
entries.description: 9级开始，你可以通过触碰一件金属或是石制武器（或者至多50发弹药），赋予这件武器破敌（泥怪、金属或土制构装体、或土系亚种生物）属性，持续1分钟。9级时，你每日可以使用1次此能力，17级时2次，20级时3次。

entries.name: 水晶视野
entries.description: 你可以看穿岩石，大地或是沙砾如同他们是透明的水晶。你的凝视可以穿透等同于你先知等级的尺数，或是看穿此数量1/12厚度（即先知等级的英吋数）的金属。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等同于你的先知等级，但不必连续。

entries.name: Cult Totem
entries.description:
The barbarian can make an attack of opportunity against a creature within her reach who damages an ally of the barbarian with a melee attack. Only the enemy, not the barbarian閳ユ獨 ally, needs to be within the barbarian閳ユ獨 melee reach in order for the barbarian to make this attack of opportunity. Once the barbarian makes an attack of opportunity against a creature with this ability, she can閳ユ獩 use this ability to make an attack of opportunity against the same creature for 24 hours.

  A barbarian must be at least 6th level and have the lesser cult totem rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: Cult Totem, Greater
entries.description:
While the barbarian is raging, when she takes hit point damage that would render her dying or dead, she remains conscious and raging until the end of her next turn after taking that damage, though she is disabled during that turn. She becomes dying or dead at the end of her next turn as normal for her current hit point total. This ability has no effect if the barbarian dies from a cause other than hit point damage, such as from a death effect or if her Constitution damage exceeds her Constitution score.

  A barbarian must be at least 10th level and have the lesser cult totem and cult totem rage powers to select this rage power.

entries.name: Cult Totem, Lesser
entries.description: While the barbarian is raging, any morale bonuses or bonuses for flanking she gains on attacks rolls are added to her damage rolls instead of her attack rolls. They are still morale bonuses, and they don閳ユ獩 stack with other morale bonuses on damage rolls.

entries.name: Cunning Feint
entries.description:
The vigilante can feint as a move action or in place of his first attack during a full attack.

  At 8th level, when the vigilante successfully feints, the opponent is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC against all attacks until the vigilante閳ユ獨 next turn.

entries.name: 巧夺先攻
entries.description: 在2级时，审判者在敏捷修正之外，额外将她的感知修正加在先攻检定上。

entries.name: 灵活扳机
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以以一个迅捷动作触发一个30尺内由她设置的陷阱。

entries.name: 随波逐流
entries.description: 以一个自由动作，你可以增加你的陆地移动或游泳速度10尺。在游泳时，你的游泳技能检定获得（1/2牧师等级，最小为1）的加值。本能力持续的时间等同于你的感知调整值（最小为1）。你每天可以使用此能力3+你的感知调整值次。此能力替换水领域的冰抗能力。

entries.name: 水流冲击
entries.description: 在8级时，骑将如果沿着正在推动着他水流的方向冲锋，他可以在攻击骰上获得+2加值，以及在伤害骰上获得每10尺水流速度+1点伤害（最高+6点伤害）。

entries.name: Currentcaller
entries.description: At 16th level, as a swift action up to three times per day when underwater, at the start of your turn you can call up a current with a speed up to 20 feet in the direction of your choice in your space (moving with you) that lasts until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Curse Blessing: Hexing Attack
entries.description: You can touch one weapon and enhance it to inflict a minor curse on the next target it strikes. The struck target must succeed at a Will saving throw or take a 閳? penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, or ability checks (warpriest閳ユ獨 choice) for 1 minute.

entries.name: Curse Blessing: Retributive Curse
entries.description:
At 10th level, as a swift or immediate action, you can inflict a curse on any adjacent creature that scores a critical hit against you or deals precision damage to you. The target must succeed at a Will saving throw or be cursed. Select one of the following effects: the target takes a 閳? penalty to one ability score of your choice (the ability cannot be reduced below 1); the target takes a 閳? penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and skill checks; each turn, the target has a 25% chance of taking no action (otherwise, it acts normally). This curse lasts for 1 hour.

  A creature can be subjected to only one instance of retributive curse at a time. This otherwise functions as bestow curse.

entries.name: Curse Breaker
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0
Prerequisite emptiness

  The power of void protects you from curses and allows you to remove or suppress them. You gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against curses and hexes. You can accept 1 point of burn as a standard action to attempt a caster level check to remove a curse on yourself or another as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.o87h8gjxevcbztgd]{移除诅咒}. If the curse normally could not be removed by remove curse, you can instead suppress the curse until the next time your burn is removed with a successful caster level check.

  When your burn is removed, you can choose not to remove the burn you spent in this way to continue suppressing the curse without interruption.

  If you die, any curse suppressed in this way returns instantly.

entries.name: Curse Conduit
entries.description: At 20th level, you gain immunity to negative energy damage and all spells with the curse descriptor. Whenever you confirm a critical hit with a melee weapon, you can immediately target your opponent with a @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒} spell or spell-like ability as a free action.

entries.name: Curse Mastery
entries.description: At 13th level, you have made the accursed magic of the hags your own. You become immune to spells of the curse subschool and curse effects. Furthermore, the DCs of your spells with the curse descriptor increase by 1, and you can apply the overpowering mind and synaptic shock phrenic amplifications to spells with the curse descriptor so long as you have learned those amplifications.

entries.name: Curse of Dampening
entries.description:
You diminish one target within 30 feet as a standard action, making its attacks weaker. Whenever the target would roll to deal damage with an attack or spell, it deals the minimum amount of damage. This curse lasts for 1 round per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1). A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. This is a mind-affecting curse effect.

  You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 11th level and 15th level. You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.

entries.name: Curse of Faltering
entries.description:
As an immediate action when an enemy within 30 feet threatens a critical hit, the shaman can force the creature to reroll its original attack roll with a penalty equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier. The target can attempt a Will save to negate this ability.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours. This is a curse effect.

entries.name: Curse of Isolation
entries.description:
The shaman makes an enemy within 30 feet keenly feel its status outside the tribe. For a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 level, the target gains no benefit from flanking or the aid another action, and it doesn閳ユ獩 benefit from morale bonuses. The target can attempt a Will save to negate this ability.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours. This is a curse effect.

entries.name: Curse of Nonviolence
entries.description:
The witch can curse a creature to prevent it from attacking innocents. If the target fails its Will save, it cannot take violent actions or do anything destructive against any creature with fewer Hit Dice than itself. If another creature takes hostile action against the cursed creature, the cursed creature can act normally in regard to that creature only.

  This is an abjuration effect.

  The curse is permanent but can be removed with a @Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术}, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术} spell. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: 痛苦诅咒
entries.description: 萨满能使３０尺内一名生物从出血效果中承受更高伤害，并且创口愈合更慢。被诅咒生物受到出血伤害时，会额外承受１点出血伤害（即便出血是属性伤害亦增加）。此外，当目标成为可能恢复生命值的效果目标时，该效果只能恢复正常数值的一半。该诅咒持续轮数等于萨满的等级。持续时间结束后，该生物２４小时内发再次成为该巫术的目标。

entries.name: 第一世界的诅咒
entries.description: 在15级时，百花骑士团的骑将可以通过他们的武器引导混乱之力。他的近战攻击在克服伤害减免时会被视作混乱阵营。除此之外，当他对一个受到魅惑影响的生物确认重击时，目标将会困惑1d6轮。在每轮中困惑生物通过投骰来决定它的行动时，它需要投两次然后让骑将决定使用哪个结果。这是一个影响心灵的效果。

entries.name: 诅咒子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3etxlex8u32g0hrx]{绝望术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光}

entries.name: Cursed Bomb
entries.description:
When an alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deliver a debilitating curse. A creature that takes a direct hit from a cursed bomb must succeed at a Will save or be affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒}.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level to select this discovery.

entries.name: Cursed Sanction
entries.description: A ward curses an enemy who attacks the subject. While this trick is implanted, a visible, circular symbol appears on the subject閳ユ獨 forehead. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject is attacked or becomes the target of a spell that requires an attack roll. The attacker takes a 閳? penalty on attack rolls, saves, ability checks, and skill checks for 1 minute per mesmerist level (Will negates). This penalty applies to the triggering attack roll. This is a curse effect.

entries.name: Cursed Wound
entries.description:
The witch can curse a living creature, preventing it from healing completely. For a number of days equal to 3 + the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier (minimum 1), whenever the victim is the target of a conjuration (healing) spell or magical healing effect, the caster of the healing effect must succeed at a caster level check (DC = 11 + the witch閳ユ獨 level) to end the hex. If the check fails, the healing effect functions as normal, except it cannot remove the last 10 points of damage the victim suffered. Similarly, natural healing, fast healing, and regeneration fail to cure the victim閳ユ獨 last 10 points of damage. Thus, the victim閳ユ獨 effective maximum number of hit points is 10 fewer than normal. A successful Will save reduces the duration of this hex to 1 round.

  At 5th level, the victim of this hex also takes a 閳? penalty on Fortitude saving throws to avoid contracting a disease or poison from an injury. This is a curse effect and can be removed by @Compendium[pf1.spells.o87h8gjxevcbztgd]{移除诅咒}.

entries.name: 翦除腐化
entries.description: 在8等时，一个苍翠骑士团的骑士一天一次，可以以一个自由动作接触一个武器，将自然伟力的原始力量附在其上。在一分钟内，这被接触到的武器会散发深绿色光，并在对附异怪生物或不死生物时附加1d6点伤害。此伤害并不会与破敌武器特殊能力相叠加。在16级时，骑士可以一天使用此能力两次。

entries.name: Cutting Edge (UC)
entries.description: A rogue with this ability immediately selects two additional skills with her rogue閳ユ獨 edge ability. She can select this advanced talent multiple times.

entries.name: Cyclone Infusion
entries.description:
Element air; Type form infusion; 等级 4; Burn 3
Associated Blasts air, blizzard, sandstorm, thunderstorm
Saving Throw Reflex half

  You create a circular rush of wind. All creatures and objects within a 20-foot-radius burst centered on you take half your blast閳ユ獨 normal amount of damage. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

entries.name: Cytillesh BomB
entries.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can infuse it with cytillesh extract. Cytillesh bombs deal 1d4 points of damage, plus 1d4 points of damage for every odd-numbered level, instead of 1d6. Creatures that take a direct hit from a cytillesh bomb are sickened for 1 round per alchemist level unless they succeed at Fortitude saves. If a creature is rendered unconscious from this bomb or any other attack before it is able to remove the sickened condition, the victim loses all memory from the last hour and cannot form new memories for 8 hours. The lost and prevented memories might return later as dreams, and can be restored with a @Compendium[pf1.spells.anya5qwdjhdfyk8u]{复原术} spell. This discovery doesn閳ユ獩 stack with other discoveries that alter an alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb.

entries.name: 邪魔血统
entries.description:
沿着你的族谱，有一名邪魔潜伏其中。你的力量来自这些吞噬灵魂的恶魔，他通过利用诸如衰老，瘟疫，饥饿以及对战争的恐惧之类的弱点玩弄凡人，并从中获取力量与快乐。你的血统在如何利用活物的弱点，以及如何榨取灵魂能量增强你的邪恶之力之类的事情上赋予了你强大的洞察力。

  本职技能: 医疗.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{愚者之触} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3efy1ico48ccrzni]{吸血鬼之触} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{疫病术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gq7np9mwtfd500zg]{枯萎术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3a162m66toj22fpa]{死亡法阵} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dlo03ajt55yofj4q]{缚魂术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}, 
  • Fast Healer,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}, 
  • Heroic Defiance, 
  • Heroic Recovery, 
  • Sickening Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  血统奥秘: 每当你施放法术杀死一个或更多具有3点或更高智力的活物时，你接下来一轮所施放的任何法术的施法者等级增加，增加的数值为前一个法术杀死的每个生物+1级。该能力不与任何其他增加你有效施法者等级的效果叠加，并且你获得的加值不能超过1/2你的魅力调整值（最低1点）。由你施放的第二个法术的等级必须与前一个法术相等或者更低。

entries.name: 邪魔子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9tww9fc9049h6iqc]{惊恐术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3efy1ico48ccrzni]{吸血鬼之触}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (daemons only)

entries.name: Daemon Totem
entries.description:
While the barbarian is raging, her melee attacks impose a temporary negative level on her opponent on a successful critical hit. After 1 hour, these temporary negative levels disappear automatically without a saving throw).

  A barbarian must be at least 6th level and have the lesser daemon totem rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: Daemon Totem, Greater
entries.description:
If the barbarian kills an intelligent creature with a CR equal to at least half her character level while raging, she heals 5 hit points. If she is already at her maximum number of hit points, she instead gains 5 temporary hit points, which don閳ユ獩 stack if she kills multiple creatures.

  A barbarian must be at least 10th level and have the lesser daemon totem and daemon totem rage powers to select this rage power.

entries.name: Daemon Totem, Lesser
entries.description: While raging, the barbarian gains a +2 bonus on saving throws against acid damage, death effects, disease, and poison. This bonus increases by 1 for each daemon totem rage power the barbarian has, excluding this one.

entries.name: 邪魔抗力
entries.description: 3级起，你获得5点强酸抗力，并且在对抗毒素与死亡效果时的豁免中获得+2加值。9级起，你的强酸抗力增加至10点，对抗毒素与死亡效果时的豁免中获得的加值提升至+4。

entries.name: 伤害减免
entries.description: 7级起，野蛮人获得DR。在受到武器或天生武器攻击时，野蛮人受到的伤害要减少1点。10级起每3级（13，16，19级）该DR都会增加1点。DR可以让伤害降低到0，但是不能低于0。

entries.name: Damage Reduction (3 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's body becomes resistant to harm, granting it damage reduction. Choose one alignment: chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. The eidolon gains DR 5 that can be bypassed by weapons that possess the chosen alignment. The alignment must be opposite to one of the alignments possessed by the eidolon.

  At 12th level, this protection can be increased to DR 10 by spending 2 additional evolution points.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: 伤害减免(血脉狂怒者)
entries.description: 7级起，血脉狂怒者获得伤害减免。每当血脉狂怒者由于武器或天生武器攻击而受到伤害时，他所承受的伤害都会降低1点。10级以及之后的每3个等级，这个伤害减免都会增加1点。伤害减免可以让伤害降至0点，但是无法使其低于0点。

entries.name: 伤害减免
entries.description: 在9级时，歌者获得伤害减免。在受到武器或天生武器攻击时，歌者受到的伤害要减少1点，在14级和19级时）该伤害减免都会增加一点。伤害减免可以让伤害降低到0，但是不能低于0。除此之外，所有受到歌者的激发狂暴影响的盟友同样获得此伤害减免。

entries.name: Damage Reduction (UC) (3 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 15th, damage reduction granted by the eidolon閳ユ獨 subtype.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 body becomes more resistant to harm. Increase the damage reduction granted by the eidolon閳ユ獨 subtype by 5.

entries.name: 裁决：末劫
entries.description: 神授力量: The prospect of an afterlife filled with torment can cause even the most stalwart to blanch閳ユ攣t least for a moment.

entries.name: 诅咒呢喃
entries.description: 用一个标准动作，奥能师可从【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点催动一场由阴险低语声组成的大合唱，它们将回荡在30尺半径内一个单独目标的脑海里，催促该目标去伤害他自己。该生物如果意志豁免检定失败就会被声音压垮并屈服于它们的建议。在该目标的回合，他将丢掉手里握持的任何物体并伤害他自己，造成1d6伤害。在3级和之后的每3级，奥能师可用该技艺瞄准一个额外目标，最多在18级达到7个目标。诅咒呢喃是一个影响心灵的效果。

entries.name: Dampen Presence
entries.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains Dampen Presence (Pathfinder Player Companion: Dungeoneer閳ユ獨 Handbook 10) as a bonus feat. The rogue does not need to meet the feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites. The rogue is also considered to have the Skill Focus (Stealth) feat for the purpose of satisfying the prerequisites of any feat that lists Dampen Presence as a prerequisite.

entries.name: Dampening Infusion
entries.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; 等级 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts negative, void
Saving Throw Will negates

  Your kinetic blast swirls with darkness, making it harder for your foes to see. This otherwise functions as dazzling infusion.

entries.name: Dance of Disorienting Shadows
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can attempt a Perform (dance) check in place of a combat maneuver check when attempting a reposition combat maneuver.

entries.name: 剑刃之舞
entries.description: 你的移动速度增加10尺。7级时，当你至少移动10尺且持用金属武器的时候，你的攻击获得+1加值。11级还有之后的每4级，此加值再上升1。11级时你可以用一个移动等效动作舞出一片刀锋壁障，使得所有瞄准的非虚体近战和远程攻击承受20%的失手机率。这个效果持续到你下一轮开始为止，你必须持用金属武器才有办法使用此能力。

entries.name: Dance of Whirling Water
entries.description:
You dance through the battlefield with all the grace and power of the waves, sweeping up enemies and tossing them away with the powers of air and water entwined. Whenever you succeed at an Acrobatics check to move through an enemy閳ユ獨 square, you gain a competence bonus equal to half your oracle level (minimum +1) on trip combat maneuvers against that creature until the start of your next turn.

  At 11th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.UnmST9BvRhxT4vq3]{旋风攻击} as a bonus feat, and you can make bull rush combat maneuvers in place of any of the attacks granted by Whirlwind Attack; you cannot move with enemies bull rushed this way.

entries.name: 跃动雷电
entries.description: 当奥能师使用【雷电投枪】技艺时，他可以从【奥能源泉】中消费2点而非1点。若如此做，所有与目标相邻接的生物都会受到骰出闪电伤害的一半伤害。邻接生物可以通过反射豁免来将此伤害减半。目标本身是否通过豁免对其邻接生物没有影响。奥能师必须拥有【雷电投枪】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 舞空武器
entries.description: 在8级，你能够通过触碰使得一个武器成为舞空武器4轮。在8级你能够使用该能力每天1次，以后每比8级多4级增加1次。

entries.name: Danger Sense
entries.description:
At 3rd level, a barbarian gains a +1 bonus on Reflex saves to avoid traps and a +1 dodge bonus to AC against attacks by traps. In addition, she gains a +1 bonus on Perception checks to avoid being surprised by a foe. These bonuses increase by 1 every 3 levels thereafter (to a maximum of +6 at 18th level).

  his ability counts as trap sense for any feat or class prerequisite, and can be replaced by any archetype class feature that replaces trap sense. The bonuses gained from this ability stack with those gained from trap sense (if the barbarian has trap sense from another class).

entries.name: Danger Sight
entries.description:
As an immediate action, you can protect yourself from harm by expending 1 point of mental focus. You can use this ability whenever you are the target of an attack or are required to attempt a saving throw against a special ability, spell, or trap. Doing so grants you an insight bonus to your AC or on your saving throw equal to 1/2 your occultist level. This bonus applies only to the next attack against you or saving throw you attempt, and if not applied by the end of the round, the protection fades and you gain no benefit.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this focus power.

entries.name: Danger Word
entries.description: At 2nd level, the cavalier can ready his allies for impending danger. As a standard action, he can ready all allies within 30 feet of the danger ahead, granting a bonus on a single type of saving throw (Fortitude, Reflex or Will) that he chooses when he grants this boon. At any point in the next minute, when these allies fail a saving throw of that type, they can choose to reroll the saving throw with a +4 competence bonus as an immediate action, but must take the results of the reroll even if it is worse. He can use this ability up to three times per day, once for each type of saving throw.

entries.name: Dark Apothecary
entries.description: The witches of ancient Iblydos were masters of herbalism, crafting potent drugs and poisons. The witch receives a +4 insight bonus on checks to craft and apply poison.

entries.name: Dark Defense
entries.description: At 5th level, light and darkness become your allies, moving around you to protect you from your enemies. You gain a +2 deflection bonus to Armor Class against any attack while you benefit from concealment against that attack. If you have full concealment from that attack, this deflection bonus increases to +4.

entries.name: Dark Half
entries.description:
By allowing the dark forces to overcome you, you can enter a state of instinctual cruelty as a swift action. While you閳ユ獧e manifesting your dark half, you increase the DCs of your psychic spells by 1, gain a +2 morale bonus on Will saves, and become immune to fear effects. Whenever you cast a spell that deals damage while manifesting your dark half, you can cause one creature that took damage from the spell to also take 1 point of bleed damage. The amount of bleed damage increases to 2 points at 5th level and to 1d6 points at 13th level.

  While manifesting your dark half, you can閳ユ獩 use any Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skills (except Acrobatics, Fly, Intimidate, and Ride) or any ability that requires patience or concentration other than casting spells using psychic magic, using phrenic amplifications, or attempting to return to normal.

  You can attempt to return to your normal self as a free action, but must succeed at a concentration check with a DC equal to 10 + your caster level. If you fail, you continue to manifest your dark half and can閳ユ獩 attempt to change back for 1 round.

  You can manifest your dark half for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + 1/2 your psychic level + your Charisma modifier; when these rounds are expended, you return to your normal self without requiring a concentration check.

entries.name: 黑母衣
entries.description: 在2级时，每当武士骑乘他的坐骑时，他的坐骑可以与武士互相分享以下他们所有的任何感官：黑暗视觉，昏暗视觉，灵敏嗅觉和看破黑暗的能力。本能力可以应用到任何他们所拥有的感官上（包括法术和魔法物品提供的感官），但武士必须骑乘他的坐骑才能获得该好处。如果武士和他的坐骑拥有同类型但强度不同的感官（例如，武士拥有60尺黑暗视觉但坐骑拥有90尺黑暗视觉），那么他们可以同时获得较强的能够等级的感官。

entries.name: 黑暗秘密
entries.description:
你学会把秘密隐藏在你释放的阴影法术中，你可以将法术术士列表中等于你魅力调整值（最低1，最高等于先知等级一半）的法术作为神术加入你的法术列表和已知列表。这些法术拥有等同于他们法师/术士的施法等级的施法等级。在这个规则下，你只能将幽影幻觉子学派的幻术系法术，亦或者是有黑暗描述符的法术加入你的法术列表和已知列表。

  每次你在采取这个启示后提升先知等级，你可以选择去丢弃任何一个这之中的法术，来从法师/术士的法术表中挑选一个全新并适合的法术。

entries.name: 黑暗挪移
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6

  效果：魔战士可以移动动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能来改变一个有[黑暗]描述符的持续法术的目标。该法术的新目标必须在法术的原始范围内，使用魔战士等级作为有效施法者等级来决定以魔战士为原点该法术最大可被移动的距离。若被尝试移动的法术效果出自于另一个生物，魔战士必须通过施法者检定才能移动该法术{DC=11+效果的施法者等级}。检定失败会消耗掉移动动作，但不消耗奥能点。

entries.name: 暗幕最终启示
entries.description: 20级时，你转化成全然的超自然生物。你得到伤害减免“5/-”，免疫强酸、重击和偷袭。每天1次，你可以用类法术能力施展“形体变化”，而且不需要任何的器材。

entries.name: 暗幕秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择暗幕启示领域的先知将以下技能加入他的本职技能：易容，威吓，知识（奥秘），隐匿。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ech2cibcsmsms9s7]{Dust Of Twilight} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{巧言术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66vvhyiy5q8yzbq2]{弱智术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdfw5f15hwcxlth]{反重力} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4qriqew7d2ot7wr5]{Interplanetary Teleport} (18th).

entries.name: Dark Tapestry Spirit
entries.description:
A shaman who selects the Dark Tapestry spirit is often a misanthropic loner. While she may well work with others, she rarely does so of her own volition. Instead, she seeks out the aid of a small group (such as a party of adventurers) as a result of an obscure vision or other influence from the Dark Tapestry that she might not fully comprehend. More often, though, a Dark Tapestry shaman is encountered not as a member of a group, but as the leader of a cult in a remote region閳ユ敄hese shamans, of course, work best as NPC villains and not as PCs.

The spirits of the Dark Tapestry have often been known to whisper dangerous secrets to mortals who dwell on sane worlds. Such spirits might be found anywhere touched by the light of baleful stars, but they are most frequently found lurking around unfathomably ancient ruins of aberrant civilizations with links to the Dark Tapestry. On Golarion, these spirits can often be found near old ruins in Osirion or the Sodden Lands, although they are also quite active throughout the county of Versex in Ustalav. Many shamans who invoke the spirits of the Dark Tapestry also worship one or several of the Outer Gods or Great Old Ones of the Elder Mythos, be it out of fear or misinformed adoration. Other entities associated with the Dark Tapestry, particularly the Dominion of the Black, seem less likely to be associated with that realm閳ユ獨 spirits, so it may well be that the spirits that shamans call upon when they turn to the Dark Tapestry for power are in fact the idle thoughts of horrors such as Nyarlathotep, Yog-Sothoth, or even Azathoth.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gl524v9qd5jji2ex]{Contact Entity I} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6g7x08y9nl7vlffv]{Contact Entity II} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0n789r9rokr1ktd1]{Contact Entity III} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66vvhyiy5q8yzbq2]{弱智术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kn3xjxysd4b3t6a]{Contact Entity IV} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4qriqew7d2ot7wr5]{Interplanetary Teleport} (9th).

  Spirit Animal: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal has an alien physiology, including twitching tentacles, additional but blind eyes, or strangely deformed limbs. The spirit animal gains the shaman閳ユ獨 choice of a swim speed or a climb speed equal to its highest speed, and one of its natural weapons increases in reach by 5 feet. If it did not have a natural weapon, it gains a tentacle attack as a secondary natural weapon with 5-foot reach. Damage for this tentacle is standard for a creature of the spirit animal閳ユ獨 size (1d2 for a Tiny spirit animal, or 1d3 for a Small one).

entries.name: Dark Tapestry Spirit Manifestation
entries.description:
Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes an unnatural spirit of the Dark Tapestry. She gains damage reduction 5/閳?and immunity to acid, critical hits, and sneak attacks. While she retains much of her original appearance, several minor cosmetic changes leave no doubt as to her now-alien nature. Her eyes might appear as solid spheres of blackness, her fingers might writhe like tentacles, or her legs might bend backward at the knees.

Once per day, the shaman can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} as a spell-like ability without requiring a material component, but the form the shaman assumes via this spell-like ability is never something that looks of natural origin to the shaman閳ユ獨 home world.

替代领域法术

  • 2nd -@Compendium[pf1.spells.26vm5jhjkxpq1xm3]{召唤怪物 II}
  • 5th - @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{召唤怪物 V}
  • 7th - @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱}

entries.name: Dark Wings
entries.description:
At 12th level, when entering a bloodrage you can choose to have batlike wings grow from your back, giving you a fly speed of 60 feet with average maneuverability.

  At 16th level, your fly speed increases to 80 feet with good maneuverability.

entries.name: 深暗视觉
entries.description: 在10级时，你能够尝试对一个敌人进行一次近战接触攻击；如果你成功命中，目标会如同遭受目盲/耳聋术的影响般目盲一分钟。

entries.name: 阴影寿衣
entries.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以触摸一个盟友并赋予其黑暗的祝福。在1分钟内，这个盟友在战斗中会被黑暗所笼罩，赋予其隐蔽（20%）效果。通常能够看穿超自然黑暗的生物能够忽略这个隐蔽效果。

entries.name: Darkness Bomb
entries.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it suppress light sources on the target. This extinguishes nonmagical light sources carried by the target and dispels magical light sources for 1 round/level as @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术}.

entries.name: 黑暗领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你操纵阴影和黑暗，另外你获得“盲斗”作为奖励专长。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k7cf5gshkp8xxqux]{目盲/耳聋术} (限目盲)
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{幽影咒法术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{召唤怪物 V} (1d3幽影)
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{真言术 盲}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.967ur7a9xepd704y]{高等幽影塑能术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xxaycxbdsmalf5ov]{阴魂咒法术}

entries.name: Darkness Infusion
entries.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Associated Blasts gravity, negative, void
Saving Throw none

  Your kinetic blast creates darkness. Treat each square of the path of your ranged attack kinetic blast, the target square of your melee attack kinetic blast, or the area of your area of effect kinetic blast as the center of a darkness effect that lasts until the end of your next turn.

  This effect counts as a 3rd-level darkness spell.

entries.name: Darkness Infusion, Greater
entries.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; Level 6; Burn 4
Prerequisite darkness infusion
Associated Blasts gravity, negative, void
Saving Throw none

  Your blast creates supernatural darkness, as per the darkness infusion, except it acts as deeper darkness and counts as a 6th-level darkness spell.

entries.name: 忍法·天瞳
entries.description: 此忍术允许忍者使用气来增强其视觉，获得最高60尺的黑暗视觉。使用本忍术为标准动作并耗费1点气。感官增强效果持续1小时。

entries.name: 惊人成功/戚嗟若
entries.description: 8级时，无论什么时候骑将用近战武器确认了一个重击，以一个直觉动作，他可以进行一个威吓检定，来挫败15尺内所有能看见他的敌人的士气。这个能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

entries.name: Dawning Realization
entries.description:
At 8th level, you can impart a shared vision of unfathomable ineffability to a living creature you touch as a standard action, after which your turn immediately ends. You are dazed and the target confused for 1 round by what you both learn. On the following round, you are both staggered for 1 round by the ramifications of your discovery. On the third round, you are confused and the target dazed for 1 round as you attempt to regain your bearings. Each round, the target can attempt a Will save with a DC equal to 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier to negate that round閳ユ獨 effects for both of you, though the effect does not end until the end of the third round. This is a mindaffecting effect that you can use a number of times per day equal to 1/2 your class level.

  This power replaces the Aura of Madness power of the Madness Domain.

entries.name: 白昼子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.b8vp8fgt1o6pq1qc]{不灭明焰}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术}

entries.name: 日新
entries.description: 到了8级，你能令一个生物仿佛休息了8小时一样恢复。它需要10分钟来使用此能力，被打断后需要重启，但不会当作用过。10分钟后，该生物治疗相当于休息8小时的生命并且可对度日需要豁免的效果进行豁免。而且失败后不会受到恶果，成功则可消除（若可能）。此能力不能用来准备法术。你在8级能使用1次，以后每比8级高2级能多用1次。此能力取代太阳领域的光轮能力。

entries.name: 恍惚接触
entries.description: 通过一次近战接触攻击，你能够使活物晕眩1轮。HD超过你牧师等级的生物不受影响。你每天可以使用此能力次数“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 恍惚接触
entries.description: 通过一次近战接触攻击，你能够使活物晕眩1轮。HD超过你牧师等级的生物不受影响。你每天可以使用此能力次数“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: Dazzling Infusion
entries.description:
Element fire, wood; Type substance infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts blue flame, fire, plasma, positive, verdant
Saving Throw Will negates

  Your kinetic blast shines brightly, making it harder for your foes to see. If your blast hits a foe (and penetrates SR if applicable), that foe must succeed at a Will save or be dazzled for 1 minute, whether or not it takes damage from the blast. You can reduce the blast閳ユ獨 damage by half to increase the DC of this save by 2.

entries.name: 致命精确
entries.description: 当野蛮人使用【无比精准】狂暴之力造成重击时，他可以在进行重击确认时将无比精准的效果加倍。野蛮人必须要达到4级且拥有【无比精准】才能选择“致命精确”。

entries.name: Deadly Accuracy (UC)
entries.description:
