entries.name: Enchantment Resonant School
entries.description:
Enchantment implements allow the occultist to befuddle the mind and charm his foes.

Implements: Censer, crown, helm, musical instrument, necklace.

entries.name: 惑控学派
entries.description: 惑控师使用魔法去控制和操纵受害者的心智。

entries.name: 六道轮回
entries.description: 在15等时，任何被苍翠骑士团的骑士杀死的生物，倾向保持着死亡的状态。无论何时，骑士杀死了什么，要以魔法来复活时，该生物被视为被死亡效果所杀死。除此之外，该尸体恒定尸体圣化（Sanctify Corpse）的效果（使用骑士的职业等级做为施法者等级）。

entries.name: 坚忍
entries.description: 游侠在3级时获得 @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍} 作为奖励专长。

entries.name: 耐久秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.usdv1eqvibmxun6x]{熊之坚韧}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{防护能量伤害}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ui70binwqvjsgaam]{法术免疫}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4k9bh8ny1il2oner]{法术抗力}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.irl69h8vnasfpak4]{Bear's Endurance, Mass}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.igmb8lisqcnsxd2d]{高等复原术}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术}

entries.name: 持久刀锋
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6

  效果：当魔战士使用【奥能力池】强化武器时，他可以额外花费一点奥能让强化的持续时间增加到每个魔战士等级一分钟。

entries.name: Enduring Earth
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 4; Burn 閳?/p>

  When using earth blasts, earth wild talents, or composite blasts that include earth, double the duration if it閳ユ獨 longer than 1 round.

entries.name: Enduring Ritual
entries.description:
As a swift action when you cast a spell with a duration of at least 1 minute per caster level, you can increase the spell閳ユ獨 effective caster level by 1 for the purpose of determining its duration and preventing attempts to dispel it. The effective caster level increases by an additional 1 for every 10 cleric levels you have (maximum +3). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Hand of the Acolyte power of the Arcane Domain.

entries.name: Enduring Toxin
entries.description:
The alchemist can alter the properties of a poison, causing it to persist longer in the victim閳ユ獨 body. Altering a dose of poison in the way takes 1 hour, requires the expenditure of raw materials worth half the poison閳ユ獨 market price, and exposes the alchemist to the poison, thereby affecting him if he is not immune. This doubles the poison閳ユ獨 maximum duration.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Enemies' Bane
entries.description:
As a swift action, the shaman imbues a single weapon she閳ユ獨 wielding with the bane weapon special ability, choosing the type of creature affected each time she does. The effect lasts for 1 minute. If the weapon already has the bane weapon special ability of the type chosen, the additional damage dealt by bane increases to 4d6.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Enemy Ground
entries.description:
The witch curses a target with clumsiness when in dangerous terrain. The target takes a 閳? penalty on Acrobatics checks to move over slippery or uneven surfaces and to avoid attacks of opportunity while moving through threatened squares. This effect lasts for 1 minute. On a successful Will save, the penalty is reduced by half and the duration is only 1 round.

  At 8th level, this penalty increases to 閳?.

entries.name: Energize Weapon Infusion
entries.description:
Element air, fire, void, water; Type form infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts blue flame, cold, electric, fire, negative
Saving Throw none

  Choose a manufactured weapon in your hand (not an unarmed strike or natural attack); if the weapon is a double weapon, you must choose one of its ends to receive this benefit. You imbue the chosen weapon with your elemental energy as part of an attack action, charge action, or full-attack action to add extra damage to each of your attacks with that weapon until the beginning of your next turn. Your attacks with the chosen weapon during that action deal 1d6 additional points of damage.

  At 7th level and every 6 levels thereafter, this bonus damage increases by 1d6 points.

  Blue flame blasts deal double this additional damage. The additional damage is of the same type as the infused blast閳ユ獨 damage. This additional damage ignores spell resistance and doesn閳ユ獩 apply any modifiers to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage (such as your Constitution modifier).

entries.name: Energy Absorbtion
entries.description: At 6th level, you gain an amount of energy absorption equal to 3 times your wizard level per day. Whenever you take energy damage, apply immunity, vulnerability (if any), and resistance first and apply the rest to this absorption, reducing your daily total by that amount. Any damage in excess of your absorption is applied to you normally.

entries.name: 能量吸收
entries.description: 当奥能师使用了【能量护盾】技艺，且此护盾阻止了10点或以上的伤害时，他可以吸收部分能量来为他的技艺供能。当吸收伤害后，他在使用任何造成能量伤害的技艺，且其能量类型与护盾吸收的能量相同时，他从【奥能源泉】中的消费降低1点。一分钟内还未使用的能量将会流失。奥能师每轮只能如此使用一份能量，且不能同时储存一份以上的能量。奥能师必须已有【能量护盾】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: Energy Absorption (UC)
entries.description:
Once per day, the barbarian can absorb the energy from a single attack that deals damage of the energy type she resists with the energy resistance rage power. She takes no damage from the attack and doesn閳ユ獩 attempt a saving throw. Instead, she increases the temporary hit points from her rage by an amount equal to 1/2 the damage she would have taken (ignoring her energy resistance).

  If the barbarian is at least 16th level, once before her rage ends, she can unleash the stored energy as a breath weapon in either a 60-foot line or a 30-foot cone. The breath weapon deals an amount of damage equal to the full amount the barbarian would have taken from the absorbed effect. Creatures affected by the breath weapon can attempt a Reflex save for half damage (DC = 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + her Constitution modifier).

  She retains the temporary hit points from this ability even if she unleashes this breath weapon.

  A barbarian must have the energy resistance rage power and be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Energy Attacks (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's attacks become charged with energy. Pick one energy type: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. All of the eidolon's natural attacks deal 1d6 points of energy damage of the chosen type on a successful hit.

  The summoner must be at least 5th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Energy Attacks (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 5th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 attacks become charged with energy. Select one energy type: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. All of the eidolon閳ユ獨 natural attacks deal 1d6 points of energy damage of the chosen type on a successful hit.

entries.name: Energy Blast
entries.description:
As a standard action that provokes attacks of opportunity, you can expend 2 points of mental focus to unleash a blast of energy. This blast has a range of 100 feet, and deals 5d6 points of energy damage, plus an additional 1d6 points for every 2 occultist levels you possess beyond 5th (6d6 at 7th, 7d6 at 9th, and so on, to a maximum of 12d6 at 19th level). The blast deals damage to each creature in a 20-foot-radius burst, but each affected creature can attempt a Reflex save to halve the damage. When you unleash an energy blast, you must decide what type of damage it deals (acid, cold, electricity, or fire).

  You must be at least 5th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: 能量盈身
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以将你的身体转化为纯净的生命之力，外观有如一个散发着白金火焰的火元素。在这个型态下，你获得元素亚种，同时散发出一圈温暖，舒适的光环，这可以将你10尺内的光照等级提升一级，最多达到正常光照（normal light）。任何不死生物用它的身躯或手持武器攻击你时，将受到“1d6+先知等级”点正能量伤害。使用长触及武器攻击你的不死生物将不会受到伤害。若你擒抱或用天生武器攻击不死生物，你可以用此伤害取代正常伤害。每轮1次，当你通过一个活体战友的方格，或着当活体战友通过你的方格时，他将恢复“1d6+先知等级”的生命值，你可以用一个移动等效动作对自己造成这个效果。当生物通过你的方格时，你可以选择要不要治疗对方。你可以用一个自由动作变回原形。你每天可以使用这个状态的轮数相当于你的先知等级。

entries.name: Energy Composite Blast
entries.description: Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies. Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts. Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st; energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

entries.name: 能量爆发
entries.description: 野蛮人能吸收一次攻击的能量伤害，并还给他的敌人。他不进行豁免，但不造成伤害。在他那次狂暴的任何时候，释放存储的能量进行60尺直线或30尺锥形的喷吐攻击。喷吐攻击的伤害等于野蛮人吸收的伤害，区域内生物可以通过DC为“10+1/2野蛮人等级+体质修正”的反射豁免使伤害减半，即使原来的效果不能豁免。野蛮人必须习得【能量吸收】且至少12级才能选择这个狂暴之力。这项能力每次狂暴只能使用1次。

entries.name: Energy Font
entries.description:
You can channel energy a number of times per day equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier. Choose whether you channel positive or negative energy each time you contact a hierophant spirit; this choice must match the spirit閳ユ獨 faith.

  If you choose positive energy, add cure spells of each level you can cast from the cleric list to your medium spell list and spells known. Otherwise, add inflict spells in the same way. These spells count as divine, as in the divine surge spirit power.

entries.name: Energy Kinetic Blade
entries.description:
Element(s) universal; Type form infusion; 等级 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You form a weapon using your kinetic abilities. You create a non-reach, light or one-handed weapon in your hand formed of pure energy or elemental matter. (If you閳ユ獧e a telekineticist, you instead transfer the power of your kinetic blast to any object held in one hand.) The kinetic blade閳ユ獨 shape is purely cosmetic and doesn閳ユ獩 affect the damage dice, critical threat range, or critical multiplier of the kinetic blade, nor does it grant the kinetic blade any weapon special features. The object held by a telekineticist for this form infusion doesn閳ユ獩 prevent her from using gather power.

  You can use this form infusion once as part of an attack action, a charge action, or a full-attack action in order to make melee attacks with your kinetic blade. Since it閳ユ獨 part of another action (and isn閳ユ獩 an action itself), using this wild talent doesn閳ユ獩 provoke any additional attacks of opportunity. The kinetic blade deals your kinetic blast damage on each hit (applying any modifiers to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage as normal, but not your Strength modifier). The blade disappears at the end of your turn. The weapon deals the same damage type that your kinetic blast deals, and it interacts with Armor Class and spell resistance as normal for a blast of its type. Even if a telekineticist uses this power on a magic weapon or another unusual object, the attack doesn閳ユ獩 use any of the magic weapon閳ユ獨 bonuses or effects and simply deals the telekineticist閳ユ獨 blast damage. The kinetic blade doesn閳ユ獩 add the damage bonus from elemental overflow.

entries.name: Energy Kinetic Blast
entries.description:
At 1st level, a kineticist gains a kinetic blast wild talent of her choice. This kinetic blast must be a simple blast that matches her element. Simple blasts are listed with their corresponding elements.

  As a standard action, the kineticist can unleash a kinetic blast at a single target up to a range of 30 feet. She must have at least one hand free to aim the blast (or one prehensile appendage, if she doesn閳ユ獩 have hands). All damage from a kinetic blast is treated as magic for the purpose of bypassing damage reduction. Kinetic blasts count as a type of weapon for the purpose of feats such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}. The kineticist is never considered to be wielding or gripping the kinetic blast (regardless of effects from form infusions; see Infusion), and she can閳ユ獩 use @Compendium[pf1.feats.26k1Gi7t5BoqxhIj]{要害打击} feats with kinetic blasts. Even the weakest kinetic blast involves a sizable mass of elemental matter or energy, so kinetic blasts always deal full damage to swarms of any size (though only area blasts deal extra damage to swarms). A readied kinetic blast can be used to counterspell any spell of equal or lower level that shares its descriptor. A kinetic blast that deals energy damage of any type (including force) has the corresponding descriptor.

  Each simple blast is either a physical blast or an energy blast.

  Physical blasts are ranged attacks that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6+1 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6+1 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st. Spell resistance doesn閳ユ獩 apply against physical blasts.

  Energy blasts are ranged touch attacks that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies. All composite blasts are listed after the kineticist elements.

  Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts.

  Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  Energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  • A complete listing of kinetic blasts and composite blasts can be found within the Kineticist Elements page, here: Kineticist Elements

entries.name: Energy Ray
entries.description:
As a standard action that provokes attacks of opportunity, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to unleash a ray of pure energy as a ranged touch attack. This ray has a range of 30 feet. The ray deals an amount of energy damage equal to 1d6 points + 1d6 points for every 2 occultist levels you possess beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd level, 3d6 at 5th, and so on, to a maximum of 10d6 at 19th level).

  When you unleash an energy ray, you must decide what type of damage it deals (acid, cold, electricity, or fire).

entries.name: 能量抵抗
entries.description: 选择一种能量类型（强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰或声波），狂暴时获得所选能量的抗力，点数等于野蛮人等级的一半（最小为1）。能量类型是选择这个狂暴之力时选定的且不能改变。这个狂暴之力可以选择多于1次，其效果不会叠加，每次适用于不同的能量类型。

entries.name: Energy Resistance (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian gains resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to 1/2 her barbarian level (minimum 1). At 8th level, she gains limited immunity to the same type of energy, as protection from energy. She can absorb 2 points of damage per level, and she applies her energy resistance first.

  The energy type is chosen when this rage power is selected, and it can閳ユ獩 be changed.

  This rage power can be selected more than once; each time, it applies to a different energy type.

entries.name: 高等能量抵抗
entries.description: 野蛮人可以减少一半他所抵抗的能量伤害（减少一半的伤害，然后再应用能量抵抗）。野蛮人必须习得【能量抵抗】且至少8级才能选择这个狂暴之力。这项能力每次狂暴只能使用1次。

entries.name: 能量护盾
entries.description: 以一个标准动作从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师可以保护他自己免受能量伤害。他选择一种能量类型，在每奥能师等级1分钟的时间内获得对此种能量10点抗力。每有5个奥能师等级，此抗力就增加5点（最高在20级时达到30）。

entries.name: Energy Ward
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to surround yourself in a swirling ward of energy. When you activate this power, you must select acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You gain resistance 10 against that energy type, and whenever a creature hits you with a melee weapon or natural weapon, that creature takes 1d6 points of energy damage of the chosen type. Attacks made with melee weapons with reach don閳ユ獩 cause the attacker to take this damage.

  At 13th and 19th levels, the resistance granted by this ward increases by 5, to a maximum of resistance 20 at 19th level.

  The energy ward lasts for 1 round per occultist level.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: Enervating Infusion
entries.description:
Element void; Type substance infusion; Level 7; Burn 4
Associated Blasts negative, void
Saving Throw Fortitude negates

  Your kinetic blast drains life force. Foes that take damage from your infused blast also take 1 temporary negative level. Negative levels from this infusion fade after 24 hours and never become permanent.

entries.name: Engulfing Winds
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

  You bend your winds into a formidable barrier. Until the start of your next turn, you lose the benefits of enveloping winds, but can create a wind wall as the spell.

  You can extend the wall閳ユ獨 duration to 1 round per kineticist level by accepting 1 point of burn.

entries.name: 强效药水
entries.description: 每日等同于他的智力修正的次数，炼金术师可以将一定数量的他饮用的药水的施法者等级替换为自己的职业等级。

entries.name: Enhance Venom
entries.description:
The barbarian adds her Constitution modifier to the DC of any poison she delivers using viper閳ユ獨 kiss or viper閳ユ獨 breath (see below).

  A barbarian must have viper閳ユ獨 breath and viper閳ユ獨 kiss to select this rage power.

entries.name: 强力治疗
entries.description: 当你施展一个治疗法术的时候，以你的先知等级，而不是法术提供的上限来决定额外的治疗加值。例如一个11级的先知施展“治疗轻伤”的时候，他将治疗“1d8+11”点伤害，而非“1d8+5”点。

entries.name: 强力治疗
entries.description: 当你施展一个治疗法术时，以你的萨满等级，而非法术提供的上限来决定额外治疗量。例如１１级萨满施展治疗轻伤，将治疗１ｄ８＋１１点，而非１ｄ８＋５。

entries.name: Enhanced Inflictions
entries.description: You recognize that harming your enemies is sometimes the only way to help your allies, and so your wrath is particularly fierce. Whenever you cast an inflict spell (a spell with the word 閳ユ笅nflict閳?in the name), the maximum amount of damage dealt by the spell is based on your oracle level, not the limit based on the spell. For example, an 11th-level oracle of succor with this revelation can cast inflict light wounds to deal 1d8+11 points of damage instead of the normal 1d8+5 maximum.

entries.name: Enhanced Senses
entries.description:
Your mind can process sensory stimuli with exceptional efficiency, awakening you to a world most humanoids cannot comprehend. You gain scent as per the universal monster rule. You can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool as a standard action to amplify your sense of smell, gaining blindsense with a range of 30 feet for 1 minute.

  At 11th level, your blindsense is continuously active, and you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool as a standard action to gain blindsight with a range of 30 feet for 1 minute.

entries.name: 增强学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 变化学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代变化学派的空间拳和改变形态能力。

entries.name: Enlarge
entries.description:
As a swift action you can enlarge yourself for 1 round, as if you were the target of the @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} spell. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Wooden Fist power of the Plant Domain.

entries.name: Enlightenment Discipline
entries.description:
Your quest for enlightenment has opened your eyes to new concepts and heights of spiritual awareness. You seek learning that allows you to evolve in mind and spirit, improving your next incarnation.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f9adpo6szijchpva]{Acute Senses} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.llxrra87kbofmyhl]{鉴定术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5wmn4airvkprv3gp]{Thoughtsense} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qr6qcx8zqum6jhc4]{赎罪术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ln4jpuurxbrfxw5j]{Arcane Sight, Greater} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y4881ol4t79wj7sf]{Circle Of Clarity} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0kppkhsencd6tzvh]{防护法术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (18th).

entries.name: Ensnare the Soul
entries.description: Your magic turns others into zombie-like servants. Add @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{支配人类} to your spell list. Creatures affected by either spell become listless and pale, appearing dead to observers (DC 20 Heal or Perception check to determine the creature is not undead). Affected creatures are slow to take any action unless you specifically direct them to do so. They are not mindless or helpless, however, and defend themselves if attacked.

entries.name: 蹒跚之刃*
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼在对一个目标近程攻击造成偷袭伤害时，直到盗贼的下一轮开始为止目标无法使用5尺快步。

entries.name: Entangling Curse
entries.description:
The shaman entangles a creature within 30 feet for a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier (minimum 1). A successful Reflex saving throw negates this effect.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: 纠缠灵质
entries.description: 1级开始，你能制造出一个灵质球，然后把它用力投向30尺内的敌人。这团灵质的作用如同绊足包，除了它对虚体生物也如常生效。这团灵质会在1d3轮后消失。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正值”。

entries.name: Entangling Infusion
entries.description:
Element earth, water, wood; Type substance infusion; 

  Level 2; Burn 2

  Associated Blasts blizzard, cold, earth, ice, magma, metal, mud, sandstorm

  Saving Throw Reflex negates

  Your kinetic blast surrounds your foes in elemental matter. Whenever a blast with this infusion deals damage to a foe, that foe becomes entangled for 1 minute. The foe can remove this condition as a standard action with a successful Escape Artist or Strength check (with the same DC as for saves against your kinetic blast) or by dealing an amount of damage to the entangling matter equal to double your kineticist level (the matter has hardness 0). If the foe was already entangled by this infusion and fails its save against a second instance of this infusion, the increased amount of elemental matter fuses to the ground, causing the foe to be rooted in place as though anchored to an immobile object.

entries.name: Entrancing Aura
entries.description:
At 8th level, you can emit an imperceptible 30-foot aura of distraction as a standard action for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive. Enemies within this aura take a 閳? penalty on Perception checks and are treated as though they had 2 fewer Hit Dice (minimum 1 Hit Die) for the purpose of your effects that would give them the fascinated condition. At 16th level, they are instead treated as if they had 3 fewer Hit Dice for such effects.

  This power replaces the Charming Smile power of the Charm Domain.

entries.name: Entrepeneur
entries.description: Select any one Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill other than Perception or Use Magic Device. The vigilante can use the selected skill to earn money as if he were using a Profession skill. If he selects Perform or Profession, the vigilante instead gains the skill unlock powers for those skills as appropriate for his number of ranks in that skill (Pathfinder RPG Pathfinder Unchained 82). If he has the social grace social talent, he can apply this benefit to all skills selected with the social grace talent.

entries.name: 极暗之渊
entries.description: 15级开始，你可以创造一个被Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术}所环绕的地区，你的视觉线不受这一地区影响。除你之外，所有处于这一区域内的生物都将处于纠缠状态（除非使用行动自如或者类似效果的能力）。

entries.name: 虚空缠身
entries.description: 萨满呼唤无尽虚空包裹目标。以一个标准动作，萨满可以使３０尺内某个目标所看到的光亮程度降低２级：强光降为微光，常光降为黑暗，微光和黑暗则会成为超自然黑暗（黑暗视觉无法看穿超自然黑暗）。该效果持续轮数为萨满等级。成功的意志豁免可以避免该效果。无论成功与否，目标２４小时内无法再次成为该巫术目标。

entries.name: Enveloping Winds
entries.description:
Element air; Type defense (Su); 等级 閳? Burn 0

  You constantly surround yourself with a whirling torrent of air, crackling arcs of lightning, or both to protect yourself from ranged attacks. All ranged attacks made with physical weapons suffer a 20% miss chance against you, except for attacks from massive weapons such as a giant閳ユ獨 thrown boulder or a ballista. This ability has no effect on ray attacks.

  The miss chance increases by 5% for every 5 kineticist levels you possess beyond 2nd. By accepting 1 point of burn, you can increase the miss chance by 5% until the next time your burn is removed. You can continue to accept points of burn to increase the miss chance further, up to a maximum of 75%.

  Whenever you accept burn while using an air wild talent, the energy surging through you causes your enveloping winds to also affect non-physical ranged attacks such as ray attacks for 1 round. You can dismiss or restore this effect as an immediate action.

entries.name: Environmental Weapon
entries.description:
When the vigilante gains this talent, he must select one type of terrain from the ranger閳ユ獨 list of favored terrains. While in this terrain, as a swift action the vigilante can find an improvised weapon if there are any loose or moveable objects around (subject to the GM閳ユ獨 discretion). He doesn閳ユ獩 take a penalty for using these improvised weapons. For example, if the vigilante selected the urban environment, he might attack a foe with a chair, an empty bottle, or even a door.

  At 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th levels, the vigilante can select an additional type of terrain.

entries.name: 抹销时空
entries.description: 以一个近战接触攻击，你可以把一个生物从多元宇宙的时轴中暂时抹除。目标必须通过一个强韧检定否则彻底消失，持续轮数相当于你先知等级的一半（最少1轮）。在这段时间里任何魔法或是神术效果都没办法找到受术者——实际上，此生物在这个时空之中存在可能性已经被暂时抹去。在效果结束的时候，此生物将会在他之前占据的空间里面出现。如果格子已经被占据，则在旁边任何可能的格子中出现。你每天可以使用此能力1次，11级的时候额外1次。

entries.name: Erosion Curse
entries.description:
The shaman summons the powers of nature to erode a construct or object within 30 feet. This erosion deals 1d6 points of damage per 2 shaman levels, ignoring hardness and damage reduction. If used against a construct or an object in another creature閳ユ獨 possession, the construct or the creature possessing the object can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage.

  Once an object or a construct is damaged by this erosion, it cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: 侵蚀之触
entries.description: 以一个近战接触攻击，你可以对一个物品或构装体造成每先知等级1d6的伤害。如果此能力被用来攻击由一个由其他人所持有的物品，则将之当做击破武器战技处理。你每天可以使用1次侵蚀之触，每3级再加1次。

entries.name: 迷离冲锋
entries.description: 在以一个整轮动作对一个距离他至少20尺远的生物发动冲锋攻击时，野蛮人可以在进行冲锋前向任何方向移动5尺距离。这个行动不视为一次5尺快步并会如常触发藉机攻击，并且，它会使野蛮人可以冲锋的距离减少10尺。

entries.name: 高等迷离冲锋
entries.description: 野蛮人现在可以通过迷离冲锋进行10尺移动，这样做要求他冲锋的目标生物距离他至少20尺远并且这会使他可以冲锋的距离减少20尺。野蛮人必须达到8级并拥有迷离冲锋狂暴之力才能选择本狂暴之力。

entries.name: Erupt
entries.description:
As a swift action, you cause flaming shards of rock to erupt from your body. These shards deal 1d6 points of damage per 2 oracle levels (minimum 1d6) to all creatures in a 10-foot-radius burst (Reflex half ). Half of this damage is fire damage and the other half is piercing damage. The shards create difficult terrain for 1 round.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter.

entries.name: Eruption Infusion
entries.description:
Element fire; Type form infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts blue flame, fire, magma, steam
Saving Throw Reflex half

  Your kinetic blast erupts from the ground in a pillar centered anywhere within 120 feet of you. The pillar affects all creatures and objects in a 10-foot-radius cylinder that extends 40 feet above the ground. An energy blast infused with eruption deals its normal damage to each target, while a physical blast deals half its normal amount of damage. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

entries.name: 逃脱绝技
entries.description: 具有该项天赋的盗贼能够以直觉动作，使用逃脱检定来替代可能会使其陷入纠缠（entangled）状态的反射豁免检定。此外每日1次，当盗贼成为擒抱战技的目标时，具有该项天赋的盗贼能够以直觉动作尝试逃脱检定，使用技能检定的结果替代她的CMD来对抗此次战技。盗贼每具有5个盗贼等级，每日便能多使用该能力1次。盗贼必须在逃脱技能上受训才能选取该项盗贼天赋。

entries.name: 施法免材
entries.description: 4级起，血脉狂怒者获得施法免材作为奖励专长。

entries.name: 学者密传
entries.description: 每日1次，拥有此天赋的盗贼可以进行一次他并没有受训的知识检定，得到如同受过训一般的结果。

entries.name: Esoteric Scholar (UC)
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can attempt any Knowledge skill check, even if she is not trained in that Knowledge skill.

替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k3a8fr763ejcm4gl]{Anonymous Interaction}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wek2dovt5lf9twu2]{静默之域}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障}

entries.name: Essence of Fire
entries.description: At 20th level, you become immune to fire damage. In addition, your bloodrager damage reduction increases by 5. If you don閳ユ獩 have bloodrager damage reduction, you gain DR 10/magic instead. You have these benefits constantly, even while you are not bloodraging.

entries.name: 永恒殉难者
entries.description: 20级起，你祖先的殉难行为注入了你的精魂。你变得免疫死亡效果（death effects）。将你复活的法术与效果（比如死者复活[raise dead]或者复生术[resurrection]）所需要的材料成分的价值减半。你的尸体无法被转化为不死生物，就如同你受到永久的@Compendium[pf1.spells.vxmp5prgw5fj4h6f]{圣居}效果影响一般（施法者等级等同于你的术士等级）。

entries.name: Eternal Opposition
entries.description:
Samsaran only.

  While most imperial dragons, undead, and other long-enduring foes can count on outlasting their mortal adversaries, the samsaran slayer has pledged to oppose their machinations across all his lifetimes. When his studied target is of the dragon, fey, outsider, or undead type, the slayer gains a +2 insight bonus to his AC against its attacks and on saving throws against its abilities.

entries.name: Eternal Past
entries.description: At 15th level, you gain an immersive mindscape. This functions as a permanent @Compendium[pf1.spells.c14tjrds5emxk417]{Create Mindscape, Greater} spell, except it must appear as a lost civilization, and you do not target any other creatures when the mindscape is created. You can open a conduit to your mindscape as a standard action at will (per the mindscape door spell), allowing you or other creatures to enter or leave. The mindscape is only as detailed as your knowledge of the lost civilization but still holds valuable secrets. The mindscape functions as a library for all 知识skills; while within your mindscape, you can spend 1d4 hours researching to use a @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：历史 check in place of any other 知识check.

entries.name: 永恒药水
entries.description: 如果一个炼金术师饮用了一份他延时处理过的药水，这份药水的效果可以永久保持，除非他选择另一份永恒药水来替换效果。选择这一科研发现需要16级炼金术师等级，且已学会“延时药水”。

entries.name: 永眠
entries.description: .  女巫能够经由一次触碰就让一名生物陷入永久的沉睡。目标生物可以通过成功的意志豁免令其无效。若豁免失败，生物陷入睡眠并且无法被唤醒。只有‘祈愿术’或者类似的法术才能解除“永眠”，不过杀死女巫也会中止此巫术。女巫可以通过此能力为饮食下毒，而摄取该饮食的生物同样需要通过意志豁免或永久陷入沉睡。女巫在同一时间只能对一份食物下毒，且咒毒会在未被食用的1分钟后失效。无论豁免成功与否，该生物在1天内都不会再次成为此巫术的目标。

entries.name: 返老还童
entries.description: 炼金术师重获青春。如果他之前因老化而损失了肉体属性，那他现在将恢复这些属性；而且他将不用再担心因年龄增长而损失肉体属性。

entries.name: Etheric Tether
entries.description:
At 1st level, a spiritualist can force the phantom to manifest in an area around her by pushing the phantom閳ユ獨 consciousness though the veil of ethereal essence, allowing it to fully manifest in either ectoplasmic or incorporeal form. Whenever her manifested phantom takes enough damage to send it back to the Ethereal Plane, as a reaction to the damage, the spiritualist can sacrifice any number of her hit points without using an action. Each hit point sacrificed in this way prevents 1 point of damage dealt to the phantom. This can prevent the phantom from being sent back to the Ethereal Plane.

This tether is limited. When the phantom is fully manifested, it and the spiritualist must remain within 50 feet of one another for the phantom閳ユ獨 manifestation to stay stable with little to no concentration on the part of the spiritualist. The spiritualist can stretch the limited tether, but only when the phantom is in ectoplasmic form. When a spiritualist starts her turn and her ectoplasmic phantom is more than 50 feet away from her (but closer than 100 feet), the spiritualist must concentrate on the link as a full-round action that provokes attacks of opportunity or the ectoplasmic phantom immediately returns to the Ethereal Plane and cannot be summoned from that plane for 24 hours. This concentration can be interrupted as if it were a spell. Treat this effect閳ユ獨 spell level as equal to 1 + 1 per 10 feet farther than 50 feet that the phantom is from the spiritualist (maximum spell level 6th). If the tether is interrupted or the check fails, the phantom immediately snaps back into the consciousness of its spiritualist master.

If the ectoplasmic phantom is ever more than 100 feet away from its spiritualist, or the incorporeal phantom is ever 50 feet away from the spiritualist or outside of line of effect from the spiritualist for more than 1 round per spiritualist level the spiritualist possesses, the tether is automatically broken; the phantom immediately returns to the Ethereal Plane and can閳ユ獩 be summoned from that plane for 24 hours.

entries.name: 忍法·无常步
entries.description: 忍者可以以高超的敏捷避开魔法和特殊攻击。她在对抗若通过反射检定可以减少一半伤害的攻击时，通过检定则不会受到伤害。只有在穿戴轻甲或不穿甲时才可以使用本忍术。无助状态下的忍者不能获得本忍术的收益。

entries.name: 忍法·无常步
entries.description: 忍者可以以高超的敏捷避开魔法和特殊攻击。她在对抗若通过反射检定可以减少一半伤害的攻击时，通过检定则不会受到伤害。只有在穿戴轻甲或不穿甲时才可以使用本忍术。无助状态下的忍者不能获得本忍术的收益。

entries.name: Evasive
entries.description:
The vigilante is hard to catch with area attacks. He gains the evasion ability, and at 12th level, he gains the improved evasion ability.

  Only a stalker vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: Everyman
entries.description:
The vigilante can take on the appearance of a specific individual whenever he assumes a mundane guise using his many guises social talent. The individual must be a farmer, laborer, or peasant. While disguised as this individual, the vigilante receives a +20 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks to appear as that individual. Any spell or ability designed to locate the individual has a 50% chance of finding the vigilante instead of the actual individual, and divination spells and abilities used on the vigilante give results as if he were the actual individual. Although this doesn閳ユ獩 grant the vigilante any special knowledge of the individual, the vigilante閳ユ獨 training grants him a +10 circumstance bonus on Bluff checks to properly play the part of the individual.

  A vigilante must be at least 11th level and have the many guises social talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 战斗伙伴
entries.description: 在10级时，用一个标准动作，你可以召唤一个战斗伙伴。这个能力作用等同于四级召唤怪物的效果，持续时间为1分钟。这个能力只能召唤1个邪恶异界生物或是一个拥有炼狱生物简单模板（Fiendish Creature）的动物，无论使用何种列表。10级之后每2级，召唤怪物的法术都会提高1环，最高在20级变为九级召唤怪物。

entries.name: 不洁打击
entries.description: 在1级时，用一个标准动作，你可以通过触摸一件近战武器给予其混乱祝福。在1分钟内，这件武器会变成黑色、橙色或蓝紫色，并对善良阵营的生物造成1D6额外伤害，在克服伤害减免时视为邪恶阵营。这个额外伤害不与邪恶（Unholy）武器特性叠加。

entries.name: 邪恶领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你凶恶而残忍，你的灵魂已经出卖给了邪恶之源。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.71g6nmvy8qnodwyz]{防护善良}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zujht80bgjdk9cyb]{阵营武器} (限邪恶)
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ym1we9ko60qcvn4t]{反善良法阵}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.okui7mft5bquqfrg]{邪影击}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xgv1e2ayf1e0br9j]{反制善良}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c1e7f0ct04k270wy]{唤起死灵}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.baocube6vvey9zlc]{渎神之语}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{邪恶灵光}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{召唤怪物 IX} (限邪恶)

entries.name: 邪眼
entries.description: .  女巫能够引发距离她30尺内、并且她所能看见的敌人心中的迷惘。目标的以下一项数据遭受-2减值（由女巫选择）：AC、属性、攻击、豁免或技能检定。此巫术持续轮数为“3+智力修正”，成功的意志豁免可以将其减至1轮。这是一项〔影响心灵〕的效果。8级时，此能力给予的减值提升至-4。

entries.name: Evil Eye (BLO)
entries.description: At 1st level, you can curse an opponent with a wicked glance. As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet that you can see, causing it to take a 閳? penalty to AC and on attack rolls for 1 round per class level or until the target hits you with an attack. The target can negate this effect with a successful Will saving throw (DC = 10 + half your bloodrager level + your Charisma modifier). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 邪眼
entries.description: 萨满能够引发距离她３０尺内、并且她所能看见的敌人心中的迷惘。目标的以下一项数据遭受－２减值（由萨满选择）：属性检定、ＡＣ、攻击检定、豁免检定或技能检定。此巫术持续轮数为３＋萨满的感知调整值，成功的意志豁免可以将它降低至１轮。８级时，此能力给予的减值变为－４。这是一个影响心灵的效果。

entries.name: Evocation Resonant School
entries.description:
Implements focused on evocation grant the ability to create and direct energy to protect and to destroy.

Implements: Gloves, rod, staff, wand.

entries.name: 塑能学派
entries.description: 塑能师陶醉于赤裸裸的魔法力量，并且能够无比轻松地进行创造和毁灭。

entries.name: Evolving Aspect
entries.description: At 8th level, you gain Aspect of the Beast as a bonus feat even if you don閳ユ獩 meet the prerequisites. As normal for the feat, you must choose one of the manifestations, and you gain its benefits even while not bloodraging. When you enter a bloodrage, you can choose a second manifestation to affect you simultaneously for the duration of your bloodrage.

entries.name: 禁言令
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次，你可以以一个标准动作迫使一个30尺内的生物陷入沉默。目标通过一个DC=10+你的审判者等级的一半+你的感知调整值的意志检定可以免除其影响，在豁免检定上失败的生物可以在一轮后重复该豁免检定。如果在第二次豁免检定上也失败，该生物就会在1天内无法说话，无法施放带有声音成分的法术，无法使用基于语言的效果，也不能书写，打手势或是以任何方法和他人正常沟通，最多只能表示肯定和否定。

entries.name: 裁决：绝罚
entries.description: 神授力量: 你强大的人格为你的主神所青睐。在教会中，你是极少数握有将危险的异端和败类的影响完全压制之权柄的特使。

entries.name: Execution Inquisition
entries.description: 神授力量: Your deity guides you when you deliver death to your chosen targets.

entries.name: Executioner's Strike
entries.description: At 8th level, your precision in combat has become incredible, and you can strike a lethal blow if your target cannot defend itself properly. Once per day, you can make an attack as a standard action against your chosen victim. If the attack hits and the victim is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC against you, any critical threats are automatically confirmed.

entries.name: Exoskeleton
entries.description: As a swift action, you can grow an exoskeleton that grants you a +1 enhancement bonus to your natural armor and 1d4 temporary hit points + 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have. The natural armor bonus increases by 1 for every 5 cleric levels you have. The exoskeleton retracts after 1 round, ending its benefits. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Expanded Awareness
entries.description:
As a move action, you can focus on your senses and gain one of the following sensory abilities: blindsense (10 feet), darkvision (30 feet), low-light vision, or scent. This new sense lasts for 1 round per psychic level. 

  At 11th level, you can use expanded awareness to gain see in darkness or thoughtsense (20 feet).

  At 15th level, you can use it to gain lifesense.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Expanded Defense
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 4; Burn 閳?/p>

  Choose an element you selected with expanded element. You gain that element閳ユ獨 defense wild talent. You can take this wild talent multiple times, choosing a different element each time.

entries.name: Expanded Element
entries.description:
At 7th level, a kineticist learns to use another element or expands her understanding of her own element. She can choose any element, including her primary element. She gains one of that element閳ユ獨 simple blast wild talents that she does not already possess, if any. She also gains all composite blast wild talents whose prerequisites she meets, as well as the basic wild talent of her chosen expanded element (for instance, basic aerokinesis if she chooses air). She doesn閳ユ獩 gain the defense wild talent of the expanded element.

If the kineticist閳ユ獨 expanded element is different from her primary element, she treats her kineticist level as 4 levels lower for the purpose of determining which wild talents she can learn from her expanded element.

If the kineticist chooses to expand her understanding of an element she already has, she gains an additional utility wild talent or infusion of her choice from that element, as if from her infusion or wild talent class feature, as appropriate.

At 15th level, the kineticist can either select a new element or expand her understanding of her original element. She can閳ユ獩 select the same element she selected at 7th level unless it is her primary element. She gains all the benefits from her new expanded element as listed above. However, if the kineticist selected her primary element as her expanded element at both 7th and 15th levels, her mastery of that element increases. For wild talents of her element, the kineticist gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls, as well as to caster level and DCs.

entries.name: 发散灵感
entries.description: 作为更加专业的人士，调查员可以在已受训的交涉、察觉、医疗、专业和察言观色技能检定上使用灵感能力而无需花费灵感点数。

entries.name: Experience Across Ages
entries.description:
Samsaran only.

  Once per day, a samsaran slayer can draw upon insights from his previous lifetimes to help identify a foe or recall a key piece of information. As a swift action, the slayer can attempt a Knowledge check as if he had a number of ranks in the appropriate Knowledge skill equal to his slayer level.

  A slayer can use this talent one additional time per day for every 5 slayer levels he has.

entries.name: 擒拿大师
entries.description: 2级时，只要他有绳子，骑将可以捆绑一个被擒抱的对手，即便那个对手并没有被压制、以其他方式束缚住或陷入无助，而且他不用在尝试这样做的战技检定中承担通常的-10减值。当判断被骑将捆绑的逃脱DC时，骑将的CMB增加等于骑将职业等级的1/2的加值。

entries.name: Expert Cypher
entries.description: A rogue with this ability can attempt a Linguistics check to decipher a single page of text as a full-round action instead of taking 1 minute as normal. In addition, when the rogue attempts a Use Magic Device check to cast a spell from a scroll, she is treated as though she had the minimum score in the appropriate ability score to cast that spell. Finally, the rogue can choose to add her Intelligence modifier to her Use Magic Device skill checks instead of her Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 平步登天
entries.description: 当进行跳跃检定时，盗贼一直被视为处于助跑状态。此外，如果盗贼从高空坠落，她可以通过一个DC15的特技动作检定来忽视起始的20尺高度，而非通常的10尺。

entries.name: Expert Leaper (UC)
entries.description: When using the Acrobatics skill to jump, a rogue with this talent is always considered to have a running start and adds her rogue level to the check result. Whenever she deliberately falls, a successful DC 15 Acrobatics check allows her to ignore the first 20 feet fallen. For every 5 by which she exceeds the DC of this check, she can ignore an additional 10 feet of distance fallen.

entries.name: 驯兽专家
entries.description: 4级时，骑将学会以卓越的技术和速度训练坐骑。当骑将对作为坐骑的动物使用驯养动物技能时，他获得等同于骑将等级一半的加值。此外，他可以将教会一匹坐骑新把戏、或训练一匹坐骑的时间缩短，每周可缩短一天，但是会令DC+5。他也可以同时训练多个坐骑，第1个之外的每个坐骑的DC会累加2。

entries.name: Exploit Weakness
entries.description: At 14th level, the inquisitor learns to take advantage of any opportunity that presents itself. Whenever the inquisitor scores a critical hit, she ignores any damage reduction the target might have. In addition, if the target has regeneration, the creature loses regeneration on the round following the critical hit and can die normally during that round. Creatures whose regeneration always functions are immune to this ability. Finally, if the inquisitor deals energy damage to a creature with vulnerability to that energy type, she deals +1 point of damage per die rolled.

entries.name: 探索子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pysrx5kxfjvsjjsi]{脚底抹油}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vl2mznu91c3efcam]{生物定位术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.refg1teqkrdtxllg]{世界波}

entries.name: 探索七海
entries.description: 在15级时，骑将获得压力适应（参见58页）作为奖励专长，并将两个海洋区域加入他的天生范围而不是一个。在探索一片水下的新地点的时候，他在先攻检定和察觉检定上获得+2士气加值，并永远能在突袭轮中行动。

entries.name: Explosion Infusion
entries.description:
Element fire; Type form infusion; Level 7; Burn 4
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts blue flame, fire
Saving Throw Reflex half

  You focus your energy on a point in space and create a controlled explosion. You can center the explosion anywhere within 120 feet of you, and you can choose the radius of the spread to be 5, 10, 15, or 20 feet. All creatures and objects within the explosion take your blast閳ユ獨 damage. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

entries.name: 高爆炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师的炼金炸弹现在的溅射范围从5尺增加到10尺。受到炼金炸弹伤害的生物将会燃烧，每轮受到1d6点火焰伤害直到火焰熄灭为止。熄灭火焰是一个整轮动作而且需要通过反射检定，在地上打滚会使反射豁免+2，或者你可以用至少2加仑的水来直接熄灭火焰。

entries.name: Explosive Calligraphy
entries.description:
The alchemist can create especially volatile pigments that detonate when agitated. This requires expending one daily use of his bombs, but otherwise functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4ywdvsm1oty8blq]{爆裂符文} except that it deals damage as one of the alchemist閳ユ獨 bombs. The alchemist can expend an additional daily use of his bombs to apply one discovery that applies to his bombs, such as acid bomb or dispelling bomb, to the runes created with this discovery.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 爆裂飞弹
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，炼金术师可以将炸弹的威力灌注到箭、弩矢、单手火器的子弹中，装填那个弹药并且做一次远程攻击。他必须熟练该武器才有办法使用此能力。当弹药击中他的目标，弹药将造成正常伤害，并且附带炸弹伤害。如果爆裂飞弹没有击中目标，那么炸弹将不会引爆。炼金术师必须达到4级才能选择此科研发现。

entries.name: Expose Weaknesses
entries.description: The vigilante is able to use sneaky tricks to make it easier to damage a foe, whether it is throwing a bit of fine dust of cold iron over a fey creature or melting a glob of silver onto a lycanthrope閳ユ獨 hide. The vigilante can add the ability to reduce a creature閳ユ獨 damage reduction or hardness by 10 to the list of options when attempting a dirty trick combat maneuver check (Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 320). This does not stack with itself, and it does not work against creatures with DR/閳?

entries.name: 延时药水
entries.description: 每日等同于他的智力修正的次数，炼金术师可以增幅任一他饮用的非立即/瞬时效果的药水，使它产生两倍于原来的效用时间。这项科研发现不能应用在炼金化合药剂上。

entries.name: 延迟幻像
entries.description: 任何你施展的持续时间为“专注”的法术，将在你停止保持专注后额外持续法师等级一半的轮数（至少1轮）。在20级时，你能够使一个持续时间为“专注”的幻像无限持续。你在同一时间内只能拥有一个无限持续幻像。如果你指定另一个幻像为无限持续，则前一个幻像立刻结束。

entries.name: Extended Range Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  Your kinetic blast can strike any target within 120 feet.

entries.name: Extinguishing Strike
entries.description: When a rogue with this talent hits a creature with a melee attack that deals sneak attack damage, any nonmagical light sources worn or carried by the creature (such as lit torches, lanterns, or sunrods) are automatically extinguished. Once per day, the rogue can use this ability to also attempt a dispel check (as per dispel magic) against any magical sources of light a target carries, using her rogue level as the caster level.

entries.name: Extra Earthcraft
entries.description: The rogue gains 2 additional earthcraft points each day. The rogue must have the earthcraft ability to select this talent.

entries.name: Extra Feat (2 pts)
entries.description:
The eidolon gains an extra feat. It must meet the prerequisites of the feat. 

  A Summoner must have the Twinned Summoner archetype in order to select this evolution.

entries.name: Extra Feat (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Twinned eidolon.

  The eidolon gains an extra feat. It must meet the prerequisites of the feat.

entries.name: Extradimension Subschool
entries.description:
相关学派： Conjuration.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the summoner閳ユ獨 charm power of the conjuration school.

entries.name: Extreme Range Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  Your kinetic blast can strike any target within 480 feet.

entries.name: 以眼还眼
entries.description: 在8等时，骑士会获得重击专攻（Critical Focus）做为奖励专长。骑士可以使用战术能力，授予她的盟友一个重击专长（取代一个团队专长）。

entries.name: 索莫斯之眼
entries.description: 15级开始，你可以从精神方面观察外界，就如同使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.fmuea6pmgrylbux7]{秘法眼}一般。此外，你可以选择显现秘法眼，这一状态下秘法眼无法被移除，所有看到这一状态秘法眼的生物将如同受到@Compendium[pf1.spells.0khn0u6nd4fat6wb]{睡眠徽记}法术影响。你每日可以使用1次此能力。

entries.name: Eye of the Moon
entries.description: Your connection to the moon makes you supernaturally perceptive. You gain darkvision to a range of 60 feet. At 11th level, as a standard action, you can focus on a specific object or area (the size of which can be no greater than a 10-foot-by-10-foot square) and see it as though with true seeing as long as the moon is shining on it. Moonless nights, cloudy skies, and shadows interfere with this ability.

entries.name: 战斗心眼
entries.description: 萨满的感官在火热的战斗中会变得更加敏锐。以一个迅捷动作，萨满在用察觉技能定位３０尺内的隐形单位时，察觉检定获得＋１０洞察加值。或者，萨满可以用迅捷动作在下一轮结束前的下一次攻击时忽视掩蔽和半掩蔽（不包括全掩蔽）的效果。该能力每日使用次数为她的萨满等级。

entries.name: 黑暗之眼
entries.description: 在8级，你的视力不会受到照明条件的限制。即便是在绝对黑暗和魔法黑暗里，你依然能使用此能力牧师等级一半的轮数，不需要是连续的。

entries.name: 鹰眼
entries.description: 你的察觉技能获得等于你牧师等级一半的种族加值（最少+1）。此外，如你能在突袭轮中行动，先攻检定获得+2种族加值。此能力替换动物领域的动物交谈能力。

entries.name: 贼眼
entries.description: 每天一次以一个整轮动作，你可以召来一只精魂老鼠，鸽子或是类似的小生物，指令执行较弱的精魂作为你的眼线鸟瞰城市的街道或是探索城市的地下——这个效果相当于法术秘法眼。在10级时，你可以同时召唤多只这种精魂，如同法术窥视魔眼（Prying Eyes）的效果。在15级时，本能力提升为法术高等窥视魔眼的效果。

entries.name: Eyes of the Void
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 閳?/p>

  You gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet (if you already have darkvision, your darkvision閳ユ獨 range increases by 30 feet).

entries.name: Eyes of the Void, Greater
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Su); Level 5; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite eyes of the void

  You can see in darkness, as per the monster special ability.

entries.name: 泯然众人
entries.description: 你在潜行检定上获得+4加值，并且当你处于人群中时，可以在被人注视的情况下尝试潜行。

entries.name: 泯然众人
entries.description: 你在潜行检定上获得+4加值，并且当你处于人群中时，可以在被人注视的情况下尝试潜行。

entries.name: Faith Discipline
entries.description:
Your belief in a higher power fuels your psychic abilities. Whether your mental abilities truly come to you as a divine gift or are simply enhanced by the power of your belief, none can say. In many ways, you resemble a divine caster, and prayers often factor into your casting of psychic spells.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.avofn5q2v0f0qxjy]{灵能武器} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.io8sg720zjd0tdj2]{信仰戍卫} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{通神术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.21yha04trfhj0ehd]{心智手术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0wamdkl9gp19l55w]{高等异界盟友} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术} (18th).

entries.name: Faith-Stealing Strike
entries.description: You can make a single melee attack using your highest base attack bonus against a creature capable of casting divine spells. If you damage the creature, it must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier) or be unable to cast any divine spells for 1 round. If you do not damage your target with the attack, this ability is expended with no effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: 忠贞战骑
entries.description: 在8级时，每当你启动自己的审判职业能力，你的坐骑就能同时获得你启动的审判的其中一种的好处。在16级时，当你启动审判职业能力时，你的坐骑可以获得两个审判的好处。

entries.name: Faked Death
entries.description: The subject appears to die, but actually can stealthily move about. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject is damaged by an attack. The subject seems to fall down dead (as programmed image), but actually turns invisible (as invisibility) for a number of rounds equal to the mesmerist閳ユ獨 level or until she attacks. Once the subject becomes visible again, the illusory dead body disappears. These are illusion effects, and a creature that interacts with the false body can attempt a saving throw to disbelieve the effect. The false body is a figment; the invisibility is a glamer.

entries.name: Falcon
entries.description:
The falcon senses all and has the speed to hunt down even the most elusive prey. Those who take this aspect gain enhanced abilities to perceive and reconnoiter the wilderness閳ユ攳ittle escapes this shifter閳ユ獨 attention.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Perception checks.

  This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Small falcon (see page 179). While in this form, you gain a base speed of 30 feet, a bite attack (1d4 damage), two claw attacks (1d3 damage), a fly speed of 60 feet (good), low-light vision, and a +4 racial bonus on vision-based Perception checks.

  At 8th level, you gain darkvision with a range of 120 feet, and your racial bonus on Perception checks increases to +6.

  At 15th level, you gain blindsense with a range of 60 feet and your fly speed increases to 90 feet (perfect).

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), talon (S)

entries.name: Falcon Aspect
entries.description:
The falcon senses all and has the speed to hunt down even the most elusive prey. Those who take this aspect gain enhanced abilities to perceive and reconnoiter the wilderness閳ユ攳ittle escapes this shifter閳ユ獨 attention.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Perception checks.

  This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Small falcon (see page 179). While in this form, you gain a base speed of 30 feet, a bite attack (1d4 damage), two claw attacks (1d3 damage), a fly speed of 60 feet (good), low-light vision, and a +4 racial bonus on vision-based Perception checks.

  At 8th level, you gain darkvision with a range of 120 feet, and your racial bonus on Perception checks increases to +6.

  At 15th level, you gain blindsense with a range of 60 feet and your fly speed increases to 90 feet (perfect).

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), talon (S)

entries.name: False Attacker
entries.description: Whenever the rogue strikes a foe from hiding, she can attempt a Bluff check as an immediate action (opposed by the target閳ユ獨 Sense Motive or Perception check, whichever has a higher bonus) before rolling damage to convince the foe that another creature was the attacker. This Bluff check applies the normal modifiers for convincing a creature of a falsehood, but can be accomplished with just physical trickery (a shared language is not required). If the Bluff is successful, and the rogue maintains concealment or cover, the rogue閳ユ獨 stealth does not end.

entries.name: False Face
entries.description: Like oni who take mortal shapes to infiltrate society, some ninjas can mold their flesh to pass unsuspected. A ninja with this trick gains the change shape (any Small or Medium humanoid, @Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}) universal monster rule as long as she has at least 1 ki point.

entries.name: False Flanker
entries.description:
A duplicate of the mesmerist appears momentarily, as though he were fighting in tandem with the subject. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject moves into or begins her turn in a square where she threatens an enemy. An illusory duplicate of the mesmerist appears in any unoccupied space adjacent to that enemy. This duplicate counts as threatening the enemy for the purposes of determining flanking, but can閳ユ獩 actually make attacks.

  The duplicate disappears at the end of the turn during which the trick is triggered. This is an illusion (figment) effect, and a creature that interacts with the false flanker can attempt a saving throw to disbelieve the effect.

entries.name: 虚假老友
entries.description: 拥有这一绝技的盗贼可以说服自己从未见过或者是不认识自己的人他们关系很好，或者很了解对方，盗贼在这方面的唬骗检定获得+4加值。

entries.name: False Hospitality
entries.description:
The witches of Iblydos are known for greeting travelers with warmth only to reveal their powers once their enemies have lowered their defenses.

  A witch can use this hex to gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.7c8nufdm0pj4bgep]{花言巧语} with a caster level equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. This hex can be used once per day.

entries.name: False Spellcaster
entries.description: The investigator can modify her extracts to be delivered as oils she can apply covertly to her skin. She can fake verbal or somatic components as she uses an extract this way to trick observers into thinking she cast a spell to produce the extract閳ユ獨 effect. She attempts a Bluff check to determine how convincing the ruse is. If observers attempt to determine the spell she is casting, those who succeed at a Spellcraft check opposed by her Bluff check realize the truth. Whether or not an observer recognizes what is going on, the DC to identify the effect of the extract is equal to 20 + the extract閳ユ獨 spell level. If the investigator has the infusion alchemist discovery, she can deliver her infusions with a range of touch, but the hint of residue grants targets a +2 bonus on the opposed Spellcraft check to realize she is not truly casting spells.

entries.name: 魔宠
entries.description: 选取此技艺的奥能师获得一个魔宠，如同法师的【奥术连结】职业特性，在决定魔宠的属性和能力时，将奥能师等级视作法师等级。若奥能师从其他职业获得了魔宠，在决定魔宠的属性和能力时，将奥能师等级与该职业等级叠加（此能力与血统升华技艺所获得的魔宠不能叠加，他只能选取其中一个）。

entries.name: 魔宠（魔战士）
entries.description: The magus gains a familiar, using his magus level as his effective wizard level. This familiar follows the rules for familiars presented in the arcane bond wizard class feature.

entries.name: 魔宠
entries.description: 选取此技艺的奥能师获得一个魔宠，如同法师的【奥术连结】职业特性，在决定魔宠的属性和能力时，将奥能师等级视作法师等级。若奥能师从其他职业获得了魔宠，在决定魔宠的属性和能力时，将奥能师等级与该职业等级叠加（此能力与血统升华技艺所获得的魔宠不能叠加，他只能选取其中一个）。

entries.name: 家族子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6orhthk4g27rncuu]{安定心神}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qn947hen3wrelxhz]{造粮术}

entries.name: Fan of Flames Infusion
entries.description:
Element fire; Type form infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts blue flame, fire
Saving Throw Reflex half

  Your kinetic blast extends in a fan of flames, damaging all creatures and objects in a 15-foot cone. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

entries.name: Fantastic Stride
entries.description:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.ugQyUpqPBDsqLyra]{跳跃攻击} as a bonus feat, ignoring its prerequisites. At 10th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the vigilante can designate one additional creature when he uses Spring Attack. The  vigilante閳ユ獨 movement this round does not provoke attacks of opportunity from any of these secondary creatures.

  A vigilante must be at least 6th level to select this talent.

entries.name: 迷魂曲调
entries.description: 3级开始，你可以通过表演技能检定，使一个或多个生物被你迷魂。这类似吟游诗人的“迷魂曲”能力，不过豁免DC为“10+1/2术士等级+魅力修正”，并且持续每等级1轮。3级时，你每天可使用此能力1次，8级时2次，13级时3次，18级时4次。

entries.name: Fascinate (Sor)
entries.description: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to use a 表演 skill to cause one or more creatures to become fascinated with you. This acts as the fascinate bardic perform ability, except the save DC is 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Charisma bonus, and it lasts 1 round/level. You may use this ability once per day at 3rd level, twice per day at 8th level, three times per day at 13th level, and four times per day at 18th level.

entries.name: 急速炸弹
entries.description: 一个有此科研发现的炼金术师可以更快地制造炼金炸弹，这使他可以在一轮中多次投掷炼金炸弹。炼金术师能以整轮动作来制作投掷炼金炸弹，只要他有足够的基本攻击加值便能获得额外攻击次数。这类似于使用远程武器进行全力攻击。选择这一科研发现需要至少8级炼金术师等级。

entries.name: Fast Circles
entries.description: At 16th level, the occultist learns to draw magic circles very quickly. He can draw a magic circle as a full-round action, but any circle drawn in this way has a duration of 1 minute per occultist level (unless it閳ユ獨 drawn in conjunction with the outside contact class feature, in which case it lasts for 10 minutes as normal). If he draws a binding circle in this way, its duration is 1 round per occultist level.

entries.name: 指若惊弦
entries.description: 每日1次，拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以在一次巧手检定中投掷两个检定骰，并选取其中较好的结果作为检定结果。她必须在进行技能检定前宣称使用这一天赋。每拥有5个盗贼等级，该能力的每日使用次数增加1次。

entries.name: 奔若狡兔
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼在一次成功的偷袭或者巧手检定后可以以一个移动动作进行撤退。她不能以超过她的速度进行移动。

entries.name: 不朽肉体
entries.description: 炼金术师血肉之躯的伤害能以肉眼可见的速度回复。他获得5点快速医疗。

entries.name: Fast Healing (4 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's body gains the ability to heal wounds very quickly, giving it fast healing 1. The eidolon heals 1 point of damage each round, just like natural healing. Fast healing does not restore hit points lost due to starvation, thirst, or suffocation, nor does it allow the eidolon to regrow lost body parts (or to reattach severed parts). Fast healing functions as long as the eidolon is alive. This fast healing does not function when the eidolon is not on the same plane as its summoner.

  This healing can be increased by 1 per round for every 2 additional evolution points spent (maximum 5).

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Fast Healing (UC) (4 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 11th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 body gains the ability to heal wounds very quickly, giving it fast healing 1. The eidolon heals 1 point of damage per round, just like via natural healing. Fast healing does not restore hit points lost due to starvation, thirst, or suffocation, nor does it allow the eidolon to regrow lost body parts (or to reattach severed parts). Fast healing functions as long as the eidolon is alive.

  This fast healing does not function when the eidolon is not on the same plane as its summoner.

  This healing can be increased by 1 point per round for every 2 additional evolution points spent (to a maximum of 5 points per round).

entries.name: 快速移动（野蛮人）
entries.description: 野蛮人的陆上速度比他的同种族正常速度快10尺。只有在野蛮人未穿甲或者穿轻或中甲，并且没有重载时他才能获得该加值。在计算因负载或穿甲产生的速度修正时要先应用此加值。此加值可以与其他任何增加野蛮人陆上速度的效果叠加。

entries.name: 快速移动(血脉狂怒者)
entries.description: 血脉狂怒者的陆上速度要比他的同族快上10尺。这个好处仅在血脉狂怒者不穿甲、穿戴轻甲或中甲，并且负重没有到达重载时才会生效。血脉狂怒者要首先应用该加值，之后再按照他穿戴的护甲或者负载的载重修正速度。这个加值会与任何其他增加血脉狂怒者陆上速度的加值叠加。

entries.name: 快速移动（武僧）
entries.description: 3级起，武僧的速度获得增强加值，详见上表。着甲、中载或重载的武僧失去此加值。

entries.name: Fast Movement (UMK)
entries.description: At 3rd level, a monk gains an enhancement bonus to his land speed, as shown on Table: monk. A monk in armor or carrying a medium or heavy load loses this extra speed.

entries.name: 快速开锁
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼可用解除装置技能以一个标准动作来解除锁扣，而不是全回合动作。

entries.name: 快速潜行
entries.description: 此能力令盗贼可以在使用隐匿技能时以全速移动而不受到惩罚。

entries.name: Fast Stealth (UC)
entries.description: This ability allows a rogue to move at full speed using the Stealth skill without penalty.

entries.name: 快速翻滚
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼在以特技动作全速翻滚越过敌人占据的方格时且不造成藉机攻击，这一特技检定的DC减少10。

entries.name: 裁决：运命
entries.description: 神授力量: 运用命数不可阻挡的力量，你阅读它的脉络，引导它的流向，以它为武器执行神的正义

entries.name: Fate Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wa7p5zwwl1p0rt92]{丧志术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ja1p1uuf8fp6fiox]{Anticipate Peril}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fp5r5razueuqj8z8]{引导之手}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.scyklgov72pvw884]{Blessing Of Fervor}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gn1u9cjc9phsczec]{Forbid Action, Greater}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4br9puuneexco5hx]{触发术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.uze75g9ayg8icipx]{Jolting Portent}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hi72gh3dlf7a1qyt]{迷宫术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术}

entries.name: 天命子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.d1wxnax51cecplm4]{占卜术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v4q4jzl82labfckc]{透支幸运}

entries.name: 宿命
entries.description: 3级开始，你在所有豁免和突袭轮（以及措手不及）AC上获得+1幸运加值。在7级以及之后每4级，此加值再+1。19级时达到最大值+5。

entries.name: 受选狂怒者
entries.description: 4级起，你的AC以及豁免检定获得+1幸运加值。8级以及之后每4个等级，这个加值都会增加1点（最高为20级时的+5点）。

entries.name: Favored Beat
entries.description:
The investigator is familiar with a specific community in which she gains the benefits of renown. She gains the @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.6xRCEzFhje8h3fb6]{Renown} vigilante social talent (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Intrigue 12). This community can be an entire settlement or portions of a settlement (such as a particular district or neighborhood) depending on the population, as allowed by the renown social talent. Anytime she could select another investigator talent, the investigator can also select from the following list of social talents (from pages 10閳?3 of Ultimate Intrigue), using her investigator level as her vigilante level for the purposes of meeting prerequisites: @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Zu3Amhv4wWbqHr8f]{Celebrity Discount}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.YlQrG9WeIKOsviud]{Celebrity Perks}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.tZgzLbbc4fkdhQUH]{Gossip Collector}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Z76OgmEJuaUZtHdV]{Great Renown}, @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.9kMoMFT33197l6fD]{Incredible Renown}, and @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.GjlhYlp5qLXZ5U0b]{Loyal Aid}.

  For the purpose of vigilante social talents, the investigator does not have a vigilante identity and is always considered to be in her social identity.

entries.name: 宿敌
entries.description:
1级时，游侠从宿敌列表中选择一种生物类型。他在针对该类型生物的唬骗、知识、察觉、察言观色和生存检定+2。此外，他在针对该类型生物的攻击和伤害检定也+2。游侠在未受训的情况下也可以使用知识技能来辨识宿敌生物。

  在5级和之后每5级（10，15和20级），游侠可以额外选择一种宿敌。此外，每次增加宿敌时，可以指定将针对任意一种宿敌的检定加值再+2（如果愿意的话，也可指定刚刚选择的宿敌）。

  如果游侠选择类人生物或者异界生物作为宿敌，那么他必须选择生物的亚种，如下表所示（注意也有其他的类人生物亚种可供选择，下表中所列的仅仅是最常见的部分）。如果某种特定生物同时属于两类宿敌类型，游侠的加值无法叠加，只能使用较高的值作为加值。

entries.name: Favored Maneuver
entries.description:
The vigilante selects one type of combat maneuver to be a favored maneuver. He gains the Improved feat corresponding to that combat maneuver (if one exists). He gains a +2 circumstance bonus on combat maneuver checks with that combat maneuver against a foe that is unaware of the vigilante閳ユ獨 presence at the start of his combat maneuver.

  A vigilante can select this talent more than once. Each time, it applies to a different combat maneuver.

entries.name: 偏好地形
entries.description: 在2等时，一个苍翠骑士团的骑士可以在游侠的偏好地形的列表上，选择一个偏好地形。他获得这项能力，如同游侠的同名职业能力一般。在8等以及之后每6个级别，他可以额外选择一个偏好地形。除此之外，每一次增加偏好地型时，可以将任意一种偏好地行的检定加值再+2（如果他想的话，也可以是已选择过的偏好地型）。

entries.name: 偏好地形
entries.description: 在2等时，一个苍翠骑士团的骑士可以在游侠的偏好地形的列表上，选择一个偏好地形。他获得这项能力，如同游侠的同名职业能力一般。在8等以及之后每6个级别，他可以额外选择一个偏好地形。除此之外，每一次增加偏好地型时，可以将任意一种偏好地行的检定加值再+2（如果他想的话，也可以是已选择过的偏好地型）。

entries.name: 偏好地形 （骑将）
entries.description: 在2等时，一个苍翠骑士团的骑士可以在游侠的偏好地形的列表上，选择一个偏好地形。他获得这项能力，如同游侠的同名职业能力一般。在8等以及之后每6个级别，他可以额外选择一个偏好地形。除此之外，每一次增加偏好地型时，可以将任意一种偏好地行的检定加值再+2（如果他想的话，也可以是已选择过的偏好地型）。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9tww9fc9049h6iqc]{惊恐术}
  • 3rd閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.j71cjhkj0697faj3]{恐吓术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.be88e90guqbi1q1z]{恐惧术}.

entries.name: 狱火加身
entries.description: 你对一个60尺内的生物许诺，如果他进行一个你所要求的任意赎罪行为（一个需要不多于一个整轮动作的行动），他在来世就可以避免永恒的折磨。如果一个善良或中立生物拒绝你的要求，他们会战栗1轮（通过意志检定无效）；如果一个邪恶生物服从你的要求，他则会在一轮内在所有的检定和投骰上获得+2士气加值。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值。这是一个基于语言的影响心灵效果。

entries.name: 恐怖凝视
entries.description: 伴随着一声怒吼，萨满导致３０尺内一个生物战栗１轮。成功的意志豁免可以避免该效果。８级时，该能力将导致惊惧。１６级时，该能力将导致恐慌。这是一个影响心灵的恐惧效果。受过该巫术影响的生物２４小时内无法再次受影响。

entries.name: 恐惧之触
entries.description: 你以标准动作近战接触敌对生物，令其经历1轮可怕幻觉。期间生物失去对恐惧效果的免疫，且对你进行攻击时受到-2惩罚。此外生物对恐惧效果的意志豁免受到等于你牧师等级一半的惩罚（最少-1）。此能力为心智效果，每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换狂乱领域的狂乱感知能力。

entries.name: 无所畏惧
entries.description: 在8级时，你免疫恐惧效果。

entries.name: 无惧狂暴
entries.description: 当狂暴时，野蛮人免疫战栗与惊惧效果。野蛮人必须至少12级才能选取此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Fearless Rage (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian is immune to the shaken and frightened conditions (but not the panicked condition).

  A barbarian must be at least 12th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Fearsome Guise
entries.description: A veil of illusion makes the subject appear to be someone else and then transform into a hideous monster at an opportune time. While this trick is implanted, the subject閳ユ獨 appearance is altered, as disguise self. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attacks a creature. The illusory appearance briefly makes the subject appear monstrous, then ends. The mesmerist attempts an Intimidate check to demoralize the target of the triggering attack. The restrictions on attempts to demoralize a target (the target being within 30 feet and able to see and hear the creature attempting the Intimidate check) apply to the subject of the trick. This is an illusion (glamer) effect.

entries.name: 恐怖生还
entries.description: 20级开始，你的鬼婆血统赐予你可观的抵抗力。你获得伤害减免“10/寒铁”，以及“6+术士等级”的法术抗力。

entries.name: Feast of Blood
entries.description:
While raging, the barbarian may feast on the organs of her foes and absorb their power. After successfully ripping out a creature閳ユ獨 vital organ, the barbarian may eat the organ within 1 minute of extracting it as a full-round action that provokes attacks of opportunity. Once the organ is consumed, the barbarian recovers a number of hit points equal to the Hit Dice of the organ閳ユ獨 owner. In addition, the barbarian gains any energy immunities or resistances the victim had, though the effectiveness of these resistances is halved (for instance, a barbarian who eats the heart of a creature with resist cold 10 would gain resist cold 5; energy immunities are reduced to resist energy 20). This energy resistance lasts for a number of rounds equal to half the Hit Dice of the creature whose organ was consumed.

  A barbarian must have the bloody fist rage power to select this rage power.

  A barbarian must be at least 14th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Feasting Bite
entries.description:
This rage power is available to half-orc barbarians. When the barbarian confirms a critical hit with her bite attack, she regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

  The barbarian must have the bloody bite rage power and either the animal fury rage power or a natural bite attack before selecting this power. Activating this ability consumes 1 round of rage.

entries.name: 专长
entries.description: 盗贼可以选择任何满足先决条件的专长来替代盗贼天赋。

entries.name: 忍法·心技体
entries.description: 忍者可以在满足需求下选择获得任何专长代替忍术。

entries.name: Feat (UC)
entries.description: A rogue can gain any feat that she qualifies for in place of a rogue talent.

entries.name: Feather Balance (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a swift action to achieve perfect balance. While this is active, the monk treats any Acrobatics attempt made to balance as if he had rolled a 20.

  This ability lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: 忍法·轻足
entries.description: 忍者可以如同使用‘羽落术’般降低其下落速度。本能力使用忍者等级作为施法者等级。使用本能力为直觉动作。忍者可以免费每日使用本能力1次，额外使用1次花费1点气。

entries.name: 飞羽子域
entries.description:
替代神授力量 Add Fly to your list of class skills. In addition, whenever you cast a spell that grants you a fly speed, your maneuverability increases by one step (up to perfect).

  替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.m6nj8x0gd1cugw6g]{群体飞行术}

entries.name: 摄食恐惧
entries.description: 在8级时，以一个即时动作，你在以近战攻击成功命中一个已经处于恐惧效果影响下目标时，你对他造成额外2d6点伤害并获得等同于额外伤害量的临时生命值，这些临时生命值可以保持24小时。在8级时你每天可以使用此能力一次，在8级后每提升4级再额外增加一次。此能力取代邪恶领域的秽恶之镰能力。

entries.name: 摄食恐惧
entries.description: 在8级时，以一个即时动作，你在以近战攻击成功命中一个已经处于恐惧效果影响下目标时，你对他造成额外2d6点伤害并获得等同于额外伤害量的临时生命值，这些临时生命值可以保持24小时。在8级时你每天可以使用此能力一次，在8级后每提升4级再额外增加一次。此能力取代邪恶领域的秽恶之镰能力。

entries.name: Feign Innocence
entries.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 social identity seems so innocent that it is hard to believe he was involved in wrongdoing. Within his area of renown, this provides a nonmagical effect identical to the @Compendium[pf1.spells.4w51afqi5d9t8nl4]{无罪术} spell.

  A vigilante must be at least 5th level and have the renown social talent to take this talent.

entries.name: Feint from Shadows
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can feint in combat using a ranged weapon against a target within 30 feet and cause the opponent to lose his Dexterity modifier against her next melee or ranged attack. The rogue must have concealment (but not full concealment) from the target of the feint.

entries.name: 野性突变
entries.description: 不论何时，当炼金术师饮用一瓶突变药剂时，他获得2爪抓攻击和啮咬攻击。这些武器被视为主要天生武器，并且使用炼金术师完整的基本攻击加值。爪抓造成1d6点伤害（小体型炼金术师则为1d4点），啮咬造成1d8点伤害（小体型炼金术师则为1d6点）。同时在突变药水生效期间，炼金术师在威吓技能上获得+2表现加值。

entries.name: Feral Shifting
entries.description: As a swift action, the arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir to gain either a bite attack that deals 1d6 points of damage (1d4 points of damage if she is Small) or two claw attacks that deal 1d4 points of damage (1d3 points of damage if she is Small) for a number of minutes equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1). These are primary natural attacks.

entries.name: 野嚎
entries.description: .  此巫术给予女巫和动物交流并理解其反应的能力，如同使用‘动物交谈’，但每次当她使用巫术时，她必须决定沟通对像种类为两栖类、鸟类、鱼类、哺乳类或爬虫类，只能与该类型的动物交流。女巫能够在自己声音所及的范围内让动物理解自己的话语。此巫术不会改变动物对女巫的态度。12级时，女巫可以使用此巫术和虫类沟通。

entries.name: Ferocious Beast
entries.description: While the barbarian is raging, her animal companion also gains the benefits of rage (including greater rage, mighty rage, and tireless rage), though the barbarian must spend 1 additional round of rage per round if her companion begins or ends its turn adjacent to her, and 2 additional rounds of rage per round if not.

entries.name: Ferocious Beast, Greater
entries.description:
While the barbarian is raging, her animal companion shares the benefits of the barbarian閳ユ獨 rage powers that are constant in effect. It gains no benefit from rage powers that require actions to activate, even if they are free actions.

  A barbarian must have the ferocious beast rage power and be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 狂野冲锋
entries.description: 在15级时，骑士的惩罚将挟裹着大自然的暴怒气息。如每当他冲锋一个生物时，他都可以以自由动作发动一次威吓检定来挫败目标的士气，如果威吓成功，目标会陷入恐慌而非战栗状态

entries.name: 狂暴坐骑
entries.description: 野蛮人骑乘且狂暴的时候，只要野蛮人还在骑乘或邻接坐骑，他的坐骑也获得狂暴效果（包括大狂暴与强力狂暴）。此时野蛮人每轮须额外消耗1轮狂暴轮数。他也可以选择不消耗，那样坐骑将不会狂暴。

entries.name: 高等狂暴坐骑
entries.description: 野蛮人骑乘且狂暴的时候，他的坐骑也获得他的狂暴之力的效果，但坐骑不会得到需要动作才能使用的能力，即使是自由动作。野蛮人必须习得【狂暴坐骑】且至少8级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 凶猛打击
entries.description: 当进行一次近战攻击时，你可以宣布它成为一次凶猛打击。如果命中，将造成等于牧师等级一半的额外伤害（最少为1），每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换力量领域的力量满溢能力。

entries.name: 凶猛践踏
entries.description: 野蛮人骑乘且狂暴的时候，他的坐骑获得“践踏”特殊攻击。中型、大型和超大型坐骑的践踏伤害分别为1d8、2d6和2d8，加上1.5倍坐骑力量修正。成功的反射豁免能够令伤害减半，DC为“10+1/2野蛮人等级+坐骑力量修正”。受到践踏攻击的生物可以对野蛮人或坐骑之一进行藉机攻击。野蛮人必须习得【狂暴坐骑】且至少8级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 高等凶猛践踏
entries.description: 野蛮人坐骑的践踏造成比原本【凶猛践踏】大一级的伤害。并且当目标反射豁免失败（或是选择不反射，而是藉机攻击）时，它可以用自由动作尝试进行闯越战技。野蛮人必须习得【凶猛践踏】且至少12级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: Ferocity
entries.description:
At 5th level, you cling to life with increasing ferocity. You gain ferocity as per the universal monster rule. Whenever you have 0 hit points or negative hit points, you gain a +4 morale bonus to your Strength and Dexterity, as well as a +2 morale bonus on Fortitude saves.

  At 8th level, you are not staggered when you have 0 hit points or negative hit points, and you automatically stabilize when you have negative hit points.

entries.name: Ferocity Discipline
entries.description:
You are in touch with the most primal part of your subconscious. Your training allows you to unlock animalistic senses and powers.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja1p1uuf8fp6fiox]{Anticipate Peril} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ln4jpuurxbrfxw5j]{Arcane Sight, Greater} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vl7yer8k1leyuxld]{预警术} (18th).

entries.name: 凶猛子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8xjcrqg79ugxu5qu]{群体牛之力量}

entries.name: 热情行动
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次以一个迅捷动作，你可以选择以你的最高基础攻击加值发动一次近战攻击；移动相当于你的速度的距离；或是如同拥有法术瞬发超魔一般施放一个已经准备的审判者法术（专攻法术的环数必须比你能够学习的法术环数低至少1环）。

entries.name: 热诚
entries.description:
在2级时，战斗祭司可以激发自己的信仰之力来伤害敌人或治疗盟友，同时，还可以用来加快自己再激烈战斗中施法的速度。战斗祭司每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于1/2战斗祭司等级+战斗祭司的感知调整值。

  一名善良战斗祭司（或信仰善良神祇的中立战斗祭司）可以消耗一次热诚，接触一个生物来治疗1d6伤害，在2级后的每3级，战斗祭司可以治疗额外1d6伤害（在20级时达到最多7d6点）。对他人使用这种热诚是一个标准动作（而对战斗祭司自己使用只需一个迅捷动作）。另一方面，战斗祭司可以将此能力用于伤害一个不死生物，造成与治疗他人相同数量的伤害。这种使用方式需要战斗祭司对目标用标准动作进行一次近战接触攻击，并且会造成机会攻击。但是不死生物不能用豁免对抗这种攻击。

  一名邪恶战斗祭司（或信仰邪恶神祇的中立战斗祭司）可以用这种能力进行近战接触攻击伤害活物，并用触摸治疗不死生物。这种能力视为使用负能量。

  信仰中立神祇的中立战斗祭司可以如同善良战斗祭司或是邪恶战斗祭司般使用这种能力，但必须和他所选择的自发施法方向（自发施法治疗法术——善良；自发施放伤害法术——邪恶）相一致。

  以一个迅捷动作，一名战斗祭司可以使用一次该能力的使用次数来施放任何一个他已准备的施法时间一轮或更短的战斗祭司法术。当使用这种方式施法时，法术目标只能是战斗祭司自身，即使它通常是能够影响他人或多个目标的法术。通过这种方式施法不需要动作成分，也不会造成机会攻击。同样战斗祭司也不用在使用这种方式施法时空出一只手。

entries.name: 裁决：热诚
entries.description: 神授力量: 你坚信唯有在激情与正直之心的驱策下，正义才能被达成。

entries.name: 造偶
entries.description: 萨满获得制造奇物作为奖励专长，并且在检定魔法物品的法术辨识检定上得到永久＋４洞察加值。

entries.name: 妖精之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，他的冲锋可以无视困难地形的影响（包括魔法造成的困难地形，但不包括其他生物占据的地形）。

entries.name: Fey Blood, Greater
entries.description: While raging, as long as the barbarian moves at least 10 feet, she gain the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{朦胧术} for 1 round.

entries.name: 次级妖精之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，他每对一个目标确认了一次重击，目标就必须通过DC=10+他的野蛮人等级的一半+他的体质调整值的意志检定，否则将困惑1轮。这是一个影响心灵的胁迫效果。

entries.name: 精类血统
entries.description:
在你家族中有着反覆无常的精类本质----由于混合了精类的血统或者魔法。你比绝大多人更为感性，更为喜怒无常。

  本职技能: 知识 ：自然.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qgmlu83z2l84kjde]{深度睡眠} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{融身入林} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.446vcsetq4ny904e]{假象术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nq4txj4d0dtzscu2]{相位门} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{迷舞} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8rsFtye3PwM6CKli]{近距射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.53urYIbYYpQuoSLd]{精准射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识 ：自然).

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个“胁迫”子学派的法术，该法术DC+2。

entries.name: Fey Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
One of your ancestors was fey, or the fey realm somehow intermixed with your bloodline. It affects your bloodrage in tricky and surprising ways.

奖励专长：

entries.name: 精类惑控
entries.description: 在8级时，百花骑士团的骑士学会了该如何使用下列类法术能力：动物信使，注目术，狂笑术以及暗示术，这些能力的施法者等级等同于他的骑将等级。他每天一共可以以任何的结合方式使用这些类法术能力3次（使用三次注目术，或者使用1次动物信使以及2次暗示术）。这些类法术能力的豁免DC为10+骑将等级的一半+他的魅力调整值。在16级时，骑将可以使用这些类法术能力7次，而且他可以将魅惑怪物和深沉忏悔UM加入这个列表。

entries.name: 精类魔法
entries.description: 在15级开始，你能够重投对抗法术抗性的施法者等级检定。你必须在第一次投骰完成以后，GM公布结果以前决定是否使用此能力。你必须接受第二次结果，即使结果更糟。你可以随意使用这项能力。

entries.name: Fey Mutagen
entries.description: The alchemist gains the ability to create a fey mutagen, a mixture that lends him some of the grace and power of the First World. When imbibed, a fey mutagen grants a +2 alchemical bonus to the alchemist閳ユ獨 Dexterity and Charisma, a 閳? penalty to his Strength, and DR 2/cold iron. This otherwise works like the standard mutagen class feature and interacts with other effects as though it were a mutagen.

entries.name: Feywise
entries.description:
Your whimsy grants you protection from fey mischief. You gain the resist nature閳ユ獨 lure druid class feature. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks against fey.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 深狱魔头
entries.description: 20级起，你免疫火焰与毒素。你还会获得10点强酸抗力与10点寒冷抗力，以及看破黑暗（see in darkness）能力。即便没有处于血怒之时，你也会一直获得这些优势。

entries.name: 中级恶魔图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，数十根邪恶的倒钩从野蛮人的身体窜出。任何对野蛮人使用近战武器、天生武器或徒手攻击的生物会受到1d6点穿刺伤害。野蛮人必须习得【次级恶魔图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 高级恶魔图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人四周围绕着威胁光环。邻接野蛮人的善良生物进入战栗状态，并在野蛮人的回合开始时受到2d6点挥砍伤害，如同被数十把利刃割裂血肉。邻接野蛮人的中立生物会战栗，但不会受伤。邪恶生物不会受到影响。野蛮人必须习得【中级恶魔图腾】且至少10级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 次级恶魔图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人头上长出一对大牛角并获得抵撞攻击。此攻击为主要天生武器（除非野蛮人同时用武器攻击，那么抵撞作为次要天生武器），采用野蛮人的最高BAB（若是次要天生武器则-5）。抵撞攻击造成1d8点穿刺伤害（小体型1d6），再加上野蛮人的力量修正（若是次要天生武器则减半）。

entries.name: Fiendish Appearance (3 pts)
entries.description:
The eidolon appears as a fiendish creature and manifests some of the abilities of a fiend.
