Wasp Venom (Ex) Sting閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC = 10 + half your shifter level + your Constitution modifier; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d3 Dex damage; cure 2 consecutive saves.

At 15th level, your fly speed increases to 80 feet (good), and you can attempt to gain control of a mindless swarm as a full-round action. To gain control of the swarm, you must succeed at a Charisma check against a DC of 10 + the swarm閳ユ獨 CR. You can direct the swarm to disperse, remain in a designated location, or attack an opponent. This control lasts for a number of rounds equal to half your shifter level.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Sting (P)

entries.name: 血之赐福
entries.description: 9级起，以标准动作，你能够选择牺牲一些你的生命值，使盟友获得两倍的暂时生命值。你最多能以此能力牺牲等同于你角色等级的生命值。这些暂时生命值持续每术士等级1分钟。在你的目标失去其暂时生命值之前，你所牺牲的生命值都无法被治愈。9级时，你每日能够使用1次该能力。17级时，你每日能够使用2次该能力。

entries.name: Gift of Claw and Horn
entries.description:
As a swift action, you gain a natural weapon. The natural weapon lasts for a number of rounds equal to half your oracle level (minimum 1). You must choose a bite, claw, or gore attack. These attacks deal the normal damage for a creature of your size (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 302).

  At 5th level, your natural weapon gains a +1 enhancement bonus. This bonus increases by +1 at 10th, 15th, and 20th level.

  At 11th level, you gain two natural weapons at a time. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Gift of Consumption
entries.description:
The witch curses a creature to share any effects that target her vitality. Whenever the witch is exposed to an effect that requires her to attempt a Fortitude save, as an immediate action she can curse a creature within 30 feet to share the effect. The hexed creature must also attempt a Fortitude save at the same DC as the witch閳ユ獨, and on a failure it is subject to the same effects as the witch. Regardless of the outcome of the saving throw, the creature can閳ユ獩 be targeted by this hex again for 1 day.

  This hex does not function with effects that require additional types of saves, such as phantasmal killer.

entries.name: 妙手回春
entries.description: 到了8级你的手法可令1分钟内死去的生物活转等于你牧师等级的轮数，HP回复到相当于你牧师等级一半，继续受死亡时依然生效的法术、状态、苦难等影响。生物在再次扑街的时间到前自由活动，你对它们没有操控权。此能力在8级能每天用一次，每比8级高4级多一次。此能力替换医疗领域的医者祝福能力。

entries.name: 疯狂礼赠
entries.description: 你呼唤无法想像的星间虚空袭击一个30尺内的目标，并使他困惑1轮。成功的强韧检定可以使此效果无效，这是一个影响心智的胁迫效果。7级时困惑将持续相当于你的先知等级，你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Gift of the Ancients
entries.description:
At 4th level, you gain a +2 resistance bonus on saving throws against gaze attacks and to resist poison. You also gain a +2 competence bonus on Perception checks.

  At 8th level, these bonuses increase by 2.

entries.name: Gift of Will
entries.description:
A small portion of the mesmerist閳ユ獨 vast mental power buttresses his ally閳ユ獨 mind. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attempts a Will saving throw or a Sense Motive check, or is targeted by an Intimidate check to demoralize her. For a saving throw, the subject uses the mesmerist閳ユ獨 Will saving throw bonus instead of her own.

  For a Sense Motive check or Intimidate check, she adds the mesmerist閳ユ獨 Charisma bonus as a morale bonus on the check or to the DC. The mesmerist can閳ユ獩 implant this trick on himself.

entries.name: Gills
entries.description:
An alchemist with this discovery grows a set of gills that allow him to breathe water in addition to breathing air. When on land, the alchemist risks his gills drying out and must bathe his gills with 1/2 gallon of water every 24 hours he is out of the water or take 1 point of Constitution damage every hour thereafter.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Gills (1 pt)
entries.description: An eidolon has gills and can breathe underwater indefinitely.

entries.name: Gills (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description: The eidolon has gills and can breathe underwater indefinitely.

entries.name: Glassfoot Bomb
entries.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it cover the ground in volatile jagged crystals in addition to its normal effects. These crystals act like caltrops, evaporating into a smelly but harmless gas in 2d6 rounds.

entries.name: Glib Facade
entries.description: Once per day, a rogue with this advanced talent can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.7c8nufdm0pj4bgep]{花言巧语} as a spelllike ability, using her rogue level as the spell閳ユ獨 caster level. A rogue must have the innocent facade rogue talent before selecting this talent.

entries.name: Glib Lie
entries.description: At 11th level, a mesmerist can deceive truthdetecting magic. A creature using this sort of magic against the mesmerist must succeed at a caster level check against a DC of 15 + the mesmerist閳ユ獨 class level to succeed (as if the mesmerist were under the effect of a glibness spell); failure means the magic doesn閳ユ獩 detect the mesmerist閳ユ獨 lies or force him to speak only the truth. This ability does not give the mesmerist the glibness spell閳ユ獨 bonus on Bluff checks.

entries.name: Glimmering Infusion
entries.description: The alchemist can expend any prepared extract to produce a cube of glowing motes that act as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.ec2zmvdzi4m3puh4]{闪光尘}. The area must be adjacent to the alchemist and covers one 5-foot square per level of extract sacrificed, and the effect閳ユ獨 save DC is calculated using the level of the sacrificed extract. The alchemist must have the infusion discovery to choose this discovery.

entries.name: Globe of Negation
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 3 points of mental focus to create a stationary globe of negation. This globe is 10 feet in diameter and cancels any spell effect that is cast into or through its area. This functions as globe of invulnerability, but it affects spells of any level. The globe can negate a total number of spell levels equal to your occultist level, after which the globe collapses.

  Spells that exceed the number of remaining levels remove all remaining levels, but are weakened; any creatures targeted by such spells receive a +4 circumstance bonus on any saving throws against the spells閳?effects. The globe lasts for a number of rounds equal to your occultist level. It has no effect on spells originating within the globe閳ユ攼nly on those that enter its area as or after they are cast.

  You must be at least 11th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: Gloom Magic
entries.description: A rogue with this talent gains the ability to cast darkness two times per day as a spell-like ability. The darkness created by this ability does not impair the rogue閳ユ獨 vision. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level. A rogue must have an Intelligence score of at least 12 and the minor magic rogue talent before choosing this talent.

entries.name: Glorious Presence
entries.description: The implement invokes the presence of those who have worn it in the past. The implement閳ユ獨 wearer gains a +1 competence bonus on all Charisma-based skill checks and ability checks for every 2 points of mental focus invested in the implement, to a maximum bonus of 1 + 1 for every 4 occultist levels you possess.

entries.name: 溃军之气
entries.description: 在10级时，每当你成功的通过近战攻击或攻击性法术伤害一个敌人，你都可以以一个迅捷动作通过一个威吓检定以挫败目标的士气，你可以使用你的战斗祭司等级以取代你的威吓技能加值（取其高者）。

entries.name: 光荣威严
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以通过接触为一个盟友加持光荣的祝福，持续1分钟。这个盟友将震慑敢于接近他的敌人，如同一个法术圣域术的效果。如果盟友发动攻击，则敌人将不再被这个效果压服。这是一个影响心灵的效果。

entries.name: 荣耀领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你被神力赐予荣耀，是不死生物的克星。另外，如果你引导能量攻击不死生物，豁免DC+2。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.y2uhoqr4itdbw5g4]{虔诚护盾}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hl9l92qfalq6c55z]{祝福武器}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dnet1tyxbsnwailm]{灼热光辉}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{圣光击}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{正气如虹}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lllhr9py6w44cxjm]{亡灵归亡}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.osi62mwn6rpkwlm6]{圣剑术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{圣洁灵光}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ursm11405zobemi3]{异界之门}

entries.name: Glutinous Gloom
entries.description:
The gloom creates an area in its splash radius that functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.j9qpy0d585f8lpm4]{蛛网术}. The webbing lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 the alchemist閳ユ獨 level.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Go with the Flow
entries.description:
You can touch a creature as a standard action to suppress its strong emotions. The target is affected as the calm emotions spell, except it can still take violent actions and violent actions against the target do not end the effect. This effect lasts a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Icicle power of the Water Domain.

entries.name: God-Meddled Curse
entries.description:
The isle of Iblydos is populated and watched over by hero-gods, some of whom are known for entangling mortals in their own affairs. The gods閳?interference in your life has left you with strange, unpredictable powers dependent on divine whim. Bizarre side effects occur whenever you are affected by a spell from a divine caster閳ユ攩or better or for worse. Once per round, when a creature casts a divine spell including you as a target, roll 1d20 and consult the table below. The effect resulting from this roll begins at the end of that enemy閳ユ獨 turn. This effect targets only you, even if other creatures were included as targets of the triggering spell.

  At 5th level, you gain a +2 competence bonus on saving throws to resist divine spells.

  At 10th level, you become immune to the confused condition.

  At 15th level, you gain a +4 competence bonus on saving throws to resist mind-affecting effects.

God-Meddled Effects

d20 Effect
1 You provoke an attack of opportunity from one enemy adjacent to you. If no enemy is adjacent, the closest enemy can move its full movement speed in your direction as a free action. If multiple enemies qualify, the GM determines which creature attacks or moves. This movement does not trigger attacks of opportunity.
2-3 Your movement speed is halved for 1 round.
4-5 You are deafened for 1 round.
6-7 You are knocked prone.
8-10 You shrink by one size category for 1 round, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.2y9e1l6zso9tdg0a]{缩小术}.
11-13 You grow by one size category for 1 round, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术}.
14-15 Your caster level is treated as 1 higher for the purpose of spell durations for 1 round.
16-17 Creatures in squares adjacent to you are pushed 10 feet away from the space you occupy.
18-19 You are able to understand all languages for 1 round.
20 You gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术} for 1 round.

entries.name: Godclaw Blessing: Command Obedience
entries.description: You can touch an ally and say a quick word to remind her of her obligations, granting her a new saving throw against each enchantment effect that currently affects her. If the saving throw is successful, the enchantment effect immediately ends. This power affects only effects that allow a saving throw.

entries.name: Godclaw Blessing: Tactical Readiness
entries.description: At 10th level, you can rally your allies within 30 feet, allowing each to immediately do one of the following as a free action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity: remove the flat-footed condition, take a 5-foot step, draw a weapon, ready a shield, or gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC for 1 round. You can affect a number of allies equal to your Wisdom bonus. These actions do not count against your allies閳?total movement or actions on their next turn.

entries.name: Godclaw Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you can cast detect chaos, detect law, and discern lies at will as spell-like abilities, using your oracle level as your caster level. You no longer take armor check penalties for wearing armor, and your armor閳ユ獨 maximum Dexterity bonus increases by 5. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.1zyixa5b6aw7npub]{粉碎掌} as a spell-like ability without requiring a focus component, treating your oracle level as your caster level. This hand manifests as a massive, spiked gauntlet.

entries.name: Godclaw Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the Godclaw mystery adds Bluff, Intimidate, Knowledge ：地方, and Perception to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9tww9fc9049h6iqc]{惊恐术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y69de8y5ddrhuue5]{怪物晕眩术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.78kwl5t99j9e8tzh]{人类定身术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8zeulunjetwrdgwj]{秩序之怒} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aoov6nqfm195txdb]{飞击掌} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7e22urxux6i2mua5]{律言} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lzj5umxjvogvpg6b]{秩序护盾} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{禁锢术} (18th).

entries.name: 弑神者
entries.description: 在15等，每当骑将对他的挑战目标进行一个近战攻击（melee attack），而他的挑战目标是一个神术施法者时，骑将在攻击与伤害上，获得等同于他魅力调整值的加值。此加值的伤害能在重击时与重击倍率相乘。

entries.name: 圣战先锋
entries.description: 在10级时，你能以一个标准动作召唤一个神圣的勇士与你并肩作战。这相当于一个法术四级召唤怪物的效果，不过你只能召唤善良异界生物或者拥有半天界模板的动物。在10级后的每2个等级，这个能力的效果就上升一个等级，最高在20级达到九级召唤怪物。

entries.name: 神圣之击
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以通过接触为一件武器灌注善良与纯洁的力量。在一分钟内，这件武器可以亮起翠绿，金黄或银白的光芒，并在击中邪恶生物时造成1d6点额外伤害，在克服伤害减免时视为善良阵营。这个额外伤害的效果不能与神圣武器附魔相叠加。

entries.name: 善良领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你能保证自己的身心都是纯好人。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.skgjjub1hng29nwo]{防护邪恶}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zujht80bgjdk9cyb]{阵营武器} (good only)
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1i8b1v3dngkxj6jp]{反邪恶法阵}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{圣光击}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sg3eq6xpsum65fgm]{反制邪恶}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z1j8oc2291czpinh]{剑刃护壁}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.odcyzsuexods8ek9]{圣言}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{圣洁灵光}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{召唤怪物 IX} (限善良)

entries.name: 苦础良药
entries.description: 狂暴时，喝一杯酒可以让野蛮人重新尝试豁免以摆脱下列影响他的效果：目盲，困惑，目眩，耳聋，力竭，疲乏，惊惧，反胃，恐慌，震慑，恶心。如果豁免成功，效果在他狂暴期间受到抑制。他还可以对中毒效果进行1次新的豁免，如果成功则痊愈，失败也不会有额外负面效果。

entries.name: 好运
entries.description: 在6级时，你可以用一个直觉动作重掷刚投的一次d20投骰，但必须在宣告投骰带来的结果前使用。你必须接受重掷的结果，即便比原本的结果更差。在6级时你每日可使用此能力1次，之后每6级牧师等级再增加1次。

entries.name: Gore (2 pts)
entries.description: An eidolon grows a number of horns on its head, giving it a gore attack. This attack is a primary attack. The gore deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge).

entries.name: Gore (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  The eidolon grows a number of horns on its head, giving it a gore attack. This attack is a primary attack. The gore deals 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge).

entries.name: Gossip Collector
entries.description:
The vigilante sits at the center of a web of gossip, granting him access to the latest scuttlebutt with baffling speed. Whenever the vigilante is presented with a topic about which he would normally need to spend 1d4 hours to gather information, he must spend only 1d2 hours instead. If he has the renown social talent and gathers the information in his area of renown, he must instead spend only 1d4 鑴?10 minutes, and if he beats the DC to gather a piece of information by 20 or more, he knows that piece of information without spending any time at all; he has simply already heard that gossip.

  This ability doesn閳ユ獩 allow him to gather information that isn閳ユ獩 available in the locale he is canvassing, even if that locale is his area of renown.

entries.name: Gossip Guru
entries.description:
You sit in a web of intrigue like a spider, subtly tracing the course of rumors and gossip in order to understand the ties that bind those around you. You can use the @Compendium[pf1.spells.piwj11ynlsji0i7a]{Rumormonger} spell once per day as a spell-like ability, using your oracle level as your caster level. Each time you do so, it ends the duration of any previous activation.

  At 11th level, you can use this ability three times per day, and at 15th level, you can use it at will, but regardless, each use still ends the duration of any previous activation.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Got Your Back
entries.description: Once per round as an immediate action, you may expend an attack of opportunity to attempt an aid another check to improve an ally閳ユ獨 attack. You and your ally must both be flanking the same opponent. This counts as an attack of opportunity.

entries.name: Grab (2 pts)
entries.description: An eidolon becomes adept at grappling foes, gaining the grab ability. Pick bite, claw, pincers, slam, tail slap, or tentacle attacks. Whenever the eidolon makes a successful attack of the selected type, it can attempt a free combat maneuver check. If successful, the eidolon grapples the target. This ability only works on creatures of a size one category smaller than the eidolon or smaller. Eidolons with this evolution receive a +4 bonus on CMB checks made to grapple.

entries.name: Grab (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
The eidolon becomes adept at grappling foes, gaining the grab ability. Select one of the following attacks: bite, claw, pincers, slam, tail slap, or tentacle. Whenever the eidolon makes a successful attack of the selected type, it can attempt a free combat maneuver check. If successful, the eidolon grapples the target.

  This ability works only on creatures at least one size category smaller than the eidolon.

  Eidolons with this evolution gain a +4 bonus on combat maneuver checks to grapple.

entries.name: 优雅落地
entries.description: 拥有这一绝技的猫族盗贼在落地时总是以双脚着地，即使他们会在这次坠落中受到坠落伤害。如果猫族盗贼同时拥有【猫落】种族特性，则在计算坠落伤害时视为比实际少20尺。

entries.name: 究极异变
entries.description: 异变药剂现在可以提供+6天然护甲加值，以及+8炼金加值到任意心智属性上（智力、感知、魅力），第二项心智属性+6，第三项心智属性+4。在异变药剂生效期间炼金术师在力量、体质、敏捷上一直会受到-2的减值，并且在药效结束之后受到2点属性伤害。选择这一科研发现需要16级炼金术师等级，且必须先学会“高级异变”。

entries.name: 贤者之证
entries.description: 在20级时，炼金术师在炼金术上获得了及其巨大的成就，他可以迅速获得2项【科研发现】，并自下方列表中获得1项贤者之证——代表着炼金术师在炼金术的某一方面取得了空前的突破性进展。对多数炼金术师而言，取得这些贤者之证之一正是常年勤奋实验的最终目标。

entries.name: Grand Fey Mutagen
entries.description: The alchemist閳ユ獨 fey mutagen now grants a +6 alchemical bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, a 閳? penalty to his Strength, DR 10/cold iron, and the druid閳ユ獨 woodland stride class feature. In addition, he can choose not to allow spells and effects to affect him if they would not be capable of affecting both his original creature type and the fey creature type. An alchemist must be at least 16th level and must have the greater fey mutagen discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 高等巫术
entries.description: 在18级以及之后的每2级，女巫选择巫术的范围还将包括高等巫术

entries.name: Grand Inspiring Mutagen
entries.description: The alchemist閳ユ獨 inspiring cognatogen now grants a +4 dodge bonus to AC and a +4 bonus to Reflex saving throws; a 閳? penalty to Strength and Constitution; and the effects of having the item lore, tenacious inspiration, and underworld inspiration investigator talents. An alchemist must be at least 16th level and have the greater inspiring cognatogen discovery to select this discovery.

entries.name: 恢弘谐律
entries.description: 20级开始，纯净的魔法音乐流淌在你的身体里。你施展任何具有言语成分的法术视为添加了@Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发}专长，而施法时间和占用法术位却无需提升。你免疫音波伤害和基于言语的效果。

entries.name: 究极突变
entries.description: 炼金术师的突变药剂现在可以使AC获得+6天防，任一项身体属性（力量、体质、敏捷）+8，第二项身体属性+6，第三项身体属性+4。在突变药剂生效期间，炼金术师的智力、感知、魅力都会受到-2减值。选择这一科研发现需要16级炼金术师等级，且已学会“高级突变”。

entries.name: Grand Rasugen
entries.description:
The alchemist閳ユ獨 rasugen now grants a +6 alchemical bonus on all saving throws, 4 temporary hit points per alchemist level, and immunity to disease, mind-affecting effects, and poison. The alchemist takes a 閳? penalty to Intelligence and a 閳? penalty to Charisma and Wisdom as long as the grand rasugen persists.

  An alchemist must be at least 16th level and have the greater rasugen discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 电光石火
entries.description: 在8级时，所有距离你不超过30尺的盟友都可以将你的感知调整值加到他们的先攻检定结果上。

entries.name: Grappling Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  Your cloud, deadly earth, or wall blast grows tendrils that hold your enemies in place. Whenever a creature takes damage from the infused blast, you can attempt a combat maneuver check to have the blast grapple that opponent. Your bonus on this check is equal to 2 + your kineticist level + your Constitution modifier (treat the blast as a Huge creature). The blast only grapples opponents; it can閳ユ獩 perform other functions of grapple maneuvers such as pinning or moving the opponent.

  If the blast is already grappling an opponent, it receives a +5 bonus on its combat maneuver check to maintain the grapple, as normal. You can use this infusion only if you also use the cloud, deadly earth, or wall form infusion.

entries.name: 真实之口
entries.description: 在8级时，任何被你擒抱或是压制的生物都会自动受到一个法术诚实之域（Zone of Truth）的影响（通过意志豁免则无效）。在战斗状态外，你也可以通过保持接触一个生物的双手来使用本能力。本能力每日的最高持续时间等同于你的审判者等级数轮，这些轮数无需连续。当你不再擒抱，压制或是接触目标时，本能力的效果终止。

entries.name: 死亡之握
entries.description: 在9级时，你能从地表上创造出爆发的骷髅手臂集群，去撷取撕裂你的敌人。这些骷髅手从60尺范围内一点地表作20尺半径爆发，对在范围的生物造成每术士等级1d6点挥砍伤害。范围内的生物能够通过一次成功的反射豁免使伤害减半，豁免失败的生物1轮内无法移动，豁免DC为“10+1/2术士等级+魅力修正”。这些骷髅手臂在1轮以后消失。此能力必须爆发在固体表面。9级时你能使用此能力每天1次；17级时每天2次；20级时每天3次。

entries.name: Grasping Chains
entries.description:
At 4th level, chains cover your body and extend from your arms, grasping at the air around you and granting you a +4 bonus on Climb skill checks.

  At 9th level, this bonus increases to +8 and you gain a Climb speed equal to 1/2 your base speed.

entries.name: Grasping Gloom
entries.description:
The gloom creates an area equal to double its splash radius that functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手}. The effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to half the alchemist閳ユ獨 level.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 墓土观感
entries.description: 萨满可以看见活物、死物、不死物的状态和健康情况。使用该能力时，萨满可以辨别３０尺内所有活物死物不死物的状态，分为存活、受伤、濒死、死亡几种，不死生物同样可以辨别。最后，该能力中萨满可以辨别目标是否中毒或有疾病。该能力每日使用轮数为萨满等级，轮数无需连续。

entries.name: 墓穴之触
entries.description: 1级开始，作为标准动作，你能通过一次近战接触攻击使一个活物战栗，此效果持续每两个术士等级1轮（至少为1）。如果你对战栗中的生物使用此能力将导致1轮惊惧（如果该生物HD小于你的术士等级）。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: 墓穴之触
entries.description: 1级开始，作为标准动作，你能通过一次近战接触攻击使一个活物战栗，此效果持续每两个术士等级1轮（至少为1）。如果你对战栗中的生物使用此能力将导致1轮惊惧（如果该生物HD小于你的术士等级）。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Gravity Control
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

  You use your gravitic abilities to move yourself, as per flame jet.

entries.name: Gravity Control, Greater
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite gravity control

  You have greater control over gravity, as per greater flame jet.

entries.name: Gravity Master
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Sp); Level 9; Burn 0
Prerequisite gravity control, greater gravity control

  You can create areas of altered gravity. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdfw5f15hwcxlth]{反重力}, but you can choose for the gravity in the area to pull toward any direction (not just up).

  If you use this wild talent, any previous use of this wild talent expires immediately.

entries.name: Grazing Shot
entries.description: The following rogue talent is available to drow rogues. Particularly deft rogues can strike two foes with one well-placed shot. As a standard action, a rogue with this talent can fire a hand crossbow at an enemy who is granted cover by another opponent. Make one ranged attack roll and compare the result to each opponent閳ユ獨 AC. Each hit deals 1 point of damage. Any special weapon properties or precision damage apply to only a single target, but any poison applied to the bolt affects all targets struck. An unchained rogue can select this talent.

entries.name: Grease Bomb
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it create a grease slick upon detonation. When a grease bomb detonates, it coats an area equal to the bomb閳ユ獨 splash radius in grease (as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.ik9u3eel5vfwrtb5]{油腻术} spell) for 1 round per level. The DC of the Reflex save to avoid falling after a failed Acrobatics check is equal to 10 + 1/2 the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. A grease bomb can閳ユ獩 affect items or armor.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Great Renown
entries.description:
The vigilante is known on a broader scale. He can gain renown in a single community of up to 5,000 individuals (a large town) or up to two communities of no more than 2,000 individuals each (two small towns). The bonus while he is in his social identity remains unchanged, but the circumstance bonus on Intimidate checks from his renown social talent while he is in his vigilante identity increases to +6.

  A vigilante must be at least 7th level and have the renown social talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 高等炼金拟像
entries.description: 炼金术师制造出拟像，效果如同“拟像术（Simulacrum）”，不过其每HD花费炼金术师100金币的原材料，且需要花24小时的时间成长，并在被杀死时化为雪水。他必须达到14级，且必须先学会“炼金拟像”才能选择此发现。被制造出来的拟像是个生物，不是超自然效果。

entries.name: Greater Anathema
entries.description:
The ability reduction of the investigator閳ユ獨 anathemas increases to 10, and he adds DR/閳?and regeneration to the list of abilities he can lower with an anathema. In addition, when an investigator creates an anathema, he can designate a specific kind of creature (such as vampires) in addition to the creature type. When used against this specific foe, the DC of the save against the anathema is 2 higher than the component poison.

  An investigator must have the anathema investigator talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 大秘咒血怒
entries.description: 8级起，当你进入血怒时，你能够将移位术（displacement）或加速术（haste）的效果应用到你身上。这是在秘咒血怒之外额外添加的效果，并且如同秘咒血怒一般生效。

entries.name: 高等异界型态
entries.description: 18级之后，召唤师可以由幻灵的进化池抽出6点进化点来改变自己的型态。不同于【异界型态】，幻灵只会失去召唤师抽出的进化点的一半。

entries.name: 高等破敌
entries.description: 到了12级，当审判者使用【破敌】能力时，武器对抗特定生物所获得的额外伤害增加为4d6。

entries.name: 旗帜高扬
entries.description: 14级时，武士的旗帜将成为对盟友的号召。所有60英尺内的盟友在对抗魅惑和胁迫法术或效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值。此外，当武士将他的旗帜显现在外时，他可以用一个标准动作挥舞旗帜令其飘扬，使所有60英尺内的盟友获得一次额外的豁免机会，以对抗以他们为目标的任意一个法术或能力效果。该豁免的DC与原DC相同，对不允许豁免的法术或效果此能力无效。任何一个盟友一天内仅能从此能力受益一次。

entries.name: 大血怒
entries.description: 11级起，当血脉狂怒者进入血怒时，力量和体质的士气加值提升至+6点，意志豁免的士气加值提升至+3点。此外，在进入血怒时，血脉狂怒者能够将一个他已知的2级或更低等级的血脉狂怒者法术效果应用至自己身上。法术的距离必须为个人或接触。若法术的持续时间大于1轮，则会改为在血怒的持续时间内保持生效。如此使用会消耗血脉狂怒者的法术位，就如同他正常施放法术一般；血脉狂怒者必须具有可用的法术位才能从该效果中获益。

entries.name: Greater Chimeric Aspect
entries.description: At 14th level, when a shifter uses her shifter aspect ability to take on a minor form, she can choose up to three aspects and assume the minor form of each aspect.

entries.name: 高级异变
entries.description: 异变药剂现在可以提供+4天然护甲加值，以及+6炼金加值到任意心智属性上（智力、感知、魅力），第二项心智属性+4。在异变药剂生效期间炼金术师的相关的肉体属性会受到-2减值，并且在药效结束之后受到2点属性伤害。选择这一科研发现需要12级炼金术师等级，且必须先学会“异变药剂”。

entries.name: 高等战斗灵感
entries.description: 调查员可以选择一种武器（比如短剑或剑杖），只要调查员的灵感池中仍然具有1点灵感点数，他就可以在使用此武器攻击时，使用灵感能力而不花费灵感点数。调查员必须拥有战斗灵感天赋且至少要达到19级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: Greater Constructive Dyes
entries.description:
The alchemist expands the set of objects he can create with his constructive dyes. The alchemist can expend one additional use of his daily bombs when using his constructive dyes discovery to create objects, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{强效造物术}.

  The alchemist must be at least 10th level and have the constructive dyes and divine inks discoveries before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 高等法术反制
entries.description: 当奥能师使用【法术反制】技艺时，他可以使用同环或更高的法术位来反制（而不是至少高一环）。奥能师必须已有【法术反制】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: Greater Divine Inks
entries.description:
The alchemist閳ユ獨 unique dyes allow him to create lifelike images. If he expends an additional daily use of his bombs, the image he creates with the divine inks discovery also produces sound, smell, and heat, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.7rx66m98dwo18fy8]{强效幻影}.

  The alchemist must be at least 6th level and must have the divine inks and improved divine inks discoveries before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 高等神力克敌
entries.description: 18级时，导魂者在使用神力克敌时获得等同其全部魅力调整值与所有导魂者等级的加值。中立阵营的导魂者使用神力克敌时获得等同其全部魅力调整值与导魂者等级-3的加值。

entries.name: Greater Draining Gloom
entries.description:
A creature struck by the gloom must succeed at a Fortitude save or gain 1d4 negative levels.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level and must have the debilitating gloom and draining gloom discoveries before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 高等情感链接
entries.description: 14级起，猎人与她的动物伙伴的情感链接范围增加至10英里。若动物伙伴和她相距不超过1英里，那么猎人便能够使用心灵感应（telepathically）和它进行沟通。

entries.name: 高等技艺
entries.description: 11级和之后每2级，奥能师可以从选取一个下列高等技艺来取代一个奥能技艺。

entries.name: Greater Fey Mutagen
entries.description:
The alchemist閳ユ獨 fey mutagen now grants a +4 alchemical bonus to Dexterity and Charisma, a 閳? penalty to his Strength, DR 5/ cold iron, and the druid閳ユ獨 woodland stride class feature.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level and must have the fey mutagen discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Greater Fire Steed
entries.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 8; Burn 0
Prerequisite fire steed, improved fire steed

  When using fire steed, the mount gains immunity to fire and its speed increases by an additional 10 feet. In addition, when the mount takes a run action, it can run up steep slopes at its normal speed and down steep slopes without its rider needing to attempt a Ride check.

entries.name: Greater Gift of Consumption
entries.description:
The witch can more effectively redirect effects to her proxy chosen by the gift of consumption hex. When the witch succeeds at her Fortitude save against an effect that she has redirected to a proxy, the hexed creature takes a 閳? penalty on its Fortitude save against the redirected effect. If the witch ever fails a Fortitude save or intentionally exposes herself to an effect that requires a Fortitude save, such as by ingesting a poison, she can redirect that effect to affect only the hexed creature, though the hexed creature can still attempt a saving throw to resist the effects. Once she has redirected an effect to another creature in this way, that creature cannot be affected by the gift of consumption hex again for 24 hours.

  The witch must have the gift of consumption hex to select this hex.

entries.name: Greater Gloom Magic
entries.description: A rogue with this talent gains the ability to cast deeper darkness once each day as a spell-like ability. The darkness created by this ability does not impair the rogue閳ユ獨 vision. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level. A rogue must have an Intelligence score of at least 13 and the gloom magic and minor magic rogue talents before choosing this talent.

entries.name: 高等灵感神药
entries.description: 炼金术士的灵感神药将给予他在防御等级上+2闪避加值，在反射检定上+2加值，但在力量和体质上承受-4减值。除此之外，炼金术士获得以下调查员天赋：奇妙灵感，离奇回忆，发散灵感。炼金术士必须达到12级且拥有灵感神药发现才能选择本发现。

entries.name: 高等祈神祷告
entries.description: 20级时，当导魂者恢复其每日法术位时，她可选择一种祈神祷告效果，在接下来一天中使其盟友与本人获得相应的增益效果。导魂者获得此效果的全部加值。此效果与她的祈神祷告和精通祈神祷告职业能力迭加。

entries.name: Greater Ki Venom
entries.description:
A ninja with this trick can further improve her ki venom. The ninja can spend 2 ki points to increase the damage die to a d8 or spend 2 ki points to change the ability damage dealt to Constitution damage.

  The ninja must have the ki venom ninja trick before selecting this trick.

entries.name: Greater Mask Misery
entries.description:
This trick functions as the mask misery trick, but can be used to ignore greater conditions as well.

  A mesmerist must have the mask misery mesmerist trick to take greater mask misery.

entries.name: 高等超魔学识
entries.description: 奥能师可以选择一项超魔专长作为奖励专长。他必须满足该专长的先决条件。每天早上准备法术时，奥能师可以从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，来将此奖励专长替换为另一项超魔专长，只要他同样满足其先决条件。奥能师必须拥有【超魔学识】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 高级突变
entries.description: 炼金术师的突变药剂现在可以使AC获得+4天防，任一项身体属性（力量、体质、敏捷）+6，第二项身体属性+4。在突变药剂生效期间，炼金术师的两项相关心智属性都会受到-2减值。选择这一科研发现需要12级炼金术师等级。

entries.name: Greater Plague Bomb
entries.description: The effects of the smoke created by an alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb duplicates the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.hv1vqeuh5eji28rz]{Contagion, Greater} instead of @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}, filling an area equal to twice the bomb閳ユ獨 splash radius for 1 round per level. An alchemist must be at least 16th level and must possess the plague bomb and smoke bomb discoveries before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 大狂暴
entries.description: 11级起，野蛮人在狂暴时，力量和体质都会得到+6士气加值，意志豁免上的士气加值增加到+3。

entries.name: Greater Rage (UC)
entries.description: At 11th level, a barbarian閳ユ獨 bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will saves while raging increases to +3. In addition, the amount of temporary hit points gained when entering a rage increases to 3 per Hit Die.

entries.name: Greater Rasugen
entries.description:
The alchemist閳ユ獨 rasugen now grants a +4 alchemical bonus on all saving throws, 3 temporary hit points per alchemist level, and immunity to mindaffecting effects. The alchemist takes a 閳? penalty to Intelligence as long as the greater rasugen persists.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level and able to brew a rasugen before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 强力幻灵护体
entries.description: 12级后，当有任何盟友位在幻灵的触及范围，盟友能得到AC+2盾牌加值以及全豁免+2环境加值。如果该生物是召唤师本人，这些加值提升到+4。当幻灵被擒抱、无助、麻痹、震慑或失去意识时这个加值无效。

entries.name: 高等法术通路
entries.description: 19级时，魔战士能够获得更多魔法学识。他可以从法师法术列表中选取14个法术加入他的法术书，并以他的魔战士等级作为法师等级使用这些法术。魔战士可以从0环、1环、2环、3环、4环、5环和6环法师法术中每环级选择2个法术。魔战士可以忽略这些法术中的姿势成份，但他也必须为这些法术正常花费贵重的材料成分。

entries.name: 高等法术战斗
entries.description: 14级时，魔战士施放法术和近战攻击的动作完美的衔接为一体。当使用【法术战斗】能力时，其专注检定加值等于所选择承受攻击检定减值的双倍。

entries.name: 高等法术打断
entries.description: 奥能师可以通过从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，来打断一个法术或魔法物品的效果。此行动类似于距离为〔接触〕的目标型‘解除魔法’。奥能师可以将其魅力调整值加至解法检定。奥能师必须拥有【法术打断】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 高等法术抗力
entries.description: 当奥能师使用【法术抗力】技艺时，法术抗力等于“11+奥能师等级”。奥能师必须拥有【法术抗力】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: Greater Spirit Channeling
entries.description: At 13th level, when you open your body to a wandering spirit, you also gain that wandering spirit閳ユ獨 greater spirit ability as long as you are in a metamorphosed form.

entries.name: Greater Spiritual Interference
entries.description:
At 12th level, whenever allies are within the phantom閳ユ獨 reach, as long as the manifested phantom is in ectoplasmic form, each ally gains a +2 shield bonus to its Armor Class and a +2 circumstance bonus on its saving throws. For the spiritualist, these bonuses increase to +4. The spiritualist and allies within range don閳ユ獩 gain this bonus if the manifested phantom is grappled, helpless, or unconscious.

  While the phantom is incorporeally manifested, allies within 30 feet of the phantom receive a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects. For the spiritualist, this bonus increases to +4. This bonus doesn閳ユ獩 apply if the phantom is unconscious.

entries.name: 高等战术
entries.description: 9级时，骑将获得一个额外的团队专长作为额外专长。他必须满足先决条件才能选取此专长。骑将使用【战术】能力时，可以将此专长分享给他的盟友。使用战术能力是一个迅捷动作。

替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g17ayjso7j8s8l2l]{Masterwork Transformation}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8z4tlk1fojr9t9yb]{铜墙铁壁}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wniqskqkk0cubu9u]{创造半位面}

entries.name: Green Tongue
entries.description: The rogue gains Aklo, Aquan, Auran, Giant, Ignan, Sylvan, or Terran as a bonus language. In addition, the rogue can attempt a DC 15 Linguistics check to communicate basic concepts with magical beasts and monstrous humanoids with which she does not share a common language.

entries.name: Green Tongue, Greater
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 7; Burn 0
Prerequisite green tongue

  You can spend 10 minutes in any outdoor location that would be valid for commune with nature in order to contact and chat with fey and leshy spirits, allowing you to gain three pieces of information as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.icjrw9y6pa1uatlz]{问道自然}.

entries.name: Greensight
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 4; Burn 0

  You can see through plant material as if you had greensight as per the universal monster rule with a range of 60 feet.

entries.name: Grig Jig
entries.description: Once per day, the rogue can weave a bit of old Varisian magic into her footwork, dancing with an infectious passion that compels another nearby to join in. The rogue can target one humanoid within 30 feet and attempt a Perform (dance) check as a full-round action that does not provoke an attack of opportunity. Her target must succeed at a Will save (DC equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 Perform [dance] check) or it begins to dance uncontrollably. So long as the rogue continues to spend a full-round action dancing each round, the affected target does so as well. If the target is attacked or otherwise in immediate danger while dancing, the effect ends. Each round on its turn, the target can attempt an Acrobatics or Perform (dance) check or a Will save (target閳ユ獨 choice) against the rogue閳ユ獨 Perform (dance) check to end the effect. A target who resists the jig can not be affected by the same rogue閳ユ獨 jig for 24 hours. The grig jig is a mind-affecting effect. The rogue must have an Intelligence score of at least 12 to select this talent. A rogue can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she possesses.

entries.name: 勇毅
entries.description: 盗贼得到“业余铳士”专长，同时还得到一个他选择的勇毅专长。他必须满足先决条件才能选择这些专长。同时，在选择此天赋之前他必须要先选择过“火器训练”天赋。

entries.name: 勇毅
entries.description: 盗贼得到“业余铳士”专长，同时还得到一个他选择的勇毅专长。他必须满足先决条件才能选择这些专长。同时，在选择此天赋之前他必须要先选择过“火器训练”天赋。

entries.name: 大地之击
entries.description: 野蛮人可以用手中武器对地面发动一次攻击，这次攻击自动命中并正常造成伤害。如果造成的伤害大于地面硬度，则野蛮人占据与邻接的空间变为困难地形。除野蛮人以外，所有在该区域的生物需进行DC为15的反射检定，失败则摔倒。野蛮人必须至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。这项能力每次狂暴只能使用1次。

entries.name: Ground Breaker (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can attack the floor around her as a full-round action. This attack automatically hits and deals damage normally. If the barbarian deals more damage than the floor閳ユ獨 hardness, the space she occupies and all of the squares adjacent to her become difficult terrain. Creatures in those squares, except the barbarian, must succeed at DC 15 Reflex saves or be knocked prone.

  A barbarian must be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Ground Breaker, Greater
entries.description:
When using the ground breaker rage power, the barbarian can extend the radius of the effect by 5 feet. This rage power can be selected up to three times, and its effects stack.

  A barbarian must have the ground breaker rage power and be at least 8th level before selecting this rage power.

entries.name: Ground Breaker, Greater (UC)
entries.description:
When using the ground breaker rage power, the barbarian can extend the radius of the effect by 5 feet. This rage power can be selected up to three times, and its effects stack.

  A barbarian must be at least 8th level and have the ground breaker rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: Grounding Goo
entries.description: The alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb applies a sticky residue after any damage from the bomb is resolved. If a creature damaged by the bomb has a nonmagical fly speed, its flight is severely impaired, and it takes a penalty equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level on Fly checks for 1 minute.

entries.name: 滋长子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{正气如虹}

entries.name: 有备无患
entries.description: 在2级时，骑士在着轻甲，未着甲并且使用防御式战斗或是使用寓守于攻专长时，可以同时获得DR1/-以及在所有的豁免检定上+2士气加值。在6级及之后每提升4级时这个DR/-还会额外+1。当他获得中度或重度负重时骑士会失去本能力的好处。

entries.name: 守家
entries.description: 8级时，你可以每天1次花10分钟不被打扰地工作来对一个特定的区域施加防护。区域最大半径为每两个牧师等级5尺，持续时间每牧师等级1小时。当防护完成时，你决定可进入的生物数量。当其他生物进入区域时，所有你选定的生物都会被警告（如果在睡眠中会被惊醒）。区域内被选定的生物在攻击和豁免上获得等同于你感知调整的神圣加值。如果你离开防护区域，防护自动结束。此能力替换团队领域的团结能力。

entries.name: 生命守护
entries.description: 狂暴时，如果一次攻击使野蛮人HP低于0，野蛮人可以将致命伤害转换为非致命伤害，每野蛮人等级1点。如果野蛮人因致命伤害而令生命值为负，他的伤势自动稳定。

entries.name: Guarded Life, Greater
entries.description:
When using the guarded life rage power, 1 additional hit point of lethal damage per barbarian level is converted to nonlethal damage.

  A barbarian must have the guarded life rage power and be at least 6th level before selecting this rage power.

entries.name: 坚御心智
entries.description: 对抗影响心灵效果时，你的豁免获得+2洞察加值。

entries.name: 守卫姿态
entries.description: 野蛮人对抗近战攻击的AC获得+1闪避加值，此加值持续等同于他体质修正的轮数（最少1轮）。此加值每6个野蛮人等级会再+1。使用此狂暴之力是一个不会触发藉机攻击的移动动作。

entries.name: Guarded Stance (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can take on a more defensive posture. This grants her a +1 dodge bonus to her Armor Class for the duration of her current rage. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has.

  This is a stance rage power.

entries.name: Guardian of the North
entries.description:
As a standard action, the shaman assumes the form, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{野兽形态 IV}, of one of the following animals: dire bear, dire tiger, mastodon, or woolly rhinoceros.

  The duration of this transformation is 1 hour per level.

  The shaman can use this ability once per day.

entries.name: Guardian of the Tribe
entries.description: The shaman can cast a harmless spell with a range of touch on a member of her tribal bond as long as that creature is within 30 feet. The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1). In addition, she is constantly aware of the condition of all members of her tribal bond ability, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.4ya1fs9tyvsqnwqx]{关照术}.

entries.name: Guardian Spirit
entries.description:
A guardian spirit is an exemplar of protection and defense.

  
Spirit Bonus: When you channel a guardian, your spirit bonus applies to AC and on Constitution checks, Fortitude saves, and Reflex saves.

  Seance Boon: You gain a +1 bonus to CMD.

  Favored Locations: City walls, forts, gates, keeps.

  Influence Penalty: You are incredibly cautious and guarded in all things, and your caution sometimes gets in the way. When attacking, you always fight defensively, and when casting a spell, you always cast defensively. Because of your focus on defense, you take a penalty on damage rolls equal to your spirit bonus.

  Taboos: Choose one: you must always protect others from danger when you can (including defeated enemies, but not enemies that are an active threat to you and others); you must keep your body in fit physical condition, and you break this taboo every time you drop below half your maximum hit points; you must speak no words and use no abilities with the sonic descriptor, and you break this taboo if you become enraged, frightened, or panicked.

entries.name: Guardian's Shield
entries.description: You gain proficiency in heavy armors and shields (including tower shields).

entries.name: Guided Eyes
entries.description:
Perception is always a class skill for you. In addition, whenever you make a skill check to see through a disguise or find something that is hidden or concealed, you gain a +4 sacred bonus on the check.

  This power replaces the Sun's Blessing power of the Sun Domain.

entries.name: 指路明星
entries.description: 只要萨满可以在夜晚看到开阔的天空，就可以确知自己的具体所在。只要能看见夜空，就可以将感知调整值加到所有以魅力为基础的技能检定之上。此外每晚１次，在户外的星空下，你可以使你的法术附加法术默发、法术定发、法术延时或法术强效的超魔效果而不增加施法时间和提高环数。萨满无需习得这些超魔专长即可使用该效果。

entries.name: 语言专家
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼如果拥有至少一点语言学技能，那么她获得4门额外语言。没有在语言学上投入技能点的盗贼获得2门额外语言，如果她之后在语言学上投入了技能点，那她获得2门额外语言。这4门奖励语言不属于语言学技能获得的额外语言。

entries.name: Guise of Life
entries.description:
An undead vigilante with this talent gains an additional social identity in the form of one living creature identical to the vigilante閳ユ獨 appearance in life. Successful Knowledge checks reveal information about the vigilante as if he were a living creature, and he counts as living for the purpose of divination spells and effects. He gains no other benefit from appearing to be a living creature, and remains vulnerable to positive energy and spells that effect undead.

  The vigilante must be a corporeal undead creature to select this talent. Humanoid vigilantes with the negative energy affinity racial trait can also select this talent, gaining a human social identity.

entries.name: Guise of Unlife
entries.description:
A vigilante with this talent gains an additional social identity in the form of an undead version of one of his existing social identities, such as a ghoul, vampire, or zombie. Successful Knowledge checks reveal information about the vigilante as if he were undead, and he counts as undead for the purpose of divination spells and effects. He gains no other benefit from appearing to be an undead creature, and remains vulnerable to negative energy and spells that effect the living.

  The vigilante must be a living creature to select this talent.

entries.name: 枪械训练
entries.description: 5级开始，铳士可以选择一种特定类型的火器（例如战斧式滑膛枪、雷筒、滑膛枪或手枪）。她可以在该类型火器的伤害上获得等于她敏捷修正的加值。此外，每当她使用该类型火器哑火时，该火器的哑火值增加2代替原本的加4。之后的每4级（9级、13级和17级），铳士选择一种其他的火器类型，同样获得这些加值。

entries.name: 炮匠
entries.description: 1级时，铳士获得下列火器中一项：雷筒、滑膛枪或手枪。她的起始武器已磨损，只有她本人了解如何恰当使用。其他生物持用该火器时被认为破损。若武器本身已处于破损状态，其他人根本无法使用。此起始武器可作为废料出售（价值4d10gp）。【PFS】此武器出售价值为22金币(4d10的平均值)。铳士同时获得“枪匠”专长。

entries.name: Gusting Infusion
entries.description:
Element air; Type substance infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts air, blizzard, sandstorm, thunderstorm
Saving Throw Fortitude negates

  The wind from your infusion causes your blast to act as an instantaneous gust of wind. If your blast has a clear path, you can accept 2 additional points of burn or reduce the damage to 0 in order to cause the gust of wind effect to persist for 1 round along that path.

entries.name: Hag Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
Hags interbreed with other races frequently, and those children who escape their grasp may pass their heritage on to later generations before it reemerges. The potent humors that accompany hag blood are better suited to a bloodrager閳ユ獨 ferocity than to traditional spellcasting.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • Improved Natural Attack,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼}
  • Mother閳ユ獨 Gift.

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.to1cdmyh5rtfyg2s]{寒冷之触} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.k7cf5gshkp8xxqux]{目盲/耳聋术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (16th)

Hags interbreed with other races frequently, and those children who escape their grasp may pass their heritage on to later generations before it reemerges. The potent humors that accompany hag blood are better suited to a bloodrager閳ユ獨 ferocity than to traditional spellcasting.
