entries.name: Hag Fortitude
entries.description:
At 4th level, you become immune to mundane and magical diseases.

  At 8th level, you also become immune to poison.

entries.name: Hag Transformation
entries.description:
At 12th level, your form grows more twisted and powerful while bloodraging, but clumsy, blind aggression clouds your mind. Your morale bonus to Strength increases by 2, and you gain low-light vision and darkvision (60 feet), but you take a 閳? penalty to both Dexterity and Wisdom for the duration of your bloodrage.

  At 16th level, you apply your morale bonus on Will saving throws while bloodraging to Fortitude and Reflex saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.

entries.name: Hag-Called Discipline
entries.description:
A hag閳ユ獨 call echoes through your mind like a siren閳ユ獨 song, enticing you to surrender and become something horrible. Even after you閳ユ獫e resisted the call or even killed your hag mother, those echoes remain, shaping your mind into something else and telling you who you were meant to be. While you閳ユ獧e almost certainly a changeling, you might be a latent psychic who came into accidental psychic contact with a hag閳ユ獨 call through a changeling associate, or your dreams might have long been infested by a night hag閳ユ獨 machinations.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{注目术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.w2yf0ksu14e91uae]{三相} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxwycv6d7xwzua4t]{隐匿之纱} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{锢魂术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物} (18th).

entries.name: 鬼眼
entries.description: .  拥有此巫术的女巫可以创造一个魔法之眼并通过它观察事物，其效果等同于‘秘法眼’法术。若制造魔法之眼的女巫拥有【战团】巫术，所有在她周围10尺以内、且拥有【战团】巫术的女巫同样可以通过魔法之眼进行观察，不过眼睛的掌控权仍属于其创造者。她每天可以使用【鬼眼】的分钟等同于女巫等级。这些时间不需连续，但必须以1分钟为单位。

entries.name: Hairpin Trick
entries.description: The rogue is skilled at making do with anything she can find. She takes no penalty on Disable Device checks for using improvised tools, and can attempt such checks without any tools at a 閳? penalty. She treats all non-improvised thieves閳?tools as masterwork and doubles the bonus she gets from masterwork thieves閳?tools from +2 to +4.

entries.name: 圣礼
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以举行一次圣洁的终敷礼。圣礼需要一天时间来达成，在此期间，你必须进行恰当的仪式，祈祷并点燃熏香，当仪式结束尸体下葬时你必须在旁监督——该尸体必须在圣礼完成后的24小时内下葬否则仪式无效。一旦该尸体受过祝福，它就无法在被变为不死生物，如同被施展了法术圣居（Hallow）一般（施法者等级等同于你的审判者等级）。

entries.name: Hallucinogenic Aura
entries.description:
At 13th level, a mental field emanates from you, touching the minds of those nearby. Any creature within 30 feet of you must succeed at a Will save or be confused for 1d4 rounds. A creature that succeeds at its saving throw is immune to your hallucinogenic aura for 24 hours. A creature that fails its save doesn閳ユ獩 need to continue making saves while it閳ユ獨 confused by this aura, and becomes immune for 24 hours once its confusion ends. This is a mind-affecting effect.

  You閳ユ獧e immune to your own hallucinogenic aura, as well as that of any other psychic. You can brew an antidote that protects the imbiber from your aura. Brewing 1 dose requires 1 hour and a successful DC 15 Craft (alchemy) check. One dose閳ユ獨 effects last for 1 month.

entries.name: Hammerblow (UC)
entries.description:
The monk links his hands together, swinging both arms like a club and dealing tremendous damage. If the attack hits, the monk rolls his unarmed strike damage twice, adding both rolls together before applying Strength and other modifiers to the damage. This bonus damage is not multiplied on a critical hit.

  The monk must attack with a fist to use this style strike, but must have both hands free.

entries.name: 束缚巫咒
entries.description: 萨满使３０尺内的一名生物的ＡＣ和ＣＭＤ受到－２减值，持续轮数等于萨满等级。通过意志豁免可以使持续时间变为１轮。８级时，减值变为－４。无论豁免成功与否，受影响生物２４小时内无法再成为该巫术目标。

entries.name: Hamstring Strike
entries.description: Anytime a rogue with this talent successfully hits an opponent with a sneak attack, she may forgo her sneak attack damage to try to hamstring her opponent. If the attack succeeds, the rogue deals weapon damage as normal, but instead of the rogue dealing sneak attack damage, the target is knocked prone and is unable to take move actions during its next turn. A successful Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Dexterity modifier) negates this effect.

entries.name: 随从之手
entries.description: 你可以令你的近战武器从手中飞出攻击一个敌人后马上回来。作为一个标准动作，你可以用近战武器做一次射程30英尺的攻击。该次攻击视同使用投掷武器进行远程攻击，但在攻击检定中以意志修正代替敏捷修正（伤害仍以力量修正计算）。本能力无法用于战技攻击。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 学徒之手
entries.description: 你能让你的武器从你的手中飞出，打击一个敌人然后回到你手中。通过一个标准动作，你能使用一件近战武器作出一次30尺射程的单攻击。这次攻击视同投掷武器远程攻击，除了你用智力加值取代敏捷加值来决定攻击值（伤害依然使用力量加值）。此能力不能用于执行一项战技攻击。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: 秩序之手
entries.description:
在15等时，骑将能以一个迅捷动作，来宣告他是戒严的执法者。骑将每天可以使用此能力的轮数，等同于他的魅力调整值。

当他使用时，他可以忽视困难地形冲锋，并且在此次冲锋中，攻击检定额外再+2。而任何被骑将挫败士气的生物，如果在此能力发动时还处于被挫败士气的状态的话，那么这些生物会战栗（Shaken）。

战栗持续的轮数等同于骑将的魅力调整值。除此之外，当这些生物如果

  • 1.企图攻击骑将
  • 2.尝试以豁免检定对抗骑将的能力
  • 3.尝试以技能检定对抗骑将的能力

  则他们会受到-3的减值 （而非一般的-2）。一个骑将，在一场战斗中仅能使用此能力一次。

entries.name: 难以愚弄
entries.description: 拥有此天赋的盗贼很难被心灵影响效果玩弄。当她每个回合开始时，可自动获得一次豁免来不相信任何她看到的幻术，即使她没有与幻术互动。如果她在对不相信幻术的豁免检定中失败，她可以在一轮后使用同DC再次尝试豁免。此额外机会只有一次。

entries.name: 老油条
entries.description: 每日1次，拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以在一次察言观色检定中投掷两个骰子，取其中较高的结果作为检定结果。她必须选择在进行察言观色检定之前使用这一天赋。获得这一天赋之后每5个盗贼等级，盗贼可以增加一次这一天赋的每日使用次数。

entries.name: Hardened Fists
entries.description: At 1st level, you can make your fists grow large, callused, and gnarled as a free action. Your unarmed strikes deal damage as though you were one size category larger, deal lethal damage, and do not provoke attacks of opportunity. If you have claws, they are affected instead, and they deal damage as though you were one size category larger. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

entries.name: Harrow Bloodline
entries.description:
Just as knowledge of the harrow has passed from generation to generation since time immemorial, so too has a deep spiritual connection to the otherworldly forces bound by the harrow passed through the ages. Your connection to the mysterious deck grants you magical power over the cards of the harrow, visions of the future, and the ability to call down ephemeral forces.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：历史.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d1wxnax51cecplm4]{占卜术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hpdynlxhfnop2wm4]{Harrowing} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{幽影咒法术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b5mz8voksps5g4yq]{通晓传奇} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ew8hm1fndppz1ezx]{Harrowing, Greater} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3wdx7fjulsohi1lk]{怪影杀手} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.tD76K8QGco9scT0r]{制造奇物},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时}, 
  • Fortune Teller, 
  • Harrowed, 
  • Mage閳ユ獨 Tattoo,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：历史).

血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a divination spell that requires a percentage roll, add 5 to the result of your roll. In addition, you can roll the percentage dice twice and use the result you prefer. Your maximum percentage chance of receiving a meaningful and accurate reply for divination spells is 100%, instead of the usual 90%.

entries.name: Harrow Strike
entries.description: Once per day while making a sneak attack against a creature, you can draw a random card from a harrow deck you own. If your attack hits, instead of dealing sneak attack damage as normal, you deal a number of points of ability damage equal to your number of sneak attack dice. The ability score damaged is the score affiliated with the suit of the harrow card drawn. You can use this ability an additional time per day at 15th level and 20th level.

entries.name: Harrowed Home
entries.description: At 15th level, your otherworldly connection is so strong that your subconscious cleaves off a small portion of the Harrowed Realm for use as your own private sanctuary. Your harrowed home is created the first time you use this ability, and is decorated as a garish reflection of your personality. Thereafter, you always visit this same home. You can place a portal to your harrowed home once every 24 hours, but placing a new portal destroys the previous one, and you can not move the entrance while you are inside. As long as you are not in your harrowed home, time ceases to pass for anything and anyone still in your pocket dimension; creatures cannot move, objects do not decay, and everything remains exactly the same as you left it the last time you visited the plane. Time continues as normal whenever you are inside your harrowed home. This ability is otherwise identical to @Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{法师豪宅}.

entries.name: Harrowing Curse
entries.description:
The witch can curse a target creature by touching it with a card randomly drawn from a harrow deck she owns. The target is affected as if by the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒} using the witch閳ユ獨 caster level, except that the witch can decrease only the ability score that corresponds to the suit of the card drawn. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be targeted by this hex more than once in 24 hours.

  At 15th level, this hex acts as a major curse spell (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 215).

  A witch with the cartomancer archetype can combine this hex with her spell deck閳ユ獨 deliver touch spell ability.

entries.name: Harsh Judgement
entries.description:
A vigilante with this talent can pronounce judgment upon his foes as per the inquisitor class feature (see page 38 of the Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide). He can choose from among the following inquisitor judgments: destruction, piercing, purity, and smiting. For the purpose of determining the bonuses provided by this ability, the vigilante閳ユ獨 level stacks with levels in any other classes that grant judgment or harsh judgment. The vigilante can use this ability once per day plus an additional time per day at 4th level and every 3 levels thereafter (up to a maximum of seven times per day at 19th level).

  Only a vigilante with the Zealot archetype can select this talent.

entries.name: 急速袭击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：魔战士可以迅捷动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点来加快其行动。本效果同‘加速术’，但仅对魔战士生效且持续等于魔战士智力调整值的轮数。

entries.name: Hateful Aura
entries.description:
At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of hatred for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive. Enemies within this aura must attempt a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier). Characters who fail their save are filled with hatred, and cannot consider other characters allies for the purpose of any actions or use any teamwork feats. The effect ends immediately if the creature leaves the aura, you end the aura as a free action, or you expend all rounds of this ability.

  This power replaces the Destructive Aura power of the Destruction Domain.

entries.name: 憎恨反扑
entries.description: 每天一次，以一个直觉动作，当你被一次近战攻击命中是你可以立刻进行一次近战攻击反击该攻击你的对手。这次攻击总是以你最高的基本攻击加值来做出，即使你已经在本轮进行过攻击也是一样。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jdj4sfwksjgy2mqf]{Murderous Command}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1gz3zdpxu7uic5ky]{狂怒斗篷}

entries.name: Haunt Channeler
entries.description:
You gain the medium's haunt channeler class feature with an effective medium level equal to your oracle level 閳?.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 鬼扰
entries.description: 恶意的灵魂如影随形，在你身边制造各种不快和怪事（比如诡异的气流，小物件无主自动，轻微的噪声等）。取出任何携带的物品都需要你使用一个标准动作，除非它需要的时间长于一个标准动作，且任何你掉落的物品都会自动朝随机方向远离你10尺距离。将‘法师之手’和‘幻音术’加入你的已知法术列表；5级时，将‘浮空术’和‘次级幻影’加入你的已知法术列表；10级时，将‘心灵遥控’加入你的已知法术列表；15级时，将‘反重力’加入你的已知法术列表。

entries.name: Haunted Discipline
entries.description:
You attract the attention of spirits as naturally as a lodestone attracts iron filings. Testing your power leads you to develop some control over undead forces, despite the inherent defenses such creatures have against psychic abilities. Meanwhile, those spirits clinging to your life essence become increasingly protective, channeling their abilities to aid you and warn of threats. Psychics of this discipline are most common in Ustalav and Shenmen, where so many spirits are stuck in the transition between life and death.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aa0w7tk852iqn3ni]{侦测死灵} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y4ztvvswf2uuwuqo]{Calm Spirit} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f98kluovmjf6w7d5]{死灵定身术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ykb7nby9eovw8jyo]{Speak With Haunt} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wr96kbh0sqxecx63]{毁灭武器} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lllhr9py6w44cxjm]{亡灵归亡} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0j2cb0iv0695a45i]{Possession, Greater} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gw9bes9othfqm7mi]{同游灵界} (18th).

entries.name: 洗劫号令
entries.description: 8级起，骑士的坐骑获得践踏（trample）怪物特殊能力。若他的坐骑已经由其他来源获得践踏能力，那么坐骑的践踏攻击造成的伤害会视为坐骑的体型比当前增大1级（见Bestiary 302页的3-1表格）；这并不会改变坐骑的挥击（slam）所造成的伤害。若生物尝试进行反射豁免来避免坐骑的践踏攻击造成的伤害，则会引发骑士的借机攻击。

entries.name: 幻梦迷雾
entries.description: 在6级时，你能释放15尺半径的幻梦迷雾，持续牧师等级轮。这些轮数无需连续。在雾中的生物必须通过DC=10+牧师等级一半+感知加值的意志鉴定，否则被迷魂。你可以选定等同于你牧师等级的特定人选不受影响。在离开返回或灵光消逝后迷魂效果立刻结束。此能力取代机运领域的好运能力。

entries.name: Head (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon grows an additional head. The eidolon does not gain any additional natural attacks for the additional head, but the additional head does allow the eidolon to take other evolutions that add an additional attack to a head (such as a bite, gore, or breath weapon).

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

entries.name: Head-Butt (UC)
entries.description:
The monk slams his head into his enemy閳ユ獨 head, leaving his foe reeling. If the attack hits and the foe is of the same size or one size smaller than the monk, the monk can make a free combat maneuver check against the target of this strike (using the base attack bonus of the attack used to hit the foe). If the foe is not of the same creature type as the monk, the monk takes a 閳? penalty on this check. If the check is successful, the target is staggered for 1 round. Creatures without a discernible head are not affected by this style strike (subject to GM discretion).

  The monk must attack with a head-butt to use this style strike.

entries.name: Heads Up
entries.description: When you make a Perception check, as an immediate or swift action you can allow one adjacent ally to act as if they had also made a Perception check with the same result.

entries.name: 医者祝福
entries.description: 在到达6级时，你所有的医疗法术视同获得法术强化效果，其治疗的伤害点数增加一半（+50％）。此效果在使用医疗法术对不死生物造成伤害时不适用。此效果也不与法术强化超魔专长累计。

entries.name: 医者之触
entries.description: 萨满的医疗检定获得＋４加值。以一个标准动作，她可用半速移动并触摸最多６个濒死生物。被触摸生物将会自动稳定伤势而无需医疗检定。

entries.name: 治愈
entries.description: .  女巫可以缓解她所触碰者的痛苦。此能力等同于‘治疗轻伤’法术，使用女巫的施法者等级决定效果。每当一名生物受益于此巫术，24小时内无法再次从中获益。5级起，此巫术如‘治疗中伤’般生效。

entries.name: 治愈
entries.description: 萨满可以缓解她所触碰者的痛苦，此能力等同于治疗轻伤法术，使用萨满的施法者等级决定效果。每当一名生物受益于此巫术，２４小时内该生物都无法再次从中获益。５级起，此巫术如治疗中伤一般生效。

entries.name: 快速医疗
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个标准动作你可以通过接触一个盟友为他在一分钟内提供快速医疗3。

entries.name: 自我治疗
entries.description: 在1级时，你的治疗法术得到强化，以一个迅捷动作，你可以使一个治疗法术的治疗量增加50%，或是对不死生物造成50%额外伤害（如同法术强效超魔专长的效果）。本能力不能与法术强效超魔专长叠加。

entries.name: Healing Bomb
entries.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it heal damage instead of dealing it. Creating a healing bomb requires the alchemist to expend an infused extract or potion containing a cure spell. A creature that takes a direct hit from a healing bomb is healed as if she had imbibed the infusion or potion used to create the bomb. Creatures in the splash radius are healed for the minimum amount of damage the cure spell is capable of healing. A healing bomb damages undead instead of healing them.

entries.name: Healing Burst
entries.description:
Element aether, void, water, wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 1
Prerequisite kinetic healer or void healer
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  You use kinetic healer or void healer (whichever you have, or either if you have both) to heal all creatures in a 30-foot radius around you. Healing burst heals half as much damage as normal, unless your healing amount is based on positive blast, in which case it heals the full amount. Unlike kinetic healer, you must accept the burn yourself. This counts as kinetic healer for the purpose of the kinetic chirurgeon archetype (the 17th-level metahealer ability heals the kinetic chirurgeon twice閳ユ攼nce for half and once for full).

entries.name: Healing Fire
entries.description: At 15th level, you can channel energy twice per day as a cleric of half your level. Instead of using this ability to damage undead, you can convert the positive energy to flame and deal an equivalent amount of fire damage instead.

entries.name: 医疗恩典
entries.description: 当你施展一个对单体、影响区域或需要进行攻击骰的法术时，你可以治疗每法术等级1点的伤害。这些治疗可以让你自由选择要分给每个受到法术影响的目标。如果你选择将医疗能量给予任何不死生物的话，他会们受到相当于每点医疗1点的伤害。从11级开始，治疗的点数变为每法术等级2点。这个医疗只能在施法当下作用且对后来才进到法术范围的生物没有影响。在20级时，治疗的点数变为每法术等级3点。

entries.name: 疗者之手
entries.description: 你的医疗检定得到+4加值。你可以用一个标准动作稳定两个人的伤势或治疗毒素，但必须分别做医疗检定。在治疗铁棘藜（或类似效果），治疗致命伤势，治疗毒素，疾病或长期照护时，你可以一次治疗两倍的人数，同时你可以对自己进行长期照护。

entries.name: Healing Hex
entries.description:
A witch can soothe the wounds of those she touches. This acts as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.xoc3vhg3btmfjauq]{治疗轻伤} spell, using the witch's caster level.

  Once a creature has benefited from the healing hex, it cannot benefit from it again for 24 hours.

  At 5th level, this hex acts like @Compendium[pf1.spells.e67esdjp4nojtbr7]{治疗中度伤}.

entries.name: 治疗秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.eu4u4mr1naoiqohz]{移除恐惧}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fxz69pwpqt9b6uss]{次等复原术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ocbjt6z7amc3yn8w]{移除疾病}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.anya5qwdjhdfyk8u]{复原术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.sbhij6pdo24wkm48]{清洁术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.i22bvq17g4r3bp4j]{Pillar Of Life}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.igmb8lisqcnsxd2d]{高等复原术}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6346rs0f4sra9gt4]{群体治疗致命伤}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mxqi375ya2rka7cp]{完全复生术}

entries.name: 治愈之触
entries.description: 拥有此能力的炼金术师可以治疗他人。以一个标准动作，他可以将“自体再生”的能力分享给他碰触到的目标，该目标得到“自体再生”效果1轮的时间，这样会消耗炼金术师每日“自体再生”的使用轮数。炼金术师每日可以使用“自体再生”的上限升至“5×炼金术师等级”。此能力只能作用在物种和他相同的生物上（类人生物、不死生物之类）。炼金术师必须达到6级且拥有“自体再生”才能选择此科研发现。

entries.name: Heart of Fire
entries.description:
At 4th level, you gain fire resistance 5. Whenever you are subjected to a magical healing effect from a cure spell, you regain 1 additional hit point per die rolled.

  At 8th level, your fire resistance increases to 10, and you regain 2 additional hit points per die rolled when you are healed by a cure spell.

entries.name: Heart's Desire
entries.description: At 8th level, you receive divine guidance on the goals of your political allies and rivals. Once per day, you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{通神术} as a spell-like ability using your inquisitor level as your caster level, but only to ask questions about others閳?goals.

entries.name: Heat Adaptation
entries.description:
Element fire, water; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0

  You are constantly protected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境} against hot temperatures only. You gain an amount of fire resistance equal to twice your current amount of burn.

entries.name: 热能光环
entries.description: 以一个迅捷动作，你能以你为中心制造一波热量辐射。这股热量对10尺之内的所有目标造成每两个先知等级1d4点火焰伤害（最少1d4点）。通过反射可使伤害减半。豁免DC为“10+1/2先知等级+魅力修正”。此外，你的身形扭曲而模糊，使你获得20%隐蔽，直到你下一轮。你每天可以使用此能力1次，在5级以及之后的每5级多一次使用次数。

entries.name: Heat Wave
entries.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 1
Prerequisite heat adaptation, searing flesh

  You create an aura of shimmering heat that distorts the area around you. Until the next time your burn is removed, you can begin or end the heat aura as a swift action. The temperature in the area 30 feet around you rises by 5鎺?F per kineticist level you possess, to a maximum modified temperature of 120鎺?F. If this brings the temperature to at least 90鎺?F, all attacks made by creatures within 5 feet of you suffer a 20% miss chance due to concealment. You are immune to these effects, as are those immune to fire or benefiting from endure elements.

entries.name: 苍夜迅行
entries.description: 萨满可以短暂地撕开虚空，临时制造出一个单行黑洞。以一个标准动作，萨满选择３０尺内一个可视盟友或自己。萨满将该目标移动，如同使用了法术丑角之旅（Jester's jaunt，ＡＰＧ）。目标在２４小时内无法再次成为该巫术目标。

entries.name: 天堂之火
entries.description: 1级开始，你能通过一个标准动作释放一道圣火射线，对30尺以内的任何目标进行一次远程接触攻击。此射线对邪恶生物造成“1d4+1/2术士等级”伤害，此伤害属于神圣伤害，无法免疫或抵抗。此射线位善良生物带来“1d4+1/2术士等级”的治疗，每个善良生物每天不能被你的天堂之火治疗超过一次。中立生物不会受伤也不会被治疗。你每天能够使用此能力次数为“3+魅力调整值”。

entries.name: 夜空最终启示
entries.description: 20级时，你与苍穹融洽的关系授予你和宇宙并存的完美合谐。你在所有豁免检定上面得到相当于你魅力修正的加值，在生命低于0的时候伤势自动稳定，并免疫恐惧。同时所有由你造成的重击检定自动通过。当你死亡，你将在3天后以众星之子的姿态复活，你新的身体将会在7天内成长成熟，效果如同“转生术”。

entries.name: 夜空秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了夜空秘示域的先知将以下技能加入本职技能列表：飞行，位面知识，察觉，生存。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qcjskol4ac3eemhy]{七彩喷射} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zyfm6dq35i4hip4u]{催眠图纹} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6lebv7569xsypp8u]{虹彩图纹} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wqvy12w1xgk6l9b0]{翱翔天际} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6vfauefzzmwl4az7]{连环闪电} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mb819hvwpk0zmw53]{虹光喷射} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (18th).

entries.name: 苍天魂域
entries.description:
选择苍天魂域的萨满双眼透射出星光，周身散发出异世的霞光。当她激活该魂域能力时，她的双眼会忽然变得深邃而幽暗，瞬间吸收掉周遭的光芒。

  魂术：七彩喷射（１环）、催眠图纹（２环）、昼明术（３环）、虹彩图纹（４环）、翱翔天际（５环）、连锁闪电（６环）、虹光喷射（７环）、阳炎爆（８环）、流星爆（９环）

  魂兽：该魂兽的身躯上会清楚的显现出此时高挂天空中的星座图像，无论是白天还是黑夜。因此，该魂兽可以作为星图。另外，它获得５尺飞行速度；若它已有飞行速度，飞行速度增加１０尺。当魂兽飞行时，星色光圈会环绕着它。

entries.name: 苍天魂域显圣
entries.description: ２０级时，萨满成为苍天的精魂。她可以将感知调整值添加到所有豁免上。当她生命值低于０时自动稳定伤势。她免疫恐惧效果，所造成的重击威胁自动确认。若她死亡，将在３天后转世为星之子（ｓｔａｒ　ｃｈｉｌｄ），并在随后７天内加速成长为人（如同转生术）。

entries.name: 重甲擅长
entries.description: 13级时，魔战士开始擅长重甲。魔战士可以穿着重甲施展魔战士法术而忽视正常的奥术失败率。但使用盾牌的魔战士则和其他奥术施法者一样，在施放包含姿势成分的法术时遭受奥术失败率。

entries.name: Heavy Training
entries.description:
The vigilante gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.3MqcLuZfUJB8xMby]{擅长重型盔甲} as a bonus feat, if he does not have that feat already. The armor skin vigilante talent also applies to heavy armor.

  At 16th level, if the vigilante has the armor skin vigilante talent, he can move at full speed in heavy armor.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: 鬼神力
entries.description: 20 级时，你血脉中传承的恶鬼之力将达到顶点。你获得了在正常的形态和任意一种具有巨人亚种的大型人型生物之间变幻的能力（如同法术@Compendium[pf1.spells.61uvtd18e9s6zku3]{巨人形态I}），你必须 在达到20级时选定你希望变化的巨人生物类型，并且一旦选定即不可更改。你可以随意在两个形态之间互相切换，也可以在变形后保持此状态任意时间。除此之外，你还会获得相当于（6+术士等级）的法术抗力。你施放的所有带有魅惑和控制子系的法术DC+2.

entries.name: 地狱腐败
entries.description: 你的近战接触攻击令生物更易腐败。被摸到的生物豁免受到-2惩罚，而且掷对抗的技能检定的时候必须投两次取最小值。该效果持续轮数为你牧师等级一半，每天可用“3+感知修正”次。此能力取代秩序领域的秩序之触能力和邪恶领域的邪恶之触能力。

entries.name: Hellbound Curse
entries.description:
Infernal influence grants you profane insight and weighs on your soul. You cannot cast spells with the good or chaotic descriptors, and you can閳ユ獩 summon good or chaotic creatures. Good and chaotic creatures instinctively distrust you, and you take a 閳? penalty on all Diplomacy checks against such creatures. You gain a +2 bonus on all Bluff and Intimidate checks.

  At 5th level, you gain a +4 bonus to all saving throws against charm effects.

  At 10th level, you gain immunity to fire.

  At 15th level, any weapon you wield is treated as lawful and evil for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.

entries.name: 地狱火
entries.description: 在9级时，你能召来一地道狱火柱。60尺范围内一点产生10尺半径爆发，造成每术士等级1d6火焰伤害。爆发区域内的生物能够通过一次成功的反射豁免使伤害减半，豁免失败的善良生物将战栗每术士等级1轮，豁免DC为“10+1/2术士等级+魅力修正”。9级时你能使用此能力每天1次；17级时每天2次；20级时每天3次。

entries.name: Hellfire Bomb
entries.description:
This discovery is available to tiefling alchemists.

  When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can have it act as an explosive bomb, but deal half of its damage as fire damage and half as unholy damage that is not subject to fire resistance or immunity. An alchemist must be at least 9th level and have the explosive bomb discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 地狱火冲锋
entries.description: 16级起，当你进行冲锋时，在冲锋结束时所作出的攻击会获得地狱火之击的好处，而且这不需要消耗地狱火之击的使用次数。若你的地狱火之击已经启动，那么火焰伤害会穿透10点或更低的火焰抗力。

entries.name: Hellfire Ray
entries.description: When an arcanist uses the flame arc exploit, she can spend 1 additional point from her arcane reservoir to draw the flames from Hell. If she does so, half of the damage she deals is fire, and the other half results directly from unholy power that is not subject to fire resistance. Good creatures that take damage from a hellfire ray must succeed at a Will saving throw or be sickened for 1d4 rounds.

entries.name: 地狱火之击
entries.description: 1级起，每日至多3次以迅捷动作，你能够向你的攻击中灌入地狱火。当你这么做时，所有近战攻击都会获得炽焰（flaming）武器特殊能力，持续1轮。12级起，每日至多能够使用5次该能力，而且效果视为焰爆（flaming burst）。

entries.name: Heralding Bloom
entries.description:
A witch can compel a plant within 30 feet to spread a message, which must be 25 words or fewer and in a language the witch speaks. This message can閳ユ獩 contain verbal spell components, command words, or other magical effects. An intelligent plant that閳ユ獨 targeted can attempt a Will save to negate the effect. If the save fails, the plant is magically compelled to 閳ユ笩peak閳?this message in an audible voice, repeating it each time one or more intelligent creatures to whom the message has not yet been repeated comes within range, until 24 hours after the hex has been placed. The plant under the effect of the hex does not gain any special intelligence from this hex or gain any ability to understand the message if it does not normally understand the language the message is delivered in, and it is in no way otherwise compelled to act in any way it would not normally.

  A witch can have a number of heralding blooms active equal to her witch level + her Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Herbal Antivenom
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  Your body can produce the herbal remedies necessary to counter almost any poison. You gain a +5 alchemical bonus on saving throws against poison, as if you were always under the effect of antitoxin. You can use the treat poison action from the Heal skill as a standard action with a mere touch, without a healer閳ユ獨 kit, and even on yourself; if you succeed, you grant the touched creature a +5 alchemical bonus against that specific instance of poison in addition to the normal +4 bonus from treat poison.

  You can accept 1 point of burn while using the treat poison action in this way to also produce the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.6l904edkt8jv9jor]{中和毒性}.

entries.name: Herbal Compound
entries.description: A ninja with this trick can consume specially prepared herbs to strengthen her mind. The ninja can spend 1 ki point and smoke, eat, or inject an herbal compound as a move action. The ninja takes a 閳? penalty to AC and on Reflex saves but gains a +4 alchemical bonus on Will saves for 10 minutes per ninja level.

entries.name: 裁决：猎端
entries.description: 神授力量: 主神追随者的信仰属于异端或是真信极难以分辨。你使用诡骗，潜伏和其他异端们熟悉的狡诈手段来将他们从教会中抓出，进行制裁。

entries.name: 英勇共鸣
entries.description: 3级起，当你从任何（包括你对自己释放的）法术、类法术能力或魔法物品中获得士气加值时，该加值额外+1。9级起，此能力也适用于表现加值。如果你获得一个影响区域或者多个目标的士气效果时（9级起也可以为“表现效果（competence effect）”），可以用一个直觉动作将你获得的额外加值赋予所有受术者。该增强对其他人持续的轮数等同于你的魅力修正。你可以每天使用该能力1次，3级之后每3级可以多使用1次。

entries.name: 英勇传奇
entries.description: 15级起，你能以一个迅捷或移动动作通过牺牲法术位，将术士级别作为吟游诗人级别来使用【提振战力】或【激发勇气】。该效果持续轮数等同于牺牲的法术环级。该效果对人类持续时间加倍。

entries.name: 英勇子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概}

entries.name: 巫术
entries.description: 每个女巫都能学到一些被称为巫术的魔法技巧，给予她们力量或削弱其敌人。1级时，女巫选择并获得一项巫术。2级和之后每2级，她能够额外获得一项巫术。女巫不能选择同一项巫术多于1次。若无特别说明，使用巫术是一个不会引发藉机攻击的标准动作。巫术豁免DC为“10+1/2女巫等级+智力修正”。

entries.name: 巫术
entries.description:
萨满能够习得一些被称作巫术的神奇技法，并用来削弱敌人的力量。２级起，萨满会学会一个巫术。在４级、８级、１０级、１２级、１６级、１８级和２０级，萨满都会学会一个新巫术。萨满可以从下列巫术与魂域特定巫术中选择所学习的巫术。若无特别说明萨满无法学习单个巫术多次。

  除非另有说明，使用巫术都是不会引起藉机攻击的标准动作。抵抗巫术的豁免ＤＣ为１０＋１/２萨满等级＋萨满的感知调整值。

entries.name: Hex of Lignification
entries.description:
The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to turn into a twisted, treelike shape for 2 rounds. The target gains hardness 5 but is staggered, and can negate the effect with a successful Fortitude saving throw.

  Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: 秘密行动
entries.description: 调查员懂得如何藏起自己的计划，躲避窥探的视线甚至逃脱魔法的探测。当调查员在使用唬骗技能传递密语或使用语言学技能编造暗号时，他可以在此技能检定上使用灵感能力时双骰取高。除此之外，当调查员在对抗预言系魔法或效果的豁免投骰上使用灵感能力时他可以不需要消耗灵感点数。调查员至少要达到5级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 秘居
entries.description: .  女巫可以隐藏或掩饰她的家园和周围地区，如同使用“海市蜃楼”法术。在使用此巫术前，她必须花1天沿着区域的边境踱步丈量40000平方尺（约200尺见方）左右，以确定家园领土。此后，只要女巫处在该地区，她就能以标准动作使用此巫术改变该地区的外观。这个幻术持续存在，直到女巫更改或解消。对于此能力而言，女巫同时只能拥有一片“家园领土”。

entries.name: Hidden Magic
entries.description:
You gain the Conceal Spell feat as a bonus feat without needing to meet the prerequisites.

  At 7th level, you can also hide your use of spell trigger items using the Conceal Spell feat, though onlookers receive a +2 bonus on their skill checks to pierce your subterfuge.

  At 11th level, you can even hide the use of spell completion items using the Conceal Spell feat, though in this case, onlookers receive a +5 bonus on their skill checks to pierce your subterfuge.

entries.name: 隐藏大师
entries.description: 20级时，忍者成为一个真正的技艺大师。她可以用一个标准动作为自己施展‘高等隐形术’。当以此方式隐形时，她无法以任何方式侦测到，甚至‘消除隐形’、‘识破隐形’和‘真知术’也无法发现她。她使用忍者等级作为此能力的施法者等级，使用此能力花费2点气。此外，每当忍者造成偷袭伤害时，她可以牺牲额外伤害骰来对目标的一项属性值造成等于所牺牲骰数的减值。该减值自身不累计，也无法将属性值降至1以下。

entries.name: Hidden Mind
entries.description: A rogue with this talent uses various devious techniques, including mental exercises and dusting her clothing with a small amount of lead, to protect herself from divinations, with the same benefits as if she cast nondetection on herself with a caster level equal to her rogue level.

entries.name: 忍法·匿兵
entries.description: 拥有此忍术的忍者可以轻松地将武器藏在身上。忍者将她的等级加在隐藏武器对应的手上功夫技能检定上。此外，她可以用移动动作抽出隐藏的武器，替代原本的标准动作。

entries.name: 藏匿光环
entries.description: 9级开始，你可以在侦测类魔法前隐藏自己。此能力类似一个常驻的@Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测}。你能够以一个移动动作来终结或恢复此效果。

entries.name: 视线躲藏
entries.description:
影舞者即使在被注意到的情况下也可以使用隐秘技能。

  只要距离阴影10尺内，影舞者就能在没有任何障碍物可利用的情况下隐藏自己的身形。但是她不能够躲在自己的影子里。

entries.name: 视线躲藏
entries.description:
影舞者即使在被注意到的情况下也可以使用隐秘技能。

  只要距离阴影10尺内，影舞者就能在没有任何障碍物可利用的情况下隐藏自己的身形。但是她不能够躲在自己的影子里。

entries.name: Hide in Plain Sight (VIG)
entries.description:
The vigilante can use Stealth to hide even when being observed. As long as he is within 10 feet of dim light (his own shadow doesn閳ユ獩 count), he can hide without anything to actually hide behind.

  Only a stalker vigilante of at least 8th level can select this talent.

entries.name: Hierophant Spirit
entries.description:
A hierophant spirit is a being of true and pure faith.

Spirit Bonus: When you channel a hierophant, your spirit bonus applies on Wisdom checks, Wisdom-based skill checks, and Will saves.

  Seance Boon: Your healing spells and abilities heal an additional 2 points of damage to each target. This does not affect healing conferred by magic items, nor does it add to fast healing or similar effects.

  Favored Locations: Altars, churches, sacred groves, shrines.

  Influence Penalty: Whether the spirit hopes to offer a chance for redemption or to sacrifice foes later on a dark altar, you must strike for nonlethal damage in combat whenever possible. You take a penalty equal to your spirit bonus on all Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks involving worshipers of faiths other than the spirit閳ユ獨, except checks to convince others to convert to the spirit閳ユ獨 faith.

  Taboos: Choose one: you must strongly revere nature and may not wear metal armor or shields; you must follow a paladin or antipaladin code as appropriate for the spirit閳ユ獨 deity; you may not deliberately speak any lies, including bluffing, exaggerating, stating half-truths with intent to deceive, lies by omission, and so on, and if you know the answer to a question that someone asks you, you must give the answer.

entries.name: 轻功
entries.description: 5级时，在进行跳跃（无论是跳高还是跳远）时，武僧可以将他的武僧等级加到特技检定上。此外，他跳跃时总是被视为已助跑。自丹田消耗1点气的话，武僧可以在进行跳跃的特技检定上获得+20加值，效果持续1轮。

entries.name: High Jump (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ki power adds his level as a bonus on all Acrobatics checks to jump, both for vertical jumps and horizontal jumps. In addition, he always counts as having a running start when attempting Acrobatics checks to jump.

  By spending 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action, the monk gains a +20 bonus on Acrobatics checks to jump for 1 round.

entries.name: High Jumper
entries.description:
When a ninja with this trick makes a high jump, the DC for that jump is half the normal DC.

  The ninja must have the acrobatic master trick before taking this talent.

entries.name: 嘶嘶之怒
entries.description:
每小时一次，以标准动作，野蛮人可以向临近的敌人喷吐毒液。她必须进行一次接触攻击才能以这种方式成功地把毒吐在敌人身上，但是当她啮咬攻击命中时，她也可以以迅捷动作使毒生效。这种毒药的豁免DC为“10+1/2野蛮人等级+野蛮人的体质调整值”。

  嘶嘶之怒毒素（Hissing Rage Poison）

  啮咬--接触或伤口；强韧豁免；频率：1次每轮 持续6轮；1d2力量伤害；连续2次成功豁免治愈

entries.name: Hive Curse
entries.description:
You were exposed at a young age (perhaps even before you were born) to the alien species known as the hive, but this exposure did not result in a full-blown infestation by these otherworldly monsters. Others (including animals) find the unsightly spines and rough growths that periodically emerge from your flesh to be disturbing and distracting, and you take a 閳? penalty on Bluff, Diplomacy, Handle Animal, and Ride checks. Once per day as a standard action, you can cough up an ovoid, leathery sphere that can be hurled as a flask of acid, though it becomes inert after 24 hours.

  At 5th level, you gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境} in hot environments and are immune to infestations (save for those from the hive itself ).

  At 10th level, your skin deformities grow numerous enough to increase your natural armor bonus by 1.

  At 15th level, you gain acid resistance 20.

entries.name: 蜂群图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人因集群攻击所受的伤害减半，这里的集群包括由法术所造成的集群和类似效果。此外，他的力量检定+1，并对冲撞、拖拽或绊摔的CMD上得到同样的加值，此加值每4级再+1，直到20级的+5。野蛮人必须要学会【野性之怒】且达到4级才能学习“蜂群图腾”。

entries.name: 蜂群图腾守护
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人将不受集群伤害。这同时也让他免疫集群攻击所造成的流血和中毒效果。此外，他在擒抱时CMB与CMD皆+1，此加值每4级再+1，直到20级的+5。野蛮人必须先学习【蜂群图腾】且达到6级，才能选择“蜂群图腾守护”。

entries.name: 蜂群图腾毒素
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人由【野性之怒】狂暴之力所提供的啮咬伤害提升一级，且啮咬攻击的减值降为-2。每狂暴时一次，野蛮人可以替自己的啮咬注入毒性，此毒素会在接下来4轮中每轮发作1次，造成1d3点体质伤害。通过1次DC为“10+1/2野蛮人等级+体质修正值”的强韧豁免可以治愈。野蛮人必须达到8级且学会【蜂群图腾守护】，才有办法学习“蜂群图腾毒素”。

entries.name: 白霜
entries.description: .  目标被凝霜形成的冰针外壳所覆盖，白霜缓慢地入侵他的血肉。目标变得苍白和发青，每分钟受到1点体质伤害直到死亡、通过强韧豁免（每分钟1次）、或被治愈。‘破除结界’、‘解除魔法’、‘移除诅咒’或类似法术可结束该效果。通过豁免的生物将不受此巫术影响1天。这是一个〔冷〕效果。

entries.name: 屏息
entries.description: 拥有此天赋的盗贼可以屏息额外两轮的时间，他可以多次选择此天赋。

entries.name: Hold Breath (UC)
entries.description: A rogue with this talent doubles the amount of time she can hold her breath.

entries.name: Holy Bombs
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal good divine damage. Evil creatures that take a direct hit from a holy bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against neutral creatures, holy bombs deal half damage, and such targets are not affected by their staggering effect. Holy bombs have no effect on good-aligned creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 神圣代行者
entries.description: 20级时，圣骑士成为了她所信仰的神与主物质界连同的纽带。她的伤害减免提升到“10/邪恶”。当她使用【制裁邪恶】并在随后成功击中一名邪恶异界生物时，此生物同时受到 @Compendium[pf1.spells.trl849bibbe760xo]{放逐术}, 的效果，施法者等级等于她的圣骑士等级（她的武器和圣徽自动被看作目标所仇恨的物件）。在放逐效果和攻击伤害计算完毕后，当次【制裁邪恶】立刻结束。此外，当她引导正能量或使用圣疗的时候，治疗的点数取最大值。

entries.name: 神圣之枪
entries.description: 在8级，你能够通过触碰使得一个武器获得“神圣”附魔，持续轮数为一半牧师等级。在8级你能够使用该能力每天1次，以后每比8级多4级增加1次。

entries.name: Holy Water
entries.description: The arcanist can unleash a jet of holy water by expending 1 point from her arcane reservoir. This creates a 30-foot line of water that deals damage equal to 1d8 points of damage plus the arcanist閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier, plus an additional 1d8 points of damage for every 2 levels beyond 1st (to a maximum of 10d8 at 19th level) to each target in the line that would normally take damage from holy water. Creatures in the area of effect can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage.

entries.name: 家园子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nee6cxpoekp3aklq]{魔法警报}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.53dyu81yaw4y0nz4]{Glyph Of Warding}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8z4tlk1fojr9t9yb]{铜墙铁壁}

entries.name: 甜言蜜语
entries.description: 每天1次，唬骗检定可以骰2次取高，但是必须在进行唬骗检定前决定是否使用该能力。每5个盗贼等级可以额外增加1次每日使用该能力的机会。

entries.name: 义无反顾
entries.description: 以一次接触，你可以提醒一个生物其义务和责任，给其一次新的豁免机会，来对抗正在影响它的允许豁免的惑控系“魅惑”和“胁迫”效果，如果此次豁免成功效果立即结束。如果你在对抗这类效果的豁免中失败，你可以以一个直觉动作给你自己提供一次额外的豁免。如果目标（你或被触摸的生物）已经做过一次额外的豁免检定，此能力对该惑控效果不再生效。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换荣耀领域的光荣触摸能力。

entries.name: 万物荣耀
entries.description: 2级时，勇武道的武士从他的荣誉感中提取力量。每当武士进行一次技能或豁免检定时，他可以用一个自由动作唤起荣耀的力量，来令自己的检定获得+4士气加值。他在2级时可以每日使用本能力1次，之后每提升4级再加1次每日可用次数，并在18级时达到每日5次的上限。

entries.name: 诚实子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.snspotd2cno49ed5]{诚实之域}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pfv5zv744x9dwg38]{指使术}

entries.name: 荣耀抵抗
entries.description: 11级时，武士可以进行1次荣耀抵抗，决定不计代价地与其挑战目标奋战到底。在11级时他可以每日使用荣耀抵抗1次，16级时再增加1次。宣告1次荣耀抵抗是一个迅捷动作。当进行荣耀抵抗时，武士对战栗、惊惧和恐慌状态免疫。他在生命值降至0以下时不会失去意识。最后，每当进行荣耀抵抗的武士进行豁免检定时，他可以花费1次【决意】次数在第一次检定后重骰一次。他必须接受第二次的结果，即便更糟。若进行荣耀抵抗的武士从与挑战对手的战斗中撤退，他失去进行挑战的能力24小时。

entries.name: Hooves (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon has a pair of sharp hooves at the end of its limbs, giving it two hoof attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The hooves deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge). The eidolon must have the limbs evolution to take this evolution. This evolution can only be applied to the limbs (legs) evolution once. Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws evolution from its base form with these hoof attacks (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of limbs evolutions.

entries.name: Horrific Glimpse
entries.description:
Once per day, the shaman can gain the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} after 1 hour of meditation. No components are required in order to use this ability, but the shaman does not get to select which plane she contacts. Instead, this version of the spell contacts an alien mind from somewhere in the Dark Tapestry, be it a hive mind of alien monstrosities, the disembodied sentience of a dead planet, or even the slumbering and insane mind of a Great Old One or Outer God. The shaman must succeed at a DC 16 Wisdom check rather than an Intelligence check to avoid a decrease in Intelligence or Charisma when using this ability. If she fails the check, her Intelligence and Charisma scores each fall to 8 for 5 weeks, as the alien minds thus contacted prove as destructive to mortal thoughts as direct contact with the most powerful of deities. The types of answers provided by the horrific glimpse, be they true answers, ignorance, lies, or random answers, are considered equal to those of a greater deity if the questions being asked concern the Material Plane, but they are equal to those of a demigod if the questions posed concern any other plane.

Also once per day (but only after first using this ability as per contact other plane), the shaman can reveal a fragment of this horrific vision to another creature, as per >phantasmal killer, except that the target takes 1d4+1 points of Wisdom damage regardless of the results of any of its saving throws. The body of a creature slain by this effect is always hideously mutilated and savaged, making spells like speak with dead useless.

entries.name: 慑人外观
entries.description: 1级开始，你可以凭借鬼婆祖先之力，让一个目标认为你具有恐怖的外观。通过一个标准动作，你可以迫使一个30尺内的目标进行DC为“10+1/2术士等级+魅力修正”的意志豁免，失败则陷入战栗，持续轮数为你术士等级的一半（至少1轮）。这是一个基于恐惧、影响心灵的效果。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Horse Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the horse grants speed and maneuverability. A horse閳ユ獨 alternate attack is hoof (B).

Minor Form: You gain the @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍} feat as well as an enhancement bonus of +5 feet to your base speed.

  At 8th level, you gain the @Compendium[pf1.feats.bXeW4kLCErPBFpNB]{飞跑} feat. If you already have the @Compendium[pf1.feats.bXeW4kLCErPBFpNB]{飞跑} feat, you instead can run at 6 times your base speed when using the Run feat.

  At 15th level, your enhancement bonus to your base speed increases to +15.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a horse. While in this form, you gain a base speed of 50 feet, low-light vision, scent (30 feet), and the ability to move before and after an attack, as if you had the @Compendium[pf1.feats.liPAO5urMI9chctT]{骑乘掠击} feat.

  At 8th level, you can move through threatened squares without provoking attacks of opportunity, and you gain trample, as the universal monster rule, dealing your shifter claw damage.

  At 15th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.go4xOiSUP8R1QJ5N]{精通闯越} as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisites.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Hoof (B)

entries.name: Hshurha's Veil
entries.description: When raging, the barbarian can use Stealth, and she gains a bonus equal to 1/2 her barbarian level on Stealth checks plus the benefits of concealment against ranged attacks and attacks of opportunity.

替代神授力量 You gain Intimidate as a class skill; this replaces the Glory domain閳ユ獨 increased save DC to resist channel positive energy.

  替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.uv3bvuerhe0furhu]{Hollow Heroism}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nyafit6oz90jqakn]{Hollow Heroism, Greater}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}.
  • If you are evil, replace the domain spells @Compendium[pf1.spells.hl9l92qfalq6c55z]{祝福武器} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{圣洁灵光} with @Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{援助术} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{邪恶灵光} respectively.

entries.name: 饥饿
entries.description: 极度的饥饿在焦虑的情况下折磨着你的身体。你无法从提供营养的法术或魔法物品中获得好处，例如神莓、英雄宴或维生戒指。你还会获得造成适合你体型的穿刺伤害的啮咬攻击(大体型为1d8，中体型为1d6，小体型为1d4)，此攻击为次要天武攻击。每场战斗你都会以处于恶心的状态开始，直到你使用了啮咬攻击造成伤害为止。5级时，你在对体型小于自身的生物进行的啮咬攻击上附加掳抓(grab)怪物特殊能力。；10级时，你的啮咬攻击造成的伤害视同大一个体型；15级时，你的啮咬攻击可造成吸血(blood drain)怪物特殊能力，如果你擒抱住敌人的话，可在回合结束时造成对方1d2体质伤害。

entries.name: 猎人战术
entries.description: 3级起，猎人会自动将她的团队专长赋予自己的动物伙伴。动物伙伴不需要满足这些团队专长的先决条件。

entries.name: 猎手羁绊
entries.description:
4级时，游侠与他的狩猎伙伴产生了一种羁绊，可以两种不同的方式之一体现。

  其一为游侠与其队友的羁绊。此羁绊让他以移动动作给予30尺之内能看见或听到他的盟友，针对单一目标时等同其本身针对该宿敌的一半加值，持续轮数为游侠的感知调整值（至少为1）。这一加值不与游侠队友的宿敌加值叠加，而是应用较高的一个。

  其二为游侠与其动物伙伴的羁绊。选择了此种方式的游侠可以从如下列表中选择一种动物伙伴：獾、鸟类、骆驼、猫科（小型），凶暴鼠、狗、马、矮种马、蛇（毒蛇或蟒蛇）或狼。如果战役部分或全部在水生环境中展开，游侠可以选择鲨鱼。选择的动物会成为游侠的忠诚伙伴，会以符合自身种类的方式在冒险旅途中陪伴游侠。游侠的动物伙伴享有游侠的宿敌和偏好地形加值。这一能力的作用方式与德鲁伊的动物伙伴能力（德鲁伊的自然纽带能力的一部分）类似，只是游侠的德鲁伊等效等级相当于“游侠等级-3”。

entries.name: 猎手突袭
entries.description: 每日1次，拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以选定一个邻近敌人作为他的猎物。直到她的下一轮结束前，盗贼对这一目标的每一次攻击都会造成偷袭伤害，即使这一目标并未处于措手不及或者是夹击状态下。

entries.name: 中级投掷
entries.description: 同【次级投掷】，但野蛮人可以使射程增量提高至20尺，或增加一级投掷物体的大小。野蛮人必须习得【次级投掷】且至少8级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 冲锋投掷
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人可以装备一件武器并在冲锋期间投掷出去。野蛮人在冲锋中的投掷与冲锋最后的近战攻击检定都+2。野蛮人必须至少移动10尺才能投掷，然后再移动至少10尺才能做出近战攻击。野蛮人必须在冲锋前装备一件投掷武器或是空着一只手。野蛮人必须习得【次级投掷】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 高级投掷
entries.description: 同【中级投掷】，但野蛮人可以使射程增量提高至30尺，或增加两级投掷物体的大小。野蛮人必须习得【中级投掷】且至少12级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 次级投掷
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人能以整轮动作举起并投出一个物体，将其作为射程增量为10尺的临时武器。用双手、单手分别能投出比自己体型小一级、两级的物体，造成伤害等同于物体坠落并加上野蛮人的力量修正。若物体并非石头、金属或类似的坚硬材料则伤害减半。这是一次远程接触攻击，目标可以尝试DC为“10+1/2野蛮人等级+力量修正”的反射豁免使伤害减半。野蛮人可以在此次攻击中使用“猛力攻击”专长，按双手或单手投掷分别计算额外伤害。

entries.name: Hurricane Queen
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Su); Level 9; Burn 閳?/p>

  You are one with the hurricane. Your enveloping winds defense wild talent has an additional 25% chance of deflecting nonmagical ranged attacks, and your total deflection chance can exceed the usual cap of 75%.

  All wind and weather (including creatures using the whirlwind monster ability) affect you and your attacks only if you wish them to do so; for example, you could shoot arrows directly through a tornado without penalty.

entries.name: Hypnotic Stare
entries.description:
A mesmerist can focus his stare on one creature within 30 feet as a swift action. That creature takes a 閳? penalty on Will saving throws. This penalty changes to 閳? at 8th level.

  A mesmerist can maintain his stare against only one opponent at a time; it remains in effect until the mesmerist stares at a new target, the opponent dies, the opponent moves farther than 30 feet away, or the mesmerist falls unconscious or dies. The mesmerist can remove the memory of his stare from the target閳ユ獨 mind; the creature doesn閳ユ獩 remember that it was affected (nor does it realize that it is currently being affected) unless the mesmerist allows it.

  The hypnotic stare is a psychic effect, and relies more on the mesmerist閳ユ獨 focus than the target閳ユ獨 perception of his stare. It can閳ユ獩 be avoided in the same ways a gaze attack can. The mesmerist can use this ability even while blinded, but must succeed at a DC 20 concentration check to do so.

  Staring at a creature requires the mesmerist閳ユ獨 focus, so if he uses a gaze attack or similar ability, he must target the subject of his hypnotic stare or voluntarily end the stare. The penalties from multiple mesmerists閳?stares don閳ユ獩 stack, nor do they stack with penalties from witches閳?evil eye hexes. This is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: Hypothermia
entries.description:
The shaman afflicts a creature within 30 feet with hypothermia. The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. On a failed save, the target is fatigued for 2 rounds.

  At 8th and 16th levels, the duration of this hex is extended by 1 round.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: 坚定不移
entries.description: 8级时，封印骑将可以藉由他的奉献精神克服身体的弱点。只要在该轮中他没有移动5尺以上，他可以在对抗冲撞、闯越、拖拽、推挤和绊摔的战技防御上得到+2加值。此加值持续到他下一轮开始。

entries.name: 寒冰铠甲
entries.description: 你可以创造出一件寒冰铠甲，为你提供+4盔甲加值。7级以及之后的每4级该加值再+2。13级这件盔甲为你提供伤害减免“5/穿刺”。在寒冷的环境中，盔甲加值（以及伤害减免加值）增加2点；在十分炎热的环境将会减少2点。你每天可以使用此铠甲的小时数等于你的先知等级。这些时间不必连续，但每次使用最少消耗1小时。

entries.name: 寒冰飞弹
entries.description: 奥能师可以从【奥能源泉】中消费1点来创造出一颗冰结飞弹。对30尺距离内任一目标进行一次远程接触攻击。若此攻击命中，则造成“1d6+奥能师魅力调整值”点寒冷伤害，1级后每2级再增加1d6点（最高在19级达到10d6）。此外目标还会恍惚1轮，强韧豁免通过则不会恍惚。

entries.name: Ice Path
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Su); Level 6; Burn 0
Prerequisite icewalker

  You freeze water vapor in the air, allowing you to travel above the ground as @Compendium[pf1.spells.e4v1uv8hexeu9sxj]{凌空而行} by walking along the ice, and leaving a path of ice behind you that lasts for 1 round before it melts.

entries.name: Ice Sculptor
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  You can sculpt ice and snow into new shapes, as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.g1evszmk8wfgnsv5]{塑石术} but affecting ice and snow instead of stone.

entries.name: Ice Shape
entries.description:
You are able to sculpt ice and snow into almost any shape. This ability functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.g1evszmk8wfgnsv5]{塑石术}, but targeting only ice and snow, not stone.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Ice Splinter
entries.description:
As a standard action, the shaman can shoot razor-sharp icicles at an enemy within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. This barrage deals 1d6 points of piercing damage + 1 point for every 2 shaman levels she has.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

  At 11th level, any weapon she wields is treated as a frost weapon.

entries.name: 冰子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ol05jfb606v0lzj9]{冰封法球}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8jq1atxonnerix55]{极冰射线}

entries.name: 冰冢
entries.description: .  暴风雨和冻结的冰风笼罩目标，造成3d8点寒冷伤害（强韧豁免通过则减半）。如果目标豁免失败，他会麻痹并失去意识，但在冰封结束前的时间内并不需要进食或呼吸。冰有20点生命值，摧毁冰将使该生物恢复自由，但在被释放后仍将恍惚1d4轮。无论豁免成功与否，该生物在1天内都不会再次成为此巫术的目标。

entries.name: Iceplant
entries.description:
This hex grants the witch and her familiar a +2 natural armor bonus and the constant effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境}.

  The effect leaves the witch閳ユ獨 skin thick and stiff to the touch.

entries.name: 霜之行者
entries.description: 3级开始，你获得5点寒冷抗力并且可以不受任何减值地轻松穿越雪地和冰面。此外，你不会在此类环境上留下任何可供追踪的痕迹。9级开始，你的寒冷抗力变为10点，你可以在冰冻的层面上攀爬，就如同受@Compendium[pf1.spells.3mfmhx8avu7h3iom]{蛛行术}影响一般。

entries.name: 冰柱
entries.description: 你可以用一个标准动作从指尖射出一段冰柱，对30英尺内的目标敌人造成远程接触攻击。冰柱造成“1d6+1/2牧师等级”寒冷伤害。你每日可使用此能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: Iconoclastic Strike
entries.description:
When the investigator deals damage with a studied strike, she can perform a sunder combat maneuver as a free action against the creature the studied strike damaged. If the object targeted is a holy symbol or divine scroll, this sunder does not provoke attacks of opportunity and deals maximum damage on a successful check.

  An investigator must be at least 13th level to select this talent.

entries.name: 冰冷皮肤
entries.description: 你获得5点寒冷抗力。5级该抗力变为10，11级变为20。17级，你免疫寒冷。

entries.name: 冰霜墓穴
entries.description: 当奥能师使用【寒冰飞弹】技艺时，他可以从【奥能源泉】中消费2点而非1点。若他如此做，则豁免失败的目标会被冰霜覆盖。只要冰霜仍然存在（在温暖环境中通常是1分钟每等级），目标便视为被纠缠（但非固定在地上），并在每次其回合开始时受到1点敏捷伤害。目标可以通过标准动作进行DC为“10+奥能师魅力调整值”的力量检定来破冰。如果目标在单次攻击中受到10点以上的火焰伤害，则冰霜消融且效果结束。奥能师必须拥有【寒冰飞弹】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: Illuminating Answers
entries.description:
You can glean deeper truths from advice you magically obtain, even if the information itself is specious. When you use a spell or spell-like ability that allows you to get answers to questions (such as augury, blood biography, or contact other plane) and get at least one answer, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool. You regain this point even if the answer is false or vague.

  The maximum number of points you can regain in this way per day is equal to your Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: 明镜之触
entries.description: 你的手发出圣洁的光芒，使用一个标准动作，你可以接触一个生物，为他在一次意志豁免检定，知识检定，察觉或察言观色检定上提供相当于你的审判者等级一半的加值。本效果持续一小时或直到生物选择使用它的效果增强一次检定为止。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值。

entries.name: 裁决：光明
entries.description: 神授力量: 手握纯净而坚决的制裁之光，你使用审判者明亮如炬的智能刺穿谬误之暗。

entries.name: Illusion Resonant School
entries.description:
Illusion implements allow the occultist to distort the senses and cloak creatures from sight.

Implements: Crystal, hat, mask, prism, ring.

entries.name: 幻术学派
entries.description: 幻术师用魔法编织混合了幻想和虚构的鬼影去阻挡和激怒他们的敌人。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kq916lznxo0ig68v]{无声幻影}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7rx66m98dwo18fy8]{强效幻影}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ifcnx1yyw6e7ousm]{托梦术}

entries.name: Immediate Change
entries.description:
The vigilante can change identities as a move action, and he no longer needs to spend extra time to adjust his appearance and persona.

  A vigilante must be at least 13th level and must have the quick change social talent to select this talent.

entries.name: Immolation
entries.description:
At 3rd level, you gain the ability to surround yourself in fire as a swift action. This fire burns for a number of rounds per day equal to your character level plus your Charisma bonus. These rounds do not have to be consecutive.

  Any unarmed attacks you make while affected by immolation deal an additional 1d6 points of fire damage, and any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you while you閳ユ獧e affected by immolation also takes 1d6 points of fire damage.

entries.name: 焚化炸弹
entries.description: 这种独特的黏性炸弹将会不停的灼烧中弹者的肌肤，造成持续性的伤害而不是在一瞬间全数爆发。这个炸弹的持续时间相当于炸弹的伤害骰数，例如一个造成5d6伤害的炸弹会持续5轮的时间。当焚化炸弹击中目标时，对方将会受到“1d6+智力修正”点伤害，范围内的目标则受到“1+智力修正”点伤害。对于被直击者而言，这个伤害将会在每轮炼金术师回合开始时重复，此时任何还站在溅射范围内的生物将会受到溅射伤害。被此炸弹直击的目标可以通过一个整轮动作，进行一次DC为“10+1/2炼金术师等级+智力修正”的反射豁免来熄灭身上的火焰。因为此炸弹使用了独特的炼金术化合物，所以在地上打滚无法提供反射豁免加值；就算泡到水中，也不会停止焚化炸弹的恶毒焚烧。也因此这种炸弹可以在水下使用。炼金术师必须达到3级才能选择此科研发现。

entries.name: 不朽传奇
entries.description: 20级起，你停止衰老；不再需要吃、喝或者睡眠；并且对即死效果和能量吸取免疫。

entries.name: Immunity (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's body becomes extremely resilient to one energy type, gaining immunity to that type. Pick one energy type: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The eidolon gains immunity to that energy type.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time it applies to a different energy type.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Immunity (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th.

  The eidolon閳ユ獨 body becomes extremely resilient to one energy type. Select one energy type: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The eidolon gains immunity to that energy type.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time it applies to a different energy type.

entries.name: Imp Familiar
entries.description: At 7th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.oRJlgRLS32fmoQpy]{进阶魔宠} as a bonus feat, and must take an imp as a familiar. The imp replaces your current familiar.

entries.name: Impale Infusion
entries.description:
Element earth, water, wood; Type form infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Associated Blasts earth, ice, metal
Saving Throw none

  You extend a long, sharp spike of elemental matter along a line, impaling multiple foes. Make a single attack roll against each creature or object in a 30-foot line, starting with the closest target. If the result is a critical threat, roll to confirm against only the first target you hit. Calculate damage against each target you hit, starting from the closest. If your attack hits a target but fails to deal physical damage to that target, the spike fails to penetrate and the infused blast doesn閳ユ獩 continue.

  A blast with the impale infusion can penetrate solid barriers, but it must deal enough damage to destroy the barrier in order to continue through. Infused earth and metal blasts always deal piercing damage.

entries.name: Impelling Disarm
entries.description:
Once per rage, the barbarian can make a disarm attempt against a target in place of a melee attack. This attempt does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If successful, the barbarian sends the target閳ユ獨 weapon flying閳ユ攨ither straight at the target, or spinning away to strike another foe up to 20 feet away. This ranged attack counts as throwing a weapon that isn閳ユ獩 designed to be thrown, even if the weapon disarmed is a thrown weapon. The barbarian makes a ranged attack, which doesn閳ユ獩 provoke attacks of opportunity, at either the target of his disarm maneuver or another creature within 20 feet. If the barbarian is aiming for the disarmed creature, the foe doesn閳ユ獩 count as being in melee for determining any penalty on the ranged attack from throwing a ranged weapon into melee. If the ranged attack hits, the disarmed weapon deals damage as if the barbarian had thrown it. The barbarian can choose to aim the disarmed weapon at a square rather than at a foe.

  A barbarian must be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 帝王血统
entries.description:
The Imperious bloodline is available to human sorcerers.

  被遗忘的王者之子，有着被掩埋在下人类历史尘埃中横跨黄金时代的古代帝国的血统财富，骄傲地象征着人类潜能的顶点，以及人类的鲁莽狂妄。

  本职技能: 表演 （演讲）

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ux76jy9wbi88br0]{光荣时刻} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d4oubr5bdoo8w1ev]{鹰之威仪} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.w2yf0ksu14e91uae]{三相} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{高等命令术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{排斥术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.eqrqv2ofspk574d3]{高等岁月抵抗} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wyyqladj16hv7nny]{天降祥瑞} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}, 
  • Heroic Defiance, 
  • Heroic Recovery,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}, 
  • Lingering Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.CLSsMyNmdcNAOUKC]{魔法天赋},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家}.

  血统奥秘: 每当你释放一个有害法术，你在对受到该法术负面影响的生物的威吓检定获得等同于法术等级的加值，持续到你的下一轮结束之前。负面影响通常意味着伤害，但是也可以意味着使人虚弱的效果或状态。

entries.name: Implement Mastery
entries.description:
At 20th level, an occultist learns to master one of his implements. He selects one implement school. Whenever he uses a focus power from an implement of that school, the DC to resist any of the effects increases by 4 and he treats his occultist level as 4 higher when determining the effects and duration of that power.

  In addition, the occultist gains 4 extra points of mental focus, but these points must always be invested in implements of the mastered school. He can閳ユ獩 save these points or expend them for any ability other than the focus powers of those implements.

  The hardness of each of the occultist閳ユ獨 implements of the mastered school increases by an additional 20 as long as the item has at least 1 point of mental focus stored within.

entries.name: Implements
entries.description:
At 1st level, an occultist learns to use two implement schools. At 2nd level and every 4 occultist levels thereafter, the occultist learns to use one additional implement school, to a maximum of seven schools at 18th level. Each implement school adds one spell per spell level of that school of magic to the occultist閳ユ獨 spell list. No spells from any other school are considered to be on the occultist閳ユ獨 spell list until he selects the associated implement school. He can閳ユ獩 use spell trigger or spell completion magic items from unknown schools without succeeding at the appropriate Use Magic Device check. An occultist can select an implement school more than once in order to learn additional spells from the associated school.

Each implement school is represented by a small list of objects. Every day, the occultist selects one item from that school閳ユ獨 list to be his implement for the day for each implement school he knows. The occultist needs only one such item to cast spells of the corresponding school, unless he selected that implement school multiple times, in which case he needs one item for each set of spells gained from that school. Implements don閳ユ獩 need to be magic items, and nonmagical implements don閳ユ獩 take up a magic item slot even if they閳ユ獧e worn. Implements that are not magic items are often of some historical value or of personal significance to the occultist, such as the finger bone of a saint, the broken scepter of a long-dead king, the skull of a mentor閳ユ獨 familiar, or the glass eye of an uncanny ancestor.

Whenever an occultist casts a spell, he must have the corresponding implement in his possession and present the implement to the target or toward the area of effect. This act is part of casting the spell and doesn閳ユ獩 require any additional action. If the occultist lacks the corresponding implement, he can attempt to cast the spell, but must succeed at a concentration check (DC = 20 + the spell閳ユ獨 level) to do so. Spells cast by an occultist without the appropriate implement are always treated as if they were cast at the minimum caster level for the spell in question (caster level 1st for a 1st-level spell, caster level 4th for a 2nd-level spell, and so on).

Each implement school also grants a base focus power. This power is added to the list of focus powers possessed by the occultist. In addition, each implement school grants access to a number of other focus powers that the occultist can select from using his mental focus class feature.

entries.name: Impossible Bloodline
entries.description:
You can see beyond the mundane, and are capable of visualizing the improbable, and even the impossible. If this expanded perception doesn閳ユ獩 drive you mad, you may learn to make the impossible into reality.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：工程.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ud4xukzhan89qhm4]次级困惑术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.x23pz2agjub1eh89]{完全修复术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gvfrhibwwuar2rcf]{缩物术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rxk9rk8gvqau3f3l]{鬼斧神工} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.k9iu3d82hlo7coct]{活化物体} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2sa3881har33geo1]{变形万物} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术} (19th).

  奖励专长： 

  • Craft Construct,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.4hNO4OAWYF5vXphH]{制造魔法武器和防具},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SMyexRzOm5PfjT5I]{妙手},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.HMCAM3Zyo77kG8Yg]{远程射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8rsFtye3PwM6CKli]{近距射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：工程).

血统奥秘: Constructs are susceptible to your 惑控系 (compulsion) spells as if they were not mind-affecting.

  Constructs are treated as living creatures for the purposes of determining which spells affect them.

entries.name: 裁决：监禁
entries.description: 神授力量: 有时候你倾向于控制敌人而非将他们就地处决——无论这是因为你需要他活着接受依法惩治或是一个可以用来拷打逼供的对象。

entries.name: 皇霸拳
entries.description: 在20级时，拳师可以以一次攻击，而非一个标准动作来发动王霸拳攻击，并且可以打飞任何体型的目标生物。如果拳师的战技攻击检定骰出了自然骰20，那么他可以立刻使用一次同加值的战技攻击检定以为确认重击。如果重击确认通过，那么这次攻击造成的伤害，以及目标因为飞出而对障碍物（如果有）和自身造成的伤害全部翻倍。

entries.name: Improved Damage (1 pt)
entries.description:
One of the eidolon's natural attacks is particularly deadly. Select one natural attack form and increase the damage die type by one step.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

entries.name: Improved Damage (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
One of the eidolon閳ユ獨 natural attacks is particularly deadly. Select one natural attack form and increase the damage die by one step.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time the eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different natural attack.

entries.name: Improved Divine Inks
entries.description:
The alchemist閳ユ獨 unique dyes allow him to create images accompanied by sound. If he expends an additional daily use of his bombs, the image he creates with the divine inks discovery also produces minor sounds, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影}.

  The alchemist must be at least 4th level and must have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 精通情感链接
entries.description: 4级起，猎人和她的动物伙伴之间获得了情感链接。该能力就如同魔宠的情感链接一般，不过猎人还能够以迅捷动作通过动物伙伴的双眼来观察，只要她希望（只要动物伙伴和她的距离不超过1英里）便可以一直维持这个状态，而且能够以自由动作结束它。在维持这种状态时，猎人是目盲（blinded）的。

entries.name: 精通反射闪避
entries.description: 9级起，武僧的【反射闪避】能力更加强大。在遭受一些通过反射检定可以减少一半伤害的攻击时，武僧通过反射豁免后将不受伤害，如果未通过也只受到一半伤害。无助状态下的武僧不能进行反射闪避。

entries.name: Improved Evasion (Talent)
entries.description: This works like evasion, except that while the rogue still takes no damage on a successful Reflex saving throw against attacks, she henceforth takes only half damage on a failed save. A helpless rogue does not gain the benefit of improved evasion.

entries.name: Improved Evasion (UC)
entries.description:
This works like evasion, except while the rogue still takes no damage on a successful Reflex saving throw against an attack, she also takes only half damage on a failed save.

  A helpless rogue does not gain the benefit of improved evasion.

entries.name: Improved Fire Steed
entries.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite fire steed

  When using fire steed, the mount閳ユ獨 fire resistance increases to 20 and its speed increases by an additional 10 feet. The mount can move over lava without difficulty or a decrease in speed.

entries.name: 精通祈神祷告
entries.description: 11级时，每当导魂者使用祈神祷告能力，她可以选择两种祈神祷告效果赋予盟友。除此之外，导魂者可从她使用的任意一种祈神祷告中获得增益效果，但她只获得通常一半的加值。

entries.name: Improved Natural Armor (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon's hide grows thick fur, rigid scales, or bony plates, giving it a +2 bonus to its natural armor.

  This evolution can be taken once for every five levels the summoner possesses.

entries.name: Improved Natural Armor (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
The eidolon閳ユ獨 hide grows thick fur, rigid scales, or bony plates, giving it a +2 bonus to its natural armor.

  This evolution can be taken once, plus one additional time for every 5 levels the summoner possesses. Each additional time it閳ユ獨 taken, the bonus increases by 2.

entries.name: 精通狩猎目标
entries.description: 19级时，杀手追猎自己的猎物的能力升级。他现在能以自由动作指定【狩猎目标】，并且可以在以普通速度移动时的生存检定中取20，不用受到惩罚。他的攻击洞察加值提高到+4。如果他的狩猎目标被杀死或者逃走，他可以在10分钟后指定新的狩猎目标。

entries.name: 高等狩猎目标
entries.description: 19级时，吸血鬼猎人追猎自己的猎物的能力升级。他现在可以以自由动作指定狩猎目标，并且可以在以普通速度移动时的生存检定中取20，不用受到惩罚。他的攻击洞察加值提高到+4。如果他的狩猎目标被杀死或者逃走，他可以在10分钟后指定新的狩猎目标。

entries.name: Improved Shadow's Chill
entries.description: When a rogue with this talent hits a creature with a melee weapon that deals sneak attack damage, the sneak attack damage is cold damage. Normal weapon damage is unaffected. The rogue must have cold resistance from a racial trait and the shadow閳ユ獨 chill rogue talent before choosing this talent.

entries.name: 精通法术战斗
entries.description: 8级时，魔战士的同时施法及近战攻击能力得到进一步提升。当使用【法术战斗】能力时，魔战士在专注检定上获得+2环境加值，这个加值也添加到所有在攻击检定上承受减值所换取的加值以外。

entries.name: 精通法术唤回
entries.description: 11级时，魔战士使用奥能力池回收法术的能力得到提升。每当他使用奥能力池以召回法术时，他只需要消耗法术环级一半的点数（至少1点）。除此之外，他还可以不召回一个使用过的法术，而是将召回法术所支付的奥能点数（至少1点）用来准备一个在他法术书内的同环其他法术。魔战士不需要因此而而重新研究他的法术书，但也不能为以此法准备的法术添加超魔专长。

entries.name: 精通直觉闪避
entries.description:
5级起，血脉狂怒者不再会被夹击（flanked）。这可以防止盗贼（或者其他具有偷袭能力的职业）通过夹击来对血脉狂怒者进行偷袭，除非攻击者的盗贼等级（或者其他赋予偷袭的职业等级）至少比目标的血脉狂怒者等级高4级或更多。

  若角色已经从其他职业获得了直觉闪避，那么在判断夹击角色所需要的最低盗贼等级时，提供直觉闪避的职业等级会和血脉狂怒者等级叠加。

entries.name: Improvised Weapon Proficiency (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability does not take a penalty on attack rolls for using an improvised weapon.

  By spending 1 ki point, the monk can fight with a broken weapon without taking any penalties on attack rolls or damage rolls for 1 round.

entries.name: In Accordance with Prophecy
entries.description: A number of times per day equal to your Intelligence modifier, you can publicly declare that your next spell is guided by prophecy. When you do, the next spell you cast has a 20% chance of fizzling (1閳?0 on a d%). If the spell does not fail, treat the spell as if it had been modified by the @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效} feat, even if you do not have that feat. At 12th level, the chance that the spell fizzles is reduced to 15% (1閳?5 on a d%). At 16th level, the chance is reduced to 10% (1閳?0 on a d%).

entries.name: In Vogue
entries.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 crafting or professional business is always at the height of the local trends, allowing the vigilante to gain more profits than usual. Goods he crafts with a Craft skill he chose with social grace are worth 1/3 more gp than normal due to his celebrity, without increasing the cost to create. Whenever he uses a Profession skill he chose with social grace to make money, he makes twice as much money.

  A vigilante must be at least 5th level and have both the double time and social grace social talents to take this talent.

entries.name: Incendiary Charge
entries.description:
An incendiary charge is a bomb specifically designed to overcome the effects of any nonmagical object閳ユ獨 hardness. As a full-round action, the alchemist can place an incendiary charge that burns and eats away at an object, dealing normal bomb damage to it. (The damage is not halved against an object with hardness, unlike most energy damage.) Furthermore, the incendiary charge ignores the first 5 points of hardness of the material being damaged.

The alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Incorporeal Bonded Manifestation
entries.description:
When a spiritualist uses this ability and chooses incorporeal form, she becomes shrouded in a haze of insubstantial mist, granting her concealment against ranged attacks.

  At 8th level, the spiritualist can better affect incorporeal creatures with melee attacks; her unarmed strikes and melee weapon attacks are treated as if they had the ghost touch magic weapon special ability.

  At 13th level, the spiritualist can take a standard action to become invisible (as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} spell) the start of her next turn.

  At 18th level, the spiritualist gains the incorporeal subtype and a fly speed of 30 feet (good) while using this form of bonded manifestation.

entries.name: Incorporeal Flight
entries.description: When the phantom manifests in incorporeal form, it has a fly speed of 40 feet (good).

entries.name: 虚无形态
entries.description: 在15级时，你能够变成虚体，维持每术士等级1轮。在此形态下，你获得虚体亚种。实体魔法武器只对你造成一半伤害（实体普通武器无法伤害你）。同样的，你的法术对实体生物伤害减半，不造成伤害的法术正常生效。你能够使用此能力每天1次。

entries.name: Incorporeal Form (4 pts)
entries.description:
Once per day, an eidolon can become incorporeal for 1 round per summoner level. While in this form, the eidolon gains the incorporeal subtype and incorporeal quality. It only takes half damage from corporeal sources as long as they are magic (it takes no damage from nonmagical weapons and objects). Likewise, its spells or spell-like abilities deal only half damage to corporeal creatures. Spells and other effects that do not deal damage function normally.

  The summoner must be at least 15th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Incorporeal Phantom Manifestation
entries.description:
When the spiritualist chooses to manifest the phantom in incorporeal form, the phantom appears within 30 feet of the spiritualist as a ghostly apparition. It gains the incorporeal subtype (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 301), including a deflection bonus to AC equal to its Charisma modif ier. Since it isn閳ユ獩 an undead creature, it takes no damage from holy water or positive energy. Unlike other incorporeal creatures, an incorporeal phantom can閳ユ獩 attack corporeal creatures, except to deliver touch-attack spells using the deliver touch spell ability.

  An incorporeal manifested phantom can make slam attacks against other incorporeal creatures as if it were in ectoplasmic form.

entries.name: 增强伤害减免
entries.description: 野蛮人的伤害减免增加“1/-”。当野蛮人狂暴时，此加值即生效。野蛮人可以选重复选取这个狂暴之力，最多3次，其效果叠加。野蛮人必须至少8级才能选取此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Increased Damage Reduction (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian閳ユ獨 damage reduction increases by 2/閳?whenever she is raging. A barbarian can select this rage power up to three times. Its effects stack.

  A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Incredible Renown
entries.description:
The vigilante is incredibly famous in both identities. He can gain renown in a single community of up to 25,000 individuals (a large city) or up to two smaller cities of no more than 10,000 individuals each (two small cities). The bonus while he is in his social identity remains unchanged, but the circumstance bonus to Intimidate from his great renown social talent while in he is in his vigilante identity increases to +8.

  A vigilante must be at least 11th level and have the great renown social talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 肆意妄为
entries.description: 2级起，每当角虺骑士团的骑士使用威吓来挫败1个或更多生物的士气时，她能尝试以自由动作（free action）挫败30尺范围内相同数量的盟友。当30尺范围内有盟友陷入战栗（shaken）状态时，骑士会在豁免检定中获得+1士气加值。在6级以及之后的每6个等级，该加值均会增加1点。骑士对陷入战栗状态的生物尝试阴招（dirty trick；APG）战技时不会引发藉机攻击。

entries.name: 不屈意志
entries.description: 14级起，当血脉狂怒者处于血怒时，就会在对抗附魔法术（enchantment spells）的意志豁免中获得+4加值。这个加值与所有其他调整值叠加，包括血脉狂怒者在血怒时意志豁免检定获得的士气加值。

entries.name: 沉溺
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次以一个标准动作，你引发目标心中对满足自己原罪的渴望极度增长，使他不顾理智的去尝试追求欲望。你必须使用察觉罪孽能力了解了该生物心中的罪孽才能使用本能力，不去目标生物可以对它进行一次意志豁免来抵抗该效果。如果目标在意志豁免检定上失败，那么在接下来的24小时中，目标一旦有机会便会抛弃一切而被自己的冲动支配去尝试满足他的欲望。这时目标仍然能尝试抵制自己的冲动，但必须成功的通过一个意志豁免检定来避免因此引发的恶心1分钟时间。这是一个影响心灵的效果。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4k32l03rzxgyifkx]{匠人祝福}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{法师豪宅}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9fd7mcoint902oyb]{树界降诞}

entries.name: 制裁子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h1ankl1l77kmnpke]{命令死灵}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{高等命令术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (inevitables only)

entries.name: 感染
entries.description: .  目标的伤口开始感染（强韧豁免通过则无效）。目标每天受到1点体质伤害。第一天过后，目标每天可以进行1次豁免以治愈感染。这是一种〔疾病〕效果。

entries.name: Infernal Bargain
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite tiefling or Planar Infusion (Hell)
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  As a swift action before using a utility talent on a willing target, you can add the effects of @Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdl22oblfph0n33]{Conditional Favor}, except that it applies to any beneficial utility talent instead of to spells of certain schools.

entries.name: Infernal Binder Subschool
entries.description:
Associated School: Conjuration.

  Suggested Opposition Schools: Divination, illusion, or transmutation.

  Alignment: Lawful Evil, Lawful Neutral, Neutral Evil, or Neutral.

  Requirements: An infernal binder must choose a familiar as her arcane bond at 1st level.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the acid dart and dimensional steps powers of the conjuration school.

entries.name: 九狱之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，他就会获得火焰抗力5，并且在对抗毒素的豁免检定上获得+2加值。

entries.name: 高等九狱之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，他就会在对抗附魔和恐惧效果的豁免检定上获得+4加值。

entries.name: 次级九狱之血
entries.description: 每当野蛮人进入狂暴状态，每天3次以一个迅捷动作，野蛮人可以让自己的武器卷进地狱之火中1轮，在此状态下，野蛮人所有的近战武器都视为拥有炽焰武器附魔效果。

entries.name: 地狱血统
entries.description:
在你的家族历史中，一个成员与魔鬼做了一笔交易。从那时以来，那个契约一直影响着你的家系。在你身上，它以明确而直接的方式显现——授予你力量和能力。尽管你的命运依然在你手中，你也不禁疑惑——你的最终奖赏，也许就是坠入炼狱。

  本职技能:交涉

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.71g6nmvy8qnodwyz]{防护善良} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q4ixxjb4v281g2xv]{灼热射线} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{支配人类} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (限魔鬼和炼狱生物) (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{高等传送术} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ol9newf4vrcx0kpf]{真言术 震} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{寓守于攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时},

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识 ：位面),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nWFr8SNcjcMqsXSH]{法术穿透}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个“魅惑”子学派的法术，该法术DC+2。

entries.name: Infernal Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
The Pit lives in your blood. Maybe one of your ancestors was seduced by the powers of Hell or made a deal with a devil. Either way, its corruption seethes within your lineage.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
