entries.name: 地狱抗力
entries.description: 4级起，你获得5点火焰抗力，并且在对抗毒素时，豁免检定获得+2加值。8级起，火焰抗力增加至10点。对抗毒素的豁免检定加值增加至+4点。

entries.name: 地狱炕力
entries.description: 在3级时，你获得5点火抗和对毒素豁免+2。在9级时，提升为10点火抗和对毒素豁免+4。

entries.name: 狱火炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师的炼金炸弹现在会生成一片持续燃烧的云雾，以“焚云术”取代“云雾术”效果（每轮6d6火焰伤害），覆盖范围是炸弹溅射范围的两倍，持续时间为每炼金术师等级1轮。选择这一科研发现需要16级炼金术师等级，且已学会“烟雾炸弹”。

entries.name: Infested Curse
entries.description:
Insects, spiders, grubs, and other vermin plague you constantly. They crawl in your hair, fill your clothes, and f ly or crawl into your mouth, nose, and ears. You take a 閳? penalty on Diplomacy checks, and when you first meet someone, the person閳ユ獨 initial attitude toward you starts one level lower than normal. Animals shy away from you閳ユ敎ou take a 閳? penalty on Handle Animal checks. You gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves versus poisons from insects, scorpions, and spiders, as well as the distraction ability of swarms of such creatures.

  At 5th level, you add @Compendium[pf1.spells.zus1nsp7k2nvol9t]{喷吐虫群} to your list of spells known.

  At 7th level, your bonus on poison and distraction saves increases to +4, and you gain DR 10/閳?against all swarm damage.

  At 13th level, you add @Compendium[pf1.spells.25iy235izs71qlns]{血肉虫群} to your list of spells known.

  At 17th level, you become immune to the swarm damage and the distraction ability of insect, scorpion, and spider swarms.

entries.name: Infiltration (Stare)
entries.description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to the target閳ユ獨 Perception checks and CMD.

entries.name: 灌注突变
entries.description: 当一个炼金术师制作出一份突变药剂，他可以向其中灌注一部份自身的魔力。这一行为会造成2点智力伤害同时因素材而消耗1000gp，但是这份突变药剂可以一直保持药效，即使炼金术师制作了另一份突变药剂。这允许炼金术师制作并保持不同种类的突变药剂，但是并不允许炼金术师同时受两份突变药剂的影响，只有最强大的那份药剂会保持药效。

entries.name: 灌注炼成
entries.description: 当炼金术师使用化合炼成时，他可以向其中注入一部分自身魔力，这能使这份化合炼成在离开炼金术师手中之后依然保持效用。这么做会消耗同样的化合炼成位，而且这份化合炼成可以给予没有炼金术师等级的人使用。

entries.name: Infusion Specialization
entries.description:
At 5th level, whenever a kineticist uses one or more infusions with a blast, she reduces the combined burn cost of the infusions by 1. This can閳ユ獩 reduce the total cost of the infusions used below 0.

  She reduces the burn cost by 1 additional point at 8th, 11th, 14th, 17th, and 20th levels.

entries.name: 内在平静
entries.description: 8级时，蓝玫瑰骑将知道并非世界上所有的事物都会随着他的愿望而行，他必须保持冷静和中立。每日一次，以一个迅捷动作，蓝玫瑰骑将可以忽略一次攻击（攻击、法术或效果皆可）中相当于他的骑将等级加上魅力修正的伤害，此能力只对造成生命伤害的效果有效。在12级和之后的每4级他会得到一次额外的使用机会，最多达到20级的4次。

entries.name: 底力
entries.description: 在6级时，每天一次，你可以通过一个迅捷动作治疗你自己，恢复1d6/每两个审判者等级的生命值。当你以此能力治疗自己时，你可以同时移除一个自己身上的下列不良状态：目盲，困惑，目眩，耳聋，惊惧，反胃，战栗，恶心或恍惚。

entries.name: Innocent Facade
entries.description: Once per day, a rogue with this talent can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.4w51afqi5d9t8nl4]{无罪术} as a spell-like ability, using her rogue level as the spell閳ユ獨 caster level. A rogue must have the minor magic talent before selecting this talent. An investigator can select the innocent facade rogue talent in place of an investigator talent. She must have the underworld inspiration investigator talent before selecting this talent, instead of minor magic.

entries.name: Innocuous Servant
entries.description: The rogue is an expert at appearing to be an unimportant servant, be it an attach鑼? bodyguard, driver, maid, kitchen assistant, or similar staff member. The rogue gains a +2 bonus on Disguise checks to appear to be a servant, but not to impersonate a particular servant. She also gains a +2 bonus on Bluff checks to lie to maintain this guise. While disguised as a servant, she gains a +2 bonus on Diplomacy checks to gather information among servants. Because she is easily overlooked as a servant, she can gather information from those she serves without asking them questions directly or alerting them to her interest. Doing so takes 1d4 days and requires a successful Bluff check instead of a Diplomacy check. At 8th level, the bonuses granted by this talent increase to +4.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tkvnbxbmbqe49bg0]{Sow Thought}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术}

entries.name: 审判庭指引
entries.description: 在你的回合开始时，你可以选择进入一种透彻明晰的专注状态，放弃本轮所有的动作（包括整轮，标准，移动，迅捷，即时与自由动作，以及藉机攻击），使一个距离你不超过30尺的盟友或的法术加速术的好处1轮。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值（至少1次）。

entries.name: 疯狂焦点
entries.description: 你以标准动作给自愿生物对抗心智效果的豁免+4加值，并且免疫困惑，持续1分钟。若生物在上述豁免中失败，则马上失去对困惑免疫，然后困惑一轮。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换狂乱领域的狂乱感知能力。

entries.name: 狂乱秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5eg2f7nek9cjmv0n]{记忆空白}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.exe45ci6j1nh9j3l]{Distracting Cacophony}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dlmeq0hpxfbjtibb]{心灵迷雾}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mvgg3g6zs5iutjj9]{Envious Urge}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.picot3viqlfo8arm]{摄魂徽记}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱}

entries.name: 疯狂子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2mh7g81k30bv7b5m]{精神错乱}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zd8nh365xvrebioj]{魅影蛛网}

替代神授力量 The domain spells provided by the Insect domain affect vermin rather than animals, treating them as if they were not immune to spells with the mindaffecting descriptor. Any such spell that allows a Will save can instead be negated by the target vermin with a successful Fortitude save at the same DC.

  替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pa6mgkl4caihdrhm]{巨虫术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j8fufy7sr3bty5du]{Vermin Shape II}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lnpyf5gwn8m21y02]{召唤自然盟友 VIII} (1d3 goliath stag beetles; Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 44)

entries.name: Inside Agent
entries.description: At 9th level, you can reroll any 察觉 check you just attempted by allowing your possessing spirit to take further control. You take a 閳? penalty on all other skill checks for the following minute as the spirit interferes with your concentration. At 13th level, you can reroll any other skill check, but the penalty for using the ability in this way increases to 閳? for the following 10 minutes. You must reroll the check before you learn the result of your original check, and cannot use this power while the skill check penalty associated with inside agent is imposed on you.

entries.name: Insightful Wisdom (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 2 ki points as an immediate action to give another ally within 30 feet just the right word of advice to prevent disaster. If the ally can hear the monk, she can reroll a single attack roll or saving throw. The ally must take the second result, even if it is worse.

  A monk must be at least 8th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 灵感
entries.description:
调查员的真正实力超越了我们对于普通的技能训练和知识储备的理解——他们惊人锐利的观察和推理能力足以击败同行业所有的竞争者。通常情况下调查员只将这些奇异的能力用在调查研究的过程中，不过如果在他们需要的时候也可以借助这些突现的灵感之光扭转任何局面。

  通过脑海中灵光一现，调查员可以优化自己的技能检定和属性检定的结果。调查员获得一个灵感池，他的灵感点数等于（1/2调查员等级+调查员的智力调整值），最小为1。在每天的睡眠休息以后，调查员的灵感池会获得恢复。以一个自由动作，调查员可以使用1点自己的灵感点数，为自己的一项检定结果增加1d6点（包括在进行检定时取10或取20的情况下），他必须在骰出检定数值但宣布结果之前使用此能力。调查员在一次检定或投骰时只能使用一次灵感能力。因为他是专业人士，调查员可以在所有的知识，语言学和辨识法术技能上使用灵感能力但不消耗任何灵感点数，前提是这些技能他已受训。

  调查员同样也可以将灵感能力用来优化自己的攻击投骰和豁免投骰，不过这样做会从他的灵感池中消耗两点灵感点数。在用于增强豁免投骰时，调查员需要用一个即时动作使用灵感能力而非一个自由动作。

entries.name: 解说灵感
entries.description: 如果调查员在一次分析怪物的弱点或特殊能力的知识检定上成功，那么他可以以一个迅捷动作消耗1点灵感点数，使所有距离他30尺内且可以听到他声音的盟友在1轮内对于此怪物或此类型的怪物的攻击投骰获得+4洞察加值。调查员至少要达到7级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 激发曲调
entries.description: 15级开始，你富于艺术性的魔法可以鼓舞你的同伴。你能够以类法术能力施展@Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概}。15级时，你每天可使用此能力1次，17级时2次，19级时3次。

entries.name: 提振技能
entries.description: 3级或以上的吟游诗人可以通过表演来帮助盟友成功完成工作。该盟友必须距离吟游诗人30尺内，并且能看到和听见吟游诗人。只要此盟友还能听见吟游诗人的表演，他就可以在特定技能检定上获得+2表现加值。3级以后的每4个等级，此加值都会提升1（7级+3，11级+4，15级+5，以及19级+6）。某些用法，例如利用【提振技能】辅助隐匿技能，可能显得不符合常理并因此被GM禁止。吟游诗人不能对自己使用此能力。此能力依赖声音成份运作。

entries.name: 激发勇气
entries.description: 1级起，吟游诗人可以通过表演来激发盟友（包括自己）的勇气，鼓舞他们对抗恐惧和提高战斗能力。只有能看到或听到吟游诗人表演的盟友才可以接受此效果。受影响的盟友在对抗魅惑和恐惧时豁免检定有+1士气加值，在攻击和武器伤害检定上也有+1表现加值。5级及之后每6个吟游诗人等级，该加值都会增加1（5级+2，11级+3，17级达到最大+4）。激发勇气是影响心灵的能力。【激发勇气】依赖声音或者视觉成份运作，诗人必须在开始表演之前决定具体使用的成份。

entries.name: Inspire Devotion
entries.description: By spending at least 1 hour engaged in acts of physical pleasure with a willing partner, you can attempt a Diplomacy check to improve that partner閳ユ獨 attitude or increase your influence with that partner (or reduce a rival閳ユ獨 influence with that partner) with no maximum on the number of steps by which you can change that partner閳ユ獨 attitude or disposition.

entries.name: 狂怒激发
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人可以用一个移动动作，把【血性狂怒】的效果分享给30尺内的所有自愿盟友，持续时间等于他的魅力修正（最小为1）。野蛮人必须习得【血性狂怒】才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: Inspire Ferocity (UC)
entries.description:
While in the reckless stance, the barbarian imparts the stance閳ユ獨 bonus and penalty to all willing allies within 30 feet of her.

  A barbarian must have the reckless stance rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: 提振战力
entries.description: 9级或以上的吟游诗人可以通过表演来激励自己或者30尺内的一个自愿的盟友，让他获得额外的战斗力。9级后每3级，诗人可以在每次使用此能力时多影响1个同伴（12级2个，15级3个，18级达到最大4个）。要使用【提振战力】，所有同伴必须能够听到和看到吟游诗人。受影响的生物获得两个额外生命骰（d10），对应的暂时生命值（每个奖励生命骰都要加上体质修正），攻击检定获得+2表现加值，且强韧检定得到+1表现加值。在决定依赖于生命骰的法术效果时，这些奖励生命骰视为正常生命骰。【提振战力】是影响心灵的能力，并且依赖声音和视觉成分运作。

entries.name: 激发豪情
entries.description: 15级或以上的吟游诗人可以通过表演赋予他自己或30尺距离内的一名盟友极大的勇气。15级后每3个吟游诗人等级，他可以在每次使用此能力时多影响1个同伴。要被【激发豪情】所影响，所有目标必须能够听到和看到吟游诗人。受到激励的生物豁免获得+4士气加值，AC获得+4闪避加值。该效果在目标能够看到表演的期间内一直有效。【激发豪情】是影响心灵的能力，并且依赖声音和视觉成分运作。

entries.name: 警觉灵感
entries.description: 每当调查员陷入措手不及状态，他都可以消耗1点灵感点数无视此状态。调查员必须在保持意识且在措手不及状态下选择是否发动此能力。使用此天赋不需要任何动作。

entries.name: Inspired Assault
entries.description: As a standard action, you can inspire a living creature with a touch by expending 1 point of mental focus. The creature receives a morale bonus on attack rolls equal to 1 + 1 for every 6 occultist levels you possess (to a maximum bonus of +4 at 18th level). This bonus also applies on saving throws against fear effects. This bonus lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: 爆破灵感
entries.description: 拥有此发现，且拥有灵感池（通过职业特性，发现货专长）的炼金术士可以消耗2点灵感点数，将自己的炸弹伤害提升1d6点。炼金炸弹的伤害类型不变。和其他影响炸弹的发现不同，这个发现可以叠加到其他已经应用了发现的炸弹上。点数，这个专长不能再同一个炸弹上应用多于1次。

entries.name: 聪慧灵感
entries.description: 调查员可以在所有的知识，语言学或辨识法术技能检定上使用灵感能力而不需要花费灵感点数，即使这些技能他未受训。

entries.name: 恐吓灵感
entries.description: 每当调查员成功的使用威吓技能挫败了一个目标的锐气，他都可以消耗1点灵感点数，在决定目标被威吓影响的时间时使自己的检定结果额外+5。调查员可以选择消耗更多的灵感点数来增加这个结果，不过他必须在威吓技能上受训才能选择本天赋。黑街灵感天赋的效果不能用作本天赋的前提条件。

entries.name: 激发狂暴
entries.description:
在1级时，歌者的战怒之歌可以使战怒之歌影响的生物在力量和体质值上获得+2士气加值，在意志豁免检定上获得+1士气加值，同时也在防御等级上承受-1减值。除此之外，受到战怒之歌影响的盟友（除歌者自己以外）不能使用任何基于魅力、敏捷，或者智力的技能（除了平衡、脱逃术、威吓，以及骑术），也不能使用任何需要耐心或需要集中精神的能力。在4级以及之后每提升4级时，战怒之歌提供的意志检定加值再额外+1，但防御等级上的减值不会增加；在8级和16级时，战怒之歌在属性上的加值各增加2点。和野蛮人的狂暴不同，这个效果在结束后不会导致被影响的生物疲乏。

如果一个受到战怒之歌影响的盟友拥有类狂暴能力（如野蛮人和血脉狂怒者的狂暴和血怒，以及歌者自身的激发狂暴），他们可以使用自己的狂暴数据加值与防御等级减值代替歌者的战怒之歌加值与减值（并且在狂暴后不会疲乏）。但是，以此方式激活的狂暴能力也同样使这些盟友无法使用他们必须狂暴才能使用的能力（如野蛮人的狂暴之力，血脉狂怒者的血脉能力）；这些能力必须由他们自己消耗狂暴能力来激活。

entries.name: 神授巧舌
entries.description: 你可以使用感知调整值而非魅力调整值加到交涉，威吓和表演（演说）检定的结果上，并且你可以将表演（演说）视为你的本职技能。

entries.name: Inspired Vigilante
entries.description: The vigilante閳ユ獨 powers of deduction are far beyond the norm. This ability functions similarly to the investigator閳ユ獨 inspiration ability, but the vigilante閳ユ獨 inspiration pool is equal to his class level (do not add his Intelligence modifier), the vigilante can never use this ability without expending a use of inspiration, and it doesn閳ユ獩 count as inspiration for any effects that interact with or require the inspiration class feature.

entries.name: Inspiring Call
entries.description: As a standard action, you can grant all allies who can see and hear you a competence bonus equal to your spirit bonus on either saving throws or attack and damage rolls. You choose which bonus to grant each time you use inspiring call. This ability lasts for 1 round. If you have the decisive strike greater spirit power, you can use inspiring call as a move action. If you have the legendary marshal supreme spirit power, you can use inspiring call as a swift action.

entries.name: 灵感神药
entries.description:
炼金术士习得了调制灵感神药——一种和突变药剂类似，但可以启发他的灵感力（如同调查员职业能力），但有损于他的肉体韧性的化学制剂。在饮下灵感神药后，炼金术士获得一个大小为他的炼金术士等级一半+他的智力调整值（最小为1）的灵感池，以及在防御等级上获得+2闪避加值，但他在力量与体质值上承受-2减值。

  以一个自由动作，炼金术士可以使用1点自己的灵感点数，为自己的一项属性或技能检定结果增加1d6点（包括在进行检定时取10或取20的情况下），如同调查员的灵感能力。炼金术士只有在服用灵感神药后才能使用本能力，且灵感神药的效果结束后，未使用的灵感点数也会消失。不过，每当这个发现激活，以此方式使用至少1点灵感点数时，炼金术士就必须通过一个DC20的意志检定，否则眩晕1轮，而且这个豁免检定无法受到灵感能力的增强。

  灵感神药享有所有突变药剂的限制性——因此，炼金术士同时只能保持一份药剂的作用：突变药剂，异变药剂（Cognatogen）UM或灵感神药。和突变药剂演绎，它们只在炼金术士手中生效，并且非炼金术士喝下灵感神药只会变得恶心。在灵感神药的效果结束时，炼金术士在力量或敏捷属性上受到2点伤害。灌注突变药剂（Infuse Mutagen）发现和持久突变（Persistent Mutagen）职业能力可以同样应用到灵感神药上。

entries.name: 指引
entries.description: 你以标准动作令30尺内的“1+1/3牧师等级”个盟友注意集中1轮。他们的攻击检定、技能检定、AC和CMD在1轮内获得+2洞察加值。这是个依赖于语言的心智效果。此能力替换高贵领域的豪言壮语能力。

entries.name: 肌情四射
entries.description: 第15级，骑士可以向基盟友们秀出完美的肌肉给他们打气。以标准动作，他可以给自己和30尺内所有盟友在近战攻击，战技检定，强韧豁免和力量检定上+4士气加值。他可以以自由动作持续此加值，每天可以使用此能力的轮数等同1/2骑士等级，不必连续。

entries.name: 激发痛苦
entries.description: 在8级时，骑将可以激起他盟友心中的暴虐残酷。以一个迅捷动作，骑将能令30尺内的盟友用他们的武器造成非致命伤害，并且不用承受通常会有的-4罚值（但武器本身仍必须有办法造成非致命伤害）。受影响的盟友会在非致命武器的伤害骰上获得+2加值。此效果可以持续1轮，并且每过5分钟后可以再次使用。

entries.name: Inspiring Prediction
entries.description: A number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier, you can predict an ally閳ユ獨 success, bolstering others閳?resolve. As a swift action, you can shout an inspiring prediction, granting each ally within 50 feet who can hear you a +4 luck bonus on her next attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

entries.name: 豪言壮语
entries.description: 你可以用一个标准动作对30英尺内的一个生物念出热血台词。该生物在攻击检定、技能检定、属性检定及豁免检定中获得+2士气加值，持续轮数等于你的牧师等级的一半（至少1轮）。本能力每日可用次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 瞬间炼金
entries.description: 从18级开始，炼金术师可以一种超常的速度制作炼金物品。只要他能通过工艺（炼金）技能检定、且手头有足够的炼金材料，他能以一个整轮动作制造一项炼金物品。他能以一个直觉动作给武器上毒。

entries.name: Instant Armor
entries.description:
Choose one type of heavy armor. You gain proficiency in that armor.

  At 3rd level, twice per day as an immediate action, you can instantly don or remove a suit of your chosen armor that you touch, causing it to teleport onto or off of your body.

  At 11th level, you can spend 1 minute placing a suit of your chosen armor into an extradimensional space. You can use this ability to immediately don or remove that armor, calling it from or removing it to that extradimensional space. While in the extradimensional space, the armor regains 1 hit point per hour when damaged.

entries.name: Instant Plan
entries.description: The vigilante can quickly manage a situation that seems to be spiraling out of control. Once per day, the vigilante can state a plan of action. All allies within 30 feet that can hear him gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects and are immune to being demoralized. They also gain a +1 morale bonus on skill checks or combat maneuver checks of the vigilante閳ユ獨 choice. The benefits last for 1 round per vigilante level.

entries.name: Instant Recognition
entries.description:
The vigilante is so well known that his name precedes him, even to other communities. It only takes 4 hours of effort to get the word out to transfer his renown benefits to a new community.

  A vigilante must be at least 13th level and have both the incredible renown and triumphant return social talents to select this talent.

entries.name: 热烈狂欢
entries.description: 在8级时任何你施展的对自身和盟友提供士气加值的法术自动获得法术延时超魔效果，如同被法术延时但不增加法术等级。此能力替换混乱领域的混沌之刃能力。

entries.name: Intense Focus
entries.description:
The psychic can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to gain a +2 bonus on any concentration check she attempts as part of casting the linked spell.

  She can choose to spend 2 points from her phrenic pool to instead gain a +4 bonus.

entries.name: Intense Focus
entries.description: The implement channels and enhances the effects of damaging evocations. A spellcaster who bears the implement can add the implement as an additional focus component for any of his damaging evocation spells that have an instantaneous duration or focus powers with an instantaneous duration. If he does so, the spell or focus power deals 1 additional point of damage of the same type to each creature for every 2 points of mental focus invested in the implement, to a maximum of 1 + 1 for every 2 occultist levels you possess.

entries.name: 锐化法术
entries.description: 每当你施展一个造成伤害塑能的法术时，在伤害上增加等于你法师等级一半的加值（最小为1）。此加值仅仅加在法术上，而不是每颗飞弹或是每道射线。此伤害类型与施放的法术相同。在20级时，每当你施展一个塑能法术时，你能在穿透生物法术抗力的施法等级检定中投骰两次，并且选择其中较好的结果。

entries.name: Intercessor
entries.description:
The shaman can invoke an ancestor spirit into an intact, humanoid or monstrous humanoid corpse to learn what the body knew in life. The acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{死者交谈}, but the shaman may ask only a single question. If an animated corpse or undead is targeted with this ability, the hex immediately fails.

  Once a corpse has answered a single question, it cannot be targeted with this ability again.

entries.name: Intermediate Psychic Magic (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype; basic psychic magic evolution; Charisma 11; summoner level 5th.

  The eidolon gains 2 points of psychic energy that it can spend each day. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e185z4g1taqtaq9d]{Compel Hostility}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ud4xukzhan89qhm4]次级困惑术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rvf2gxyy1d4strae]{Mind Thrust I}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c11olzqztodz5o5x]{渐隐术}

  The eidolon can use that spell thereafter as a psychic spell by spending 1 point of psychic energy. The caster level and save DC are the same as for basic psychic magic.

  This evolution can be selected more than once, selecting a different spell each time. The eidolon閳ユ獨 amount of psychic energy available to spend each day does not stack閳ユ攰t uses only the highest number of points granted by its most powerful psychic magic evolution.

entries.name: Internal Buffer
entries.description:
At 6th level, a kineticist閳ユ獨 study of her body and the elemental forces that course through it allow her to form an internal buffer to store extra energy. The buffer starts empty and doesn閳ユ獩 replenish each day, but the kineticist can accept 1 point of burn to add 1 point to the buffer as a full-round action, to a maximum of 1 point total. This maximum increases to 2 points at 11th level and to 3 points at 16th level. Once the kineticist adds points to her buffer, they remain indefinitely until she spends them.

  When she would otherwise accept burn, a kineticist can spend 1 point from her buffer to avoid accepting 1 point of burn. She cannot spend more than 1 point from her buffer in this way for a single wild talent. Points spent from the internal buffer don閳ユ獩 activate elemental overflow or add to its effects. Similarly, this buffer can be used to exceed the limit on the number of points of burn the kineticist can accept in a single turn.

entries.name: 内在强韧
entries.description: 当身处狂暴时，野蛮人免疫恶心与反胃效果。野蛮人必须至少8级才能选取此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Internal Fortitude (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian is immune to the sickened and nauseated conditions.

  A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 星海虚空
entries.description: 你呼唤寒冷太虚深处的严苛极寒伤害你的敌人。以一个标准动作，30尺之内的一个敌人将会被虚空包覆并受到每先知等级1d6的寒冷伤害，一个成功的强韧检定可以让伤害减半。10级时严酷的虚空可以让豁免失败的敌人陷入疲劳。15级时豁免失败的敌人还会震慑1轮。你每天可以使用这个能力1次，每10个先知等级再额外得到1次使用次数。

entries.name: Intimidating Display
entries.description: The shaman can call upon some of the majesty and power of dragons to cow her enemies. The shaman gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} as a bonus feat, even if she does not meet the prerequisites, and she can use it even when not wielding a weapon.

entries.name: 威吓凝视
entries.description: 野蛮人能以移动动作对一名邻接敌人进行一次威吓技能检定。如果他成功挫败对方士气，则敌人将战栗“1d4+1/野蛮人的检定结果每超过威吓DC5点”轮。

entries.name: Intimidating Glare (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian adds her Strength modifier in place of her Charisma modifier on all Intimidate checks to demoralize a foe. She can attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize an adjacent foe as a move action instead of a standard action.

  If the barbarian successfully demoralizes an adjacent foe, that foe is shaken for the remainder of the barbarian閳ユ獨 current rage.

entries.name: Intrigue Feats
entries.description:
The vigilante gains one of the following feats as a bonus feat:

  Blustering Bluff, But a Scratch, Call Truce, Confabulist, Criminal Reputation, Cutting Humiliation, Esoteric Linguistics, Intoxicating Flattery, Ironclad Logic, Nerve-Racking Negotiator, Orator, Persuasive Bribery, Play to the Crowd, Quick Favor, Rhetorical Flourish, Sense Assumptions, Sense Relationships, or Street Smarts.

  He must meet the feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites.

  This talent can be selected multiple times; each time, the vigilante gains a new feat from the above list.

entries.name: Intrigue Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of intrigue. You can apply @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发} to any spell you cast without increasing the level or casting time. You do not need to possess these feats to use this ability.

entries.name: Intrigue Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the intrigue mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjog6bufg5b08lvq]{魅惑人类} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.swkw2yoee6d9ldcd]{False Belief} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d0d86z521shpman1]{短讯术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1m5rpvirt48brv71]{说服徽记} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (18th).

entries.name: 直觉防护
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：当魔战士用法术辨识检定成功辨识出一个敌人施放的咒法[召唤]法术时，他可用直觉动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能在自己身上施放一个防护混乱\邪恶\善良\守序’(在使用奥能时选择)，每个魔战士等级持续一轮。当他7级时，他可改为施放一个‘反混乱\邪恶\善良\守序法阵’(在使用奥能时选择)。

entries.name: Intuitive Understanding
entries.description:
If the alchemist drinks an extract of the divination school while under the effects of a cognatogen (Ultimate Magic 15), his effective caster level temporarily increases by 2. In addition, while under the effects of a cognatogen, the alchemist may use augury once as a spell-like ability (caster level equal to his alchemist level). At 10th level, he can use divination instead.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level and must have the cognatogen discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Inured to Terror
entries.description:
Samsaran only.

  With their knowledge of the cyclical nature of existence, there are few experiences that can daunt samsaran slayers for long. As an immediate action when a slayer fails a saving throw against a fear effect, he can attempt the saving throw a second time to reduce the severity of the effect from panicked to frightened, frightened to shaken, or shaken to unaffected. Additionally, the DC of Intimidate checks to demoralize him increases by 2.

entries.name: Inured to the Dead
entries.description:
Once per rage, when the barbarian fails a saving throw against an effect created by an undead creature, she can reroll the saving throw. She must use the second result, even if it is worse. This does not require spending an action.

  A barbarian must be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 调查员天赋
entries.description: 在第3级以及之后的每两个等级时，调查员可以获得一项调查员天赋。除非另外提及，否则每一项调查员天赋只能选择一次。

entries.name: 隐形
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以变得“隐形”如同名法术。你每天可以保持隐形的分钟数等于你的先知等级，这些时间不必连续，但每次使用至少要花费1分钟。9级开始，当你使用此能力时可当做“高等隐形”，但是每使用此能力1轮就如同你使用隐形1分钟。要选择此启示你至少要达到3级。

entries.name: 隐形场
entries.description: 在8级，每天你能用一个迅捷动作使自己隐形等同于你法师等级的轮数。该能力使用不需要连续。其他方面如同 @Compendium[pf1.spells.cxgi0ub77t6aink1]{高等隐形}.

entries.name: 忍法·遁无形
entries.description: 每当忍者使用【忍法·遁形】时，她视同处于‘高等隐形术’效果下。忍者必须拥有【忍法·遁形】方可选择本忍术。

entries.name: 祈神祷告
entries.description:
以标准动作，导魂者可祈求神祇的力量强化盟友。

  当导魂者使用祈神祷告能力时，她必须从下列能力中选择一项，使她30尺内盟友获得此增益效果。如果导魂者的阵营为邪恶，此能力提供亵渎（Profane）加值，而非通常的神圣（Sacred）加值。中立阵营的导魂者必须选择亵渎加值或神圣加值，一旦选定即无法更改。生效中的祈神祷告效果无法打断，但导魂者死亡，麻痹，震慑或昏迷时立即结束。

  导魂者每日可使用此能力的总分钟数等于其职业等级。使用此能力不必连续，但必须以分钟计。以一个迅捷动作，导魂者可消耗1分钟能力使用时间，将她选择的祈神祷告变更为另一种。

  从7级开始，导魂者可用移动动作替代原本的标准动作使用此能力。13级开始，导魂者只需一个迅捷动作使用此能力。

  • 惩戒（Destruction）：导魂者的盟友充满了神圣的怒火，在所有武器伤害上获得+1神圣加值。这个加值每3级导魂者等级额外+1。
  • 治疗（Healing）：导魂者散发治疗之光，她的盟友获得1点快速医疗。导魂者的盟友每轮获得1点治疗（最高不超过其生命上限）。每轮治疗量每3级导魂者等级额外+1。
  • 正义（Justice）：这个能力促使导魂者的盟友寻求正义，在所有攻击上获得+1神圣加值。这个加值每5级导魂者等级额外+1。10级时，当确认重击威胁时该加值加倍。
  • 锐刺（Piercing）：这个能力赐予导魂者的盟友强大的集中力并且让他们的法术更加强大。盟友的专注检定及穿透法术抗力的施法者等级检定+1神圣加值。这个加值每3级导魂者等级额外+1。
  • 保护（Protection）：导魂者身旁环绕着保护的光环，给予其盟友防御等级+1神圣加值。这个加值每5级导魂者等级额外+1。10级时，当确认对导魂者盟友造成的重击威胁时该加值加倍。
  • 纯净（Purity）：导魂者的盟友对敌人的卑劣侵害获得保护，在所有豁免检定上获得+1神圣加值。这个加值每5级导魂者等级额外+1。10级时，这个加值对抗诅咒、疾病和毒素时加倍。
  • 坚韧（Resiliency）：导魂者的盟友更能对抗伤害，获得伤害减免「1/魔法」。这个伤害减免每5级导魂者等级额外+1。10级时，伤害减免从魔法变为导魂者的对立阵营（混乱、邪恶、善良、秩序）。如果她是中立阵营，导魂者的盟友不会得到该提升。
  • 抗力（Resistance）：导魂者的盟友受到一层闪烁的光环防护，获得2点能量抗力，对应的能量类型在祈神祷告开始时选择决定（强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰、音波）。这个防护每3级导魂者等级额外+2。
  • 制裁（Smiting）：此能力为导魂者盟友的武器浸染神圣的光芒。导魂者的武器在穿透伤害减免时视为魔法武器。6级时，导魂者的武器在穿透伤害减免时同时被视为一个阵营武器（混乱、邪恶、善良、秩序）。阵营种类取决于导魂者的阵营。如果导魂者是中立阵营，她不会得到这个好处。10级时，导魂者的武器在穿透伤害减免时视为精金武器（但不会额外减少硬度）。

entries.name: Invoke Primal Magic
entries.description: When an event within 30 feet of the arcanist would trigger a chance for a primal magic effect, the arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as an immediate action to increase the chance to 100%.

entries.name: Invoke the Harrow
entries.description: At 9th level, you can draw a random harrow card from a complete harrow deck you own as a standard action and channel the aspects of the card into your body. You take on superficial traits featured on the card and gain a +4 enhancement bonus to the ability score associated with the card閳ユ獨 suit. You can invoke the harrow for a number of minutes per day equal to your sorcerer level; the duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

entries.name: Iomedae's Boon
entries.description:
As a move action, you can call upon your deities to grant you courage. You gain a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls, damage rolls, and Will saving throws against fear effects for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma bonus.

  At 7th level, this bonus increases to +2, and at 14th level this bonus increases to +3.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 5th level, and every 5 levels thereafter.

entries.name: 精铁强韧
entries.description: 你的强韧检定+1。7级和14级这个效果再+1。

entries.name: 钢铁内脏
entries.description: 拥有此天赋的盗贼要不是拥有铸铁般坚固的肠胃，就是曾经训练自己忍受毒药。无论如何，他在对抗毒素时得到+1的豁免加值，同时在对所有会引起恶心和反胃的法术或效果时得到+4加值。

entries.name: Iron Order
entries.description:
Once per day, you can issue an order as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}. Any creature of chaotic alignment has difficulty defying your command, taking a 閳? penalty on its saving throw to resist it.

  At 15th level, your command function as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术}. If you are wearing Hellknight plate or a signifer mask, your command閳ユ獨 target takes an additional 閳? penalty on its saving throw to resist the order (regardless of the target閳ユ獨 alignment; this stacks with the penalty chaotic creatures take).

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 钢铁之肤
entries.description: 每天1次，你的皮肤像钢铁一样变得更加坚硬，使你获得伤害减免“10/精金”。这项能力作用如同“石肤术”，并使用你的先知等级作为施法者等级。在15级，你可以每天使用此能力2次。要选择此能力你至少要达到11级。

entries.name: 坚钢兵刃
entries.description: 你召唤出一把近战类型的军用或简易武器，你每天可以使用这把武器的分钟数等于你的先知等级。这把武器必须符合你的体型并且以金属构成（就算他原本的材料不是金属也会变成金属，例如矛；不过除了外表之外，所有的属性都同于他木造的同类），你被视为熟练此武器。这把武器会在离开你手中1轮之后消失。3级此武器视为由寒铁锻造，在7，15，19级此武器得到额外+1的增强加值。13级这把武器的材质变成精金。你每天可以使用此能力的次数相当于“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Irori's Boon
entries.description:
Once per day as an immediate action, whenever you fail a saving throw that causes you to become blinded, deafened, frightened, panicked, paralyzed, shaken, or stunned, you can attempt that saving throw again with a +4 insight bonus on the roll. You must take the second result, even if it is worse.

  At 7th and 15th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

entries.name: 绝对命令
entries.description: 8级开始，你可以强迫其他人完成你的命令。以一个标准动作，你可以如同 @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物} 法术般控制一个生物，但是对手的HD必须小于等于你的法师等级否则无效。目标生物可以以一个意志豁免抵销这个影响，豁免难度等于“10+1/2法师等级+智力修正”。你可以控制生物的时间等于你的法师等级轮，这些回合并不需要连续。你必须以一个标准动作专注去维持控制被支配的生物。

替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zt7cje76dck9hwp9]{极度绝望}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fb38vn4hm4rur6gm]{Wall Of Force}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙}

entries.name: 自外而来
entries.description: 每天一次，当你施放一个召唤法术时，你所召来的一头生物将变得更为强大，该召唤生物获得进化简单模版。如果你同时召唤多于1只生物，这些生物中只有只有1只会获得进化模版。此拥有进化模版的生物在外形上也会变的扭曲或怪异，笼罩着来自于异空间的虚寒。该能力只有在你以牧师职业施放召唤法术时才能生效——如果你以其他职业能力获得了此领域，该领域能力不会影响这些职业施放的召唤法术。此能力替换虚空领域的坚御心智能力。

entries.name: It Is My Nature
entries.description: At 20th level, your poisoned blood protects you, reflexively conjuring an ethereal stinger to lash out at foes who come too close. Three times per day when an enemy moves into a square adjacent to you, you can make a melee touch attack against the creature as an immediate action. On a hit, the creature must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier) or die. A creature that succeeds at this Fortitude save is immune to this effect for 24 hours. This is a poison and death effect. You can use this ability even when you are surprised or flat-footed.

entries.name: It was Meant to Be
entries.description: At 9th level, you may reroll any one attack roll, critical hit confirmation roll, or level check made to overcome spell resistance. You must decide to use this ability after the first roll is made but before the results are revealed by the GM. You must take the second result, even if it is worse. At 9th level, you can use this ability once per day. At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

entries.name: 物品制造
entries.description: 奥能师可以选择一项造物专长作为奖励专长。他必须满足该专长的先决条件。

entries.name: 奇物学识
entries.description: 调查员可以使用辨识法术技能检定以获知魔法物品的能力和启动命令，而无需使用法术侦测魔法来获得这些信息。调查员至少要达到7级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 万事通
entries.description: 10级或以上的吟游诗人能够使用任何技能，包括正常需要训练但他未曾受训的技能在内。16级或以上的诗人将所有技能看作本职技能。19级或以上的诗人可以在任何情况下为技能检定取10，哪怕正常来说这样做是不被允许的。

entries.name: Jagged Flesh
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 1
Prerequisite flesh of stone

  You painfully push forth jagged chunks of rock from your flesh. Until the next time your burn is removed, while your flesh of stone is active, any creature that strikes you with an unarmed strike or natural weapon or that grapples you takes 1d6 points of piercing damage. Weapons that strike you also take this damage, though the damage is unlikely to penetrate the weapon閳ユ獨 hardness.

entries.name: Jaguar's Grace
entries.description:
A slayer with this talent does not take the normal 閳? penalty when dealing nonlethal damage using a weapon that normally deals lethal damage. Attacks made this way can apply nonlethal sneak attack damage.

  The slayer must be at least 4th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Jaguar's Pounce
entries.description:
When a slayer with this talent deals sneak attack damage, he can attempt a disarm or trip combat maneuver as an immediate action as if the target were flat-footed (losing its Dexterity bonus to CMD). This combat maneuver does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

  The slayer must have the jaguar閳ユ獨 grace talent to select this talent.

entries.name: Jaguar's Protection
entries.description:
When a slayer with this talent deals sneak attack damage, he draws the target閳ユ獨 attention away from his allies. The affected enemy takes a 閳? penalty on attack rolls made against anyone other than the slayer for 1 minute.

  The slayer must have the jaguar閳ユ獨 pounce talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 审判
entries.description:
从1级开始，审判者可以用一个迅捷动作对她的敌人进行审判。当审判开始时，审判者根据使用的审判类型获得加值或者特殊能力。1级时审判者每天可以使用这个能力1次。在4级及之后每3级，审判者每天可以获得额外1次使用次数。一旦启动，这个能力持续到战斗结束，然后所有优势马上消失。审判者必须参与战斗才能获得这些优势。如果她陷入惊惧、恐慌、麻痹、震慑、昏迷，或者其他不能参与战斗的状态，该能力不会结束，但她失去审判带来的优势、直到回归到战斗中。当审判者使用该能力时，她必须选择一种审判效果。以一个迅捷动作，她可以改变审判种类。如果审判者是邪恶阵营，她得到的是亵渎加值而非神圣加值。中立阵营的审判者必须选择获得神圣加值或亵渎加值，一旦选定将无法改变。

  • 惩戒（Destruction）：审判者充满了神圣的怒火，在所有武器伤害上获得+1神圣加值。这个加值每3级审判者等级额外+1。
  • 治疗（Healing）：审判者被治疗之光包围，获得1点快速医疗。只要审判者依然存活并且审判未结束，她就可以每轮获得1点治疗。每轮治疗量每3级审判者等级额外+1。
  • 正义（Justice）：这个审判促使审判者寻求正义，在所有攻击上获得+1神圣加值。这个加值每5级审判者等级额外+1。10级时，当确认重击威胁时该加值加倍。
  • 锐刺（Piercing）：这个审判让审判者强大的集中力并且让他的法术更加强大。这个审判给予专注检定及穿透法术抗力的施法者等级检定+1神圣加值。这个加值每3级审判者等级额外+1。
  • 保护（Protection）：审判者身旁环绕着保护的光环，给予防御等级+1神圣加值。这个加值每5级审判者等级额外+1。10级时，当确认对你造成的重击威胁时该加值加倍。
  • 纯净（Purity）：审判者对敌人的卑劣侵害获得保护，在所有豁免检定上获得+1神圣加值。这个加值每5级审判者等级额外+1。10级时，这个加值对抗诅咒、疾病和毒素时加倍。
  • 坚韧（Resiliency）：审判者更能对抗伤害，获得伤害减免“1/魔法”。这个伤害减免每5级审判者等级额外+1。10级时，伤害减免从魔法变为审判者的对立阵营（混乱、邪恶、善良、秩序）。如果她是中立阵营，审判者不会得到该提升。
  • 抗力（Resistance）：审判者受到一层闪烁的光环防护，获得2点能量抗力，对应的能量类型在审判开始时选择决定（强酸、寒冷、电击、火焰、音波）。这个防护每3级审判者等级额外+2。
  • 制裁（Smiting）：审判为审判者的武器浸染神圣的光芒。审判者的武器在穿透伤害减免时视为魔法武器。6级时，审判者的武器在穿透伤害减免时同时被视为一个阵营武器（混乱、邪恶、善良、秩序）。阵营种类取决于审判者的阵营。如果审判者是中立阵营，她不会得到这个好处。10级时，审判者的武器在穿透伤害减免时视为精金武器（但不会额外减少硬度）。

替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h8zit03e88jxrg9t]{严加斥责}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qq0r0sldae6ole7n]{叱责}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3jaumkutti1ytulq]{审判烙印}

entries.name: 天网恢恢
entries.description: 每当你或一个距离你不超过10尺远的盟友使用近战或远程攻击对一个目标成功造成了一次重击威胁时，以一个即时动作，你可以为这次重击的确认投骰提供+4加值。本能力的效果不能和重击专攻专长叠加。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值。

entries.name: Juju Final Revelation
entries.description:
At 20th level, you become a master of the connections between the mortal world and the spirit world. Your knowledge enables you to gain incredible insight and control over others by manipulating spiritual energy. You gain an insight bonus equal to your Charisma modifier to your AC and on all saving throws and Knowledge checks.

  Additionally, once per day, you may cast extended dominate monster as a spell-like ability. With this ability, you may dominate a number of creatures equal to double your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Juju Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the juju mystery adds Bluff, Intimidate, Knowledge ：自然, Perform （演讲）, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ct9fhh8uawn8e4md]{动物交谈} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.be88e90guqbi1q1z]{恐惧术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (as a 6th-level spell) (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jjmoi5qbwkbguzbn]{召唤自然盟友 VII} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q2r6jrgsbwjgssdg]{Charm Monster, Mass} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (18th).

entries.name: Juju Senses
entries.description:
When casting detect magic and identify, you gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge ：神秘 and Spellcraft checks to recognize auras and identify their properties. You also gain a +2 bonus on Perception and Sense Motive checks made against spirit creatures, such as outsiders, fey, and incorporeal undead.

  At 10th level, this bonus increases to +4.

entries.name: Jury-Rigged Bomb
entries.description:
Unlike normal bombs, jury-rigged bombs can be created from whatever materials the alchemist has on hand; this makes them particularly handy in situations where the alchemist might find himself imprisoned or stripped of his equipment. Jury-rigged bombs can be crafted and thrown as a swift action (this counts against the alchemist閳ユ獨 daily use of bombs), and they deal only 1d4 points of damage + additional damage equal to half the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier on a direct hit. This damage increases by 1d4 at 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter. Despite being useful in a pinch, jury-rigged bombs are nonetheless crudely crafted and highly unstable; if the alchemist閳ユ獨 attack roll results in a natural 1, the bomb explodes as he is creating it, and he takes damage as if he had taken a direct hit.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.id: Just a Face in the Crowd
entries.name: Just a Face in the Crowd
entries.description: The rabble-rousers of Galt can blend into a crowd and are able to hide and spot others who appear to be hiding. The rogue gains a bonus equal to half his class level on Disguise and Perception checks when 10 or more creatures of his size are within 30 feet of him.

entries.name: 裁决：正义
entries.description: 神授力量: 你所侍奉的正义即是罪人命中注定所要面对之审判。

entries.name: 存真之道
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你接触一个生物并为他在你的下一轮前在一次攻击，技能，属性或豁免检定获得洞察加值，相当于你的审判者等级的一半（至少为1），持续1轮。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值（至少1次）。

entries.name: Jynx Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.q63jn0kbrrb6t3ea]{粉碎音波}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lsboosfk26m0ycqv]{降咒}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.a73dq2t8pd5n0y1g]{惩戒}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3jaumkutti1ytulq]{审判烙印}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1mi4y3g4n8adtfl3]{嫌恶术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术}

entries.name: Kalistocrat's Acumen
entries.description:
A vigilante with this talent must follow the dietary and sexual prohibitions of the Prophecies of Kalistrade (Pathfinder Campaign Setting: The Inner Sea World Guide 237) in his social identity or he loses the talent閳ユ獨 benefit until he atones. He can treat settlements as one size category larger when determining their base values and purchase limits.

  At 9th level, the vigilante can treat settlements as two size categories larger for the above purposes.

  At 15th level, the vigilante can treat settlements as four size categories larger for the above purposes.

entries.name: Kami Warden
entries.description: Ninjas can act as bodyguards as well as assassins or spies; some mystically emulate the relationship between kami and their wards when protecting their charges. A ninja with this trick gains Bodyguard and as bonus feats, ignoring their prerequisites. When using In Harm閳ユ獨 Way to intercept an attack, the ninja can spend 1 ki point to gains DR 10/cold iron and resistance 10 to acid, electricity, and fire for that attack.

entries.name: Kamikaze
entries.description:
A ninja with this ability strikes without concern for her own well-being. The ninja can spend 1 point from her ki pool to give her unarmed strikes and any weapons she wields the vicious weapon special ability for 1 round per level.

  The ninja can spend 1 ki point to dismiss this effect.

entries.name: Kawarimi
entries.description: Once per day when a successful attack is made against a ninja with this ability, as an immediate action she can spend 1 ki point to attempt a Stealth check opposed by the attacker閳ユ獨 Perception check. The ninja can attempt this check while being observed as long as she has cover or concealment (or an ability that allows her to attempt Stealth checks without cover or concealment). If she閳ユ獨 successful, the opponent閳ユ獨 attack hits an inanimate object that the attacker mistook for the ninja, and the ninja may move into an adjacent square and is hidden from the attacker.

entries.name: 敏锐回想
entries.description: 在3级时，调查员可以在未受训的情况下进行所有的知识技能检定。

entries.name: Keen Scent (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon's sense of smell becomes even more acute. The eidolon can notice other creatures by scent in a 180-foot radius underwater and can detect blood in the water at ranges of up to a mile.

  The eidolon must possess the gills and scent evolutions to take this evolution.

entries.name: Keep the Corners
entries.description:
Once per day when you fail a Reflex saving throw, you can reroll the saving throw with a +4 insight bonus. You must take the second result, even if it is worse.

  At 7th level and 15th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

entries.name: 传承管理
entries.description: 2级时，封印骑将必须选择一个他要保卫的地点或是秘密。如果他选择保卫地点，在为了保护该地点而战时，他的攻击检定会有+2的士气加值。如果他选择秘密，那么针对任何打算探出他秘密的行为时，他的豁免和技能对抗检定得到+2的士气加值。这些加值持续到他选择了另外一个守护地点或是秘密为止。

entries.name: Kelizandri's Tide
entries.description: When the barbarian rages, enemies find it difficult to escape the vortex of her fury. As a full-round action while raging, the barbarian can attempt a single combat maneuver check against each creature within 10 feet of her. If her roll equals or exceeds a creature閳ユ獨 CMD, she moves that creature 5 feet closer to her. Once per day after attempting this maneuver, she can attack each adjacent creature as a free action as if using the @Compendium[pf1.feats.UnmST9BvRhxT4vq3]{旋风攻击} feat. If she has the @Compendium[pf1.feats.UnmST9BvRhxT4vq3]{旋风攻击} feat, she can also use it as a free action in this way one additional time per day.

entries.name: 奥能真气
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6；须在提供【气运丹田(Ki Pool)】的职业上拥有等级

  效果：魔战士可将【奥能力池】中的奥能点和另一个职业提供的【气运丹田】中的气交换使用。

entries.name: 忍法·穿云
entries.description: 拥有此忍术的忍者可以阻止生物使用其气池。每当忍者造成偷袭伤害时，目标必须通过意志豁免，否则在等于忍者魅力修正的轮数内无法由气池花费点数。豁免DC等于“10+1/2忍者等级+魅力修正”。目标气池中的点数并不受影响，无需花费气的能力也仍可正常生效。

entries.name: Ki Blocker (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a free action before making an unarmed strike against a foe. If the attack hits, the monk can interrupt the target閳ユ獨 flow of ki. If the monk successfully damages the target of his attack, that opponent閳ユ獨 cost to activate abilities with ki increases by 1 ki point for 1 hour.

  If the monk spends 2 points from his ki pool, he can use this ability to affect the target閳ユ獨 arcane pool, arcane reservoir, grit points, inspiration, or panache points instead of its ki pool. The effects of this ability do not stack, but multiple hits increase the duration by 1 hour for each hit.

  A monk must be at least 10th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 忍法·星爆
entries.description: 拥有此忍术的忍者可以将一部分气充入一件投掷武器中，例如手里剑，并用一个标准动作投掷出去。该投掷武器爆炸开来并影响10尺爆发范围，造成1d6点火焰伤害，忍者2级之后的每4级再加1d6点火焰伤害，在18级时达到最高的5d6。受爆炸影响的生物可以通过反射豁免来令伤害减半，DC等于“10+1/2忍者等级+魅力修正”。若投掷武器命中某个生物，该生物在豁免检定上受-2减值。若投掷武器未命中，参照溅射武器规则处理。使用本忍术花费1点气。

entries.name: Ki Guardian (UC)
entries.description:
As an immediate action before he rolls a saving throw against a targeted effect that also targets other allies or an area effect whose area includes other allies, a monk with this ability can spend any number of ki points and designate a number of adjacent allies equal to the number of ki points spent. The monk rolls one saving throw for each designated ally, using his bonus instead of the ally閳ユ獨. For each successful saving throw, the corresponding ally treats the effect as if that ally had succeeded at the saving throw, and for each saving throw failed, the corresponding ally treats the effect as if that ally had failed the saving throw. If the monk fails any of the saving throws (including his own original saving throw), the monk treats the effect as if he had failed the saving throw.

  A monk must be at least 6th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: Ki Hurricane (UC)
entries.description:
As a full-round action, a monk with this ability can move up to twice his speed. At any point in that movement, the monk can spend 1 ki point to make the first attack in his flurry of blows. He can later spend another ki point to make the next attack in his flurry of blows, and so on, until he either stops spending ki points or has exhausted all the attacks from his flurry of blows.

  A monk must be at least 10th level and possess the sudden speed ki power before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: Ki Meditation (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 2 ki points to meditate as a full-round action, as if using Combat Meditation.

  Alternatively, he can spend 4 ki points to meditate as a move action instead.

  Using these ki points does not count as one of the monk閳ユ獨 daily uses of Combat Meditation, but it grants him the usual benefits he would gain from his meditation feats for doing so.

  The monk must have the Combat Meditation feat before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: Ki metabolism (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability uses his ki to control his metabolism. As long as he has at least 1 point remaining in his ki pool, the monk needs to eat and drink only 1/4 as often as normal, needs only 2 hours of sleep each night (including to replenish his ki pool), and can hold his breath for up to 1 hour per point of Constitution.

  As a move action, he can spend 1 ki point to enter a state of suspended animation, falling unconscious and appearing dead to all senses. At the time he enters this state, he indicates a preset period of time or a triggering condition, after which he awakens.

entries.name: Ki Mount (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a standard action to grant 2 temporary hit points per monk level he possesses to his mount for 1 hour per monk level. As long as the monk and his mount are adjacent or the monk is mounted, the mount shares the benefits of whichever of the AC bonus, evasion, high jump, improved evasion, ki strike, perfect self, and still mind abilities the monk possesses.

  A monk must be at least 6th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 气运丹田
entries.description:
4级时，武僧获得了一个丹田气池，当中流转的超自然能量──气，能使武僧完成神妙的技艺。武僧的丹田气池大小等同于“1/2武僧等级+感知修正”。只要他的丹田中至少还有1点气，他就能使用【斗气击（Ki Strike）】。

  • 4级时，在穿透伤害减免时，武僧的徒手攻击视为魔法武器。
  • 7级时，在穿透伤害减免时，武僧的徒手攻击亦视为寒铁和镀银武器。
  • 10级时，在穿透伤害减免时，武僧的徒手攻击同样被视为秩序武器；
  • 而16级时，在穿透伤害减免或对抗物品硬度的时候，武僧的徒手攻击则被视为精金。

  自丹田中消耗1点气，武僧可以做出下列行动：

  • 在使用【疾风连击】时，再进行一次使用他最高的基础攻击加值的额外攻击。
  • 消耗1点气来增加20尺速度，效果持续1轮。
  • 消耗1点气来让自己在AC上获得+4闪避加值，效果持续1轮。

  启动这些能力都是一个迅捷动作。

  武僧在等级提升时，可以透过消耗气来使用新的能力。丹田在武僧充足休息或静思8小时后便会自动归满。

entries.name: 气池
entries.description: 盗贼得到一个类似忍者的气池，不过这个小小的气池并不支持额外的攻击次数。此气池的大小等同于盗贼的感知修正（至少为1），并且在每天开始时自动恢复。如果他已经拥有气池或是在之后得到气池，那么该气池的大小增加相当于他感知修正的一半。他可以透过消耗1点气池中的气来增加自身的移动速度10尺直到他的回合结束。

entries.name: 气池
entries.description:
2级时，忍者获得一个气池，其中流转的超自然能量令她能够完成神妙的技艺。忍者的气池大小等于“1/2忍者等级+魅力修正”。只要气池中还有至少1点气，她就能在任何跳跃的特技技能检定中如同助跑开始一样。在10级时，她也可以在跳跃的特技检定中将DC减半（但她仍旧无法移动超过其速度允许的距离）。自气池消耗1点气，忍者可以用最高基本攻击加值进行一次额外的攻击，但限其使用全力攻击时。此外，她可以花费1点气增加20尺速度，持续1轮。最后，忍者可以花费1点气令自己在隐匿技能检定上获得+4洞察加值，持续1轮。启动这些能力都是一个迅捷动作。忍者可以选择特定的忍术来获得额外的消耗气池的特殊能力。

  气池在8小时休息或冥想后的每天清晨恢复；这些时间无需连续。若忍者拥有其他带有气池的职业，则将忍者与该职业等级合计以决定气池的总点数，但仅能将一种属性修正加在该总值上。选择使用何种属性，需在获得第二个职业的能力时决定，一旦决定则不可更改。之后忍者可以消耗气池点数使用每个她所拥有的带来气池的职业的能力。

entries.name: Ki Pool (UC)
entries.description:
At 3rd level, a monk gains a pool of ki points, supernatural energy he can use to accomplish amazing feats. The number of points in a monk閳ユ獨 ki pool is equal to 1/2 his monk level + his Wisdom modifier. As long as he has at least 1 point in his ki pool, he can make a ki strike.

  At 3rd level, ki strike allows his unarmed attacks to be treated as magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 7th level, his unarmed attacks are also treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 10th level, his unarmed attacks are also treated as lawful weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 16th level, his unarmed attacks are treated as adamantine weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction and bypassing hardness.

By spending 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action, a monk can make one additional unarmed strike at his highest attack bonus when making a flurry of blows attack. This bonus attack stacks with all bonus attacks gained from flurry of blows, as well as those from haste and similar effects.

  A monk gains additional powers that consume points from his ki pool as he gains levels.

The ki pool is replenished each morning after 8 hours of rest or meditation; these hours do not need to be consecutive.

entries.name: Ki powers (UC)
entries.description:
At 4th level and every 2 levels thereafter, a monk can select one ki power. These powers allow the monk to perform amazing feats of mystical power and acrobatic prowess by expending points from his ki pool. Once a ki power is selected, it cannot be changed. Some ki powers require the monk to be of a specific level or higher before they can be chosen.

  Unless otherwise noted, a monk cannot select an individual ki power more than once.

entries.name: Ki Range (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a swift action to increase the range increment of any thrown monk weapon by 20 feet.

  Apply this benefit before doubling the range increment with the Far Shot feat.

entries.name: Ki Sunder (UC)
entries.description: A monk with this ability can spend 1 ki point as a free action when attempting a sunder combat maneuver check to add his monk level as a bonus to the damage roll.

entries.name: Ki Venom
entries.description:
A ninja with this trick knows how to make poisons from innocuous herbs or minerals. Creating ki venom is a full-round action that costs 1 ki point. The poison lasts for 24 hours before becoming inert. The poison deals either Strength or Dexterity damage, chosen when the venom is created. The ninja can spend additional ki as part of the process of creating the ki venom to improve the venom in one or more of the following ways: spend 1 ki point to increase the damage die to a d6, spend 1 ki point to change the ability damage dealt to Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma damage, or spend 1 ki point to increase the number of saves required to cure the poison by 1.

Ki Venom

  Type poison, injury; Save Fortitude DC = 10 + 1/2 the ninja閳ユ獨 level + her Charisma modifier
Frequency 1/round for rounds equal to the ninja閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier.
Effect 1d4 ability damage (see above); Cure 1 save

entries.name: Ki Visions (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ability often sees visions of spirits or hears the voice of his departed mentor in his dreams. On any given night during which the monk dreams, he can use this ability to gain the benefits of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术}. If he does, he spends 2 ki points from the next day閳ユ獨 total.

  A monk must be at least 10th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: Ki Volley (UC)
entries.description:
When a targeted spell or spell-like ability fails to overcome the monk閳ユ獨 spell resistance from diamond soul, he can spend 2 ki points as an immediate action to send that spell back at its caster as spell turning.

  A monk must be 16th level or higher and possess the diamond soul ki power before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 绝杀
entries.description: 到了8级，若确认了重击，你那充满死亡能量的武器会额外造成相当于牧师等级一半的出血伤害。你能在8级每天使用1次，然后每比8高4级多1次。此能力替换死亡领域的死亡拥抱能力。

entries.name: Kin to the Old Tales
entries.description: At 20th level, your soul becomes host to the otherworldly energies of the harrow. You gain DR 10/cold iron and immunity to curses, paralysis, and sleep. You can always act in the surprise round of combat, and you cannot be caught flat-footed. You gain unlimited use of your invoke the harrow ability.

entries.name: Kinetic Awe
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  You create a terrifying display of elemental power. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧}, except you can use this ability as a standard action and you add half your kineticist level as a bonus on your Intimidate check if you閳ユ獫e used gather power during the same round; doing so expends the gathered power. This ability otherwise counts as the @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} feat; feats and other effects which affect @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} (such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.kn854Ovz0BDA2Dgz]{粉碎防御}) apply to it, and it counts as @Compendium[pf1.feats.3cq9YbgcMrAXC76j]{炫目技巧} for the purpose of meeting combat feat prerequisites.

entries.name: Kinetic Blade Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You form a weapon using your kinetic abilities. You create a non-reach, light or one-handed weapon in your hand formed of pure energy or elemental matter. (If you閳ユ獧e a telekineticist, you instead transfer the power of your kinetic blast to any object held in one hand.) The kinetic blade閳ユ獨 shape is purely cosmetic and doesn閳ユ獩 affect the damage dice, critical threat range, or critical multiplier of the kinetic blade, nor does it grant the kinetic blade any weapon special features. The object held by a telekineticist for this form infusion doesn閳ユ獩 prevent her from using gather power.

You can use this form infusion once as part of an attack action, a charge action, or a full-attack action in order to make melee attacks with your kinetic blade. Since it閳ユ獨 part of another action (and isn閳ユ獩 an action itself), using this wild talent doesn閳ユ獩 provoke any additional attacks of opportunity. The kinetic blade deals your kinetic blast damage on each hit (applying any modifiers to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage as normal, but not your Strength modifier). The blade disappears at the end of your turn. The weapon deals the same damage type that your kinetic blast deals, and it interacts with Armor Class and spell resistance as normal for a blast of its type.

  Even if a telekineticist uses this power on a magic weapon or another unusual object, the attack doesn閳ユ獩 use any of the magic weapon閳ユ獨 bonuses or effects and simply deals the telekineticist閳ユ獨 blast damage. The kinetic blade doesn閳ユ獩 add the damage bonus from elemental overflow.

entries.name: Kinetic Cover
entries.description:
Element aether, earth, water, wood;Type utility (Sp);Level 1; Burn 0

  You call up elemental matter to defend yourself and your allies from attacks. As a standard action, you can select one face of a square within 30 feet of you and move elemental matter to block that face, providing total cover from that direction. The face you select must be supported by the ground, and the kinetic cover cannot support more than 5 pounds of weight. Water, ice, and telekinetic force are translucent, but earth, metal, mud, and the like are opaque and block line of sight. A creature who strikes the cover can easily destroy it.

  Regardless of its composition, the cover has hardness 0, AC 5, and 2 hit points per kineticist level you possess. You can have a number of kinetic covers in existence equal to your Constitution modifier + 1/2 your kineticist level.

entries.name: Kinetic Dissolution
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite wayang, chosen racial trait

  Choose either the dissolution閳ユ獨 child alternate racial trait or the light and dark racial trait. You can use the chosen racial trait by accepting 1 point of burn, even if you have no daily uses of that racial trait remaining.

entries.name: Kinetic Fist Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You surround your body with energy or elemental matter from your kinetic abilities. You can use this form infusion as part of an attack action, a charge action, or a full-attack action to add damage to each of your natural attacks and unarmed strikes until the beginning of your next turn. Since kinetic fist is part of another action, using this wild talent doesn閳ユ獩 provoke any additional attack of opportunity. You deal an additional 1d6 points of damage per 3 dice of your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage (minimum 1d6), and this damage is of the same type as your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage. This extra damage ignores spell resistance and doesn閳ユ獩 apply any modifiers to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage, such as your Constitution modifier.

entries.name: Kinetic Form
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 1

  You are able to suspend your body in a large mass of elemental matter. Until the next time your burn is removed, you can change your size to Large or shift back to your original size as a standard action. This doesn閳ユ獩 change your ability scores in any way.

  At 16th level, you can accept 1 additional point of burn to instead change your size to Huge. You cannot use kinetic form to decrease your size.

entries.name: Kinetic Healer
entries.description:
Element aether, water; Type utility (Sp); Level 1; Burn 1
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  With a touch, you can heal a willing living creature of an amount of damage equal to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage. Instead of paying the burn cost yourself, you can cause the recipient to take 1 point of burn. If you do so, the recipient takes 1 point of nonlethal damage per Hit Die he possesses, as usual for burn; this damage can閳ユ獩 be healed by any means until the recipient takes a full night閳ユ獨 rest.

entries.name: Kinetic Restoration
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 1

  You recover from 1d4 points of ability score damage to one of your physical ability scores (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution). This also eliminates any fatigue that you suffer, and improves an exhaustion condition to fatigued.

If you have the kinetic healer utility wild talent, you can use both kineticist restoration and kinetic healer on the same target with one standard action.

entries.name: Kinetic Revivification
entries.description:
Element aether, water; Type utility (Su); Level 6; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite kinetic healer

  You can bring an ally who died within 1 round back from the dead with your kinetic healer wild talent similarly to the breath of life spell, except the ally regains the normal number of hit points from the kinetic healer utility wild talent instead of the amount healed by breath of life. An ally revived in this way takes 1 point of burn + any points of burn from the kinetic healer utility wild talent (if you choose to have the ally take points of burn instead of taking it yourself).

If you have the metahealer ability (such as from the kinetic chirurgeon kineticist archetype found on page 90 of Occult Adventures), this feat instead allows you to bring an ally back who died within a number of rounds equal to 3 + the ally閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier (minimum 0) 閳?the number of points of burn the ally had taken before it died. For each round that the ally was dead, when it is brought back to life in this way, it takes 1 additional point of burn + any points of burn from the kinetic healer talent.

entries.name: Kinetic Whip Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Prerequisite kinetic blade
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  You form a long tendril of energy or elemental matter. This functions as kinetic blade but counts as a reach weapon appropriate for your size. Unlike most reach weapons, the kinetic whip can also attack nearby creatures.

  The kinetic whip disappears at the beginning of your next turn, but in the intervening time, it threatens all squares within its reach, allowing you to make attacks of opportunity that deal the whip閳ユ獨 usual damage.

entries.name: 暗刺
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以进行一次偷袭攻击，将你的先知等级视为有效的游荡者等级。你每天可以使用本能力一次，在5级和之后每提升5级时可以每天多使用一次。

entries.name: 骑将挑战
entries.description: 15级时，骑将每天可以进行一次骑将挑战。这与一般的挑战类似，但是骑将可以将自己的魅力修正加到针对挑战物件的所有攻击与伤害检定上。此外，在对抗被他的骑将挑战指定的目标时，他在用以确认重击检定的攻击骰上获得+4环境加值。

entries.name: 一击倒地
entries.description: 每日1次，盗贼可以选择放弃她的偷袭伤害而将对手击倒在地。她必须在攻击之前使用这一天赋。如果攻击命中，那么取代造成偷袭伤害（同时也不造成任何其他偷袭带来的负面效果)，对手被击倒在地并昏迷1d4轮。一个成功的强韧检定可以将效果降至恍惚1轮，DC为“10+1/2盗贼等级+智力修正”。

entries.name: 击飞
entries.description: 每轮1次，野蛮人可以进行一次冲撞检定来取代一次近战攻击。如果成功，目标承受等同于野蛮人力量修正的伤害，且如常地向后移动。如果成功，野蛮人无须跟着目标移动。此动作不会引发藉机攻击。

entries.name: Knockback (UC)
entries.description:
Once per round, the barbarian can attempt a bull rush against one target in place of a melee attack, using her full CMB regardless of the attack it replaces. If the bull rush is successful, the target takes an amount of damage equal to the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier and is knocked back as normal. The barbarian doesn閳ユ獩 move with the target.

  This bull rush doesn閳ユ獩 provoke an attack of opportunity.

entries.name: Knockback Kick (UC)
entries.description:
The monk attempts to knock his foe back with a powerful kick. If the attack hits, the monk can attempt a free combat maneuver check against the foe (using the base attack bonus of the attack used to hit the foe). If the check is successful, the foe is knocked 10 feet directly away from the monk. This distance increases by 10 feet for every 5 by which the check exceeds the foe閳ユ獨 CMD, to a maximum distance equal to the monk閳ユ獨 fast movement bonus.

  This movement does not provoke an attack of opportunity. The foe stops moving if it strikes another creature, barrier, or otherwise solid object. The creature is not knocked prone by this movement.

  The monk must attack with a kick to use this style strike.

entries.name: 沉重打击
entries.description: 取代一次近战攻击，野蛮人可以绊摔一个目标。如果成功，目标受到等于野蛮人力量修正的伤害，并被击倒。这不会引发藉机攻击。这项能力每次狂暴只能使用1次。

entries.name: Knockdown Stance (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can focus on toppling her foes. Once per round, she can make a trip attack against one target in place of a melee attack. If she succeeds, the target is knocked prone. This trip attempt doesn閳ユ獩 provoke an attack of opportunity.

  This is a stance rage power.

entries.name: 震荡击
entries.description: 在4级时，每天一次拳师可以对一个目标发动一次沉重的打击，将其一击殴到仆街。拳师必须在攻击检定之前声明自己要使用震荡击尝试，如果拳师的这次攻击成功命中并且目标受到了伤害，他就必须通过一个强韧检定（DC=10+1/2拳师等级+拳师力量或敏捷调整值，取其高者）否则将在1d6轮内失去意识。被击晕的生物每轮可以再以一个不受藉机攻击的整轮动作尝试恢复意识。免疫重击和非致命伤害的生物也同时免疫这个能力。在10级时，拳师获得额外一次震荡拳的每日使用次数；在16级时再增加一次。

entries.name: Knockout Queen
entries.description: Sabriune has passed on the secret of swiftly manufacturing drow poison. Once per day, the rogue can create 1 or more doses of drow poison by spending 25 gp per dose; this process takes 30 minutes of work, regardless of the number of doses she creates. She can create no more than 1 dose for every 3 rogue levels she has (minimum 1 dose). Creating drow poison in this way does not require a skill check, but the created poison spoils if not used within 24 hours. (This spoilage means that selling doses of this poison for a profit to unsuspecting merchants might well result in unwanted repercussions and reprisals!)

entries.name: 知识守护者
entries.description: 在1级时，你可以通过接触一个生物以获悉他的情报和弱点。如果你成功的对目标造成了一次接触攻击，你可以借此了解关于它的情报，如同你进行了一个知识检定并且获得了等于（15+战斗祭司等级+感知调整值）的检定结果。

entries.name: 怪物大全
entries.description: 在10级时，每当你成功的通过了一个探知生物信息的知识检定（比如通过知识守护者祝福），你就可以以一个迅捷动作，对这个生物的攻击，豁免检定以及对抗该生物攻击你的AC上获得+2洞察加值。这些加值持续1分钟。

entries.name: 知识领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你是通晓传说的智者。你可以额外将所有知识技能添加到你的职业技能列表中。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{通晓语言},
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想},
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{死者交谈},
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术},
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术},
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.x619lrcykmmwts0f]{寻找捷径},
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.b5mz8voksps5g4yq]{通晓传奇},
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gw2sgj93dgarpem8]{感知位置},
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vl7yer8k1leyuxld]{预警术}.

entries.name: 岁月知识
entries.description: 你搜寻时间，并寻找有关传奇或信息的遗漏片段。你可以重骰你1分钟内做过的1次知识检定，并得到相当于你魅力修正的洞察加值。每日你可以使用此能力的次数相当于你的魅力修正。

entries.name: 知识力池
entries.description: 7级时，当魔战士准备其魔战士法术时，他可以决定从奥能力池中花费1点或更多点数，最高可以等于其智力加值。他每以此法花费1点，便可以将魔战士法术列表中的任意一个法术视同包含在其法术书中并能以此法在当日正常准备该法术。他也可以运用力池法术能力施展依此法添加的法术，但仅限他下一次准备法术之前使用。

entries.name: Kobold Bloodline
entries.description:
The following bloodline is available to kobold sorcerers.

  While many kobold sorcerers tout their purely draconic bloodline, over generations of eldritch training, some such spellcasters have created a bloodline that, while tinged with some draconic magic, is the embodiment of the race閳ユ獨 virtue distilled into arcane form. Many practitioners of this bloodline go on to lead powerful kobold tribes.

  本职技能: Disable Device

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nee6cxpoekp3aklq]{魔法警报} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8w67l6dzzsi6oz5f]{造坑术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o4ywdvsm1oty8blq]{爆裂符文} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cdedzw5d9ui73ua7]{龙息术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bdyr9oebse6haser]{化石为泥} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8z4tlk1fojr9t9yb]{铜墙铁壁} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cm3l4h4mld9j8lar]{延迟爆裂火球} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv14vemq9gduhyhu]{Form Of The Alien Dragon III} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{禁锢术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{防御式战斗训练},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发}.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell against a creature that is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC, increase that spell閳ユ獨 DC by +2.

entries.name: Kundalini Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite ki pool, kinetic fist
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw Fortitude partial

  You infuse your elemental energy with kundalini serpent fire. Choose a chakra you can currently open; you must accept an amount of burn equal to the chakra閳ユ獨 number (1 for root, 2 for sacral, and so on). Your unarmed strikes with the infused blast cause the target to suffer the effects of blocking the chosen chakra as per the Block Chakras or Block Upper Chakras feat. You can use this infusion only while also using the kinetic fist form infusion.

entries.name: Kyton Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
In the shadowy land of Nidal, the influence of Zon-Kuthon and the Midnight Lord閳ユ獨 favored servants閳ユ敄he kytons閳?taints the land and its inhabitants. Just as an eclipse drives animals wild, so too does the darkness unleash a madness from deep within you.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Q1cY8r0Pvb66pMG0]{警觉}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器} (spiked chain),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强}
  • Improved Dirty Trick,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jy64xofud29j5ju6]{痛苦打击} (10th),

In the shadowy land of Nidal, the influence of Zon-Kuthon and the Midnight Lord閳ユ獨 favored servants閳ユ敄he kytons閳?taints the land and its inhabitants. Just as an eclipse drives animals wild, so too does the darkness unleash a madness from deep within you.

entries.name: Kyton Immunities
entries.description: At 20th level, you gain immunity to cold and DR 10/good and silver. You have this benefit constantly, even when not bloodraging.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6zv90r375b5ha994]{Delay Pain}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.429wzxjzm1chnsq7]{Instrument of Agony}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kna8nhxmk5b6m6e8]{Agonize}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k6nfhf1wvik082wu]{痛苦徽记}

entries.name: Labyrinthine Words
entries.description: You add your Wisdom modifier in addition to your Charisma modifier on Bluff checks to lie and Diplomacy checks to influence other creatures.

entries.name: 跛足
entries.description: 你的一条腿受到了永久性的伤损，如果你拥有30尺或更多的基础速度，那么你的移动速度降低10尺；如果你的基础速度低于30尺，那么你的移动速度降低5尺。你将不会再因为重负而降低移动速度。5级时，你免疫疲乏效果（但不包括力竭）；10级时，你不会再因为着甲而降低移动速度；15级时，你免疫力竭效果。

entries.name: 语言子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{通晓语言}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.etskn140auk6cjj2]{共享语言}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{巧言术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zuqlok69lapqc6lg]{心灵连线}

entries.name: Large (4 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon grows in size, becoming Large. The eidolon gains a +8 bonus to Strength, a +4 bonus to Constitution, and a +2 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to its Dexterity. This size change also gives the creature a 閳? size penalty to its AC and on attack rolls, a +1 bonus to its CMB and CMD, a 閳? penalty on Fly skill checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth skill checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, it also gains 10-foot reach. Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total. The eidolon must be Medium to take this evolution. The summoner must be at least 8th level before selecting this evolution.

If 6 additional evolution points are spent, the eidolon instead becomes Huge. The eidolon gains a +16 bonus to Strength, a +8 bonus to Constitution, and a +5 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to its Dexterity. This size change also give the creature a 閳? size penalty to its AC and attack rolls, a +2 bonus to its CMB and CMD, 10-foot reach, a 閳? penalty on Fly skill checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth skill checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, its reach increases to 15 feet (10 feet for all other base forms). Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total. These bonuses and penalties replace, and do not stack with, those gained from becoming Large.

  The summoner must be at least 13th level before selecting this option.

The ability increase evolution costs twice as much (4 evolution points) when adding to the Strength or Constitution scores of a Large or Huge eidolon.

entries.name: Large (UC) (4 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 8th (13th for Huge), Medium size.

  The eidolon grows in size, becoming Large. The eidolon gains a +4 bonus to Strength, a +2 bonus to Constitution, and a +2 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to Dexterity. This size change also gives the creature a 閳? size penalty to AC and on attack rolls, a +1 bonus on combat maneuver checks and to CMD, a 閳? penalty on Fly checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, it also gains a reach of 10 feet. Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total.

If 6 additional evolution points are spent, the eidolon instead becomes Huge. The eidolon gains a +8 bonus to Strength, a +4 bonus to Constitution, and a +5 bonus to its natural armor. It takes a 閳? penalty to Dexterity. This size change also gives the creature a 閳? size penalty to AC and on attack rolls, a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks and to CMD, a 10-foot reach, a 閳? penalty on Fly checks, and a 閳? penalty on Stealth checks. If the eidolon has the biped base form, its reach increases to 15 feet instead of 10 feet. Any reach evolutions the eidolon possesses are added to this total. These bonuses and penalties replace, and do not stack with, those gained from becoming Large.

The ability increase evolution costs twice as much (4 evolution points) when adding to the Strength or Constitution scores of a Large or Huge eidolon.

entries.name: Last Ditch Effort
entries.description: Once per day, a rogue with this ability who accidentally activates a trap while attempting to disarm it may immediately attempt another Disable Device check to disarm it, albeit at a 閳? penalty. The result of the second check is taken even if the result is lower.

entries.name: 最终抵抗
entries.description: 20级时，武士在进行挑战时可以每日进行一次最后抵抗。当这一挑战生效时，所有近战及远程武器对武士造成最小伤害值，除非攻击来源为重击。此外，武士在生命值降至0以下时保持神志清醒且不会陷入恍惚。当使用此能力时，武士不会因近战或远程武器而亡，除非它们被武士的挑战目标所持有。本能力对法术、环境效果、超自然能力或任何近战和远程武器之外的伤害来源无效。这类伤害来源对他正常生效并能够杀死他（尽管仍旧无法令他生命值降至0以下时失去神智或陷入恍惚）。本效果持续至挑战结束，或武士对挑战目标之外的其他目标做出进攻性动作。

entries.name: 毒性持续
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以以一种更有效以及节俭的方式给武器上毒。以这一方式对武器猝毒，毒性可以在两次成功攻击中生效，而非通常的一次。当然，这一方式也减低了毒性，毒药的DC-2。以这一方式淬毒是一个全回合动作，如果盗贼拥有“迅捷上毒”天赋那她能以一个迅捷动作来完成这一工作。

entries.name: Lasting Poison (UC)
entries.description:
A rogue with this talent can apply poison to a weapon in such a way that it is effective for a number of successful attacks equal to her Dexterity modifier (minimum two) instead of one. This poison has a reduced effect, however, and saves made against the poison gain a +2 circumstance bonus.

  Applying poison in this way is a full-round action, or a standard action if the rogue has the swift poison rogue talent.

entries.name: Lasting Tinctures
entries.description: The alchemist knows how to make tinctures that last much longer than normal. The durations of the effects of any tinctures the alchemist brews using the Craft skill are doubled. When the alchemist uses this discovery to brew a longer-lasting tincture, the tincture imposes its normal penalties on the alchemist even if the alchemist has an ability that reduces tinctures閳?penalties (such as the substance tolerance ability of the fermenter alchemist archetype presented in this section). An alchemist with this discovery can brew tinctures with normal durations.

entries.name: 笑料之触
entries.description: 在1级时，你能用一次近战接触攻击导致一个生物爆笑一轮。爆笑中的生物只能做一个移动动作，但是他们可以正常保护自己。当一个生物被笑料之触所影响，它在之后的24小时内免疫该效果。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Lava Walk
entries.description:
You can walk across lava, magma, and similarly heated stone at your normal movement speed. You are immune to any fire damage caused by the surface while you walk above it, even if it radiates damage at a distance. While using lava walk, you never slip or fall from poor or slippery footing. You can use lava walk for 1 minute per day per oracle level. This duration doesn閳ユ獩 need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 守序之击
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以通过接触为一件武器灌注秩序的内在本质。在一分钟内，这件武器可以亮起淡黄或灰白的光芒，并在击中混乱生物时造成1d6点额外伤害，在克服伤害减免时视为守序阵营。这个额外伤害的效果不能与秩序武器附魔相叠加。

entries.name: 律法先锋
entries.description: 在10级时，你能以一个标准动作召唤一个秩序的勇士与你并肩作战。这相当于一个法术四级召唤怪物的效果，不过你只能召唤守序异界生物或者拥有绝对模板的动物。在10级后的每2个等级，这个能力的效果就上升一个等级，最高在20级达到九级召唤怪物。

entries.name: 秩序领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你遵循绝对的秩序法则，并由此获得启迪。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.md6ltvqh9paadsm4]{Protection From Chaos}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zujht80bgjdk9cyb]{阵营武器} (限秩序)
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ne7ot8lcaiva3f9]{反混乱法阵}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8zeulunjetwrdgwj]{秩序之怒}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3lgy3s4h4087ojht]{反制混乱}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.d8hypv6zdyan3rzr]{怪物定身术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7e22urxux6i2mua5]{律言}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lzj5umxjvogvpg6b]{秩序护盾}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{召唤怪物 IX} (限秩序)

entries.name: 圣疗
entries.description:
2级起，圣骑士可以通过接触治疗她自己或她人的伤口。此能力每日可以使用的次数等于“1/2圣骑士等级+魅力修正”。每次使用圣疗可以治疗“1/2圣骑士等级×1d6”点生命值。使用此能力一般来说是一个标准动作，但用来治疗自己是一个迅捷动作。圣骑士需要有一只手空闲才能使用此能力。

  圣骑士也可以使用【圣疗】伤害不死生物，造成“1/2圣骑士等级×1d6”点伤害。如此使用圣疗需要一个成功的近战接触检定，但不会引发藉机攻击。不死生物对此伤害无法进行豁免检定。

entries.name: Lay to Rest
entries.description:
The witch may target a single undead creature with this hex as if with an @Compendium[pf1.spells.lllhr9py6w44cxjm]{亡灵归亡} spell. A Will save negates this effect.

  Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: Leadership
entries.description: 在8级时，你获得 @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力} 作为额外专长。此外，只要你一直遵守你的神祇的教义（若你不信仰特定神祇则改为神圣信条），你的领导力数值就拥有+2加值。

entries.name: 领导子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.hu8179fdqfkl0bqj]{祈祷术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8mv7anloqgou2ps8]{辉煌启言}

entries.name: Leap and Bound
entries.description:
A vigilante with this talent adds his Strength bonus on Acrobatics checks in addition to his Dexterity modifier. He is always treated as having a running start when jumping, and his high jumps are treated as long jumps when determining the DC. When the vigilante jumps, he does not fall until the end of his turn, allowing him to attack or perform other actions in midair. If the vigilante grapples a creature capable of bearing his weight, he does not fall, instead remaining adjacent to the creature as it moves.

  A vigilante must be at least 10th level to select this talent.

entries.name: 跳跃袭击者
entries.description: 4级起，你能够在冲锋时跃过茂密的植被以及其他类似的障碍。当你冲锋时，能够忽略困难地形（但不能忽略其他生物）。你能够以正常速度穿过它，并且它不会妨碍你的冲锋。

entries.name: Leathery Skin
entries.description: At 3rd level, you gain cold resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus to AC. At 9th level, your cold resistance increases to 10 and natural armor bonus increases to +2. At 15th level, your natural armor bonus increases to +4.

entries.name: Leave an Opening
entries.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 hidden strike leaves an unbalancing opening in a foe閳ユ獨 defenses, setting up the foe to be attacked again. At the beginning of the foe閳ユ獨 next turn, if the vigilante threatens the foe, the foe provokes an attack of opportunity from the vigilante. Multiple attacks against the same foe don閳ユ獩 create multiple attacks of opportunity in the same round (but attacks against several foes can cause each to provoke one attack of opportunity).

  Only a stalker vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: 稳行者
entries.description: 此能力令盗贼可以在使用杂技技能在狭窄的表面上全速移动而不受到惩罚。此外，拥有此能力的盗贼在使用杂技技能在狭窄的表面上移动时不是措手不及状态。

entries.name: Ledge Walker (UC)
entries.description: This ability allows a rogue to move along narrow, uneven, or slippery surfaces (such as ice) at full speed using the Acrobatics skill without penalty. In addition, a rogue with this talent is not flat-footed when using Acrobatics to move along such surfaces, and retains her Dexterity bonus to AC.

entries.name: Leg Sweep (UC)
entries.description:
The monk attempts to sweep his foe閳ユ獨 leg, knocking the opponent down. If the attack hits, the monk can make a free trip attempt against the target of this strike (using the base attack bonus of the attack used to hit the foe). This trip attempt does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

  The monk must attack with a kick to use this style strike.

entries.name: Legacy Conduit
entries.description: At 16th level, when using the legacy style bloodline power, you can expend a spell slot as a swift action to share the benefits of the selected style feat with all allies within 30 feet. The benefits last for 1 round per level of the spell slot expended. Allies must still enter the style閳ユ獨 stance as a swift action.

entries.name: Legacy Style
entries.description: At 8th level, select any one style feat. You can use this style feat while bloodraging; however, if you do not meet all of the style feat閳ユ獨 prerequisites, you must expend a spell slot when entering the style閳ユ獨 stance, and the benefits last for only 1 round per level of the spell slot expended or for the duration of your bloodrage, whichever is shorter. If you already have this style feat, you can enter the style閳ユ獨 stance as part of the free action to bloodrage.

entries.name: Legacy Weapon
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus and touch a weapon to grant it an enhancement bonus. The bonus is equal to 1 + 1 for every 6 occultist levels you possess (to a maximum of +4 at 18th level). Enhancement bonuses gained by this ability stack with those of the weapon, to a maximum of +5.

  You can also imbue the weapon with any one weapon special ability with an equivalent enhancement bonus less than or equal to your maximum bonus by reducing the granted enhancement bonus by the appropriate amount. The item must have an enhancement bonus of at least +1 (from the item itself or from legacy weapon) to gain a weapon special ability. In either case, these bonuses last for 1 minute.

entries.name: 守律
entries.description:
当你违反契约时，地狱的枷锁会将残忍的结果强加于你，而这也使得你更加精于算计。每当你违背你的承诺（无论是有意还是无心），就会使你恶心24小时或者直至你履行你的契约，以先到者为准。然而每天一次，当你尝试履行对他人许下的承诺时，能够通过对自己立誓在任何由你进行的单一检定中获得+4士气加值。5级起，当你对一个人进行一对一的谈话时，会在交涉，威吓以及察言观色检定中获得+3表现加值。

10级起，你可以在抗拒影响心灵效果时每分钟进行一次新的豁免检定，宛如你在下意识地寻找漏洞一般。15级起，任何违背对你的诺言的生物会在对抗你的攻击以及能力时，AC、法术抗力以及豁免会受到等同于你的魅力调整值（最低为1）的减值，持续24小时。

替代神授力量 In campaigns that use the optional hero point system (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 322), you gain Hero閳ユ獨 Fortune (Advanced Player閳ユ獨 Guide 324) as a bonus feat.
