Otherwise, you gain Marked for Glory (Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 69) as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet its prerequisites.

  替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{援助术}, 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3wcvosazm31i8758]{Contagious Zeal}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dm52jk1e37b05v9d]{正义狂热}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.p4h6ocn0axh59xrc]{Unshakable Zeal}
  • If you are evil, replace the domain spells @Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{圣光击}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.osi62mwn6rpkwlm6]{圣剑术}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0vm6or4nwaylpfa]{圣洁灵光} with @Compendium[pf1.spells.okui7mft5bquqfrg]{邪影击}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.ftrg3ira8jwicetv]{Unholy Sword}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.flrn1xmm2wfrxbkf]{邪恶灵光} respectively.

entries.name: Legendary Archmage
entries.description: Once per day, you can cast any spell on the sorcerer/wizard spell list as if using the wild arcana ability, except the archmage doesn閳ユ獩 gain 1 point of influence over you, the spell doesn閳ユ獩 require a spell slot, and you can select a spell of any level.

entries.name: Legendary Champion
entries.description: You gain two combat feats of your choice, and you can choose different feats each time you channel a champion spirit. You can treat your base attack bonus from your medium levels as equal to your medium level for the purposes of qualifying for combat feats and determining their effects, and you can count your medium levels as levels of one other class whose base attack bonus equals its class level (such as fighter, barbarian, or slayer) for the purpose of qualifying for the two new combat feats.

entries.name: Legendary Guardian
entries.description: Once per day as an immediate action, you can ignore the effects of a single attack against you, including enemy spells targeting you or whose area or effect includes you. The attack affects other creatures as normal.

entries.name: Legendary Hierophant
entries.description: Once per day, you can request a minor @Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术}. This request must be in line with the options for miracle that don閳ユ獩 cost powdered diamond. As usual for a miracle, the deity or other being the spirit worships can choose whether or not to grant the request at its whim.

entries.name: Legendary Marshal
entries.description: You can use a lesser spirit surge without incurring influence. This lesser surge adds a maximum of 1d6 to the roll and does not apply your spirit bonus, regardless of other effects or abilities you have that alter your spirit surge. A lesser surge still counts as a spirit surge for the purpose of the limit of one spirit surge per round, but it does not consume any free uses of spirit surge you may have from effects such as taboo.

entries.name: Legendary Trickster
entries.description: Once per day, instead of rolling for a skill check, you can choose your d20 result. Additionally, you gain the ability to change form at will as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.t44p3oeq43jwcgwg]{高等变形术}, except that you can mimic the form of a specific individual.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mmdypasgl5us00wb]{Forbid Action}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gn1u9cjc9phsczec]{Forbid Action, Greater}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.fjekm39re35y3kot]{Hold Monster, Mass}

entries.name: 勒彼斯塔德变形者
entries.description: 当奥能师被一个‘变形术’影响时，他可从【奥能源泉】中花费1点奥能点来施展一个法术。除了奥能师是用该能力在‘变形术’下而不是在【自然变身】下施法，这个能力的其他作用方式如同“自然施法”专长一样。

entries.name: Leshy Caller
entries.description:
You can spontaneously swap out any of your domain spells for a summon nature閳ユ獨 ally spell of the same level or lower, to a maximum of summon nature閳ユ獨 ally VII. If you do, you must use the spell to summon one or more leshys. Add leaf leshy, gourd leshy, fungus leshy, seaweed leshy, and lotus leshy to your summon nature閳ユ獨 ally I, II, III, IV, and V lists, respectively. You count as a plant creature for the purpose of creating leshys (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 3 176).

As a standard action, you can grant a single leshy within 30 feet a +4 sacred bonus on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Wooden Fist power of the Plant Domain.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ho3wsspkqkhypt0]{树化术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.icjrw9y6pa1uatlz]{问道自然}

entries.name: Leshy Summoning Hex
entries.description: The witch counts as a plant creature for the purpose of growing leshys. She adds leaf leshys, gourd leshys, fungus leshys, seaweed leshys, and lotus leshys to the list of creatures she can summon with @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{召唤怪物 I}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.26vm5jhjkxpq1xm3]{召唤怪物 II}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.1zmn8vqy3s5l9kiv]{召唤怪物 III}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{召唤怪物 IV}, and @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{召唤怪物 V}, respectively.

entries.name: 致死精确
entries.description: 当野蛮人使用【无比精准】狂暴之力时，他手中武器的重击倍率上升1（×2变成×3，×3变成×4），野蛮人必须先学会【无比精准】和【致命精确】且达到16级才有办法选择此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Lethal Accuracy (UC)
entries.description:
While in the accurate stance, the barbarian閳ユ獨 critical multiplier for damage increases by 1 (a 鑴? multiplier becomes 鑴?, a 鑴? multiplier becomes 鑴?, and a 鑴? multiplier becomes 鑴?).

  A barbarian must have the accurate stance and deadly accuracy rage powers and be at least 16th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Lethal Grace
entries.description: The vigilante combines strength and speed into incredibly deadly attacks. He gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{武器娴熟} as a bonus feat, and if he already has the Weapon Finesse feat, he can immediately swap it for another feat for which he qualified at the level he chose Weapon Finesse. When using Weapon Finesse to make a melee attack using his Dexterity bonus on attack rolls and his Strength bonus on damage rolls, he also adds half his vigilante level on damage rolls. This bonus damage is not reduced or increased if the vigilante is wielding a weapon two-handed or in an off-hand.

entries.name: Lethality (Stare)
entries.description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to the target閳ユ獨 Fortitude saves versus poison and diseases.

entries.name: Levitation Buffer
entries.description:
A mesmerist閳ユ獨 telekinetic assault renders foes around the subject less of a threat. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when either an enemy moves adjacent to the subject or the subject begins her turn with one or more enemies adjacent to her. The mesmerist can either lift all enemies adjacent to the subject slightly into the air or push them all away from the subject. Lifting enemies causes them to move at half speed and take a 閳? penalty to their CMDs against bull rush, drag, and reposition attempts for 1 round (Will negates). The speed reduction and CMD penalty don閳ユ獩 stack with those from hostile levitation.

  Pushing enemies away requires the mesmerist to attempt a bull rush combat maneuver check using his mesmerist level + his Charisma modifier as his CMB. Any enemy that閳ユ獨 successfully pushed moves away from the subject of the trick using the normal rules for a bull rush.

entries.name: 解放
entries.description: 你获得忽视妨碍你行动效果的能力。你每日能够在等同于你牧师等级的轮数中正常移动，忽视妨碍行动的魔法效果，如同受到@Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}法术效果的影响。此效果在需要时自动生效。每日可用轮数无需一次性连续使用。

entries.name: 自由呼声
entries.description: 在10级时，你可以通过一个迅捷动作，使你周围30尺半径内的所有盟友都受到你的解放祝福的效果影响。这个效果持续一轮。

entries.name: 解放
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个迅捷动作，你可以忽视任何影响你的移动能力或者可能麻痹你的效果一轮，如同法术自由行动的效果。你可以在你无法进行任何动作时使用此能力，不过在失去意识的状态下则不行。

entries.name: 解放领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你拥有自由的灵魂，与所有试图奴役与压迫的人为敌。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.eu4u4mr1naoiqohz]{移除恐惧}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7xdn59ffjaqchhrz]{移除麻痹}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o87h8gjxevcbztgd]{移除诅咒}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e5kw4dwf9qwty6tl]{高等解除魔法}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.080el1lfozrhf6c2]{脱身术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kdzx88z16gs8l392]{解锢术}

entries.name: 解放领域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送}

entries.name: 自由祝福
entries.description: 你可用标准动作触摸一个意愿的生物，给予其恩惠。一个有此恩惠的生物可以对一个正在影响它的法术或效果，以迅捷动作重新做一次豁免检定来结束。恩惠可持续1分钟或发散。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换解放领域的解放能力。

entries.name: 红字
entries.description: 每个凡人施法者的血肉深处都隐藏着一个秘密——这种神秘的潜能一旦通过合适的程序与仪式解放，就能将生灵转化为不死者。有意识地引导这种潜力需要魔术师花费数年和钜万金钱才能找到适合他个人的转化巫妖的仪式，但有时，机运或是不幸也会捉弄一个施法者，让他无意识地闯进亡灵术的领域。你曾经（多半是无意间）完成了一个巫妖转化仪式的设计，虽然你没有被成功地转化，但你被迫拥有了一部分巫妖的存在。你现在会被正能量伤害和被负能量治疗，如同你是一个不死生物一般。在5级时，你可以将控制不死生物加入你的先知已知法术列表，视为二环法术；在10级时，你可以将一级亡灵形态UM与二级亡灵形态UM加入你的先知已知法术列表，分别视为三环和五环法术；在15级时，你变得免疫死亡效果。

entries.name: 悬命者
entries.description: 你持续散发出半径10尺的灵光，将范围内即将离世的魂魄钉在原地。在此灵光的范围内，任何濒死的生物（包括你）都可以将你的感知调整值加到伤势稳定检定上（可以与其他所有调整伤势稳定检定的加值叠加）。

entries.name: 生命羁绊
entries.description: 14级后，召唤师的生命与他的幻灵连结在一起。只要幻灵仍有1点或更多生命值，召唤师将不会死亡。那些足以令召唤师死亡的伤害将转由幻灵承受。这些伤害要逐点计算（首先将召唤师的生命降至负体质值+1），这意味着当幻灵的生命值降到负的体质值之后，剩下的伤害将会立刻致召唤师于死地。这项能力对那些不造成实际伤害的效果无效，即使那仍可能杀死召唤师。

entries.name: 生命最终启示
entries.description: 20级时，你化身为完整纯粹的生命能量。你免疫出血、即死效果、力竭、疲乏、恶心、反胃和负向等级，而且任何属性伤害和属性吸取能力没办法将你的属性降到1以下。你自动通过对巨创致死的豁免。当你生命值低于0的时候，你将不会死亡，直到你的负生命值大于你体质的两倍。

entries.name: 赐命
entries.description: .  每天1次，女巫可以通过整轮动作碰触一个死去的生物并令其起死回生。这项能力如同‘复生术’，但它无需材料成分。

entries.name: 生命虹吸
entries.description: 你可以从敌人的身躯之中提取生命之力加到你自己身上。以一个标准动作，你可以对30尺内的一个活物发动“生命虹吸”，这个能力会对目标造成每2先知等级1d6点的伤害，同时使你获得等量的额外生命值，此生命值持续的小时数相当于你的魅力修正。你没办法对一个目标造成超过对方现有生命值加上其体质属性的伤害，因为这样的伤害已经可以杀死对方。目标可以通过一个强韧检定使受到的伤害减半。7级时你每天可以使用1次这个能力，之后每4级再多1次。要选择这个启示，你必须达到7级。

entries.name: 生命连结
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以在你与一个生物之间建立生命连结。每轮萨满回合开始时，如果该生物的生命值低于最大生命值5点或更多，该生物恢复５点生命值而你受到５点伤害。你可以激活每先知等级１个额外链接。这个连结持续到你或该生物死亡。当你与该生物的距离超过１００尺，或你用直觉动作切断也能使连结结束。若你同时保有多条连结，可以用一个直觉动作同时切断。

entries.name: Life Link (SHA)
entries.description:
The shaman creates a bond between herself and another creature within 30 feet. Each round at the start of the shaman閳ユ獨 turn, if the bonded creature is wounded for 5 or more hit points below its maximum hit points, it heals 5 hit points and the shaman takes 5 points of damage. The shaman can have one bond active per shaman level. The bond continues until the bonded creature dies, the shaman dies, the distance between her and the bonded creature exceeds 100 feet, or the shaman ends it as an immediate action.

  If the shaman has multiple bonds active, she can end as many as she wants with the same immediate action.

entries.name: 生命秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了生命秘示域的先知将以下技能加入本职技能列表：驯养动物，知识（自然），生存。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aa0w7tk852iqn3ni]{侦测死灵} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxz69pwpqt9b6uss]{次等复原术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6l904edkt8jv9jor]{中和毒性} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.anya5qwdjhdfyk8u]{复原术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{生命之息} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4re1j2w8wkvsvnsi]{医疗术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.igmb8lisqcnsxd2d]{高等复原术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.klcvk9ct1l7mhjwp]{群体医疗术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mxqi375ya2rka7cp]{完全复生术} (18th).

entries.name: Life Revier
entries.description: The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject attempts an Intelligence or Knowledge check to remember a previous experience. The subject receives flashes of her entire life up to this point. She can use the mesmerist閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier in place of her Intelligence modifier on the check, and she can attempt the check untrained. The subject cannot learn information that she has not previously read, heard, or otherwise experienced at some point during her life when using this ability.

entries.name: 生命视野
entries.description: 8级开始，你获得10尺盲视，每天持续等于你法师等级的轮数。此能力仅仅允许你侦测活物和不死生物。这个视野也会告诉你一个生物到底是不死生物还是活物。构装体和其他不死不活的生物无法被此能力看见。此能力的范围在12级以及之后的每4级额外增加10尺。使用此能力的轮数不必连续。

entries.name: 感知生命
entries.description: 萨满可以看到生命、死亡和普通的健康状态。当使用该能力时，她可以辨别３０尺内任何生物是活着、受伤、濒死、还是死亡。同时也能辨别生物是否困惑、残废、生病、反胃、中毒、恶心或恍惚。１２级时，使用该能力时同时可以感知到周围的活物，如同盲视，但只对３０尺内活物有效。该能力使用轮数为萨满等级，无需连续。

entries.name: 生命魂域
entries.description:
选择生命魂域的萨满比一般凡人充斥着更多生命力。她的皮肤闪耀着光泽，牙齿如珍珠般洁白。当她激活该魂域能力时，她的瞳孔和头发会散发出微光。

  魂术：侦测不死（１环）、次级复原术（２环）、中和毒性（３环）、复原术（４环）、生命之息（５环）、医疗术（６环）、高等复原术（７环）、群体医疗术（８环）、完全复生术（９环）

  魂兽：该魂兽是同类生物中最漂亮和健康的类型，并且看上去满溢生气。该魂兽获得快速医疗１，若魂兽已有快速医疗能力，则原快速医疗增加１。

entries.name: 生命魂域显圣
entries.description: ２０级时，萨满成为生命能量的完美引导者。她将免疫流血、死亡攻击(death attack)、负能量、力竭、疲乏、反胃、恶心。属性伤害和能量吸取无法将她的属性值降低到1以下。当你受到巨创时你的豁免自动成功。当你生命值降到9以下时，你在受到超过2倍体质值的负生命值前不会死亡。

entries.name: 生命学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 死灵学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代死灵学派的力胜于亡和墓穴之触能力。

entries.name: 生命感知
entries.description: 你可以感觉到30尺内的活物，如同你拥有“盲视”能力。你必须达到11级才有办法选择这个启示。

entries.name: Lifesense (4 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon can pinpoint living creatures with ease. The eidolon notices and locates living creatures within 60 feet, just as if it possessed the blindsight evolution.

  The eidolon must possess the undead appearance evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Light Matrix
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to create a glowing orb of swirling lights that obeys your commands. This orb illuminates the area like the light spell. The orb can be commanded to hover over your shoulder, moving with you. As a move action, you can direct it to move up to 30 feet away from you. If the light matrix is ever more than 30 feet away from you, it returns to hover over your shoulder.

  If you are at least 5th level, you can direct the light matrix to make a melee touch attack against one foe within 30 feet. If the attack hits, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be blinded for 1d4 rounds by a flash of light. If the attack hits, regardless of whether the target succeeds at the save, the light matrix immediately ends. The light matrix otherwise has a duration of 1 hour per occultist level you possess.

  You can閳ユ獩 have more than one light matrix in existence at one time. If you use this power again, any previous light matrices immediately end.

entries.name: 光耀秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0j43l3u9eqj5gvnp]{舞灯术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.b8vp8fgt1o6pq1qc]{不灭明焰}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6lebv7569xsypp8u]{虹彩图纹}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.d3a93wcwatqhywqy]{火蛇术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{火焰之躯}

entries.name: 轻身步
entries.description: 6级时，忍者习得如何极少接触脚下地面来进行移动的技巧。以整轮动作，她可以移动双倍于其速度，忽视困难地形。当以此方式移动时，任何表面都足以支撑她，无论她重量如何。这使得她能够穿越水面、熔岩、甚至是最细的树枝。她必须在足以正常支撑她的表面结束移动。她不能以此方式在空气中移动，或是向上运动到墙上或其他类似的竖直表面。当以此方式移动时，她不会受到该表面带来的伤害或由接触引起的危害，例如熔岩或蒺藜，她也无需进行特技动作检定来避免在溜滑或粗糙的表面摔倒。最后，当使用本能力时忍者忽视任何使用基于位置触发的机械力学陷阱。

entries.name: Light Steps (UC)
entries.description:
A monk with this ki power can move effortlessly across nearly any surface. Whenever the monk activates his feather balance ki power, he can also ignore all difficult terrain. In addition, while active, he can cross any solid surface, even if it would normally not support his weight. This does not allow him to walk on liquids.

  A monk must be at least 8th level and have the feather balance ki power before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 光明子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术}

entries.name: Light Walker (UC)
entries.description:
The rogue can move at full speed through difficult terrain and can take 5-foot steps into difficult terrain.

  A rogue must have the ledge walker rogue talent before choosing light walker.

entries.name: 电弧
entries.description: 你能用标准动作发出一道电弧。通过一个远程接触攻击任何30尺以内的敌人。电弧造成“1d6+1/2牧师等级”的电伤害。你每天可以使用此能力次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 闪电喷吐
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以从口中喷出一个30尺线形闪电。这个闪电会造成每先知等级1d4的电击伤害，最大10d4。通过反射检定可使伤害减半，豁免DC为“10+1/2先知等级+魅力修正”。你每天可以使用此能力1次，在5级以及之后的每5级再加1次使用次数。

entries.name: 雷电投枪
entries.description: 奥能师可以从【奥能源泉】中消费1点来射出闪电之枪。对30尺距离内任一目标进行一次远程接触攻击。若此攻击命中，则造成“1d6+奥能师魅力调整值”点闪电伤害，1级后每2级再增加1d6点（最高在19级达到10d6）。目标还会视力受损，在1轮内将所有生物视作拥有隐蔽（20%），强韧豁免通过则不会视力受损。

entries.name: 闪电主宰
entries.description: 在8级时，你每日能够召来等同于你牧师等级个数的闪电球。你可以用一个标准动作随意愿召来特定个数的闪电球，但每个生物不得作为超过一个闪电球的目标，且每两个生物间距离不得超过30英尺。本能力其他效果类似“招雷术”。

entries.name: Lightning Rod
entries.description:
As a swift action when you cast a spell with the electricity descriptor, you can designate one creature within line of sight. The spell閳ユ獨 damage against that creature increases by 50%, as if affected by the Empower Spell feat. This additional damage results from divine power that is not subject to being reduced by electricity resistance, and you take an equal amount of electricity damage immediately after you cast the spell. The spell can deal this additional damage only once, even if it could affect the target multiple times. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time per day for every 4 cleric levels you have beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Electricity Resistance power granted by the Air Domain.

entries.name: 光明子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1st閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.33pe0bge7b7aq3io]{电爪}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dqj6m4atpnp7dd9k]{火焰刀} (deals electricity damage and gains the electricity descriptor instead of fire)
  • 3rd閳?@Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{闪电束}

entries.name: 木质转化
entries.description: 每天1次，你可以将一个目标变成木雕。以一个标准动作，你可以使30尺内的目标和其身上所有的装备转化成木头，除非对方通过强韧检定。效果的持续轮数相当于你先知等级的一半，除了上述效果和变成木头之外，此能力类似“石化术”。这个效果可以被任何能移除石化术的效果解除。15级你可以得到1次额外的使用次数。要选择此能力你必须达到11级。

entries.name: Limbs (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon grows an additional pair of limbs. These limbs can take one of two forms. They can be made into legs, complete with feet. Each pair of legs increases the eidolon's base speed by 10 feet. Alternatively, they can be made into arms, complete with hands. The eidolon does not gain any additional natural attacks for an additional pair of arms, but it can take other evolutions that add additional attacks (such as claws or a slam). Arms that have hands can be used to wield weapons, if the eidolon is proficient.

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

entries.name: Limbs (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
The eidolon grows an additional pair of limbs. These limbs can take one of two forms. They can be made into legs, complete with feet. Each pair of legs increases the eidolon閳ユ獨 base speed by 10 feet.

  Alternatively, they can be made into arms, complete with hands. The eidolon does not gain any additional natural attacks for an additional pair of arms, but it can take other evolutions that add additional attacks (such as claws or slam). Arms that have hands can be used to wield weapons, if the eidolon is proficient.

  This evolution can be selected more than once.

entries.name: 缠身酸液
entries.description: 当奥能师使用【酸液喷射】技艺时，他可以从【奥能源泉】中消费2点而非1点。若如此做，则豁免失败的目标会在之后数轮中受到额外伤害。初始攻击的每造成了2d6点强酸伤害，就会使目标在接下来一轮中受到1d6强酸伤害。随后轮中每造成2d6点强酸伤害，也会使目标下一轮再受到1d6强酸伤害。此伤害持续到前一轮的此效果造成的强酸伤害为1d6为止。例如一个9级奥能师能够造成“5d6+奥能师魅力调整值”点强酸伤害，第二轮造成2d6点强酸伤害，第三轮即最后一次造成1d6点强酸伤害。奥能师必须拥有【酸液喷射】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 绵延塑能
entries.description: 任何你施展且延续时间超过瞬时的塑能法术，额外加上你法师等级一半的持续轮数（至少1轮）。在20级时，任何尝试解除你的塑能法术检定都要骰两次，而且你的对手必须选择比较不利的那个结果。

entries.name: 疼痛滞留
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：当魔战士用他的武器击中敌人时，他可以直觉动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，直到魔战士下一轮开始前，对方进行任何专注检定时那次攻击的伤害（包括用【法术打击】造成的法术伤害）都被视作持续伤害。

entries.name: Lingering Plague
entries.description:
Any creature that must make a save against a disease caused by the alchemist閳ユ獨 extract or other class ability must make a second save 1 round later to avoid doubling the duration of the disease effect. If the disease doesn閳ユ獩 have a duration, this discovery reduces its onset time and frequencies by half.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Lingering Poison
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can have a poison remain inert until a later time. When she delivers a contact or injury poison, instead of the poison閳ユ獨 normal onset time, the rogue can delay the poison閳ユ獨 effects until up to 1 day from when it is delivered (minimum 1 round). The delayed poison can be detected as normal by spells such as detect poison and similar abilities.

entries.name: 阴魂不散
entries.description: 炼金术师熟悉他的身体与灵魂之间的连结，使他比起正常人可以在死亡之门面前徘徊更久。在决定是否会受伤致死时，他的体质被视为比原有的体质高10点（例如一个有10点体质的炼金术师要在生命值达到-20才会死亡）。能将他体质降到零或是同类的效果（属性伤害、属性吸取、体质减值等），将会使他陷入昏迷而不是当场杀死他，要让他死亡必须要再使他受到5点的体质伤害、吸取或是减值（事实上，炼金术师的体质被降至-5才会被这类攻击杀害）。一个炼金术师必须达到4级才能选择此科研发现。

entries.name: Lingering Spirits
entries.description:
Numerous minor spirits find themselves attracted to you. Your connection with these spirits allows you to manifest any of the following spell-like abilities as a swift action: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.p8lm7khq3ynyif21]{法师之手}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z3ysa1xxmzgj14sd]{Grave Words}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f6k11j4pvmkka4e9]{Telekinetic Projectile}

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Lingering Venom
entries.description:
Poisons that the investigator personally applies to weapons and traps, or otherwise inflicts upon foes, require one additional successful save to cure.

  An investigator must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Link (SPI)
entries.description: A spiritualist and her phantom share a mental link that allows for communication across distances (as long as they are on the same plane). This communication is a free action that can be performed even when it isn閳ユ獩 the spiritualist閳ユ獨 turn, but the spiritualist and the phantom must both be conscious to communicate in this way. This allows the spiritualist to give orders to her phantom at any time. Magic items interfere with a spiritualist閳ユ獨 connection to her phantom; as a result, the spiritualist and her phantom share magic item slots. For example, if the spiritualist is wearing a magic ring, her phantom can wear only one magic ring. In the case of a conf lict, the items worn by the spiritualist remain active, and those worn by the phantom become dormant. The phantom must possess the appropriate appendages to utilize a magic item.

entries.name: Linked Reaction
entries.description:
A hive mind allows the mesmerist and an ally to share one another閳ユ獨 reaction times. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when either the subject or the mesmerist is surprised and the other isn閳ユ獩 (even if the mesmerist would normally be unable to take actions because of being surprised). Both the mesmerist and the subject can act in this surprise round.

  The mesmerist can閳ユ獩 implant this trick on himself.

entries.name: 恶龙咒．冢
entries.description:
角色呼唤石冢蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点负能量伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到8级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  腐朽诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标每天受到1点体质伤害，每天衰老相当于1年的寿命（受到所有年龄增长的惩罚，但不获得任何好处）。

entries.name: 恶龙咒．崖
entries.description:
角色呼唤峭壁蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点火焰伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到4级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  烈火诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标获得火焰易伤。

entries.name: 恶龙咒．峡
entries.description:
角色呼唤峡湾蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点寒冷伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到4级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  溺亡诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标无法在水中呼吸（通过魔法也不行），它可以保持屏息的时间减半，并且一旦屏息就会进入恶心状态。

entries.name: 恶龙咒．寒
entries.description:
角色呼唤冰雪蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点寒冷伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到4级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  冰霜诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标获得寒冷易伤。

entries.name: 恶龙咒．林
entries.description:
角色呼唤寒林蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点电击伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到4级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  闪电诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标获得电击易伤。

entries.name: 恶龙咒．池
entries.description:
角色呼唤天池蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点强酸伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到8级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  死亡诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标无法被医疗魔法影响，也不能获得自然恢复。

entries.name: 恶龙咒．岩
entries.description:
角色呼唤岩山蛇龙的力量附着己身，他的近战攻击可以造成额外1点火焰伤害。如果角色失去意识或被一次攻击或法术杀死，他的对手立刻遭受恶龙诅咒的攻击（意志通过则无效）角色必须达到8级才能选择本狂暴之力。

  血沸诅咒：豁免检定：意志豁免DC=10+1/2角色等级+角色的魅力调整值；效果：目标获得火焰易伤，而且会因为血管沸腾的痛苦而永久性陷入恍惚状态。

entries.name: Lion Aspect
entries.description:
Lions hunt in prides, cooperating to bring down large opponents and defend their territory. A lion閳ユ獨 alternate attack is bite (B, P, S).

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Intimidate checks.

  This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a dire lion. While in this form, you gain a base speed of 40 feet, low-light vision, and scent (30 feet). Once per day for every 2 shifter levels you have, you can utter a mighty roar, allowing you to attempt an Intimidate check with a +5 circumstance bonus to demoralize enemies within 30 feet. Allies gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls against creatures affected by this ability.

  At 8th level, you gain one of the following teamwork feats as a bonus feat: Outflank, Pack Attack, Paired Opportunists, or Shake It Off. You can grant allies within 30 feet the benefits of this feat as a swift action for a number of rounds equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  At 15th level, you provide a flanking bonus to any ally who threatens the same opponent as you do, and you can change places with an adjacent ally as a move action that does not provoke an attack of opportunity, as if using the Swap Places feat.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

entries.name: 狮之呼唤
entries.description: 2级时，雄狮骑士团的骑将获得鼓舞其盟友的能力。以一个标准动作，他可以进行一次鼓舞士气的演讲，给60尺内所有盟友带来对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定表现加值，等同于其魅力修正，以及攻击检定的+1表现加值，持续等同于其骑将等级的轮数。如果任何范围内的盟友正在受到造成惊惧或恐慌的法术或能力的影响，他可以立刻做一次豁免检定来抵抗该效果（如果该效果允许的话）。

entries.name: 勇气之水
entries.description: 狂暴时，每份酒精为野蛮人带来对〔影响心灵〕效果的豁免+1士气加值，最大值为每4野蛮人等级1点。

entries.name: Live On
entries.description:
At 5th level, you can use lay on hands as though you were a paladin of 3 levels lower than your psychic level. You also gain access to mercies as though you were a paladin of 3 levels lower than your psychic level.

  You can target only yourself with lay on hands or mercies gained from this discipline. This stacks with lay on hands abilities gained from other sources.

entries.name: Living Capacitor
entries.description:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 2; Burn 0

  You store electricity damage you take within your body, as if you constantly had @Compendium[pf1.spells.0g0pgsbjns61ovln]{Body Capacitance} active. Once you discharge this electricity damage via a touch attack, you must take electricity damage again before you can discharge it again.

entries.name: Living Paradox
entries.description: At 20th level, your outward appearance remains the same, but beneath your skin lies not flesh and blood but clockwork gears, miniature galaxies, or something equally uncanny. You gain immunity to disease and poison. You take no additional damage from bleed effects, critical hits, and sneak attacks.

entries.name: Living Pigment
entries.description: The alchemist infuses his inks and dyes with a spark of animating force. As a standard action, he can expend one daily use of his bombs and a 1st-level extract he has prepared to create a creature, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{召唤怪物 I}, using his level as the spell閳ユ獨 caster level. The extract is expended as if the alchemist had consumed it. The alchemist can expend a higher-level extract when using this ability to create a creature using a summon monster spell of a level equal to the level of extract expended. For example, if the alchemist expends a 4th-level extract, he can create a creature as if using @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{召唤怪物 IV}. Additionally, the alchemist can expend an additional use of his daily bombs when creating a creature in this way to grant the creature the celestial or fiendish template. The alchemist must have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 活体暗影
entries.description:
的身体溶解，并且你会变成一团活体暗影。这个能力如同【气化形体】一样运作。

  在你14级的时候，这个能力视作【影之躯】一样运作来取代之前的运作方式，但你依旧同时拥有你使用【气化形体】时增加的DR(10/魔法)，并同时免疫毒素、偷袭和重击。你每天可以使用此能力的时间为每先知等级1分钟，使用的时间不须连续，但每次使用最少消耗1个分钟。你需要至少7级才可以选择这个启示。

entries.name: Living Shield
entries.description:
As an immediate action whenever the vigilante is grappling a creature and is targeted by an attack, he can attempt a combat maneuver check against the target of his grapple (this combat maneuver check doesn閳ユ獩 count as a grapple combat maneuver check). If he succeeds, the creature he is grappling becomes the new target of the attack. If the check fails, the creature escapes the grapple and the vigilante is the target of the attack as normal.

  This ability must be used after the attack is declared against the vigilante, but before the attack is made and the results revealed.

entries.name: Living Swarm
entries.description: At 20th level, you and the machines within you become one. Your nanites consume and replicate your body, allowing swift and radical physical alterations with little more than a thought. You become immune to bleed effects, diseases, and poisons, and gain DR 5/閳? At will, you can break down your body and move in a shimmering stream of flying nanites, as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体}.

entries.name: Lizard Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the lizard is one of swift, graceful movement, granting the ability to dart and scurry with an astounding agility and balance.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Acrobatics checks.

  This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of an agile and brightly colored giant lizard (as per the giant frilled lizard from Bestiary 194, but with the following changes). While in this form, you gain a base speed of 40 feet, low-light vision, scent (30 feet), a primary bite attack (1d8 damage) with the grab ability and a secondary tail attack (1d6 damage) with the trip ability.

  At 8th level, your base speed increases to 60 feet and you gain a climb speed of 30 feet.

  At 15th level, you gain Improved Natural Attack with your bite and your tail attacks, and the reach of your tail attack becomes 10 feet.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tail slap (B)

entries.name: 蜥蜴步伐
entries.description: 狂暴期间，野蛮人冲锋或奔跑时，她可以在水面上移动而不下沉。然而如果她在回合结束时仍站在水面上，就会下沉。

entries.name: 专注定位
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次你可以以类法术能力的形式使用法术生物定位术（Locate Creature）或是物品定位术（Locate Object），但必须以你专注搜寻的目标为法术目标。本能力的有效范围为你的每审判者等级1英里。

entries.name: Location Channel
entries.description:
At 5th level, a medium can perform a special seance at the site of a person閳ユ獨 death閳ユ攼r a location that was precious to that person in life閳ユ敄o call forth that person閳ユ獨 spirit into the medium閳ユ獨 body so his allies can ask it questions. The effects are similar to the spell call spirit (see page 160), except that the duration is 1 round per medium level and the spirit possesses the medium閳ユ獨 body instead of appearing in a wispy form. The other participants of the seance must ask the questions.

  Once the medium attempts to call a spirit, he cannot attempt to call the same spirit again for 24 hours. Once per round, the medium can attempt to end the seance early by succeeding at a Will save (DC = 20 + 1/2 the medium閳ユ獨 class level).

entries.name: Loci Sentry
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to set a ward about an area. This area has a maximum radius of 10 feet + 5 feet per occultist level you possess.

  Whenever a creature enters the area, a sentry manifested by your psyche appears and strikes out at the intruder. The affected creature must succeed at a Will save or be dazed for 1 round. You are immediately aware of the sentry閳ユ獨 activation. The sentry lasts for up to 1 hour per occultist level you possess, or until triggered.

  When you set the sentry, you can set any number of specif ic creatures to be immune to the sentry and thus avoid triggering it.

entries.name: 磁石之力
entries.description: 萨满可以使３０尺内一个生物变得沉重而无力。目标如同中载一般。若目标已经中载，则时效内变为重载。若目标已重载，目标的ＡＣ最大敏捷加值变为＋０，护甲减值－９，移动速度降为５尺。该效果持续轮数为萨满等级。成功的意志豁免可以避免该效果。无论成功与否，目标２４小时内无法再次成为该巫术目标。

entries.name: 肢体增长
entries.description: 3级开始，当你使用近战接触攻击时，你的触及范围增加5尺。此能力并不增加你的威胁范围。在11级时，这项奖励增加为10尺。在17级时，增加为15尺。

entries.name: Lore Discipline
entries.description:
By collecting expert information and reading all sorts of treatises and chapbooks on occult subjects, you learn proper techniques and rituals to empower your mental abilities. Your abilities become stronger through study and science, not instinct.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcs7ba5depdyitey]{通晓语言} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pyr472hvqn8c8es2]{Hypercognition} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vrzgrnmiz8kmz6di]{Mind Probe} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nv20ki8uteao1vqv]{Retrocognition} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b5mz8voksps5g4yq]{通晓传奇} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ln4jpuurxbrfxw5j]{Arcane Sight, Greater} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q8nety5obvbbd5xs]{Divide Mind} (18th).

entries.name: 知识最终启示
entries.description: 20级时，你所有的知识检定都可以取20。你理解了现实的基础，也知道该如何改变，每天1次，你可以施展“祈愿术”，此法术不需要任何施法材料，不过这个法术不能带来属性加值，也没有办法模拟需要昂贵法术成分的法术。

entries.name: 传说智识
entries.description: 和一般百科全书式的记忆方式不同，你的知识多半来自诗词，故事或歌曲。你可以用你的魅力修正取代智力修正来进行知识检定。

entries.name: 博学
entries.description: 在7级时，歌者已经了解了如此之多的诸国传说，以至于他可以为任何自己拥有技能等级的知识技能检定取10。此外，每天一次，歌者能够以一个标准动作为任意知识检定取20。在13级时，诗人都获得一次额外的每日使用次数，在20级时达到最大每日三次。

entries.name: 知识秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了知识秘示域的先知将以下技能加到他的本职技能列表：估价，法术辨识，知识（所有）。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.llxrra87kbofmyhl]{鉴定术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m1rmcpcaixcpz9ib]{巧言术} (4th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tcnirpnzjdaym1fd]{物品定位术} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b5mz8voksps5g4yq]{通晓传奇} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.14chms7xurvi85x9]{群体枭之睿智} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{时间静止} (18th).

entries.name: 知识魂域
entries.description:
选择知识魂域的萨满将会显得十分睿智，有时能让人忽略她的年龄。尽管她多半很谦逊，但只需要简单的集中精神进行观察，她就能轻易将一切映入眼中，发现深藏的奥秘。

  魂术：鉴定术（１环）、巧言术（２环）、物品定位术（３环）、通晓传奇（４环）、异界探知（５环）、群体枭之睿智（６环）、灵视（７环）、片可预知（８环）、时间停止（９环）

  魂兽：该萨满的魂兽显得十分温顺而谨慎。它的先攻检定获得＋２加值，潜行检定获得＋４加值。

entries.name: 知识魂域显圣
entries.description: ２０级时，萨满成为知识的化身。她可以在知识检定中取２０，未受训的知识技能检定中亦可。她对真实世界基础的理解可以让她每日使用１次祈愿术而无需材料成分。但该祈愿术无法用来给予属性值或代替施法用昂贵材料。

entries.name: 失却子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bc3nc0ri47egssht]{弱能术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术}

entries.name: 爱慕子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{注目术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平}

entries.name: 昏暗视觉
entries.description: 野蛮人的感官瞬间变的更加灵敏。当狂暴时，他获得昏暗视觉。

entries.name: Low-Light Vision (1 pt)
entries.description: An eidolon gains low-light vision, enabling it to see twice as far as a human in conditions of dim light.

entries.name: Low-Light Vision (UC)
entries.description: The barbarian閳ユ獨 senses sharpen, and she gains low-light vision.

entries.name: Loyal Aid
entries.description:
The vigilante gains the service of a number of loyal allies who can help him gather information, cover for his two identities, or perform minor tasks. Inside his area of renown, a vigilante with this talent gains a bonus on Diplomacy checks to gather information equal to half his vigilante level.

In addition, if the vigilante wants, he can task his friends to help cover for him by spreading false tales of his location and activities to others. This has the effect of increasing the DC of Diplomacy checks to gather information about the vigilante and Survival checks to track him by an amount equal to his level. This lasts for 1 day, and can be used only once per week.

Finally, once per day, the vigilante can ask his allies to perform a minor task for him. This usually involves delivering a message, purchasing a piece of mundane gear worth 100 gp or less (which the vigilante must pay for), or retrieving an object owned by the vigilante (that would be easily accessible by the ally). This task might take other forms as well, subject to GM discretion, but can never involve combat or danger.

  A vigilante must be at least 3rd level and have the renown social talent to select this talent.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.eu4u4mr1naoiqohz]{移除恐惧}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{高等命令术}

entries.name: 幸哉我友
entries.description: 在1级时，你可以接触一个盟友使他获得幸运的眷顾，在接下来的一次属性检定，攻击检定，豁免检定或技能检定上可以双骰取高。使用这个能力必须在投骰前声明，并且仅可以发动一次。该效果持续最多一分钟或直到消耗掉。

entries.name: 衰哉我敌
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个即时动作你可以迫使一个邻接你的敌人重骰结果一次攻击，豁免或检定投骰，你必须在这次投骰获得结果前声明重骰，目标必须接受两次投骰中较差的那个结果。

entries.name: 机运领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你整个人都充满了运气，你的存在就能带来好运。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xco22162bwgxn7pj]{克敌机先}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ibk7jrc5rwubpia6]{援助术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{防护能量伤害}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.446vcsetq4ny904e]{假象术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.suel7sgnztenv551]{神迹术}

entries.name: 催眠曲
entries.description: 1级开始，你可以如同使用类法术能力一般使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.99xovzg8h1nh9o9a]{催眠曲}，你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。这一类法术效果持续1分钟并且不需要保持专注。目标对像在对抗睡眠效果时意志豁免-4。

entries.name: Luminous Form
entries.description:
You can transform your body into churning light, granting you the effects of blur and causing your body to shed light as a sunrod.

  At 7th level, creatures that end their turn adjacent to your luminous form become blinded for 1 round (Fortitude negates).

  At 13th level, creatures that end their turn adjacent to your luminous form are blinded for 1d4 rounds (Fortitude reduces to 1 round).

  At 18th level, your luminescence is as bright as natural sunlight, and creatures affected by natural sunlight are so affected if they end their turn adjacent to your luminous form.

  You can maintain your luminous form for up to 1 minute per day per oracle level; this duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments. You can forgo the blur and blinding aspects of this ability to instead simply shed light as a torch, though this still counts against the ability閳ユ獨 duration for the day.

entries.name: Lunar Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become an avatar of the primal world閳ユ攽art humanoid, part beast. Once per day, you can transform into a lycanthrope of your choice for a number of hours equal to your Charisma modifier, gaining all the powers of a natural lycanthrope of that type, including the ability to change shape between human, animal, and hybrid form. In addition, you become immune to mind-affecting and language-dependent effects, as well as effects that specifically target only humanoids.

entries.name: Lunar Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the lunar mystery adds Acrobatics, Knowledge (Nature), Perception, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dol5wzpsk7m6gxsc]{Fumbletongue} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ech2cibcsmsms9s7]{Dust Of Twilight} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2mh7g81k30bv7b5m]{精神错乱} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knjoprwzcm3jygwk]{狼之型} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cxp0vodhvuwnfmye]{Litany Of Madness} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8rf2ucrtzmxooyw6]{Lunar Veil} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1btrja5u0cz66cy8]{Blood Mist} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (18th).

entries.name: 苍穹诱惑
entries.description: 你和天际的强大连结让你连想要双脚着地都有困难。１级时你不再留下足迹。５级时你可以悬浮在地面上６尺的位置，甚至可以在液体表面飘行。１０级时你得到飞行的能力，如同法术飞行术，每日使用时间为每萨满等级１分钟。使用无需连续，每次至少１分钟。

entries.name: 情欲子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{愚者之触}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}

entries.name: Lycanthropy Curse
entries.description:
You suffer from a minor form of lycanthropy. The exact animal your body and mind are aligned with can vary, but you should choose an animal that matches your faith thematically. In times of stress or unease, you cannot speak閳ユ攼nly growl and snarl like an animal. This ability works similarly to the tongues curse, but whenever you are in combat, you cannot speak at all. This does not interfere with spellcasting but does apply to spells that are language dependent. A character under the effects of speak with animals can understand you, and you can communicate with such characters normally. You can speak with animals when in this condition. Choose one type of animal commonly associated with lycanthropy (such as rats, wolves, or bears); you gain a +4 bonus on Handle Animal checks with these creatures.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物} to your list of 1st-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.0324zq42g3fu4kko]{动物信使} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjdfluulncmqacc3]{野兽形态 I} to your list of 3rd-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{野兽形态II} to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, you gain damage reduction 5/silver, and if you already have this type of damage reduction, it increases in value by 5 (to a maximum of DR 15/silver).

entries.name: Mad Rush
entries.description:
Whenever the vigilante charges, he can make a full attack. Whenever he uses this ability, he takes a 閳? penalty to his AC until the start of his next turn (in addition to the AC penalty for charging).

  Only an avenger vigilante of at least 12th level can select this talent.

entries.name: Maddening Whispers
entries.description:
At will as a standard action, the shaman can invoke whispers from spirits of the Dark Tapestry to speak directly into the mind of a single target within 30 feet. These whispers utilize no known language, yet the victim nevertheless feels convinced that, somehow, it was almost able to comprehend the message. The target must succeed at a Will saving throw or be confused for 1 round.

  At 8th level and again at 16th level, the confusion caused by this hex lasts for 1 additional round.

  Whether or not the save is successful, the shaman cannot target that creature with this hex again for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting effect.

entries.name: 控制疯狂
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个迅捷动作你可以控制30尺内所有的困惑生物在本轮内执行哪一种动作，持续1轮。你可以在自己处于困惑状态时使用此能力。

entries.name: 疯狂支配
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个迅捷动作你可以强迫一个距离你30尺内陷入畏缩，惊惧，恐慌或者麻痹状态的生物受到影响的时间暂缓1轮，但是目标承受1轮困惑状态。不过，处于困惑状态的生物如果在行动轮中获得的效果是“攻击自己”或者“攻击最近的生物”则重骰困惑效果。在这轮困惑效果不会延长原来效果的持续时间。在困惑效果结束后，目标继续正常受到原来的效果影响。

entries.name: 癫狂炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师的炼金炸弹不仅仅能烤焦生物的肉体，还会灼伤他们的意志。被癫狂炸弹击中的生物会受到1d4感知伤害，但癫狂炸弹的威力比普通炼金炸弹低2d6（所以如果一个炼金术师的炼金炸弹正常能造成6d6+4点伤害，那他的癫狂炸弹仅仅能造成4d6+4点伤害）。如果对方在24小时内受过癫狂炸弹的伤害，那么癫狂炸弹造成的感知伤害会每次减去1点，最低1点。选择这一科研发现需要12级炼金术师等级。

entries.name: 狂乱领域
entries.description:
神授力量: Madness Domain

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ud4xukzhan89qhm4]次级困惑术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.648x72rflah0ggyz]{愚者之触}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{魅影杀手}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.34jyuvdflia4goib]{闪光图纹}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3wdx7fjulsohi1lk]{怪影杀手}

entries.name: Maelstrom Infusion
entries.description:
Element water; Type substance infusion; Level 8; Burn 4
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts charged water, water
Saving Throw Reflex partial

  You create a 20-foot-radius whirling maelstrom in a body of water within 120 feet (the area of the maelstrom does not include any squares in the radius that aren閳ユ獩 in the water). Any creature in the maelstrom immediately takes one-quarter your blast閳ユ獨 normal damage regardless of whether it succeeds at its save. A creature that succeeds at its Reflex save can choose to exit the area at the closest space.

  A creature in the maelstrom must succeed at a DC 35 Swim check in order to swim, and any creature that enters the maelstrom or ends its turn in the maelstrom takes half your blast閳ユ獨 normal damage. As a free action at the beginning of your turn, you can position each creature in the maelstrom anywhere you choose within the affected area.

  This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Constitution modifier or until you use this infusion again. You can use grappling infusion with this infusion.

entries.name: Maelstrom Jump
entries.description: The arcanist can call upon the randomness of the Maelstrom to move in unpredictable ways. She can expend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as a swift action to gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} for 1 minute and move 10 feet in a random direction. For the next minute, she moves 10 feet in a random direction at the end of each of her turns. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity or count against her movement for the round. If the movement would end her movement in an occupied space, she instead travels to the nearest unoccupied space.

entries.name: 谐律血统
entries.description:
艺术与音乐的灵性之力在你的家系里潺潺流淌。你的祖先可能与安踏神族有过碰撞，或者拥有亚空天族号手神使的遗传；当然，这也可能是你家系中一个不太体面的污点，譬如来自鸟身女妖的血统，或者某位先祖被休格斯（Shoggoth）的不休低语所逼疯。无论如何，家族的艺术天赋在你的魔法中体现得淋漓尽致。

  本职技能: 表演.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0onqjy8gfgop1xsi]{腹语术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bacuzpculp9tld48]{咆哮术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q070n0zoq3zojpas]{支配人类} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{真言术 盲} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5if5rln4qlsccrbn]{Shout, Greater} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wplgawb6aznjx7se]{女妖之嚎} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.LSykiaxYWzva2boF]{高等法术专攻} (惑控系),
  •  Lingering Performance,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (表演),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻} (惑控系), Spellsong,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施放一个具有言语成分、且没有动作或材料成分的法术时，你的施法者等级视为高于当前1级。

entries.name: Mage of the Veil Subschool
entries.description:
Rather than controlling the elements or transforming the environment, mages of the veil focus on much more subtle magic閳ユ攤lending into their surroundings to watch, observe, and gather secrets, or fading from view completely for the sake of solitude. Most graduates of this college become spies, scouts, or infiltrators.

  相关学派： Illusion.

  Requirements: A mage of the veil must select disguise self as one of his spells known at 1st level.

  本职技能: A mage of the veil gains 唬骗, Disguise, and 隐匿 as class skills.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the blinding ray and invisibility field powers of the illusion school.

entries.name: Magic Attacks (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon is infused with magic, allowing it to treat all of its natural attacks as if they were magic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  If the summoner is 10th level or higher, all of the eidolon's weapons are treated as the alignment of the eidolon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

entries.name: Magic Attacks (SPI)
entries.description:
When the phantom manifests in ectoplasmic form, it treats its slam attacks as if they were magic for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction.

  If the spiritualist is 10th level or higher, all of the phantom閳ユ獨 weapons are treated as the alignment of the phantom for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

entries.name: Magic Attacks (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
The eidolon is infused with magic, allowing it to treat all of its natural attacks as if they were magic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  If the summoner is 10th level or higher, all of the eidolon閳ユ獨 natural attacks are treated as the alignment of the eidolon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

entries.name: 祝福法术
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个标准动作你可以施放一个已经准备的战斗祭司法术而无需使用法术栏位。这个法术的施法时间必须为一个标准动作，且法术环数至少要比你的最高施法环数低3环。另外，它必须是造成伤害或使得一个生物承受减值的法术（比如造成轻伤或绝望术）。举例来说，一个10级的战斗祭司可以施放4环战斗祭司法术，那么他只能用此能力施放1环法术而无需使用法术位。

entries.id: Magic Blessing: Hand of the Acolyte
entries.name: 侍僧之手
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以让你自己的武器从手里飞出击打敌人，然后立刻回返。你可以用这件武器对一个30尺内的敌人发起一次攻击，视为使用投掷武器进行了一次远程攻击，不过在进行攻击投骰时将你的感知调整值替代你的敏捷调整值（伤害仍然以力量调整值计算）。这个能力不能用来发动战技攻击。

entries.name: Magic Circles
entries.description:
At 8th level, an occultist learns how to draw magic circles. To draw a circle, he must have chalk, salt, blood, powdered silver, or some other appropriate substance at hand (although he can press a magic circle into a softer surface such as dirt or clay). Drawing a circle takes 1 minute and requires the occultist to expend 1 point of mental focus (either generic focus or focus from any one of his implements). Once completed, this circle functions as a permanent magic circle against any alignment of the occultist閳ユ獨 choosing. The circle can閳ユ獩 be against a component of the occultist閳ユ獨 alignment (if he is lawful good, for example, it can閳ユ獩 be a magic circle against good or law). The circle remains until its form is physically broken (for example, if the lines are smeared or the salt is scattered). Only a living creature can break the circle; environmental effects can閳ユ獩 break it.

  An occultist can have only one circle created in this way at a time. If he creates a second circle, the first one loses all its magic powers. This type of magic circle can閳ユ獩 normally be focused inward to bind an outsider.

entries.name: 魔法领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你是一位关于一切神秘之物的真正的研究者，能够看到魔法本质中的神性。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.llxrra87kbofmyhl]{鉴定术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7vamkma4y88ek4q6]{魔嘴}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0axqb92kzlesc24q]{法术灌输}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.4k9bh8ny1il2oner]{法术抗力}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.niqxt53lhxrjfaty]{反魔场}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0kppkhsencd6tzvh]{防护法术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.19p4nr8rsvt42lmn]{法师裂解术}

entries.name: Magic Item Skill
entries.description: At 2nd level, an occultist閳ユ獨 knowledge of magic items grants him a bonus when attempting to use them. He gains a bonus on all Use Magic Device checks equal to 1/2 his occultist level.

entries.name: 法术渗透
entries.description: 当你施展法术解除魔法效果的时候，你的施法者等集视为比正常高2，如果你的等级高于9级，那么此加值上升为+4

entries.name: Magical Familiarity
entries.description:
The vigilante taps into a past life閳ユ獨 arcane secrets. He selects a 0-level spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list. The vigilante can cast the chosen spell three times per day as a spell-like ability, using his vigilante level as his caster level.

  At 6th level, he chooses a second 0-level spell that he can also use three times per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 12th level, in addition to these 0-level spells, he chooses a 1st-level spell that he can cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

  At 18th level, he can cast his 1st-level spell three times per day and his 0-level spells at will.

  The vigilante must have an Intelligence score of at least 10 to select this talent.

entries.name: Magical Hoarder
entries.description:
At 13th level, whenever a creature within 30 feet of you casts a spell intended to benefit its targets, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool as an immediate action to include yourself as a target of that spell. If the creature is not your ally, you must be able to clearly see the spell閳ユ獨 effects and you must succeed at a Spellcraft check (DC = 15 + the spell閳ユ獨 level) to identify the spell before using this ability.

  If you are not within the normal range of the spell, then you must spend 1 additional point from your phrenic pool to use this ability.

  If the spell has a range of personal, then you must instead spend 2 additional phrenic points from your pool to use this ability.

  This ability does not affect spells with an instantaneous or permanent duration.

entries.name: 魔法主宰
entries.description: 20级时，奥能师习得了在奥能源泉和法术之间相互转换的方法。他可以施展任何他已经准备的法术，从【奥能源泉】中消耗“1+法术环级”点，而不消耗法术位。当他以这种方式施放法术时，他的施法者等级视为比原有高2级，此法术的任何相关豁免DC+2。他无法再消耗【奥能源泉】点数来强化以这种方式施放的法术。

entries.name: Magma Form
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can assume the form of a Small magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.pawbnw1nm4f0b98e]{元素身躯I}. You gain the same abilities as if you had chosen an earth elemental閳ユ獨 form, except your earth glide functions as the earth glide ability of a magma elemental.

  At 9th level, you can assume the form of a Medium magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{元素身躯II}.

  At 11th level, you can assume the form a Large magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{元素形态 III}.

  At 13th level, you can assume the form of a Huge magma elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.v42t5kpxc8mvd615]{元素形态 IV}.

  You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour per oracle level.

  You must be at least 7th level to choose this revelation.

entries.name: Magnetic Infusion
entries.description:
Element air, earth; Type substance infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Associated Blasts charged water, electric, metal, plasma, thunderstorm
Saving Throw none

  Your kinetic blast causes your foes to become mildly magnetic. Whenever an infused blast deals damage to a foe, attacks made with metal weapons (including metal kinetic blasts) against that foe receive a +4 bonus until the end of your next turn, and the foe takes a 閳? penalty on Reflex saving throws to avoid metallic objects.

entries.name: Magnetism
entries.description:
Element air, earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite magnetic infusion
Saving Throw none; SR yes

  You can push and pull metal objects using magnetism. This functions as telekinetic maneuvers but you can make only bull rush and drag combat maneuvers, and can do so only against metal objects or creatures.

  If you use this ability on an attended metal object, you must exceed the creature閳ユ獨 CMD as normal, and if it閳ユ獨 holding the object, it must drop it or this ability pushes or pulls the creature.

entries.name: Magnetism, Greater
entries.description:
Element air, earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 9; Burn 0
Prerequisite magnetic infusion, magnetism
Saving Throw none; SR no

  You can repel or attract metal objects in a vast line with a magnetism so strong that there is no hope of escaping. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{驱离金石}, except only for metal objects, and you can also pull the objects toward you instead of pushing them away. The effect lasts for 1 round, and the pulling version of the effect can閳ユ獩 pull objects into the air unless they are already airborne.

  You can accept 1 point of burn to increase the duration to 1 round per kineticist level you have.

entries.name: 魔战士奥能
entries.description: 随着等级提升，魔战士习得了各种奥秘以拓展他将战斗力量和魔法技巧混合在一起的特别道路。3级开始，魔战士获得一项魔战士奥能，之后每3等级再额外获得一项。除非特别提及否则每项魔战士奥能不得多次选择。影响法术效能的魔战士奥能仅可用于改变魔战士法术列表的法术。

entries.name: Major Ameliorating
entries.description:
The witch can touch a creature to suppress or protect it from more debilitating negative conditions. Each time she uses this hex, the witch either chooses the blinded or deafened condition, or chooses a type of effect: curse, disease, or poison. If the target is or later becomes afflicted with the chosen condition or effect, that condition or effect is suppressed for a number of minutes equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. Alternatively, for 24 hours the witch can grant her target a +4 circumstance bonus on saving throws against effects that cause any two of the above conditions or effects (witch閳ユ獨 choice; she can choose any combination of conditions or effects, as long as she chooses only two total).

  At 15th level, the witch can choose up to two total conditions or types of effects to suppress or three total conditions or types of effects to grant a circumstance bonus against each time she uses the major ameliorating hex.

  Once a creature has benefited from this hex, it cannot benefit from it again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Major Amplifications
entries.description: At 11th level and every 4 levels thereafter, a psychic can choose a major amplification in place of a phrenic amplification.

entries.name: 救生
entries.description: .  即使是严重的伤口，女巫也能够轻轻触碰就将其复原。此巫术等同于‘治疗重伤’效果，并使用女巫的施法者等级。每当一名生物受益于此巫术，24小时内无法再次从中获益。15级时，此巫术如‘治疗致命伤’般生效。

entries.name: 强力巫术
entries.description: 在10级以及之后的每2级，女巫巫术的选择范围将包括强力巫术

entries.name: 高级魔法
entries.description: 拥有此天赋的盗贼可以以类法术能力施放一个术士/法师法术列表中的1级法术，每天两次。此能力的施法者等级等同于盗贼等级。豁免DC为“11+智力修正”。盗贼的智力至少有要11才能选择此天赋。盗贼在选择此天赋之前必须拥有“次级魔法”天赋。

entries.name: Major Magic (3 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon learns to cast a major spell as a spell-like ability. Select one spell from the following list: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wh9zc2reqneafxro]{强酸箭}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e67esdjp4nojtbr7]{治疗中度伤}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tsndfcfijmgxs37p]{黑暗术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y69de8y5ddrhuue5]{怪物晕眩术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d8yy4njnr25hacek]{滑翔术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (self only), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxz69pwpqt9b6uss]{次等复原术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.plou8h168bfn5hq6]{浮空术}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q4ixxjb4v281g2xv]{灼热射线}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形}
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3mfmhx8avu7h3iom]{蛛行术}

  This spell can be cast once per day as a spell-like ability.

At 10th level, this spell can be cast three times per day by spending 2 additional evolution points. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice 閳?2. The save DC for this spell is 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 12 and must possess the minor magic evolution to take this evolution.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a new spell from the above list.

entries.name: Major Magic (UC)
entries.description:
A rogue with this talent gains the ability to cast a 1st-level spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list once per day as a spell-like ability for every 2 rogue levels she possesses. The rogue閳ユ獨 caster level for this ability is equal to her rogue level. The save DC for this spell is 11 + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier.

  A rogue must have the minor magic rogue talent and an Intelligence score of at least 11 to select this talent.

entries.name: Maker's Call
entries.description: At 6th level, as a standard action, a summoner can call his eidolon to his side. This functions as dimension door, using the summoner閳ユ獨 caster level. When used, the eidolon appears adjacent to the summoner (or as close as possible if all adjacent spaces are occupied). If the eidolon is out of range, the ability is wasted. The summoner can use this ability once per day at 6th level, plus one additional time per day for every four levels beyond 6th.

entries.name: 恶毒灵质
entries.description: 15级开始，你的灵质卷须可以猛击你周围的生物。将其视为以你为中心的“黑触手”，除了这些触手同样能擒抱灵体和虚体生物，而且它们不会影响你自己（然而它们会影响你的队友）。你每天能使用该能力等同于每术士等级1轮的时间，这些时间不需要连续。

entries.name: 冷眼
entries.description: 以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。此能力取代机运领域的小幸运能力。

entries.name: Malignant Poison
entries.description: As a full-round action, the alchemist can increase the save DC of any poison by 4 and increase its duration by 2 frequency increments (for example, large scorpion venom lasts 8 rounds instead of 6 and drow poison lasts 4 minutes instead of 2). Additionally, malignant poisons take effect immediately and do not have an onset time. This alchemical change lasts until the poison閳ユ獨 extended duration ends or for a number of minutes equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 level, whichever comes first. After that, the poison reverts back to its original state. An alchemist must be at least 10th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Malleable Flesh
entries.description:
Whether through mutation or alchemy, some vigilantes have flesh that is as moldable as clay and as fluid as ink. A vigilante with this talent gains the shapechanger subtype and the compression universal monster rule. In addition, the vigilante can alter his appearance as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术}, except that the changes are physical rather than illusory. However, aspects of the vigilante閳ユ獨 aesthetic persist in all forms, halving the bonus on Disguise checks gained from this effect and from seamless guise.

  At 12th level, the vigilante can pass through narrow openings, even mere cracks, along with any item he wears or carries (to a maximum of his light load).

entries.name: Mammoth Hide
entries.description:
The shaman can touch a willing ally and cause its skin to thicken and sprout thick, shaggy fur. The creature gains a +2 enhancement bonus to natural armor and cold resistance 5 for 10 minutes.

  At 9th level, the enhancement bonus increases to +3 and the cold resistance to 10.

  At 15th level, this enhancement bonus increases to +4 and the cold resistance to 15.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma bonus.

entries.name: Mammoth Spirit
entries.description:
A shaman who selects the mammoth spirit is abnormally tall and stocky, with thick shaggy hair. When she uses a special ability of this spirit, her muscles ripple and flex, and her stature seems even greater than before. At times, particularly when she uses her most powerful abilities, a ghostly image of a mammoth may seem to rise around her as a visible aura of ghostly power.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hzkaqaa8n6ygwmub]{Tar Pool} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jjmoi5qbwkbguzbn]{召唤自然盟友 VII} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ukacuu0cvdjkqxwu]{Frightful Aspect} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (9th).

  Spirit Animal: The shaman閳ユ獨 spirit animal appears more primal and prehistoric than an ordinary animal of its kind. It gains a +2 inherent bonus to its Strength score. The spirit animal loses this bonus when it manifests as a megafauna companion from the true spirit ability.

entries.name: Mammoth Spirit Manifestation
entries.description: At 20th level, the shaman can transform into any animal listed under the megafauna or elephant heading. This ability works as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{野兽形态 IV}, but the shaman can activate and dismiss the ability as often as she likes and the duration is permanent.

entries.name: 战技熟稔
entries.description: 选择一种类型的战技。当使用你选择的战技时，将你的先知等级当做你的基本攻击加值计算战技加值。7级你获得精通专长（例如“精通绊摔”）以给你的战术提供加值。11级你获得高级专长（例如“高级绊摔”）给你的战术进一步提供加值。你不需要达到这类专长的先决条件。

entries.name: 战技精通(魔战士)
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士在选择本奥能时需选择一项战技。每当他尝试该战技时，他用他的魔战士等级作为其基本攻击加值（与其他职业带来的基本攻击加值合计）。

  特殊：魔战士可以多次选择本奥能，效果不叠加。每次选择此奥能时，魔战士需选择一种新的战技。

entries.name: Maneuver Mastery (ORA)
entries.description:
Select one type of combat maneuver. When performing the selected maneuver, you treat your oracle level as your base attack bonus (plus the BAB from other classes) when determining your CMB.

  At 7th level, you gain the Improved feat (such as Improved Trip) that grants you a bonus when performing that maneuver.

  At 11th level, you gain the Greater feat (such as Greater Trip) that grants you a bonus when performing that maneuver.

  You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.

entries.name: 招式训练
entries.description: 3级起，武僧在使用战技时，他可以用武僧等级取代他的基本攻击加值来计算CMB。自其他职业得来的基本攻击加值不影响此能力，且可以正常叠加。

entries.name: 招式训练(拳师)
entries.description:
在3级时，拳师可以选择一项战技能力以进行额外的练习，她将在使用这项战技攻击的CMB和对抗这项战技的CMD上获得+1加值。

  在第7级以及之后每4级时，拳师可以选择继续精进另一项战技，并且在这项战技上的CMB和CMD上获得+1加值。除此之外，她在已经受训过的战技上还会再获得+1加值。举例来说，当一个拳师在3级时选择了精进擒抱战技，并在7级时选择了精进破武战技，那么在7级时，她擒抱CMB和CMD拥有+2加值，破武则有+1加值；如果在11级时她选择精进冲撞战技，那么她拥有的加值则成为：擒抱+3，破武+2，冲撞+1。

entries.name: Maneuvering Dodge
entries.description: Whenever a foe of the rogue閳ユ獨 size or larger misses the rogue with a melee attack, the rogue gains a +2 bonus on any Acrobatics, Climb, Fly, and Swim checks she attempts for 1 round. At 8th level, this bonus increases to +4.

entries.name: Manifest Memory
entries.description: At 20th level, you can overlay portions of your mindscape onto the world around you. This functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.82vi1xife3nlu8a0]{海市蜃楼} spell, except all structures and terrain created must be places appearing within your mindscape. You can use this ability at will, but you can maintain only a single manifest memory at any one time. You can allow any creature you can see who has previously entered your mindscape to automatically disbelieve the illusion as a free action.

entries.name: 显圣
entries.description: 达到２０级后，萨满将成为他所代表魂域的巅峰形象。显圣的性质和类别取决于所选魂域。

entries.name: Manifold Tricks
entries.description: At 5th level, the mesmerist can have two tricks implanted at a time. The number of concurrent tricks increases by one for every 4 mesmerist levels he possesses beyond 5th. Each creature can still be the subject of only one trick at a time. If the mesmerist implants a new trick while he already has his maximum number of concurrent tricks implanted, he must choose one implanted trick to dismiss without triggering (the dismissed trick still expends a daily use of the mesmerist閳ユ獨 tricks).

entries.name: 操作学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 惑控学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代惑控学派的眩目之触和绝望光环能力。

entries.name: Mantis Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the mantis imparts uncanny patience and unsettling speed.

Minor Form: You gain Lunge as a bonus feat.

  At 12th level, your reach increases by 5 feet.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant mantis. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, a +2 racial bonus on initiative checks, and two primary claw attacks (1d6) with the grab ability.

  At 8th level, you can always act in the surprise round, but if you fail to notice your foes, you act last, regardless of your initiative result (you act in the normal order in subsequent rounds).

  At 15th level, whenever you roll for initiative, you can roll three times and use any one of the results.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

entries.name: Mantle Against Chaos
entries.description: You can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.md6ltvqh9paadsm4]{Protection From Chaos} on yourself or another creature as a spell-like ability. You can use this ability for a number of minutes per day equal to your inquisitor level (minimum 1). This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1 minute increments.

entries.name: 月之帷幕
entries.description: 你的意志和你与月亮的亲和让你免疫兽化。此外，你还可以用一个成功的接触攻击切断兽化者和月亮的连结，这将会强迫对方变回人形，持续相当于你先知等级的轮数。5级时你可以使用这个接触造成如同“狂暴术”的效果，使用此能力为近战接触攻击。你每天可以使用这个能力1次，5级以及之后的每5级再增加1次。

entries.name: 千变万化
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以将自己变成一个中型或小型的人形生物，如同“变身术”。7级时你可以变成中型或小型动物，如同“野兽型态I”；11级时你可以变成中型或小型魔法兽，如同“野兽型态III”；15级你可以变成各式各样的外型，如同“高等变形术”。你能使用“千变万化”的时间为每天每先知等级1分钟，时间不需连续，不过每次使用至少得消耗1分钟。

entries.name: Many Guises
entries.description:
The vigilante can take on any number of mundane guises. Whenever he changes his identity, he has a third option (instead of social or vigilante): he can become mundane. The mundane identity is not a specific individual. Each one is created at the moment it is assumed, and quickly forgotten as soon as it is removed. While in a mundane identity, the vigilante does not gain the benefit of either his social or vigilante identity, but instead appears as a member of his race, usually a common laborer, farmer, or peasant of any gender. His alignment is treated as neutral when he is in his mundane identity. While in this identity, he receives a +20 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks to appear like an ordinary member of his race. Spells and abilities that are looking for the vigilante in either of his other identities fail while he is in his mundane identity. He must build the appearance for this identity using whatever clothing and tools he has at his disposal. While he can use magic (such as a hat of disguise), his mundane identity can never be anything other than an ordinary member of a society or large group (subject to GM discretion).

  A vigilante must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Many Guises (NIN)
entries.description:
A ninja with this trick gains the vigilante social talent of the same name.

  The ninja must have the deep cover ninja trick before selecting this trick.

entries.name: Many Roads
entries.description: You gain an insight bonus on Fly and Survival checks equal to 1/2 your oracle level. Further, you learn to speak and read three languages in addition to those you already know.

entries.name: Many Throw Infusion
entries.description:
Element aether; Type form infusion; Level 8; Burn 4
Prerequisite extended range
Associated Blasts telekinesis
Saving Throw none

  You grab a large number of objects and throw them all at once. You can use your telekinetic blast to make attack rolls against a number of targets equal to your kineticist level within 120 feet, but no two targets can be more than 30 feet apart.

entries.name: 水灵血统
entries.description:
你的诞生伴随着水巨灵之力，它的水之魔法犹如醍醐灌顶般滋润你。

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：位面.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijui94bv4uzu8awb]{冰墙术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.enp0cwf0itsgjxv7]{长驻幻影} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd32fuc6e7j4isbn]{元素形态 III} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8jq1atxonnerix55]{极冰射线} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{祈愿术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：位面),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{武器娴熟}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个造成能量伤害的法术时，你可以将能量类型转换为寒冷。这同样改变了决定法术类型的关键字。

entries.name: Marksman's Shot
entries.description: Those who seek to slay with a single shot must have keen eyes and perfect poise. As an attack action, the slayer makes a single ranged attack at his highest attack bonus with a ranged weapon he wields. The target of the attack must be the slayer閳ユ獨 studied target. On a successful hit, the slayer doubles the number of sneak attack dice applied to the attack; if the attack was not a sneak attack, this benefit does not apply.

entries.name: Marshal Spirit
entries.description:
A marshal spirit is a towering presence and an inspiration to others.

Spirit Bonus: When you channel a marshal, your spirit bonus applies on Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks, as well as on spirit surge rolls. This allows the bonus to apply twice to the total result if you use a spirit surge on a Charisma check or on a Charisma-based skill check.

  Seance Boon: Choose a seance boon from any of the other legends to benefit from. When using the shared seance class feature, each participant can choose a different boon.

  Favored Locations: Council rooms, stages, theaters, throne rooms.

  Influence Penalty: The time you spend concentrating on your allies prevents you from attending to other important matters. You take a penalty equal to your spirit bonus on Wisdom checks and Wisdom-based skill checks. Additionally, if you are not at least nominally in charge of your present allies, you lose the marshal閳ユ獨 spirit bonus and seance boon.

  Taboos: Choose one: you may not allow yourself or your allies to prevent a fleeing enemy from escaping, since an at-large villain makes a better tale (this applies only to enemies seeking to escape, not to those retreating to alert others or fight again from a better position); you may never leave an ally behind or allow yourself or your allies to sacrifice another ally, even a summoned creature; you must embrace any opportunity to spread the legend of yourself and your allies, even when a low profile would be helpful.

entries.name: Marshall's Order
entries.description: You can use your spirit surge on attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, concentration checks, and skill checks rolled by you or any allies who participated in your seance as long as you have line of sight and line of effect, and are within 30 feet of the chosen ally. You can still use spirit surge only once per round.

entries.name: Martial Discipline
entries.description: Through meditation and study of monastic forms of combat, you have learned a lethal form of unarmed combat. You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打} as a bonus feat, even if you do not meet the prerequisites. You gain the unarmed strike damage of a monk of your oracle level. If you also have monk levels, those levels stack for the purpose of determining your unarmed strike damage.

entries.name: 千招百式
entries.description:
在1级时，拳师可以通过一个移动动作，在1分钟时间内获得一个她不具有的战斗专长。拳师必须满足获得这些专长的前提条件。她每天可以使用此能力的次数等同于她3+拳师等级的一半（最少1次）。

  如果在前一项招数的持续时间内拳师希望激活另一个招式，他可以重新使用本能力，获得另一个专长的效果。

  如果拳师激活的战斗专长有每日使用次数限制（如震慑拳[Stunning Fist]专长），拳师每次激活千招百式时使用的次数会统一计入本专长的每日使用次数限制中。

  在6级时，拳师可以通过激活千招百式能力而最多同时获得两个战斗专长。她也可以只用一个迅捷动作激活一个专长，或是用一个移动动作同时激活两个专长，她可以通过前一个专长作为激活后一个专长的存在条件，但是这样做的话他也将无法更换作为前提的专长，除非同时替换掉以其为获得前提的专长。选择第二个专长也会同时额外占用千招百式能力的每日使用时间。

  在10级时，拳师可以通过激活千招百式能力而最多同时获得三个战斗专长。她也可以只用一个自由动作激活一个专长，或是用一个迅捷动作同时激活两个专长，又或者是用一个移动动作激活全部三个专长。她可以通过第一个专长作为激活第二个专长的存在条件，然后再通过前两个专长作为激活第三个专长的存在条件，选择激活三个专长也会样会额外占用千招百式的每日使用时间。

  在12级时，拳师可以以一个即时动作激活一个专长，或是使用一个迅捷动作同时激活3个专长。选择激活的每一个专长同样会额外占用千招百式的每日使用时间。

  在20级时，拳师可以以一个迅捷动作激活任意数量个战斗专长。选择激活的每一个专长同样会额外占用千招百式的每日使用时间。

entries.name: 习武
entries.description: 在1级时，当作为选择专长的前提条件时，拳师可以将他的拳师等级同时视为战士和武僧等级。除此之外，在使用魔法物品时他同样同时视为等级相当于他拳师等级的战士和武僧（比如专长震慑拳的效果和奇物武僧之袍[Monk's Robe])。但是，本能力不会使拳师获得这两个职业的奖励专长，比如武僧的震慑拳。

entries.name: 殉难子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.menqakfoa1ftvi3f]{护卫他人}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z1i7h2b69qfztxf9]{牺牲誓言}

entries.name: Martyr's Resistances
entries.description:
At 4th level, you gain fire resistance 5 and you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against fear and pain effects.

  At 8th level, your fire resistance increases to 10, and the bonus on saving throws against fear and pain effects increases to +4.

entries.name: 殉难血统
entries.description:
你的祖先之一为了她的信仰付出了最大的代价。这个远亲由于某种原因而为了她虔诚的信仰折磨自己，而这种奉献回荡在她的后世子孙之中，赋予他们奥术力量。你的血脉赋予你忍受痛苦，抵抗酷刑并激励他人的能力。

  本职技能: 表演 （演讲）.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.c81jnlmi4976g7sz]{Surmount Affliction} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{英雄气概} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.scyklgov72pvw884]{Blessing Of Fervor} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2ip53auf03bqxkl1]{Joyful Rapture} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍},
  •  Heroic Defiance,
  •  Heroic Recovery,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (表演),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: 每当你在战斗中受到伤害时，你的有效施法者等级会在你的下一回合中增加1级。这个效果每轮只能触发1次。

entries.name: Martyred Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
One of your ancestors paid the ultimate price for her beliefs. This distant relative martyred herself out of a devout dedication to some specific cause, and that sacrifice has infused you with power that you can use for good閳ユ攼r for ill. When you bloodrage, an inspiring fury conjures echoes of your forebear閳ユ獨 incredible determination and selfless dedication, both offering you protection and amplifying your ability to punish any who dare incur your wrath.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • Heroic Defiance,
  • Heroic Recovery,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R3a1OV18RwDJftvq]{领导力}

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}
