  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a spell from the transmutation school and target only yourself, increase the spell閳ユ獨 duration by 50%. This does not stack with metamagic feats or abilities such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时}.

entries.name: Nanite Resurgence
entries.description:
At 9th level, once per day as an immediate action upon being reduced to one-quarter your maximum hit points, you can force the mechanical swarm living inside you to keep you alive. This ability functions like a @Compendium[pf1.spells.u7y6niex9e7tbhyp]{转灵强愈剂} spell using your sorcerer level as the caster level, except it is an extraordinary ability and cannot be dispelled.

  At 17th level, you can use this ability twice per day (though using this ability twice in one 24-hour period entails a chance of system shock and death; see the spell閳ユ獨 description for more details).

  At 20th level, you never die of system shock from using this ability.

entries.name: Nanite Strike
entries.description:
At 1st level as a free action, you can cause nanites to flow from your body and coat the striking end of any manufactured melee weapon you wield. When you hit with a melee attack using this weapon, some of the nanites infect the blood of the victim (Poison閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Con modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str damage; cure 1 save).

  At 5th level, weapons you use with this ability are treated as magical for the purposes of overcoming DR, and the poison also deals 1 point of Constitution damage. At 7th level, the damage increases to 1d2 points of Constitution damage and 1d2 points of Strength damage. At 11th level, the cure becomes two successful saves.

  You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier; these rounds need not be consecutive.

entries.name: Nanite Surge
entries.description:
At 3rd level, once per day as an immediate action, you can cause your nanites to surge, granting you a bonus equal to 3 + your sorcerer level on any one d20 roll; this ability must be activated before the roll is made. If you already possess the nanite surge ability from another source (such as from being an android), you can use your nanite surge an additional time per day.

  At 9th level, you can use this ability an additional time per day.

entries.name: 天灾
entries.description: .  通过此巫术，女巫可以呼唤自然的可怕力量，为一片土地带来浩劫。此巫术的效果等同于‘复仇风暴’与‘地震术’法术的组合，地震术在第二轮生效（此时酸液的暴雨正从天而降）。女巫必须在使用此巫术时保持专注，若被打扰则效果立刻中止。女巫每天只能使用1次此巫术。

entries.name: 自然预知
entries.description: 你可以阅读刚宰杀的新鲜动物或是人形生物的内脏，以在单次豁免检定上得到相当于你魅力修正的洞察加值。此外，透过观察与解释鸟类的飞行途径，你可以在单次技能检定上得到+10的环境加值。最后通过检查岩石或泥土上的印痕，或是看着洒入风中沙尘的形状，你可以在单次的先攻检定上得到+4的洞察加值。这些加值必须在24小时之内被使用，同时，你必须在掷骰前宣布你是否要使用这些加值。进行一次自然预知得花费10分钟的时间，你每天可以使用自然预知1次，每获得4个先知等级额外增加1次。

entries.name: 天生法术战斗
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以用他选择的一种天生武器攻击来使用【法术战斗】职业能力。若他如此做，他的专注检定获得＋2加值。若此天生武器攻击使用了一个平常握持武器的肢体（例如爪击），他无法在用此肢体发动天生武器攻击时握持武器。如果他有任何攻击时不需要肢体的天生武器（例如啮咬），他可以在正常武器攻击之外使用本能力进行【法术战斗】。

  特殊：魔战士可以多次选择本奥能，专注加值不叠加。每次选择此奥能时，魔战士需选择一种不同的天生武器。例如，魔战士可以选择爪击和啮咬，这样魔战士就可以在施放一次法术之外，用空手爪击和啮咬做全回合攻击。除此之外，本奥能的效果与【法术战斗】职业能力一致。

entries.name: 自然纽带
entries.description:
1级起，德鲁伊便与大自然构成了紧密的联系。此联系表现为下列两种形式之一。

  第一种是与自然世界的亲密联系，使得德鲁伊获得以下牧师领域之一：风，动物，土，火，植物，水，天气。在决定领域神力和领域法术时，德鲁伊的有效牧师等级等于其德鲁伊等级。做出此种选择的德鲁伊也会如同牧师一般获得额外的领域法术位。她必须在此法术位中准备领域法术，且此法术位不可用于自发施法。

  第二种选择是与一只动物伙伴形成紧密的羁绊。德鲁伊在起始时可带有可选动物伙伴的任意一种。此动物是德鲁伊冒险时的忠贞伙伴。与同类的普通动物不同的是，动物伙伴的生命骰，属性，技能和专长都会随着德鲁伊等级的提升而增长。如果人物从多个来源获得了动物伙伴，将她的有效德鲁伊等级相互叠加以决定伙伴的数据和能力。根据伙伴种类的不同，大多数伙伴的体型会在德鲁伊达到4级或7级时增长。如果德鲁伊放走他的动物伙伴，他必须举行仪式，不间断地祈祷24小时，才能获得一个新的动物伙伴。同样的仪式也可以用来取代死亡的动物伙伴。

entries.name: 自然最终启示
entries.description: 20级，你发现了生命本质的奥秘，使你对你的身体得到了他人难以想像的控制能力。每天1次，以一个整轮动作，你可以将自己包覆在一个有机物构成的茧中。当封闭在茧中的时候你被视为无助。8小时之后，你将你的物种转化为植物，动物或人形生物，得到该物种的基本特性。这个变化不会改变你的生命骰数、生命值、豁免加值、技能点数、本职技能或专长。每次型态转变的时候，你将清除身上所有的毒素和疾病，补满生命点数，并恢复所有属性伤害。在每次转化的时候，你必须选择和你当下不同的物种类别。

entries.name: 自然秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了自然秘示域的先知将以下技能：攀爬，飞行，自然知识，骑术，生存，游泳加到他的本职技能列表里面。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{树肤术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rrsefzpm3nhztvld]{植物交谈} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0sssdtv0tkbns2r3]{喘息之林} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9qiwo9kx8d1hqrn]{启蒙术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{石言术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{动物形态} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.refg1teqkrdtxllg]{世界波} (18th).

entries.name: 自然智识
entries.description: 德鲁伊的知识（自然）和生存技能检定+2。

entries.name: 自然魂域
entries.description:
选择自然魂域的萨满将显现出与他紧密相连的自然特征和形象。森林的自然萨满将有绿色的皮肤和头发，眼眸如同绿宝石般，散发有绿叶红花的香气。来自冻土的自然萨满将十分白皙，有着蓝水晶的瞳仁和冰凉的体温。

  魂术：魅惑动物（１环）、树肤术（２环）、植物交谈（３环）、树林气息（４环，grove of respite，ＡＰＧ）、启蒙术（５环）动物异变(Animal Growth)、石言术（６环）、漫天虫蚀（７环）、动物形态（８环）、世界波（９环，world wave，ＡＰＧ）

  魂兽：自然萨满的魂兽是凶暴种，看上去是同类中最强的类型。该魂兽可以自由穿行灌木丛或其他自然困难地形而不会减速也不受到伤害或造成困难。若魂兽拥有飞行速度，它可以在最高为暴风级别的风中飞行而飞行技能不承受减值。

entries.name: 自然魂域显圣
entries.description: ２０级时，萨满成为自然的精魂。每天１次，她可以用一个整轮动作将自己包入茧内。处于茧内时她视为无助。茧内８小时后，她将破出，将自己变为植物、动物或类人生物，并获得该生物的所有物理特征和能力。所选生物类型必须异于当前生物类型。该效果不会改变她的生命骰，生命值，豁免骰，技能等级，本职技能，武器护甲擅长。这种改变是永久的，直到萨满再次改变自身。每次变形后，所有毒素、疾病效果会被解消，恢复满生命值，治愈所有属性伤害。

entries.name: 自然训练
entries.description: 在判断动物伙伴是否有资格选取专长、背景特性（traits）以及调整或增强动物伙伴的选项（options）时，猎人的总猎人等级同时视同为德鲁伊等级和游侠等级。

entries.name: Nature's Gifts
entries.description: Once per day, the shaman can command trees and other plants to yield magical berries and fruit. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{神莓}, except the maximum number of hit points it can restore to a subject in a 24-hour period from this hex is equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 Charisma modifier (minimum 1 hit point per day).

entries.name: Nature's Thorns
entries.description: At 16th level, creatures that hit you in melee (other than those using manufactured reach weapons) take 4d6 points of piercing damage. A creature takes this damage only on its first successful attack against you in a combat round, and not on subsequent attacks in that round.

entries.name: 环境低语
entries.description: 你和大自然非常的亲近，让你可以从环境的低语中感受到危险的征兆并保持警觉。从不寻常的蛙叫到隆隆地鸣，一切都指示着你趋吉避凶，将你的魅力取代敏捷加到你的AC和CMD上，任何会导致你失去AC敏捷加值的效果改为让你失去AC上的魅力加值。

entries.name: 毒性肌肤
entries.description: 经过长久以来的炼金术实验与接处化学药品，炼金术师终于让自己的身体变成带有毒性、不堪入口，任何啮咬、吞噬或吞咽炼金术师的生物必须通过一次强韧豁免，否则将会反胃1d4轮。要选择此科研发现，炼金术师必须达到12级。选择此科研发现的炼金术师对自身的“毒性肌肤”免疫。

entries.name: 临近死亡
entries.description: 你在对抗对疾病，影响心灵的效果和毒药的豁免检定上获得+2洞察加值。7级该加值作用在对即死效果，睡眠效果和震慑的豁免检定上。11级该加值变为+4。

entries.name: Necromancy Resonant School
entries.description:
Implements that draw power from necromancy can control undead and harm the living.

Implements: Bone, coin, doll, drum, robe, skull.

entries.name: 死灵学派
entries.description: 恐怖的死灵师指挥不死生物并且使用不生的污秽力量对抗他的敌人。

entries.name: Necromantic Focus
entries.description: The implement grants its possessor greater power over the undead. Whoever possesses the implement can control an additional 2 Hit Dice of undead for every point of mental focus invested in the item (to a maximum number of Hit Dice equal to 4 鑴?your occultist level). Any spellcaster who bears the implement can add it as an additional focus component for a necromancy spell he casts to create undead. If he does so, he can create an additional number of HD of undead equal to the additional HD the implement allows him to control (apply this effect after doubling the HD of undead for desecrate, if applicable). Undead creatures take a 閳? penalty on saving throws against spells cast by the bearer of this implement for every 4 points of mental focus invested in this implement.

entries.name: Necromantic Servant
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to raise a single human skeleton (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 250) or human zombie (Bestiary 288) from the ground to serve you for 10 minutes per occultist level you possess or until it is destroyed, whichever comes first. This servant has a number of hit points equal to 1/2 your maximum hit point total (not adjusted for temporary hit points or other temporary increases). It also uses your base attack bonus and gains a bonus on damage rolls equal to 1/2 your occultist level.

  At 5th level, whenever the necromantic servant would be destroyed, if you are within medium range (100 feet + 10 feet per level) of the servant, you can expend 1 point of mental focus as an immediate action to cause the servant to return to full hit points.

  At 9th level, you can choose to give the servant the bloody or burning simple template (if it閳ユ獨 a skeleton) or the fast simple template (if it閳ユ獨 a zombie).

  At 13th level, when you take an immediate action to restore your servant, it splits into two servants. You can have a maximum number of servants in existence equal to 1/2 your occultist level.

  At 17th level, the servant gains a teamwork feat of your choice.

entries.name: Neutralizing Bomb
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to give it the potential to end certain ongoing effects instead of dealing damage. Each creature in the splash radius can attempt a new saving throw against any poison afflicting it and any ongoing conditions or ongoing acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. (If an effect did not allow a saving throw, this bomb doesn閳ユ獩 allow affected creatures to attempt one.) Success counts as one successful save toward ending poison and immediately ends other conditions. Exposed poison in the splash radius is also rendered harmless. A creature with poison abilities that is directly struck by the bomb finds those abilities useless for 1d4 rounds unless it succeeds at a Fortitude saving throw.

  This discovery doesn閳ユ獩 stack with any other that modifies bombs.

entries.name: 新奥术
entries.description: 9级时，你能添加一个术士/法师法术列表中的奥术到你的所知奥术列表。你必须选择你有能力施展的法术。你能够在13级和17级各获得一个额外法术。

entries.name: 奈多阴影面纱
entries.description: 通过从【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点，奥能师可以用一张阴影面纱围住自己，使得他更难被发现和攻击。奥能师获得隐蔽(20%)和+5隐匿。这个效果持续“1+奥能师魅力调整值”轮。

entries.name: 夜袭
entries.description: 你以标准动作融入黑夜阴影，变得几乎完全不可见。在微光或者黑暗区域内，你对没有黑暗视觉的生物视为隐形(如同隐形术)，轮数为牧师等级一半（最小1）。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换黑暗领域的黑暗接触能力。

entries.name: 暗夜子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3plb67e51webutdz]{睡眠术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇}

entries.name: Night Terror
entries.description:
You send your spirit to torment another being閳ユ獨 dreams. Once per day, you may target a creature with the effects of a @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇} spell. Instead of the spell閳ユ獨 normal damage, you make a full attack, using your Charisma modifier in place of your Strength modifier, against the victim閳ユ獨 touch AC. You deal 1d10 damage for each successful hit.

  You must be at least 11th level before selecting this revelation.

entries.name: 夜之视觉
entries.description: 野蛮人的感官在瞬息之间变的无比锐利。当狂暴时，他获得60尺的黑暗视觉。野蛮人必须有作为狂暴之力或是种族特性的昏暗视觉，才能选取此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Night Vision (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian閳ユ獨 senses grow incredibly sharp, and she gains darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If she already has darkvision, the range of that darkvision increases by 60 feet.

  A barbarian must have a darkvision racial trait, low-light vision racial trait, or the low-light vision rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: Nightblindness (Stare)
entries.description: The darkvision range of the hypnotic stare閳ユ獨 target decreases by 10 feet.

entries.name: 暗夜之瞳
entries.description: 3级开始，你获得30尺黑暗视觉。9级时变为60尺黑暗视觉。如果你已经拥有黑暗视觉，那么在计算距离时将效果叠加。

entries.name: Nightmare (Stare)
entries.description: The target of the hypnotic stare rolls twice on all Will saves versus fear, taking the lower result.

entries.name: 噩梦
entries.description: .  女巫能够呼唤邪能，令60尺内一名生物的睡眠长期受到噩梦折磨。此巫术会在每次目标尝试睡眠时生效，作用如同‘梦魇’法术。成功的意志豁免可以令其无效。若豁免失败，每天晚上目标都必须进行一次新的豁免检定，否则无法正常休息。

entries.name: Nightmares Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3plb67e51webutdz]{睡眠术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j7mhkhixnvd0amye]{Oneiric Horror}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{魅影杀手}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.laz5zb1cdfb9jzit]{Dream Travel}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ylewzn5nlzy7ugdm]{Symbol Of Weakness}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21r9ptvsjo99o3yw]{短讯暗示}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight}

entries.name: 暗夜子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{魅影杀手}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pzwe3gxjz8gthyaj]{梦之衣}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3wdx7fjulsohi1lk]{怪影杀手}

entries.name: 机敏
entries.description: 2级起，当铳士穿着轻甲或无甲时AC获得+1闪避加值。任何使铳士无法将敏捷加至AC的效果均会令本能力无效。此加值在2级后的每4级再+1，18级时为最大的+5。

entries.name: 机敏
entries.description: 3级起，当游荡剑客穿着轻甲或无甲时AC获得+1闪避加值。任何使游荡剑客无法将敏捷加至AC的效果均会令本能力无效。此加值在3级后的每4级再+1，19级时为最大的+5。

entries.name: 飞檐走壁
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼如果在攀爬检定中投出5或更低的结果导致检定失败，她可以迅速进行另一次攀爬检定，但是DC+10。如果成功，她停止坠落并攀附在附近的平面上。如果她以这一方式停止坠落，那她不会受到坠落伤害。

entries.name: Nimble Climber (UC)
entries.description: Whenever the rogue fails a Climb check by 5 or more, she can attempt a Reflex save (using the same DC as the Climb check) to catch herself and avoid falling.

entries.name: Nimble Walker
entries.description: At 20th level, you gain a +5 racial bonus on Reflex saving throws and on Acrobatics checks made to move through a creature閳ユ獨 threatened area or through its space. You also gain the ability to breathe while passing through earth using your earth glide ability.

entries.name: 光轮
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以放出30英尺的光轮，每日可用轮数等于你的牧师等级。此效果类似“昼明术”法术。此外，此范围内的不死生物每停留一整轮都受到等于你牧师等级的伤害。带有黑暗描述的法术和类法术能力在光轮范围内自动失效。本能力的可用轮数可以分作多次使用。

entries.name: Nine-Tailed Kineticist
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0
Prerequisite kitsune

  You can cast a spell-like ability granted to you by any Magical Tail feat you have by accepting 1 point of burn, even if you have no daily uses of that spell-like ability remaining. You must be able to use wild talents of a level equal to the number of extra tails required to use a spell-like ability granted by a Magic Tail feat to use this ability to cast that spell-like ability (for example, you would need to be 15th level and able to use 8th-level wild talents to use this talent to cast the dominate person spell-like ability granted by Magical Tail).

  In addition, you can learn a Magical Tail feat that you qualify for in place of gaining a new infusion or utility wild talent.

entries.name: 忍术
entries.description: 拥有此天赋的盗贼可以选择一个忍者的忍术。除非他已经拥有气池，否则他无法选取那些需要气池的能力。他可以多次选择此天赋。盗贼无法选择与盗贼天赋同名的忍术。

entries.name: No Breath
entries.description:
Element void; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite emptiness

  You gain no breath, as per the universal monster ability, and you can survive in the vacuum of space.

entries.name: No Breath (4 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon no longer needs to breathe. The eidolon does not breathe, and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as inhaled poison). This does not give immunity to cloud or gas attacks that do not require breathing.

  The summoner must be at least 11th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: 无处可逃
entries.description: 野蛮人能以一个直觉动作移动等同于他双倍正常速度的距离，但他只能在一名邻接敌人进行撤退动作时使用此能力。他必须在邻近该敌人的方格内结束他的移动。野蛮人在此移动中如常引发藉机攻击。他每次狂暴只能使用1次此能力。

entries.name: No Escape (UC)
entries.description: The barbarian can move up to double her base speed as an immediate action. She can use this ability only when an adjacent foe uses a withdraw action to move away from her. She must end her movement adjacent to the enemy that used the withdraw action. The barbarian provokes attacks of opportunity as normal during this movement.

entries.name: No Place Like Home
entries.description:
The witch fills an ally with the safety he feels at home or inflicts pangs of homesickness to hamper an enemy閳ユ獨 defenses. She chooses a target for the hex within 30 feet. If she chooses an ally, that ally gains a +2 dodge bonus to AC against traps and on Reflex saves against traps. If she chooses an opponent, that opponent takes a 閳? penalty to AC against traps and on Reflex saves against traps. Either way, the effects last for 1 minute. The target can attempt a Will save to negate the effects of the hex.

  At 8th level, the bonus or penalty increases to 4.

  At 16th level, the bonus or penalty increases to 6.

  A creature targeted by this hex cannot be targeted again by this hex for 1 day.

entries.name: 无痕
entries.description: 3级时，忍者习得如何掩盖行踪、长时间躲藏以及隐藏其存在。追踪忍者使用的生存技能检定DC增加1。此外，她的训练令她在易容技能检定、以及保持静止不动至少1轮的隐匿对抗检定上获得+1洞察加值。之后每3级，生存DC和易容及隐匿对抗检定的加值都再增加1。

entries.name: 豪言壮语
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以对周围30尺内的一个生物发出豪言壮语。这个生物在攻击检定，技能检定，属性检定或豁免投骰上获得+2士气加值。这个效果持续1分钟。

entries.name: 身先士卒
entries.description: 在10级时，你可以以自己为楷模，激励所有的盟友冲向胜利。如果你在某轮执行了一个动作，那么30尺半径范围内所有的盟友都会在下一个行动轮进行同样一个动作时在攻击检定或技能检定上获得+4士气加值。举例来说，如果你冲锋一个目标并发动近战攻击，那么在下一轮冲锋并攻击同一个敌人的盟友就可以在攻击检定上获得+4士气加值。

entries.name: 高贵领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你是杰出的领袖，鼓舞着所有追随着你的信仰和教导的人。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21bxbzdaawjrnvyo]{神恩}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{注目术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9vdjohbrj896e2ot]{辨识谎言}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.l1zl69j95ad7l9dn]{高等命令术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pfv5zv744x9dwg38]{指使术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{排斥术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21r9ptvsjo99o3yw]{短讯暗示}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

entries.name: Noble Visage
entries.description:
You gain a +1 bonus on Charisma checks and Charisma-based skill checks against creatures that share your creature type (and subtype, if you are a humanoid). This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.

As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant her your noble visage bonus against creatures that share her creature type (or subtype) for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your noble visage bonus for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Inspiring Word power of the Nobility Domain.

entries.name: 跑酷者
entries.description: 你可以自由穿越城镇环境中的障碍物和困难地形（包括拥挤的人群）而无需承受速度降低，伤害及其他惩罚。但是，被魔法效果操作过的障碍物和困难地形仍然会阻碍你。

entries.name: Nostrum
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates an infusion, he can mask a delayed poison within the mixture. A nostrum can contain only an ingested poison, and the save DC of the poison is reduced by 2. The poison takes effect a number of hours after being imbibed equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence bonus (minimum 0) decided by the alchemist at the creation of the nostrum. The poison within a nostrum can be detected as normal by spells such as detect poison and similar abilities. Until the nostrum is consumed or destroyed, it continues to occupy one of the alchemist閳ユ獨 daily extract slots.

  An alchemist must have the infusion discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Nothing Can Stop Me
entries.description:
Once per round, while the vigilante is moving, he can make one attack as a free action against an unattended object in the way of his path, such as a door or table. If his attack deals enough damage to destroy the object, he can continue to move. If he doesn閳ユ獩 destroy the object, his move ends. This attack is made as part of his move action and doesn閳ユ獩 count against his attacks this round. If his attack inadvertently targets a creature (such as a mimic), it automatically misses and his move ends (although he can still attack the creature as normal at the end of his movement).

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: Notorious Fool
entries.description:
While in his social identity, the vigilante can feign absentmindedness, clumsiness, drunkenness, or eccentricity very convincingly. When he fails an opposed Sleight of Hand or Stealth check while in his social identity, he can immediately attempt a Bluff check opposed by the onlookers閳?Sense Motive checks to appear as though he had only blundered or stumbled in a spectacular fashion. If he succeeds at this Bluff check, the onlookers do not realize the vigilante was attempting the action that prompted him to attempt a Sleight of Hand or Stealth check, although being in the wrong place or behaving in an inappropriate manner may still have negative consequences.

  This talent is ineffective against any onlooker who has already witnessed the vigilante faking a blunder within the last 24 hours.

entries.name: Numb to the Pain
entries.description: You gain a morale bonus equal to your Charisma bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting spells and effects. This bonus cannot exceed your psychic level.

entries.name: Numerical Alchemy
entries.description: The investigator閳ユ獨 skill with mental mathematics allows him to know exactly which muscle movements are necessary to mix an extract in the quickest, most efficient way. The investigator can expend one use of inspiration to mix an extract in 1 round (as opposed to 1 minute).

entries.name: Numerical Alchemy, Greater
entries.description:
The investigator can calculate his movements and account for his reactions to danger or unexpected situations with lightning speed. He can expend a use of inspiration to mix an extract as a standard action.

  The investigator must have the numerical alchemy talent and be at least 11th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Numerical Strike
entries.description:
Once per day when the investigator has confirmed a critical hit with a studied strike, he can deal average damage instead of rolling damage as normal. This includes the damage dealt by the successful attack as well as the additional damage from the studied strike.

  He can expend a use of inspiration to use this ability a second time per day.

  Using this ability doesn閳ユ獩 require an action.

  The investigator must be at least 5th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Numerical Strike, Greater
entries.description:
Once per day, when the investigator has confirmed a critical hit with a studied strike, he can deal the strike閳ユ獨 maximum damage instead of rolling damage as normal. This includes the damage dealt by the successful attack as well as the additional damage from the studied strike. He can expend a use of inspiration to use this ability a second time per day. Using this ability doesn閳ユ獩 require an action.

  The investigator must have the numerical strike talent and be at least 13th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Numerical Strike, Masterful
entries.description:
The investigator can use both numerical strike and greater numerical strike three times per day. The investigator doesn閳ユ獩 need to expend uses of inspiration to use either ability, but he can never use either more than three times per day each.

  The investigator must have the numerical strike and greater numerical strike talents and be at least 17th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Oaken Skin
entries.description:
At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, your skin thickens like bark and you gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your natural armor.

  At 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1.

entries.name: Obey
entries.description: As a standard action, you can issue a command to one living creature by expending 1 point of mental focus. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.2p6fzj5t03oivndd]{命令术}. The target must be within 30 feet and capable of understanding your order. The target can attempt a Will save to negate this effect. If the creature is the same creature type as you, it takes a 閳? penalty on this saving throw.

entries.name: 浑水摸鱼
entries.description: 当其他人在描述一个事件的时候，盗贼可以做一个对抗交涉检定来在事件的讲述中插入一段评论或者描述，从而使这个人怀疑他是否能够准确地回忆起一些细节。如果盗贼成功了，她的目标将不会意识到是盗贼的干扰让她产生了混淆。但如果盗贼失败了，目标可以做一个察言观色检定（DC等于盗贼失败的交涉检定结果）来发现是盗贼在蓄意混淆这个故事。

entries.name: 混淆施法
entries.description: 当奥能师施放法术时，他可从【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点使其看起来像另一个法术。这个法术可以被伪装成任何奥能师知晓的其他法术。该技艺会使正确辨识该法术的法术辨识技能DC提高，提高幅度为奥能师CL的两倍。法术辨识失败且失败差值小于奥能CL的两倍会将该正在施放的法术误认为另一个被奥能师选定的伪装法术。

entries.name: Object Reading
entries.description:
At 2nd level, an occultist learns how to read information from items he examines. Examining an item in this way requires him to spend 1 minute handling the item. If the item is a magic item, the occultist learns its properties and command word as if he had successfully examined the item using detect magic and succeeded at a Spellcraft check. This ability does not reveal whether the item is cursed unless the occultist閳ユ獨 class level is equal to or greater than the caster level of the item. If the item has any historical significance, the occultist learns one piece of information about its past (as determined by the GM).

  Finally, if the item was last used no longer than 1 day ago per the occultist閳ユ獨 class level, the occultist learns one piece of information about the last creature to use the item. This information might be a glimpse of the creature閳ユ獨 appearance, a brief vision of what it saw while using the item, or perhaps its emotional state when it last used the item. The GM determines what information is gained in this way.

  This functions like the psychometry occult skill unlock, but doesn閳ユ獩 require a skill check and can be used at will.

entries.name: Object Seer
entries.description:
As a full-round action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to gain insight into an object in your possession. You can ask one question, but that question must be tied in some way to the object, such as the nature of its power, the identity of the creature that last possessed it, or even where the object was when a certain event took place. You always receive an answer from the psychic impressions imprinted upon the item, but they are sometimes cryptic or misleading. This ability otherwise functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.p2kosvizylhy8vfa]{通神术}.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: Obliterate Memory
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can target a creature within 30 feet and eliminate all memory of an event the target experienced, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆}. A target can attempt a Will save to negate this effect. In addition, you can cause an account of the memory erased by this ability to appear on a blank page of any book you are carrying.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level.

  You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 裁决：终末
entries.description: 神授力量: 无信之人如居虚空之中，然而虔信使徒行列里亦有知晓空无与黑暗知识的学者…凝望深渊使你了解，你乃死灭，敌之死灭。

entries.name: Obscuring Blow
entries.description: Once per day, the rogue can forgo her potential to deal sneak attack damage to attempt to cloud an opponent閳ユ獨 vision. She must declare the use of obscuring blow before she makes the attack. If the attack hits, it does normal damage but, instead of dealing sneak attack damage (and any effect that triggers when the rogue deals sneak attack damage), the target treats all other creatures as if they had concealment, suffering a 20% miss chance on all attack rolls for a number of rounds equal to half the rogue閳ユ獨 level. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this effect to 1 round. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + 1/2 the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier.

entries.name: Obscurity
entries.description:
The vigilante is relatively unknown socially. In fact, he makes a point of keeping the life of his social identity as ordinary as possible. This social talent functions exactly as the renown social talent, but instead of improving the starting attitude of all NPCs within the community, it empowers the vigilante so that he no longer needs to succeed at Disguise checks to appear as his social identity while assuming that identity within his area of obscurity. He still has to attempt Disguise checks when NPCs within this settlement are confronted with indisputable proof that the vigilante could be more than he appears to be, such as when he uses a vigilante talent while in his social identity. This social talent counts as renown for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of social talents that list renown as a prerequisite and can be improved by such talents.

  A vigilante with this talent cannot select renown, nor can he select any social talent that requires him to be famous (such as celebrity discount or celebrity perks).

entries.name: Occult Dungeoneer
entries.description: Street thieves in Absalom expect wares to be securely locked, and sometimes it takes high-quality tools and magic training to ensure there閳ユ獨 a meal at the end of the day. A rogue with this ability can use spell-trigger and spell-completion items as if the following spells were on a spell list to which he has access: detect secret doors, detect traps, knock, locate object, and obscure object. If the spell-trigger device allows a wielder to apply his own caster level (such as with a staff ), the rogue may use his class level as his caster level. The rogue may also use knock as a supernatural ability once per day, using his rogue level as his caster level.

entries.name: Occult Final Revelation
entries.description: Upon reaching 20th level, you become one with the spirits. You become immune to death effects, exhaustion, fatigue, nausea, negative levels, and the sickened condition. You can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} once per day as spell-like abilities without requiring material components. Should you die, you rise again 2d4 days later as a ghost.

entries.name: Occult Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the occult mystery adds Bluff, Disguise, Knowledge ：神秘, and Use Magic Device to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{隐形仆役} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oplskt3tgws8ujv8]{幽灵手}(4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.68ngvzmzvadhf6vs]{异界探知} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{投影术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqeaxoaozlv9vg35]{灵视} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2vb5orfcy57lrfmc]{片刻预知} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射} (18th).

entries.name: 玄秘秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.aa0w7tk852iqn3ni]{侦测死灵}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h1ankl1l77kmnpke]{命令死灵}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bp1j6n5r1lsok3kf]{暮光之刃}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wralcmyi4tdcai24]{黑触手}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1rhpxleafu8mi5yu]{灵蛇杖}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c1e7f0ct04k270wy]{唤起死灵}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{锢魂术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ursm11405zobemi3]{异界之门}

entries.name: Occulted Soul
entries.description: A ninja with this trick can still her mind to bypass magical detection. The ninja can spend 1 ki point to cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.awia42zci8nufpfl]{回避侦测} on herself as a spell-like ability, with a caster level equal to her ninja level.

entries.name: 海子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g2obld7y0lpyztes]{水面行走}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ltda70etgwje43x6]{津波}

entries.name: Octopus Aspect
entries.description:
The octopus is a cunning hunter, able to contort its malleable body with ease.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

  It increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of an octopus. While in this form, you gain the aquatic subtype, a swim speed of 30 feet, low-light vision, a bite attack (1d3), a tentacles attack (no damage) with the grab ability, and Multiattack as a bonus feat.

  At 8th level, you gain the jet ability (200 feet).

  At 15th level, you gain the ability to produce an ink cloud (see below) and deal an amount of bludgeoning damage with your tentacles attack equal to the damage dealt by your shifter claws.

Ink Cloud (Ex): While within water, you can emit a 10-foot-radius sphere of ink once per minute as a swift action. This ink provides total concealment and persists for 1 minute.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tentacle (B)

entries.name: 防御式突袭*
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼在对一个目标进行近战攻击造成偷袭伤害时，对这一目标的攻击获得每一个偷袭骰1AC的闪避加值。这一效果持续一轮。

entries.name: Omnikinesis
entries.description: At 20th level, a kineticist transcends the distinction between the different elements and can bend all creation to her will. By accepting 1 point of burn (in addition to any burn requirement of the kinetic blast she chooses), she can use any blast wild talent she doesn閳ユ獩 know. By accepting 1 point of burn as a standard action, she can change any of her wild talents into any other wild talent of the same category (such as simple blasts or defense) for 24 hours, ignoring any elemental requirements or restrictions (but not any other requirements or restrictions).

entries.name: 黑暗之翼
entries.description: 12级起，你能够在进入血怒时选择从背后长出类似蝙蝠翅膀的双翼，这会赋予你60尺飞行速度，机动性一般。16级起，你的飞行速度增加至80尺，机动性良好。

entries.name: One Body, Two Minds
entries.description: At 15th level, once per day, you can improve the effectiveness of a single spell by having your possessing spirit channel that spell. The spell acts as though it were affected by both the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{法术定发} metamagic feats. If the spell chosen is a mind-affecting spell, it also benefits from the @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{法术延时} metamagic feat. This ability does not use up a spell slot higher than the level of the base spell, nor does it increase the level of the base spell.

entries.name: One of Those Faces
entries.description: Each day, you can use disguise self as a spell-like ability for up to 10 minutes per character level. This duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 10-minute increments. Additionally, once you have used this ability, whenever you use it for the next 24 hours you must take the same alternate appearance.

entries.name: 亡者眷族
entries.description: 在20级时，你的外表开始腐败（腐烂的外形由你自己决定），并且不死生物视你为他们的一员。你免疫寒冷、非致命伤害、麻痹以及睡眠。你同样获得伤害减免5/-。无智力的不死生物不会注意到你，直到你攻击他们。在对抗不死生物的法术和类法术能力时，你在豁免上获得+4士气加值。

entries.name: 全心全意
entries.description: 在15级时，骑士的坐骑获得他的有备无患能力的好处，前提是它必须着轻甲或不着甲，且没有过度负重。骑士必须进行防御式战斗或寓守于攻才能获得本能力的好处，但他的坐骑无需如此。除此之外，坐骑还会获得骑士的挑战奖励（无论它是否着甲或负重）。

entries.name: One Touch (UC)
entries.description:
As long as he has at least 1 point remaining in his ki pool, as a standard action, a monk with this power can make an unarmed strike against a foe as a touch attack. He adds 1/2 his monk level as a bonus on the damage roll. He can spend 1 ki point to double this bonus for that attack.

  A monk must be at least 12th level before selecting this ki power.

entries.name: 融入阿巴顿
entries.description: 20级起，你的身体完全接受了源自邪魔血统那不可名状的力量。你免疫强酸，死亡效果以及毒素。你还获得了DR 5/善良或银，以及10点寒冷抗力，10点闪电抗力，以及10点火焰抗力。

entries.name: One with Nature
entries.description: At 16th level, creatures of the animal or plant types don閳ユ獩 attack you unless compelled to do so by magic or you attack them first. Three times per day, you can transport yourself from one tree to another tree, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{融身入林} with half the transport range. Moving from one tree to another in this manner is a move action. You gain these abilities even while not bloodraging.

entries.name: 野性主宰
entries.description: 17级起，其他动物会尊敬猎人和她的动物伙伴，甚至可能会对她们产生畏惧之心。只要动物的类型与猎人当前使用的动物之力的类型大致相同，就会产生这种反应：比如蝙蝠与其他种类的蝙蝠，虎与猫科动物，猎鹰与鸟类，蛇与爬行动物，等等。除非受到魔法胁迫或者猎人或动物伙伴首先发动攻击，属于此种类别的动物（包括凶暴种）都不会主动攻击猎人和她的动物伙伴。猎人和她的动物伙伴能够以迅捷动作尝试对适当类别的动物挫败士气（demoralize），在判断威吓检定的结果时，要投掷1d20加上猎人的等级和她的魅力调整值。

entries.name: Oneiromancy
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can tamper with the minds of sleeping creatures. You plant a subconscious thought in a sleeping creature閳ユ獨 mind by attempting a Diplomacy or Intimidate check to modify the sleeping creature閳ユ獨 attitude or request a service from it. If you succeed, when the creature wakes it behaves in the way you dictated with the normal restrictions for the Diplomacy or Intimidate skill.

  The target of oneiromancy remains unaware of this manipulation, though if you fail your Diplomacy check the subject might have its starting attitude toward you negatively impacted, as normal. You must be adjacent to the sleeping creature to use this ability.

  Alternatively, you can use this ability as part of the casting of @Compendium[pf1.spells.ifcnx1yyw6e7ousm]{托梦术}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.sbjna6uk79pysjv6]{Minor Dream}, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{梦魇}. In this case, the oneiromancy effect takes place when the spell is cast.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. Creatures that don閳ユ獩 dream are immune to this effect.

entries.name: Ongoing Defense
entries.description: The psychic can increase the duration of spells that improve her psychic defenses. She can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool when she casts any intellect fortress, mental barrier, thought shield, or tower of iron will spell to extend the spell閳ユ獨 duration by 1 round.

entries.name: 恶鬼血统
entries.description:
你的祖先曾经被迫向喜怒无常的恶鬼主人屈膝侍奉，以满足它们的种种穷奢极欲为生存方式。而你，他们的后裔也就不可避免的感染上了恶鬼的力量，并且幸运的习得了如何操纵这非人血脉遗产的方法。

  本职技能:易容.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{飞行术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.smbkd2yobhshbpqf]{魅惑怪物} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pkm8um5t1cxsn6jh]{寒冰锥} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e5kw4dwf9qwty6tl]{高等解除魔法} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xmkvpl56appk20cl]{锢魂术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.NFxHebU1XhEs5WJh]{寓守于攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}, 
  • Enforcer,
  •  Fast Healer,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}, 
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Intimidate),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.BJBC4lbo7xGWPsKJ]{擅长异种武器} (katana)

  血统奥秘: 每当你施放一个带有魅惑或控制子系的法术时，你在唬骗、交涉和威吓检定上获得相当于所施法术等级数的加值，持续1d4轮。

entries.name: 鬼生
entries.description: 15 级时，当你的生命值被降到0，你的伤势会自动稳定，并且在（术士等级）个轮数内每轮获得2点生命值恢复。当恢复生效后，所有在你身上可能导致你继续死亡的 法术和能力将无效化（比如流血术），但是，如果在恢复期间你受到了火或者酸伤害，那么你当日剩余的恢复将停止（但是伤势依然会稳定）。你在生命值达到体质 值的负数时依然会正常死亡，无论你是否正在恢复。这个能力每天只能生效一次——你在当天第二次生命值被降到0时这个能力就不会发动了。

entries.name: Ooze Blight
entries.description: A target hit by the alchemist閳ユ獨 bomb loses the split special quality for 1d4 rounds. In addition, against creatures with the ooze type, this bomb deals untyped damage that bypasses all resistances.

entries.name: 乘势攻击
entries.description: 每轮一次，盗贼可以对刚刚被其他角色的近战伤害到的敌人作一次藉机攻击。该攻击计入盗贼每轮藉机攻击次数中。即使有战斗反射专长，盗贼也不能每轮使用此能力一次以上。

entries.name: Opportunist (UC)
entries.description: The rogue can make an attack of opportunity against an opponent who has just been struck for damage in melee by another character. This attack counts as an attack of opportunity for that round and can閳ユ獩 be used more than once per round.

entries.name: 压制
entries.description: 在2等时，骑将如果使用他所效忠之地狱骑士团的偏爱武器对敌人造成伤害，他就可以用一个迅捷动作来得知这个敌人是否属于混乱阵营，同如他用了侦测混乱研究了该生物3轮。除此之外，如果他是用此能力得知了该生物属于混乱阵营，他在攻击检定上获得+1士气加值。这个加值并不会重复叠加，但可以跟骑将挑战的效果叠加。

entries.name: 先知诅咒
entries.description: 每个先知都背负着诅咒，这些诅咒既为他们造成不利也会带来有利之处。先知必须在1级时选择自己的诅咒，一旦选择即不能更改。除非有神祇力量的介入，否则先知无法以任何方式摆脱自己的诅咒。先知诅咒的等级基于她的“先知等级+1/2非先知等级或HD”。

entries.name: 忿怒法
entries.description: 结合神术与徒手击打武技的精要，你可以通过自己的拳脚快速传导法术攻击。这个启示与魔战士的法术打击能力相同，但你只能使用徒手击打攻击来传递法术，无论你是否拥有其他能力都是如此。除此之外，你使用牧师法术列表中的法术而不是魔战士法术列表中的法术来使用法术打击。你必须达到7级才能选择本启示。

entries.name: 兽人血脉
entries.description:
污秽的兽人之血在你体内奔流不息，野蛮的先祖之怒在你心中燃烧不止。你的狂怒绝不会蛰伏，它让你的身躯强大无比，并指引你去寻求更强的力量。

  本职技能: 生存.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{燃烧之手} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.im8z5kfg8ohowie9]{死云术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cm3l4h4mld9j8lar]{延迟爆裂火球} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.go4xOiSUP8R1QJ5N]{精通闯越},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{猛力攻击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h8Ap9cxdsXWRC6Tc]{法术扩展}.

  血统奥秘: 你获得兽人亚种,包括黑暗视觉60英尺和强光敏感。如果你已经拥有黑暗视觉,其范围增加到90英尺。每当你施放了一个造成伤害的法术,该法术获得伤害骰子+1点伤害的奖励。

entries.name: 骑士道
entries.description: 1级时，骑将必须对一项特定的骑士道宣誓。骑士道会带给骑士一些加值、本职技能以及特殊能力。此外，每项骑士道都有一些骑将必须遵守的法令。如果骑将违反了其中任何一条，他会失去所有骑士道带来的收益，持续24小时。对于法令的违反GM有最终解释权。若要改变所信奉的骑士道，骑将必须通过一个冗长的程序。如果决定这样做了，骑将会立刻失去旧骑士道带来的所有收益。他必须在不获得任何新骑士道的收益的前提下遵守该骑士道的法规整整1级的时间。一旦完成，他会获得新骑士道的所有收益。注意，根据战役设定，这些骑士道的名字可能改变。

entries.name: 裁决：秩序
entries.description: 神授力量: 当需要力战疯狂的异形，混沌的恶魔与骚动的异端。审判者查阅律法和刑典，呼唤秩序的大能对抗敌人。

entries.name: 角虺骑士团
entries.description:
隶属于角虺骑士团的骑士可以说是一群杀人集团，在这里的指挥系统中晋升的关键是冷酷的实用主义以及卑劣的行径。她们通常是残酷且自私自利的领导者，下属的苦难往往是这些人的自信之源。

守则：角虺骑士团的骑士必须致力于增加自身的声望、财富和权力，对她的主顾也要如此。她必须努力将利润与效率最大化，并以此为方针指挥手下的佣兵，如果能让自己距离目标更近一步或者让自己显得更加出众的话，甚至可以不惜牺牲手下。

挑战： 当角虺骑士团的骑士发出挑战后，只要她的挑战目标陷入纠缠（entangled）、力竭（exhausted）、疲乏（fatigued）、夹击（flanked）、反胃（nauseated）、倒地（prone）、战栗（shaken）、恍惚（staggered）、或者无法将敏捷加值加到自己的AC上时，就能在对挑战目标作出的攻击和伤害检定中获得+1士气加值。每拥有4个骑士等级，该加值就会增加1点。

技能： 角虺骑士团的骑士将知识(本地)和巧手加入到她的本职技能列表中。只要检定牵涉到她的主顾或者组织时，骑士就能在知识(本地)检定中获得加值，数值相当于她的骑士等级的一半（最低+1点）。她还能将使用巧手检定时所承受的护甲检定减值降低，降低的数值等于她的骑士等级的一半（最低降低到0点）。

entries.name: 兽之骑士团
entries.description:
该团的骑士献身护卫所有形式的天成自然，他们向野生的动物立下共同进退的誓约，并和幽林中的居民来往甚密。

守则：我团骑士须恪守防卫自然的道义——无论是寻常野兽亦或是幻兽，在文明力量对它们展开捕猎和屠杀之前阻止这些恶行的蔓延。但是，如果有凶蛮野物不循生存之道，不遵自然法度，我团骑士也当力斩之而不赦。

挑战： 当兽之团的骑士发动挑战时，只要骑士威胁着他的挑战目标，他的坐骑也会在对抗目标的近战攻击检定上获得+1环境加值。这个加值每提升4个骑士等级就会额外+1。

技能： 兽之团的骑士可以将知识（自然，智力）和生存技能加入本职技能列表。除此之外，兽之骑士团的骑士在尝试使用生存技能追踪的检定上额外加上他的骑士等级数的一半。

entries.name: 狂兽骑士团
entries.description:
属于这个骑士团的骑士只会寻求破坏与混沌。狂兽骑士团的骑士沉醉于破坏，他们会按照自己的方式造成尽可能造成更大的伤害与混乱。尽管会有人歌颂战争的伟大与胜利的荣耀，但是对于狂兽骑士团的骑士来说，战斗仅仅为了品尝被自己斩杀的敌人之鲜血。这个骑士团的成员有时会很疯狂，而且可能会崇拜来自黑暗异帷（Dark Tapestry）的外神（the elder gods）和旧日支配者（Great Old Ones）。从学院或者军事院校出身的骑士不可能学到狂兽骑士团的行事方式；对于其他骑士团来说他们意味着堕落，而关于这个骑士团的秘密，也只会由黑暗的存在在精神错乱的青年人梦中低语，或者记述在禁忌的仪式中流传下来。

在格拉利昂（Golarion），你最有可能在率领贝尔克泽恩（Hold of Belkzen）的兽人部落进行袭击的队伍中、在法力荒漠（Mana Wastes）中统领小股强盗或劫匪的成员里、或者在任何极具破坏能力的领袖会受到尊敬与推崇的地区找到狂兽骑士团，他们会在这些律法的根基被动摇的地区播种混乱。

守则： 骑士要在他前往之地施行暴力。狂兽骑士团的骑士绝不怜悯，若被挫败就要极尽所能寻求报复。骑士必须时刻寻求着冲突，并且不能回避已经引发的战斗。对于无法盗取、抢夺或索取之物，他必须将其彻底亵渎或摧毁。

挑战： 在狂兽骑士团的骑士发出挑战之后，只要他攻击的第一个生物是他的挑战目标，那么在使用顺势斩（Cleave）或者大顺势斩（Great Cleave）时，所有伤害检定会获得+1士气加值。骑士每具有4个等级，这个加值就会增加1点。

技能： 狂兽骑士团的骑士将解除装置（敏捷）以及潜行（敏捷）加到他的本职技能列表中。他可以在未受训的情况下进行解除装置检定。若他在解除装置上投入了点数，那么就能够在使用该技能破坏、阻塞或摧毁装置的检定中获得加值，数值为他的骑士等级的1/2（最低+1）。

entries.name: 百花骑士团
entries.description:
百花骑士团的骑将将他们的一生献身于保护精类，特别是保护那些从第一世界前往主物质界的精类。这些骑将自己可能是精类，但即使不是，他们也会展现出一些奇怪的念头，以及偶尔残酷的幽默感，就像大多数典型的第一世界居民。

守则： 骑将不能拒绝帮助一只精类，除非它会干扰到他正在进行的使命，或者他相信这精类想要阻止他完成目标。他必须尽力防止通向第一世界的大门被过度使用或者腐化。如果骑将遭遇了瘟疫妖精（开拓者RPG 怪物图鉴6 46-47）或者其他堕落的精类，他必须尽全力消灭它们。

挑战： 当百花骑士团的骑将发出挑战时，挑战的目标在对抗精类或者骑将使用的法术和类法术能力的豁免上获得-1减值。这个减值每4个骑将等级提升1点。百花骑士团的骑将不能对任何精类生物发起挑战，除非这个生物拥有瘟疫妖精范本。

技能： 百花骑士团的骑将将易容和知识（自然）加入他的本职技能列表中。百花骑士团的骑将可以在未受训的情况下尝试知识（自然）技能检定。当百花骑士团骑将尝试唬骗检定来在战斗中使用虚招时，他在检定上获得等同于他骑将等级一半的加值（最小+1）。

entries.name: 蓝玫瑰骑士团
entries.description:
蓝玫瑰骑士团的骑将们奉献自我，以在他们漫游的土地上推广和平。他们是技巧精湛的战士和优秀的外交官，拥有顾问般的智慧、耐心和理解力，并永远铭记着自己的职责，拿起武器对抗侵略者、暴君或邪恶的窜位者。虽然他们全心全意的坚信和平乃是他们的最终目标，但他们首先仍是战士，拥抱着理想，监护着那些无法或不能拿起武器保护自身的人。

守则： 蓝玫瑰骑士团的团员必须挺身对抗不必要的暴力，保护土地和人民避开那些他们既不希望开始，也不希望打下去的战争，他必须寻求流血最少的方式来阻止冲突，股利和平解决智慧生物之间的冲突与分歧，并修补战争所撕裂的伤口。他必须一年四季履行承诺，并在必要时保护那些投降他盟友的俘虏。

挑战： 如果蓝玫瑰骑将曾经花费一个标准动作给予他挑战的敌人（必须是智慧生物）投降，而对方拒绝的话，他在对抗该目标的攻击检定上得到+1的士气加值此加值再之后的每4级+1，最高到17级的+5。

技能： 蓝玫瑰骑士团的骑将将知识（历史）和知识（贵族）加入他的本职技能。当他尝试使用交涉技能来调停不包含他的双方冲突时，他得到相当于他等级一半的加值（至少+1）。

entries.name: 蛇怪骑士团
entries.description:
属于这个骑士团的骑将只为其自身效力，为达成自己的目的和增加自己的声望而努力。这个骑士团的骑将趋向于自私并只关心个人的目标和目的。

守则： 骑将必须将自己的利益和目标高于一切。他必须接受应得的报酬，自己挣得的奖励，甚至是自己的那一份战利品。骑将必须抓住每一次机会来增加自己的地位、声望和实力。

挑战： 当蛇怪骑士团的骑将发动挑战时，如果他是唯一一个正在威胁着目标的生物（坐骑不包括在内），他就会在对该目标造成的所有近战攻击伤害上获得+1士气加值。这个加值每提升4个骑士等级就会额外+1。

技能： 蛇怪骑士团的骑将将估价（智力），表演（魅力）加入本职技能。此外，蛇怪骑士团的骑将可以将自己的魅力修正加在企图通过威吓使自己士气受挫的DC上（在一般的感知修正上再叠加）。

entries.name: 巨龙骑士团
entries.description:
巨龙骑士团的骑将们将自己奉献给了一群与自己志向相同的人，无论是一个佣兵公司还是一小队冒险者。这些骑将相信忠诚与友谊，并且愿意以生命来保护自己的伙伴。

守则： 骑将必须对自己的盟友保持忠诚，并且必须为了所属团体的长远利益而努力。他必须保护自己的盟友不受到伤害，并在他们遭到怀疑时站出来维护他们的荣誉。

挑战： 当巨龙骑士团的骑将发出挑战时，只要他威胁着挑战目标，他的盟友在攻击他的挑战目标时攻击检定就会获得+1环境加值。此加值每4骑将等级增加1。

技能：巨龙骑士团的骑将将察觉（感知）和生存（感知）加入本职技能。此外，当巨龙骑士团的骑将使用生存技能来为盟友提供水和食物或保护盟友不受到恶劣环境的侵害时，他获得等同于骑将等级一半的加值（最少+1）。

entries.name: 东晨骑士团
entries.description:
该团的骑士致力于在芸芸众生的注意力之外隐藏异界的危险知识，在暗影中地与常人难以想像的超自然威胁作斗争。东辰骑士是绝对的现实主义者而非道学家，除了例行的监控和探查以外，他们会使用各种秘密手段维护人类社会的稳定和存续。

守则： 我团骑士需避世隐身，以此作为骑士团与超自然的敌对力量长久作战的优先战略。他必须奋起对抗来自常识之外的恐怖存在，保护无辜而无知的平民百姓，并在第一时间向骑士团报告任何异常威胁的苗头。

挑战： 当东辰团的骑士发动挑战时，骑士会在对抗他目标的攻击和能力时，在防御等级上获得+1闪避加值，在豁免检定上获得+1洞察加值，但他必须着轻甲且不能负重超过轻度负重才能获得本加值。这个加值每提升4个骑士等级就会额外+1。

技能： 东辰团的骑士可以将知识（神秘）和知识（位面）技能加入本职技能列表，并且他可以在未受训的情况下进行这两项知识技能检定。除此之外，如果东辰骑士团的骑士在在知识（神秘）和知识（位面）技能上已受训，那么他在使用这两个技能探知关于神秘与超自然存在的技能检定上获得相当于他的骑士等级一半（至少为+1）的加值。

  专长: 东辰骑士团的骑士获得异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）作为奖励专长。

entries.name: 月无团
entries.description:
天洲的大地精军人已经在无数年的对外战争中熟稔地掌握了利用幽暗环境和他们种族的黑暗视觉作为自己的优势，以此在与人类，精灵和轮回者战斗中获得上风。在大地精的军事帝国高领，残暴的武士们不仅仅利用黑暗来完善战术。他们求索，学习，意图将自己的精神与庇护他们种族的黑暗紧密结合，忠诚于于光明之敌本身。于是，在这些黑暗信徒之中诞生了广受敬畏的月无团武士团。虽然月无团并不限制非大地精种族加入他们的序列，但那些没有天生黑暗视觉的武者会发现他们完全无法适应该武士团的作风。

守则：武士不得在万万必需之情况外制造光亮——黑暗庇护吾等，它自有永在而不受干犯。武士必须为某个军事组织效力（在高领国，这意味着效忠于某个武士战团的团长，然后通过一级级指挥系统层层向上，直到指挥链顶端的督军鬼憎苏察大人和幕府九大佬）。武士必须谨守规矩：知进退，有分寸，忠以侍上，严以待下。对于秉烛而战的敌手，武士当不留慈悲，熄灭其希望之光。

挑战： 当月无团的武士发动挑战时，他在对被自己挑战的目标发动的威吓检定上获得+1加值。这个加值每提升4个武士等级就会额外+1

技能： 月无团的骑士可以将察觉（感知）和生存（感知）技能加入本职技能列表。除此之外，月无团的武士在使用察觉技能来尝试定位不可见的生物或物体时，他在察觉检定上获得相当于他的武士等级一半的加值（至少+1）。

entries.name: 鳗鱼骑士团
entries.description:
加入鳗鱼骑士团的骑将们，相信沟通与磋商是共荣双赢的康庄大道。他们寻找、交好新人，提供守卫或是雇佣兵的服务，并商议互惠协议条款。洛卡(Locathah)鳗骑手是鳗鱼骑士团的创建者，虽然之后也有其他水生种族加了进来。甚至有一小部分住在陆上，沿着海岸线的骑将们已向此交涉人与磋商者的骑士团宣誓。

守则：骑将必须以开放的心胸欢迎所有陌生人，并且对与他人合作表现欢迎。只要协议条款保持公平，则骑将们永远不能拒绝签订盟约或达成协议的机会。对坏毁与本骑士团骑将或其他人盟约的人，本骑士团的骑将必须严格惩处那人。

挑战： 无论何时，每当鳗鱼骑士团的骑将发起了一次挑战并正威胁着该名目标时，一名与骑将种族不同的盟友在对抗骑将的挑战目标时，于攻击骰上获得+1环境加值。这个加值每提升4个骑士等级就会额外+1。

技能： 鳗鱼骑士团的骑将将知识(地方)[智力]以及察觉(感知)加进他的本职技能表中。鳗鱼骑士团可以在未受训的情况下尝试知识(地方)技能检定。此外，当鳗鱼骑士团的骑将使用交涉对协议条款进行磋商时，他在该检定上获得等于他骑将等级一半的加值(最少+1)。

entries.name: 九柱星骑士团
entries.description:
这些属于此骑士团的骑将们，加入了地狱骑士对抗混乱的圣战，他们用钢铁般的戒律来约束他们的生活，并且发誓用尽一切手段来击败混乱。通过威吓以及手中武器的威力，这些严峻的战士充分体现了冷酷的法律之力，追逐与粉碎那些已被混乱侵蚀并溃烂的地方。许多人是从地狱骑士的那座荒凉的、黑色的堡垒开始他们新的道路的。而其他则是巡回在城市以及村落之间，担当审判者以及正义的冷酷特使。 就像其他地狱骑士一般，这个骑士团当中的大部分成员，要不就是在地狱骑士堡垒接受训练，要不就是得到了一位真正的地狱骑士的指导。他们当中的大多数，最终也会试图进阶地狱骑士，并期盼着那一天，那个他们终将要正面对抗来自地狱的力量，致命试炼到来的日子。在此之前，九柱神之星骑士团的成员们通常都是地狱骑士的随扈，或是拥有着许可，在各处去寻找并解决混乱的菜鸟们。先不论他们的目标，每个骑将都与一个特定的地狱骑士团体有关联，他们会严格遵守该骑士团的“苛评”。九柱神之星骑士团的成员们通常出现在艾巴萨罗姆(Absalom)、切利亚斯(Cheliax)、依斯嘉(Isger)、拉哈多姆(Rahadoum)、瓦瑞西安(Varisia)但骑将们的目标可能让他们跑遍整个内海地区。

守则： 这骑士团的骑将是法律最为铁面无情的一面，如果粉碎梦想、强迫顺从、以法律之名大开杀戒可以带来和平跟进步的话，那这些行为就只是微不足道的代价罢了。骑将必须将所有的违法者绳之以法，但如果这件事不可能完成的话，那他就必须化身法律的刽子手。与此同时，他还必须遵守他所效忠的地狱骑士团的原则。

挑战： 一个九柱神之星骑士团的骑将，在对以下这些生物发出挑战时(两者任一即可)，在攻击检定上获得+1士气加值，同时，他也对该生物在威吓：挫败士气上，获得此加值。这加值在1等时为1，并在每四个职业等级后再增加1。

技能： 九柱神之星骑士团的骑将把知识(地方)以及察觉加入到他的本职技能中。除此之外，他在决定是否进入突袭轮的察觉检定中，获得他骑将职业等级1/2(最小为1)的士气加值

entries.name: 第一律法骑士团
entries.description:
属于第一律法骑士团的骑将们，致力于追捕任何实践、布道或是其他任何对宗教的帮助的人。

守则： 骑将们必须尽力保护无神论者以及那些排斥神的人。他必须没有守护神，也不可自愿服侍神的代理人们。他必须从那些神的代理人的行动中，保护一般民众，远离他们造成的“苦难”。

挑战： 每当第一律法骑士团的骑将发动挑战时，每一轮，当他对他所挑战的目标进行攻击时，他在他的回合时获得1点临时生命值。这些临时生命值可以维持1小时。每一轮可以获得的临时生命值数值，会在获得每四个骑将等级后+1。

技能： 第一律法骑士团的骑将能将医疗与知识(宗教)加入它的本职技能中。第一律法骑士团的骑将可以在未受训的情况下，进行知识(宗教)技能检定。如果他在(宗教)技能上有受训，他会在辨认有宗教信仰的成员，或是有关宗教用具(paraphernalia)的检定中，得到等同1/2他骑将职业等级(最少+1)的加值。

entries.name: 耀炎骑士团
entries.description:
一个耀炎骑士团的骑将将他的生命致力于追求个人荣耀。即便这种追求会让他的生命悬于一线，骑将也会追求着传奇的地位以及与之而来名望和荣耀

守则： 骑将必须为自己和队伍寻求荣耀。他必须努力给自己的名字带来光荣，无论什么代价。他必须挑战并击败不断增加的对手来进一步巩固他的赫赫声望。

挑战： 一个耀炎骑士团的骑将随着他的光荣胜利变得越来越有恃无恐。将他的挑战目标生命值降到0点或更低后，以一个直觉动作，骑将可以选择一个15尺内的敌人，发动荣耀挑战（Glorious Challenge）。

  • 荣耀挑战： 一个荣耀挑战不计入骑将挑战的每日可用次数，但是其他方面如同骑将的挑战职业能力一般运作。当他发动一个荣耀挑战时，骑将在荣耀挑战期间AC承受-2减值（这个减值与正常的骑将挑战对抗挑战目标以外敌人所承受的-2AC减值相叠加）。骑将对荣耀挑战目标的近战伤害获得目前为止连续发动的荣耀挑战次数2倍的士气加值。只要他持续不断地击败他荣耀挑战的目标并且有其他的敌人在范围内，骑将就可以持续无限地发动荣耀挑战，AC的减值和伤害的加值也随着后来的敌人增加。举例而言，一个5级的骑将刚刚发动了他击败最初挑战（Challenge）目标后的第三次荣耀挑战（Glorious Challenge），他的AC承受-6减值（对荣耀挑战目标外承受-8减值）并且近战伤害获得11点加值（来源于他基础的挑战能力的一个+5加值，加上来源于连续三个荣耀挑战的+6士气加值）

  
技能： 一个耀炎骑士团的骑将把知识（本地）和生存加入他的本职技能。当骑将的当前生命值等同于或超过他的最大生命值时，他的威吓检定获得他骑将等级的一半加值（最少+1）。

entries.name: 苍翠骑士团
entries.description:
苍翠骑士团的骑士们致力于保护大自然与野生生物，他们揉和了苍翠誓约的光荣与恐怖。他们信奉要阻止任何自然法则被曲解、滥用的可能，即使为此使用武力也在所不惜。

守则：骑将必须明白自己在自然秩序中的位置并且努力维护自然的平衡。他必须乐于让自然就这样“顺其自然”不受任何干扰，并阻止那些会破坏这微妙的平衡的任何人事物。他不会容忍异怪生物、不死生物或着那些不负责任，并且贪婪的滥用自然资源，所谓“文明的”人们。他可能富有远见，并寻求建立协议带给自然世界长久的保护，或着诉诸暴力，如果这是最快又最有效的保护方法的话。

挑战： 苍翠骑士团的骑士们不能对任何动物与植物发出挑战。不论何时，当他发出挑战，他对他发出挑战的目标，在攻击上获得+1士气加值。此加值会在每四个骑将等级再+1。如果他所挑战的目标是异怪生物或不死生物，那他可以在对抗他的目标时，在每一轮的第一次攻击骰投掷两次，并选择任意一次作为结果。

技能： 苍翠骑士团的骑士获得知识(自然)与生存作为本职技能。除此之外，不论何时，当一名苍翠骑士团的骑士试图使用生存检定追踪异怪生物或不死生物的敌人时，他得到等同1/2他骑士职业等级(最少+1)的加值。

entries.name: 护卫骑士团
entries.description:
加入护卫骑士团的骑士致力于保护特定的人或物，并且奉献忠诚与坚韧的美德——通常来说他们是被人雇来进行保护工作。护卫骑士团的成员通常是雇佣兵，他们会为那些出钱想要保护自身资产的人提供有价值的服务；这种情况在杜鲁玛（Druma）最为显著，此地有许多骑士隶属于杰出而坚定的黑衫佣兵团（Blackjackets of the Mercenary League）。护卫骑士团的骑士可以为了自身的信念而提供服务，并不一定需要他人掏钱，但是他的保护必须要得到某种酬劳，这种酬劳报可以是人情，可以是知识的传授，或者其他无形之物的交易。骑士团内有一种说法：只有当保护者将自身的所有物至于任务中，并且可能会在自己失败时损失某些有价值的事物时，才会全身心投入任务并且努力进行高水准的护卫。

守则：护卫骑士团的骑士必须尽其所能努力保护好他要守护的物件，即便代价是自己的生命也是如此。骑士通过他的服务而得到报酬，这可以通过金钱、人情或者以其他方式支付。只要不会影响到骑士团的其他守则或者事先商定的合同，护卫骑士团必须完成他在合约中约定的使命或者雇主的要求。

挑战： 每日开始时，护卫骑士团的骑士必须宣称一个人或物（包括可以清晰定义的一组物体，比如一堆箱子或一套书籍）作为他在当日所致力于保护的对象，通常来说这会是他受雇保护的物件；选取的物件被称作骑士的戍卫（cavalier’s ward）。每当骑士发出挑战时，只要骑士的实体所处的位置在他保护的物件和目标之间，那么他的AC在对抗挑战目标时就会获得+1士气加值。骑士每具有4个等级，这个加值就会增加1点。

技能： 护卫骑士团的骑士将知识（地理）以及察觉加到他的本职技能列表中。此外，他在知识（贵族）检定中获得等同于他骑士等级一半的加值（最低+1）。

entries.name: 锤之骑士团
entries.description:
锤之骑士团的骑士崇拜力量高过一切，他们认为强大就意味着拥有替弱者做出决定的权利。当骑士团成员的个人目标与强大的统治者发生冲突，他必须证明自己的力量和理想更加优越。

守则： 骑士必须不断努力，以证明其自身和其盟友的力量，特别是在遇到逆境或那些追求更加强大力量的骑士。

挑战： 锤之骑士团的骑士，在其使用全力攻击攻击他挑战的对手时，可以尝试进行一次自由的擒抱或破武战技，此战技不会引发借机攻击。

技能： 锤之骑士团的骑士将特技（敏捷）和知识（本地）（智力）加入其职业技能列表。同时，当骑士使用特技技能跳跃，他可以在敏捷调整值之外再额外加上力量调整值，同时还获得1/2骑士等级（最低1）的加值。

entries.name: 英雄骑士团
entries.description:
属于此骑士团的骑将致力于猎杀大型怪物，并从它们的魔掌中保护社会大众。这些骑将们重视勇气、奉献，与坚若磐石的决心。

守则：英雄骑士团的骑将必须选择一个区域，不论是一个定居点或是一个国家都可以，并且宣誓杀死任何威胁此区域的怪物。他必须完成他为了杀死这只野兽所做的任何承诺，如有必要，也必须追踪至此怪物的巢穴，并且直到当前的目标被杀死前，需放弃任何新猎物。骑将必须尝试确保在他追踪猎物时，不会对他的领地造成永久性的伤害。

挑战： 无论何时，当英雄骑士团的骑将发起了一次挑战，如果他挑战的目标其体型要比他大上至少一个等级，那他会在近战伤害骰上获得+1士气加值。此加值在他每提升4级骑将等级再+1。

技能： 英雄骑士团的骑将将知识(奥秘，智力)与知识(自然，智力)加入本职列表中。此外，无论何时，当英雄骑士团的骑将用知识检定来辨认一个怪物时，他在此检定上获得等同他骑将等级一半的加值(最小为1)。

entries.name: 大地骑士团
entries.description:
这些骑士将自身奉献给大地与那些居住在繁华地区之间，相对落后地区的人们。这些骑士们常常在偏原地区的城镇，领导着未受训的革命军来反抗不公不义的政府，或是那些会威胁公民日常生活的野蛮元素。自力更生以及运用少量资源的能力，是那些追随大地骑士团的骑士们的标记。

守则： 骑士必须致力保护被暴虐政权蹂躏的人民，他不能因为还没准备好，就拒绝他的使命跟责任。

挑战： 不论何时一个大地骑士团的骑士发起了挑战，他在使用远程攻击对付他所挑战的目标时，在攻击上获得+1士气加值。此加值会在获得每四个骑将等级后+1。

技能： 一个大地骑士团的骑士将知识(地方)与生存作为本职技能。除此之外，当骑士使用生存技能来避免迷路时，他在此检定中获得等同1/2他骑士职业等级(最少+1)的加值。

entries.name: 雄狮骑士团
entries.description:
属于这个骑士团的骑将将自己献身于一名君主，可能是一个国王，女王，或者甚至是地方军阀。这个骑士团的骑将是坚定的，献身于自己的理想，愿意为保护自己的君主及其领土而付出任何代价。

守则： 骑将必须不惜任何代价保护他的君主的生命和领土。他必须无条件遵从君主的命令。他必须为扩展其国度的领土和威信而奋斗。

挑战： 当雄狮骑士团的骑将发起挑战时，他对来自于挑战目标的攻击获得+1闪避AC加值。此加值每4骑将等级增加1。

技能： 雄狮骑士团的骑将将知识（地方，智力）和知识（贵族，智力）加入本职技能。雄狮骑士团的骑将可以在未受训的情况下使用知识（贵族）。如果他在该技能上已受训，他会在与其君主相关的检定上获得等同于其骑将等级一半的加值（最低1）。

entries.name: 纪念骑士团
entries.description:
加入纪念骑士团的骑将们奉献自身，守卫、服务一处特别的城市或定居点，并且往往追随或是尊重他们家乡的信仰。属于纪念骑士团的骑将会维护他们所献身城市的法律，就算是出门旅游也会遵循这些律法。

守则：骑将必须努力地守护定居点、所有居住其内的人，以及那些下塌于此的旅人。他必须遵循定居点的律法，就算他离开此地，并且只要有可能，他要支持并激励人民群众包罗万象的理想与价值观。

挑战： 当纪念骑士团的骑将发起挑战并且被夹击，在对抗挑战目标时，于AC上获得+1闪避加值，并且在对抗恐惧以及影响心灵效果上获得+1士气加值。每有4个骑将职业等级，此加值+1。

技能： 纪念骑士团的骑将将知识(地方)以及知识(宗教)加入他的本职技能中。纪念骑士团的骑将可以选择这两个技能中的一个，并且能在未受训的情况下进行检定。如果他在该选择的技能上有等级，他可以在检定中获得等于他骑将等级一半的加值(最小+1)，只要这个检定涉及到他选择的定居点，或是一个在他选择的定居点中重要的信仰。

entries.name: 犬爪骑士团
entries.description:
只有骑乘犬类或狼的半身人才能加入犬爪骑士团。他们会宣誓保卫半身人，半身人的领地和其他无辜的人民，在荒野中巡逻，寻找对个体或是整个社群的威胁。这些骑将能以坚定的效率和决心捕捉到潜在的危险，这让那些不是半身人的种族感到诧异，但是会让这些伙伴们也能提高警惕。

守则： 骑将必须致力于保护其社群免受怪物和侵略者的威胁。他的首要职责是帮助半身人社群，但是他同时也宣誓保护那些无法独自应对荒野中威胁的人们。他绝不能进行任何可能导致一个半身人社群或一个无辜生物陷入危险的行动。一名犬爪骑士团的半身人必须选择狼或犬作为其坐骑。

挑战： 当一名犬爪骑士团的骑将发出挑战时，只要坐骑正在威胁骑将的挑战目标、且正被骑将骑乘，它的AC获得+1闪避加值。这一加值在之后的每4个骑将等级都再+1。

技能： 犬爪骑士团的骑将将知识（自然）和生存添加至其本职技能列表中。他可以在未受训的情况下进行知识（自然）检定。同时，犬爪骑士团的骑将善于在骑乘时追迹，使用他坐骑的速度而不是他本人的速度来决定移动中追踪的罚值，不论他是否正在骑乘。

entries.name: 悔罪骑士团
entries.description:
不是所有的骑将都以贵族或乡绅子女的身份开始他们的骑士生涯。有的出身于盗贼、杀手或骗徒，但在看到他们的恶行所造成的苦难后，他们转而投身于高尚的事业。遵循这个骑士团的骑将寻求机会弥补他们的过去所犯下罪行，尽自己所能来恢复自己被玷污的名声。

守则： 骑将必须对犯罪者表现仁慈，并且在他进行判决时要展现绝对的公正。他必须认为只有十恶不赦的怪物才是不可挽回的邪恶，而且必须将所有敌人交给当地执法者以确保公正的审判。

挑战： 当悔罪骑士团的骑将发动挑战时，只要他威胁着他的挑战目标，他对抗挑战目标战技的CMD获得+1士气加值。这个加值每4个骑将等级再+1。

技能： 一个悔罪骑士团的骑将把逃脱（敏捷）和察言观色（感知）加入到他的本职技能中。当他尝试逃脱技能检定时，骑将除了他的敏捷加值外还可以把他的力量加值加到检定结果中。

entries.name: Order of the Reins
entries.description:
The cavaliers of the order of the reins hold a strong rapport not just with their mounts, but with all tamed and domesticated animals on Golarion. From camels and horses to teams of sled dogs, these cavaliers hold themselves honor-bound to protect these creatures for their labor and loyalty. Cavaliers of the order of the reins often serve as the commanders of caravans or other expeditions, using their unique skills to ensure that the caravan and its wares safely reach their intended markets.

守则： The cavalier must do everything in his power to keep a caravan or traveling group safe once he has agreed to protect it. He must see that any allied animal injured under his watch is healed, or personally give it a merciful death if survival is not an option. He must not let any animal under his command suffer needlessly.

挑战： Whenever an order of the reins cavalier issues a challenge, all allied animals, animal companions, familiars, and mounts within 60 feet gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls and a +2 bonus to AC against the target. This bonus increases by 1 for every additional 4 levels the cavalier has.

技能： An order of the reins cavalier adds Appraise and Perception to his list of class skills. Any animal that the cavalier is riding can use the cavalier閳ユ獨 Handle Animal modifier in place of its own Acrobatics and Swim skill modifiers as long as the cavalier is mounted on it.

entries.name: 戎马骑士团
entries.description:
戎马骑士团的骑将们发誓追求骑手与坐骑之间完美的伙伴关系。此骑士团认为这两者之间的平衡成就于这种伙伴情谊的建立，而此种情谊内包含了完善自身的根源、与群众有更良好的关系以及更好的了解如何保护世界。

限制： 只有骑马的骑将才有资格加入此骑士团。

守则：骑将必须看重她的坐骑更胜于己。她必须对任何服务敌人的非战斗人员或低智力的生物展露她的慈悲。她必须教导任何想要与他们的坐骑沟通更加顺畅的人。她能吃的肉只可以是由人为饲养与屠宰的动物的肉。她必须致力确保她的民众与她所占领的土地和谐相处，并且不会对其照顾下的动物造成不必要的痛苦。

挑战： 当戎马骑士团的骑将跨坐在她的坐骑上，并发起一次挑战时，她可以冲锋她所挑战的目标─就像标准挑战那样移动并攻击─并且之后可以再次移动，就像使用了骑乘攻击(Ride-By Attack)专长一般。她在此轮的总移动距离不得超过她坐骑的速度。这次战技会引发借机攻击，但当她冲锋她的挑战目标时，她在对抗借机攻击时的AC上，获得1点闪避加值。这个加值每4个骑将等级再+1。如果骑将已经有了骑乘攻击专长，那此闪避加值增加至2。

技能： 一位戎马骑士团的骑将把知识(自然)和察觉加入她的本职列表中。当她使用生存技能来追踪一个生物或为了她与她的坐骑寻找食物与水时，她在检定上获得等同于其骑将等级一半的加值（最低1）。

entries.name: Order of the Scales
entries.description:
Members of this cavalier order serve the cause of legal integrity. Many order of the scales cavaliers track down and apprehend fleeing lawbreakers so that these vagrants may answer for their crimes and make good on their debts. They often serve as judges or stakeholders, and work to ensure that wherever a bargain is made閳ユ敋hether it is monetary, a life debt, or an oath to be upheld閳ユ攤oth ends make good on their promises.

守则：The cavalier must fulfill all binding agreements he makes with others. If a bargain becomes impossible to fulfill, he must satisfactorily compensate all aggrieved or adversely affected parties involved in the bargain. When serving as a judge or arbiter, the cavalier must make fair, impartial judgments, and if unable to do so, must recuse himself at the earliest possibility. If authorized to enforce an agreement, the cavalier must wholeheartedly strive to accomplish this, remaining unswayed by threats, bribery, and other deterrents.

挑战： Whenever an order of the scales cavalier issues a challenge, he receives a +1 morale bonus on combat maneuvers and attacks of opportunity made against the target of his challenge. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the cavalier possesses.

技能： An order of the scales cavalier adds Knowledge ：地方 (Int) and Linguistics (Int) to his list of class skills. He gains a bonus equal to half his level (minimum +1) on Sense Motive checks to determine whether someone is bluffing and to determine whether a creature閳ユ獨 behavior is being inf luenced by an enchantment.

entries.name: 封印骑士团
entries.description:
封印骑士团是守护特定物件（例如极危险魔法物品）、地点（失落的神庙）或秘密（某地的农夫其实是皇室末裔）的隐密结社。他们是古老传统的捍卫者或是统治者的从者，守护着重大的机密。有时候为了妥善的保存和保护这些机密，他们会主动出击以找出隐藏的秘密。

守则： 封印骑将必须尽他的一切守护他的职责，为了达成职责，不论他的健康、他的荣耀或是生命都可以舍弃。如果他守卫一个区域，他必须驱逐入侵者；若他守卫物品，那他得保护该物件免于偷窃，要是该物件被拿走了，他必须尽一切所能的将之寻回。

挑战： 封印骑将在对他挑战目标进行全力攻击的时候，他可以用自由动作发动一次冲撞或是绊摔，以此自由动作发起的冲撞或绊摔不会引发借机攻击。

技能： 封印骑将将解除装置和语言学加到他的本职技能。当他使用唬骗防止对方探出他负责的东西时，他可以在唬骗上得到相当于他骑将等级一半的加值。

entries.name: 坚盾骑士团
entries.description:
加入了坚盾骑士团的骑将将自己的生命奉献于保护平民，从普通的农民到诚实的工匠。这些骑将站在浪潮的面前，保护那些无辜的人免受游荡的掠夺者和饥饿的怪物的伤害。

守则： 骑将必须保护平民的生命和财产，保护他们不受到想要伤害或剥削。他必须在允许的情况下给予施舍，在有人需要的情况下提供说明。他不能做出任何可能对无法防御自己的人造成伤害或困苦的行为。

挑战： 当坚盾骑士团的骑将发出挑战时，如果其挑战目标对骑将之外的目标做出了攻击，那么骑将在攻击挑战目标时攻击检定获得+1士气加值。此效果持续1分钟。加值每4骑将等级增加1。

技能： 坚盾骑士团的骑将将医疗（感知）和知识（地方，智力）加入本职技能。当他对自己之外的生物使用医疗技能时，他获得等同于自己骑将等级一半的加值（最少+1）。

entries.name: 尸衣骑士团
entries.description:
该团的骑士以摧毁不死亡灵和猎杀它们的创造者与支持者为己任。尸衣骑士探索古老的墓穴，乱葬岗与古战场，为徘徊不止的痛苦死者带去最终安眠。

守则： 我团骑士必须保护生者，英勇抗击亡灵的威胁。搜寻无眠的死灵与执着难平的怨魂，将它们送回本应属于逝者的归途。除此之外，骑士应当举剑为不能自卫者而战，将扰乱生死秩序的源头连根斩除

挑战： 当尸衣团的骑士对一个不死生物发动挑战时，骑士会在对自己的挑战目标的攻击检定上获得+1士气加值，持续1分钟。这个加值每提升4个骑士等级就会额外+1。

技能： 尸衣团的骑士可以将知识（本地）和知识（宗教）技能加入本职技能列表，并且他可以在未受训的情况下进行知识（宗教）技能检定。除此之外，如果尸衣骑士团的骑士在知识（宗教）技能上已受训，那么他在使用这两个技能探知关于不死生物与作祟存在的技能检定上获得相当于他的骑士等级一半（至少为+1）的加值。

entries.name: Order of the Songbird
entries.description:
Samurai of the order of the songbird are artists, scholars, and poets. They treat battle as a beautiful art form; many of these samurai seek pacifistic means of defeating their foes. Even samurai of this order who kill their opponents do so with respect, considering such a fight to be an act of poetic tragedy. These samurai are most common in lands where beauty is treasured, such as Hwanggot, Jinin, and Tianjing.

守则： The samurai must never destroy art unless doing so is part of an artful act or performance of her own. She must respect the skill of her opponents and never desecrate or purposefully humiliate a foe. If she takes a sapient life, she must create a piece of art, performance, or poem in honor of the fallen creature or creatures in order to memorialize what she has taken from the world.

挑战： An order of the songbird samurai gains a +1 dodge bonus to AC and a +1 sacred bonus on saves against the attacks and abilities of the target of her challenge. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 class levels the samurai has. The samurai must be wearing light or no armor, not using a shield, and carrying no more than a light load to gain this benefit.

技能： An order of the songbird samurai adds Knowledge ：宗教 (Int) and Perform (Cha) to her list of class skills. The samurai adds half her level to Craft checks and Profession (gardener) checks.

entries.name: 护法骑士团
entries.description:
属于护法骑士团的骑士奉献他的的人生在保护与协助施法者，尤其是法师与德鲁伊，并对抗那些寻找并破坏对魔法界来说有重要意义的物品与地点的人。

守则：骑士不能拒绝施法者向他寻求援助的请求，除非这件事会干扰到他现在的任务，或是他认为施法者试图直接地违反骑士的宗旨与目标。

挑战： 当一个护法骑士团的骑士发动了挑战，在骑士成功地对他的目标造成伤害后，他挑战的目标对法术与类法术能力的豁免检定上，得到-1的减值，持续一轮。此减值会在每四个骑将等级再-1。

技能： 一个护法骑士团的骑士将知识(奥秘)与知识(自然)作为本职技能。它可以使用知识(奥秘)来辨识奥数施法者正在施展的法术，如同他使用了法术辨识；他也可以使用知识(自然)对神术施法者这样做。当骑士藉由准备动作，攻击了一个正在施法的生物，并用相应的知识辨认出这是什么法术，他在攻击上获得+1加值。

entries.name: 星辰骑士团
entries.description:
加入了星辰骑士团的骑将献身于对于一种信仰及其成员的保护和服务。属于此骑士团的骑将趋于遵从所属信仰的原则和引导。在加入骑士团时，他应该选择一个信仰来效力。

守则： 骑将必须为保护信仰及其信徒而努力，从牧师到普通人。他必须遵从该信仰的约束，在任何可能的时刻推动其事业，并为其神圣的使者们效力。

挑战： 当星辰骑士团的骑将发出挑战时，如果他在威胁自己的挑战目标，则在所有豁免检定上获得+1士气加值。此加值每4骑将等级增加1。

技能： 星辰骑士团的骑将将医疗（感知）和知识（宗教，智力）加入本职技能。星辰骑士团的骑将可以在未受训的情况下使用知识（宗教）技能。如果他在该技能上已受训，他会在与其所选信仰相关的检定上获得等同于其骑将等级一半的加值（最低+1）。

entries.name: 利剑骑士团
entries.description:
加入利剑骑士团的骑将将其生命奉献于骑将准则，注重荣耀，勇气，与公平。利剑骑士团的男性趋于向一名女士宣誓效忠，而一些女性骑将则向一名领主宣誓效忠。在所有骑士团中，利剑骑士团可能是目标和理想最为广阔的一个。

守则： 骑将在面对危险时必须表现出勇气，面对冤枉自己的人时必须表现出宽恕，面对穷人和弱者时必须表现出博爱。他必须在对待任何事物的任何时刻都保持公正与荣誉。他必须维护自己的荣耀以及，高于一切的，他的效忠之人的荣耀。

挑战： 利剑骑士团的骑将发出挑战时，只要他在骑乘坐骑，就会在对挑战目标的攻击检定中获得+1士气加值。此加值每4骑将等级增加1。

技能： 利剑骑士团的骑将将知识（贵族，智力）和知识（宗教，智力）加入本职技能。当他使用察言观色来对抗唬骗检定时，他获得等同于自己骑将等级一半的加值。

entries.name: 圣典骑士团
entries.description:
知识是通往真理与力量的踏脚石，圣典骑士团大多数的成员致力于保存知识，不计一切代价的守护着那些书写在纸上的资料。其中也有部分的圣典骑将会出外搜寻那些过于危险，必须要封存或销毁的资讯。

守则： 圣典骑士团的成员必须不计一切代价保护书面知识（至少对那些合法的知识来说是如此），在必要时，他们也负责摧毁那些被禁制的知识，以狂热的将隐藏的禁制知识找出，然后彻底的毁灭。大部分的骑士团成员认为保存一份被书写的知识是一种比生命，包括他们自己的生命还要重要的工作，因为这将确保之后几代的人都能受惠于书上的智慧。

挑战： 当圣典骑将发出挑战时，他对该目标的所有法术或类法术能力之豁免得到+2的加值。此加值同样作用在关于该目标的唬骗或是察言观色检定上。

技能： 圣典骑将可以将语言学和知识（宗教）、知识（奥秘）加到他的本职技能中，而且他可以在未受训的情况下进行语言学检定。如果他在语言学上有受训点数，那么他再进行语言学检定时可以得到相当于他骑将等级一半的加值（至少+1）。

entries.name: 勇武道
entries.description:
多数武士向武人的信条宣誓，它们着重于责任、荣誉、忠诚以及服从。这一准则不仅包括向武士的领主和主人，同样也包括了向其同伴和家庭。勇武道的武士是世界上最可信赖也最可怕的战士之一。

守则： 武士必须以生命保护其主公的性命和领地。他必须诚实而勇敢，尊重他的前辈和主人，忠诚于他的朋友和主公。他必须时刻以荣誉和尊严自律。

挑战: 当勇武道的武士发出挑战时，他对其挑战目标的攻击获得伤害减免“1/-”，此伤害减免每在他每提升4级武士等级再+1。

技能： 勇武道的武士将知识（历史，智力）和知识（贵族，智力）加入本职技能。真勇会的武士可以在未受训下进行知识（贵族）检定。若他在该技能上拥有等级，则可以在检定上获得其武士等级一半（至少为+1）的加值，前提是该检定涉及他所在地区的贵族或政治

entries.name: 波涛骑士团
entries.description:
波涛骑士团的骑将探索着海底的秘密。

守则：骑将必须永远地追寻和探索新的疆域和水下的秘密，只有在自己的人受到水下威胁（特别是水下的邪恶种族，像是沙华鱼人，但是来自邪恶种族的骑将则会有善良或者中立的敌人）或者保护自己新发现的宝藏的时候才会停下来，他们会为了这些人和物而奋战。

挑战： 当发动挑战时，只要波涛骑士团的骑将在水下，他就可以在自己的豁免检定上获得+1士气加值。每4个骑将等级这个加值就会提升1点。

技能： 隶属波涛骑士团的骑将将知识（地理）和察觉加入他的本职技能。他可以在知识（地理）未受训的时候尝试检定，但是如果他在这个技能上有等级，他将他骑将等级的一半（至少为1）加到所有和找到水下位置相关的知识（地理）检定上。

entries.name: 长鞭骑士团
entries.description:
隶属长鞭骑士团的骑将立誓残酷、恶毒，只服务那些能让她不受约束施加苦难的人。此骑士团的骑将把痛苦加诸在那些与他们交战者，并且俘虏那些屈服之人。

守则：骑将必须寻找那些比他还要弱小的人，凌虐他、拷问他。他必须强迫他人无条件服从他的命令。只要有可能，他必须坚持不懈的造成痛苦与苦难。因为这些邪恶的守则，此骑将必须是邪恶阵营。

挑战： 当长鞭骑士团的骑将发起挑战时，只要他在之前的轮中有伤害或某位生物，他在对这名挑战目标时，于所有近战伤害骰中获得+1士气加值。这个加值每拥有4个骑将等级就会额外+1(最大17级时+5)。

技能： 长鞭骑士团的骑将将知识(地方)以及知识(规则)加进他的职业本职技能表。当长鞭骑士团的骑将使用威吓迫使另一名生物照他说的行事时，他在该检定中获得等于他骑将等级一半的加值(最小+1)

entries.name: 复仇骑士团
entries.description:
这些加入了复仇骑士团的骑士们，在寻找并惩罚那些背叛他们的人。

守则： 骑士必须对那些曾无端伤害她或她财产的人，寻求报复的行动(不论合法与否)。她不会原谅一丝一毫的污辱。

挑战： 不论何时，当一个复仇骑士团的骑士对一个，在24小时内遭遇到的，并符合上述条件的生物发动了挑战，骑士在对抗她挑战目标的攻击上获得+1士气加值。此加值会在每四个骑将等级再+1

技能： 一个复仇骑士团的骑士将知识(地方)与知识(贵族)作为本职技能。不论何时，当骑士使用交涉技能来搜集讯息时，获得等同于他一半骑士等级的加值(最小为1)。

entries.name: Orderly Casting
entries.description: The arcanist can tie her spells to the rigid order of Axis, giving them predictable results. As a swift action, she can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir. For the next minute, her spells deal damage as if she had rolled exactly average on all of the dice, rounded down. To find the average, treat the arcanist as if she had rolled 2-1/2 on all d4s, 3-1/2 on all d6s, 4-1/2 on all d8s, 5-1/2 on all d10s, and 6-1/2 on all d12s. For example, if a 3rd-level arcanist used this exploit and cast burning hands, the spell would deal a total of 7 points of damage.

entries.name: Oscillation (Stare)
entries.description: The target of the hypnotic stare treats all enemies beyond 30 feet (except the mesmerist) as having concealment (20% miss chance).

entries.name: 外层裂隙最终启示
entries.description: 20级时，你得到撕开界域裂隙的能力。你每日可以用类法术能力施展异界之门一次，如果你打算透过这个能力招唤生物服务你的话，你仍然需要付他10,000枚金币的工资。

entries.name: 外层裂隙
entries.description:
本职技能: 外层裂隙的先知将以下技能视为本职技能：飞行、威吓、界域知识和求生

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{抵抗能量伤害} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uus00fo4fn7yro0w]{Vermin Shape I} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.y4b1zmhmsa0gvf06]{Planar Binding, Lesser} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bbmd0fj17jsf5300]{高等异界誓缚} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.esia6azb5g68tfs7]{禁锢术} (18th).

entries.name: Outside Contact
entries.description:
At 8th level, the occultist learns the true name of one particular outsider. This outsider can have no more than 3 Hit Dice. Whenever the occultist creates a magic circle, he can expend 1 additional point of mental focus to focus the circle inward and lure that outsider to the circle (similar to using @Compendium[pf1.spells.y4b1zmhmsa0gvf06]{Planar Binding, Lesser}). The outsider is bound for up to 10 minutes. During this time, the occultist can bargain with the outsider for one piece of information. This requires a payment of at least 20 gp (or items of at least that value that are of interest to the outsider). The bargaining requires the occultist to attempt a Diplomacy or Intimidate check opposed by the outsider閳ユ獨 Sense Motive check. Succeeding at the check by 5 or more reduces this cost to 10 gp. Failure increases the price to 30 gp, whereas failure by 5 or more allows the outsider to escape without giving any information (or receiving payment). The information gained can be anything that might be learned through a divination spell. The information is always correct but is frequently cryptic. It typically takes the outsider 1d3 hours to gather the information, at which point it returns of its own accord to deliver the information as promised. The outsider always resents being used in this way, even if the occultist and the outsider share an alignment component. After the occultist bargains with the outsider, the magic circle loses all power and the outsider is sent back to its home plane.

At 12th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the occultist learns to contact one additional outsider of the same type or a different type. Although he can call only one outsider in this way at a time, the occultist can ask such an outsider one additional question per calling for every 4 occultist levels he possesses beyond 8th (to a maximum of four questions at 20th level), all for the same bargaining price. The questions must be in some way related to one another.

At 16th level, in lieu of asking questions, the occultist can demand that the outsider deliver a message to any one friendly creature that the occultist knows personally. The occultist can also task the outsider to deliver one object weighing no more than 1 pound. Either of these demands requires an opposed check as described above. Delivery typically takes 1d4 hours, but this period is reduced to 1d6 minutes if the recipient is within 1 mile of the occultist (or even less if the recipient is within sight). The occultist must be able to accurately describe the recipient in both name and appearance. This ability can閳ユ獩 be used to deliver anything to a location, or to enemies or creatures that are unfriendly to the occultist.

entries.name: 异界来客
entries.description: 20级开始，你的天生形态成为了长着动物头颅的类人生物，如同真正的罗刹。这并不会影响你的语言或施法能力。你可以使用“自我变形”或其他伪装、变形能力来变装成其他合适的生物。当确认某些针对特定生物类型的魔法或效果时，你永远视为本地异界生物，而非类人生物（或你原先的任何其他生物类型）。与其他异界生物不同，你仍然可以如同原先的生物类型一般被复活。最后，你获得伤害减免“10/穿刺”。

entries.name: 霸道推进
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人的闯越战技若成功，则造成等同他力量修正的额外伤害。

entries.name: Overbearing Assault (UC)
entries.description: The monk attacks relentlessly, backing his foe into a corner. If the attack hits, the monk can perform a free reposition combat maneuver against the target of the strike (using the base attack bonus of the attack used to hit the foe) with a 閳? penalty. This reposition attempt does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

entries.name: 霸道猛进
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人可以1轮闯越多个目标，越过第一个以后对每个CMB-2。野蛮人必须习得【霸道推进】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: Overflowing Grace
entries.description: When you heal a creature to full hit points or a creature already at full hit points with your positive or negative energy, that creature gains a +1 sacred bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 round. The bonus is sacred if you use positive energy and profane if you use negative energy. If you destroy or kill one or more creatures with positive or negative energy, you gain a +1 bonus of the same type on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 round.

entries.name: Overpowering Mind
entries.description:
The psychic can spend 2 points from her phrenic pool to increase the Will save DC of the linked spell by 1.

  At 8th level, she can choose to instead spend 4 points to increase the DC by 2.

  At 15th level, she can choose to instead spend 6 points to increase the DC by 3.

  This amplification can be linked only to spells that have the mind-affecting descriptor and require a Will saving throw.

entries.name: Owl Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the owl is one of silence. This predator glides through the night unheard, a master of stealthy attacks.

Minor Form: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Stealth checks.

  This bonus increases to +6 at 8th level and +8 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Medium owl (see page 181). While in this form, you gain a base speed of 30 feet, a fly speed of 60 feet (average), two talon attacks (1d6 damage), darkvision with a range of 60 feet, and a +2 racial bonus on Stealth checks.

  At 8th level, you gain Flyby Attack (Bestiary 315) as a bonus feat, and the range of your darkvision increases to 120 feet.

  At 15th level, you can take the form of a Large owl and gain the benefits of the Snatch feat (Bestiary 316), but you can use it only to grab a creature at least one size category smaller than yourself, and you can squeeze a creature grappled with this ability no matter what size it is.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), talons (S)

entries.name: Owl's Sight
entries.description:
The vigilante gains low-light vision. If he already has low-light vision, he gains a +4 competence bonus on Perception checks in low light.

  The vigilante also gains a +2 competence bonus on Sleight of Hand and Stealth checks at night.

entries.name: Pack Range
entries.description:
When a barbarian with this rage power enters a rage, any barbarian within 30 feet who also has this rage power can enter a rage. A barbarian that enters a rage outside of her turn spends 1 round of rage immediately and then spends another round of rage to maintain her rage at the beginning of her next turn.

  A barbarian must be at least 6th level to choose this rage power.

entries.name: Pageantry Discipline
entries.description:
The act of ritual, no matter how ostentatious, can be a route to mental strength. By engaging in esoteric and intricate routines, you have unlocked potent psychic power.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6orhthk4g27rncuu]{安定心神} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jcr72piqo6g549e1]{缓慢术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{神威如狱} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.weyfn0mg2oifasq1]{伪装术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{法师豪宅} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zi1fpl4essgw5bbc]{神圣化身} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ueuz3ymuz8pxpzr6]{Heroic Invocation} (18th).

entries.name: Pain Discipline
entries.description:
Mental blocks prevent your immense inborn psychic energies from flowing freely. They are unleashed only when you suffer pain.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijtqp1h3hka5kive]{Persuasive Goad} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jy64xofud29j5ju6]{痛苦打击} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3efy1ico48ccrzni]{吸血鬼之触} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1dkzhi78je32sbrr]{Pain Strike, Mass} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jddpsd5pkky0qjg]{Synapse Overload} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nqrpfidjuzllqa9z]{Inflict Pain, Mass} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9f3hf9h3j8q8062b]{力竭波} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6yeorbvt5ysym3nh]{Suffocation, Mass} (18th).

entries.name: Pain is Power
entries.description:
At 8th level, after taking damage from any source, you may attempt a DC 25 concentration check as an immediate action. If you succeed, you gain the benefits of a blessing of fervorAPG spell for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level. If you fail, this ability is expended with no effect. You can use this ability once at 8th level, plus an additional time for every 4 levels you are beyond 8th.

  This power replaces the Scythe of Evil power of the Evil Domain or the Staff of Order power of the Law Domain.

entries.name: Pain Wave
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to unleash a wave of pain. This wave hits all creatures other than you in a 20-foot-radius burst centered on a point that you designate within 100 feet. All living creatures in this area are wracked with pain, gaining the sickened condition for 1 round per occultist level you possess. Affected creatures can attempt a Will save to reduce the duration to just 1 round. This is a mind-affecting pain effect.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: Painful Reminder
entries.description:
As a swift action, you can cause an enemy to take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage if you dealt damage to that enemy with a spell since the start of your previous turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  This damage increases to 2d6 at 8th level and to 3d6 at 15th level.

entries.name: 痛苦之击
entries.description: 当你进行一次近战攻击检定时，你可以决定将这次攻击造成的伤害全部转化为非致命伤害，并加上你的感知调整值。除此之外，你还可以同时以一个自由动作使用威吓检定挫败目标的士气，在这次检定中，你获得相当于你的痛苦之击造成的非致命伤害量的加值。你每天可以使用此能力3+你的感知调整值次。此能力替换毁灭领域的毁灭打击能力。

entries.name: Painful Stare
entries.description:
When an attack that deals damage hits the target of a mesmerist閳ユ獨 hypnotic stare, the mesmerist can cause the target to take an amount of additional damage equal to 1/2 the mesmerist閳ユ獨 class level (minimum 1). The mesmerist can use this ability as a free action, and can use it even if it isn閳ユ獩 his turn. If the mesmerist uses this ability to increase his own damage, the additional damage increases by 1d6 points for every 3 class levels the mesmerist possesses. This damage is precision damage and is not multiplied on a critical hit.

  A mesmerist can trigger this ability only once per round, but a single creature can take damage from multiple mesmerists閳?painful stares in a round.

entries.name: Painful Strike
entries.description: At 1st level, when you confirm a critical hit, the target is sickened for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your bloodrager level (minimum 1). During this time, the creature must succeed at a concentration check (DC = 15 + the spell閳ユ獨 level) in order to cast a spell.

entries.name: Pale Horse
entries.description:
You can summon a @Compendium[pf1.spells.zpwd0f19q1lm04p3]{魅影驹}, as the spell, to serve you for a number of hours per day equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-hour increments.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 派头
entries.description:
游荡剑客不仅仅是一个穿着轻甲的战士，她还是个有派头的战斗者。游荡剑客使用时髦值作战：这是一种表示游荡剑客在战斗中完成惊人动作的能力的指标。在每天开始时，游荡剑客在时髦值上获得等于其魅力调整值的点数（至少为1）。时髦值在一天当中不停上下浮动，但一般不能高于游荡剑客的魅力调整值（至少为1），不过一些专长和魔法物品可能会影响这一最大值。游荡剑客花费时髦值来完成壮举（见下文），并通过下述方式恢复时髦值。

  轻型或单手穿刺近战武器重击：每当游荡剑客在战斗中使用轻型或单手穿刺武器重击并成功确认时，她恢复1点时髦值。对无助或无知觉的生物、或对生命骰数低于游荡剑客人物等级一半的生物造成重击，并不会恢复时髦值。

  使用轻型或单手穿刺近战武器做出致命一击：每当游荡剑客在战斗中使用轻型或单手穿刺武器将一个生物的生命值降至0或更低时，她恢复1点时髦值。破坏一个目标或其他无主物品，击杀无助、无知觉、或者生命骰数低于游荡剑客人物等级一半的生物，并不会恢复时髦值。

entries.name: Papercraft Tools
entries.description: Traditional thieves閳?tools might be suspicious, but no guard looks twice at a common deck of cards. So long has the rogue has access to a deck of cards, she can destroy one card to attempt a single Disable Device check as if she had a set of thieves tools. If she uses a harrow card for this purpose, she can treat the card as a set of masterwork thieves閳?tools (granting her a +2 circumstance bonus on the Disable Device check), though the card is still destroyed after use.

entries.name: 征战典范
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，萨满获得人类变巨术和死亡化身(deadly juggernaut,UC)法术效果，持续１分钟或解消。该能力每日使用次数为３＋萨满魅力调整值。

entries.name: 城市之尊
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，萨满呼唤一座城市最强大的杀戮之灵寄宿于他的体内，在接下来的1分钟（或是他自愿遣送该精魂离开前）之中，萨满获得相当于他萨满等级的游荡者的偷袭职业能力。萨满每天可以发动本的次数等同于3+他的魅力调整值次。

entries.name: 寄生畸胎
entries.description: 炼金术师的“畸变之臂”是他体内寄生畸胎的一部份，此畸胎包括一颗头、躯干和双手（来自“畸变之臂”科研发现）。通常此畸胎都陷在炼金术师的体内、只露出双手（如同“畸变之臂”），不过炼金术师可以用一个标准动作突显或是收纳畸胎。此畸胎是无助的，完全受到炼金术师的掌握，而且没办法被当作目标或伤害。每天一次，当炼金术师面对会让他昏迷、无助或会使他无法控制自己行动的心智效果时，他可以重骰豁免，成功表示畸胎吸收了此效果，而炼金术师则不受影响；不过在这段时间里，他没有办法使用畸胎的手臂，但装在上面的魔法装备仍然持续生效。在选择此科研发现前，炼金术师必须先选取两次“畸变之臂”。

entries.name: Pariah
entries.description: The witch can cause a creature within 60 feet to be shunned by its allies for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. Any other creature attempting to directly assist the target with a harmless spell or aid another action must attempt a Will save. If the save succeeds, the aiding creature is unaffected by this hex. If the save fails, the aiding creature can閳ユ獩 follow through, the action is lost, and the aiding creature can閳ユ獩 directly aid the target for the duration of this hex. This hex does not prevent the target from benefiting from area of effect spells.

entries.name: 错裂面纱
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以使用一个迅捷动作将此能力用于你施放的一个单一目标且可用意志豁免检定来避免或减弱其主要效果的法术上。如果目标抵御法术失败，则会因虚空的幻象导致短暂的精神错乱，继而困惑等于法术环级的轮数。受术者需要每轮做一次新的豁免检定来结束这个效果——这些额外得到的豁免机会只可用于额外受到的困惑效果而无法用于原法术的效果。错裂面纱是一个影响心灵的效果，你每日可以使用此能力的次数为“1/2牧师等级”

entries.name: Pass the Torch
entries.description: Once per day as a swift action, you can channel the energy of the apocalypse into your body, causing you to ignite. You take 1d4 points of fire damage when you activate this ability and again at the beginning of your turn until you end the effect. Any creature that begins its turn adjacent to you takes 1d6 points of fire damage as the fire spreads, plus 1 additional point of fire damage for each previous round you have had this ability active. For example, adjacent creatures take 1d6+5 points of damage if you have had this ability active for 5 rounds. You can use this ability for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level, and you can end this ability as a free action. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

entries.name: Past Life Evoker
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 0
Prerequisite samsaran

  Once per day, you can accept 1 point of burn to choose one simple blast wild talent belonging to any element. You gain the chosen simple blast wild talent for 1 minute, using your kineticist level 閳?2 to determine the blast talent閳ユ獨 damage.

  The simple blast wild talent you gain in this way does not allow you to meet any prerequisites.

entries.name: Past-Life Memories
entries.description: You add a bonus equal to half your psychic level (minimum 1) to all Knowledge checks and can attempt all Knowledge skill checks untrained.

entries.name: Path of the Snake
entries.description:
Once per day, as a standard action, you can become incorporeal. While in this form, you gain a +10 bonus on Stealth checks and can move in any direction and through any object (except for those made of force). You can take no action other than to move while in this form. You remain in this form for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level, but you can end this effect prematurely with a standard action.

  At 15th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

  You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Patient Insight
entries.description: When you attempt a Heal, Knowledge, Sense Motive, or Survival check, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool to roll the check twice and take the higher result.

entries.name: 耐心细致
entries.description: 你在交涉，察觉和察言观色技能检定上获得+2加值。

entries.name: Peace Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
