  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6orhthk4g27rncuu]{安定心神}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xhd6734dulevnwef]{风墙术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k3zn13pbr5tr9zac]{驱逐术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8hhy7qitegvb7a4]{Serenity}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.r37k9siiazcdqkc7]{回返真言}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5h7qpvgnqof7oku7]{力场监牢}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1mi4y3g4n8adtfl3]{嫌恶术}

entries.name: Peacebond
entries.description:
A witch can use this hex on a creature to prevent it from drawing a weapon for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 level. This hex has no effect on natural weapons or weapons already in a creature閳ユ獨 hands, but does prevent an archer from drawing arrows.

  A Will save negates this effect, and whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: Peafowl Aspect
entries.description:
Peafowl are popular ornamental birds due to their spectacular colors, and they are often symbols of royalty or the divine. A shifter using the alternate natural attacks rules on page 8 of Pathfinder Player Companion: Wilderness Origins can select a bite (B, P, S) or tail slap (B) attack.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 enhancement bonus to your Charisma score.

  At 8th level the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level it increases to +6.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Small peafowl. While in this form you gain low-light vision, a fly speed of 40 feet (clumsy), two talon attacks (1d3 damage), and a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks. A peafowl can閳ユ獩 use its fly speed to hover and must end any flying move action by landing or perching on a solid surface. A peafowl can perform a captivating dance targeting all creatures within a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone that can see your dance must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half your shifter level + your Charisma modifier) or be stunned for 1 round.

  At 8th level, the stunned effect lasts for 2 rounds, and at 15th level the duration increases to 4 rounds. Whether or not it succeeds at the initial save, a creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 24 hours.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S), tail slap (B)

entries.name: 无双架势
entries.description: 每日1次，拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以在一次特技动作检定中投掷两个骰子，并取其中较好的结果作为检定结果。她必须在进行检定前使用这一天赋。获得这一天赋之后每5个盗贼等级，盗贼可以每日多使用一次这一天赋。

entries.name: Peerless Speed
entries.description:
At 3rd level, you can tap into the power of the Astral閳ユ獨 enhanced magical nature to gain the ability to accelerate your spellcasting dramatically.

  Once per day as a swift action, you can cast one cantrip you know as though it were augmented by the @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发} metamagic feat, without altering the cantrip閳ユ獨 level.

  At 5th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the maximum level of the spell you can augment with this ability increases by 1, to a maximum of an 8th-level spell at 19th level. If you use this ability while on the Astral Plane or on any plane whose enhanced magic trait allows you to cast a spell as if augmented by @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发}, you can instead choose to augment the spell as though you had applied the @Compendium[pf1.feats.77gXSucrxfrE9yWk]{法术强效} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.J1yi4hFKYdXqZE3h]{法术极效} metamagic feats instead.

entries.name: Penetrating Bite
entries.description:
When using the animal fury rage power while raging, the barbarian閳ユ獨 bite is able to pierce most resistances.

  At 4th level, her bite is treated as a magic weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 7th level, her bite is also treated as cold iron and silver for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 10th level, her bite is also treated as a chaotic weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 16th level, her bite is treated as an adamantine weapon for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction and bypassing hardness.

  A barbarian must have the animal fury rage power and be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Penetrating Charge
entries.description: A penetrating charge is a bomb specifically designed to disable locks and similar mechanisms, though not other means of sealing a door, a container, or other sorts of devices. As a full-round action, the alchemist can place a penetrating charge on a lock. Instead of dealing damage, the penetrating charge seeps into the mechanism and eats away at it, granting a +5 circumstance bonus on any subsequent Disable Device checks against the mechanism. A creature can spend 10 minutes and attempt an appropriate Craft check (DC 15) to fix the lock and remove this bonus.

entries.name: Penetrating Infusion
entries.description:
Element air, fire, water; Type substance infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Associated Blasts blue flame, cold, electric, fire
Saving Throw none

  The intensity of your blasts allows you to break through your foes閳?resistances. Treat your foe閳ユ獨 cold, electricity, or fire resistance as if it were 5 lower for the purpose of determining the infused blast閳ユ獨 damage; this doesn閳ユ獩 stack with the reduction from searing flame.

  You can increase the burn cost of this infusion to further reduce the foe閳ユ獨 resistance against the infused blast by 5 per additional point of burn accepted. This has no effect on creatures with immunity.

entries.name: 侦搜
entries.description: 调查员可以使用察觉技能取代生存技能进行循迹和追踪（但DC和使用生存技能追踪相同），调查员必须在察觉技能上受训才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: Perfect Aid
entries.description:
You can effortlessly give aid to your allies, whether that means providing them with help attacking or defending them in the heat of combat. You gain Bodyguard as a bonus feat, and whenever you use the aid another action to provide a bonus on attack rolls or to AC to one of your allies, the bonus you provide increases by 1. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of +5 at 19th level). It doesn閳ユ獩 stack with other feats or class features that improve the bonus you provide when using the aid another action.

  This revelation also counts as the Combat Expertise feat, but only for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Swift Aid feat and any feat that lists Swift Aid as a prerequisite.

entries.name: Perfect Body
entries.description: Some practitioners of psychic techniques extend their training to improve their bodies as well as their minds. When the psychic casts a linked transmutation spell, she can spend 1 point from her phrenic pool to gain a +2 bonus on her next Reflex or Fortitude save.

entries.name: 完美明晰
entries.description: 当使用【心境澄明】狂暴之力时，野蛮人可以在幻术的识破机会和意志豁免上双骰取高。你必须先学会【心境澄明】才能选择“完美明晰”。

entries.name: Perfect Clarity (UC)
entries.description:
While in the calm stance, the barbarian can roll twice for any miss chances or Will saving throws to disbelieve illusions, taking the better result.

  A barbarian must have the calm stance rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: Perfect Fall
entries.description: As long as there is a wall or another surface within arm閳ユ獨 reach, the vigilante never takes falling damage. Even if no surface is available, he takes only half damage from falling and lands on his feet.

entries.name: 完美知识
entries.description: 萨满永久处于巧言术效果下。萨满所有知识间的、语言学检定、法术辨识检定获得＋１０表现加值。

entries.name: 超凡入圣
entries.description: 20级时，武僧变成魔法生物。从此以后，在考虑法术和魔法效果时，武僧都将永远被视为异界生物而不是原来的类人生物（或者武僧本来的生物类型）。同时，武僧获得了伤害减免“10/混乱”，即在受到非混乱武器攻击或没有类似伤害减免的生物进行的天生武器攻击时，武僧都可以忽略前10点伤害。和其他异界生物不同，武僧依然可以被复活，如同他还属于之前的生物类型一样。

entries.name: Perfect Self (UC)
entries.description:
At 20th level, a monk becomes a magical creature. He is forevermore treated as an outsider rather than a humanoid (or whatever his original creature type was) for the purpose of spells and magical effects.

  Additionally, the monk gains damage reduction 10/chaotic, which allows him to ignore the first 10 points of damage from any attack made by a nonchaotic weapon.

  Unlike other outsiders, the monk can still be brought back from the dead as if he were a member of his previous creature type.

  Finally, the monk gains the ability to enter a state of perfect calm. During this time, the monk can take no actions, but he does regain ki at the rate of 1 point per 10 minutes spent at calm. He cannot use this ability to gain an amount of ki in excess of his maximum.

entries.name: 完美之声
entries.description: 9级开始，你理解了所有用于沟通的声音，而你也懂得如何使自己的语言被所有智慧生物所理解。你可以听懂所有至少懂一种语言的生物的语言，并使他们听懂你的语言。你所施放的基于语言的法术DC提高1。

entries.name: Perfect Vulnerability
entries.description:
As a standard action, the vigilante can cleverly strike his foe where that foe is weakest. This attack targets the foe閳ユ獨 touch AC, and the foe is denied her Dexterity bonus against the attack. Once a foe has been the target of perfect vulnerability, she can閳ユ獩 be the target of the same vigilante閳ユ獨 perfect vulnerability for 24 hours.

  A vigilante must be at least 8th level to select this talent.

entries.name: Perfected Form
entries.description:
You maintain an unshakable sense of who you are, and no force can compel you to be anything else. You gain a +1 sacred (if your patron is good or neutral) or profane (if your patron is evil) bonus on saving throws against polymorph, petrification, and transmutation effects. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 cleric levels you have (maximum +5). Once per day when you succeed at a saving throw against such an effect, you can gain a surge of self-confidence as an immediate action that grants you a number of temporary hit points equal to your cleric level and a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, and saving throws; both effects last for 1 minute.

  This power replaces the Liberation power of the Liberation Domain or the Strength Surge power of the Strength Domain.

entries.name: 完美自我
entries.description: 8级开始，以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得等同你的法师等级一半（最高+10）的增强加值到单项属性上1轮。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于你的法师等级。

entries.name: 裁决：不懈
entries.description: 神授力量: 你的主神赐予你无穷的耐力，而你也誓言在信仰之敌伏法之前你绝不停止追击。你获得快步跟进（Step Up）作为奖励专长。

entries.name: 长效突变药剂
entries.description: 从14级开始，【突变药剂】的效果可以持续每等级1小时。

entries.name: 疫病血脉
entries.description:
在那魔法疫病横行的年代，你从母亲那疾病肆虐的子宫出生，抑或是在幼年时期所受的怪异脓疮，使你的血液中流窜着那衰败的瘟疫之力。

  本职技能: 医疗.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{魅惑动物} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vxi9c3xwa83xthka]{飞虫走兽} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{疫病术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zonwg3yt8pswj03y]{驱离害虫} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdp0mts5razk0qms]{疫病虫群} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.51ob5y7phwlhcuzz]{真言术 死} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nNVFVFRBCT4O2ab9]{调制药剂},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8VZQJOyAXbXghxd7]{自给自足},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (知识：自然),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: 虫类生物会受到你的影响心灵法术影响，同时在施展心灵影响法术时他们被视为动物。

entries.name: 疫病息吹
entries.description:
15 级起，你身体中的疫病使你的呼吸也同样的致命。每天一次以一个标准动作，你可以呼出一个30尺锥状的疫病之云，在这个恶心气体中的活物都必须通过单次豁免 （检定豁免DC=1/2术士等级+魅力调整值），否则就会同时染上两种疾病。受术者会立即承受疾病的初始效果，并且使用玩者手册P.557页有关疾病的发 作频率及嗣后豁免难度的说明。17级时，每天可使用此能力的次数变成2，20级时你每天可以使用本能力3次。

  疫病的种类必须由下表选取：失明症（blinding sickness）、黑死病（bubonic plague）、失心热（cackle fever）、腐热症（filth fever）、痲疯（ leprosy）、心炎症（mindfire）、红肿痛（red ache）、黏滑病（slimy doom）、颤抖症（shakes）。

替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wvpa1pt2gyh75g3x]{石化之触}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.361rc74674l3zt9a]{石化术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g52zx1t1giteg5h1]{雕像术}

entries.name: Petrifying Strike
entries.description: Whenever the rogue damages a creature with one of her sneak attacks, she also deals 2 points of Dexterity damage to that creature as its body petrifies.

entries.name: 魅影学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 幻术学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代幻术学派的失明射线跟隐形力场能力。

entries.name: Phantasmagoric Display
entries.description: The shaman can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.mb819hvwpk0zmw53]{虹光喷射}, each once per day with a caster level equal to her shaman level.

entries.name: Phantasmal Assault
entries.description:
At 13th level, you learn to harness your psychic force against all forms of haunts and undead creatures. Your mind-affecting spells that deal damage can now be used against haunts and undead normally immune to mind-affecting effects (including mindless undead). These spells are treated as though they dealt positive energy damage. This affects only spells that deal purely psychic-based damage (such as psychic crush, mind thrust, or synapse overload); effects based on physical effects (such as telekinetic projectile or telekinetic storm) don閳ユ獩 benefit from this ability. Additional non-damaging effects from such spells don閳ユ獩 affect the haunt, unless it would be normally affected.

  When you use a mind-affecting effect that deals damage against a possessed creature, the possessing entity takes a 閳? penalty on the saving throw against the mind-affecting attack.

entries.name: Phantom
entries.description:
A spiritualist begins play with the aid of a powerful and versatile spirit entity called a phantom. The phantom forms a link with the spiritualist, who forever after can either harbor the creature within her consciousness or manifest it as an ectoplasmic or incorporeal entity. A phantom has the same alignment as the spiritualist, and it can speak all the languages its master can. A spiritualist can harbor her phantom in her consciousness, manifest it partially, or fully manifest it. A fully manifested phantom is treated as a summoned creature from the Ethereal Plane, except it is not sent back to the Ethereal Plane until it is reduced to a negative amount of hit points equal to or greater than its Constitution score.

A spiritualist can fully manifest her phantom through a ritual that takes 1 minute to perform. When the phantom is fully manifested, the spiritualist can change the form of the phantom閳ユ獨 manifestation (either from ectoplasmic to incorporeal or vice versa) as a full-round action that provokes attacks of opportunity. When the phantom manifests, its hit points are unchanged from the last time it manifested, unless the phantom was slain and returned to the Ethereal Plane; in this case, the phantom manifests with half its maximum number of hit points. The phantom does not heal naturally, and can be healed only with magic or by being tended to with the Heal skill while fully manifested in ectoplasmic form. The phantom stays fully manifested until it is either returned to the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness (a standard action) or banished to the Ethereal Plane. If the phantom is banished to the Ethereal Plane, it can閳ユ獩 return to the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness or manifest again for 24 hours.

While fully manifested, a phantom can閳ユ獩 be returned to the Ethereal Plane by means of dispel magic, but spells such as dismissal and banishment work normally. Whenever the spiritualist is unconscious or asleep, the phantom immediately returns to the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness. If the spiritualist dies, the phantom is returned to the Ethereal Plane, and can閳ユ獩 return to the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness until 24 hours after the spiritualist is brought back to life. A phantom can閳ユ獩 be dismissed or banished (by a spell or any other similar effect) while it resides in the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness, as the phantom is protected from such effects by the power of the spiritualist閳ユ獨 psyche.

Fully manifested phantoms can wear armor and use items (though not wield weapons) appropriate to their forms. Any items worn, carried, or held by a phantom are dropped when the phantom returns to the spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness, and must be retrieved and donned anew if the phantom wishes to use them when it fully manifests in the future.

Phantoms are self-involved, even jealous, creatures that do not play well with other summoned companions. A phantom refuses to manifest (either fully or as part of a bonded manifestation) in the presence of an eidolon or shadow summoned by the phantom閳ユ獨 master. Furthermore, if a phantom is manifested when such a creature is summoned, it immediately retreats into its spiritualist閳ユ獨 consciousness, and will not manifest again until the eidolon or shadow is dismissed.

A fully manifested phantom閳ユ獨 abilities, feats, Hit Dice, saving throws, and skills are tied to the spiritualist閳ユ獨 class level and increase as the spiritualist gains levels.

entries.name: Phantom Limb
entries.description:
The alchemist can manifest a ghostly, incorporeal arm that juts out from his torso. This phantom limb does not grant the alchemist any extra attacks or actions per round, and it cannot hold or grab anything (including incorporeal objects). The alchemist may use his phantom limb to make a touch attack against a foe as a standard action, scraping away at the very fibers of the victim閳ユ獨 soul. This attack deals 1d4 points of damage per alchemist level (Fortitude half ). Creatures that are immune to incorporeal attacks are immune to this damage, but otherwise the damage bypasses all forms of damage reduction except DR/ epic. The alchemist may suppress or activate this ability as a free action, and can use his phantom limb for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + his Intelligence modifier (these rounds need not be consecutive).

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level to select this discovery.

entries.name: Phantom Recall
entries.description:
At 6th level, as either a swift or an immediate action, a spiritualist can call her manifested phantom to her side or back into her consciousness. This ability functions as dimension door, using the spiritualist閳ユ獨 class level as the caster level. When the spiritualist calls the phantom in this way, the phantom appears adjacent to the spiritualist (or as close as possible, if all adjacent spaces are occupied).

When the spiritualist uses this ability to call the phantom back to her consciousness, she can activate bonded manifestation as part of that action, but doing so costs 1 extra round of bonded manifestation.

The spiritualist can use this ability once per day at 6th level, plus one additional time per day for every 4 spiritualist levels she possesses beyond 6th.

entries.name: Phantom Stampede
entries.description:
The shaman summons a host of ghostly herd beasts to trample a single creature. These phantom beasts affect only the target creature, which is buffeted and pummeled by their passing. The creature takes no damage from the ability, but takes a 閳? penalty to its CMD against bull rush, overrun, and trip attempts. Additionally, spellcasters under the effect of this ability take a 閳? penalty on concentration checks. The target receives no saving throw to negate this effect.

  This effect lasts a number of rounds equal to the shaman閳ユ獨 level.

  The creature can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: 幻象之触
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以透过一次近战接触攻击让一个活物陷入战栗之中，持续时间相当于先知等级一半（至少1轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Pheremones
entries.description: The alchemist exudes an imperceptible musk that grants him a permanent +3 competence bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate checks.

entries.name: 慈善魔法
entries.description: 当奥能师以一个或更多盟友(不包括他自己)为目标施放法术时，奥能师可从【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点给予这些盟友临时生命，数值等同于奥能师法术的法术等级(spell level)。这些临时生命可以与其他来源的临时生命相叠加，但是多次使用该技艺获得的临时生命不叠加。这些临时生命持续1分钟/施法者等级或直到消散。

entries.name: Philologist
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can reroll any Linguistics skill check made to decipher writing in an unfamiliar language, and never risks drawing a false conclusion from a failed Wisdom check after a failed Linguistics check. A rogue with this talent is allowed only one reroll per inscription, message, or text encountered.

entries.name: 贤者之石
entries.description: 炼金术师学会了如何制造＜贤者之石＞。每月1次，他可以花费1天时间制作一颗贤者之石。

entries.name: Philosopher's Touch
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus and touch a weapon, causing it to gain the properties of a special material. You can cause the weapon to be treated as cold iron or silver for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction for 1 minute per occultist level you possess.

  At 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, you can touch an additional weapon as part of using this ability to grant that weapon the same benefit (still expending only 1 point of mental focus).

  At 11th level, you can cause any weapon affected by this ability to act as if it were adamantine instead (but only for the purposes of overcoming damage reduction, not for overcoming hardness).

entries.name: Phoenix Bloodline
entries.description:
One of your ancestors bore witness to a phoenix閳ユ獨 resurrection and formed a bond with the magical creature.

  The resurrecting flames still course through your veins, surging with power.

  本职技能: 知识(Arcana).

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qcjskol4ac3eemhy]{七彩喷射} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1i8b1v3dngkxj6jp]{反邪恶法阵} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pgsw180d62ekw83m]{Path Of The Winds} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.hfca2lb4tlmrzoxm]{火焰纹章} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ijwcwnt3oatnfghq]{虹光法墙} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{火焰之躯} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}, 
  • Elemental Focus (fire),
  •  Fast Healer,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (@JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：奥秘).

  血统奥秘: When casting any spell that deals fire damage, you can instead heal your targets. The spell deals no damage, and living creatures affected by the spell instead regain a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage the spell would normally deal.

entries.name: Phoenix Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
One of your ancestors may have witnessed the fiery resurrection of a phoenix or been healed by the grace of this legendary bird. Whatever the case, the flames of the phoenix burn brightly within your soul, filling you with an inextinguishable vitality that can withstand the most harrowing of assaults. When you bloodrage, vibrant energy boils forth from beneath your skin, granting you both the soothing warmth to heal a friend閳ユ獨 wounds and the brutal power to burn flesh from bone. Your rage is an awesome and terrible thing to behold, as the raw power of your untamed life force can allow you to pull yourself back from the grasp of death itself.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JNlMhMhcDO8wkXiw]{重击专攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{顽强}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{灵活移动}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lndeaqm2j2nvgm6p]{燃烧之手} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fxz69pwpqt9b6uss]{次等复原术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.norn02g8zdsspf2j]{治疗重伤} (13th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾} (16th)

entries.name: Phoenix Fire
entries.description: The power of the phoenix brings righteous destruction to any who oppose it. At 20th level, while bloodraging, you gain the following effects: your melee attacks deal an additional 2d6 points of fire damage, any enemies within 20 feet of you must succeed at a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier) or take 4d6 points of fire damage at the start of their turn, and any creature that attacks you with a natural or non-reach weapon takes 1d6 points of fire damage (no save) with each successful hit.

entries.name: Photokinetic Infusion
entries.description:
Element wood; Type substance infusion; Level 1; Burn 1
Prerequisite positive blast
Associated Blasts positive
Saving Throw none

  Your blast damages living creatures with light. This deals normal damage to undead creatures but also deals minimum damage (1 point of damage per d6, can閳ユ獩 be increased by the 9th-level improvement to metakinesis) to living creatures.

  Undead creatures that are particularly vulnerable to sunlight, such as vampires, take 1 extra point of damage per die from the infused blast.

entries.name: 光合作用
entries.description: 3级开始，你可以通过自然养分自我供给。你对进食和睡眠的需求降低了，就如同穿戴“维生戒指（ring of sustenance）”一般。此外，你在对毒素和睡眠效果的豁免检定上获得+2种族加值。在9级时，这一加值变为+4。

entries.name: Phrenic Amplifications
entries.description:
A psychic develops particular techniques to empower her spellcasting, called phrenic amplifications. The psychic can activate a phrenic amplification only while casting a spell using psychic magic, and the amplification modifies either the spell閳ユ獨 effects or the process of casting it. The spell being cast is called the linked spell.

  The psychic can activate only one amplification each time she casts a spell, and doing so is part of the action used to cast the spell. She can use any amplification she knows with any psychic spell, unless the amplification閳ユ獨 description states that it can be linked only to certain types of spells.

  A psychic learns one phrenic amplification at 1st level, selected from the list below. At 3rd level and every 4 levels thereafter, the psychic learns a new phrenic amplification.

  A phrenic amplification can閳ユ獩 be selected more than once. Once a phrenic amplification has been selected, it can閳ユ獩 be changed.

  Phrenic amplifications require the psychic to expend 1 or more points from her phrenic pool to function.

entries.name: Phrenic Pool
entries.description:
A psychic has a pool of supernatural mental energy that she can draw upon to manipulate psychic spells as she casts them. The maximum number of points in a psychic閳ユ獨 phrenic pool is equal to 1/2 her psychic level + her Wisdom or Charisma modifier, as determined by her psychic discipline.

  The phrenic pool is replenished each morning after 8 hours of rest or meditation; these hours don閳ユ獩 need to be consecutive. The psychic might be able to recharge points in her phrenic pool in additional circumstances dictated by her psychic discipline.

  Points gained in excess of the pool閳ユ獨 maximum are lost.

entries.name: Phrenic Strike
entries.description: As long as the psychic has at least 1 point in her phrenic pool, she can attempt an unarmed strike in place of a touch attack as part of casting a spell with a range of touch. This unarmed attack still provokes attacks of opportunity as normal unless the psychic can otherwise make unarmed attacks without provoking attacks of opportunity.

entries.name: Physical Composite Blast
entries.description: Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies. Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts. Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st; energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

entries.name: 体能增强
entries.description: 你在一项身体属性（力量，敏捷，体质）上获得+1增强加值。此奖励之后每5级增加1。20级达到最大+5。在每天准备法术时，你能够改变此加值到一项新属性上。20级时，此奖励被加到两项你所选定的身体属性上。

entries.name: Physical Kinetic Blade
entries.description:
Element(s) universal; Type form infusion; 等级 1; Burn 1
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

You form a weapon using your kinetic abilities. You create a non-reach, light or one-handed weapon in your hand formed of pure energy or elemental matter. (If you閳ユ獧e a telekineticist, you instead transfer the power of your kinetic blast to any object held in one hand.) The kinetic blade閳ユ獨 shape is purely cosmetic and doesn閳ユ獩 affect the damage dice, critical threat range, or critical multiplier of the kinetic blade, nor does it grant the kinetic blade any weapon special features. The object held by a telekineticist for this form infusion doesn閳ユ獩 prevent her from using gather power.

You can use this form infusion once as part of an attack action, a charge action, or a full-attack action in order to make melee attacks with your kinetic blade. Since it閳ユ獨 part of another action (and isn閳ユ獩 an action itself), using this wild talent doesn閳ユ獩 provoke any additional attacks of opportunity. The kinetic blade deals your kinetic blast damage on each hit (applying any modifiers to your kinetic blast閳ユ獨 damage as normal, but not your Strength modifier). The blade disappears at the end of your turn. The weapon deals the same damage type that your kinetic blast deals, and it interacts with Armor Class and spell resistance as normal for a blast of its type. Even if a telekineticist uses this power on a magic weapon or another unusual object, the attack doesn閳ユ獩 use any of the magic weapon閳ユ獨 bonuses or effects and simply deals the telekineticist閳ユ獨 blast damage. The kinetic blade doesn閳ユ獩 add the damage bonus from elemental overflow.

entries.name: Physical Kinetic Blast
entries.description:
At 1st level, a kineticist gains a kinetic blast wild talent of her choice. This kinetic blast must be a simple blast that matches her element. Simple blasts are listed with their corresponding elements.

  As a standard action, the kineticist can unleash a kinetic blast at a single target up to a range of 30 feet. She must have at least one hand free to aim the blast (or one prehensile appendage, if she doesn閳ユ獩 have hands). All damage from a kinetic blast is treated as magic for the purpose of bypassing damage reduction. Kinetic blasts count as a type of weapon for the purpose of feats such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{武器专攻}. The kineticist is never considered to be wielding or gripping the kinetic blast (regardless of effects from form infusions; see Infusion), and she can閳ユ獩 use @Compendium[pf1.feats.26k1Gi7t5BoqxhIj]{要害打击} feats with kinetic blasts. Even the weakest kinetic blast involves a sizable mass of elemental matter or energy, so kinetic blasts always deal full damage to swarms of any size (though only area blasts deal extra damage to swarms). A readied kinetic blast can be used to counterspell any spell of equal or lower level that shares its descriptor. A kinetic blast that deals energy damage of any type (including force) has the corresponding descriptor.

  Each simple blast is either a physical blast or an energy blast.

  Physical blasts are ranged attacks that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6+1 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6+1 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st. Spell resistance doesn閳ユ獩 apply against physical blasts.

  Energy blasts are ranged touch attacks that deal an amount of damage equal to 1d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 1d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  Composite blasts combine elements to form a new blast. When a kineticist gains a new element through expanded element, she gains access to all composite blasts for which she qualifies. All composite blasts are listed after the kineticist elements.

  Most composite blasts are either physical or energy blasts, like simple blasts.

  Physical composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6+2 + the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6+2 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  Energy composite blasts deal an amount of damage equal to 2d6 + 1/2 the kineticist閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier, increasing by 2d6 for every 2 kineticist levels beyond 1st.

  • A complete listing of kinetic blasts and composite blasts can be found within the Kineticist Elements page, here: Kineticist Elements

entries.name: Physical Push
entries.description:
By channeling your psychic energy, you can make your body capable of greater physical feats. When you attempt a Strength-, Dexterity-, or Constitution-based ability check or skill check, you can gain a bonus on the check equal to your Wisdom bonus.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier. Using this ability is part of the action used to attempt the skill check (if any). If you succeed at the check, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool.

entries.name: Physical Regression
entries.description: At 13th level, you can spend 2 points from your phrenic pool as a standard action once per day to take on the form of one of your previous incarnations. This ability functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.d40ia71c2eljm91k]{变形术} spell, but its range is personal and its duration becomes 10 minutes per caster level.

entries.name: Pickled Quasit
entries.description:
The alchemist has learned how to seal a quasit in a bottle, which he can prepare for use as an extract. When the alchemist activates the extract, he throws the bottle at a square within 30 feet, releasing the quasit. The quasit is not under the alchemist閳ユ獨 control, but is otherwise treated as a summoned creature. The quasit remains for 1 round per caster level, then collapses into its associated elements. If the alchemist has the infusion discovery, another character can use the infused specimen. Creating a pickled quasit requires a 4th-level extract.

  An alchemist must be at least 10th level to select this discovery.

entries.name: Pierce the Darkness
entries.description: The rogue can extend her senses of hearing and smell in darkness or when blinded. She gains blindsense out to a range of 5 feet, but only against creatures concealed by darkness or her own blindness. She still suffers the normal miss chance for attacking creatures with concealment.

entries.name: 稳守门户
entries.description: 在8级时，如果骑士使用单手或轻型武器进行防御式战斗或使用寓守于攻专长，那么他每轮发动的第一次近战攻击在攻击检定上不承受减值。如果他使用双武器战斗，那么只要他在副手使用轻型武器，每轮他两把武器的第一次攻击都不会承受上述减值。双头武器不会享有本能力的好处。

entries.name: 洞察阴影
entries.description:
暗影在你和（xiong）善(e)的眼(mu)神(guang)下退避,给予你哪怕是在最深的黑暗中的视觉。

  你获得60尺黑暗视觉。如果你已经拥有黑暗视觉，把你现存的黑暗视觉增加60尺，在11级时，你可以完美的在任何黑暗中看东西，甚至在绝对黑暗，亦或者是被深幽黑暗术创造的黑暗之中。

entries.name: 穿透面纱
entries.description: 你和黑暗帷幕中异界生物的连结让你可以看透黑暗，你得到60尺的黑暗视觉。11级时你可以看穿任何种类的黑暗，就算处在绝对黑暗下或是在“深幽黑暗术”的影响之下。

entries.name: Pillar
entries.description:
Element earth, water, wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite kinetic cover

  You create a 5-foot-by-5-foot pillar of ice, packed dirt, or tangled roots with a height of up to 15 feet. This takes 1 full round, during which time the ground within the affected area rumbles conspicuously, but it rises only at the end of the round. You can閳ユ獩 create a pillar in an area occupied by or adjacent to any creatures unless all such creatures are willing, and if an unwilling creature moves into the area before the pillar finishes rising, it can disrupt and foil the pillar. As the pillar springs into existence, willing creatures and objects within the affected area are lifted with it.

The pillar can閳ユ獩 be used to crush creatures or objects against the ceiling; if insufficient room is available for the pillar and any creatures or objects on it, the pillar reaches only the maximum possible height. You can閳ユ獩 create a pillar under a Large or larger creature.

The pillar has AC 4, hardness 0, and 3 hit points per kineticist level. Scaling the pillar閳ユ獨 rough edges requires a successful DC 15 Climb check. When destroyed, when you create a new pillar, or when a number of rounds equal to your Constitution bonus (minimum 1) have elapsed, the pillar crumbles, melts, or withers away, gently lowering anything on it back to the ground.

entries.name: Pincers (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon grows a large pincers at the end of one pair of its limbs, giving it two pincer attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The pincers deal 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). Eidolons with the grab evolution linked to pincers gain a +2 bonus on CMB checks made to grapple. The eidolon must have the limbs (arms) evolution to take this evolution. Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws from its base form with pincers (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the limbs evolution.

entries.name: Pincers (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype.

  An eidolon grows large pincers at the ends of one pair of its limbs, giving it two pincer attacks. These attacks are secondary attacks. The pincers deal 1d6 points of damage (1d8 if Large, 2d6 if Huge). Eidolons with the grab evolution linked to their pincers gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks to grapple.

  The eidolon must have the limbs (arms) evolution to take this evolution. Alternatively, the eidolon can replace the claws from its base form with pincers (this still costs 1 evolution point).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of limbs (arms) evolutions the eidolon possesses.

entries.name: Pitiful Foe
entries.description:
You can temporarily curse one target within 30 feet as a standard action, making it pitiful and ineffective in battle. While this ability is in effect, the target is never considered to be threatening you or your allies, even if it is armed and you or your allies are standing in a square into which it can make a melee attack. If the target rolls a natural 20 on an attack roll or saving throw, the attack or saving throw is not an automatic success (as would be normal) and whether it is successful is instead determined normally. Additionally, the target automatically fails all rolls to confirm critical hits. This curse lasts for 1 round per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1). A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. This is a mind-affecting curse effect.

  You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 7th and 15th levels.

entries.name: 瘟疫炸弹
entries.description: 这种炸弹散发出具有“疫病术”效果的烟雾取代“云雾术”，充满两倍炸弹的波及范围，持续每炼金术师等级1轮的时间。炼金术师必须达到8级且选择过“烟雾炸弹”才能选择此科研发现。

entries.name: 疫病神
entries.description: 3级起，反圣骑士成为所有堕落秽邪疾病的带原者。反圣骑士不会受到任何疾病的负面影响如伤害或减值，但他仍可身怀此疾病将其传染给他人。

entries.name: 瘟疫使者
entries.description: 20级起，你的接触攻击、近战武器攻击或接触类型法术都会使敌人染上木乃伊热（Mummy Rot），虽然你可以选择以一个迅捷动作使这一能力失效一轮。受术者可以以强韧豁免来消解木乃伊热，豁免DC=10+1/2术士等级+魅力调整值。

entries.name: 疫病秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.aa0w7tk852iqn3ni]{侦测死灵}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h1ankl1l77kmnpke]{命令死灵}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{疫病术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8uwmrygxgih1fb57]{操纵死尸}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pa6mgkl4caihdrhm]{巨虫术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c1e7f0ct04k270wy]{唤起死灵}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wkp8u7xl1dgpk362]{操控死灵}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j209j280fyqccq61]{唤起高等死灵}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.khfprkujokr9uigq]{吸能术}

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c3iz720zjv922b6j]{Ray of Sickening}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{疫病术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7l7wofgz2iafjsdr]{Plague Storm}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}

entries.name: Plague Vector
entries.description:
The effects of the alchemist閳ユ獨 plague bomb operate as normal except for the following changes. The chosen disease閳ユ獨 save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + his Intelligence modifier. Any creatures affected by the chosen disease become vectors for it, spreading the disease to any creatures they come in physical contact with for a number of days equal to the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier (minimum 1). The save DC to avoid contracting the disease from the vector is the same as the DC used for this discovery.

  An alchemist must be at least 14th level and must have the plague bomb discovery to select this discovery.

entries.name: Plague's Caress
entries.description: At 1st level, you can make a melee touch attack as a standard action that causes a living creature閳ユ獨 flesh to break out into rancid-smelling pustules and sores for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your sorcerer level (minimum 1 round). These sores cause the victim to become sickened for the duration of the effect; this is a disease effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Plagued Curse
entries.description:
You suffer from minor ailments and sicknesses. While you struggle to resist new diseases, you have grown accustomed to the many inconveniences of sickness. You take a 閳? penalty on all saving throws against disease or infestation effects, but you are immune to the sickened condition.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.y7aqxf7alib6ld6t]{疱疹咒} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, increase the save DC of any disease effect you create by +2, and you raise the number of saves required to recover naturally from these diseases by 1.

  At 15th level, you are immune to the effects of disease and infestations, but you can still function as a carrier for sickness.

entries.name: Planar haze
entries.description:
You can fill an area with the smoky miasma of the Outer Rifts. Once per day when you cast a spell that has an area, as a swift action you may also fill that area with a thick haze that acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}, except it originates at the center of your spell effect and cannot expand beyond the spell閳ユ獨 area.

  At 10th level, the haze functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}.

  You may use this ability one additional time per day at 7th level, and one additional time per day at 14th level.

entries.name: 位面猎手
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：当魔战士使用【奥能力池】强化武器时，他可额外花费一点奥能将〈位面〉特性加在他的武器上，或是额外花费2点奥能将〈闭锁〉特性加在他的武器上。

entries.name: 位面污染
entries.description: 每日一次，用一个标准动作，你可以让一个20尺扩散的区域充满轻度的混乱或邪恶界域特性，此效果持续的轮数等同于你的先知等级。在混乱位面影响区域中，守序的生物基于魅力的检定会承受-2环境减值，邪恶位面对于善良的生物也有同样的效果。在十一级，位面污染的效果变得更加强大，将对相对阵营的生物基于感知、智力、魅力的检定造成-2的环境减值，这些减值和低等级时的效果叠加〔所以总共让基于魅力的检定-4〕。你必须要身为混乱或邪恶阵营才有办法选择此启示，而且你只能启动和你阵营组成相符的位面效果〔混乱善良只能启动混乱效果，中立邪恶也只能发动邪恶污染。〕

entries.name: Planar Knowledge
entries.description: As an infernal binder, you gain a +3 bonus on @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：位面 checks.

entries.name: Planar Scent
entries.description: You can intuitively sense disruptions in the cosmos. This ability functions as a constant detect magic, but only for effects of the conjuration (calling), conjuration (summoning), conjuration (teleport), and illusion (shadow) subschools. You gain a +2 insight bonus on Spellcraft checks to identify such effects.

entries.name: Planar Ward
entries.description: As a standard action, you can expend 2 points of mental focus to surround yourself with a planar ward. Creatures not native to the plane that you are currently on take a 閳? penalty on attacks against you, and you receive a +4 circumstance bonus on saving throws against the spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities of such creatures. This ward lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: 自然先锋
entries.description: 在10级时，你能以一个标准动作召唤一个自然界的勇士与你并肩作战。这相当于一个法术四级召唤自然盟友的效果，持续一分钟。不过你只能召唤一只动物，这个动物的生物类型将转变为为植物。在10级后的每2个等级，这个能力的效果就上升一个等级，最高在20级达到九级召唤自然盟友。

entries.name: 猛烈生长
entries.description: 在1级时，如果你的一次近战攻击成功命中，那么你可以以一个迅捷动作使被攻击的目标立刻开始发芽和长出扰人的藤蔓。这个生物将被纠缠1轮（反射豁免通过则无效）。

entries.name: Plant Disguise
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0

  You can assume the shape of an immobile plant, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ho3wsspkqkhypt0]{树化术} but transforming into any ordinary Small or Medium plant.

entries.name: 植物领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你得到植物的庇护，能够生长出防御用的棘刺，也能够与植物沟通交流。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{树肤术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tvhm9lzgnjlcucsn]{植物滋长}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wi9uvm8p12qvq616]{命令植物}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nqfoy30smshc3c6w]{棘墙术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ipc85wy0f0lmr0l4]{驱离木材}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qt0xmkag6ahtvesm]{活化植物}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.szzwom7utm3sm15z]{操控植物}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bp4s030vn5iwwf58]{蔓生术}

entries.name: Plant Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2nn2tshkn4p7k25l]{纠缠术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3fkwj6d8s65ufwar]{加速毒发}

entries.name: Plant Puppet
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0

  You can control plants, causing them to attack your foes. This functions as the aether puppet wild talent, except it controls plants instead of objects.

  At 12th level, you can grant hardness 5 to Large and larger animated plants.

entries.name: Poetic Inspiration
entries.description: At 8th level, an order of the songbird samurai can speak a few words as a swift action, inspiring allies to great deeds. Allies within 30 feet who can hear the samurai gain a competence bonus equal to her Charisma modifier on attack and weapon damage rolls for 1 round. This ability can be used once per combat.

entries.name: Poetic Vengeance
entries.description:
You constantly plot and scheme to take your revenge against those who wrong you. Once per day as an immediate action, after an enemy successfully affects you with an attack (whether with a spell, a physical attack, or any other sort of attack), you can force the enemy to take half the effects of its own attack unless it succeeds on a Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 your oracle level + your Charisma modifier). Any damage from the attack is halved, and non-damaging effects have a 50% chance to apply. If the non-damaging effect has a DC, the enemy receives a saving throw against it, at either the DC of the original effect or the DC of this ability, whichever is lower.

  At 10th level, you can use this ability twice per day, and at 20th level you can use it three times per day.

entries.name: Poison (2 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon secretes toxic venom, gaining a poison attack. Pick one bite or sting attack. Whenever the selected attack hits, the target is poisoned. 

  Eidolon poison閳ユ敄ype poison (injury); save Fort negates; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d4 Str damage; cure 1 save. The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Constitution modifier. For 2 additional evolution points, this poison deals Constitution damage instead. This poison can be used no more than once per round.

  The summoner must be at least 7th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Poison (UC) (2 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th; daemon, demon, devil, elemental, or protean subtype; bite or sting evolution.

  The eidolon secretes toxic venom, gaining a poison attack. Select one bite or sting attack. Whenever the selected attack hits, the target is poisoned.

Eidolon Poison: Injury; save Fort negates; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d4 Str damage; cure 1 save.

The save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 the eidolon閳ユ獨 Hit Dice + the eidolon閳ユ獨 Constitution modifier.

  For 2 additional evolution points, this poison deals Constitution damage instead. This poison can be used no more than once per round.

entries.name: 毒气炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师的炼金炸弹现在会引发一片死云，以“死云术”取代“云雾术”效果，覆盖范围是炸弹溅射范围的两倍，持续时间为每炼金术师等级1轮。选择这一科研发现需要12级炼金术师等级，且已学会“烟雾炸弹”。

entries.name: 毒素转换
entries.description: 花费1分钟，炼金术师可以转换一剂量毒剂的生效方式（接触、食入、吸入或伤口）为另外一种。举例来说，一个炼金术师可以将小蜈蚣毒（Small centipede Poison）由伤口感染转换为吸入感染。你必须在炼金术实验室中才能使用此能力。要选择此科研发现，炼金术师必须达到6级。

entries.name: Poison Fangs
entries.description:
At 12th level, you gain the poison special attack, tied to your bite attack. Your poison is as follows:

  bite閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC = 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Con damage; cure 1 save.

entries.name: Poison Lore
entries.description: An investigator has a deep understanding and appreciation for poisons. At 2nd level, he cannot accidentally poison himself when applying poison to a weapon. If the investigator spends 1 minute physically examining the poison, he can attempt a @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：自然 check to identify any natural poison or @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：神秘 check to identify any magical poison (DC = the poison閳ユ獨 saving throw DC). Lastly, once a poison is identified, he can spend 1 minute and attempt a 工艺： (alchemy) check (DC = the poison閳ユ獨 saving throw DC) to neutralize 1 dose of the poison. Success renders the dose harmless. The investigator has no chance of accidentally poisoning himself when examining or attempting to neutralize a poison.

entries.name: 毒性抗力
entries.description: 从第2级开始，炼金术师在所有的毒性对抗检定上获得+2加值。这一抗力在5级时升为+4，在8级时升为+6。10级时，炼金术师对毒药完全免疫。

entries.name: Poison Resistance (INV)
entries.description: At 2nd level, an investigator gains a +2 bonus on all saving throws against poison. This bonus increases to +4 at 5th level, and to +6 at 8th level. At 11th level, the investigator becomes completely immune to poison.

entries.name: 浸毒
entries.description: .  女巫可以使用她的大釜来精炼用于注入水果和其他佳肴的剧毒，食用这些致命美食后如同受到‘毒击术’法术效果。精炼剧毒并注入美食共需耗时1小时，共计能够影响1磅重的食物。食品的毒性存留24小时，毒性不能转移到其他物体。食物口味正常，但魔法检测将显示它有毒性。女巫必须拥有【魔釜】巫术才能选择此巫术。

entries.name: 毒性之触
entries.description: 炼金术师获得了毒性之触，有如处于‘毒击术’之下，他能以一个自由动作启动或关闭这一能力。至于这种毒性被创造和传递时的外观如何，则因炼金术师而异。

entries.name: 用毒
entries.description: 杀手接受过使用毒剂的训练，不会在为武器淬毒时意外中毒。

entries.name: 用毒
entries.description: 杀手接受过使用毒剂的训练，不会在为武器淬毒时意外中毒。

entries.name: Poisoned Explosive
entries.description:
When an alchemist creates a bomb, he can apply a dose of contact or injury poison to it, as if applying poison to a weapon. If the poisoned bomb hits its target, the bomb deals damage as normal, but the target must also succeed at a saving throw against the poison or be affected by that poison. No other creatures are affected by the poison.

  An alchemist must be at least 4th level and have the poison use class feature before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Poisoner
entries.description:
The vigilante gains the alchemist閳ユ獨 poison use class feature. At 6th level, when he has 5 doses of a single kind of poison, he can synthesize a dose of that poison once per day at no cost. This process takes 1 minute. It doesn閳ユ獩 expend the 5 doses of poison, but the doses must be in the vigilante閳ユ獨 possession to perform the synthesis. The poison produced requires careful storage and special skill to use. It becomes inert if it leaves the vigilante閳ユ獨 possession and can閳ユ獩 be sold.

  The vigilante can maintain only 1 dose of synthesized poison for every 5 doses of that poison in his possession.

entries.name: Politics Inquisition
entries.description: 神授力量: Your divine guidance twists agreements, laws, and policies to suit the interests of the faith.

entries.name: Pollute Water
entries.description:
The witch can corrupt bodies of water with foul energies. This functions as the blight hex, except it affects only either an area of standing water or a creature with the aquatic or water subtype. A creature of any type that drinks water from a polluted area must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or become nauseated for 1d3 rounds and afflicted as if blighted with the blight hex curse.

  A creature that succeeds at this saving throw is immune to the effects of polluted water from this area for 24 hours.

  Polluted water does not quench thirst.

entries.name: Polluting Glance
entries.description:
The witch can corrupt nonmagical liquid items (such as alchemical remedies) with a look. The witch can choose one liquid item she can see within 30 feet and change its contents into polluted water as per her pollute water hex (see above). The number of polluting glance hexes the witch can have active at one time is equal to her Intelligence bonus (minimum 1).

The witch must have the pollute water hex to select this hex.

entries.name: 力池射线
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以用标准动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能令其一件远程武器充满元素能量。作为使用本能力的一部分，他可以自由动作用充能的远程武器进行一次攻击。在投骰之后DM宣布结果之前，魔战士可消耗掉充能使该次攻击造成1d6点能量伤害（强酸、冰冷、电击或火焰，在从【奥能力池】中花费奥能时选择）。若该次攻击未命中，则充能正常消耗，效果将被浪费掉。若魔战士有【远程法术打击】职业能力（比如重装魔战变体），他在使用【远程法术打击】能力时若同时消耗“力池射线”的元素充能，则可使该次攻击成为远程接触攻击。6级及之后每3级，力池射线造成的伤害增加1d6。

entries.name: 力池打击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以用标准动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能令其手掌充满元素能量。作为使用本能力的一部分，他可以自由动作进行一次近战接触攻击。若攻击命中，则充能释放并造成2d6点元素伤害（强酸、冰冷、电击或火焰，在从【奥能力池】中花费奥能时选择）。他可用本能力使用【法术战斗】职业能力。若该次攻击未命中，则在能量消散前，该充能效果可保持最多1分钟。6级及之后的每3级，力池打击造成的伤害值增加1d6。

entries.name: 弧光力池打击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级12；“力池打击”

  效果：魔战士在进行“力池打击”时，可从【奥能力池】中额外花费1点奥能，若该次攻击击中目标，那么他可自由动作对目标15尺范围内最多相当于他智力调整值个数(最少是0)的目标进行远程攻击。这些目标承受和“力池打击”的第一目标一样的能量伤害，即使那次伤害是重击也一样。

entries.name: 黏着力池打击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9；“力池打击”

  效果：魔战士在进行“力池打击”时，可从【奥能力池】中额外花费1点奥能，若该次攻击击中目标，那么除了正常造成“力池打击”的能量伤害外，目标下一轮开始时还需承受这次伤害值一半的额外伤害。

entries.name: 雷鸣力池打击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6；“力池打击”

  效果：魔战士在进行“力池打击”时，可从【奥能力池】中额外花费1点奥能，使该次攻击造成音波伤害并且震聋单个目标一轮，目标可通过{DC=10+魔战士等级一半+魔战士智力调整值}的豁免检定免受耳聋的影响。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jve8s6ut5yp4hht3]{Open And Shut}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2o9tacbz7tbrlhvv]{敲击术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v1nropy1tvj0476l]{Urban Step}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.if867t28tu6zxaei]{传送法阵}

entries.name: 征兆秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wjdhmfdgwrevax3w]{凶兆}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tcnirpnzjdaym1fd]{物品定位术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tfml9xp8w3xdq0e8]{血之讯息}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术}

  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vl7yer8k1leyuxld]{预警术}

entries.name: 定位攻击
entries.description: 每日1次，当一个拥有这一天赋的盗贼在一次近程攻击中命中对手，她可以移动30尺而不造成藉机攻击。这一移动最终必须停留在攻击目标的毗邻位置。

entries.name: Possessed Bloodline
entries.description:
Possessed sorcerers channel their magic potential through a unique bond with a possessing spirit rather than through blood alone. These spirits take numerous forms, but such is their tenaciousness that they bond in a way that prevents their banishment from the host. Instead, both possessor and sorcerer work together, their joint nature allowing the sorcerer to unlock many unnatural abilities.

  The magical nature of a sorcerer閳ユ獨 bloodline means the sorcerer herself does not even need to be the creature initially possessed to have this particular bloodline. It may be that one of your ancestors was possessed by a powerful spirit, one whose presence was so overwhelming that it sends ripples of power down through the generations.

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：宗教.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja1p1uuf8fp6fiox]{Anticipate Peril} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9hi94t05i449j5ul]{Share Memory} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l8xwrepcmkdgb2wf]{Purge Spirit} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.flqg043abb5xryh5]{Entrap Spirit} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4mw83czf7b62rar3]{Possession} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lovx4kiq18gbvg4e]{Telepathy} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s6q72tw2zra9sycu]{精神错乱} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v39qnirlhgje2c0e]{Bilocation} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q8nety5obvbbd5xs]{Divide Mind} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师}, 
  • Fearsome Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.cKxfEL5XOWuzLhfO]{精通钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家}, 
  • Selective Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻}(唬骗 ),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻}, 
  • Traumatic Spell.

  血统奥秘: Whenever you cast a non-cantrip spell, you can roll the next Will save you attempt against a mind-affecting effect before your next turn twice and take the better result. If you have already failed a save against a mind-affecting effect, you can instead attempt another Will save against that ongoing mind-affecting effect after successfully casting your spell. You can use this ability only once against a given mind-affecting effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 夺舍
entries.description: 另一个思想正与你共用身体，阻碍你的控制，结果这使你难以集中精神。你在所有的专注检定中承受-2减值，而且专注以维持法术时会引发藉机攻击。每当敌人试图使用某个效果（effect）去占据（possess）或支配（dominate）你，且该效果允许进行一次豁免检定来避免生效时，你可以进行两次豁免检定并选择较好的那个结果。5级时，如果你被晕眩或震慑，可以选择用双倍持续时间的困惑状态来取代晕眩或震慑效果。10级时，将占据术OA加入你的先知5环已知法术列表。15级时，将高等物体占据术OA加入你的先知7环已知法术列表。

entries.name: 裁决：附体
entries.description: 神授力量: 你操起自己的意念，击溃弱小的心灵，占据它们的躯体以为己用。

entries.name: 强化魔法
entries.description: 每当奥能师从【奥能源泉】中消费点数来提高施法者等级时，施法者等级+2而不是+1。每当奥能师从【奥能源泉】中消费点数来提高法术DC时，+2而不是+1。

entries.name: Pounce (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon gains quick reflexes, allowing it to make a full attack after a charge.

  This evolution is only available to eidolons of the quadruped base form.

entries.name: Pounce (UC) (3 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 7th, quadruped base form.

  The eidolon gains quick reflexes, allowing it to make a full attack after a charge.

entries.name: Power from Pageantry
entries.description: When casting a spell with a casting time of 1 standard action or less, you can spend 1 point from your phrenic pool to extend the casting time to 1 full round. If you do, the caster level and saving throw DC increase by 2.

entries.name: Power from Pain
entries.description: If your painful reminder deals at least 5 points of damage, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool. The maximum number of points you can regain in this way per day is equal to your Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: 风灵神力
entries.description: 20级开始，你获得风巨灵一般实现许愿的能力。每天1次，你能够以类法术能力施展@Compendium[pf1.spells.s2p7a4biy7bl4ks2]{有限祈愿术}。这些起源必须以“我希望”开头，并且不能与你24小时内许下的愿望重复。若你通过此能力复制一个需要贵重材料的法术，你必须如常支付材料费用。此外，你免疫电击伤害，并且可以使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送}进入或离开于气元素位面，每天1次。

entries.name: 火灵神力
entries.description: 20级开始，你获得火巨灵一般实现许愿的能力。每天1次，你能够以类法术能力施展@Compendium[pf1.spells.s2p7a4biy7bl4ks2]{有限祈愿术}。这些起源必须以“我希望”开头，并且不能与你24小时内许下的愿望重复。若你通过此能力复制一个需要贵重材料的法术，你必须如常支付材料费用。此外，你免疫火焰伤害，并且可以使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送}进入或离开于火元素位面，每天1次。

entries.name: 元素之力
entries.description: 12级起，你的元素打击能力所造成的能量伤害能够穿透对应能量类型的抗力，并且能对免疫该类能量的生物造成半额伤害。

entries.name: Power of the Fallen
entries.description:
You can touch a dying creature and channel its life energy into another living creature. This ability acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.k0k8gvqyy3rd5gke]{死亡丧钟}, except you can choose any ally (including yourself ) within 30 feet to gain the benefit of this effect, and you can apply the +2 enhancement bonus to either Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Power of the Giants
entries.description: At 15th level, you may grow to Large size as a standard action. At this size you gain a +6 size bonus to Strength, a 閳? penalty to Dexterity, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, and a +4 natural armor bonus. You may return to your normal size as a standard action. You may remain in this size for up to 1 minute per character level per day; this duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1 minute increments.

entries.name: 水灵神力
entries.description: 20级开始，你获得水巨灵一般实现许愿的能力。每天1次，你能够以类法术能力施展@Compendium[pf1.spells.s2p7a4biy7bl4ks2]{有限祈愿术}。这些起源必须以“我希望”开头，并且不能与你24小时内许下的愿望重复。若你通过此能力复制一个需要贵重材料的法术，你必须如常支付材料费用。此外，你免疫寒冷伤害，并且可以使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送}进入或离开于水元素位面，每天1次。

entries.name: 炼狱之力
entries.description: 在20级时，你的形体变得充满极恶力量。你免疫火焰与毒素。你同样获得强酸，寒冷抗性各10点，以及60尺黑暗视觉。

entries.name: 土灵神力
entries.description: 20级开始，你获得土巨灵一般实现许愿的能力。每天1次，你能够以类法术能力施展@Compendium[pf1.spells.s2p7a4biy7bl4ks2]{有限祈愿术}。这些起源必须以“我希望”开头，并且不能与你24小时内许下的愿望重复。若你通过此能力复制一个需要贵重材料的法术，你必须如常支付材料费用。此外，你免疫强酸伤害，并且可以使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{异界传送}进入或离开于土元素位面，每天1次。

entries.name: 飞龙之力
entries.description: 20级起，你免疫麻痹（paralysis）、昏睡（sleep）以及与你所选择的能量类型相同的伤害。你还会获得60尺盲感。即便没有处于血怒之时，你也会一直获得这些优势。

entries.name: Power Over Undead
entries.description: You receive @Compendium[pf1.feats.CjLNTqNGz4zU4zpp]{命令死灵} or @Compendium[pf1.feats.O7Dn4bXZtMW0UstG]{驱散死灵} as a bonus feat. You can channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier, but only to use the selected feat. You can take other feats to add to this ability, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.pgRX4VpFemwv9R0E]{额外引导} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.1HfwfBOSWtdxFQ2s]{精通导能}, but not feats that alter this ability, such as @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5rgOsdDlseGr4o5]{元素导能} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.ieww7CP6JK5pwtpg]{阵营导能}. The DC to save against these feats is equal to 10 + 1/2 your wizard level + your Charisma modifier. At 20th level, undead cannot add their channel resistance to the save against this ability.

entries.name: 猛力一击
entries.description: 野蛮人单次伤害检定+1。此加值每4个野蛮人等级会再+1。使用此狂暴之力是一个迅捷动作，且必须在攻击检定之前启用。他每次狂暴只能使用1次此能力。

entries.name: Powerful Bond
entries.description:
As a free action, you can open a link to communicate telepathically with a single ally within 60 feet. The telepathic link is two-way and lasts for 1 minute. Unlike normal telepathy, this ability requires a shared language. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Touch of Good power of the Good Domain.

entries.name: Powerful Connection
entries.description:
When casting a divination spell (such as scrying) that imposes a penalty on saving throws based on the physical connection you have to the target, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to double the penalty from a possession, garment, or body part.

  In addition, when casting any other divination spell that allows a saving throw, you can increase the DC of that save by 2 by adding an object, garment, or body part that belonged to the target as a focus component for the spell and expending 1 point of mental focus.

entries.name: 知识之力
entries.description: 8级时，圣典骑将可以阅读奥术或神术卷轴并施展上面的法术。当他这么做时，他的施法者职业等级如同“骑将等级-4”，他可以用语言学而不是法术辨识来解读卷轴，且不需要施展“阅读魔法”。他能使用的卷轴和他一开始选择的知识有关，宗教知识可以使用神术，秘法知识则是奥术。此外，在决定他能从卷轴上施展法术的施法关键属性时，他的关键属性+1，此加值在10级再+1，然后之后的每5级+1，直到20级的+4。此加值取决于他2级时选的知识，宗教增加感知，奥秘增加智力。

entries.name: 无双说客
entries.description: 到了8级你能在交涉和威吓的时候自由动作投两次取高。此能力在8级能每天用一次，每比8级高2级多一次。此能力替换解放领域的自由呼声能力。

entries.name: Powerful Smash
entries.description:
As a standard action, the shaman can attack an enemy with an unarmed strike as if she had the @Compendium[pf1.feats.2aTFNMs3pW6nUBlr]{精通徒手击打} feat. If the shaman hits a creature in this way, that creature must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the shaman閳ユ獨 class level + her Charisma modifier) or be dazed for 1 round.

  The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + her Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 强袭猛击
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的的盗贼可以在全回合攻击中使用这一天赋。她可以选择让这一轮自己的所有攻击承受-2减值直到她的下一轮开始为止。在这段时间内她的攻击如果造成偷袭，那么可将所有投出1的偷袭伤害骰变为2。

entries.name: Powerful Sneak (UC)
entries.description: Whenever a rogue with this talent takes a full-attack action, she can take a 閳? penalty on all attack rolls until the start of her next turn. If she does, she can reroll any sneak attack damage dice that result in 1s. She can reroll multiple dice, but she can閳ユ獩 reroll any individual die more than once per attack.

entries.name: Powerful Stance (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can focus her ferocity. She gains a +1 bonus on melee damage rolls and thrown weapon damage rolls. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has.

  This is a stance rage power.

entries.name: 无力预言
entries.description: 你能预先警示到危险，但是你不能预防它。你获得直觉闪避（uncanny dodge），如同盗贼的职业能力。但是，你在突袭轮不能使用任何动作，包括自由动作，除了瞬间洞察 （Flash of Insight）能力。如果没有突袭轮，你在战斗的整个第一轮中陷入恍惚（staggered）状态。5级时，你的先攻检定获得+4洞察加值；10级时，你获得如果盗贼一样的精通直觉闪避（improved uncanny dodge），用你的先知等级作为你的盗贼等级来决定此能力。15级时，当你在突袭轮或其他情况没有意识到被攻击时，你所有的豁免检定和你的AC获得+4洞察加值。

entries.name: Pranked Curse
entries.description:
Capricious fey constantly bedevil you, playing pranks on you such as tying your shoelaces together, hiding your gear, making inappropriate noises or smells at formal events, and mimicking your voice to tell embarrassing lies. In addition to any social consequences of such mischief, you take a 閳? penalty on initiative checks. Furthermore, whenever you attempt to retrieve a stored item from your gear, there閳ユ獨 a 25% chance that you fail to find it with that action. Add @Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.mtxqp85izkb20djq]{幻音术} to your list of spells known.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.ec2zmvdzi4m3puh4]{闪光尘} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.27o3msobhyghmfid]{弱效幻影} to your list of spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} to your list of spells known as a 5th-level spell.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{投影术} to your list of spells known. A possessed oracle can select this curse in place of the haunted curse.

entries.name: Prayer Aura
entries.description:
At 13th level, as a free action, you can extend an aura around you to bolster your allies and make your enemies less effective. You can use this aura for a number of rounds per day equal to your psychic level. These rounds don閳ユ獩 need to be consecutive. This functions as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.hu8179fdqfkl0bqj]{祈祷术} spell, granting your allies a +1 luck bonus on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, saves, and skill checks and imposing a 閳? penalty on your enemies閳?rolls of those types.

  If you are chaotic, lawful, good, or evil, the penalty from your aura changes to 閳? against creatures of an opposing alignment. The penalty doesn閳ユ獩 change further for a creature that opposes you on two alignment axes (such as a chaotic evil creature fighting a lawful good psychic).

entries.name: 精确炸弹
entries.description: 当一名炼金术师投掷炼金炸弹时，他可以选择一定区域不受炼金炸弹的溅射影响，可选择的最大方格数等同于他的智力修正。如果攻击失手，则此科研发现无效。

entries.name: 精准协调
entries.description: 2级起，猎人能够选择精准射击（Precise Shot）或包抄APG（Outflank）作为奖励专长。她不需要满足这个专长的先决条件。若猎人选择包抄专长的话，她的动物伙伴也会自动获得该专长。

entries.name: Precise Poison
entries.description: The alchemist is adept at delivering poison to the most vulnerable areas of his targets. When the alchemist confirms a critical hit with a poisoned weapon, he increases the save DC of the poison by an amount equal to the weapon閳ユ獨 critical multiplier.

entries.name: 优雅猎手
entries.description: 你可以迅捷动作给自己基础移动速度+10尺1轮。每5牧师等级，便再加5尺。此外，也获得1轮昏暗视觉。如果已有则视线范围则为普通人类在昏暗光源中3倍。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换动物领域的动物交谈能力。

entries.name: 槛发
entries.description: .  女巫可以立即使她的头发（甚至是眉毛）生长达10尺或缩回正常，并能操纵她的头发，如同其为一个力量属性等于她智力属性的肢体。她的头发触及为10尺，她可以将其作为次要天生武器攻击并造成1d3点伤害（小体型女巫为1d2）。她的头发可以操纵物品（但非武器）如同人手般灵巧。头发不会如同独立生物般被攻击或破武。从女巫的头上断落的长发将消失归于虚无。使用【槛发】并不会伤害女巫的头颈，即使它吊起很重的东西。女巫每天可以操纵头发的分钟等同于女巫等级，这些时间不必连续，但必须以1分钟为单位。男性女巫也可用此巫术操纵他的胡须、鬓角、眉毛或睫毛。【译者吐槽：问——这巫术怎么办到的啊？答——这是女巫秘传的睫毛伸缩膏，保证让你拥有浓密修长的睫毛，想怎么卷怎么翘怎样的形状都行（恶）。】

entries.name: 准备上路
entries.description: 2级起，护卫骑士团的骑士能够针对某种地形进行准备，他要花48小时进行对地形的研究、训练和对自身装备的定制。他能够从游侠的偏好地形（Favored Terrain）职业能力的列表中选择任意一种地形。若骑士处于被选择的地形中，他就会在先攻检定，知识（地理）、察觉、潜行与生存技能检定中获得+2加值。8级起以及之后的每6个等级，这些加值都会再增加1点。此外，在所选地形中计算大陆移动速度（overland movement speed）时，骑士与他的坐骑会将没有道路的地形（trackless terrain）视为道路或小径（road or trail），将具有道路或小径的地形视为具有公路（highway）的地形。若骑士已经在公路上行进的话，他和他的坐骑能够在进行10小时的强行军（forced march）之后，才需要开始尝试体质检定（大陆移动问相关内容详见这里）。

entries.name: 预感
entries.description: 在你的回合开始时，以可以以一个自由动作掷骰一个d20。在下一回合之前你可以以这个结果取代任何你要进行但还没掷骰的d20检定。如果你在下一回合之前没有使用这个结果，就会失去这次效果。你每天可以使用这个能力次数为“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: 远见打击
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6

  效果：在魔战士用武器击中一个敌人之后，他可以直觉动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能预判对手的行动。直到魔战士下一轮结束前，目标面对魔战士的攻击失去AC上的敏捷加值。

entries.name: 远见防御
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：在魔战士用武器击中一个敌人之后，他可以直觉动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能预判对手的行动。直到魔战士下一轮开始前，对于来自该对手的攻击，魔战士获得等同于智力调整值(最少是0)的AC加值和反射加值。

entries.name: Presence of Dragons
entries.description:
Those who would oppose you must overcome their fear of dragons or be struck with terror at your draconic majesty. As a swift action, you can manifest an aura of draconic might around yourself. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you when you activate this ability must attempt a Will save. Success means that the creature is immune to this ability for the following 24 hours. On a failed save, the opponent is shaken for 2d6 rounds. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

  You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels beyond 5th.

entries.name: 保存器官
entries.description: 炼金术师知道怎么保存和保护他自己的脏器，包括避开致命伤口。当受到重击或偷袭时，炼金术师有25%的机会把此变成正常攻击，此能力将不会和其他使重击和偷袭失效的效果叠加，例如护命盔甲。你可以重复选择此能力至多三次，每次效果累计，第二次选取此能力时重击、偷袭失效机会上升到50%，第三次升至75%。

entries.name: 忍法·蛇咬
entries.description: 拥有此忍术的忍者可以攻击敌人的要害穴位，造成衰弱和剧烈疼痛。每当忍者造成偷袭伤害时，她可以造成1点力量或敏捷伤害，由忍者决定。与一般的属性伤害不同，此伤害可以通过DC15的医疗检定治好。每次检定成功可以治好1点本忍术带来的伤害。拥有本忍术的忍者在此项医疗技能检定上获得+10洞察加值。

entries.name: Primal Aether
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0

  You can gather strands of aether twisted and warped by your experiences in the Spellscar Desert, and wind them so tightly that they explode, creating a primal magic event with a CR equal to your kineticist level. See pages 12閳?3 of Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Magic for more information on primal magic events.

entries.name: Primal Companion
entries.description: You gain the service of a faithful animal of the night. You can select from a bear, boar, crocodile, shark, tiger, or wolf. This animal functions as a druid閳ユ獨 animal companion, using your oracle level as your effective druid level.

entries.name: Primal Fury
entries.description:
At 13th level, you can unleash a more primal version of yourself as a free action. This functions as transformation, with the following exceptions. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your psychic level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. You can end the effect as a free action.

  After using this ability, you are fatigued for a number of rounds equal to twice the number of rounds spent in primal fury.

  You cannot enter a new primal fury while fatigued or exhausted. If you fall unconscious, your primal fury immediately ends.

entries.name: 原能魔法
entries.description:
选择该技艺的奥能师可以通过两种方式使用原能魔法：

  奥能师可从【奥能源泉】中花费一点或更多点奥能点创造一个不受控制的原能魔法效果，依据范例原能魔法事件表(内海魔法 P13，翻译链接)。该事件的CR等同于奥能师的施法者等级，每从【奥能源泉】中多花费一点奥能点施法者等级上限提升5。在此种情况下，该事件也被视为一个法术等级是CR一半的法术(法术等级最高为9)。

  奥能师也可从【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点和一个至少3级的法术位来创造一个效果，就像他使用了惊奇权杖（Rod of Wonder)一样。所有惊奇权杖创造的法术效果均使用奥能师的法术等级，而不是惊奇权杖效果列表中列出的法术等级(比如，一个8级奥能师使用惊奇权杖随机施放出的火球术将造成8D6伤害，而不是列表中的5D6伤害)。在此种情况下，该事件也被视为一个法术等级等同于花费掉的法术位等级的法术。

entries.name: 根源转换
entries.description: 当你施展法术造成强酸、寒冷、电击或火焰伤害时，你可以将他转换为另外一种能量类型，你每日可以使用此能力一次，每五级再一次，在十五级，你可以用伤害减半的方式造成音波伤害，二十级时则能以伤害减半的方式造成力场伤害，要学习此启示，你必须先达到七级。

entries.name: 征服源生
entries.description: 当你施法且处发源生魔法效果，或是使用惊异权杖的时候可以骰两次并选取其中一个结果，同时你对源生魔法效果和惊异权杖引发的法术效应之豁免检定+2。

entries.name: 原始嗅觉
entries.description: 当使用【灵敏嗅觉】狂暴之力时，野蛮人在追迹的生存检定和定位他看不到的生物之察觉检定上，得到相当其等级一半的加值。如果他定位了一个全掩蔽的生物，那么他可以将之视为普通掩蔽。野蛮人必须要先学会【灵敏嗅觉】且达到8级，才能学习“原始嗅觉”。

entries.name: Primal Speaker
entries.description:
The shaman can speak with mammoths and any other megafauna or elephant creatures as if she were under the effects of speak with animals.

  At 5th level, the shaman gains a bonus on Handle Animal checks when dealing with those animals equal to half her shaman level.

  At 10th level, the shaman can affect one such animal within 30 feet as if she閳ユ獓 cast charm animal (Will negates).

  Whether or not the target succeeds at the saving throw, it can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.

entries.name: Profane Bomb
entries.description:
When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it deal evil divine damage. Good creatures that take a direct hit from a profane bomb must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered on their next turn. Against a neutral creature, a profane bomb deals half damage, and the target is not affected by the bomb閳ユ獨 staggering effect. A profane bomb has no effect against evil-aligned creatures.

  An alchemist must be at least 8th level to select this discovery.

entries.name: Progenitor's Sting
entries.description:
You can magically apply your toxic essence onto your weapon or onto the weapon of a willing ally within 30 feet as a standard action. (Poison閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 10 + half your sorcerer level + your Charisma modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1 Str, Dex, or Con damage [chosen when this ability is used]; cure 1 save).

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  At 5th level, the ability damage of your poison increases to 1d3.

  At 7th level, each time you apply your progenitor閳ユ獨 sting, you can choose two ability scores for your bloodline poison to affect.

  At 11th level, whenever you apply your progenitor閳ユ獨 sting to a weapon, you can magically apply it onto all willing allies閳?weapons within 20 feet as well. This counts as one use of your bloodline ability.

entries.name: Prohibition
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can command a creature within 30 feet to refrain from committing a particular action (including any referenced in the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.mmdypasgl5us00wb]{Forbid Action}). If the creature performs the named action before the beginning of your next turn, it takes 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every 2 cleric levels you possess and the effect ends. This is a language-dependent effect. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

If you have the spell rune domain power, you can attach a spell effect to the prohibition as if it were the spell rune domain ability; the spell takes effect if the creature performs the named action. This spell must be of at least 1 level lower than the highest-level cleric spell you can cast, and it must target one or more creatures. Regardless of the number of targets the spell can normally affect, it affects only the creature that triggers the rune. Attaching a spell in this way extends the duration of the prohibition by a number of rounds equal to the spell閳ユ獨 level, or until it is discharged.

  This power replaces the Touch of Law power of the Law Domain or the Blast Rune power of the Rune Domain.

entries.name: Project Psyche
entries.description:
You can project your psyche into another vessel. Once per day, you can possess another creature as if using the @Compendium[pf1.spells.8ai7fslz4zu8xe9s]{魔魂壶} spell, though this does not require a receptacle. You must be adjacent to the target creature, which receives a Will save against the effect.

  You must be at least 11th level to choose this revelation.

entries.name: 持久研究
entries.description: 调查员的战斗策略能力的持续时间增加到他的智力调整值的两倍轮数（至少2轮），或直到他对一个目标发动策士之击为止，取其先者。调查员必须达到13级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: Promethean Curse
entries.description:
Your body is falling apart, forcing you to rely on mechanical augmentations or replacements to keep yourself alive. You take 1 point of Constitution damage each day, but you also ignore the first point of Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution damage you take for the remainder of that day.

  At 5th level, you gain a +2 bonus on all saving throws on effects that cause ability damage, ability drain, or ability score penalties.

  At 10th level, this bonus increases to +6.

  At 15th level, any effect that would normally deal ability drain on you instead deals ability damage whenever you successfully save against the effect.

entries.name: 创源门徒
entries.description:
习得这项科研发现的炼金术士知晓如何以炼金术取代奥术以制作构装体。

  拥有这项科研发现的炼金术士得到制造构装体做为奖励专长。

  炼金术士必须使用手艺（炼金术）来制作构装，且在这么做时，以其炼金术士等级做为施法者等级。

  当制造构装时，炼金术士可以用自己的炼金配方取代所需法术，但，若他没有关键配方，那么DC仍会如常提升。

  要学习创源门徒，炼金术士必须要达到六级。

entries.name: Prophecy
entries.description: The witch can call on her prophetic ancestors and cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.pwueht12qqo0268e]{预言术} once per day. She can spend a full hour casting the spell in place of providing the usual material components.

entries.name: Prophecy Subschool
entries.description:
Associated School: Divination.

  Replacement Powers: This subschool replaces the forewarned and scrying adept powers of the divination school.

entries.name: Prophetic Armor
entries.description: You are so in tune with your primal nature that your instincts often act to save you from danger that your civilized mind isn閳ユ獩 even aware of. You may use your Charisma modifier (instead of your Dexterity modifier) as part of your Armor Class and all Reflex saving throws. Your armor閳ユ獨 maximum Dexterity bonus applies to your Charisma, instead.

entries.name: Propitiation
entries.description:
At 9th level, a medium has learned hidden techniques and rites that allow him to mollify his channeled spirit once per day, reducing its influence over him by 1 point (to a minimum of 1 point of influence).

  The details of the propitiation ritual vary based on the individual spirit, but the process always takes around 10 minutes to perform and it never requires any additional cost (such as an offering of wealth or a live sacrifice).

entries.name: 无常血统
entries.description:
你的血脉中流淌着最为变幻无常的狂野混沌之力，这一本质深深烙印于你的灵魂之中不可磨灭。你的念头脱跃不定，充斥着各种新奇古怪的念头。对你而言集中精力全神贯注地完成某项工作是极其困难的，因为你总会在半途被其他更加新鲜有趣的事物转移注意力。

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：位面.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ja005kj1gh7g0dnk]{熵光护盾} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{朦胧术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{气化形体} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{强效造物术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{解离术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.t44p3oeq43jwcgwg]{高等变形术} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2sa3881har33geo1]{变形万物} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.lxDJhpqwtR3J4UXx]{灵巧武艺},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.F9mKy0SmRo4bTdni]{防御式战斗训练},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.9mcYid7xJY9NiySx]{法术增远},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.1hxjrJ68yWsiCCFD]{精通强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (工艺： 任意),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V2zY7BltkpSXwejy]{法术专攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: 由于你混乱无常的血统所致，你的变形魔法和创造魔法极难被解除。你的变形系法术和咒法（创造系）法术的解除DC+4。

entries.name: 无常抗力
entries.description: 3级开始，你获得5点强酸抗力，在对抗变形、石化、变化学派的法术及类似效果上获得+2豁免检定加值。9级开始，你的强酸抗力变为10，同时豁免加值变为+4。

entries.name: 星灵子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术} (lesser)
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.r190q9zxmei82lmv]{移位术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qf4bqjgeff1q4hjt]{异界誓缚} (proteans only)

entries.name: 保护弱者
entries.description: 15级时，骑将可以对敌人进行拦截。以一个直觉动作，他可以以标准速度移动（或其坐骑的标准动作，如果在骑乘的话）并且做出一次近战攻击。此次移动会正常引发借机攻击。骑将必须在邻接敌人的位置完成移动。下一轮骑将会恍惚并无法在1轮之内再次使用此能力。

entries.name: Protect Vitals (UC)
entries.description:
While in the guarded stance, the barbarian gains an additional +4 dodge bonus to AC against attack rolls made to confirm critical hits.

  A barbarian must have the guarded stance rage power and be at least 8th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 保护灵气
entries.description: 在10级时，你可以释放出半径30尺的防御性灵气，持续一分钟。所有处于灵气影响范围内的盟友获得10点强酸，寒冷，电击，火焰和音波抗力；在15级时，这些抗力加值提高到15。

entries.name: 增强防御
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以为自己的豁免检定+1神圣加值，为AC也提供+1神圣加值，持续一分钟。这个效果无法叠加。在10级时，加值增加到+2。在20级时，加值增加为+3。

entries.name: 保护领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你的信仰使你得到伟大保护，同时你可以运用这信仰来保护他人。另外你在豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值，每5等级再+1。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{圣域术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.menqakfoa1ftvi3f]{护卫他人}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{防护能量伤害}
