entries.description: When attempting to cast spells in an area infused by primal magic, the arcanist can spend 1 point from her arcane reservoir as part of the casting to gain a bonus equal to half her arcanist level on Spellcraft checks to avoid triggering a primal magic effect.

entries.name: 抗力
entries.description: 你获得5点能量抗力，对应于你选择的类型。此选择在你准备法术时决定。抗力类型可以每天改变。在11级时，增加到10点。20级时，你免疫你所选择的能量类型。

entries.name: Resistance (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon's form takes on a resiliency to one particular energy type, which is usually reflected in its physical body (ashen hide for fire, icy breath for cold, and so on). Pick one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). The eidolon gains resist 5 against that energy type.

  This resistance increases by 5 for every 5 levels the summoner possesses, to a maximum of 15 at 10th level.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time an eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different energy type.

entries.name: Resistance (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
The eidolon閳ユ獨 form takes on a resiliency to one particular energy type, which is usually reflected in its physical body (ashen hide for fire, icy breath for cold, and so on). Select one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). The eidolon gains resistance 5 against that energy type. This resistance increases by 5 for every 5 levels the summoner possesses, to a maximum of 15 at 10th level.

  This evolution can be selected more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time the eidolon selects this evolution, it applies to a different energy type.

entries.name: 抗力吸取
entries.description: 当奥能师使用【法术抗力】技艺时，只要他的法术抗力成功的从一个敌人施展的法术效果中保护了他，他就可以用一个直觉动作终止此效果。若如此做，将等于该法术环数一半的点数加入他的【奥能源泉】。这些点数是临时的，若一分钟内还未用掉就会流失。超过【奥能源泉】上限的点数也会流失。奥能师必须拥有【高等法术抗力】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 抗力之触
entries.description: 你可以用一个标准动作接触一个同伴，令其在1分钟内获得你的抗力加值。若你如此做，则你在一分钟内失去保护领域带来的抗力加值。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。

entries.name: 坚定决心
entries.description: 2级时，骑将在穿戴重型盔甲的前提下受到近战或远端攻击时，他可以将1点致命攻击转化成1点非致命伤害。每次受到攻击，骑将可以使用1次此能力。此能力不能将属性伤害、属性吸取或能量伤害转化成非致命伤害。6级时，以及之后每4级，骑将每次可转化的伤害量增加1。

entries.name: 决意
entries.description:
1级开始，武士获得决意能力，能够让他忍受哪怕最具毁灭性的伤害或折磨。1级时他可以每日使用此能力1次，之后每2等级增加1次。每当武士战胜其挑战目标时，他可以恢复1次【决意】的每日可用次数，但最高不得超过其每日最大可用次数。战胜挑战目标通常指将目标降至生命值0或更低，但GM可以规定敌人投降或逃离战斗也算是被战胜。武士可以通过多种方式使用此决意能力。

  坚定信念（Determined）：以一个标准动作，武士可以消耗1次【决意】可用次数来移除疲乏、战栗或恶心状态。若武士达到8级，他可以选择移除力竭、惊惧、反胃或恍惚状态。若这些状态持续时间超过1小时或永久性生效，此能力会将该状态移除1小时，之后该状态恢复。

  坚决果断（Resolute）：每当武士需要进行强韧或意志豁免，他可以用一个直觉动作消耗1次【决意】可用次数，投骰两次并从中选择较好一次结果。他必须在进行豁免投骰前决定使用此能力。

  势不可挡（Unstoppable）：当武士被降至0点生命值以下，但并不致命时，他可以用一个直觉动作消耗1次【决意】可用次数来立即稳定伤势并保持神志清醒。他陷入恍惚，但在进行一个标准动作时不会失去意识并开始濒死。他会在受到任何来源造成的额外伤害时失去意识。

entries.name: 决意子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{祝福术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴}

entries.name: Resonating Rumbles
entries.description: When a rogue with this talent makes a successful sneak attack against a creature with tremorsense, the rogue can subtract 3 dice from her sneak attack damage to prevent the target from using tremorsense for a number of rounds equal to half her rogue level.

entries.name: Restless Slumber
entries.description:
The witch causes a creature within 30 feet to fall into a sleep riddled with nightmares. This functions as the slumber hex.

  Additionally, the restless nature of the sleep causes the creature to violently toss and turn, dealing 1d10 points of damage to itself each turn. This damage does not wake the creature.

  When it wakes, the creature閳ユ獨 addled state causes it to be confused for a number of rounds equal to half the witch閳ユ獨 level.

  The witch must have the slumber hex to select this hex.

entries.name: 裁决：复健
entries.description: 神授力量: 医者仁心。然而你不但了解如何治愈肉体的创伤，还懂得修复神圣之所在，剔除信仰之敌的玷污的方法。

entries.name: 复原子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ocbjt6z7amc3yn8w]{移除疾病}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6l904edkt8jv9jor]{中和毒性}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界}

entries.name: 修复接触
entries.description: 你可用一次神力接触来移除下列效果的一个：晕眩、疲乏、战栗、恶心、恍惚，每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换医疗领域的制止死亡能力。

entries.name: Restored Glory
entries.description: At 3rd level, objects in your possession with the broken condition function as if they did not have the broken condition, though if they reach 0 hit points they are destroyed as normal. At 9th level, destroyed objects (objects with 0 hit points) in your possession function and appear as if they had only the broken condition, though if they reach a number of negative hit points equal to your level, they become fully destroyed and don閳ユ獩 function at all, even in your possession. At 15th level, destroyed objects in your possession function and appear as if fully repaired, though they can become fully destroyed as described above. Destroyed objects must have physical pieces left to be affected by this ability. Objects that leave your possession are affected normally by these conditions. This ability does not affect artifacts.

entries.name: Restoring Flames
entries.description: At 15th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.igmb8lisqcnsxd2d]{高等复原术} once per day as a spell-like ability.

entries.name: Restriction (Stare)
entries.description: The target of the hypnotic stare treats all areas of dim light or darker as difficult terrain.

entries.name: Resurgence
entries.description:
At 5th level when you would be reduced to 0 hit points or fewer by an attack, you can spend 2 points from your phrenic pool as an immediate action to regain a number of hit points equal to 1d8 points of damage + your psychic level.

  At 10th level, this ability閳ユ獨 healing increases to 3d8 + your psychic level. If this healing is insufficient to bring you above negative hit points, you are automatically stabilized.

  If you would still be killed by the amount of damage taken, you erupt with positive energy and heal all allies within 30-foot-radius burst for the amount you healed yourself.

entries.name: 回生子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.c5anior2ysy6s2xy]{死者复活}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.thh46ghi51lrl3cl]{复生术}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mxqi375ya2rka7cp]{完全复生术}

entries.name: 报偿
entries.description: .  女巫能够对60尺内一名生物降下诅咒，当受术者通过近战伤害他人时，自身也会受到撕裂血肉的严重创伤。在受术者成功造成了近战伤害后，他会立刻受到等同于所造成伤害一半的反噬（向下取整）。【报偿】所造成的伤害忽略受术者拥有的一切抗力、免疫和伤害减免。此巫术持续轮数等同于女巫智力修正。成功的意志豁免可以令其无效。

entries.name: Retributive Spray
entries.description: At 12th level, whenever you閳ユ獧e hit by an attack or spell that deals slashing or piercing damage, your black blood sprays up to 10 feet toward the opponent who attacked you, striking the first creature along its path. That creature takes 1d8 points of cold damage + 1 point of cold damage for every 2 bloodrager levels you possess. A successful Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your bloodrager level + your Constitution modifier) halves the damage.

entries.name: Return to Dust
entries.description:
You call upon the inexorable ravages of time and entropy to damage an object or undead creature within 30 feet, dealing 1d6 points of damage per 2 oracle levels you have, ignoring hardness and damage reduction. If used against an undead creature or an object in another creature's possession, the undead creature or the creature possessing the object can attempt a Reflex saving throw to halve the damage.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Returning Weapon
entries.description:
The vigilante has a signature type of thrown weapon that returns to him. Choose a type of thrown weapon, such as throwing axes. Whenever the vigilante uses that type of weapon, it automatically returns as if it had the returning property.

  At 14th level, if the vigilante chose a type of thrown weapon that is treated as ammunition, such as shuriken, and buys a set of 50 magic ammunition of that type, he automatically replenishes them at no cost and never runs out. If he chose a non-ammunition thrown weapon instead, he can apply the magical properties of the first weapon he throws in a round to any nonmagical thrown weapons of that type he throws that round. This allows him to make a full attack with the benefits of his magical thrown weapon, even though it only returns next round.

entries.name: 无所遁形
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次以一个标准动作，你大声念诵你所信奉神祇的名讳并迫使一个距离你不超过30尺的变形生物显露它原本的形态。该生物必须通过一个意志检定（DC=10+你的审判者等级的一半+你的感知调整值）否则将立刻脱离其拥有的变形效果或是天生的变形能力，恢复其原本的形态。如果该目标对本能力的豁免检定失败，但又因为某些原因而无法显露其原型，那么它将恍惚1轮时间。本能力是一个影响心灵的胁迫效果。

entries.name: 启示
entries.description: 在1级，3级以及之后每提升4个等级时（7级，11级，以此类推），先知可以从自己的秘示域中学习和领悟到新的力量与能力。先知只能选择她秘示域所给予的启示，如果一项启示具有随等级提升的效能，先知以她的现有等级来计算这些效果。除非特别提及，否则激活启示能力将是一个标准动作。

entries.name: Revelation Inquisition
entries.description: 神授力量: 摘下它们不配拥有的身份，在你的眼前，以良善为假面具的恶徒将被曝光于天下，接受制裁。

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.moftgchcn1d0p2t0]{侦测密门}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.u5rbvasnr78ifrp7]{表象祛除}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术}

替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5nr9o7o0it6ewf17]{狂笑术}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rgd5v3llwoptwcdb]{强大希望}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.op40qjf9oohlx5nu]{英雄宴}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{迷舞}

entries.name: Revenge
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{魔牙术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8u1xa5javcxc6szk]{狂暴术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2mh7g81k30bv7b5m]{精神错乱}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.suilv5ug3tvbwuh2]{Vengeful Outrage}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6jz03m4lryndt0kd]{复仇鬼影}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.o4rwtizvdj7216qd]{水幕天华}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

entries.name: Reverse Shift
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Sp); Level 8; Burn 0

  You reverse the flow of your connection to the planes, sending your body into the Ethereal Plane as @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体}. As long as you concentrate on reverse shift, you remain on the Ethereal Plane; after a number of consecutive rounds spent on the Ethereal Plane equal to your kineticist level (and every such interval thereafter), you must accept 1 point of burn.

  Once you return to the Material Plane, you cannot use reverse shift again for a number of rounds equal to the number of rounds you spent on the Ethereal Plane.

entries.name: 革命子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.v3d3lnjj7ks0ztii]{注目术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1m5rpvirt48brv71]{说服徽记}

entries.name: 回朔时空
entries.description: 每天1次，以一个直觉动作，你可以重骰一个d20，你必须在掷骰结果宣布之前使用此能力。你必须接受掷骰结果，即便可能更糟。11级还有之后的每4级，你得到1次额外的使用次数。你必须达到7级才能选择此启示。

entries.name: 钢材之谜
entries.description: 你反覆查看金属的构造和纹理，使你洞察其质地与功能。每天1次，你可以花费10分钟审视一块未加工的金属或矿石，让你在之后和金属有关的手艺检定得到+5的洞察加值。

entries.name: Ride the Blast
entries.description:
Element universal; Type utility (Sp); Level 6; Burn 0

  You can use this wild talent as part of activating a kinetic blast other than telekinetic blast. You transform yourself into your element or energy and send yourself along with your kinetic blast. You appear at the end of the blast閳ユ獨 path, adjacent to the blast閳ユ獨 target (or final target, for form infusions like chain) or at the center of the burst or spread for form infusions like explosion.

  This ability doesn閳ユ獩 work with form infusions that involve melee attacks (such as kinetic blade) or that use a cone shape (such as spray).

entries.name: 驭雷术
entries.description: 15级开始，你可以通过一个整轮动作化身为闪电，以10倍速度进行直线移动。这一移动方式不会触发藉机攻击。所有处于你动作路径上的生物和物体都将受到你的“电闪雷鸣”能力影响。生物无法阻挡你的移动，但是固体障碍可以，除非它们的生命值被降低到0以下。你每日可以使用1次此能力，持续等同于你术士等级的轮数。

entries.name: Rider Bond (2 pts)
entries.description:
You and your eidolon share an empathic connection while you ride it. You gain a bonus on Ride checks equal to one-half your summoner level and you also gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.0spsP9ylE3goD3jc]{骑乘战斗} as a bonus feat when mounted on your eidolon.

  The eidolon must possess the mount evolution to take this evolution.

entries.name: 骑术绝技
entries.description: 具有该项天赋的盗贼在骑乘不带鞍的坐骑时，仅会在骑术检定中承受-2减值来取代正常的-5减值。当具有该项天赋的盗贼使用骑术技能进行纵马跳跃（mount leap）时，她能够使用她的骑术调整值或者坐骑的跳跃调整值，取其较高者来取代原本的两者取低。具有该项天赋的盗贼会在使用骑术技能减轻落马伤害（soften a fall from her mount）或者快速上下马（fast mount or dismount）时，骑术检定获得+5表现加值。最后，具有该项天赋的盗贼在从镫里藏身（Cover）的姿态回身上鞍时，可以尝试DC15的骑术检定，若成功，则可以使用自由动作取代原本的移动动作。在该次检定中失败的话，就只能如常使用移动动作恢复姿态。盗贼必须在骑术技能上受训才能选取该项盗贼天赋。

entries.name: 裂隙迷雾
entries.description: 用一个标准动作，奥能师可从【奥能源泉】中花费一点奥能点在他身边创造出一个五尺半径的冷雾漩涡。斜眼打量时，会有炼狱生物的面容在迷雾中打转。用一个标准动作，奥能师可以让这团裂隙迷雾向任何方向以30尺的速度移动，最远移动到距奥能师60尺的地方。迷雾可以上升或者跳跃最多30尺高来攻击一个目标。当迷雾停止移动时，它会缠绕任何完全或部分包含在它范围的目标。迷雾超自然的寒冷温度将对这些被影响的生物造成1d6点寒冷伤害。被裂隙迷雾伤害的生物如果意志豁免失败则在接下来的一轮里被减速（如同法术减速术）。一旦被创造出来，裂隙迷雾可以维持每2奥能师等级1轮（最少1轮），或直到奥能师启动一个新的奥能技艺。

entries.name: 裂口魔法
entries.description: 你在突破混乱或邪恶异界生物的法术抗力时，你的有效施法者等级视为比正常高4。

entries.name: Rift Reach
entries.description:
As a move action, you can tear open a small rent in reality just large enough to reach an arm through. The far end of this portal must be within 10 feet of you, but otherwise allows you to manipulate objects, perform melee attacks requiring a single hand, or even cast spells. If you cannot see your target, standard concealment penalties apply. You cannot move either end of the portal once it閳ユ獨 created, and the opening collapses immediately when you leave your current space or withdraw your arm, but it otherwise lasts for 1 round per psychic level. Your disembodied hand uses your AC with a +4 size bonus, should opponents target it. This size bonus does not apply to disarm combat maneuver checks.

You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

  At 11th level, the range of your rift reach increases to 20 feet.

  At 15th level, your range increases to 30 feet.

entries.name: 裂隙兵装
entries.description: 你对于外层裂隙的了解让你可以把他们的力量附加在武器，以突破其他异界生物的防护。每日一次，以一个标准动作，你可以碰触一个武器或20发的弹药，赋予它们可以突破伤害减免Dr/寒铁的特性，持续每先知等级一分钟的时间。在九级的时候，你可以让武器突破Dr/善良或是Dr/秩序。你每五级可以得到一次额外的使用次数。

entries.name: 正义威仪
entries.description: 每当你徒手对一个邪恶生物发动一次接触攻击时，该目标生物就必须通过一个DC=10+你的审判者等级的一半+你的感知调整值的意志检定，否则将战栗1d4轮。如果目标是一个邪恶异界生物，那么会陷入惊惧而非战栗状态。你每天可以使用本能力的次数等同于3+你的感知调整值。

entries.name: Righteous Fury
entries.description: At 9th level, once per day you can create a spear of pure light and throw it at a creature within 60 feet as a standard action. This is a ranged touch attack that uses your Charisma modifier in place of your Dexterity modifier to determine the attack bonus. The spear deals 1d6 points of damage per sorcerer level and ignores all damage reduction and hardness. This damage increases to 1d8 points of damage per sorcerer level against an evil creature. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. At 17th level, you can use this ability three times per day.

entries.name: 潜身卫道
entries.description: 你可以使用感知调整值而非魅力调整值加到唬骗和威吓检定的结果上。

entries.name: Rime-Bound Gloom
entries.description:
The gloom creates an area of freezing shadow in its splash radius that deals 2d6 points of cold damage to all creatures in the area each turn. This effect lasts 1 round for every 2 alchemist levels.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level to select this discovery.

替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{困惑术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1os71jpk7lrrl47b]{挑拨曲}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kikowbnn4h6anegq]{Symbol of Strife}

替代神授力量 When casting a Rites domain spell with a costly material component閳ユ攼r casting permanency on any domain spell閳ユ敂educe the cost of the necessary components by 20%.

  替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5o8uysrb153tnvci]{Sanctify Corpse}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{魔法恒定术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gb7pxobi1za67p7g]{束缚大法}

entries.name: Ritual Unity
entries.description:
You receive a +2 bonus on all skill checks attempted as part of an occult ritual. When you take the aid another action to assist an ally with a skill check and succeed at a DC 20 check, you impart a +4 bonus to your ally instead.

  When you successfully aid an ally in this way, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool.

替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ohy0ty2dawfaaqwd]{水流冲击}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7fvsn0gbv6ynlp63]{水流术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.yldjnorgbx4jsldz]{元素身躯II}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h4nlrm44ubsyzuhz]{液体形态}

entries.name: Rivethun Discipline
entries.description:
You have embraced those aspects of your body that cause you agony, respecting the perspective they grant you if not necessarily the roles they閳ユ獫e condemned you to in life.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.r8bhei88g6h26fp0]{Heightened Awareness} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.usdv1eqvibmxun6x]{熊之坚韧} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.isrnyw9biluqoo80]{Aura Sight} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ev845glbl54em94v]{Persistent Vigor} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jbqo4o2b2tmdz7wv]{真知术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.37ubwx82nqaog3ib]{Thought Shield V} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{心灵屏障} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).

entries.name: 醉轰鸣
entries.description: 狂暴时，每份酒精为野蛮人带来威吓检定的+1士气加值，最大值为每4野蛮人等级1点。

entries.name: 石块投掷
entries.description: 你是一个熟练的掷石者，在投掷石块的攻击检定上获得+1种族加值。你可以投掷最多比你的体型小两个级别的石块。每个石块的射程为20尺，你最多可以投掷5倍射程的距离。投掷石块的伤害为中型2d4，小型2d3，加上1.5倍你的力量修正。

entries.name: Rocket Bomb
entries.description:
Alchemists with this discovery can prepare special rockets to deliver their bombs. Rocket bombs travel farther and explode bigger than normal bombs, but cannot target individual creatures. Rocket bombs explode in a 20-foot radius, and all creatures in that area take the alchemist閳ユ獨 normal splash damage. The range increment on a rocket bomb is 50 feet. Rocket bombs cannot be used with the precise bomb or fast bomb discoveries.

  An alchemist must be at least 6th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: 岩石视觉
entries.description: 3级开始，你获得“岩石敏锐”能力，就如同矮人一般。如果你是个矮人，那你的“岩石敏锐”加值变为+4。9级开始，你获得30尺颤动感知。15级时，你的视线可以穿过固体，就如同使用“X射线视觉戒指（ring of x-ray vision）”一般，持续轮数等同于你的术士等级，你可以分开多次使用此能力而不必一次用完。

entries.name: 权杖掌握
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：当魔战士使用权杖时，用他的智力调整值(最少是0)取代使用该法术需要的最低属性调整值计算任何权杖内法术的DC。

entries.name: 权杖支配
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：当魔战士使用权杖内的法术或是以权杖作为【法术打击】渠道时，将他的智力调整值(最少是0)加在用于突破法术抗性的施法者等级检定上。

entries.name: 盗贼高等天赋和忍者高等忍术
entries.description: 杀手可以选择以下盗贼高等天赋和忍者高等忍术来取代一项高等杀手天赋：致死突袭（Deadly Sneak*, APG)，忍法·无常步（或反射闪避; Evasion, UC)，专长（Feat，UC)，猎手突袭（Hunter's Surprise, APG)，一击倒地（Knock-Out Blow, APG)，易容大师（Master of Disguise)，乘势攻击（Opportunist)，魅影狙击（Stealthy Sniper, APG)。杀手可以选择本天赋多次，但同一个不能重复选择。

entries.name: 盗贼匍匐术
entries.description: 在倒地状态中，拥有此能力的盗贼可以以半速移动。以这种方式移动依然会同正常情况一样引发藉机攻击。拥有此能力的盗贼可以在倒地状态中进行5尺快步。

entries.name: Rogue Crawl (UC)
entries.description: While prone, a rogue with this ability can move at half speed. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity as normal. A rogue with this talent can take a 5-foot step while crawling, and she reduces her attack roll and AC penalties for being prone by 2.

entries.name: 忍法·身合
entries.description: 忍者可以选择一项盗贼天赋代替忍术。忍者不能选择与忍术同名的盗贼天赋。

entries.name: 游荡者天赋(调查员)
entries.description:
调查员可以获得以下游荡者天赋之一：

  CRB：快速潜行(Fast Stealth），稳行者(Ledge Walker），高级魔法(Major Magic)，次级魔法(Minor Magic)，快速解除(Quick Disable)，韧性(Resiliency），游荡者匍匐术(Rogue Crawl)，鲤鱼打挺(Stand Up)，陷阱嗅觉(Trap Spotter），

  APG：强袭连携（Assault Leader），伪装（Camouflage），心细如丝（Canny Observer），万人迷（Charmer），虚假情报（Coax Information），战斗舞步（Combat Swipe），灵活扳机（Cunning Trigger），指若惊弦（Fast Finger），奔若狡兔（Fast Getaway），快速开锁（Fast Pick），语言专家（Guileful Polygot），老油条（Hard to Fool），甜言蜜语（Honey Words），毒性持效（Lasting Posion），飞檐走壁（Nimber Climber），无双架势（Peerless Maneuver），快速易容（Quick Disguise）。快速陷阱制作（Quick Trapsmithing），

  UC：黑市关系（Black Market Connection），谎言说服（Convincing Liar），灵巧之腕（Deft Palm），勇毅（Grit），火器训练（Firearm Training），屏息（Hold Breath），钢铁内脏（Iron Gut），绳技大师（Rope Master），强力划水（Strong Storke），地形大师（Terrain Master），翻墙者（Wall Scrambler）

  调查员将他的调查员等级视为盗贼等级。如果某项游荡者天赋需要前提才能选择（如高级魔法天赋需要次级魔法天赋作为前提），调查员必须满足其前提。调查员可以多次选择本天赋，每次选择时他会获得一项新的游荡者天赋。

entries.name: 盗贼天赋(杀手)
entries.description: 杀手可以选择以下盗贼天赋来取代一项杀手天赋：流血攻击（Bleeding Attack*)，伪装（Camouflage, APG)，战斗窍门（Combat Trick)，快速潜行（Fast Stealth)，巧手盗贼（Finesse Rogue)，火器训练（Firearm Training, UC)，勇毅（Grit, UC)，老油条（Hard to Fool, APG)，毒性持续（Lasting Poison, APG)，强袭猛击（Powerful Sneak*, APG)，盗贼匍匐术（Rogue Crawl)，扰乱反应（Slow Reactions*)，迅捷射击（Snap Shot, APG)，狙击手之锐目（Sniper's Eye, APG)，突袭攻击（Surprise Attack)，迅捷上毒（Swift Poison, APG)，地形专家（Terrain Mastery, UC)，陷阱嗅觉（Trap Spotter)，不存在的盟友（Unwitting Ally, UC)，武器训练（Weapon Training)。任何基于盗贼等级的天赋效果，将使用杀手等级计算。杀手可以选择本天赋多次。若某项盗贼天赋具有先决条件（如【高级魔法（Major Magic)】需要【次级魔法（Minor Magic)】作为前置)，杀手在选择该天赋前必须满足先决条件。【译注：不存在的盟友本来是一项盗贼高等天赋，要在10级以后才能获得，但杀手2级即可获得。】

entries.name: Rogue Talent (VIG)
entries.description: The vigilante gains a single rogue talent (not an advanced talent) of his choice. If he selects a rogue talent marked with an asterisk (*), that talent applies to his hidden strikes instead of to sneak attacks, and the talent counts as a stalker vigilante talent with an asterisk (*) for the limitation of only one applying to a given hidden strike. Only a stalker vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: 盗贼天赋
entries.description: 盗贼的经验积累过程中，她可以学会一些帮助她挫败敌人的天赋。2级时，盗贼获得一个盗贼天赋。之后每2级都会再获得一个盗贼天赋。盗贼不能重复选择同一个天赋。

entries.name: Rogue's Edge (UC)
entries.description:
At 5th level, a rogue has mastered a single skill beyond that skill閳ユ獨 normal boundaries, gaining results that others can only dream about. She gains the skill unlock powers for that skill as appropriate for her number of ranks in that skill.

  At 10th, 15th, and 20th levels, she chooses an additional skill and gains skill unlock powers for that skill as well.

entries.name: Roiling Soil
entries.description:
Combining your mastery of earth and water, you shape the battlefield in your favor, bending the terrain to benefit you and your allies and hinder any who might oppose you. The ground within 5 feet per 2 oracle levels you have shifts and rolls unpredictably; if you use this ability underwater, the surrounding waters churn. This area moves with you, and you and your allies are unaffected by the roiling terrain. Other creatures can move within the area at half speed with a successful DC 10 Acrobatics check. Failure means they stop moving for the round, while failure by 5 or more causes them to fall prone; if underwater, creatures gain the effects of being off-balance (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 433) instead of falling prone.

  This effect lasts a number of rounds equal to your oracle level, and you can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 轮摆位移
entries.description: 野蛮人对抗远程攻击的AC获得+1闪避加值，此加值持续等同于他体质修正的轮数（最少1轮）。此加值每6个野蛮人等级会再+1。使用此狂暴之力是一个不会引发藉机攻击的移动动作。

entries.name: 浪人
entries.description:
虽然多数武士信奉勇武道，用其非凡的技艺侍奉某个领主、地域和人民；而一些武士并没有自己的主人，这或许是因为失宠或者死亡，或是偶尔的自己选择。这些武士被称为浪人，在各地流浪，奉行他们自己理想的准则。浪人是一群令人侧目的自由职业者，他们以追随心志为目标，并不像更专心侍奉的武士那样受人尊重和支持。注意骑将可以选择此武士团组织，但他们一般被称为漫游骑士（Knights Errant），而非浪人。

成为浪人: 一般而言，当武士希望改变所守武士道时，他必须通过一个冗长的过程，需要他在获得新武士道的任何收益前遵守其守则一段时间。但浪人并非如此。一旦一名武士决定成为浪人，他立即失去所有旧武士道的加值、技能和能力，并获得浪人的对应效果。若他再次希望献身于另一项武士道时，他必须使用正常规则来进行这一改变

守则： 浪人遵循他们个人的道德和荣誉准则。因而他们的守则非常灵活且多变。每个浪人应当决定他自己的守则，这应当包括至少三项条款。这些守则由GM批准决定。

挑战： 当一名浪人作为另一名武士或骑将的挑战目标、圣武士的制裁目标、巡林客的追猎目标或类似的效果下时，并且他也向该人物发出挑战作为回应，浪人对该挑战目标的攻击检定获得+1士气加值，对应该挑战目标攻击的AC获得+1闪避加值。每提升4级武士等级这些加值再+1，并在20级达到上限+5。

技能： 浪人将知识（地方，智力）和生存（感知）加入本职技能。

entries.name: Rooftop Infiltrator
entries.description: The vigilante gains a climb speed equal to half his base speed, which increases to his full base speed when climbing a rope.

entries.name: 落地生根
entries.description: 15级开始，你可以通过一个移动动作长出根须使自己根植于地面。你的移动速度降低为5尺，同时AC获得+4天生护甲加值。此外，在冲撞、闯越、复位、以及绊摔战技的CMD获得+10加值。你获得30尺颤动感知和1点快速治疗。你每日可以使用此能力每术士等级1分钟，你不必一次性用尽，但是每次使用此能力都将消耗1分钟的持续时间。

entries.name: Roots
entries.description:
Element wood; Type utility (Su); Level 1; Burn 0

  Your body sinks roots into soft surfaces, making it hard to move you. This functions as the earth walk wild talent, except it works only on soft surfaces (like soil or snow) and not on stone.

  If you have both roots and earth walk, the bonuses stack while you閳ユ獧e on soft earth surfaces.

entries.name: 绳技大师
entries.description: 拥有此能力的盗贼在使用绳索攀爬时，可以用他的标准陆地移动速度。同时即便处在威胁或是分心的情况下，他仍可以在使用特技动作结合绳索通过狭窄容易掉落表面时取10。此外，他在绑人时对方的脱逃DC将上升4点。

entries.name: Rot Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7mnhs4rmcv7lo1l6]{Decompose Corpse}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.mt3gozaeg6qqy180]{曲木术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.26d575hwkhmftrbw]{Fungal Infestation}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5ues51xy0x9yyapy]{Fleshworm Infestation}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kvfggbo0tr5gklxu]{Plague Carrier}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wueg9fxln3z761m1]{Epidemic}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0rhghy2ft8l9buyt]{Cursed Earth}

entries.name: 无边怒火
entries.description: 野蛮人即使在疲乏状态下也可以进入狂暴。当野蛮人使用此能力后进入狂暴，他免疫疲乏状态。然而狂暴结束后，每狂暴1轮，野蛮人就会力竭10分钟。

entries.name: Roused Anger (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can enter a rage even when fatigued. If the barbarian enters a rage while fatigued, she loses the fatigued condition and she does not gain temporary hit points from rage.

  Once this rage ends, the barbarian is exhausted for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Rule Minds
entries.description:
At 20th level, a mesmerist can permanently mentally enslave a creature. When the mesmerist successfully affects the target of his hypnotic stare with an enchantment spell that requires a saving throw, he can force that creature to attempt a second Will saving throw with a DC equal to the spell閳ユ獨 DC. The DC is reduced by 5 if the monster isn閳ユ獩 a humanoid. If the creature fails, it becomes a permanent thrall to the mesmerist (as dominate monster) until the mesmerist dies. If it succeeds, it can閳ユ獩 be affected by rule minds again for 24 hours.

  A mesmerist can have only one creature enthralled at a time. If he enthralls a new creature, the previous one is set free but is unaware that it was enthralled by the mesmerist.

entries.name: Rumormonger
entries.description:
A rogue with this talent can attempt to spread a rumor though a small town or larger settlement by making a Bluff check. She can do so a number of times per week equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 0). The DC is based on the size of the settlement, and it takes a week for the rumor to propagate through the settlement. If the check succeeds, the rumor is practically accepted as fact within the community; succeeding by 5 or more over the DC decreases the time it takes the rumor to propagate by 1d4 days. A failed check means the rumor failed to gain traction, while failing by 5 or more causes the opposite of the rumor or some other competing theory involving the rumor閳ユ獨 subject to take hold.

Community Size DC
Small town 18
Large town 20
Small city 25
Large city 30
Metropolis 35

entries.name: 爆裂符文
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个标准动作你可以在一个邻接方格绘制一枚爆裂符文，对进入这一方格的任何生物造成1d6+1/2你的战斗祭司等级的伤害。你在设计此符文时可以决定它造成强酸，寒冷，电击或火焰伤害中的一种。符文本身是隐形的，可以持续你的战斗祭司等级轮或你主动将其解除为止。你无法在一个被其他生物占据的方格绘制符文。在解除魔法时，符文视为一个1级法术，需要DC26的察觉检定发现它的存在和DC26的解除装置检定将其破坏。

entries.name: 储法刻印
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个标准动作你可以将一个法术施展到一件魔法武器中，如同这件武器拥有储法附魔品质。这个法术可以最多储存10分钟然后自行消解。

entries.name: 符文领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你在怪异的符文中找到了强力的魔法。你获得@Item[uTqIo32PsPruk9Vs]{抄写卷轴} 作为额外专长。

entries.name: 符文转移
entries.description: 6级你能用迅捷动作来移动你“爆发符文”的位置。此符文起点在你30尺内，可移动到你任何临近区域，包括被其它生物占据的。此能力替换符文领域的法术符文能力。

entries.name: Rustling Grasp
entries.description:
Once per day as a standard action, you can perform a melee touch attack that rusts iron, as the rusting grasp spell.

  At 11th level, and every four levels thereafter, you can use this ability an additional time per day.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Sabotage (Stare)
entries.description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to Diplomacy and Intimidate checks.

entries.name: 神圣护甲
entries.description:
在7级时，战斗祭司可以以一个迅捷动作，使用神圣之力加强他的护甲。这个能力会使得护甲获得+1增强加值。在7级之后的每3级，这个加值都会额外+1，直到在19级达到+5。

  这些加值可以与护甲原本的增强加值叠加，但最高不能超过+5；它们也可以被用来给护甲增添以下特性：抗能（Energy Resistance）（一般、强化和高等），护命（Fortification）（次等、中等和高等），无相（Glamered）以及抗法（Spell Resistance）(13、15、17、19)，。为神圣护甲添加这些特殊能力需要消耗与增加护甲附魔相同的增强加值数量，无相附魔视为+1，一般抗能视为+2，强化抗能视为+4，高等抗能视为+5。相同的特殊能力不能叠加。在添加任何特殊能力前，这件护甲至少要有+1增强加值。

  这个能力的每日可使用时间为每战斗祭司等级1分钟，但这些分钟数不必连续。护甲的增强加值和特性在每天第一次使用该能力时就已决定，直到第二天再次使用该能力前不能改变。这个能力只在战斗祭司穿戴该护甲时有效。如果护甲被脱下或者被拿走，护甲将立即失去该能力的效果。这个能力可以在战斗祭司的回合开始时用自由动作中止。战斗祭司不能使用该能力强化盾牌。

  当战斗祭司激活了自己的神圣护甲能力时，他可以通过一个自由动作，使用一次自己本日的热诚能力激活自己的神圣武器。

entries.name: 神圣评议
entries.description: 用一个移动等效动作，你可以唤起祖灵提供建议，让你在任何单次的d20检定上得到+2加值。此效果持续1轮的时间，你每日能使用此能力的次数相当于你的魅力修正。

entries.name: Sacred Sneak Attack
entries.description: When making a sneak attack against an undead creature or evil outsider, the rogue閳ユ獨 sneak attack damage is considered good-aligned for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction. Normal weapon damage is unaffected for this attack. A rogue must have a good alignment to select this rogue talent.

entries.name: Sacred Threshold
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can bless a door, a window, or another portal with a touch. For 1 minute, you can increase or decrease the DC of any check to unlock or force open the portal by an amount equal to half your cleric level. In addition, your first ally to pass through the portal during this time gains an amount of temporary hit points equal to 1d4 + 1 for every 2 cleric levels you have. These temporary hit points last for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.

  This power replaces the Agile Feet power of the Travel Domain.

entries.name: 神圣武器
entries.description:
在1级时，战斗祭司挥舞的武器将被灌注他的信仰之力。除了神祇的偏好武器外，他可以选择任何他具有武器专攻专长的武器作为自己的神圣武器，如果他同时拥有多件武器的武器专攻专长，那么它们全部可以视为他的神圣武器。在使用神圣武器战斗时，这些武器的伤害骰将取决于战斗祭司的等级而非武器本身的伤害骰，中体型战斗祭司的神圣武器伤害见表：战斗祭司，大体型或小体型战斗祭司的神圣武器伤害表见下。战斗祭司也可以使用武器本身的伤害骰而非神圣武器的伤害骰，但他必须在进行攻击检定时声明这一点（如果武器本身的伤害骰大于神圣武器的伤害骰，则伤害骰不变）。除了增加伤害外，神圣武器的效果不影响武器的其他方面，也不对炼金物品，炸弹或其他造成能量伤害的武器生效。

  等级 小体型 大体型

   1-4 1d4 1d8

   5-9 1d6 2d6

  10-14 1d8 2d8

  15-19 1d10 3d6

  20 2d6 3d8

  在4级时，战斗祭司可以以一个迅捷动作，召唤神力来增强他的神圣武器，使他的神圣武器获得+1增强加值。在4级以后的每4级，这个加值额外+1（最高达到20级时的+5）。如果战斗祭司拥有多件神圣武器，那么他可以在接下来的行动轮中再花费一个迅捷动作增强自己的其他神圣武器。战斗祭司增强神圣武器的每日持续时间等同于他的战斗祭司等级，但这些论数不必持续。

  神圣武器的增强加值与武器本身的增强加值可以叠加，但最大不超过+5。除此之外，战斗祭司还可以为武器增加以下一种武器特殊附魔：光能（Brilliant Energy），护体（Defending），瓦解（Disruption），炽焰（Flaming），冻寒（Frost），锐锋（Keen）以及电击（Shock），如果战斗祭司属于混乱阵营，那么他额外获得混沌（Anarchic）和反噬（Vicious）附魔；如果战斗祭司属于邪恶阵营，那么他额外获得狂斩（Mighty Cleave）和邪恶（Unholy）附魔；如果战斗祭司属于善良阵营，那么他额外获得幽冥（Ghost Touch）和神圣（Holy）附魔；如果战斗祭司属于守序阵营，那么他额外获得公理（Axiomatic）和慈悲（Merciful）附魔；如果战斗祭司属于绝对中立阵营，那么他额外获得储法（Spell Storing）和雷鸣（Thundering）附魔。为神圣武器添加这些特殊能力需要消耗与增加武器附魔相同的增强加值数量，相同的特殊能力不能叠加。在添加任何特殊能力前，这件武器至少要有+1增强加值。

  如果多件神圣武器共用这些增强，那么它们中的每一件都会独立消耗这个能力的轮数。这些武器上的特殊能力附魔和增强加值数量必须在每天第一次使用时即确认，并在第二天到来前无法更改。在其他生物的手中，神圣武器并无特殊能力，但他们激活的效果在离开战斗祭司的掌握后仍然能继续生效（比如被投掷出去）。战斗祭司可以在自己的回合开始时以一个自由动作取消神圣武器的效果（本轮将不计入每天的使用轮数）。如果战斗祭司在一件双头武器上使用神圣武器能力，那么这个效果将只会在武器的一头上生效。

entries.name: Sacrifice (3 pts)
entries.description: An eidolon can sacrifice its own hit points to heal another creature. As a standard action, the eidolon can sacrifice up to 2 hit points per Hit Die and then touch the target creature, thereby healing the creature for half the amount sacrificed.

entries.name: Sacrifice Self
entries.description: A rogue who makes a successful Reflex save against an area effect can ignore the benefits of her evasion ability to shield an adjacent ally against the effect, essentially halving the damage that ally would normally take. A rogue with improved evasion can attempt a secondary save against her ally閳ユ獨 damage. If the save is successful, neither she nor her ally takes any damage. A rogue must have evasion in order to select this talent, and she must have improved evasion to benefit from the secondary effect.

entries.name: 李代桃僵
entries.description: 到了8级你能用直觉动作替代30尺内一个盟友受到一次伤害。此能力还会传递随之而来的效果，且伤害无法用任何方式减免。此能力在8级能每天用1次，14级2次，20级3次。此能力替换高贵领域的领导力能力。

entries.name: 牺牲之益
entries.description: 1级起，以直觉动作，你能够牺牲1点生命值，兑换为+1神圣加值，用于下一个由你进行的伤害检定、豁免检定或技能检定。这个加值只能在你正要使用的时候，或者下一轮中使用——否则你所牺牲的生命值与加值都会被浪费。每日你可以使用该能力的次数等同于3 + 你的魅力调整值。

entries.name: 转化牺牲
entries.description: 15级起，每日1次以迅捷动作，你可以使你的一种属性受到2点暂时属性伤害，并使任意其他的属性临时获得+2内在加值。这个加值最多持续每术士等级1小时，或者直至你选择提前放弃它（自由动作），在效果存续期间，暂时属性伤害都无法被任何方式所治愈。只有在该效果结束之后，你才能以常规方式治愈属性伤害。20级时，你每日能够使用2次该能力。

entries.name: Safe Casting
entries.description: Whenever you cast a spell that cures the target of hit point damage, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity for spellcasting.

entries.name: Safe House
entries.description:
The vigilante can establish a safe house in his area of renown, and he can change it every time he changes his area of renown. If he doesn閳ユ獩 have the renown talent, he can still select this talent and place the safe house in a single location to which he has access, but he can never move the safe house from its initial location until he gains the renown talent. This safe house must be an area no larger in volume than a cube that is a number of feet per side equal to 10 feet per vigilante level. The safe house can be arranged any way he likes and it can be part of a larger building, like a secret room or an underground cave. Objects within this safe house can閳ユ獩 be located by any effect that is less powerful than a discern location spell.

  At 7th level, this protection from being located also applies to creatures in the safe house.

  At 13th level, the entire area is protected from scrying effects (though not mundane snooping) like a mage閳ユ獨 private sanctum.

entries.name: Safekeeping
entries.description: At 1st level, you can touch a creature as a standard action, granting it a +2 insight bonus to AC for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Salamander Bloodline
entries.description:
You are descended from the elemental outsiders known as salamanders. You wield flame as a weapon and a tool, and your smithing skills are unrivaled.

  本职技能: Acrobatics.

entries.description:
Salamanders are fierce warriors and master smiths, and you wield their might and mastery of metal by birthright.

entries.name: Salamander's Scales
entries.description:
At 4th level, you gain fire resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus to AC.

  At 8th level, your fire resistance increases to 10 and your natural armor bonus increases to +2.

  At 16th level, your fire resistance increases to 20 and your natural armor bonus increases to +3.

entries.name: Sand Bomb
entries.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can pack the casing full of sand that explodes in an abrasive cloud on impact. A creature that takes a direct hit from a sand bomb is blinded for 1 round, as are any creatures in the splash radius that fail a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half the alchemist閳ユ獨 level + his Intelligence modifier).

entries.name: Sandstone Solution
entries.description: As a full-round action, the alchemist can convert any potion or extract into a solution that, when thrown or applied, solidifies sand or dirt to the hardness of stone for 1 hour, affecting an area with a radius of 10 feet 鑴?the level of the potion or extract. If this solution is thrown at or applied to stone, it instead causes a 5-foot cube of stone to become crumbly and soft for 1 minute, reducing its hardness by double the level of the potion or extract.

entries.name: Sandwalker
entries.description: At 15th level, you gain you gain a burrow speed of 30 feet and tremorsense with a range of 60 feet.

entries.name: Sapped Magic (Stare)
entries.description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to the DCs of spells and spell-like abilities used by the target, and to the target閳ユ獨 spell resistance (if any).

entries.name: 迟滞打击
entries.description: 每当调查员成功地对一个他展开战斗策略的目标造成伤害，该目标就会在1轮内无法发动藉机攻击。调查员至少要达到5级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: Savage Dirty Trick
entries.description:
Once per round while raging, the barbarian can attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver in place of a melee attack. This attempt does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If successful, the target takes an amount of damage equal to the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier and must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 the barbarian閳ユ獨 level + the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier) or take an additional penalty from the dirty trick based on the type of dirty trick performed and the following table.

Initial Penalty Additional Penalty
Blinded Staggered
Dazzled Dazed
Deafened Staggered
Entangled Anchored in place and unable to move from that square
Sickened Nauseated

  
On a failed Fortitude save, the opponent takes this additional penalty on top of the dirty trick閳ユ獨 original effect. The additional penalty lasts for 1 round (though the initial penalty lasts as long as normal), and can be removed with a move action. The initial effect cannot be removed via mundane means until the additional penalty is removed (though magical effects like remove blindness/deafness work). Removing the initial effect also removes the additional penalty. If the target is immune to the initial penalty, then it is unaffected by the additional penalty.

For example, a barbarian using this rage power attempts a dirty trick combat maneuver against her opponent to blind him. She succeeds and her opponent fails his Fortitude save, so he becomes staggered as well as blinded. Regardless of whether he had succeeded at his saving throw, the opponent still takes an amount of damage from the barbarian閳ユ獨 combat maneuver equal to the barbarian閳ユ獨 Strength modifier (unless he has damage reduction or would otherwise be able to prevent this damage). Likewise, if her opponent were immune to blinding effects, he would not suffer from the blindness or the staggering effect, regardless of his saving throw.

This power can only be used once per opponent per rage. A barbarian must be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: 野蛮暴投
entries.description: 如果野蛮人使用投掷武器发动远程攻击并使用他的敏捷调整值来计算攻击加值，那么他可以在远程攻击检定上获得+1加值。如果野蛮人拥有至少+4的力量加值，那么这个加值在4级时提升到+2；如果野蛮人拥有至少+6的力量加值，那么这个加值在8级时提升到+3；如果野蛮人拥有至少+8的力量加值，那么这个加值在12级时提升到+4。

entries.name: Savage Intuition
entries.description: Your bestial senses allow you to sense danger and become enraged before you even have time to consciously react to danger. When combat begins, if you have rounds of rage remaining, you may automatically enter a rage without using an action at the start of the first round of combat (or at the start of the surprise round, if there is one), even if you are not otherwise aware that combat has begun.

entries.name: Savage Jaw
entries.description:
While raging, the barbarian can open her jaw wide and latch her teeth firmly onto her opponent. While using the animal fury power, the barbarian can activate this power as a free action and gain the grab ability with her bite attack until the start of her next turn. This power can be used only once per rage.

  A barbarian must have the animal fury rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: 手下留情
entries.description: 15级时，当他成功以近程攻击击中一个生物，如果这个造成致命伤并且会使得那个生物生命值降到0以下，骑将可以以一个自由动作，将伤害类型改变为非致命伤害。骑将可以每轮使用一次该能力。

entries.name: 鳞类精魄
entries.description: 20级开始，你成为变形生物亚种，你可以任意变形为爬虫亚种生物（如同“自我变形”）或者是蛇（从微型到超大型，如同“@Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{野兽形态III}）。你在变身时保留语言能力，并能如常施展需要动作成份的法术。你对毒和麻痹免疫，你可以任意使用“毒蛇獠牙”而不受次数限制。你的毒素现在可以造成任意种类的属性伤害。

entries.name: Scaled Toughness
entries.description:
You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action, you can harden your skin, giving it a scaly appearance and granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level.

  At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day.

  You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Scalykind Blessing; Serpent Fang
entries.description:
At 10th level, as a standard action you can manifest venomous fangs for 1 minute. These fangs grant a bite attack that deals 1d4 points of damage (for a Medium warpriest, 1d3 if Small). A successful bite also afflicts the opponent with a debilitating venom. The poison閳ユ獨 save DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your warpriest level + your Constitution modifier.

Serpent Venom (Ex): Bite閳ユ攰njury; save Fort negates; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1d2 Con; cure 1 save.

entries.name: Scalykind Blessing: Scaly Touch
entries.description:
At 1st level, you can touch an ally as a standard action to grant it reptilian scales. For 1 minute, the ally gains a +1 enhancement bonus to its natural armor.

  At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5 at 20th level).

神授力量: 你是爬虫类的真神，只凭一撇便可令弱小的生物昏厥。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{魔牙术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.05m8kfc2u9cg528g]{迷惑动物}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bgtmki0xl4xl4y91]{Magic Fang, Greater}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.29cfi65seiajh5qv]{动物异变}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{摄心目光}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀} (takes the form of Diminutive-sized reptiles),
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3ah9mmg0odateh8l]{动物形态}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化}*Only reptiles.

entries.name: Scar Hex
entries.description:
This hex curses a single target touched with horrible scars of the witch's choosing, whether something as simple as a single letter on the target's forehead or blotchy, burnlike scars on his body. The target may make a Will save to resist this hex. These scars do not interfere with the target's senses or prevent it from using abilities, but may affect social interactions. They persist through disguises and shapechanging.

  The witch can user her hexes on the scarred target at a range of up to 1 mile, and she is considered to have a body part from the target for the purpose of scrying and similar divination spells. The witch can withdraw this hex from a target as a move action at any range.

  The number of supernatural scars the witch can maintain at once is equal to her Intelligence bonus; once she reaches this limit, she must remove the scar from a current victim in order to mark another. Effects that remove curses can remove the scar.

entries.name: Scavenger
entries.description: A rogue with this talent can pick up and stow an object as a swift action instead of two separate move actions. She gains a +2 bonus on Sleight of Hand checks to pick the pockets of creatures that are stunned or disabled.

entries.name: 灵敏嗅觉
entries.description: 野蛮人在狂暴中获得灵敏嗅觉能力，并可用于定位不可视的敌人（参见特殊能力中“灵敏嗅觉”的相关描述）。

entries.name: Scent (1 pt)
entries.description: An eidolon's sense of smell becomes quite acute. The eidolon gains the scent special quality, allowing it to detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if downwind, it drops to 15 feet. Strong scents can be detected at twice the normal range. Scent does not allow the eidolon to precisely locate the creature, only to detect its presence. It can detect the direction with a move action. The eidolon can pinpoint the creature's location if it is within 5 feet. The eidolon can use scent to track creatures.

entries.name: Scent (UC)
entries.description: The barbarian gains the scent ability. She can use this ability to locate unseen foes.

entries.name: Scent (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description: The eidolon閳ユ獨 sense of smell becomes quite acute. The eidolon gains the scent special quality, allowing it to detect opponents within 30 feet by sense of smell. If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if the opponent is downwind, the range drops to 15 feet. Strong scents can be detected at twice the normal range. Scent does not allow the eidolon to precisely locate the creature, only to detect its presence. It can detect the direction as a move action. The eidolon can pinpoint the creature閳ユ獨 location if it is within 5 feet. The eidolon can use scent to track creatures.

entries.name: 学派力量
entries.description: 15级时，选择一个法术学派，任何你施展的此学派的法术DC+2。此奖励与法术专攻叠加。

entries.name: 学派理解
entries.description: 奥能师可以从法师的奥术学派中选择一种，但无需指定对立学派。奥能师如同他是1级法师般获得此学派的一个能力，并在使用时以魅力调整值取代智力调整值。此能力必须是一个1级能力，且使用次数限制为每天“3+奥能师魅力调整值”次。以一个迅捷动作，奥能师可以从【奥能源泉】中消费1点来增强他的理解，使得在使用此能力时将奥能师等级视为法师等级，持续等于他魅力调整值的轮数（至少为1）。在持续时间内，他还会获得此学派其他的1级能力。他以此方法无法其他能力，譬如8级学派之力。若奥能师已有一个奥术学派（或在之后获得一个），此技艺效果改为在决定奥术学派能力时，将奥能师等级与给予奥术学派的职业等级叠加。

entries.name: Scorching Heat
entries.description: At 12th level, your weapons conduct heat. You deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage with natural weapons and melee attacks made with metal weapons. You also deal 2d6 points of fire damage per round to any creature you grapple. This does not damage your equipment.

entries.name: Scorpion Aspect
entries.description:
The aspect of the scorpion invokes a hidden menace with a poisonous sting.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Stealth checks and grapple combat maneuver checks.

  This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant scorpion. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, tremorsense with a range of 10 feet, two primary claw attacks (1d6) with the grab ability, and a secondary sting attack (1d6).

  At 8th level, the range of your tremorsense increases to 20 feet, and you gain a +4 racial bonus on Climb and Perception checks.

  At 15th level, when you make an attack of opportunity with your sting attack or maintain a grapple and deal damage with your sting attack, that attack also applies the following poison.

Poison (Ex): Sting閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC = 10 + half your shifter level + your Constitution modifier; frequency 1/ round for 6 rounds; effect 1d3 Strength damage; cure 2 consecutive saves.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Pincers (B), sting (P)

entries.name: Scorpion Bloodline
entries.description:
Whether your ancestors served a scorpion goddess or simply worked closely with more mundane members of the species, the venom from these arachnids has seeped down through generations into your blood.

  本职技能: Climb.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6vx3lvbhp6h220wq]{Thorn Javelin} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3mfmhx8avu7h3iom]{蛛行术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pa6mgkl4caihdrhm]{巨虫术} (scorpions only) (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.j8fufy7sr3bty5du]{Vermin Shape II} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{漫天虫蚀} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{凋死术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jg2n48yy9pk9mpdr]{Transmute Blood To Acid} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.QvlxYVVsBDlykPKe]{奥术打击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  •  Disruptive Spell,
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.VMVAqGze4cs3naya]{灵狐步},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (Climb),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{隐秘}.

  血统奥秘: You are trained in the use of poison and cannot accidentally poison yourself when applying poison to a weapon.

entries.name: Scourge Curse
entries.description:
You are a blight on the natural world. Bizarre natural hazards develop within a 300-ft radius around you whenever you linger in a natural area for more than 10 minutes, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ug4qh4cuh5f9ralf]{Curse Terrain, Lesser}. You cannot choose the hazards or their locations. However, your movement is unimpeded by undergrowth, as a druid閳ユ獨 woodland stride ability, as plants wither away in your footsteps.

  At 5th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.23pgt0f34obki95q]{Feast Of Ashes} to your list of 2nd-level oracle spells known.

  At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.1msv71n204g06fbe]{Explosion Of Rot} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known.

  At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.25iy235izs71qlns]{血肉虫群} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.

entries.name: 惩敌
entries.description: 在8级时，你选择一个与你的信仰相敌对的宗教信仰，你将属于该信仰的生物视为你的宿敌（如同游侠的宿敌职业能力），你的宿敌加值为+2。在13级时，该加值提升到+4，在18级时，该加值提升到+6.本加值与其他宿敌加值不能叠加（仅取高）。

entries.name: Scrap Bomb
entries.description: When the alchemist creates a bomb, he can choose to have it explode into shards of shrapnel that deal piercing damage. A creature that takes a direct hit from a scrap bomb takes 1 point of bleed damage per die of bomb damage unless it succeeds at a Reflex save.

entries.name: Scribe Scroll
entries.description: At 1st level, a wizard gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.tlRu8SYjzA7WCHN7]{抄写卷轴} as a bonus feat.

entries.name: 卷轴掌握
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级6

  效果：当魔战士使用卷轴时，他可从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能用他的智力调整值取代使用该法术需要的最低属性调整值计算任何卷轴内法术的DC。

entries.name: Scry Slip
entries.description: Whenever a rogue with this talent is targeted by a scrying effect that allows a Will save, the caster of the divination must succeed at a caster level check (DC = 15 + the rogue閳ユ獨 class level). This talent wards the rogue and any objects she is holding or carrying. An investigator can select this talent in place of an investigator talent.

entries.name: 探知学派
entries.description:
相关学派： 预言学派

  取代能力：以下能力取代预言学派的探知机运能力。

entries.name: 侦测娴熟
entries.description: 在8级时，当你被法术侦察时你总能发现。如同恒定的 @Compendium[pf1.spells.viq93vkjaungdbul]{侦测探知}”。另外，每当你侦测一个对象，你被视为对次目标更熟悉。非常熟悉的目标在尝试回避你的探知的豁免上获得-10罚值。

entries.name: Scrying Familiarity
entries.description: You are well acquainted with scrying sensors. You can roll twice and take the better result on saving throws against divination (scrying) spells and effects, on Perception checks to notice scrying sensors, and on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance when you use a scrying spell or effect. If you notice a magical sensor, you can attempt a Stealth check opposed by the caster閳ユ獨 caster level check to avoid being detected by the sensor.

entries.name: 秽恶之镰
entries.description: 在8级，你能够通过触碰使得一个武器获得“邪恶”附魔，持续轮数为一半牧师等级。在8级你能够使用该能力每天1次，以后每比8级多4级增加1次。

entries.name: Sczarni Smuggler
entries.description: The rogue has picked up Sczarni tricks for making masterful forgeries and using bribery to evade trade rules. The rogue needs to learn only the approximate appearance of a document that doesn閳ユ獩 require a particular person閳ユ獨 signature to accurately forge the document with Linguistics (gaining a +8 bonus on the check to create the forgery, as if she had seen a similar document before). The rogue needs only a small sample of a person閳ユ獨 handwriting to make a convincing forgery of great length in that person閳ユ獨 handwriting. The rogue can always take 10 on Diplomacy checks to offer bribes. In addition, the rogue automatically gains an extra advantage at the start of a pursuit (Ultimate Intrigue 142) in an urban environment.

entries.name: Seamless Guise
entries.description: A vigilante knows how to behave in a way that appears perfectly proper and normal for his current identity. Should anyone suspect him of being anything other than what he appears to be while either in his social or vigilante identity, he can attempt a Disguise check with a +20 circumstance bonus to appear as his current identity, and not as his other identity.

entries.name: Searing Flame
entries.description:
Element fire; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 閳?br>Prerequisite burning infusion

  Over time, your burning infusion sears away your foe閳ユ獨 fire resistance. When you roll burn damage from burning infusion against a foe, decrease the foe閳ユ獨 fire resistance by an amount equal to the unmodified burn damage; don閳ユ獩 apply fire resistance to this roll for the purpose of determining the reduction.

  This decrease lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your kineticist level. These decreases stack, to a minimum resistance of 0.

entries.name: Searing Flesh
entries.description:
Element fire; Type defense (Su); 等级 閳? Burn 0

  Your body becomes painfully hot. Whenever a creature hits you with a natural attack or an unarmed strike, that creature takes 1 point of fire damage per 4 kineticist levels you possess (minimum 1 point of fire damage). A creature in a grapple with you takes double this amount of damage at the end of each of its turns. Weapons that strike you also take this damage, though the damage is unlikely to penetrate the weapon閳ユ獨 hardness.

  By accepting 1 point of burn, you can increase this damage by 1 point per 4 kineticist levels you possess until the next time your burn is removed. You can increase the damage in this way up to seven times.

Whenever you accept burn while using a fire wild talent, the surging flame causes your searing flesh to deal double its current amount of damage for 1 round (a creature in a grapple with you takes a total of four times as much damage as normal). You can dismiss or restore this effect as an immediate action.

entries.name: Searing Heat
entries.description: At 15th level, your body becomes as hot as a salamander閳ユ獨. You deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage with natural weapons and melee attacks made with metal weapons. In addition, you deal 2d6 points of fire damage per round to any creature you grapple. This heat does not damage your equipment. You can activate or deactivate this effect as a free action.

entries.name: 季节子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{神莓}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gq7np9mwtfd500zg]{枯萎术}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆}

entries.name: 第二动物之力
entries.description:
8级起，每当猎人使用她的动物之力能力时，她都能选择两种不同的动物来模仿以取代原本的一种，而且能够将两种动物之力分配给她的动物伙伴以取代原本的一种。就如同上文中提到的那样，第二项动物之力并不会被计入猎人模仿动物面相的每日分钟数中。

  若猎人的动物伙伴死亡，而且猎人将动物伙伴的动物之力应用至自身，那么这也不会计入同一时间里她最多能够选择的两种动物之力里。猎人仍旧只能将已死动物伙伴的一项动物之力应用至自身，而非两种。

entries.name: 浪子回头
entries.description: 在8级时，每天一次，你可以给予一个敌人以机会让他停止错误的作为，回归正道。以一个标准动作，你可以以类法术能力的形式施放法术赎罪术（Atonement），但目标必须是一个和你信仰同一宗教且违背了它的教义，或是希望改宗到你的阵营的生物。如果该赎罪术的效果需要支付昂贵的材料成分，那么你可以选择自愿承受一个负向等级来替代这些消耗。在受到赎罪术的效果影响时，该生物还会同时受到一个法术治疗重伤的好处。

entries.name: 双重审判
entries.description: 在8级时，当审判者使用她的【审判】能力，她可以选择两种不同的审判而不是一种。这个能力只会消耗1次每日使用次数。以一个迅捷动作，她可以改变其中一个审判。

entries.name: 奥秘
entries.description: 萨满获得一个超魔专长作为奖励专长。萨满必须满足所选专长的前置条件。

entries.name: 裁决：守秘
entries.description: 神授力量: 保守你自己的秘密，了解敌人的秘密，至关重要。

entries.name: 都市的秘密
entries.description: 每天一次，当你使用一个预言系法术尝试影响一个处于城镇环境中的生物或区域是，这个法术的范围加倍。在7级和15级时，你每天可以多使用一次本能力。

entries.name: Sedition Inquisition
entries.description: 神授力量: Your deity calls you to cast down a hostile government. Stealth is a class skill for you.

entries.name: Seduction
entries.description:
The witch uses enthralling movements to fascinate a single creature within 60 feet that can see the witch. A Will save negates this effect. If the target is (or could be) sexually attracted to the witch, the save DC is increased by 2. The effect lasts for 1 round, but the witch can extend this effect for 1 additional round (up to a total number of rounds equal to her class level) by taking a standard action to continue her enthralling movements. Whether or not the target succeeds at its save, it cannot be the target of this ability again for 1 day.

  At 8th level, the fascination effect lasts for 2 additional rounds after the witch ceases taking a standard action to maintain it. This is a mind-affecting charm effect.

entries.name: Seduction Inquisition
entries.description: 神授力量: Your deity blesses your attempts to use sex and love for a higher purpose.

entries.name: 暗之目
entries.description: 在15级时，武士获得在黑暗中完美视物的能力，如同同名的看破黑暗通用怪物能力。

entries.name: 暗之目
entries.description: 在15级时，武士获得在黑暗中完美视物的能力，如同同名的看破黑暗通用怪物能力。

entries.name: See in Darkness (3 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon can see perfectly in darkness of any kind, including that created by deeper darkness.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: See Invisibility
entries.description: At 9th level, a spiritualist gains the ability to see many things normally hidden from sight. She gains the ability to use @Compendium[pf1.spells.nokru6mxk9p3r513]{识破隐形} as a spell-like ability once per day, with a duration of 10 minutes.

entries.name: See It Coming
entries.description: At 3rd level, you gain a +1 luck bonus on the saving throw type of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will). As a full-round action, you can change which saving throw your luck bonus applies to. At 7th level and every 4 levels thereafter, this bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +5 at 19th level.

entries.name: 魔法视觉
entries.description: 奥能师可以看见魔法灵光。若他从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，在1分钟内他立即认出魔法物品的灵光和法术效果（如同‘侦测魔法’）。在此期间，他视作对每个灵光都已经研究了3轮时间，并且在知识（奥秘）技能检定中视作d20骰出了15。此外，若他在此期间触摸了一件魔法物品，他可以立即通过法术辨识技能鉴定其特性，而无需花费3轮来检查此物品。若该物品为敌人所持有，奥能师必须通过成功的近战接触攻击才能加以鉴定。

entries.name: 忍法·慧识眼
entries.description: 拥有本忍术的忍者习得如何看到不可视的存在。以一个迅捷动作，忍者可以施展‘识破隐形’，使用其等级作为施法者等级。忍者可以每日免费使用此能力1次，每额外次数花费1点气。

entries.name: Seek Retribution
entries.description: At 8th level, once per day after receiving a request for aid from a legal authority or an aggrieved party regarding the breaking of an oath, whenever the cavalier encounters the oath-breaking creature, he can choose to vehemently exact retribution. As a swift action, the cavalier can grant himself a competence bonus equal to his Charisma modifier on all attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and opposed checks against the oathbreaking creature. These bonuses last for 1 round per level.

entries.name: Seemless Shapechanger
entries.description:
The vigilante seamlessly adopts any persona he assumes with magic. The vigilante adds his seamless guise bonus to the bonus on Disguise checks that he gains to assume the shape of another creature with a polymorph spell or effect.

  A vigilante must have the shapechanger subtype to select this talent.

entries.name: Seismic Master
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 9; Burn 0

  You can focus on your connection to earth and create a localized tremor, as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.a5gcbpwfhu4hh5ic]{地震术} spell.

entries.name: 兵贵神速
entries.description: 此能力需在你和队友投先攻出结果前发动，可让30尺内一人双投任取。每天“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换战争领域的战斗狂暴能力。

entries.name: 仰仗自身
entries.description: 2级时，浪人学会即便是处在最困难的时期也仅仅依靠自己。每当浪人针对持续时间高于1轮的效果进行意志豁免检定失败时，他可以在该效果的第二轮结束时再次尝试豁免检定。若他进行这一豁免检定，则拥有与正常标准豁免相同的效果（防止部分或全部效果）。此外，每当浪人生命值降至0以下时，在他的下一回合他可以进行两次来稳定伤势检定，使用较好的一次结果。

entries.name: Self Telekinesis
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 3; Burn 0

  You use your telekinetic abilities to move yourself. Otherwise, this wild talent functions like flame jet.

entries.name: Self Telekinesis, Greater
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0
Prerequisite self telekinesis

  You have greater control over your self telekinesis. Otherwise, this wild talent functions like greater flame jet.

entries.name: Self-Assurance
entries.description:
Overwhelming confidence in your success brings you closer to your goals, and you know that your superiority has destined you for greatness. As an immediate action, you can gain a morale bonus equal to half your psychic level (minimum 1) on a single ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check. You must declare that you are using this ability before attempting the roll in question. If you succeed at the check, you regain 1 point in your phrenic pool.

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: 自制力
entries.description: 你对自己的身体具备了惊人的控制力。你在对抗魅惑和胁迫子学派的附魔系法术时在豁免投骰上获得+2表现加值。

entries.name: Self-Perfection Discipline
entries.description:
You take a holistic view of psychic power, believing that you must hone both your mental and physical attributes to remain in balance. The focus you find while exercising, fasting, and otherwise tending to your body broadens your psychic powers.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pysrx5kxfjvsjjsi]{脚底抹油} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.usdv1eqvibmxun6x]{熊之坚韧} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.s9amdo5398alb5p0]{加速术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lvzq2mwkqmozolpl]{行动自如} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wuispaydz8jvw3io]{Echolocation} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mkrjbrp57yfdqrx0]{钢筋铁骨} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.au6p72aztjhtokwr]{Akashic Form} (18th).

替代领域法术

  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.5v3j49r4mdq9rbx6]{Paragon Surge} (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Race Guide 48; always matches your actual race)
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dckgxyd6ariois1s]{Primal Scream}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{转变术}

entries.name: Self-Resurrection
entries.description:
From the ashes of your body springs forth new life. At 16th level, once per day when you are reduced below 0 hit points while you are bloodraging, you can call upon the power in your blood to pull yourself back from death. This functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{生命之息} spell cast upon yourself.

  At 20th level, this instead functions as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.4re1j2w8wkvsvnsi]{医疗术} spell, except that the healing can return you to life as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{生命之息}, using your bloodrager level as your caster level. Using this ability does not take an action. This ability does not function if your body is completely destroyed by an effect such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.sxyiwj0z95piv96i]{解离术}.

entries.name: 感知传送
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以在中距离（100尺+每法师等级10尺）定点放置一个传感器让你获得效果线。你可以在轮数为法师等级一半（至少1轮）的时间里透过传感器看或听（但不能两者兼具）。除此之外这个传感器作用方式如同以你法师等级为施法者等级施放的“锐耳术/鹰眼术”。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等同于“3+智力修正”。

entries.name: Sensed (Stare)
entries.description: The hypnotic stare penalty also applies to Stealth checks.

entries.name: 蛇类伙伴
entries.description: 在4级时，你获得一个动物伙伴，以你的牧师等级-2作为你的有效德鲁伊等级。你必须选择毒蛇或蟒蛇作为你的动物伙伴。

entries.name: Serpent Fangs
entries.description:
At 1st level, you grow serpentine fangs. These fangs are treated as a natural weapon, granting you a bite attack as a primary natural weapon. This attack deals damage equal to 1d8 (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

  At 4th level, your fangs are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

  At 8th level, the damage increases to 1d10 (1d8 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Serpent in the Sun
entries.description:
So long as you are exposed to at least 4 hours of sunlight per day, you no longer need to eat to survive and you gain +2 bonus on saves against diseases.

  At 5th level, you become immune to nonmagical diseases and no longer need to drink water to survive.

  At 10th level, you become immune to magical diseases, gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against poisons, and only need to sleep half as long to rest or recover from fatigue or exhaustion.

  At 15th level, you become immune to poison and fatigue. You lose these benefits if you fail to spend at least 4 hours in sunlight in a 24-hour period.

entries.name: 毒蛇獠牙
entries.description: 1级开始，你能以一个自由动作长出锋利的獠牙。这些獠牙被视为天生武器能造成“1d4+力量修正”（小体型1d3）的伤害，并附带毒素伤害（啮咬，伤口，强韧豁免DC为“10+1/2术士等级+体质修正”，每轮1次/持续6轮，1点体质伤害，1次成功豁免后治愈）。5级时，这些獠牙在克服伤害减免时被视为魔法武器，毒素伤害增强为1d2点体质伤害。7级时，需要2次成功的豁免检定才能治愈。11级时，毒素伤害增强为1d4点体质伤害。你能够每天使用此能力次数为“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Serpent's Tail
entries.description: At 9th level, you can transform your legs into a slithering serpentine tail as a free action. Your speed is reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet), and you can閳ユ獩 be tripped. Your footwear melds into your body and is nonfunctional unless it provides a constant bonus and does not need to be activated. You also gain a tail slap natural attack that deals 1d8 points of damage (1d6 if you are Small) + your Strength modifier. At 15th level, your reach with your tail slap increases by 5 feet. These effects last a number of minutes per day equal to your sorcerer level; the duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

entries.name: 蛇语者
entries.description: 3级开始，你可对所有有鳞类生物（包括各类恐龙，蜥蜴人及各类冷血生物）任意使用“动物交谈”。此外，你获得一个毒蛇魔宠，有效法师等级为“术士等级-2”。

entries.name: 古蛇血统
entries.description:
你的血统可以追溯至那些远古时期的世界统治者，你的祖先可能是某个深受那些爬行生物宠幸的奴隶，因某次所谓的'馈赠’而获得了一部份它们的血脉。尽管你天性诡诈多疑，并且有着极强的煽动力，但这并不妨碍你为正义和公理奋斗。

  本职技能: 交涉.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{催眠术} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7e01shgg8c44zfg]{减缓毒发} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.1zmn8vqy3s5l9kiv]{召唤怪物 III} (reptiles only) (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vdh0yuzpjwhky6kr]{毒击术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d8hypv6zdyan3rzr]{怪物定身术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.52v3fogun1n9jzum]{群体暗示术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.et3440o24hcgrfwl]{召唤怪物 VII} (reptiles only) (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oq3mqv5vovjkoa2p]{迷舞} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.66s5qm8kwycgobce]{支配怪物} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.u7rGDZUL296QIuA0]{战斗施法},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SUACufUXl12sUvnQ]{诈欺师},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.SMyexRzOm5PfjT5I]{妙手},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.L10V7jTzmMYz62zz]{谈判专家},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (唬骗 ),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{隐秘}.

  血统奥秘: 你那诡异阴冷的血统让你的法术能对最粗愚的野兽产生影响。当你使用一个影响心智的法术或是包含语言成份的法术，这一法术能对动物，魔法兽，以及类人怪物产生影响，就如同它们是类人生物并且能理解你的语言一般。

entries.name: Serpentine Swim
entries.description: At 4th level, you can swim sinuously, like a snake. You gain a swim speed equal to your base speed.

entries.name: Servant of Winter
entries.description:
As a full-round action, you can summon a single ice elemental (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 114) to serve you.

  At 7th level, you can summon a Medium ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.aqri3zf6mzgd4di6]{召唤怪物 IV}.

  At 11th level, you can summon a Huge ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mf6k8tg8xu0wedoz]{召唤怪物 VI}.

  At 15th level, you can summon an elder ice elemental, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.j91n23p4tfjixp3s]{召唤怪物 VIII}.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day at 15th level.

  You must be at least 7th level before selecting this revelation.

entries.name: Servitor
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to summon a servitor. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.kyo0kwhw2jhuztju]{召唤怪物 I}, but you can use it only to summon a single creature, and the effect lasts for 1 minute.

  At 4th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the level of the summon monster spell increases by 1, to a maximum of @Compendium[pf1.spells.et3440o24hcgrfwl]{召唤怪物 VII} at 19th level. You can閳ユ獩 have more than one servitor in effect at a time.

  At any time, you can expend 1 point of mental focus as a free action to extend the duration of an active servitor by 1 minute.

entries.name: Set-Up
entries.description: When you successfully hit a target with a sneak attack in melee, you can choose to forgo your additional sneak attack damage to make the target more vulnerable to one of your allies adjacent to it. The first melee attack that ally makes against the target before the beginning of your next turn treats the target as flanked, even if your ally is not flanking the target. This has no effect on creatures you could not flank with that ally, even if the ally was properly positioned.

entries.name: Sever Alignment
entries.description: When making a sneak attack against an opponent with an alignment subtype, a rogue with this talent can forgo her sneak attack damage to scramble the creature閳ユ獨 metaphysical nature. If the attack succeeds, the rogue deals weapon damage as normal, and the target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half the rogue閳ユ獨 level + the rogue閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier) or lose all damage reduction overcome by aligned weapons (such as DR 10/good), lose all regeneration overcome by aligned sources (such as regeneration 10 [good]), and lose the ability to cast spells and use spell-like abilities with alignment descriptors for 1 round for every 2d6 points of sneak attack damage the rogue would have dealt (minimum 1 round). The rogue must have the aligned sneak attack talent to select this talent.

entries.name: Shackle Smash
entries.description: Perhaps trained to remove or destroy restraints from slaves and prisoners by the Twilight Talons or Bellflower Network, a vigilante with this talent can choose to make no more noise than people talking when he attempts a sunder combat maneuver check or attempts a Strength check to break an object. He ignores half an object閳ユ獨 hardness when attempting sunder combat maneuver checks and when attacking nonmagical objects.

entries.name: Shades of Gray
entries.description: A rogue with this talent uses mental and emotional tricks to protect herself from attempts to discern her alignment. This offers her the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.vsr1e8ib0hfhbnxb]{隐匿阵营} whenever she chooses, though she must be conscious to maintain the effect.

entries.name: Shades of Rage
entries.description: At 4th level, whenever you enter a bloodrage, the light level within 30 feet of you decreases by one step. Natural light is always affected, but magical illumination dispels this ability if the caster of the light effect succeeds at a caster level check against a DC equal to 10 + your class level.

entries.name: 幽影武器
entries.description:
你可以创造符合你当前身体大小的一个拟态的简易或军用的精制武器。你需要要熟练这种武器。第一次你用该武器击中生物时，这个生物可以通过一个意志检定来不相信这把是真的。失败就意味着正常造成伤害，然而成功就意味着这个生物指挥受到1点伤害。这个武器只能对物品造成1点伤害。

  在3级，11级，19级，这个武器都会获得 +1的增强加值。在7级的时候，在创造幽影武器时，可以选择为这把武器增加【冻寒】或者【锐锋】的武器附魔。

  这个能力在目标意志检定通过时，不会起作用。在15级，武器对那些通过意志检定的目标，造成最小伤害（即是你在每一个伤害骰都ROLL到1）而不再是1点伤害。

  你可以使用这个能力持续（你每拥有1个先知等级，就拥有1min持续时间）的时间，但是必须以1分钟为单位。

  这个武器会在你不再握着它的一轮后消失。

entries.name: Shadow Beast
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can call forth one or more beasts made of shadow by expending 1 point of mental focus. This functions as shadow conjuration, but it can be used to duplicate only the effects of summon monster spells. Creatures created with this spell deal 50% of the normal damage to those that disbelieve the illusion, and their nondamaging effects have only a 50% chance of affecting disbelieving targets. This can be used to duplicate any summon monster spell up to @Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{召唤怪物 V}.

  For every 2 additional levels you possess beyond 9th, the maximum spell level you can duplicate with this ability increases by 1 (to a maximum of @Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{召唤怪物 IX} at 17th level). Regardless of the spell duplicated, the creatures remain for 1 round per occultist level you possess.

  You must be at least 9th level to select this focus power.

entries.name: Shadow Blend
entries.description:
The mesmerist can trigger this trick whenever the subject attempts a Stealth check while in an area of dim or darker light. The subject gains total concealment from all enemies (50% miss chance) as long as it remains within areas of dim or darker light. Against creatures with darkvision, the subject gains concealment (20% miss chance) rather than total concealment.

  Once triggered, this effect lasts for 1 round per mesmerist level or until the subject enters an area of normal or brighter light.

entries.name: Shadow Blend (2 pts)
entries.description:
In any condition of illumination other than bright light, the eidolon disappears into the shadows, giving it concealment (20% miss chance). If it has the shadow form evolution, it instead gains total concealment (50% miss chance).

  The eidolon can suspend or resume this ability as a free action.

entries.name: Shadow Blessing: Flicker of Shadows
entries.description:
At 1st level, you can cause a weapon you touch to warp and become insubstantial for a split second before an attack. The first attack made with this weapon each round ignores any shield bonus to Armor Class, as well as bonuses from cover. Total cover still provides a creature its full benefit.

  This effect lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Shadow Blessing: Swift as Shadow
entries.description: At 10th level, you can spend a swift action to empower yourself or an ally within 30 feet to move over the ground as easily as its shadow. The subject閳ユ獨 land speed increases by 10 feet and it takes no movement penalties for darkness, difficult terrain, or slickness. The creature can safely move over areas of ice and even those affected by a grease spell. When a creature affected by this ability hits with a charge attack, that attack deals an amount of additional cold damage equal to your level.

entries.name: 暗影血统
entries.description:
阴影界的精魂有时会因不知名的原因在主物质位面逗留一段时间，你的祖先因之而遭受感染，你的血脉已经被神秘的阴影物质所彻底浸染。拜其所赐，你的性格阴郁低沉，整日沉默寡言，厌恶人群，并且有意无意的使自己边缘化。较之与那些碌碌俗人交际，你更喜欢默默地锤炼自身的技艺。

  本职技能: 隐匿.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mz9yr5yhr0f3oqtp]{黑暗视觉} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{幽影咒法术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{幽影塑能术} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{真言术 盲} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.967ur7a9xepd704y]{高等幽影塑能术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xxaycxbdsmalf5ov]{阴魂咒法术} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.jCxcObXJfdDrx4WS]{特技专家},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{法术默发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (隐匿),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.f5FPqAYWlKj3zCIY]{隐秘},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.vWiTqHC4Y3Xn1Pme]{武器娴熟}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个带有“黑暗”描述或者是阴影子学派的法术时，你的隐匿技能技能获得等同于施展法术等级的环境加值，这一效果持续1d4轮。

entries.name: Shadow Bloodrager Bloodline
entries.description:
Because of your heritage, you can move and see through shadows as if you are part of them. Your fury absorbs light, warmth, and strength.

奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{战斗反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{精通先攻}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{闪电反射}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.WKIVfdosc5SqYzmP]{即时备战}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Mz8ZG6nqW3NKFZhK]{快步跟进}

  奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (7th),

entries.name: 忍法·幻身
entries.description: 忍者创造出1d4个自身的阴影复制体，隐藏自己的真实位置。这类似于‘镜影术’，使用忍者的等级作为施法者等级。使用本忍术为标准动作并花费1点气。

entries.name: Shadow Discipline
entries.description:
You perceive the space between light and darkness, and draw power from it. Shadows conceal and protect you, while revealing the locations of those who dare to hide within them. Over time, you develop the ability to deny the warmth of light or life to your enemies.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h4hrop7rq2c9phyi]{Blurred Movement} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.advqdmonj6ro62u7]{Fear The Sun} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{深幽黑暗术} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cmwcavfyc1vbehy8]{Shadow Step} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{幽影塑能术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.8rf2ucrtzmxooyw6]{Lunar Veil} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.h9dzj2fr5lksdjcp]{Umbral Strike} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0mt9mso6wdhfafpo]{Polar Midnight} (18th).

entries.name: Shadow Door
entries.description: At 16th level, you can take any part of your movement through shadows, teleporting to another location within 60 feet. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{次元门}, except you can閳ユ獩 use shadow door in brightly lit areas. You can teleport in this manner a total of 10 feet per class level each day.

entries.name: Shadow Duplicate
entries.description: Once per day as an immediate action when the rogue is hit, the rogue can create a single shadow duplicate of herself, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.4jsss37x0pplib8f]{镜影术}. The GM randomly determines whether the attack hit the rogue or the shadow duplicate. The shadow duplicate lasts for a number of rounds equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level, or until the shadow duplicate is dispelled or destroyed. This ability does not stack with the mirror image spell. The caster level for this ability is equal to the rogue閳ユ獨 level. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she has.

entries.name: 阴影最终启示
entries.description: 当达到20级时，你的身体将永远的被阴影界的精华所折磨。当你在昏暗亦或者是黑暗环境下会【再生5】，并同时免疫寒冷、偷袭和重击。当在一个比昏暗环境还要亮的幻术中，你的再生会被中止。另外，任何你释放的幽魂子派的法术和有黑暗字符描述的法术都会自动【法术增远】而不会影响他们的法术等级。

entries.name: Shadow Form (2 pts)
entries.description: The eidolon's body becomes shadowy and more indistinct. This shadow form grants the eidolon constant concealment (20% miss chance), and its melee attacks affect incorporeal creatures as if it had the ghost touch weapon property. The eidolon's melee attacks deal only half damage to corporeal creatures.

entries.name: 暗影宗师
entries.description: 20级开始，你能在自然黑暗和魔法黑暗效果下正常视物。当你使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{幽影咒法术}或@Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{幽影塑能术}模拟法术时，它的真实性增加20%。此外，所有你模拟创造的生物都如同受到@Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{增强召唤}专长影响一般增强。

entries.name: 幽影掌握
entries.description: 当你使用一个幽影子派的幻术系法术时，你每拥有1个先知等级，就可以增加这些法术1%的强度。你只能在至少7级才能选择这个启示

entries.name: 阴影秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了战斗秘示域的先知将以下技能加入他的本职技能列表：唬骗，知识（地下城），易容，隐匿。

奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术} (4th),
