entries.description: 你和林木交谈，并且学习其所知。你必须花1分钟的时间沉思，并且和树木沟通。此能力的效果类似“石言术”，除了你沟通的对象是木材而非石头。你每日可以使用此能力的分钟数相当于你的先知等级，此时间不需要连续，不过每次使用至少会消耗1分钟。你可以和自然或是加工过的木料交谈。你必须达到11级才能选择此启示。

entries.name: 知识专家
entries.description: 2级时，从宗教或奥秘知识中选择一个，他可以在未受训的情况之下使用该技能，如果他在所选的知识上有受训点数，他可以在与该知识相关的书本、经典、卷轴或其他书写资讯的知识检定上得到+2的加值，此能力一但选定就无法更改。

entries.name: Spectral Smoke
entries.description:
A cloud of smoke pops up around the subject, foiling attacks. The mesmerist can trigger this trick when the subject is targeted by an attack or by a spell that requires an attack roll. A smoke cloud appears in the subject閳ユ獨 square and in a 10-foot radius around it. This cloud lasts for 1 round per mesmerist level. The cloud functions as fog cloud, but is an illusion (figment) effect that can閳ユ獩 be dispersed by wind and can be used underwater.

  A creature that interacts with the cloud can attempt a saving throw to disbelieve the effect. The radius of the cloud increases by 5 feet for every 5 caster levels the mesmerist possesses, to a maximum of 30 feet at 20th level.

entries.name: Spectral Spells
entries.description:
You gain Ectoplasmic Spell as a bonus feat. In addition, once per day, you can cast a spell with the Ectoplasmic Spell metamagic feat as a standard action that does not increase the level of the spell.

  You can use this ability one additional time per day at 7th level and every 4 levels thereafter.

entries.name: 加减时流
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以加速或减缓时间的流动，如同“加速术”和“迟缓术”。你每天可以使用此能力1次，12和17级再加一次。你必须达到7级才能选取此启示。

entries.name: 施法援助
entries.description: 在2等时，不论何时，当骑士使用援助他人动作来协助他的一个盟友，这个盟友会在她下一次的专注检定、解除检定或是施法者等级检定获得+2表现加值（以先发生者为准）。在8等以及之后每6个等级，此加值再额外+1。

entries.name: Spell Anticipation
entries.description:
The mesmerist can choose a spell to strike back at enemy spellcasters. When the mesmerist implants this trick, he must expend one spell slot to couple a spell he knows of that level with the trick. That spell must have a casting time of 1 standard action or less and be able to target one creature (spells like dominate person that have more restrictive targeting can be used, but have no effect if triggered against creatures that don閳ユ獩 match). He can trigger this trick when the subject is targeted by an enemy閳ユ獨 spell. The mesmerist閳ユ獨 spell then triggers, affecting only the enemy spellcaster.

  This takes effect only if the enemy spellcaster is within range of the spell (as measured from the subject of the trick), and functions as though the mesmerist were in the subject閳ユ獨 square.

  The enemy閳ユ獨 spell still has its full effect, even if the mesmerist閳ユ獨 spell would normally protect against it or make the caster unable to cast it.

entries.name: Spell Binding
entries.description:
When a magus selects this arcana, he must select one spell from the wizard spell list that is of a magus spell level he can cast. He adds this spell to his spellbook and list of magus spells known as a magus spell of its wizard spell level. He can instead select two spells to add in this way, but both must be at least one level lower than the highest-level magus spell he can cast.

  A magus can select this magus arcana more than once.

entries.name: Spell Blast
entries.description: As a swift action whenever you confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a spell that requires an attack roll, you can immediately attempt to bull rush your opponent in any direction. You don閳ユ獩 provoke an attack of opportunity for this bull rush attempt.

entries.name: 法术战斗
entries.description: 1级时，魔战士学会了如何同时施放法术和运用武器的战术。这与双武器战斗很像，但副手武器是正在释放的法术。要使用此能力，魔战士必须有一只手空闲（即使该法术并不需要动作成份），而另一只手持用轻型或单手近战武器。以一个整轮动作，他可以在-2减值下使用其武器做出所有攻击，并同时释放任何魔战士法术列表中的释放时间为一个标准动作的法术。若他以防御式释放此法术，则可以选择令其攻击检定获得最高等于其智力修正的额外减值，并在专注检定上获得等量的环境加值。若检定失败，则法术失效，但攻击仍旧受到减值。魔战士可以选择先释放法术或先使用武器攻击，但若他拥有多于一次的攻击能力，则无法在几次武器攻击之间施展法术。

entries.name: Spell Deflection
entries.description:
You can use a readied action to counterspell any spell being cast on you or an adjacent ally that requires a ranged touch attack (such as a ray). In order to successfully counter the spell, you must make an unarmed attack roll. If the result of this attack roll is higher than 20 + the spell閳ユ獨 caster level, the spell is negated with no effect.

  At 17th level, any spell you successfully negate is reflected back at the caster with the same ranged touch attack result.

  You must be at least 11th level before selecting this revelation.

entries.name: Spell Destruction
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 7; Burn 0

  You weave strands of aether around yourself in order to deflect targeted magic back at the caster. Until the beginning of your next turn, every time you are targeted by a spell that could be affected by spell turning, roll 1d10閳? and determine the effects of the spell as if you had @Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转} with that many spell levels remaining.

  You can accept 1 point of burn to increase the duration to 10 minutes per kineticist level you possess, but in that case, it deflects only 10 spell levels in total (still rolled 1d10閳? at a time) before ending early.

entries.name: 法术打断
entries.description: 奥能师暂时地打断一个法术，只要从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，并成功通过对此法术的解法检定（如同‘解除魔法’）。此能力会将法术效果压制等同于奥能师魅力调整值的轮数（至少1轮）。若此法术影响多个生物，则此能力仅压制一个生物身上的效果。在持续时间结束后，法术重新生效，且被压制的轮数将不计入其持续时间。此能力可用于非自愿目标，但奥能师必须进行成功的近战接触攻击、且目标可以通过成功的意志豁免来避免此效果。此能力对立即生效或持续时间为永久的法术无效。

entries.name: 汲借秘术
entries.description:
在5级时，歌者可以从其他的施法者出学习魔法，并以自己的魔力模仿他们的法术。每天一次，歌者可以从游吟诗人，牧师或法师/术士法术列表中选择一个法术施放，如同这是他的已知歌者法术一般。歌者必须耗费与该法术同一环数的法术位来施放这个法术。歌者汲借而来的法术必须至少通过一个整轮动作来施放，即使原本法术的施法时间要更短。

在11级时，歌者可以获得一次本能力的额外使用次数；在17级时，他每天可以使用本能力三次。

entries.name: Spell Knowledge
entries.description:
Your studies into how all things are interconnected have taught you to cast a very limited number of spells. Select a single spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list that is at least 2 levels lower than your highest-level extract known. You can prepare and cast this spell as an arcane spell. Preparing the spell uses up an extract slot 1 level higher than the spell閳ユ獨 level. Your caster level is equal to your alchemist level, and your save DCs and concentration checks are Intelligence-based. You閳ユ獧e considered to have this spell on your spell list for purposes of prerequisites, spell completion items, and spell trigger items.

You may select this discovery more than once. Each time, it grants you access to another spell from the sorcerer/wizard spell list.

entries.name: 法术唤回
entries.description: 4级时，魔战士习得如何使用其奥能力池来回收使用过的法术。通过一个迅捷动作他可以支付奥能力池中相对应的点数（至少1点）召回任一个已经使用过的同环级的法术。这些法术视为重新准备且没有施放过。

entries.name: 法术抗力
entries.description: 以一个标准动作从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师可以在等于他魅力调整值的轮数（至少为1）的时间内赋予他自身法术抗力。此法术抗力等于“6+奥能师等级”且不能被压制，但可以在他的回合以一个自由动作解除。

entries.name: Spell Resistance (4 pts)
entries.description:
An eidolon is protected against magic, gaining spell resistance. The eidolon's spell resistance is equal to 11 + the summoner's level.

  This spell resistance does not apply to spells cast by the summoner.

  The summoner must be at least 9th level before selecting this evolution.

entries.name: Spell Resistance (UC) (4 pts)
entries.description:
Requirements: Summoner level 9th.

  The eidolon is protected against magic, gaining spell resistance. The eidolon閳ユ獨 spell resistance is equal to 11 + the summoner閳ユ獨 level.

  This spell resistance does not apply to spells cast by the summoner.

entries.name: 法术抗力
entries.description: 以一个标准动作从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师可以在等于他魅力调整值的轮数（至少为1）的时间内赋予他自身法术抗力。此法术抗力等于“6+奥能师等级”且不能被压制，但可以在他的回合以一个自由动作解除。

entries.name: 法术符文
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以在使用爆发符文时附上一个你施展的法术，令该法术在生物触发符文受到伤害的同时受到该法术的效果。该法术必须低于低于你所能施展的最高级牧师法术至少1级，且目标为一个或多个生物。不管该法术正常情况下影响几个目标，在符文触发时仅对该生物生效。

entries.name: 法术护盾
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以迅捷动作从【奥能力池】中花费1点奥能，直到他下一轮回合结束前在AC上获得等于其智力调整值的盾牌加值。

entries.name: Spell Storing
entries.description: The rogue can store within himself a single targeted harmless spell of up to 2nd level. The spell must have a casting time of 1 standard action. Anytime a spell that meets these conditions is cast on the rogue, and he does not already have a spell stored, he can choose to store it rather than have it take effect immediately. Anytime afterward, as a standard action, the rogue can have the spell take effect (acting in all ways as if it had just been cast on him). A rogue must have 1 rank of Use Magic Device to select this talent.

entries.name: 破甲祛法
entries.description: 每次狂暴时1次，野蛮人可以通过一次成功的战技检定来击破一个正持续中的法术效果。对并非施加在生物身上的法术来说，野蛮人必须对抗的CMD为“15+效果施法者等级”；而对那些施放在生物身上的法术来说，野蛮人则需要进行一次比那个生物CMD高5点的击破武器战技检定，此检定忽略任何法术或类法术能力带来的失手机率。如果此检定成功，野蛮人可以压制该法术效果一轮。若检定结果比目标高5~9则压制两轮；若检定结果比目标高10及以上，那么法术效果被解除。要学习“破甲祛法”，野蛮人必须要达到6级且学习过“猎巫人”。

entries.name: 法术偷取
entries.description: 奥能师可以通过从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，来偷取一个生物身上正在生效的一个法术。若此生物非自愿，则奥能师必须进行成功的近战接触攻击来偷取法术，且目标可以通过成功的意志豁免来避免此效果。奥能师可以指定目标身上一个正在生效的特定法术，但若他错误地或未能认出目标身上是什么法术正在生效，则从正在生效的法术中随机选取一个来偷取。如果偷取成功，法术效果将转移至奥能师身上，在剩余的持续时间内影响他。除非此法术通常允许在其持续期间进行新的豁免（譬如在每轮结束时），否则此能力并不会让奥能师对该法术效果进行豁免。奥能师无法用此能力偷取距离为个人或持续时间为永久的法术。奥能师必须拥有【法术调整】技艺才能选择此技艺。

entries.name: 法术调整
entries.description: 从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，奥能师可以改变一个法术的既定效果。要使用此能力他必须与此法术效果（或此效果的目标）相邻接，并意识到了该效果。他可以选择将此法术的剩余持续时间延长或缩短50%。此能力可用于非自愿目标，但奥能师必须进行成功的近战接触攻击、且目标可以通过成功的意志豁免来避免此效果。此能力对一个法术只能生效1次。此能力对立即生效或持续时间为永久的法术无效。

entries.name: 法术诡计
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级12

  效果：每当魔战士成功使用一次阴招战技，他可用迅捷动作施放一个他已经准备的、施法时间为标准动作或更低的惑控系或幻术系法术。魔战士每日可用此能力一次。

entries.name: 法痕
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士可以使用一种被称为法痕的基于疤痕的特殊皮肤刺青来施放或者准备法术。魔战士可以像使用卷轴一样使用法痕，在施法时墨水和疤痕同时消失。他也可以不消耗法痕，而用它们准备法术，如同使用“法术熟稔Spell MasteryCRB”的法师。魔战士使用自己的法痕时不需要看见它们。魔战士身上总共可以容纳法术等级合计为18的法痕，他可以用抄录卷轴的规则来创造这些法痕，但不需要“抄录卷轴Scribe ScrollCRB”专长。

entries.name: 破法者
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：魔战士得到“破法者SpellbreakerCRB”做为奖励专长。

entries.name: 破法者
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级9

  效果：魔战士得到“破法者SpellbreakerCRB”做为奖励专长。

entries.name: 裁决：灭法
entries.description: 神授力量: 你获得扰法者作为奖励专长（即使你尚未满足先决条件也是一样）。当你击败一个敌人（将其生命值降低到0或以下，将其俘虏，或是接受有条件的败降），你就会在防御等级上获得+2神圣或亵渎加值，持续1分钟每审判者等级。如果你属于善良阵营，那么该加值为神圣加值；如果你属于邪恶阵营，那么该加值为亵渎加值；如果你既非善良也非邪恶，那么你必须选择它是神圣或者亵渎加值。这个选择一旦决定即不能更改。除此之外，每当你成功的攻击命中了应该拥有炼金术士等级或是其他施法者职业等级，或是可以使用类法术能力的目标时，你可以立刻终止上述效果而是令目标陷入恍惚状态。该目标每轮（包括该效果生效的当轮）都可以进行一次强韧豁免检定来终止此恍惚效果。

entries.name: 法痕
entries.description:
本职技能: 法痕先知将神秘知识、自然知识、求生与使用魔法装置视为本职技能。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.x5hunybxpzhd3gcm]{遮蔽物品} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{解除魔法} (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.exwa9xra4u82j0sx]{次等法术无效结界} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.myg2b9ww43nnlbr2]{破除结界} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.niqxt53lhxrjfaty]{反魔场} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uyn64zazmaydnk7o]{法术反转} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.4pryfl3cihbio5ph]{法痕} (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.19p4nr8rsvt42lmn]{法师裂解术} (18th).

entries.name: 法痕最终启示
entries.description: 二十级时，你成为源生魔法大师，当你施放法术的时候，你可以选择触发源生魔法同时施放该法术，你每分钟可以使用此能力一次，如果你的法术本身触发的源生魔法，你可以让你的法术和源生魔法共同生效，而不是被源生魔法事件取代。

entries.name: 法术打击
entries.description: 2级时，每当魔战士释放一个魔战士法术列表中距离为〔接触〕的法术时，作为一次近战攻击的一部分，他可以通过近战攻击传递这一法术。魔战士通过持用的武器自由进行一次近战攻击（使用他的最高基本攻击加值）而非近战接触来作为施放该法术的一部份。若命中，则该次近战攻击造成正常伤害的同时造成该法术效果。若魔战士同时使用【法术战斗】能力，那么这次攻击同样会承受近战攻击减值。法术打击可以使用武器的重击威胁范围（19-20或是18-20，也受到包括〈锐锋〉武器附魔等其他调整）造成重击，但是只具有×2的成功重击伤害倍数，不过武器攻击本身的重击伤害仍然受到武器重击倍数影响。

entries.name: Spider Aspect
entries.description:
The spider is a patient hunter, sensing foes that struggle in its webs.

Minor Form: You gain a +2 competence bonus on Climb checks, Stealth checks, saving throws against web effects (magical or otherwise), and checks to break free of webs.

  This bonus increases to +4 at 8th level and +6 at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a giant spider. While in this form, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, tremorsense with a range of 10 feet, a climb speed of 30 feet, the web special attack, and a bite attack (1d6).

  At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial bonus on Perception checks, and the range of your tremorsense increases to 20 feet.

  At 15th level, you gain Improved Natural Attack (bite), and the range of your tremorsense increases to 30 feet.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Bite (B, P, S)

entries.name: Spin Kick (UC)
entries.description:
The monk spins about, delivering a kick his foe did not expect. The monk makes his attack against the foe閳ユ獨 flat-footed AC. Creatures with the uncanny dodge class feature or a similar effect cannot be caught flat-footed by this style strike.

  The monk must attack with a kick to use this style strike.

entries.name: Spindle Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type form infusion; Level 2; Burn 2
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw Reflex negates (see text)

  You throw a long, roughly 5-foot-by-10-foot spindle of elemental matter or energy (or nearby unattended objects in the case of telekineticists) up to 30 feet away, damaging all creatures and objects within any two adjacent 5-foot squares unless they succeed at a Reflex save.

  An energy blast infused with spindle deals its normal damage to each target, while a physical blast infused with spindle deals half its normal damage to each target. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

entries.name: Spines and Brambles
entries.description:
With a beckoning gesture, the shaman conjures spiny shrubs in a number of squares equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1) within 30 feet. The squares become filled with light undergrowth (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 426). The shaman can pass through the affected squares without impediment.

  When the shaman uses this hex again, any previously conjured undergrowth withers away.

entries.name: Spire Totem
entries.description:
While raging, the barbarian takes no penalties for using a weapon to deal nonlethal damage. When dealing nonlethal damage, the barbarian adds a bonus equal to half her barbarian level on her damage rolls.

  A barbarian must have the lesser spire totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Spire Totem, Greater
entries.description:
While the barbarian is raging, all allies within 30 feet gain a +2 morale bonus on Will saves. When attempting a Will save against a fear effect, all allies within this area can roll twice and use the better result.

  A barbarian must have the spire totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Spire Totem, Lesser
entries.description: While raging, the barbarian gains a +1 morale bonus on attacks against any creature that has targeted one of her allies with an attack or a harmful spell within the last round.

entries.name: 魂域
entries.description:
萨满与世上的精魂有着某种神秘的羁绊。她与某种特定精魂有着长久持续的链接，这给予了她一系列能力和职业特征。

  在１级时，萨满获得她所选魂域给予的。她将该魂域给予的法术加入自己的法术列表，并且这些法术可以通过魂术的方式施放。将魂域赋予的巫术加入到她能够在巫术与飘渺巫术职业能力中选择的巫术列表中。

  在８级时，萨满获得所选魂域的。在１６级时，她获得所选精魂的。

  若萨满从其它职业获得秘示域能力（比如先知），所选魂域和秘示域必须相同，这意味着其中之一可能要改选。若你的ＧＭ许可，你可以改变较先获得的秘示域或魂域来使得二者相同。

entries.name: 魂兽
entries.description:
在１级时，萨满与所选精魂代表的某种魂兽紧密相连。这只魂兽是萨满与魂域沟通的渠道，引领萨满沿着这条道路行进。魂兽同样也可以给予萨满一切特殊能力。

  萨满每日必须与魂兽进行沟通来准备法术。不过魂兽不像女巫的魔宠一样为萨满储存法术，魂兽只是萨满与神力沟通的桥梁。若萨满的魂兽被杀，她将无法准备新法术或使用魂术，直到魂兽复归。

entries.name: Spirit Bonus
entries.description: When a medium channels a spirit, he gains a bonus on certain checks and to certain statistics, depending on the spirit. A 1st-level medium閳ユ獨 spirit bonus is +1; it increases by 1 at 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter.

entries.name: 灵性提升
entries.description: 每当你的治疗法术将一个生物的生命值治疗到最大值时，这个法术过量治疗的部分将成为该生物的临时生命值（上限为你的先知等级数），这些临时生命值持续每先知等级1轮。

entries.name: Spirit Channeling
entries.description: As your self-awareness expands, you become increasingly attuned to the spirit world around you. At 5th level, as part of your meditation to initiate metamorphosis, you can invite a wandering spirit to share your body as if you were a shaman (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Class Guide 37). You gain the associated 1st-level spirit ability as long as you maintain your altered form, but your metamorphosis form also exhibits some aspect of the spirit you host, such as vivid red hair for a flame spirit or gauntness for a bone spirit.

entries.name: 魂术
entries.description: 在准备的法术之外，萨满每天可以自发施放一系列的法术。除了祷念之外，每日每个她能使用的萨满法术等级中均有自发法术位。在萨满使用这个自发法术位时，她能够从魂域所赋予的法术列表中选择法术（见魂域职业能力以及飘渺魂域职业能力）。她可以使用任何自身已知的超魔法术增强这些法术，并按照专长的需要使用更高等级的自发法术位，不过这样会增加施放法术的时间

entries.name: Spirit Mastery
entries.description: At 19th legend, the medium becomes a legend among spirits, particularly lesser spirits. He can use his spirit surge ability an additional two times per day without incurring influence, regardless of whether he accepts a taboo or channels a weaker spirit. When channeling a weaker spirit, he can use his spirit surge ability an additional four times per day for each power he forgoes, instead of an additional two times.

entries.name: 天精地魄
entries.description: 当萨满生命值降到０以下时，她将自动稳定伤势并在１ｄ４轮内获得快速治疗１。１５级时，变为快速治疗３。

entries.name: 战士之魂
entries.description: 你唤醒你祖宗里最强大战士的灵魂，并让他占有你的身躯，使你成为强大的战士。你在力量，敏捷和体质上得到+4的增强加值，同时，你的基本攻击加值提升到相当于你的先知等级，并且得到+4天生防御加值。此外，你还对你所选择的武器得到“精通重击”专长。此能力持续轮数相当于先知等级的一半。这个能力的持续时间不须连续，不过每次使用至少消耗1轮的时间。你必须达到11级才能选择这个启示。

entries.name: 圣灵护盾
entries.description: 你可以唤起祖先的灵魂化为环绕着你的护盾并阻挡攻击。你得到+4的盔甲加值，在7级和之后的每4级此加值再+2。13级时此护盾让瞄准你的箭矢，射线或其他需要掷骰的远程攻击承受50％的失手机率。你每天可以使用这个护盾的小时数相当于你的先知等级，持续时间不须连续，但每次至少会消耗1个小时。

entries.name: Spirit Shroud
entries.description:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to surround yourself with a shroud of spirit energy. You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 1d6 + your occultist level. This shroud lasts for 1 minute per occultist level or until the temporary hit points are expended, whichever comes first. These temporary hit points stack with those from other sources, but not with those gained through multiple uses of this ability.

  At 4th level, as long as the shroud remains, you also gain a resistance bonus on all saving throws against death effects, fear effects, and any spells or effects that bestow negative levels or deal negative energy damage (if the spells or effects allow a save). This bonus is equal to 1 + 1 for every 4 occultist levels you possess beyond 4th.

  You must be at least 3rd level to select this focus power.

entries.name: 骏马精神
entries.description: 野蛮人骑乘且狂暴的时候，野蛮人的坐骑获得“1/2野蛮人等级/魔法”的DR。野蛮人必须习得【狂暴坐骑】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: Spirit Surge
entries.description:
After failing a d20 roll that was modified by his spirit bonus, a medium can allow his spirit to gain 1 additional point of influence over him in order to add 1d6 to the check閳ユ獨 result without taking an action. This can cause the check to succeed instead of fail. The medium must be conscious and aware to use this ability, and he can use this ability at most once per round.

  At 10th level, the medium閳ユ獨 spirit surge die increases to 1d8, and at 20th level it increases to 1d10.

entries.name: 中级灵魂图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人周围的灵魂使敌人难以见到他。非邻接野蛮人的敌人在使用远程或近战（通常是长触及武器）攻击时有20%失手率。野蛮人必须习得【次级灵魂图腾】且至少6级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 高级灵魂图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人周围的灵魂对邻接的敌人变的更加危险。邻接野蛮人的活体敌人在野蛮人的回合开始时受到1d8点负能量伤害。此外，野蛮人的灵丝可以攻击到15尺远的敌人，并且伤害增为1d6。野蛮人必须习得【中级灵魂图腾】且至少10级才能选择这个狂暴之力。

entries.name: 次级灵魂图腾
entries.description: 狂暴时，野蛮人用围绕着他的灵魂骚扰敌人。这些灵丝每轮对所有邻接野蛮人的敌人挥击一次，攻击加值为野蛮人的最高BAB加上魅力修正。每次挥击造成“1d4+野蛮人魅力修正”点负能量伤害。

entries.name: Spirit Touch
entries.description:
At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.

  This power replaces the Death's Embrace power of the Death Domain or the Ward Against Death power of the Repose Domain.

entries.name: 灵魂行走
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以变成虚体和隐形状态。当变成这种形态时，你可以向任何方向移动，穿过任何物体(除了那些由力场组成的)。处于这种形态时你除了移动无法做其他动作。你可以保持此状态的轮数等于你的先知等级，但你可以通过一个标准动作提前结束此能力。11级时，你每天可以使用此能一次，15级时可以使用两次。要选择此启示你至少要达到11级。

entries.name: 精魂秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tyhxeck30qtsp35q]{镇魂曲}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.oylikodnyku2zewu]{隐形术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{死者交谈}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0lrux8tmaml5fkw6]{灵能盟友}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.p7edwwc2h3mb0bo5]{Ghostbane Dirge, Mass}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{行影术}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.btccs4sjo2nog1a0]{幻化灵体}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{异界盟友}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gw9bes9othfqm7mi]{同游灵界}

entries.name: Spiritual Awareness
entries.description:
While raging, the barbarian's dodge bonus to AC from trap sense applies against attacks made by incorporeal creatures.

  The barbarian must have trap sense to select this ability.

entries.name: Spiritual Bond
entries.description:
At 14th level, a spiritualist閳ユ獨 life force becomes intrinsically linked with the phantom閳ユ獨 spiritual essence. As long as the phantom has 1 or more hit points, when the spiritualist takes damage that would reduce her to fewer than 0 hit points, those points of damage are transferred to the phantom instead. This transfer stops after the phantom takes all the points of damage or the phantom is reduced to a negative amount of hit points equal to its Constitution score. In the latter case, points of damage dealt in excess of this limit are dealt to the spiritualist.

  This ability affects only effects that deal hit point damage.

entries.name: Spiritual Bulwark
entries.description: At 5th level, you develop a deeper attachment to your lingering spirits, and learn to rely on their presence as protection from external spiritual attacks. You gain a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier on saving throws against effects generated by haunts, incorporeal undead, incorporeal outsiders, and on saving throws against possession attempts.

entries.name: Spiritual Companion
entries.description:
While ninjas are accustomed to solitude, some form pacts with magical beings to seek aid and advice. A ninja with this trick gains an improved familiar, treating her ninja level as her wizard level. The ninja can select any of the following as her familiar: calligraphy wyrm, pipefox, shikigami kami, or spirit oni.

  The ninja must have an alignment compatible with the chosen familiar.

entries.name: Spiritual Defense
entries.description:
Your chanting grants protection against your enemies. As a move action, you can begin chanting to gain the benefit of a protection spell (such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.skgjjub1hng29nwo]{防护邪恶}) using your oracle level as your caster level. This protection lasts until you stop chanting or for the spell閳ユ獨 normal duration, whichever comes first. Chanting after the initial round of the effect is a free action, and you can incorporate verbal components and communication into the chant; magical silence ends a chant and its protection effect.

  At 6th level, you can chant aloud to create a magic circle effect (such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.1i8b1v3dngkxj6jp]{反邪恶法阵}).

  You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Spiritual Interference
entries.description:
At 4th level, whenever a spiritualist is within the reach of her ectoplasmic manifested phantom, she gains a +2 shield bonus to her Armor Class and a +2 circumstance bonus on her saving throws. She doesn閳ユ獩 gain these bonuses when the ectoplasmic manifested phantom is grappled, helpless, or unconscious.

  A spiritualist within 30 feet of her incorporeally manifested phantom receives a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects. This bonus is a supernatural ability and does not apply if the phantom is unconscious.

entries.name: 御亡之盾
entries.description: 在2级时，骑士可以呼唤死者的灵魂集结起来防护自己。每天一次，当骑士被一个自己所挑战的不死生物攻击时，他可以以一个即时动作使用本能力，在对抗这次攻击的防御等级上获得相当于骑士魅力调整值的偏斜加值。骑士必须在攻击检定结果投出前决定是否使用本能力。

entries.name: Splash of the Styx
entries.description:
Element water; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 1
Prerequisite tiefling or Planar Infusion (Abaddon, Abyss, or Hell)
Saving Throw Will negates; SR yes

  You can spend 1 full round to draw upon the waters of the River Styx to erase memories of a target. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.5ll7q13p0skbgonc]{修改记忆}, except that it can only eliminate memories.

entries.name: Splitting Mutagen
entries.description:
Once per day while under the effects of his mutagen, the alchemist can split into two identical copies of himself as an immediate action after being damaged by a piercing or slashing weapon. Each copy has an ooze-like complexion, most often manifesting as a slimy sheen to his skin. The alchemist splits his current hit points evenly between the copies. The copies use the same statistics, share the same resources, and have identical equipment (except artifacts, which only one copy has). Similarly, if one of the copies expends a charge or daily use from a magic item that a copy has, the charge or daily use is expended from both copies. If one copy drops or gives away an item, the duplicate item disappears from the other copy as well.

The two copies act independently and each one has a full set of actions. At the end of the alchemist閳ユ獨 next turn, he selects one of the copies, which loses its ooze-like complexion as it becomes the alchemist; the other copy dissolves into a fine mist and dissipates. If one of the copies is destroyed before this happens, the remaining copy immediately becomes the alchemist, and he gains 1 permanent negative level. If both copies are destroyed simultaneously (such as from a @Compendium[pf1.spells.6oq1wcryviik9ice]{火球术}), both copies collapse into formless goo; the alchemist can only be restored to life via @Compendium[pf1.spells.thh46ghi51lrl3cl]{复生术} or similarly powerful magic.

  An alchemist must be at least 12th level before he can select this discovery.

entries.name: 自发施法
entries.description:
善良阵营的战斗祭司（或信仰善良神祇的中立战斗祭司）可以将事先准备好的非祷念法术临时转换成治疗法术，即使他事前并未准备该治疗法术也可。此时，战斗祭司会失去一个准备好的法术，换得一个同环（或较低环级）的‘治疗伤害’法术。

  邪恶阵营的战斗祭司（或信仰邪恶神祇的中立战斗祭司）不能将法术转换成治疗伤害法术，但却可以转换成造成‘造成伤害’法术（也就是法术名称中带有造成伤害一词的法术）。

  信仰中立神祇的中立战斗祭司可以在上述两种法术转换中择其一。但是一旦决定之后便再也无法改变。此选择亦决定该中立战斗祭司能引导正能量还是负能量（见下文引导能量）。

entries.name: 法术转换
entries.description: 善良牧师（或信仰善良神祇的中立牧师）可以将事先准备好的法术（祷念和领域法术不可）临时转换成医疗法术，即使他事前并未准备该医疗法术也可。此时，牧师会“失掉”一个准备好的法术，换得一个同环级（或较低环级）的“治疗伤害”法术。邪恶牧师（或信仰邪恶神祇的中立牧师）不能将法术转换成医疗法术，但却可以转换成“造成伤害”法术。信仰中立神祇的中立牧师可以在上述两种法术转换中择其一，但是做出决定之后便再也无法改变。此选择亦决定该中立牧师能引导正能量还是负能量。

entries.name: 自发施法
entries.description: 德鲁依可以将事先准备好的法术临时转换成召唤法术，即使他事前并未准备该召唤法术也可。此时，德鲁伊会“失去”一个准备好的法术，换得一个同级或较低环级的“召唤自然盟友”。

entries.name: Spontaneous Change
entries.description: At 4th level, when entering a bloodrage, you can cast a transmutation spell that affects only you as a swift action, provided that the spell閳ユ獨 normal casting time is 1 round or shorter. The spell lasts for as long as you continue bloodraging, regardless of the spell閳ユ獨 normal duration. You can use this ability only to cast bloodrager spells you know.

entries.name: Spontaneous Generation
entries.description: At 3rd level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.tD76K8QGco9scT0r]{制造奇物} as a bonus feat. In addition, when you craft a magic item (except a potion, a spell-trigger item, or a spell-completion item), you may ignore one spell prerequisite without increasing the creation DC. You can ignore an additional spell prerequisite at 9th, 15th, and 20th levels.

entries.name: 自体再生
entries.description: 炼金术师可以使用此能力快速愈合身上的伤口。每轮1次，以一个自由动作，炼金术师可以恢复5点生命值，如同他拥有快速医疗5。他每天每2个炼金术师等级可以恢复5点生命值，如果他陷入昏迷且此能力还有每日使用次数的话，此能力会自动修复他的肉体直到他恢复清醒。

entries.name: 通晓徽记
entries.description: 对世界历史奥秘的展握对你揭开了神秘之力，让你可以统御现实。当你达到可以施放该徽记法术等级的时候，你可以自动学会该法术，就算该法术不在你的可知法术表上。所谓的徽记法术是指所有法术名称内有包涵“徽记”两个字的法术。要选择这个启示，你必须达到11级。

entries.name: Spore Infusion
entries.description:
Element wood; Type substance infusion; Level 5; Burn 3
Associated Blasts autumn, spring, summer, verdant, winter, wood
Saving Throw Fortitude negates

  Creatures that take piercing or slashing damage from your blast are infected with spores. If a target fails its Fortitude save, it takes 1d6 points of damage per round for 10 rounds as plants and fungi grow out of its body. At the end of that time, the target is exposed to the pulsing puffs disease. This infusion is a disease effect. When using a wood kinetic blast against a creature infected by this infusion, you gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls, to saving throw DCs, and on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance.

Pulsing Puffs: Blast閳ユ攰njury; save Fort DC 18; onset 1 minute; frequency 1/day; effect 1d6 Dex damage; cure 2 consecutive saving throws.

entries.name: Spray Infusion
entries.description:
Element water; Type form infusion; Level 4; Burn 3
Associated Blasts charged water, water
Saving Throw Reflex half

  You diffuse your kinetic blast to spray out wildly. All creatures and objects in a 30-foot cone take half your normal amount of blast damage. The saving throw DC is Dexterity-based.

entries.name: 流星飞射
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以发射一颗能量流星，射程60尺，造成5尺半径内的目标每先知等级1d4点火焰伤害，一个成功的反射检定可以让伤害减半。你每天可以发射1颗流星，在5级和之后的每5级额外得到1颗，你可以一次发射1颗以上的流星，但被多个不同爆破所笼罩的生物只会受到一次伤害。

entries.name: Spring Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.68m9du7zw2di7ew6]{羽落术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.kouqz0pm1xl8xilm]{变身术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.2jx5vqudbddi0a2w]{Pup Shape}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rauee0gjmvenijmr]{现形术}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.wp6qm9gnjxoqww4h]{Lightning Arc}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6vfauefzzmwl4az7]{连环闪电}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.f7gaaxcschrg2r0q]{雷暴箭雨}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7mstq5c76h3e6zzx]{时间静止}

entries.name: 春之怒
entries.description: 野蛮人的愤怒使她的身体和精神恢复活力。在狂暴时，她忽略了因老化而导致的属性减值。她也忽略了负向等级的减值，虽然她依然保留任何负向等级，直到被正常移除。野蛮人只能选择一个季节主题的狂暴之力，从春季，夏季，秋季或冬季之怒中选择。

entries.name: 奋力冲刺
entries.description: 每次狂暴时1次，野蛮人可以花费一个整轮动作以正常的6倍速度移动，或是以3倍速冲锋。野蛮人必须拥有“迅足”，且达到4级才能选择此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Sprint (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian adds 1/2 her speed to the distance she can move when she runs or charges.

  A barbarian must have the swift foot rage power and be at least 4th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Spying Touchsight
entries.description:
Element aether; Type utility (Sp); Level 4; Burn 0
Prerequisite touchsight

  You attach a sticky strand of invisible aether to a target and then project your senses along the strand, allowing you to spy on that target. Attaching the strand of aether requires a ranged touch attack, but if you activate this ability while your target is under the effect of your touchsight, you can use the strands from your touchsight instead.

  Once you have activated spying touchsight, you can concentrate on it to spy on your target with any of your five senses (though your own body no longer benefits from the senses you project); the strand lasts as long you concentrate, though you can switch which senses you are projecting each round. A creature using see invisibility or a similar effect can notice the trailing strand of aether and follow it back to you.

  A creature can break your spying touchsight by dispelling it, but otherwise, the only way to break the strand is if one of you uses a teleportation effect, moves more than 1 mile from the other, or is completely blocked from the other in all directions (such as if one of you were inside a telekinetic sphere).

entries.name: Squander
entries.description: At 15th level, you gain the ability to force others to waste the opportunities they are given. Once per day as a standard action, you can cause a target within 30 feet to gain the staggered condition for a number of rounds equal to your sorcerer level. The duration is halved if the target makes a successful Will save (DC 10 + 1/2 your sorcerer level + your Cha modifier).

entries.name: 律理之杖
entries.description: 在8级时，你可以令接触到的一把武器获得“秩序”附魔，持续轮数等于你的牧师等级的一半。在8级时你可以每日使用1次本能力，之后每4级再多1次每日可用次数。

entries.name: Stag Aspect
entries.description:
The stag can outrun or stand its ground against almost any foe. This aspect offers majestic grace and swift speed.

Minor Form: You gain an enhancement bonus of +5 feet to your base speed.

  This bonus increases to +10 feet at 8th level and +20 feet at 15th level.

Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a Large stag (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 4 150), but its space changes to 10 feet. While in this form, you gain a base speed of 50 feet, low-light vision, scent (30 feet), a gore attack (1d6 damage), and two hoove attacks (1d4 damage).

  At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial bonus on Acrobatic checks when jumping.

  At 15th level, you gain the Awesome Blow and Improved Natural Attack feats (Bestiary 314, 315) for gore attacks, and you can use Awesome Blow against a creature of your size or smaller.

Alternate Natural Attacks: Gore (P), hoof (B)

entries.name: 惊人打击
entries.description: 15级时，封印骑将可以把对手彻底的打飞。他可以用一个整轮动作，以最高攻击加值进行一次攻击，如果该次攻击命中，攻击会如常造成伤害，并且带来冲撞的效果。该次冲撞中，封印骑将的战技检定上得到相当于该次攻击伤害一半的加值。

entries.name: 醉步
entries.description: 狂暴时，每份酒精为野蛮人带来AC+1闪避加值，最大值为每4野蛮人等级1点。

entries.name: Staggering Gaze
entries.description: At 8th level, when a creature is affected by your gaze bloodline power, it is staggered in addition to being slowed.

entries.name: 恍惚打击
entries.description: 1级起，当你造成重击时，目标必须成功进行强韧豁免（DC = 10 + 1/2你的血脉狂怒者等级 + 你的体质调整值），否则会恍惚（staggered）1轮。这些效果与恍惚重击（Staggering Critical）专长叠加。目标必须对每个效果进行单独豁免。

entries.name: 木桩
entries.description: 4级时，任何被吸血鬼猎人拿来刺穿吸血鬼的心脏的穿刺武器或锋利的工具（例如岩钉）皆被视为木桩。如果此临时木桩被移除，吸血鬼会如常地复活。

entries.name: 追踪者
entries.description: 7级时，杀手【杀戮目标】能力的加值将作用于针对研究目标的易容、威吓和隐匿技能检定。

entries.name: Stalker Sense
entries.description:
The vigilante has a sense for danger. He always acts on the surprise round.

  At 6th level, he gains uncanny dodge, and at 12th level, he gains improved uncanny dodge.

  Only a stalker can select this talent.

entries.name: Stalker Talent
entries.description: The rogue can select a vigilante talent. For the purposes of selecting and using this talent, she counts as a 10th-level vigilante with the stalker specialization, regardless of her actual rogue level. Her sneak attack counts as a hidden strike with reduced damage for the purpose of determining the effects of her vigilante talent, which means, among other things, that she can閳ユ獩 apply any of the vigilante talents marked with an asterisk (*) to her sneak attacks.

entries.name: 坚定
entries.description: 在11级，审判者结合精神与肉体去化解特定的攻击。当她成功通过强韧或意志豁免避免一次原本成功豁免也会有次要效果的攻击，她将完全避免这个效果。这个能力仅能在审判者身着轻甲、中甲或未着甲时使用。一个无助的审判者不会得到这个能力。

entries.name: 可靠伙伴
entries.description: 在8等时，骑将的坐骑变得更加健壮与结实。坐骑获得健壮（Toughness）作为奖励专长（如果坐骑已经有了健壮专长，或在之后获得这个专长，由此专长所获得的HP加倍），并在豁免上获得+2加值。

entries.name: Stampede
entries.description: At 15th level, as a standard action, the cavalier can incite any riderless and nonhostile animals and animal companions within 60 feet of him to stampede. Each affected creature gains a +4 bonus to AC (this bonus stacks with the benefits of the cavalier閳ユ獨 challenge), the trample universal monster rule, and a bonus to damage equal to half the cavalier閳ユ獨 level for 1 round. The save DC against an incited animal閳ユ獨 trample attack is 10 + half the cavalier閳ユ獨 level + his Charisma modifier. Incited creatures attack whatever targets the cavalier directs them to unless commanded otherwise by a bonded master (in the case of a familiar or animal companion).

entries.name: 迎战黑暗
entries.description: 在15级时，骑士立誓毁灭一切胆敢与自己或生者为敌的不死生物。每当一个被骑士挑战的不死生物的近战攻击命中骑士或骑士的一个邻接盟友时，这个不死生物就会触发骑士的借机攻击，且骑士的这次借机攻击在攻击检定上拥有+2士气加值。如果一个被骑士挑战的不死生物对骑士造成了重击威胁，骑士会自动在对抗重击确认时在防御等级上获得相当于魅力调整值的偏斜加值，该加值是一个超自然能力。

entries.name: 鲤鱼打挺
entries.description: 拥有此能力的盗贼可以通过一个自由动作从倒地状态起身。如果在被威胁时起身，依然会受到藉机攻击。

entries.name: Stand Up (UC)
entries.description: A rogue with this ability can stand up from a prone position as a swift action without provoking attacks of opportunity, or as a free action that provokes attacks of opportunity.

entries.name: 星图预兆
entries.description: 你丰富的笔记以艺术图形和繁复的数学公式记载了星空的运作模式。每天1次，你可以花10分钟思考星图的意涵，以得到如同“通神术”的效果。你必须达到7级才有办法选择这个启示。

entries.name: 驭星者
entries.description: 20级开始，你对寒冷伤害和目盲免疫，你可以在自然黑暗和魔法黑暗中完美视物。此外，你于夜间的户外地区获得1点快速治疗能力。

entries.name: 星夜尘沙
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，萨满召唤来一团星尘包裹３０尺内一个生物。星尘会使目标如同蜡烛一般发光，并且不能从隐蔽和隐形效果中获得任何好处。目标的攻击和基于视力的察觉检定都会获得－１减值，该减值在４级及之后每４级都会增加１,最高２０级时的－６。该能力持续轮数为萨满等级的一半。不依靠视力的生物不受该能力影响。该能力每日使用次数为３＋萨满魅力调整值。

entries.name: 虚空凝视
entries.description: 在6级时，每天一次你可以呼唤出灵物锁镣捆绑一个60尺内的目标（通过意志检定则无效）。当你受到一个敌人造成的伤害时，被你所捆绑的生物也会同时承受该伤害；反之，如果被你捆绑的生物受到你或你的盟友所造成的伤害，那么你也会同样承受此伤害。这个能力不会在你和你的目标间创造有形的链接，并且你们之中的任何一方都可以通过切断和对方之间的效果线来中断本能力的效果。

entries.name: Starlight Agility
entries.description:
You gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避} as a bonus feat.

  At 8th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.9p0aAtCyLdcwnftS]{疾风步} as a bonus feat.

  At 15th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.jbvXxHpu7BVbCpwr]{闪电步} as a bonus feat.

  You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.

entries.name: 繁星秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.bl71og1gklwncmt7]{妖火}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ech2cibcsmsms9s7]{Dust Of Twilight}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.a6a6s9jysswthu3r]{群星的引导}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ni93l43asrq29ytd]{游荡星尘}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ifcnx1yyw6e7ousm]{托梦术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pzwe3gxjz8gthyaj]{梦之衣}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.y4881ol4t79wj7sf]{Circle Of Clarity}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{爱与和平}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{星界投射}

替代领域法术

  • 2nd - @Compendium[pf1.spells.zyfm6dq35i4hip4u]{催眠图纹}
  • 7th - @Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线}
  • 9th - @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆}

entries.name: 星魄血统
entries.description:
你是占星师和那些探索星辰背后黑暗秘密之人的后裔。当你凝望深渊的同时，深渊也在凝望着你，这股黑暗中的未名虚空扭曲了你的心智，灵魂，以及你的躯体，渴望着通过媒介跨越世界的鸿沟降临于此界。

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：自然.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jhyb2ana8jrk2lut]{隐形仆役} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ec2zmvdzi4m3puh4]{闪光尘} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qmorw7eojkfqr00m]{闪现术} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dwb03nzhbwb1b5nr]{召唤雷暴} (9th; 造成火焰伤害且于夜间户外伤害增加),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wqvy12w1xgk6l9b0]{翱翔天际} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{排斥术} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3bdfw5f15hwcxlth]{反重力} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.21ksduh3fm41vmjk]{高等窥视魔眼} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xhzme0v6tjq95fg6]{流星爆} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{盲斗},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.rt2cBQvEU0ANE3z4]{制造权杖},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{坚忍},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.V8GIvVaAofyw9xIl]{精通反制},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.cKxfEL5XOWuzLhfO]{精通钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{钢铁意志},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{法术瞬发},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (察觉),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{健壮}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施展塑能学派法术时，施法目标如果未能通过豁免，将被无数细微闪烁的星光闪到目眩状态，这一状态持续等同于施展法术的等级的轮数。

entries.name: Startling Appearance
entries.description: At 5th level, a vigilante learns to use the element of surprise to his advantage, startling foes that are unaware of his presence. Whenever a vigilante with this ability attempts an attack against a foe that is completely unaware of the vigilante閳ユ獨 presence (usually due to Stealth or invisibility), the foe is treated as flat-footed for the rest of the vigilante閳ユ獨 turn (uncanny dodge or a similar ability prevents this effect unless the vigilante is at least 4 levels higher than the foe with uncanny dodge). The foe also takes a 閳? penalty on attacks made against the vigilante until the start of the vigilante閳ユ獨 next turn.

entries.name: Steadfast Example
entries.description:
The shaman touches a willing creature and bolsters its mental and emotional defenses. The next time the target attempts a Will saving throw, the subject can use the shaman閳ユ獨 Will saving throw bonus instead of his own.

  The shaman can have only one creature under the effect of this hex at a time, and a creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.

entries.name: 窃取荣耀
entries.description: 8级时，骑将可以从其他生物的成功攻击中窃取荣耀。当骑将之外的其他生物对骑将威胁范围内的目标造成重击时，骑将可以对该目标进行1次借机攻击。

entries.name: 偷窃故事
entries.description: 在使用了浑水摸鱼来让他人的故事描述陷入混乱之后，盗贼可以做另一个对抗交涉检定来改变故事的细节，以此来让目标蒙羞。如果检定成功，目标将会在对抗任何听到这个故事的人的交涉和唬骗检定上获得一个减值。这个减值等同于盗贼的智力，感知，或者魅力加值（三者取高），并将会持续到目标想办法修复了她的名声或者转而羞辱了盗贼。盗贼必须在选择浑水摸鱼绝技之后才能选择这个绝技。

entries.name: Steal Voice
entries.description:
The witch can steal the voice of one creature within 30 feet, causing it to lose, for a number of rounds equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence bonus, all abilities that rely on speech, including talking, casting spells with verbal components, and using auditory bardic performances. A successful Will saving throw negates this effect. If this hex is used upon a willing target, the duration lasts for a number of hours equal to the witch閳ユ獨 Intelligence bonus.

  Additionally, the witch can change her voice to match that of any creature whose voice she has stolen with this hex, as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.26g4tysnax570dxo]{Vocal Alteration} (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 248).

entries.name: 盗窃一击
entries.description: 调查员在使用策士之击造成伤害时，他可以以自由动作，对被策士攻击伤害的生物发动一次窃取（Steal）APG战技攻击，并不会引发藉机攻击。调查员至少要达到13级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 隐匿掌握
entries.description:
你可以获得【技能专攻——隐匿】

  在8级时，你可以在你没有前置的情况下，获得【标志性技能——隐匿】（出自掉链子盗贼）

  在16级，你可以获得影舞者的【视线躲藏】作为职业能力

entries.name: 潜行绝技
entries.description: 当具有该项天赋的盗贼具有隐蔽（concealment）带来的好处时，她能够放弃一次藉机攻击的机会，并尝试潜行检定对抗引起藉机的敌人的CMD。成功则允许盗贼在下个回合结束之前，对该名敌人做出的首次近战攻击时视为敌人措手不及。使用该能力并不会算作消耗该轮内盗贼的可用藉机攻击次数。盗贼必须在潜行技能上受训才能选取该项盗贼天赋。

entries.name: 魅影狙击
entries.description: 拥有这一天赋的盗贼可以在使用隐匿技能进行狙击时承受-10减值而非是正常的-20减值来维持躲藏。

entries.name: 钢化围巾
entries.description: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以将你身上的围巾，手套，披风或是一片衣物化为长达30尺坚硬如钢的物质。你能用这个东西向外攻击，如同进行一次近战攻击。对此能力而言，你视为熟练这项武器，甚至可以发动战技攻击。此外，如果你有“武器娴熟”专长也会在这次攻击中生效。当你击中目标，你造成“1d8+1/2先知等级”的伤害，攻击之后这件衣物将变回原本的尺寸而且无害。你无法用此能力发起藉机攻击。你每天可以使用此能力的次数相当于“3+魅力修正”。

entries.name: Steel Soldier
entries.description:
Some vigilantes ceaselessly tinker with their armor until the two seem inseparable; masked maidens are particularly prone to developing this obsession. The vigilante can spend 1 day and 100 gp per class level modifying a set of armor with which he is proficient. The vigilante can conceal one set of unworn modified armor on his person as though it were an extraordinarily small object, as per Sleight of Hand, and can don modified armor without aid. The armor skin talent also applies to armor with this ability.

  At 8th level, the vigilante treats modified armor閳ユ獨 enhancement bonus (if any) as a weapon enhancement bonus when making attacks with the armor閳ユ獨 gauntlets, if the armor has any.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: 破金皮肤
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，你可以硬化肉体使攻击你的武器受伤或损毁。当近战或远程武器击中你时，你能以一个自由动作对其进行击破武器检定，即使还没轮到你行动（如果是远程武器，将它的CMD看做“15+攻击者的基本攻击加值”而不是攻击者的CMD）。这不会引起藉机攻击。若你击破武器战术成功，你对武器造成如同徒手攻击的正常伤害（而不是瘀伤）。这次攻击造成的伤害能忽略等同于你先知等级的硬度。这项能力不能保护你免于伤害，除非你将该武器完全摧毁。你每天可以使用此能力1次，持续时间为每先知等级1分钟。要选择此启示你至少要达到7级。

entries.name: Steely Resolve
entries.description: Three times per day, as an immediate action when the vigilante fails a Will saving throw against a mind-affecting effect, the vigilante can delay the effect閳ユ獨 onset for a number of rounds equal to half his vigilante level, after which the vigilante is affected as normal by the entire effect. Rounds spent delaying the effect do not count toward the effect閳ユ獨 duration.

entries.name: Stem the Flow
entries.description: When making a successful sneak attack against a creature with the ability to channel energy, the rogue may forgo 3d6 points of sneak attack damage to instead prevent the target from channeling energy for a number of rounds equal to half her rogue level.

entries.name: 逆流而上
entries.description: 8级时，骑将获得“禁止通行”专长，即使不满足先决条件也一样。在阻止其他生物移动时，拥有此能力的骑将可以进行一次普通的近战攻击。如果攻击命中并造成了伤害，该目标必须停止移动，就如同骑将进行了一次成功的战技检定一样。

entries.name: 严苛凝视
entries.description: 审判者擅长于察觉她们敌人的诡计并威吓他们。审判者在所有威吓及察言观色上得到审判者等级一半（最少+1）的士气加值。

entries.name: Sticks and Stones
entries.description: The slayer gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.bZ1YdzkT8NtRIEJ4]{随手武器} as a bonus feat.

entries.name: Sticky (1 pt)
entries.description: The eidolon is especially sticky, whether from a coating of adhesive slime, partially congealed blood, or tiny barbed spines. The eidolon gains a +4 bonus on combat maneuver checks to initiate or maintain a grapple.

entries.name: 粘性炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师的炼金炸弹现在可以在爆炸后黏着在生物身体上，并造成持续伤害。受到粘性炸弹直接命中的生物会在一轮后受到一次溅射伤害。含有特殊效果的炸弹，如果它的生效时间是1轮后，那么现在会在2轮后生效。选择这一科研发现需要10级的炼金术师等级。

entries.name: 粘性毒药
entries.description: 任何炼金术师制造的毒药都是有粘性的。当炼金术师向一件武器淬毒时，这件武器可以在等同于炼金术师的智力修正的攻击命中次数中依然保持毒性。这件武器可以一直保持毒性。选择这一科研发现需要6级炼金术师等级。

entries.name: 定发法术
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士每天可以释放一个法术，如同该法术被“法术定发Still SpellCRB”所增强。这不会增加施法时间或是法术等级。

entries.name: 定发法术
entries.description:
前提：魔战士等级3

  效果：魔战士每天可以释放一个法术，如同该法术被“法术定发Still SpellCRB”所增强。这不会增加施法时间或是法术等级。

entries.name: 心如止水
entries.description: 3级起，武僧在对抗惑控系法术和效果时豁免检定+2。

entries.name: Sting (1 pt)
entries.description:
An eidolon possesses a long, barbed stinger at the end of its tail, granting it a sting attack. This attack is a primary attack. The sting deals 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge). The eidolon must possess the tail evolution to take this evolution.

  This evolution can be selected more than once, but the eidolon must possess an equal number of the tail evolution.

entries.name: Sting (UC) (1 pt)
entries.description:
Requirements: Agathion, daemon, demon, devil, div, elemental, protean, or psychopomp subtype; tail evolution.

  The eidolon possesses a long, barbed stinger at the end of its tail, granting it a sting attack. This attack is a primary attack. The sting deals 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

  This evolution can be selected more than once, up to the number of tail evolutions the eidolon possesses.

entries.name: 恶臭炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师制作的炸弹现在可以产生一阵可怕的恶臭云雾，云雾覆盖范围是溅射范围的两倍，臭云持续1轮时间。炼金术师必须已学会“烟雾炸弹”才能选择此科研发现。

entries.name: 岩石最终启示
entries.description: 当达到20级时，你成为强酸与泥土的大师。你可以将以下任何一个专长应用于你的酸和土系法术，而不需要提高法术等级：法术增远，法术强效，法术默发或法术定发。

entries.name: 岩石秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 选择了岩石秘示域的先知将以下技能：估价，攀爬，威吓和生存加入他的本职技能列表。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.fv9mgob508qv99zz]{魔石术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gqtg9ruv8kkd0knf]{召岩术} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dkv9v4verb82fmpx]{融身入石} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.l83djt5019ujasjh]{石墙术} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术}(10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wgm8mm1za909pwch]{石言术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.g52zx1t1giteg5h1]{雕像术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{驱离金石} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.o8jhvddxgunzx94i]{巨石碾压} (18th).

entries.name: Stone Resistance
entries.description: At 16th level, you gain acid resistance 10 and are immune to disease, poison, and the sickened and staggered conditions. You also cannot be flanked.

entries.name: Stone Sculptor
entries.description:
Element earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 5; Burn 0

  You can sculpt earth into any shape, as the spell @Compendium[pf1.spells.g1evszmk8wfgnsv5]{塑石术}.

entries.name: 岩石魂域
entries.description:
选择岩石魂域的萨满皮肤将会变得粗糙而坚硬。她激发本魂域能力时，她皮肤下面的宝石将会浮现并发光，如同暗夜中的夜明珠一般。

  魂术：魔石术（１环）、召岩术（２环，stone call，ＡＰＧ）、融身入石（３环）、石墙术（４环）、石肤术（５环）、石言术（６环）、雕像术（７环）、驱离金石（８环）、元素集群（９环，clashing rocks，ＡＰＧ）

  魂兽：该魂兽看上去如同用石头和沙土制造出来的，有着细小的宝石嵌在皮肤中。该魂兽获得ＤＲ５/精金。

entries.name: 岩石魂域显圣
entries.description: ２０级时，萨满成为大地的存在。她获得强酸抗力３０。她可以在施放任何酸或土法术时，将下列之一超魔专长运用在上而无需提高法术位或增加施法时间：法术增远、法术延时、法术默发、法术定发。萨满无需习得这些专长。

entries.name: Stone Stabilitiy
entries.description:
You receive a +4 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground.

  At 5th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.gTrGPxzN054GfpkM]{精通绊摔} as a bonus feat.

  At 10th level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.feats.lNyMFFQaOxxTOW7M]{高等绊摔} as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to gain these feats.

entries.name: 稳如磐石
entries.description: 当萨满站在地面时，你对抗冲撞和摔绊的ＣＭＤ获得＋４加值。５级时获得精通摔绊作为奖励专长。１０级时获得高等摔绊作为奖励专长。你无需达成专长的前置条件。

entries.name: Stony Skin
entries.description: A rogue with this talent gains DR 2/adamantine. A rogue can select this talent up to three times; each additional time the rogue selects this talent, the DR granted by this talent increases by 1.

entries.name: 风暴炸裂
entries.description: 以一个标准动作，萨满可以在３０尺内一个生物周身制造出风雨雷暴。目标视其所有敌人具有隐蔽，在１轮＋每４萨满等级１轮的时间内承受该隐蔽带来的２０％失手率。该能力每日使用次数为３＋萨满魅力调整值。１１级时，萨满持用的武器视为拥有雷鸣武器特殊能力。

entries.name: 风暴之主
entries.description: 20级开始，你已化身为暴风。你对耳聋，震慑，和风力影响免疫，你对所有自然和魔法云雾及天气所造成的隐蔽效果获得120尺盲视。每日1次，当你被闪电和音波效果攻击时，你可以放弃豁免检定来吸收攻击能量治疗自身，每3点电击或音波伤害恢复1点生命值。

entries.name: 魂魄风暴
entries.description: 你呼唤你的先祖，以鬼魂般的方式伤害你的敌人，他们的愤怒将对范围内所有目标造成物理伤害。此风暴的射程为100尺，范围为20尺爆发，在范围内的生物和物品会受到每两个先知等级1d8的伤害，而不死生物则受到每先知等级1d8的伤害。成功的强韧豁免可以让伤害减半。你必须达到7级才能选择这个启示，你每天可以使用“魂魄风暴”1次，11级和之后的每4级再增加一次。

entries.name: 暴风血统
entries.description:
你的血统源自那些天空中骄傲强悍的精魂，闪电的力量于你的血脉中奔流不止。

  本职技能: @JournalEntry[dfjwbMEdt062TJtE]{知识}：自然.

  奖励法术:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.33pe0bge7b7aq3io]{电爪} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cnuin981hdq7ryit]{造风术} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.m84969gni5iu4bdt]{闪电束} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.bacuzpculp9tld48]{咆哮术} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wqvy12w1xgk6l9b0]{翱翔天际} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6vfauefzzmwl4az7]{连环闪电} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{旋风术} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴} (19th).

  奖励专长：

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.K4FEFu94JKOP2l51]{致命瞄准},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{闪避},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.9mcYid7xJY9NiySx]{法术增远},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.HMCAM3Zyo77kG8Yg]{远程射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{强韧加强},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8rsFtye3PwM6CKli]{近距射击},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{技能专攻} (飞行),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.9p0aAtCyLdcwnftS]{疾风步}.

  血统奥秘: 当你施展一个带有“闪电”或者“音波”描述的法术时，法术DC增加1点。

entries.name: 风暴之子
entries.description: 3级开始，你获得5点电击音波抗力，所有对你的风力影响效果降低一级。9级开始，所有对你的风力影响效果都降低两级，你对自然或魔法的云雾和天气影响带来的隐蔽效果获得60尺盲感。

entries.name: Storms Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{隐雾术}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.rrheoc0h80mbss7z]{召雷术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.t1uhggjfimtabp4v]{冰风暴}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dwb03nzhbwb1b5nr]{召唤雷暴}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1mkigzpu5hohovgw]{御风而行}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{操控天气}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.i9greyz3c0ap32vi]{旋风术}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n4e35m6qu9nmkhgm]{复仇风暴}

entries.name: 风暴子域
entries.description:
替代领域法术

  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dwb03nzhbwb1b5nr]{召唤雷暴}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风}

entries.name: 风暴行者
entries.description: 萨满可以无减值通过非魔法雾气、雨、烟雾或其它环境效果。她也不会因上述环境而减速，也无需进行特技检定来通过这些环境。她可以自由穿行于自身所创造出来的魔法环境。１０级时，萨满在任何环境效果（包括魔法环境）中的视觉距离是平常的两倍。

entries.name: 炸弹轰炸
entries.description: 炼金术师用炸弹轰炸40尺直线上的目标而不是产生影响半径。这条线从炼金术师的脚边开始并朝着他指定的方向延伸，炼金术师选择路径上的一个生物对其投掷攻击骰，并使他受到全额伤害，路径上的其他生物则受到溅射伤害。如果炼金术师有学习过“高爆炸弹”的科研发现，可以使用“高爆炸弹”轰炸80尺距离中的生物取代40尺。

entries.name: Strangler
entries.description: A ninja with this trick knows how to use a scarf, usually with a coin or large knot, as a lethal garrote. The ninja takes no penalties when using a scarf as an improvised garrote. In addition, as a free action when attempting a grapple combat maneuver check, the ninja can spend 1 ki point to gain the constrict special attack on that maneuver with damage equal to half the ninja閳ユ獨 sneak attack dice (minimum 1d6).

entries.name: 战场策略
entries.description: 8级时，骑将可以耗费一个标准动作给30尺内的盟友（包括他自己）带来数种收益中的一个。盟友必须能看到或听到骑将才能获得收益。骑将可以带来持续一轮AC的+2闪避加值、持续1轮攻击检定的+2士气加值、或是立刻进行一个仅能用于移动的移动动作。骑将可以给范围内的盟友带来不同的收益，但他的盟友每场战斗只能获益1次。

entries.name: 街巷最终启示
entries.description: 在20级时，你成为城市之力的化身。泥可以大声念出一座城市和一个生物的名字，如果该生物处于该城市中，你就会立刻知道他是否身处该城市。除此之外，你也可以了解你所在的城市，如同施放一个法术问道自然的效果，但是你只能在城镇和定居点中使用该能力，而非在自然环境中。

entries.name: 街巷秘示域
entries.description:
本职技能: 拥有街巷秘示域的先知可以将唬骗，知识（本地），察觉和潜行技能加入本职技能列表。

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{易容术} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{侦测思想} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.53dyu81yaw4y0nz4]{Glyph Of Warding} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7c0l64pfdkgl7j5y]{幻墙术}(8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.gk8fqfvj99d46p2h]{虚假景象} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.q5432hyeds4pncxn]{回城术} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.dsondqy4ngf1yzf3]{障幕} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.kqftgm3bi2dqj92l]{法师豪宅} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9968j68bl9x9iq7u]{克隆术} (18th).

entries.name: 意志之力
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个迅捷动作你可以忽视因为穿着中甲和重甲（或处于中/重载）而受到的移动速度减值，持续一分钟。在此期间，你还可以在对抗造成纠缠，恍惚或麻痹效果的豁免检定中加上你的力量加值。

entries.name: 力量奔涌
entries.description: 在1级时，以一个迅捷动作你可以在你的近战攻击，基于力量的战技攻击检定，力量检定和基于力量的技能检定上加上相当于你的战斗祭司等级一半的加值（至少为+1），持续1轮。

entries.name: 力量领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 大块头有大智慧——你的信仰为你带来不可思议的力量和能力。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.jnlr9cuepka1l26e]{变巨术}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.73han2zqxg59u18g]{魔化防具}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ui70binwqvjsgaam]{法术免疫}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{正气如虹}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.h2r6m68142borl8k]{擒拿掌}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0amu53wegzdp0axj]{金刚拳}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.1zyixa5b6aw7npub]{粉碎掌}

entries.name: Strength of Shadows
entries.description:
At 8th level, you gain cold resistance 10. Your melee attacks deal additional cold damage equal to the critical multiplier of the weapon you use.

  At 13th level, your cold resistance increases to 20.

  At 18th level, you become immune to cold damage.

entries.name: 坚若磐石
entries.description: 20级开始，你的身体如同金石铸就一般坚固，你获得伤害减免“10/精金”。此外，你对石化效果免疫。只要你还站立在地面上，你穿越狭窄地形时不受任何减值，并对冲撞、拖拽、擒抱、复位、绊摔战技以及任何带有受迫移动效果的能力免疫。

entries.name: 深渊强壮
entries.description: 9级开始，你的力量获得+2内在加值。此奖励13级增长为+4，17级为+6。

entries.name: 野兽之壮
entries.description: 9级时，你的力量获得+2内在（inherent）奖励，13级时+4,17级时+6.

entries.name: 力量秘示域
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.21bxbzdaawjrnvyo]{神恩}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.05i5rxwim12hwktu]{牛之力量}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.zq7xi7l5vgpqu7rt]{Magic Weapon, Greater}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0yvwyclhkf76veo1]{神能}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ax0ythzw8n4bta8]{正气如虹}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.8xjcrqg79ugxu5qu]{群体牛之力量}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.61uvtd18e9s6zku3]{巨人形态 I}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.y4oyspjsp6cc7btp]{巨人形态 II}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.n3lp01euzcdmtbw5]{形体变化}

entries.name: Strength Stance (UC)
entries.description:
The barbarian can summon mighty strength. She gains a +1 competence bonus on combat maneuvers and to her CMD. These bonuses increase by 1 for every 4 levels the barbarian has. In addition, she gains a +8 competence bonus on Strength checks to lift, push, bend, or break objects (this does not apply to combat maneuvers).

  This is a stance rage power.

entries.name: 力量满溢
entries.description: 你可以用一个标准动作赋予接触到的一个生物巨大的力量。在一轮中，目标获得等于你牧师等级一半的增强加值（至少+1），作用于近战攻击、基于力量的战技检定、基于力量的技能、以及力量属性检定上。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+你的感知修正”。

entries.name: Strike the Unseen
entries.description:
The vigilante gains Blind-Fight as a bonus feat. He can also deal hidden strike damage against targets with total concealment.

  At 10th level, he gains Improved Blind-Fight as a bonus feat and can deal all types of precision damage against targets with concealment or total concealment.

  At 16th level, he gains Greater Blind-Fight as a bonus feat.

  The vigilante does not have to meet the prerequisites for either Improved Blind-Fight or Greater Blind-Fight to gain these feats with this talent.

entries.name: Strike Through Shadow
entries.description:
At 12th level, you can declare a single melee attack as a strike through shadow. This attack moves through its target閳ユ獨 shadow and strikes from below or inside its armor. You make this attack against the target閳ユ獨 touch AC.

  You can use this ability once per day, plus an additional time per day each at 15th and 18th levels.

entries.name: 真击斩
entries.description: 15级时，勇武道的武士可以利用他年复一年的训练和集中注意力来做出完美的打击。当他使用此能力时，武士正常进行一次攻击。若该攻击命中，则直接造成重击威胁。武士必须正常进行重击确认投骰。该攻击造成最大伤害值，但武器附魔、偷袭、以及重击的额外伤害检定必须如常进行。这一攻击的伤害忽视任何目标可能拥有的伤害减免，并令其陷入目盲、耳聋、恶心或恍惚状态1d4轮（由武士决定）。进行这一攻击为一个标准动作。武士每日可以使用此能力1次。

entries.name: Strong Impression
entries.description: A rogue who selects this talent gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0jbkTJcIji9BNiF]{威逼} as a bonus feat.

entries.name: 强力划水
entries.description: 在游泳时，他可以骰两次游泳检定并取其高值。如果其他的能力或法术提供他的游泳检定骰两次取高的效果，那么他在这两次检定的结果上都得到+2加值。若他的游泳检定受到法术或能力影响，必须骰两次取低的话，他可以只骰一次游泳检定并且接受该次掷骰的结果。

entries.name: 人性学徒
entries.description: 1级起，你将交涉，知识（历史），知识（地方），知识（贵族）和语言学作为职业技能。此外当你使用这些技能记忆、学习或收集关于人类的信息时，你在这些检定上获得等同于魅力修正的洞察加值。

entries.name: Studied Ally
entries.description:
The slayer can study an ally or friendly creature he can see as a move action. The slayer gains a +1 bonus on checks and attack rolls to use the aid another action to help with that ally閳ユ獨 skill checks, attacks, or AC. This bonus increases at the same rate as a slayer閳ユ獨 studied target bonus.

  At 7th level, a slayer can study an ally as a move or swift action. A slayer閳ユ獨 studied ally counts against the number of studied targets he can have active at once.

entries.name: 战斗策略
entries.description:
调查员可以利用自己超人的计算和一双锐眼，根据对手的实力和自己训练出的优势，拟定最佳最有效的攻击方案。在4级时，调查员可以通过一个移动动作测定一个他可以看到的敌人。这样做可以让调查员在攻击这个目标时，在近战攻击检定上获得相当于自己调查员等级一半的洞察加值，在伤害投骰上获得同等加值，持续相当于调查员的智力调整值轮（最少1轮）或他进行了一次策士之击为止，取其前者。该伤害加值为精准伤害，所以不会因为重击而翻倍。

  一个调查员同一时间内只能对一个目标展开战斗策略，一旦调查员对一个目标进行测定，目标就会在接下来的24小时内不会受到同一个调查员的战斗策略。，除非调查员花费1点灵感点数并以一个移动动作重新测定此生物。

entries.name: 策士防御
entries.description: 每当调查员展开他的战斗策略能力时，他可以选择自己在对抗被他测定的目标时获得AC洞察加值而非攻击加值（但仍然保留伤害加值）。他必须在使用战斗策略时选择使用何种加值，并且除非他再次使用战斗策略否则获得的加值类型无法改变。调查员至少要达到9级才能选择本天赋。

entries.name: 策士之击
entries.description:
在4级时，如果一名调查员以近战攻击命中了一个被他展开战斗策略测定的目标，他就可以通过自由动作进行一次策士般的精妙袭击。4级时策士之击造成1d6点额外伤害，并且在之后的每2级时都再增加1d6点（在20级达到最高的9d6点）。策士之击造成精准伤害，如果调查员在进行策士之击时造成了重击，额外伤害不会翻倍。免疫偷袭的生物同样免疫策士之击。

  使用造成非致命伤害的武器时(像是闷棍，长鞭或徒手攻击)，调查员可以在发动策士之击时额外造成非致命伤害而不是致命伤害。他可以在使用造成致命伤的武器时使用策士之击造成额外的非致命伤害（仍然在攻击投骰上承受-4减值）。

  调查员必须能够充分地看到目标以找到一个要害并必须能够触到该要害才能发动策士之击。调查员在攻击有隐蔽的生物时不能发动策士之击。

entries.name: Studied Target
entries.description:
A slayer can study an opponent he can see as a move action. The slayer then gains a +1 bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks attempted against that opponent, and a +1 bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against it. The DCs of slayer class abilities against that opponent increase by 1. A slayer can only maintain these bonuses against one opponent at a time; these bonuses remain in effect until either the opponent is dead or the slayer studies a new target.

If a slayer deals sneak attack damage to a target, he can study that target as an immediate action, allowing him to apply his studied target bonuses against that target (including to the normal weapon damage roll).

At 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th levels, the bonuses on weapon attack, damage rolls, and skill checks and to slayer DCs against a studied target increase by 1. In addition, at each such interval, the slayer is able to maintain these bonuses against an additional studied target at the same time. The slayer may discard this connection to a studied target as a free action, allowing him to study another target in its place.

At 7th level, a slayer can study an opponent as a move or swift action.

entries.name: Stunning Appearance
entries.description: At 17th level, a vigilante can leave his foes unable to respond when he appears. Whenever a vigilante with this ability makes a successful attack against a foe that is unaware of the vigilante閳ユ獨 presence (see startling appearance), the foe must make a successful Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the vigilante閳ユ獨 class level + his Charisma modifier) or be stunned until the end of the vigilante閳ユ獨 next turn. If the creature has more HD than the vigilante閳ユ獨 class level, it receives a +4 circumstance bonus on this save. This ability is in addition to the effects of startling appearance and frightening appearance. Once a creature has been the target of this ability (regardless of whether or not the saving throw is successful), it is immune to that vigilante閳ユ獨 stunning appearance for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

entries.name: 震慑拳
entries.description:
1级起，武僧获得 @Compendium[pf1.feats.GsjouI6B8X7BA5wN]{震慑拳} 作为奖励专长，即使他并未满足先决条件。武僧每天可尝试的震慑攻击的次数等同于他的武僧等级，再加上每天每4个非武僧职业等级1次。

  4级时与之后的每4级，武僧都可以在他的 @Compendium[pf1.feats.GsjouI6B8X7BA5wN]{震慑拳}. 上附加一种新的状态效果。这状态将会取代原来的效果（震慑目标1轮），成功的检定可以忽略此状态。

  4级时，武僧的【震慑拳】可以令目标疲乏。

  8级时，可以令目标恶心1分钟。12级时，可以令目标恍惚“1d6+1”轮。

  16级时，可以令对手目盲或耳聋。

  20级时，可以令目标麻痹“1d6+1”轮。

  武僧必须在攻击骰投出前选择他要使用何种状态。这些效果不会其本身造成的效果叠加（一个生物若是被震慑拳打到恶心，他并不会因为吃了另一记震慑拳而变成反胃），但是可以延长状态的持续时间。

entries.name: 忍法·百式
entries.description: 选择此忍术的忍者获得一项满足前提要求的流派专长。

entries.name: Style Strikes (UC)
entries.description:
At 5th level, a monk can learn one type of style strike. Whenever he makes a flurry of blows, he can designate one of his unarmed strikes as a style strike. This attack is resolved as normal, but it has an additional effect depending on the type of strike chosen. He must choose which style strike to apply before the attack roll is made.

  At 9th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, a monk learns an additional style strike.

  At 15th level, he can designate up to two of his unarmed strikes each round as a style strike, and each one can be a different type.

entries.name: Stylish Infusion
entries.description:
Element universal; Type substance infusion; Level 3; Burn 2
Prerequisite brawler's flurry or flurry of blows class feature, kinetic fist
Associated Blasts any
Saving Throw none

  When you learn this infusion, select an unchained monk style strike. You can use that style strike during a flurry of blows with your infused blast, though you must still follow the limitation of one style strike per flurry of blows (or two if you are a 15th-level unchained monk). If you select flying kick, the distance is equal to your elemental overflow bonus on attack rolls 鑴?10 feet. You can use this infusion only while also using the kinetic fist form infusion.

Special: You can select this infusion multiple times. Each time, you must select a different style strike.

entries.name: Subjective Truth
entries.description:
The vigilante閳ユ獨 disparate identities allow him to defeat magic that detects lies. As long as what he says is true from the point of view of his current identity, it detects as true to effects such as discern lies, and he can say it in effects such as zone of truth that force him to speak the truth.

  A vigilante must be at least 9th level and have the feign innocence social talent to select this talent.

entries.name: 征服
entries.description:
在8等时，只要骑将使用近战武器，并对

  • 1.一个阵营为混乱，且智力3或着是更高的生物
  • 2.被骑将发现这生物在过去的一小时之内违反了当地的法律
确认重击后，他可以将他的魅力调整值加到重击最后的总伤害中。

  如果这记重击杀死了该生物，又或着让该生物昏迷（unconsciou），在这时，骑将可以用一个直觉动作，对着15尺内，所有可以看到骑将的敌人们，进行一次挫败士气（demoralize）的威吓检定。

  这能力在一场战斗中仅能使用一次。

entries.name: Subordinate Spell
entries.description:
The psychic can divide her mind to cast a less powerful spell upon herself alongside her linked spell. The linked spell can閳ユ獩 be lower than 5th level and can閳ユ獩 take less than a standard action to cast. This applies to the actual casting time, so the psychic can閳ユ獩 add a subordinate spell to a quickened spell. The subordinate spell閳ユ獨 casting time must be 1 standard action or less, and its level can be no higher than the linked spell閳ユ獨 level 閳?5. The subordinate spell must target only the psychic (even if it could normally affect other or multiple targets). The psychic must spend a number of points from her phrenic pool equal to 3 + double the subordinate spell閳ユ獨 level.

  The subordinate spell acts as though it had been cast, and uses up one of the psychic閳ユ獨 spells per day of its level. The effects of the two spells are separate, so each might require its own concentration check.

entries.name: Substantiating Bomb
entries.description:
Your bombs are infused with ectoplasm and a longing for life, lending ethereal creatures a measure of substance. You can throw a bomb that inflicts no damage but instead creates a 10-foot-radius cloud of fog that functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.g33euis7yi9pwddy]{云雾术} and lasts for 1 round per alchemist level. Incorporeal creatures that pass through this cloud become partially solid, taking half damage from nonmagic attacks and full damage from magic weapons, spells, and spell-like abilities. This effect lasts for the duration of the smoke cloud, even if the incorporeal creature moves outside the cloud閳ユ獨 area. A creature affected by the cloud can attempt a Will saving throw to negate the substantiating effects of this bomb.

  An alchemist must be 10th level before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Subsumed Spirit
entries.description:
As the alchemist grows in power, his parasitic twin laps up a portion of his soul, like a dog feeding on its master閳ユ獨 scraps. The alchemist閳ユ獨 parasitic twin can now manifest or hide within the alchemist閳ユ獨 torso as a move action. As a standard action, the alchemist can cause his manifested twin to babble, driving listeners insane. All creatures without the insanity special ability that are within 60 feet of the alchemist must succeed at a Will save or be affected by confusion for 1 round per alchemist level. The alchemist can urge his parasitic twin to babble a number of times per day equal to 3 + the alchemist閳ユ獨 Intelligence modifier. Creatures that successfully save can閳ユ獩 be affected by this effect for 24 hours. The alchemist is immune to its sibling閳ユ獨 babbling. This is a sonic, mind-affecting compulsion effect.

  The alchemist must have the parasitic twin discovery before selecting this discovery.

entries.name: Subtle Misdirection
entries.description: As a standard action, you can touch a creature or an object that weighs no more than 25 pounds per caster level to impart an illusory ward that lasts for 1 minute. Attacks against a warded creature suffer a 20% miss chance, and the ward ends once it negates an attack. The DC of any caster level check, skill check, or saving throw to detect or determine the properties of a warded item increases by 1, plus 1 for every 5 wizard levels you have. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.

entries.name: Succor Final Revelation
entries.description: You become a beacon of aid and assistance to your allies and those you deem worthy of receiving your succoring magical benefits. You can apply any one of the following metamagic feats to any spell you cast that targets one or more of your allies without increasing the level or casting time: Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell. You do not need to have these feats to use this ability, and you can use this ability any number of times per day on any spell that can be affected by the listed metamagic feats.

entries.name: Succor Mystery
entries.description:
本职技能: An oracle with the succor mystery adds Handle Animal, Knowledge ：自然, and Survival to her list of class skills.

奖励法术: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.mczdgwo3xl8c6e26]{衰弱射线} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qc7vnye0x975gxdf]{Shield Of Fortification} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lisojmynoblunlex]{协调行动} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.rxenoze8iyh9iyng]{Shield Of Fortification, Greater} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.knyako6zopc1chrv]{石肤术} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z0duc2v2n3ioynta]{高等英雄气概} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.uuzeynxotp9dzu15]{耗费术} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cc0or00vpiky87n7]{Spellcrash, Greater} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.77bihy40diufd6p1]{抑制法墙} (18th).

entries.name: Sucker Punch
entries.description:
Whenever the vigilante attacks a foe that is unaware of his presence (or who views him as an ally), and the attack deals nonlethal damage, the attack deals an additional 1d6 points of nonlethal damage. This additional damage increases by 1d6 at each of 6th, 12th, and 18th levels.

  Only an avenger vigilante can select this talent.

entries.name: Sudden Attack
entries.description: Whenever you take a full-attack action, you gain one additional attack at your highest base attack bonus. This ability stacks with the extra attack from haste, but it doesn閳ユ獩 stack with special actions that grant extra attacks, such as flurry of blows or spell combat. Sudden attack works as normal with full-attack options such as two-weapon fighting.

entries.name: Sudden Block
entries.description: After an enemy閳ユ獨 attack would hit you or an adjacent creature, you can use spirit surge to increase the victim閳ユ獨 AC, possibly causing the attack to fail, by rolling your spirit surge die and adding it to the chosen character閳ユ獨 AC. You must not be flat-footed, and you must be aware of the attack. If use of this ability causes the enemy閳ユ獨 attack to miss, you can make an attack at your highest base attack bonus against that enemy as an immediate action.

entries.name: 忍法·百面
entries.description: 忍者可以改变其外貌每等级1分钟，本能力如同‘易容术’。使用本能力为迅捷动作。忍者可以每日免费使用本能力1次，每额外次数需花费1点气。

entries.name: Sudden Insight
entries.description:
As a swift action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to gain an insight into your immediate future. You can use this foreknowledge as a free action before you roll any ability check, attack roll, or skill check to gain an insight bonus on that roll equal to 1/2 your occultist level (minimum +1).

  You can use your foreknowledge only once per turn, and if it閳ユ獨 not used by the end of your turn, the insight fades and you gain no benefit.

entries.name: 突然转移
entries.description: 一眨眼的功夫，你就能在别的地方出现。在一次近战攻击对你失手时，你能以直觉动作在视野内传送10尺，目的地必须仍能被此生物攻击到。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。此能力替换诡术领域的复制幻象能力。

entries.name: Sudden Speed
entries.description: As a swift action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to grant yourself a burst of speed. This increases your land speed by 30 feet for 1 minute. This ability does not stack with itself.

entries.name: Sudden Speed (UC)
entries.description: A monk with this ki power can spend 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action to grant himself a sudden burst of speed. This increases the monk閳ユ獨 base land speed by 30 feet for 1 minute.

entries.name: Sudden Sting
entries.description: At 9th level, when you are able to act in the surprise round, you can take a full round閳ユ獨 worth of actions rather than just a single standard action. You can also cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.3fkwj6d8s65ufwar]{加速毒发} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.l7e01shgg8c44zfg]{减缓毒发} as spell-like abilities a total of three times per day.

entries.name: 受难学识
entries.description: 奥能师能够通过被一个法术影响来学习怎样施展它。当奥能师在一个敌人施展的法术中豁免失败时，他能用一个直觉动作从【奥能源泉】中消费1点，来暂时性的学会此此法术。他能用他的法术位来施展此法术，就如同他当天准备了这个法术一般。此法术必须在法师/术士列表上，并且是他所能施展的环级。施展此法术的能力持续等于奥能师魅力调整值的轮数（至少为1）。

entries.name: Suffocate
entries.description:
Element aether, air, void, water; Type utility (Sp); Level 6; Burn 0
Saving Throw Fortitude partial; SR yes

  You use aether to choke a creature within 120 feet, air to create an area of unbreathable air around it, or water to fill its throat with water. If your target needs to breathe, it must hold its breath for as long as you concentrate. On each of its turns, it can attempt a Fortitude save in order to speak, but it can breathe only if your concentration breaks, you leave the 120-foot range, or you break line of effect.

  You can accept 1 point of burn when activating this wild talent in order to expel the air from your target閳ユ獨 lungs. If you do so and the target fails its first Fortitude save, it becomes disabled and is reduced to 0 hit points, and on its second failed Fortitude save, it falls unconscious and is reduced to 閳? hit points.

entries.name: Suffocating Grip
entries.description: While raging, when the barbarian successfully maintains a grapple, she can choke her opponent instead of dealing damage to, moving, pinning, or tying up her opponent. The grappled opponent cannot speak or breathe and must hold its breath or begin suffocating. The grappled opponent can take a breath during any round in which the barbarian does not maintain the grapple. Creatures that do not breathe are not affected by this ability.

entries.name: Suffocating Grip, Greater
entries.description:
When the barbarian is using the suffocating grip rage power, the grappled creature cannot hold its breath and immediately begins suffocating.

  A barbarian must be at least 12th level and have the suffocating grip rage power to select this rage power.

entries.name: 暗示
entries.description: 6级或以上的吟游诗人可以通过表演对一个已经被迷魂（见前）的生物使用@Compendium[pf1.spells.zqj5qzyl46af27v0]{暗示术}。使用此能力不会打断迷魂的效果，但需要在用以保持迷魂的自由动作之上额外花费一个标准动作。诗人可以在同一场演出中对一名生物多次使用此能力。一次成功的DC为“10+1/2诗人等级+魅力修正”的意志豁免可以抵抗此效果。该能力只能影响一个生物（但参见下面的【群体暗示】）。【暗示】属于惑控系（胁迫）影响心灵且与语言相关的能力。此能力依赖声音成份运作。

entries.name: Summer Patron
entries.description:
• 2级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.k4whhwm1dsz2upkm]{神莓}
  • 4级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lzos34s87qsc620l]{炽焰法球}
  • 6级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{昼明术}
  • 8级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.ph3krpxerzptnwbl]{Flaming Sphere, Greater}
  • 10级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.92hth51cs9oi0nfe]{火墙术}
  • 12级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nk37t5em8q4v1djs]{燃烧之风}
  • 14级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线}
  • 16级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆}
  • 18级——@Compendium[pf1.spells.qk3oeq4awbc1smjw]{火焰之躯}

entries.name: 夏之怒
entries.description: 野蛮人引导着夏末的炎热，使她周围的空气炙热并充满压迫感。野蛮人触及范围内的生物只要待在触及范围内就会一直疲乏，除非通过强韧豁免（DC = 10 +1/2野蛮人等级+她的体质调整值）并可免疫24小时。野蛮人只能选择一个季节主题的狂暴之力，从春季，夏季，秋季或冬季之怒中选择。

entries.name: Summer's Heat
entries.description:
The witch surrounds her target with oppressive heat, dealing a number of points of nonlethal damage equal to her witch level and causing the target to become fatigued. The target can attempt a Fortitude save to reduce this nonlethal damage by half and negate the fatigued condition.

  Whether or not the target succeeds at this save, it can閳ユ獩 be the target of this hex again for 1 day.

entries.name: 召唤怪物
entries.description: 从1级开始，召唤师可以将‘召唤怪物’法术做为类法术能力施展，每天可以使用的次数相当于“3+魅力修正”。作用如同正常的‘召唤怪物’法术，除了持续时间改为每施法者等级1分钟，而非1轮。召唤师同时间不能藉由这个能力拥有一个以上‘召唤怪物’，或是‘异界之门’法术的效果。如果使用了第二次，第一个效果将立刻消失。因为这些‘召唤怪物’法术与幻灵使用相同的能量来源，幻灵与透过这种方法召唤的生物亦不能并存。1级时，召唤师可以使用‘召唤怪物I’，到了3级、以及此后的每2级，类法术能力的效果提升一环，允许他召唤更强大的生物（最高到17级的‘召唤怪物IX’）。到了19级，这项能力可以被当作‘异界之门’或是‘召唤怪物IX’使用。如果使用‘异界之门’，召唤师仍需要支付正常的代价。

entries.name: Summon Nature's Spirits
entries.description:
Once per day, as a standard action, you may cast a summon monster spell of a level up to the highest level you can cast. You may only summon elementals in this manner, but are treated as having the @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{增强召唤} feat when you do so.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: 唤魂
entries.description: .  女巫招出了一个HD不超过18的类人生物的幽魂。鬼魂有自己的个性和欲望，但愿意跟女巫讨价还价，如同她施放了‘高等异界盟约’。作为和女巫契约的保证，幽魂需要相当于1个临时负向等级的生命能量（这是在使幽魂服务的标准价格额外的代价）。只要幽灵仍然在服务女巫，这种负向等级就会持续存在；女巫可以用标准动作结束该契约，并立即消除负向等级。

entries.name: 召唤者魅力
entries.description: 每当你施展一个咒法“召唤”子学派法术，持续时间增加你的法师等级的一半（最少1轮）。在20级时，你能够把任何召唤怪物法术持续时间延长为无限。你在同一时间内只能拥有一个以此方式无限持续的召唤怪物法术。如果你指定另一个召唤怪物法术为无限持续，则前一个法术会立刻结束。

entries.name: 盲目之击
entries.description: 在1级时，你能通过一次近战接触攻击，将太阳的烈光射入对手的双眼，这是一个光亮效果。如果目标未能成功通过反射检定则目盲1轮。如果目标生物拥有日光敏感或光线敏感特性，则在这次检定上承受-4减值。没有视力的生物不受这个能力的影响。

entries.name: 亡灵克星
entries.description: 在10级时，以一个标准动作你可以通过触摸自己的武器，为它提供炽焰或破敌（不死生物）附魔效果，持续一分钟。武器可以同时拥有这两种特殊附魔

entries.name: 太阳领域
entries.description:
神授力量: 你在灼目的太阳中见到了纯净真理之光，并能以它的祝福或愤怒帮助你。

  领域法术:

  • 1环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.pau0ejk30fs1eebl]{忍受环境}
  • 2环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.3b1x69kfhnsa2d54]{灼热金属}
  • 3环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.dnet1tyxbsnwailm]{灼热光辉}
  • 4环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.nfm6i9z9r3n2fku7]{火焰护盾}
  • 5环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.gmugktarbieojt59]{焰击术}
  • 6环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.0hknfnoaljc75fj3]{火种术}
  • 7环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.vax8ojz8g3oovwzu]{阳炎射线}
  • 8环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.j2mwv9wfxhqch10g]{阳炎爆}
  • 9环——@Compendium[pf1.spells.lxxliyxfw9uvbxmt]{虹光法球}

entries.name: Sun Stride
entries.description:
You can travel between areas of natural sunlight as if by means of a dimension door spell. This ability does not function in areas of less than bright light, though it does work within the area of a daylight spell.

  At 5th level, you can sun stride up to 40 feet per day; this can be a single stride of 40 feet or four strides of 10 feet each.

  At 9th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the distance you can sun stride doubles (80 feet at 9th level, 160 feet at 13th level, and 32 feet at 17th level). This amount can be split among many strides, but each one, no matter how small, counts as a 10-foot increment.

  You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

entries.name: Sun Totem
entries.description:
The touch of flame fuels and bolsters the barbarian閳ユ獨 rage. She gains fire resistance 10 when raging. In addition, for 1d6 rounds after coming in direct contact with open flame, her speed increases by 10 feet.

  A barbarian must have the lesser sun totem rage power and be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Sun Totem, Greater
entries.description:
The barbarian takes on aspects of the sun. She gains fire resistance 20 when raging. While raging, she is surrounded by a halo of flame that deals 1d6 points of fire damage to anyone that hits her with a touch attack or unarmed attack or succeeds at a bull rush, drag, or grapple combat maneuver against her. Her unarmed strikes and attacks with natural weapons deal 1d6 additional points of fire damage.

  A barbarian must have the sun totem rage power and be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

entries.name: Sun Totem, Lesser
entries.description: The sun閳ユ獨 fire invigorates the barbarian. She is immune to environmental effects from heat and severe heat, and she gains a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves against the effects of extreme heat. In addition, the barbarian gains fire resistance 5 while raging.

entries.name: 太阳祝福
entries.description: 每当你引导正能量以伤害不死生物时，在造成的伤害中计入你的牧师等级。在你引导正能量时，不死生物的豁免上无法计算其引导抗力。

entries.name: 破除强化
entries.description: 当狂暴的野蛮人成功对魔法物品进行击破武器战技检定后，那件魔法物品上的魔法能力被压制1轮，他的检定结果每比目标CMD高5再增加一轮，他必须先学会破甲祛法并达到八级才能学习此狂暴之力。

entries.name: Sungazer
entries.description:
You can study the sun and gaze upon any place its light touches. You can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.6kmkxepwgsbta6ui]{锐耳术/鹰眼术} as a spell-like ability, but only for visual observation and you can only place your sensor in places currently being touched by sunlight.

  At 10th level, you can instead use @Compendium[pf1.spells.g66w32kdup1f43bp]{探知} to observe any area touched by sunlight.

  At 15th level, you can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.glt6uk3n6g6l2p6l]{高等探知} instead. You must be at least 5th level to select this revelation.

  You can sungaze for 1 minute per day per oracle level; the duration need not be continuous, but it must be used in 1-minute increments.

entries.name: Sunlight Acclimation
entries.description: Time spent in the bright light of day has partially inured the alchemist to its effects. When the alchemist would normally take Constitution damage as a result of vulnerability to sunlight, he can attempt a DC 11 Fortitude saving throw to negate the effects. The DC of this saving throw increases by 1 for each hour after the first spent in sunlight within the last 24 hours.

entries.name: 日光炸弹
entries.description: 炼金术师可以投掷出一颗发出如同日光般强烈光芒和辐射的炸弹，其效果等同于“致盲炸弹”，但是不死生物、菌类、霉菌、软泥怪、泥形怪还有其他会被日光伤害的生物将会受到每伤害骰数额外+2的伤害；易受日光伤害的不死生物若在豁免中失败，还会额外恍惚1轮。要选择此科研发现，炼金术师必须达到10级并且学习过“致盲炸弹”科研发现。

entries.name: Sunlight Strike
entries.description: The slayer can reflect sunlight (or other sources of bright light) into the eyes of an adjacent target as a swift action, causing it to gain the dazzled condition for 1 round.

entries.name: Sunsight
entries.description: At 1st level, you gain low-light vision and cannot be dazzled. If you already have low-light vision, you instead gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against blindness effects.
